articles.title: Uvuko 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizohlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Uvuko"

Ake sivule iBhayibheli kuJohane Isahluko 11, amavesi 21-25, futhi siqale ukufunda;

UMarta wathi kuJesu: "Nkosi, ukube ubulapha, umnewethu nga engafanga. Namanje ngiyazi ukuthi konke ongakucela uNkulunkulu uyakunikwa." ,” kusho uMarta, “ukuthi uzovuka ekuvukeni.” UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila okholwa yimi, noma efa.

UJesu wathi: "Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila! Okholwa yimi, noma efa, wophila" Amen

(1) Umprofethi u-Eliya wathandaza kuNkulunkulu, futhi umntwana waphila

Ngemva kwalokhu, owesifazane owayeyinkosikazi yendlu, indodana yakhe yagula yaze yaphelelwa umoya (okusho ukuthi ifile).
(Umphefumulo womntwana usesemzimbeni wakhe, futhi uyaphila)

... U-Eliya wawela phezu komntwana izikhathi ezintathu, wakhala kuJehova, wathi: "Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngicela uvumele umphefumulo walo mntwana ubuyele emzimbeni wakhe." .Umzimba wakhe uyaphila. 1 AmaKhosi 17:17, 21-22

(2) Umprofethi u-Elisha wavusa indodana yowesifazane waseShunemi

Kwathi umntwana esekhulile, ngolunye usuku waya kuyise nakubavuni, wathi kuyise: “Ikhanda lami, ikhanda lami, wathi encekwini yakhe: “Yise kunina Wamthatha, wamnika unina, wahlala emathangeni kanina;
...UElisha wafika wangena endlini wabona umntwana efile elele embhedeni wakhe.

....Wabe esehla elokhu ehla enyuka ekamelweni, wakhuphuka walala phezu kwengane, yathimula kasikhombisa yabe isivula amehlo. 2 Amakhosi 4:18-20,32,35

(3) Lapho umuntu ofile ethinta amathambo ka-Elisha, owayefile wayevuswa

U-Elisha wafa wangcwatshwa. NgoSuku Lonyaka Omusha, ithimba labakwaMowabi lahlasela izwe impilo wasukuma. 2 AmaKhosi 13:20-21

(4) Israyeli →→ Ukuvuka kwamathambo

umprofethi uyaprofetha → Israyeli → Umndeni wonke wasindiswa

Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, lawa mathambo angavuka na?
Wayesethi kimi: “Profetha kulawa mathambo, uthi:
Yizwani izwi leNkosi nina mathambo omileyo.
Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova kulawa mathambo:
"Ngizokwenza umoya ungene kuwe,
Uzophila.
Ngiyakuninika imisipha, ngininike inyama, nginembese ngesikhumba, ngifake umoya kini, niphile;

"....UJehova wathi kimi: "Ndodana yomuntu, Lawa mathambo awumndeni wonke wakwa-Israyeli . .. Isikhombo kuHezekeli 37:3-6,11

Bazalwane, angithandi ukuba ningayazi le mfihlakalo (funa nizicabange nihlakaniphile), ukuthi ama-Israyeli alukhuni ngenhliziyo; kuze kugcwale isibalo sabezizwe , Khona-ke wonke ama-Israyeli ayosindiswa . Njengoba kulotshiwe:

“Kuyakuvela uMsindisi eSiyoni, asuse sonke isono sendlu kaJakobe futhi: “Lesi yisivumelwano sami nabo, lapho ngisusa isono sabo.”

Ngakuzwa lokho phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe zakwa-Israyeli Faka uphawu Inani liyi-144,000. IsAmbulo 7:4

(Qaphela: Phakathi nesonto elilodwa, ingxenye yesonto! Ama-Israyeli abekwa uphawu nguNkulunkulu → angena enkathini yeminyaka eyinkulungwane → okwakuwukugcwaliseka kweziprofetho ezingokwesiprofetho. Ngemva KweJubili LaseQian → wonke umndeni wakwa-Israyeli wasindiswa)

idolobha elingcwele ijerosalema →→ umakoti, umfazi wewundlu

Enye yezingelosi eziyisikhombisa ezazinezitsha zegolide eziyisikhombisa ezigcwele izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa zokugcina yeza kimi, yathi: “Woza lapha, futhi ngizokubonisa umakoti, umkaWundlu.
Amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli
“Ngaphefumulelwa nguMoya oNgcwele, izingelosi zangithwala, zangiyisa entabeni ende, zangikhombisa umuzi ongcwele, iJerusalema, owehla uvela ezulwini kuNkulunkulu kulo muzi; lalinjengetshe eliyigugu kakhulu, linjengejaspi, licwebezela njengekristalu, kwakukhona udonga olude olunamasango ayishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kukhona izingelosi eziyishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kwakulotshwe amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli.
Amagama abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu

Kukhona amasango amathathu ngasempumalanga, amasango amathathu ngasenyakatho, amasango amathathu ngaseningizimu, nangasentshonalanga amasango amathathu. Ugange lomuzi lunezisekelo eziyishumi nambili, naphezu kwezisekelo kukhona amagama abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu. IsAmbulo 21:9-14

( Qaphela: Izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli + abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu,
I-Israeli Church + Ibandla Labezizwe

Ibandla linye! )

Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?)

(5) Ngomthandazo: Ukuvuswa kukaThabitha noDorka

Kwakukhona eJopha umfundi wesifazane, igama lakhe kunguThabitha, okungukuthi ngesiGreki uDorkasi (okusho ukuthi inhlwathi), wenza imisebenzi emihle, epha izipho eziningi; Ngaleso sikhathi wagula washona.

...UPetru wabatshela ukuthi baphume bonke, waguqa ngamadolo wakhuleka . IzEnzo 9:36-37, 40

(6) UJesu wavusa abantwana bakaJayirosi

Lapho uJesu ebuya, izixuku zamhlangabeza ngoba zonke zazimlindile. Kwafika indoda egama layo linguJayiru, isikhulu sesinagoge, yaziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zikaJesu, yamncenga ukuba eze endlini yakhe; Kwathi uJesu esehamba, ixuku lambuthanela.

.... Lapho uJesu efika endlini yakhe, akekho owayevunyelwe ukungena naye ngaphandle kukaPetru, uJohane, uJakobe, nabazali bendodakazi yakhe. Bonke abantu bakhala beshaya izifuba ngenxa yendodakazi. UJesu wathi: "Ningakhali! Ayifile, kodwa ilele." wabuya , futhi wasukuma ngokushesha futhi uJesu wathi kuye ukuba amnike okudliwayo .

(7) UJesu wathi: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila;

1 Ukufa kukaLazaru

Kwakukhona indoda egulayo okuthiwa uLazaru, ehlala eBethaniya, umuzi wakubo kaMariya nodadewabo uMarta. .. Ngemva kokuba uJesu ewashilo la mazwi, wabe esethi kubo: “Umngane wethu uLazaru ulele, futhi ngizomvusa, abafundi bakhe bathi: “Nkosi, uma elele, uzosinda UJesu wayekhuluma ngokufa kwakhe, kodwa bona babecabanga ukuthi ulele njengokujwayelekileyo. Johane 11:1, 11-14

2 UJesu wathi: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila;

Lapho uJesu efika, wathola ukuthi uLazaru wayesenezinsuku ezine esethuneni.
...UMarta wathi kuJesu: "Nkosi, ukube ubulapha, umnewethu nga engafanga. Namanje ngiyazi ukuthi noma yini ongayicela kuNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uzokunika yona." uzakuvuka futhi." UMarta wathi: "Ngiyazi ukuthi uyakuvuka ekuvukeni kwaMobayi."

” UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila.” Okholwa yimi, noma efa, wobuye aphile;

3 UJesu wamvusa uLazaru kwabafileyo

UJesu waphinda wabubula enhliziyweni yakhe, wafika ethuneni; UJesu wathi: "Susani itshe."
UMarta, udadewabo wofileyo, wathi kuye: “Nkosi, useyanuka manje, ngokuba usenezinsuku ezine efile.” Wathi kuye: “Angishongo yini kuwe ukuthi uma ukholwa, uyakubona uNkulunkulu? ?" Udumo? Balisusa-ke itshe.

UJesu waphakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini, wathi: “Baba, ngiyakubonga ngokuba ungizwile. ungithumile. Eseshilo lokho wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Lazaru, phuma, izandla nezinyawo zisongwe ngendwangu ithawula: “Mthukululeni, nimyeke ahambe

Qaphela : Lezi zinkulumo ezibalwe ngenhla ziyindlela kaNkulunkulu yokuvusa abafileyo ngemikhuleko yabantu, ukunxusa nokuphulukisa! Futhi wonke umuntu makabone ngamehlo akhe iNkosi uJesu evusa uLazaru.

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila. Okholwa yimi, noma efa, wophila.

INkosi uJesu yathi: “Lowo ophilayo akholwe kimi akasoze afa. Kusho ukuthini lokhu? ). Uyakukholwa lokhu na?” Johane 11:26

Ukuze uqhubeke, hlola ukwabelana kwethrafikhi "Ukuvuka" 2

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Uvuko 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokufunda inhlanganyelo futhi sabelane "Uvuko"

Isifundo 2; UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasizala kabusha

Savula iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Petru Isahluko 1:3-5, futhi safunda ndawonye: “Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ngokwesihe saKhe esikhulu, wamvusa kwabafileyo ngoJesu Kristu, osinikile nizalwe kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo efeni elingenakonakala, elingenabala, elingabuniyo, eligcinelwe nina ezulwini. Nina enigcinwe ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngokholo nizokwazi ukwamukela insindiso elungiselelwe ukwembulwa ezinsukwini zokugcina.

1. UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasenza kabusha

buza: Lowo ophila akholwe yimi kasoze afa naphakade. Uyakukholelwa lokhu kuJohane 11:26
Wayesho ukuthini uJesu lapho esho lokhu?

Ngokuba nombhalo uthi kumiselwe abantu ukuba bafe kanye, emva kwalokho kube ngukwahlulelwa. Heberu 9:27

impendulo :Ukuzalwa kabusha! Amen!

kufanele uzalwe ngokusha

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: Kufanele nizalwe kabusha, ningamangali. Bheka uJohane 3:7

UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo!

Ukuzalwa kabusha → → Thina:

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya - Johane 3:5
2 Uzalwe ngeqiniso levangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15 noJakobe 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:12-13

buza : Wazalelwa u-Adamu?
Wazalwa nguJesu Kristu?
Uyini umehluko?

impendulo :Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) U-Adamu wenziwa ngothuli —Genesise 2:7

U-Adamu waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: noma inyama)— 1 Korinte 15:45

→→Izingane azizala nazo zadalwa, inyama nomhlaba.

(2)U-Adamu wokugcina uJesu

→→NguLizwi waba yinyama—Johane 1:14;
Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:1-2
→uNkulunkulu waba yinyama;
Umoya kaNkulunkulu—Johane 4:24
→Umoya waba yinyama nomoya;

Ngakho-ke, uJesu wazalwa nguYise - bheka amaHeberu 1:5.

UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo → uyasizala kabusha Amen

Sizalwa kabusha ( Omusha ) wenziwa futhi ngeZwi, elenziwe nguNkulunkulu, elenziwe nguMoya oNgcwele, lizalwa ngezwi leqiniso likaJesu Kristu ngokukholwa evangelini, elizalwa nguBaba waseZulwini, umzimba womoya) ngoba singumzimba womoya! amalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imiqulu yasendulo inezela ngokuthi: Amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). Bheka eyabase-Efesu 5:30

(3) U-Adamu waphula isivumelwano eNsimini yase-Edene - bheka uGenesise Izahluko 2 no-3
U-Adamu wephula umthetho futhi wona → wathengiswa esonweni.
Njengenzalo ka-Adamu, nathi sathengiswa esonweni lapho sisenyameni - bheka kwabaseRoma 7:14
Inkokhelo yesono ingukufa - Bheka KwabaseRoma 6:23
Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile. Roma 51:12
Ku-Adamu bonke bayokufa
→Ngakho-ke, kumiselwe ukuba wonke umuntu afe kanye ---Bheka kumaHeberu 9:27
→ Umsunguli u-Adamu wayenguthuli futhi uyobuyela othulini - bheka uGenesise 3:19

→Umzimba wethu omdala wavela ku-Adamu, futhi uwuthuli futhi uyobuyela othulini.

(4) UJesu wayengenasono futhi engoni

asikho isono
Niyazi ukuthi uJehova wabonakala ukuba asuse isono somuntu, kodwa asikho isono kuye. 1 Johane 3:5

abukho ubugebengu

Akenzanga sono, futhi kwakungekho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. 1 Petru 2:22
Ngokuba umpristi wethu omkhulu akakwazi ukuzwelana nobuthakathaka bethu. Walingwa kuzo zonke izici njengathi, kodwa engenasono. Hebheru 4:15

2. UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo

→→Izingane ezizelwe kabusha azinasono futhi azoni

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane 3:9, siyivule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye;

buza :UJesu wavuswa→Ingabe abantu abasha abavuselelwe basenazo izono?

impendulo : akanacala

buza :Angabe amaKrestu azelwe ngokusha wona?

impendulo :ukuzalwa kabusha( Omusha ) ngeke enze ubugebengu

buza :Ngani?

impendulo :Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu →→ (omusha)

1 Ungoni - 1 Johane 3:9
2 Aniyikona — 1 Johane 5:18

3 Futhi akanakona— 1 Johane 3:9

(Bantu abavuselelwe kabusha, aningoni ngani? UNkulunkulu uzokhuluma ngeBhayibheli! Anidingi ukukhuluma noma ukungabaza, ngoba nizokwenza amaphutha ngokushesha nje lapho nikhuluma. Inqobo nje uma nikholelwa encazelweni kamoya Amazwi kaNkulunkulu, amavesi eBhayibheli alandelayo azophendula:)

4 Ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye, akanakona 1 Johane 3:9
5 Ngokuba wazalwa nguNkulunkulu, 1 Johane 3:9
(Wonke umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uhlala kuKristu futhi uhlezi noKristu ezinhliziyweni zenu nasezindaweni zasezulwini. Abba! Isandla sokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba. Amen!)
6 Lowo ohlala kuye akoni Johane - Joshuwa 3:6
7 Uma uMoya ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningakaMoya - Roma 8:9
8 Ngoba wena (ixhegu) ufile, Omusha ) ukuphila kufihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu - Kolose 3:3
9 Wasivusa futhi (abantu abasha) wasihlalisa kanye naye ezindaweni zasezulwini kanye noKristu Jesu - Efesu 2:6
10 Umzimba uyahlanyelwa ( umhlaba ), okuvuswayo ngumzimba womoya ( ngokomoya ). Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya. 1 Korinte 15:44
11 Uyisidalwa esisha - bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:17

12 Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ( Omusha ) ayinakubonwa - bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:16-18

Isaziso: Umphostoli uPawulu wathi kweyesi-2 KwabaseKorinte 4:18 →Ngokuba asikhathazeki bheka "Ngizokubona( Indoda endala) kodwa indawo yokunakekela" bheka "Kulahlekile ( Omusha ); Le ndoda endala iya iba mbi kancane kancane ngenxa yokukhohlisa (isono) kwezinkanuko zobugovu - Efesu 4:22 → Umzimba wangaphandle womuntu omdala uyabhubha usuku nosuku - bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:16 . Ngoba amehlo ayabona ( Indoda endala ), yinyama eyazalwa u-Adamu futhi engowenyama Uthengiselwe esonweni Uma ona ngenxa yokulingwa izinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama, kancane kancane uyoba mubi futhi abhujiswe ekuqaleni useyobuyela othulini ngemva kweminyaka eyikhulu .

Umbuzo: Uphi umuntu wethu omusha ozelwe kabusha?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Futhi ongabonakali ( Omusha ) Indwangu yoboya! Njengoba kuchaziwe ngaphambili: UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wazalwa kabusha ( Omusha ) ukuhlala kuKristu, ukufihlwa noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ukuba noKristu ezindaweni zasezulwini, futhi nihlale ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba, nasezinhliziyweni zenu → njengoba uPawulu asho kwabaseRoma 7:22! Ngoba ngokwencazelo yami yangaphakathi (umbhalo wokuqala ungumuntu) → umuntu ongabonakali ophila ezinhliziyweni zenu ngumuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha wavuswa kanye noKristu futhi ungumzimba womoya amehlo anqunu Umzimba womoya uxhumene nomuthi wokuphila ezulwini, noJesu Ukuphila kukaKrestu, yidlani ukudla kokomoya kokuphila, niphuze amanzi aphilayo omthombo wokuphila, nivuselelwe usuku nosuku kuKristu futhi nikhule nibe ngumuntu, ogcwele isimo sokugcwala kukaKristu Ngalolosuku, uJesu Kristu woza Lapho ebuya futhi, ozelwe kabusha Indoda entsha izokwambulwa futhi yembulwe → uvuko oluhle kakhulu! Amen. Njengoba nje inyosi ikhiqiza "indlovukazi yezinyosi" esidlekeni sayo, le "nyosi yendlovukazi" inkulu futhi iminyene kunezinye izinyosi. Umuntu wethu omusha uyafana kuKristu uyovuswa futhi abonakale ngaphambi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka, futhi uyobusa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane, uyobusa noJesu Kristu ezulwini elisha nomhlaba omusha. Amen.

Noma yiliphi ikholwa elibonayo, elizwayo futhi eliqonda izwi leqiniso liyokhetha ukuhlanganyela nathi "IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu" Ibandla elinobukhona bukaMoya oNgcwele nokushumayela ivangeli leqiniso. Ngoba bayizintombi ezihlakaniphileyo ezinezibani ezandleni zabo futhi ezilungise amafutha ezitsheni izintombi ezihlakaniphile ziyayiqonda imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli, ziphakamise imfundiso yeqiniso, futhi ziqonde umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha Zingcwele, azinasono, futhi azikwazi ukona . Njengabantu abangu-144 000 abalandela iWundlu. Amen!

Kunamabandla amaningi afundisa iBhayibheli, njengebandla laseLawodikeya amanye awanabo ubukhona bukaMoya oNgcwele futhi awashumayeli imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli masonto onke, futhi abakwazi ukuqonda abakuzwayo !Uma ungazange udle futhi uphuze ukudla okungokomoya kokuphila, ungakazalwa kabusha, futhi ungagqoki (umuntu omusha) uKristu, uba yisihawu futhi uhambe ze. Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yawasola lawo mabandla afana neLawodikeya → Wena wathi: Ngicebile, ngicebile, futhi angidingi lutho; ngiyakuncenga ukuba uthenge kimi igolide elicwengisiswe emlilweni, ukuze ucebe, nezingubo ezimhlophe, ukuze ungavezwa, namathonsi amehlo, ukugcoba amehlo akho, ukuze ubone; IsAmbulo 3:17-18

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Isexwayiso: Onezindlebe makezwe!

Abantu abaholwa nguMoya oNgcwele bazokuqonda ngokushesha lapho bekuzwa, kodwa abanye abantu abaqondi noma bekuzwa Kungani lokhu? Kukhona futhi abantu ababa nenkani futhi bamelane nendlela yeqiniso, bacekele phansi indlela yeqiniso, futhi bashushise abantwana bakaNkulunkulu ekugcineni, bayokhaphela uJesu nabantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, uma kukhona ongaqondi, kufanele athandaze ngokuzithoba kuNkulunkulu futhi afune, futhi uyothola; Amen
Kodwa akumele umelane nendlela yeqiniso futhi uthole inhliziyo ethanda iqiniso. Ngaphandle kwalokho, uNkulunkulu uzomnika inhliziyo engalungile futhi amenze akholwe amanga. Bheka ku-2 Thesalonika 2:11
Abantu abanjalo abasoze bakuqonda ukuzalwa kabusha nensindiso kaKristu. Uyakukholwa noma cha?

(2) Noma ubani owenza ubugebengu →→ (Kungumuntu omdala)

buza : Amanye amabandla afundisa ukuthi...abantu abavuselelayo basengakona?

impendulo : Ungakhulumi nefilosofi yabantu;

1 ...Noma ubani owonayo akambonanga - 1 Johane 3:6

Qaphela: Noma ubani ohlala Kuye (ebhekisela kulabo abakuKristu, umuntu omusha owazalwa kabusha ekuvukeni kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo) akoni noma ubani owonayo akambonanga → Ingabe uwubonile umbhalo weBhayibheli La mavesi? kaNkulunkulu Enkulumweni YeBhayibheli! UJesu wathi: "Amazwi engiwasho kini angumoya nokuphila! Niyakubona lokho na?

2 Wonke owonayo akamazanga yena - 1 Johane 3:6

Qaphela: Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukuba bazi wena-Nkulunkulu wedwa oqinisileyo, nomthumileyo, uJesu Kristu. Kunephutha kwamanye amaBhayibheli e-electronic: elithi “Yazi Wena, Owukuphela KukaNkulunkulu Weqiniso” linegama elengeziwe elithi “munye”, kodwa akukho ukuthayipha eBhayibhelini elilotshiwe.
Ngakho, ngicela uzibuze, ingabe uyayazi iNkosi uJesu Kristu? Uyayiqonda insindiso kaKristu? Labo befundisi bakufundisa kanjani ukuthi wonke umuntu ovusiwe ( Omusha ), ngabe usenecala yini? Lithini iBhayibheli ngabashumayeli abafundisa ngale ndlela → Ohlala Kuye ( Ungumuntu omusha ), ningoni;

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

3 Ungalingeki

Qaphela: Bantwanyana bami, ningalingwa ngabanye, okungukuthi, ningalingwa ngamanga nezimfundiso; Omusha Hhayi enyameni yenu endala, emzimbeni wenu omdala onesono, kodwa umuntu omusha kini, ohlala kuKristu, ezulwini, hhayi emhlabeni, kithi. Omusha Ayibonakali ngeso lenyama" umuntu womoya "ngokwenziwa kabusha kukaMoya oNgcwele, nenziwe basha usuku nosuku futhi ube ngumuntu ngokwenza ukulunga. Lokhu kusho ukuthi owenza ukulunga ungumuntu olungileyo, njengoba nje neNkosi ilungile. Amen

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Lowo ohlala kuye akoni; Bafana bami, ningalingeka. Lowo owenza ukulunga ulungile, njengoba nje uJehova elungile. 1 Johane 3:6-7

3. Umhlaba wonke ulele ezandleni zomubi

Labo abonayo bangabakaSathane

Lowo owenza isono ungokaSathane, ngoba uSathane wonile kwasekuqaleni. INdodana kaNkulunkulu yabonakala ukuba ichithe imisebenzi kaSathane. 1 Johane 3:8

(Abantu emhlabeni wonke, abangaphansi komthetho, labo abeqa umthetho nezoni, izoni! Bonke balele ngaphansi kwesandla somubi. Uyakukholwa na?)

Siyazi ukuthi lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona; Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi. Siyazi futhi ukuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu isifikile, yasinika ukuhlakanipha ukuze simazi oweqiniso, futhi sikuye oweqiniso, iNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu. Lona unguNkulunkulu weqiniso nokuphila okuphakade. 1 Johane 5:18-20

Izokwabelwa enkulumweni yesithathu: "Uvuko" 3

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Uvuko 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sihlola ezokuthutha futhi sabelane "Uvuko"

Isifundo 3: Ukuvuka Kwabafileyo Nokuzalwa Kabusha Komuntu Omusha NoMuntu Omdala

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:17-20, siyiphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:
Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; Konke kuvela kuNkulunkulu, owasenza ukuba sibuyisane naye ngoKristu, wasinika inkonzo yokubuyisana. Lokhu kungukuthi uNkulunkulu ekuKristu ebuyisana naye izwe, engababaleli iziphambeko zabo, ebeka kithi leli zwi lokubuyisana. Ngakho singamanxusa kaKristu, njengokungathi uNkulunkulu unxusa ngathi. Siyanincenga esikhundleni sikaKristu ukuba nibuyisane noNkulunkulu.

1. Siyizithunywa zevangeli

→→Ungawabeki ( Indoda endala ) iziphambeko ziphezu kwabo ( Omusha ), futhi usiphathise umlayezo wokubuyisana.

(1) Umuntu omdala nomuntu omusha

Umbuzo: Umehlukanisa kanjani umuntu omdala kumuntu omusha?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Umuntu omdala ungowesivumelwano esidala;
2 Umuntu omdala ungoka-Adamu; umuntu omusha ngokaJesu, u-Adamu wokugcina - 1 Korinte 15:45
3 Umuntu omdala u-Adamu wazalwa;
4 Umuntu omdala ungowasemhlabeni;
5 Umuntu omdala uyisoni;
6 Umuntu omdala uyona umuntu omusha ngeke one - 1 Johane 3:9
7 Umuntu omdala uphansi komthetho; umuntu omusha ukhululekile emthethweni
8 Umuntu omdala ulalela umthetho wesono;
9 Umuntu omdala ukhathalela izinto zenyama;
10 Umuntu omdala uya ngokuba mubi kakhulu;
11 Umuntu omdala akanakulidla ifa lombuso wezulu;
12 Umuntu omdala wafa kanye noKristu;

(2) UMoya oNgcwele ulwa nenyama

Umbuzo: Uhlala kuphi uMoya oNgcwele?

Impendulo: UMoya oNgcwele uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu!

ukuze ahlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Ngokuba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu, omemeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” ( Galathiya 4:5-6 )

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. KwabaseRoma 8:9

buza Akushiwongo yini ukuthi umzimba wethu uyithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele na? —1 Korinte 6:19
→→Ingabe liyasho lapha ukuthi awuyena owenyama? — Roma 8:9

impendulo : Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Inyama yethu ithengiswe esonweni

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. Roma 7:14

2 Inyama ithanda ukulalela umthetho wesono

Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ngokwalokhu kubuka, ngilalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yami, kodwa inyama yami ilalela umthetho wesono. Roma 7:25

3 Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu →→Umzimba wesono uyabhujiswa, futhi uhlukaniswe nalomzimba ofayo.

Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono;

4 UMoya oNgcwele uhlala kwabazelwe kabusha ( Omusha ) ku

buza : Sizalwa kuphi kabusha (abantu abasha)?

impendulo : Ezinhliziyweni zethu! Amen

Ngokuba ngokomuntu wangaphakathi (umbhalo wokuqala) ngiyajabula ngomthetho kaNkulunkulu - KwabaseRoma 7:22

Qaphela: UPawuli wathi! Ngokwencazelo ekimi (umbhalo wokuqala ungumuntu) → lokhu enhliziyweni yami ( abantu ) mayelana nokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo ( umuntu womoya ) Umzimba womoya, umuntu womoya, uhlala kithi, lokhu okungabonakali ( umuntu womoya ) yimina wangempela ongabona ngaphandle nje Isithunzi ! Ngakho-ke, uMoya oNgcwele uhlala kubantu abavuselelwe ngokomoya! Lokhu kuzalwa kabusha ( Omusha ) Umzimba womoya uyithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele, ngoba lo mzimba wazalwa nguJesu Kristu, futhi thina singamalungu akhe! Amen
Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(3) Inkanuko yenyama iphikisana noMoya oNgcwele

→→Indoda endala nendoda entsha bayalwa

Ngaleso sikhathi, labo abazalwa ngokwenyama ( Indoda endala ) washushisa labo ababezelwe ngokukaMoya ( Omusha ), futhi lokhu kunjalo manje. Galathiya 4:29
Ngithi hambani ngoMoya, khona aniyikufeza izinkanuko zenyama. Ngokuba inyama ikhanuka okuphambene noMoya, kepha uMoya ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama: lezi zinto ezimbili ziyaphikisana, ukuze ningenze enikuthandayo. Galathiya 5:16-17

Ngokuba abaphila ngokwenyama babeka izingqondo zabo ezintweni zenyama; Ukunaka kwenyama kungukufa; Ngokuba ukunaka kwenyama kungubutha kuNkulunkulu; ngokuba akuwuthobeli umthetho kaNkulunkulu; KwabaseRoma 8:5-8

(4) Kuphakathi komzimba noma ngaphandle komzimba

Ngiyamazi umuntu ekuKristu owahlwithwa wayiswa ezulwini lesithathu eminyakeni eyishumi nane edlule (ukuthi wayesemzimbeni angazi, noma wayengaphandle komzimba yini, angazi; nguNkulunkulu yedwa owaziyo. )… Esehlwithiwe wayiswa epharadesi, wezwa amazwi ayimfihlo okwakungakhulunywa muntu. 2 Korinte 12:2, 4

buza : Umuntu omusha kaPawuli Noma umuntu wakhe omdala.
→→Ukudlwengulwa ezulwini lesithathu?

impendulo : Kungumuntu omusha ozalwa kabusha!

buza : Usho kanjani?

impendulo : Ezincwadini ezabhalwa uPawulu

Inyama negazi akunakulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu

Ngithi kini, bazalwane, inyama negazi akunakulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu, nokungonakalayo nokungabhubhiyo. 1 Korinte 15:50

Qaphela: U-Adamu wazalwa ngenyama negazi Ungumuntu ofayo futhi akanakulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu; Ngakho-ke, kwakungekona ukuthi umuntu omdala kaPawulu, umzimba noma umphefumulo, wahlwithwa wayiswa ezulwini lesithathu, kodwa umuntu omusha kaPawulu ozelwe kabusha ( umuntu womoya ) Umzimba womoya waphakanyiselwa ezulwini lesithathu.

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ukuxoxa ngezincwadi ezabhalwa abaphostoli mayelana novuko nokuzalwa kabusha:

[ uPeter ] Nizelwe ngokusha, kungengambewu ephelayo, kodwa ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelimiyo... 1 Petru 1:23, ngoPetru... Nabanye abafundi babona ukuvuka kukaJesu, bekhuluma encwadini yeZenzo. Abaphostoli bathi: “Umphefumulo wakhe awushiywanga eHayidese, nomzimba wakhe awukuboni ukubola.
[ UJohane ] Embonweni wesAmbulo, sabona abantu abangu-144 000 belandela iWundlu babeyizintombi nto futhi bengenasici.
Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. UJesu wathi: “Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, lokho okuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya.”— Johane 3:6; 1:13
[ uJakobe ] Wayengakholelwa kuJesu ngaphambili - Johane 7:5 wayekholelwa ukuthi uJesu wayeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ngemva kokubona ukuvuswa kukaJesu ngamehlo akhe siqu kuJakobe 1:18 : “Wasizala izwi leqiniso ngokwentando yakhe.

[ uPaul ] Isambulo esatholwa sasisikhulu kunesabanye abaphostoli - 2 Korinte 12:7 , NW, wahlwithwa wayiswa ezulwini lesithathu nasepharadesi!

Yena ngokwakhe wathi: “Ngiyamazi lo okuKristu, noma ubesemzimbeni, noma ubengaphandle komzimba, angazi, nguNkulunkulu yedwa owaziyo.
Ngoba uPawulu ngokwakhe wazalwa nguNkulunkulu ( Omusha ) wahlwithwa waba yipharadesi!
Ngakho izincwadi ezingokomoya azibhala zazicebile futhi zijula.

Kumuntu omdala nomuntu omusha:

( Omusha ) Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; 2 Korinte 5:17
( Indoda endala ) Ngibethelwe kanye noKristu, akusaseyimi ophilayo... Galathiya 2:20; uhlala kuwe, awusiye owenyama ( Indoda endala .... KwabaseRoma 8:9 → Futhi siyazi ukuthi uma sihlala (ekumuntu omdala), sihlukanisiwe neNkosi. 2 Korinte 5:6
( UMoya oNgcwele ) Ngokuba inyama ikhanuka okuphambene noMoya, kepha uMoya ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama: lezi zinto ezimbili ziyamelana, ukuze ningenze enithanda ukukwenza. Galathiya 5:17
( Ivuswe kanye noKristu njengomzimba womoya )
Okuhlwanyelwe kungumzimba wenyama, okuvuswa kungumzimba womoya. Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya. 1 Korinte
15:44
( Yembathani umuntu omusha, nembathe uKristu )
Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. Galathiya 3:26-27
( Umphefumulo nomzimba kuyalondolozwa )
Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokupheleleyo! Kwangathi umoya wenu, nomphefumulo, nomzimba, kulondolozwe kungabi nacala ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, futhi uyokwenza. 1 Thesalonika 5:23-24
( Ukuzalwa kabusha, umzimba womuntu omusha uyavela )

Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:4

Umphostoli uPawulu wabhekana nakho mathupha ( Ukuvuka nokuzalwa kabusha kanye noKristu ) waphakanyiselwa ezulwini lesithathu ipharadesi! Usanda kubhala izincwadi eziningi ezingokomoya eziyigugu, ezizuzisa kakhulu thina esikholelwa kamuva kithi singabuqonda ubuhlobo phakathi komuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha nomuntu omdala, umuntu obonakalayo nomuntu womoya ongabonakali, umzimba wemvelo. nomzimba womoya, nesono, labo abangenacala, labo abonileyo, labo abangeke ona.

Sivuswa kanye noKristu siyizidalwa ezintsha ( umuntu womoya ) unomoya, umphefumulo nomzimba! Kokubili umphefumulo nomzimba kufanele kuvikelwe. Amen

Ngakho nakithi maKristu babe abantu ababili , umuntu omdala nomuntu omusha, umuntu ozelwe ngu-Adamu nomuntu ozelwe nguJesu, u-Adamu wokugcina, umuntu wenyama ozelwe yinyama nomuntu womoya ozelwe ngoMoya oNgcwele;

→→Ngenxa yokuthi imiphumela yokuphila ivela enhliziyweni, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Makwenzeke kini ngokokholo lwenu!

Abashumayeli abaningi ebandleni namuhla abaqondi ukuthi kunabantu ababili ngemva kokuvuka nokuzalwa kabusha. Munye kuphela umuntu oshumayela izwi →Indoda endala nomuntu omusha, wemvelo nowomoya, unecala futhi umsulwa, unesono futhi akanasono Ukushumayela okuxubile ukukufundisa , uma umuntu omdala ona, uhlambulule izono zakhe nsuku zonke. Phatha igazi likaKristu njengento evamile . Lapho ubheka amavesi eBhayibheli futhi uwaqhathanise, uhlale unomuzwa wokuthi akushoyo akulungile, kodwa awazi ukuthi yini engalungile ngalokho akushoyo? Ngoba bathi " Indlela ka-yebo no-cha ", okulungile nokungalungile, awukwazi ukubona umehluko ngaphandle kokuqondiswa nguMoya oNgcwele.

Bheka "Izwi LikaYebo NoCha" kanye "Ukuhamba NgoMoya Ongcwele" mayelana nendlela yokubhekana nesono sendoda endala.

2. Yiba yisithunywa sevangeli likaKristu

→→Cha Indoda endala iziphambeko ze Omusha Emzimbeni wakho!

Lona nguNkulunkulu kuKristu owenza izwe libuyisane naye, angahlukanisi nalo. Indoda endala ) iziphambeko ziphezu kwabo ( Omusha ), futhi usiphathise umlayezo wokubuyisana. 2 Korinte 5:19
Bazalwane, kubonakala sengathi asinacala enyameni. Ngoba uKristu ukhokhe isikweletu sesono ) ukuphila ngokwenyama. Roma 8:12
Wayesethi: "Angisayikukhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo."

Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, ayisekho imihlatshelo yesono. Hebheru 10:17-18

3. Kuzovela umuntu omusha ovusiwe

(1) Umuntu omusha uvela enkazimulweni

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:3-4

(2) Umzimba womuntu omusha ubonakala ufana nomzimba wakhe okhazimulayo

Uyoguqula imizimba yethu ephansi ifane nomzimba wakhe wenkazimulo, ngokwamandla anamandla okuthobisa ngawo zonke izinto ngaphansi kwakhe.
Filipi 3:21

(3) Uyobona isimo Sakhe sangempela, futhi umzimba womuntu omusha uzovela njengaye

Bazalwane abathandekayo, manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; 1 Johane 3:2

Namuhla sabelana "Uvuko" lapha Siphinde sabelane ngalo ngaphambili (uvuko, ukuzalwa kabusha) Wemukela wonke umuntu ukuze akuhlole.

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli kusuka
ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu
Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezingu-144 000 ezilandela uKristu iWundlu.
Amen!
→→Ngimbona esesiqongweni nasegqumeni;
Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nezinye izisebenzi ezisekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abakholwa yilelivangeli, Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! Isikhombo kwabaseFilipi 4:3
Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa iziphequluli zabo ukusesha - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza ukuze ulande Qoqa futhi uhlanganyele nathi, sisebenze ndawonye ukushumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Ukuzalwa KukaJesu Kristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
UJesu Kristu uyazalwa

---Igolide, inhlaka, imure---

NgokukaMathewu 2:9-11 Sebezwile amazwi enkosi bahamba. Inkanyezi ezayibona empumalanga yahamba masinyane phambi kwazo, yafika endaweni lapho umntwana ekhona, yema phezu kwayo. Lapho bebona inkanyezi, bajabula kakhulu, babona umntwana noMariya unina.

okukodwa: igolide

Umbuzo: Limelelani igolide?

Impendulo: Igolide liwuphawu lwenkazimulo, isithunzi, kanye nenkosi!

omele igolide ukuzethemba →Ngikushayele ucingo" ukuzethemba “Senihloliwe, niyigugu kunegolide elibhubhayo nakuba livivinywa ngomlilo, ukuze namukele ukudunyiswa, nenkazimulo nodumo, lapho uJesu Kristu ebonakaliswa.”— 1 Petru 1:17 .

“UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuze bonke incwadi Owakhe akayikubhubha kepha abe nokuphila okuphakade. Johane 3:16

ezimbili: i-mastic

Umbuzo: Imelelani inhlaka yempepho?

impendulo:" i-mastic "Lisho iphunga elimnandi, elifanekisela ithemba lovuko! Limelela umzimba kaKristu!"

(1) Yeka ukuthi inkulu kangakanani imfihlakalo yokukhonza uNkulunkulu, okungekho ongayiphika! NguNkulunkulu ebonakala enyameni ( umzimba kaKristu ), walungisiswa ngoMoya oNgcwele, wabonwa yizingelosi, washunyayelwa kwabezizwe, wakholwa emhlabeni, wemukelwa enkazimulweni - bheka ku 1 Thimothi Isahluko 3:16.

(2)Siyabonga Nkulunkulu! njalo usihola kuKristu, esenza saziwe ngathi yonke indawo amakha okumazi uKristu. Ngoba sinamakha kaKristu phambi kukaNkulunkulu, kokubili kwabasindiswayo nakwababhubhayo. Kulesisigaba (indoda endala), uyiphunga lokufa (kufa noKristu) kulesosigaba (indoda endala) umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ), laba yiphunga eliphilayo kuye. hlala noKristu ). Ubani ongakwazi ukubhekana nalokhu? Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 2:14-16

(3) Ukwenziwa kwenhlaka yenhlaka yempepho kungenziwa gcoba "→Ngakho "impepho" ifanekisela umzimba kaKristu ovusiwe ngokuthi" Iphunga "Anikezelwe kuNkulunkulu, futhi owenziwe kabusha (umuntu omusha) kithi ungamalungu omzimba wakhe. Ngakho-ke, bazalwane, ngiyanincenga ngobubele bukaNkulunkulu. umnikelo womzimba , umhlatshelo ophilayo, ongcwele, owamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu, okuyinkonzo yenu yomoya. Bheka kwabaseRoma 12:1

ezintathu: Imure

Umbuzo: Imure imelelani?

impendulo: Imure Imele ukuhlupheka, ukuphulukiswa, ukuhlengwa nothando.

(1) Ngibheka othandiweyo wami njengesaka lemure ( uthando ), njalo ezandleni zami. Bheka IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo 1:13

(2) Akukhona ukuthi siyamthanda uNkulunkulu, kodwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi wathumela iNdodana yakhe ibe yinhlawulo ngezono zethu njenge . Bheka ku-1 Johane 4:10

(3) Yena ngokwakhe wathwala izono zethu ngokulenga emthini, ukuze njengoba safa ngenxa yezono, siphilele ukulunga. ngenxa yezinkinga zakhe ( hlupheka ), uzophulukiswa ( ukuhlengwa ). Funda ku-1 Petru 2:24

kanjalo" igolide , i-mastic , Imure "→→imele" ukuzethemba , ithemba , uthando "!

articles.title: Ukuzinikela 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sifunda inhlanganyelo futhi sabelane ngokukhipha okweshumi!

Ake siphendukele kuLevitikusi 27:30 eTestamenteni Elidala futhi sifunde ndawonye:
“Konke okusemhlabeni,
Noma kuyimbewu emhlabathini, noma isithelo esihlahleni;
Okweshumi kungokukaJehova;
kungcwele kuJehova.

------Okunye-kweshumi-----

1. Ukuzinikela kuka-Abrama

UMelkisedeki inkosi yaseSalema waphuma ukumhlangabeza, ephethe isinkwa newayini, engumpristi kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke.
Wabusisa u-Abrama, wathi: “INkosi yezulu nomhlaba, uNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, mayibusise u-Abrama!

“Ngakho u-Abrama wanika uMelkisedeki ingxenye yeshumi yayo yonke inzuzo yakhe.”—Genesise 14:18-20.

2. Ukuzinikela kukaJakobe

UJakobe wenza isifungo: “Uma uNkulunkulu eyakuba nami, angigcine endleleni yami, angiphe ukudla engikudlayo nezingubo zokugqoka, ukuze ngibuyele endlini kababa ngokuthula, ngiyomenza uJehova uNkulunkulu wami. .

Amatshe engiwamise abe yizinsika futhi ayakuba yithempeli likaNkulunkulu; ”— Genesise 28:20-22

3. Ukuzinikela Kwama-Israyeli

Ngokuba nginike amaLevi njengefa okweshumi komkhiqizo wabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, okuwumnikelo wokuphakanyiswa kuJehova. Ngakho ngathi kubo: ‘Akuyikuba nafa phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. ’”
UJehova wayala uMose, wathi: “Yisho kumaLevi, uthi kuwo: ‘Okweshumi eniyakuthatha kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, engininika kona kube yifa lenu, niyakunikela ngeminikelo yenu kuJehova INKOSI — Numeri 18:24-26
Kuzo zonke izipho eniziphiwayo, okuhle kunakho konke, okungcwelisiwe, kuyakunikelwa njengomnikelo wokuphakanyiswa kuJehova. — Numeri 18:29

4. Nika abampofu okweshumi

Njalo iminyaka emithathu ngumnyaka wokwetshumi, lithathe ingxenye yetshumi yomhlaba wonke.
Linike amaLevi (abenzi bomsebenzi ongcwele) nabafokazi, izintandane nabafelokazi, ukuze babe nokudla okwanele emasangweni akho. Duteronomi 26:12

5. Okweshumi kungokukaJehova

“Konke okusemhlabeni,
Noma kuyimbewu emhlabathini, noma isithelo esihlahleni;
Okweshumi kungokukaJehova;
kungcwele kuJehova.

— Levitikusi 27:30

6. Ulibo lungekaJehova

Kufanele usebenzise impahla yakho
+ futhi ulibo lwezithelo zakho zimdumise uJehova.
Khona-ke izinqolobane zakho ziyogcwala ngokwedlulele;

Izikhamo zakho zewayini zichichima iwayini elisha. — IzAga 3:9-10

7. Zama ukufaka ingxenye eyodwa kweshumi ku-"Tianku"

Ngivivinyeni ngokuletha okweshumi okupheleleyo kokweshumi kwenu endlini yengcebo, ukuze kube nokudla endlini yami, usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Ingabe izokuvulela amafasitela asezulwini futhi ikuthululele izibusiso, ngisho noma ingekho indawo yokuyithola? — Malaki 3:10

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli kusuka

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Ukuzinikela 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokufunda inhlanganyelo futhi sabelane ngokuzinikela kobuKristu!

Ake siphenye kuMathewu 13:22-23 eTestamenteni Elisha eBhayibhelini sifunde ndawonye: Ohlwanyelwe emeveni nguye olizwayo izwi, kepha iminako yezwe nokukhohlisa kwemali kuliminyanisa izwi. ukuthi lingethele . Okuhlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilowo olizwayo izwi, aliqonde, athele isithelo, ngekhulu, namashumi ayisithupha, futhi ngezinye ngamashumi amathathu. "

1. Ukuzinikela koDokotela abavela eMpumalanga

... Izazi ezithile zeza eJerusalema zivela empumalanga, zithi: “Uphi lowo ozelwe eyinkosi yabaJuda na? Sibonile inkanyezi yakhe empumalanga, futhi size ukuzokhuleka kuye.

...Zathi ziyibona inkanyezi, zathokoza kakhulu, zangena endlini, zabona umntwana enoMariya unina; , inhlaka, nomure. Mathewu 2:1-11

【Ukholo.Ithemba.Uthando】

igolide :Imele isithunzi nokuzethemba!
i-mastic : Imele iphunga nethemba lovuko!

Imure :Kumele ukuphulukiswa, ukuhlupheka, ukuhlengwa nothando!

2. Ukuzinikela kwezinhlobo ezimbili zabantu

(1) UKayini no-Abela

UKayini → Ngolunye usuku uKayini waletha umnikelo wezithelo zomhlabathi kuJehova;
U-Abela → U-Abela naye wanikela ngezibulo lezimvu zakhe namanoni awo. UJehova wamnaka u-Abela nomnikelo wakhe, kepha uKayini nomnikelo wakhe akabanga naye.

UKhayini wathukuthela kakhulu futhi ubuso bakhe bashintsha. Genesise 4:3-5

buza :Kungani uthathele u-Abela nomnikelo wakhe?

impendulo : Ngokukholwa u-Abela (onikela ngamazibulo ezimvu zakhe namanoni awo) wanikela kuNkulunkulu umhlatshelo omuhle kunoKayini, kanjalo wafakazelwa ukuthi ulungisisiwe, ukuthi uNkulunkulu waveza ukuthi ulungile. Nakuba afa, wayesakhuluma ngenxa yalolu kholo. Isikhombo Hebheru 11:4 ;

Lokho uKayini ayekunikela kwakungenalo ukholo, uthando, nenhlonipho ngoNkulunkulu, uJehova, wavele wanikela ngalokho okukhiqiziwe komhlabathi, futhi akazange anikele ngolibo lomkhiqizo omuhle njengomnikelo nakuba iBhayibheli lingazange likuchaze wayesemkhuzile wathi umnikelo wakhe awumuhle futhi awemukeleki.

→INkosi yathi kuKayini: "Uthukuthelelani? Kungani ubuso bakho bushintshile? Uma wenza kahle, ngeke wamukeleke? Uma wenza kabi, isono sicathamela ngasemnyango. Siyokukhanuka. uyolinqoba.”—Genesise 4:6-7.

(2) Abazenzisi banikela okweshumi

(UJesu) wathi: “Maye kini, babhali nabaFarisi, bazenzisi!

Kunalokho, izindaba ezibaluleke kakhulu emthethweni, eziwubulungisa, isihe, nokwethembeka, azisamukeleki. Lokhu kuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu okufanele uyenze; Mathewu 23:23

UmFarisi wema wazikhulekela wathi: ‘Nkulunkulu, ngiyakubonga ngokuthi anginjengabanye abantu, abaphangi, abangalungile, iziphingi, nanjengalo mthelisi. Ngizila ukudla kabili ngeviki futhi nginikela okweshumi kwakho konke engikutholayo. ’—Luka 18:11-12

(3) UNkulunkulu akakuthandi okunikelwa ngokomthetho

Awuyithandi iminikelo yokushiswa neminikelo yesono.
Ngaleso sikhathi ngathi: Nkulunkulu, nangu ngiza,
Ukwenza intando yakho;
Izenzo zami zilotshiwe emiqulwini.

Ithi: “Umhlatshelo nesipho, umnikelo wokushiswa nomnikelo wesono, ongawuthandanga futhi ongawuthandanga (lokhu kungokomthetho)”;

buza : Kungani ungakuthandi okunikezwayo ngokomthetho?

impendulo : Lokho okunikezwayo ngokomthetho kuwumyalo odinga ukwenziwa kwezimiso, kunokuba umnikelo onjalo ukhumbuze abantu izono iminyaka ngeminyaka, kodwa awunakususwa izono.

Kodwa le mihlatshelo yayiyisikhumbuzo sonyaka sesono, ngoba igazi lezinkunzi nelezimbuzi lalingenakususa isono. Hebheru 10:3-4

(4) Nikela "okukodwa kweshumi"

“Konke okusemhlabeni,
Noma kuyimbewu emhlabathini, noma isithelo esihlahleni;
Okweshumi kungokukaJehova;
kungcwele kuJehova.

— Levitikusi 27:30

→→u-Abrahama wanikela okweshumi

Wabusisa u-Abrama, wathi: “UJehova wezulu nomhlaba, uNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, makabusise u-Abrama! Genesise 14:19-20

→→UJakobe wanikeza ingxenye eyodwa kweshumi

Amatshe engiwamise abe yizinsika futhi ayakuba yithempeli likaNkulunkulu; ” Genesise 28:22

→→AbaFarisi banikela okweshumi

Ngizila ukudla kabili ngeviki futhi nginikela okweshumi kwakho konke engikutholayo. Luka 18:12

Qaphela: Ngenxa yokuthi u-Abrahama noJakobe babazi ezinhliziyweni zabo ukuthi konke ababekuthola bakuphiwa nguNkulunkulu, ngakho babezimisele ukunikela ngamaphesenti ayishumi;

AbaFarisi, ngakolunye uhlangothi, babengaphansi komthetho futhi benikela ngokulandela iziqondiso zomthetho Bathola yonke imali yabo ngobuhlakani babo banikela ngokunye okweshumi kwakho “konke engangikuzuzile” njengokukhokha intela ngempoqo.

Ngakho-ke, ukuziphatha kanye nengqondo yokunikela "kweshumi" kuhluke ngokuphelele.

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

3. Ukuzinikela komfelokazi ompofu

UJesu wathi ephakamisa amehlo, wabona umuntu oyisicebi ebeka umnikelo wakhe emnikelweni, nomfelokazi ompofu ebeka izinhlamvu zemali ezimbili ezincane unakho okungaphezu kwalokho abanakho.” , wakubeka emnikelweni, kodwa umfelokazi wafaka konke ayenakho ngenxa yokuntula kwakhe siqu (ukholo ekuthandeni uNkulunkulu).” ( Luka 21:1-4 )

ubumpofu :Ubumpofu bemali yezinto ezibonakalayo
umfelokazi :Isizungu ngaphandle kokusekela

owesifazane : Kusho ukuthi umfazi uphelelwa amandla.

4. Nikelani abangcwele imali

Maqondana nokupha abangcwele, njengalokho ngayala amabandla aseGalathiya, yenzani kanjalo nani. Ngosuku lokuqala lwesonto yilowo nalowo makabekele eceleni imali ngokwenzuzo yakhe ukuze angayilande lapho ngifika. 1 Korinte 16:1-2
Kodwa ningakhohlwa ukwenza okuhle nokupha, ngokuba iminikelo enjalo iyamthokozisa uNkulunkulu. Hebheru 13:16

5. Zimisele ukufaka isandla

buza : AmaKristu anikela kanjani?

impendulo : Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) ngokuzithandela

Bazalwane, ngiyanitshela ngomusa uNkulunkulu awuphe amabandla aseMakedoniya, nakuba ayephakathi kokulingwa okukhulu nezinsizi, ayesegcwele injabulo nakuba ayempofu kakhulu. Ngingafakaza ukuthi banikela ngokukhululeka nangokuvumayo ngokwamandla abo nangaphezu kwamandla abo, 2 Korinte 8:1-3

(2) Hhayi ngenxa yokungabaza

Ngakho-ke ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele ngicele labo bazalwane ukuba beze kini kuqala futhi balungiselele iminikelo eyayithenjiswe ngaphambili, ukuze kubonakale ukuthi eninikela ngakho ngokuthanda hhayi ngokuphoqwa. 2 Korinte 9:5

(3) Hlanganyela ezinzuzweni ezingokomoya

Kodwa manje ngiya eJerusalema ngiyokhonza abangcwele. Ngokuba abaseMakedoniya nabaseAkaya babethanda ukubuthela iminikelo yabampofu kwabangcwele baseJerusalema.
Nakuba lokhu kuwukuzimisela kwabo, empeleni kubhekwa njengesikweletu esikweletwayo (isikweletu sokushumayela ivangeli kanye nokuhlinzekela ukushiyeka kwabangcwele nabampofu); basekele impilo yabo. Roma 15:25-27

Bamba iqhaza ezinzuzweni ezingokomoya:

buza : Iyini inzuzo engokomoya?

impendulo : Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1: Abantu mabakholelwe ivangeli futhi basindiswe— KwabaseRoma 1:16-17
2: Qonda iqiniso levangeli—1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18
3: Ukuze niqonde ukuphindukuzalwa—Johane 3:5-7
4: Kholwa ekufeni, ukumbelwa, nokuvuka kanye noKristu— Roma 6:6-8
5: Qonda ukuthi umuntu omdala uqala ukufa, futhi umuntu omusha ubonakalisa ukuphila kukaJesu—2 Korinte 4:10-12
6: Indlela yokukholwa nokusebenza kanye noJesu—Johane 6:28-29
7: Indlela Yokukhazinyuliswa NoJesu—Roma 6:17
8: Indlela yokuthola umvuzo—1 Korinte 9:24
9: Tholani umqhele wenkazimulo—1 Petru 5:4
10: Uvuko olungcono— Hebheru 11:35
11: Busa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane—IsAmbulo 20:6
12: Busa noJesu kuze kube phakade naphakade—IsAmbulo 22:3-5

Qaphela: Ngakho-ke, uma ninikela ngentshiseko ekusekeleni umsebenzi ongcwele endlini kaNkulunkulu, izinceku ezishumayela ivangeli leqiniso, nabazalwane abampofu phakathi kwabangcwele, nisebenza kanyekanye noNkulunkulu izinceku zikaKristu, uNkulunkulu uyokukhumbula. Izinceku zeNkosi uJesu Kristu, bayonihola ukuba nidle futhi niphuze ukudla okungokomoya kokuphila, ukuze ukuphila kwenu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana futhi nibe novuko olungcono esikhathini esizayo. Amen!

Nalandela uJesu, nakholelwa evangelini leqiniso, futhi nesekela izinceku ezishumayela ivangeli leqiniso! Bathola inkazimulo, umvuzo, nomqhele ofanayo noJesu Kristu →→ Okusho ukuthi, uyafana nabo: thola inkazimulo, umvuzo, nomqhele ndawonye, uvuko olungcono, uvuko lwangaphambi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka, nokubusa kukaKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane , Amazulu amasha nomhlaba omusha noJesu Kristu obusa phakade naphakade. Amen!

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(Njengesizwe sakwaLevi sakhokha okweshumi ngo-Abrahama)

→→Kungashiwo futhi ukuthi uLevi, owamukela okweshumi, naye wathola okweshumi ngo-Abrahama. Ngoba lapho uMelkisedeki ehlangana no-Abrahama, uLevi wayesesemzimbeni (umbhalo wokuqala, okhalweni) kakhokho wakhe.

Hebheru 7:9-10

【AmaKristu kufanele aqaphe:】

Uma abanye abantu belandela→futhi bakholwe→labo bashumayeli abashumayela izimfundiso ezingamanga futhi bephambanisa ivangeli leqiniso, futhi bengaliqondi iBhayibheli, insindiso kaKristu, nokuzalwa kabusha, kusho ukuthi awuzalwa kabusha, uyakholwa noma awukholwa. Ngokuqondene nesifiso sabo sokuthola inkazimulo, imivuzo, imiqhele, kanye nezinhlelo zabo ezidukisayo zokuvuswa ngaphambi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka, masingakusho ngisho nokukusho? Onezindlebe makezwe futhi aqaphe.

4. Zibekeleni ingcebo ezulwini

“Ningazibekeleli ingcebo emhlabeni, lapho inundu nokugqwala kubhubhisa khona, nalapho amasela efohla khona, ebe. Mathewu 6:19-20

5. Ulibo dumisa iNkosi

Kufanele usebenzise impahla yakho
+ futhi ulibo lwezithelo zakho zimdumise uJehova.
Khona-ke izinqolobane zakho ziyogcwala ngokwedlulele;

Izikhamo zakho zewayini zichichima iwayini elisha. — IzAga 3:9-10

(Ulibo luyingcebo yokuqala etholakele, njengeholo lokuqala, imali engenayo yebhizinisi lokuqala noma isivuno sezwe, kanye nemihlatshelo engcono kakhulu eyenziwayo yokudumisa uJehova. Njengokupha ukuze kusekelwe umsebenzi wevangeli endlini kaNkulunkulu. , nishumayela izinceku zevangeli, bangcwele abampofu, kanjalo nibe nokudla ezinqolobaneni zasezulwini, noBaba uyakwenezela kini okuningi.)

6 Wonke onakho, uyophiwa okwengeziwe

Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ogcinelwe ezulwini, uyakuphiwa (emhlabeni) okwengeziwe, futhi uyoba nokuchichimayo; Mathewu 25:29
(Qaphela: Uma ungabeki ingcebo yakho ezulwini, izinambuzane ziyokuluma emhlabeni, amasela afohle ebe. Uma isikhathi sifika, imali yakho iyondiza, ungabi nalutho ezulwini nasemhlabeni. .)

7. “Ohlwanyela ingcosana uyakuvuna ingcosana;

→→ Lokhu kuyiqiniso. Yilowo nalowo makanikele njengokunquma kwakhe enhliziyweni yakhe, kungabi bulukhuni noma ngamandla, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyabathanda abanikela ngokuthokoza. UNkulunkulu unamandla okunipha umusa wonke uvame, ukuze nibe nokwanela konke ezintweni zonke ngezikhathi zonke, nivame emisebenzini yonke emihle. Njengoba kulotshiwe:
Wapha abampofu imali;
Ukulunga kwakhe kumi kuze kube phakade.

Onika ohlwanyelayo inhlanyelo nesinkwa sokudliwa uyokwandisa imbewu yokuhlwanyela kwenu nesithelo sokulunga kwenu, ukuze nicebe kukho konke, ukuze nibe nokuchichima, nimbonge uNkulunkulu ngathi. 2 Korinte 9:6-11

6. Ukuzinikela okuphelele

(1) Isikhulu somuntu ocebile

Umahluleli wabuza “Nkosi”: “Mfundisi Omuhle, kufanele ngenzeni ukuze ngizuze ifa lokuphila okuphakade na?” Wathi kuye: “Ungibizelani ngokuthi ngimuhle? Kakho omuhle, ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu, uyayazi imilayo ethi: Ungabulali; ungafakazi amanga; , “Konke lokhu ngikugcinile kusukela ngisemncane.” “INkosi” ikuzwa lokho yathi: “Usasilalelwe into eyodwa: thengisa ngakho konke onakho, uphe abampofu, khona uzakuba negugu ezulwini; uzoza ungilandele."

Wathi ekuzwa lokho wadabuka kakhulu, ngoba wayecebe kakhulu.

( Izikhulu ezicebile azithandi ukugcina ingcebo yazo ezulwini )

UJesu embona wathi: “Kulukhuni kangakanani kwabacebile ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu

Beka umcebo ongashi ezulwini

——Luka 12:33

“Ningazibekeleli ingcebo emhlabeni, lapho inundu nokugqwala kubhubhisa khona, nalapho amasela efohla khona, ebe. Ngenxa yakho lapho ingcebo yakho ikhona, nenhliziyo yakho iyoba lapho.”— Mathewu 6:19-21

(2) Landela uJesu

1 owashiywa emuva— Luka 18:28, 5:11
2 Ukuziphika—Mathewu 16:24
3 Landela uJesu—Marku 8:34
4 Ukuthwala izimpambano zendlela — Marku 8:34
5 Zonda ukuphila— Johane 12:25
6 Ulahlekelwe ukuphila kwakho— Marku 8:35
7 Thola ukuphila kukaKristu— Mathewu 16:25
8 Thola inkazimulo— Roma 8:17

.......

(3) Nikela njengomhlatshelo ophilayo

Ngakho ngiyanincenga, bazalwane, ngobubele bukaNkulunkulu ukuba ninikele imizimba yenu ibe-ngumnikelo ophilileyo, ongcwele, owamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu, kube ngukukhonza kwenu kokomoya. Ningalingisi leli zwe, kodwa niguqulwe isimo ngokwenziwa ibentsha ingqondo yenu, ukuze nibe nokuhlolisisa okuyintando kaNkulunkulu enhle neyamukelekayo nepheleleyo. KwabaseRoma 12:1-2

7. Gijimani uqonde egoli

Bazalwane, angizisho ukuthi sengikutholile, kodwa kunye engikwenzayo: ngikhohlwa okungasemuva, ngizelulela kokuphambili, ngijonge emgomeni, emklomelweni wokubizelwa phezulu kukaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu.

Filipi 3:13-14

8. Kukhona izikhathi eziyi-100, ezingama-60, nezingama-30

Okuhlwanyelwe emeveni ngumuntu olizwayo izwi, kepha kamuva izinkathazo zezwe nokukhohlisa kwemali kwaliminyanisa izwi, ukuze lingatheli.

Okuhlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilowo olizwayo izwi, aliqonde, athele isithelo, ngekhulu, namashumi ayisithupha, futhi ngezinye ngamashumi amathathu. ” Mathewu 13:22-23

[Kholwa ukuthi uzothola okuphindwe kayikhulu kulokhu kuphila nokuphila okuphakade empilweni elandelayo]

Akekho ongakwazi ukuphila ngokuphindwe kayikhulu kulo mhlaba futhi ongakwazi ukuphila phakade ezweni elizayo. "

Luka 18:30

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli kusuka

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezingu-144,000 ezilandela iNkosi iWundlu.

Amen!

→→Ngimbona esesiqongweni nasegqumeni;
Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9

Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nezinye izisebenzi ezisekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abakholwa yilelivangeli, Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! Isikhombo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: Umfanekiso Wezintombi Eziyishumi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sifuna ukwabelana ngokuhlanganyela: Umfanekiso Wezintombi Eziyishumi

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu 25:1-13 futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Khona umbuso wezulu uyofana nezintombi eziyishumi ezathatha izibani zazo zaphuma ukuyohlangabeza umyeni Ezihlakaniphile zathatha izibani zazo, kodwa azizange zithathe amafutha ezitsheni zazo;

Umbuzo: Zimeleni izintombi?

impendulo:" intombi "Kusho ubumsulwa, ubungcwele, ukuhlanzeka, ukungabi nasici, ukungangcoli, ukungabi nasono! Kumele ukuzalwa kabusha, impilo entsha! Ah bafo

1 Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya—Bheka kuJohane 1:5-7
2 Uzalwe eqinisweni levangeli--bhekisela ku-1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18.

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu—bheka uJohane 1:12-13

[Nginizele kuKristu Jesu ngevangeli] → Nina eningabafundi bakaKristu ningaba nabafundisi abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi kodwa obaba bayingcosana, ngokuba mina nginizele ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu. 1 Korinte 4:15

【" intombi “Nangenxa yebandla.njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezethulwe kuKristu]→ ...ngokuba nganandisela endodeni eyodwa ukuba ningcweliswe kuKristu njengezintombi ezimsulwa. 2 Korinte 11:2

Umbuzo: Limelelani elithi "Lamp"?

Impendulo: "Isibani" simele ukholo nokuzethemba!

Isonto lapho "uMoya oNgcwele" ukhona! Reference IsAmbulo 1:20,4:5
Ukukhanya okukhishwa "isibani" sesonto → kusiqondisa endleleni eya ekuphileni okuphakade.
Izwi lakho liyisibani ezinyaweni zami nokukhanya endleleni yami. ( IHubo 119:105 )

→→“Ngaleso sikhathi (okungukuthi, ekupheleni kwezwe), umbuso wezulu uyofana nezintombi eziyishumi ezathatha izibani (okungukuthi, ukholo lwezintombi eziyishumi) zaphuma ukuyohlangabeza (uJesu) umkhwenyana Mathewu 25:1

Iziwula ezinhlanu zibambe izibani]

1 Yilowo nalowo ozwa izimfundiso zombuso wezulu kodwa angaqondi

“Ukukholwa, ukukholwa” kwabantu abahlanu abayiziwula → kufana “nomfanekiso woMhlwanyeli”: Lowo olizwayo izwi lombuso wezulu kodwa angaliqondi, omubi uyeza, akususe okuhlwanyelwe enhliziyweni yakhe. ; nakhu okuhlwanyelwe endleleni eduze kwawo. Mathewu 13:19

2 Ngoba wayengelampande enhliziyweni yakhe... wawa.

Ohlwanyelwe edwaleni ngumuntu olizwayo izwi, alamukele masinyane ngokuthokoza, kepha ngenxa yokuthi engenampande enhliziyweni yakhe, kungokwesikhashana nje ehlushwa usizi nokuzingelwa ngenxa yezwi, uyawa masinyane. Mathewu 13:20-21
buza:" Amafutha "Kusho ukuthini?"
impendulo:" Amafutha "Kubhekiselwa emafutheni okugcoba. Izwi likaNkulunkulu! Limele ukuzalwa kabusha nokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu! Amen

“UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu; :18

【 izintombi ezinhlanu ezihlakaniphileyo 】

1 Lapho abantu bezwa umlayezo futhi bawuqonde

"Ukholo. Ukholo" Lwezintombi Ezinhlanu Ezihlakaniphile: IBandla Elinobukhona Bomoya Ongcwele → Okuhlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilowo olizwayo izwi futhi aliqonde, bese lithela izithelo, ngezinye izikhathi ngekhulu, ngezinye izikhathi ayisithupha, futhi ngezinye izikhathi amashumi amathathu. ” Mathewu 13:23

(Type 1 people) Noma ubani ozwa izimfundiso zombuso wezulu kodwa angaqondi...Mathewu 13:19

(Thayipha abantu 2)→→... Abantu bayawuzwa umyalezo futhi bayawuqonda ...Mathewu 13:23

buza:
Ithini imfundiso yombuso wezulu?
Kusho ukuthini ukuzwa intshumayelo futhi uyiqonde?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ukuzwa izwi leqiniso → kuyiqiniso lombuso wezulu

Futhi njengoba senizwile izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, futhi nakholwa kuKristu ...

1 (Inkolelo) UJesu unguMesiya othunywe uNkulunkulu - Isaya 9:6
2 (Ukukholwa) UJesu wayeyintombi nto eyakhulelwa futhi yazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele - Mathewu 1:18
3 (Ukukholwa) UJesu uyiZwi elenziwe inyama - Johane 1:14
4 (Ukukholwa) UJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu - Luka 1:35
5 (Ukukholwa) UJesu unguMsindisi kanye noKristu - Luka 2:11, Mathewu 16:16
6 (Ukukholwa) UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu,
Futhi wangcwatshwa - 1 Korinte 15:3-4, 1 Petru 2:24
7 (Ukholo) UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu - 1 Korinte 15:4
8 (Faith) Ukuvuswa kukaJesu kusivuselela kabusha - 1 Petru 1:3
9 (Ukholo) Sizalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya—Johane 1:5-7
10 (Faith) Sizalwa ngeqiniso levangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18
11 (Ukholo) Sizalwa nguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:12-13
12 (Faith) Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu ensindiso kubo bonke abakholwayo - Roma 1:16-17
13 (Faith) Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona - 1 Johane 3:9, 5:18
14 (Ukukholwa) Igazi likaJesu lihlanza izono zabantu (kanye) - 1 Johane 1:7, Heberu 1:3
15 (Ukholo) Umhlatshelo kaKristu (okanye) wenza labo abangcweliswa baphelele phakade - Hebheru 10:14
16 (Kholwani) ukuthi uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala kini, futhi nina (umuntu omusha) awuyena owenyama (umuntu omdala) - Roma 8:9
17 (Incwadi) Inyama “yomuntu omdala” iya iwohloka kancane kancane ngenxa yokukhohlisa kwenkanuko— Efesu 4:22
18 (Incwadi) “Umuntu omusha” uhlala kuKristu futhi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku ngokuvuselelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele - 2 Korinte 4:16
19 (Ukholo) Lapho uJesu Kristu ebuya futhi ebonakala, owenziwe kabusha (umuntu omusha) uyovela futhi futhi abonakale kanye noKristu enkazimulweni - Kolose 3: 3-4

20 Kuye nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu—Kwabase-Efesu 1:13

【 Abantu bayawuzwa umyalezo futhi bayawuqonda 】

Nakhu okwashiwo iNkosi uJesu: “Yilowo nalowo olizwayo izwi lombuso wezulu... uyalizwa futhi aliqonde! Kamuva lithela isithelo, enye ngekhulu, enye ngamashumi ayisithupha, enye ngamashumi amathathu. Ingabe uyaqonda?


NgokukaMathewu 25:5 Lapho umyeni elibala...(Isitshela ukuthi sikulindele ngokubekezela ukufika kweNkosi uJesu umyeni.)

NgokukaMathewu 25:6-10 ... wafika umyeni...eziyiziwula zathi kwezihlakaniphileyo: ‘Sipheni amafutha, ngokuba izibani zethu ziyacima.

(Isonto" isibani ”→→Akukho amafutha “okugcoba”, akukho ukuba khona koMoya oNgcwele, akukho zwi likaNkulunkulu, akukho ukuzalwa kabusha kwempilo entsha, akukho ukukhanya “ukukhanya kukaKristu”, ngakho isibani sizocima)

’ Indoda ehlakaniphile yaphendula: ‘Ngesaba ukuthi ayanele mina nawe.

Umbuzo: Ikuphi indawo ethengisa "amafutha"?
impendulo:" Amafutha "Kubhekiselwa emafutheni okugcoba! Amafutha okugcoba uMoya oNgcwele! Indawo lapho kuthengiswa khona amafutha yibandla lapho izinceku zikaNkulunkulu zishumayela khona ivangeli, zikhuluma iqiniso, nebandla lapho uMoya oNgcwele enawe, ukuze ukwazi yizwa izwi leqiniso futhi wamukele "amafutha okugcoba" kaMoya oNgcwele!

’ Lapho beyothenga, wafika umkhwenyana. Ababelungile bangena kanye naye bahlala etafuleni, umnyango wavalwa.

【Qaphela:】

Umuntu oyisiwula wayefuna ukuthengisa amafutha "ngaleso sikhathi", kodwa wathenga "amafutha"? Awuzange uyithenge, akunjalo? Ngoba uJesu, umyeni, ufikile, ibandla leNkosi liyohlwithwa, umlobokazi uyohlwithwa, futhi amaKristu ayohlwithwa! Ngaleso sikhathi, zazingekho izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezazishumayela ivangeli noma ezikhuluma iqiniso, futhi umnyango wensindiso wawuvaliwe. Abantu abayiziwula (noma amabandla) abangawalungisanga amafutha, uMoya oNgcwele, nokuzalwa kabusha ababona abantwana abazalwa nguNkulunkulu.

(Kukhona nalabo abaphikisa ngamabomu indlela kaNkulunkulu yeqiniso, abaphambanisa indlela yeqiniso yeNkosi, abaprofethi bamanga, nabashumayeli bamanga. Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho → abantu abaningi bayothi kimi ngalolo suku: ‘Nkosi, Nkosi! aniprofethi egameni lakho, nikhipha amademoni ngegama lakho, nenza izimangaliso eziningi egameni lakho, na? :22-23

Ngakho-ke, kufanele siqaphe futhi samukele ukukhanya kweqiniso ngesikhathi ivangeli lisakhanyiswa! Njengezintombi ezinhlanu ezihlakaniphile, zaziphethe izibani namafutha ezandleni zazo, zilindele ukufika komkhwenyana.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Siqondise bantwana ukuba singene kulo lonke iqiniso, sizwe iqiniso lombuso wezulu, siqonde iqiniso levangeli, samukele uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, sizalwe kabusha, sisindiswe, futhi sibe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu! Amen. Njengoba nje izintombi ezinhlanu ezihlakaniphileyo ziphethe izibani ezandleni zazo futhi zilungisa amafutha, zilinda ngokubekezela umkhwenyana iNkosi uJesu iyeza izothatha izintombi zethu ezimsulwa iziyise embusweni wezulu. Amen!

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezingu-144,000 ezilandela iNkosi iWundlu.

Amen!

Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9

Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenzi abasekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abakholwa yilelivangeli, Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen!

Isikhombo kwabaseFilipi 4:3

articles.title: “Gqoka Izikhali Zomoya” 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sihlola ubudlelwane futhi sihlanganyela: AmaKristu kumelwe agqoke izikhali ezingokomoya ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke.

ISIFUNDO 7: Thembela KuMoya Oyingcwele Thandaza futhi ucele noma nini

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabase-Efesu 6:18 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngazo zonke izinhlobo zokunxusa nokunxusa nithandaze ngoMoya;

1. Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wenze ngoMoya oNgcwele

Uma siphila ngoMoya, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya. Galathiya 5:25

(1) Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuphila ngoMoya oNgcwele?

Impendulo: Ukuzalwa kabusha - kungukuphila ngoMoya oNgcwele! Amen

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Wazalwa eqinisweni levangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:12-13

(2) Hamba ngoMoya oNgcwele

Umbuzo: Uhamba kanjani ngoMoya oNgcwele?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Izinto ezindala zidlulile, futhi zonke sezivele zaba zintsha.

Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; 2 Korinte 5:17

2 Umuntu omusha ozalwa kabusha akayena owenyama yomuntu omdala

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, nina (umuntu omusha) aniseyinyama (umuntu omdala), kodwa ningokaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. KwabaseRoma 8:9

3 Ukungqubuzana kukaMoya oNgcwele nenkanuko yenyama

Ngithi hambani ngoMoya, khona aniyikufeza izinkanuko zenyama. Ngokuba inyama ikhanuka okuphambene noMoya, kepha uMoya ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama: lezi zinto ezimbili ziyaphikisana, ukuze ningenze enikuthandayo. Kepha uma niholwa nguMoya, aniphansi komthetho. Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, umona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. Galathiya 5:16-21

4 Bulalani izenzo ezimbi zomzimba ngoMoya oNgcwele

Bazalwane, kubonakala sengathi asinacala enyameni ukuphila ngokwenyama. Uma niphila ngokwenyama, nizakufa; kepha uma nibulala imisebenzi yomzimba ngoMoya, nizakuphila. KwabaseRoma 8:12-13 nabaseKolose 3:5-8

5 Yembathani ubuntu obutsha nikhumule umuntu omdala

Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe, nembatha omusha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe. Kolose 3:9-10 nabase-Efesu 4:22-24

6 Inyama yomuntu omdala kancane kancane iwohloka, kodwa umuntu omusha wenziwa musha usuku nosuku kuKristu.

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle (umuntu omdala) ubhujiswa, umuntu wangaphakathi (umuntu omusha) wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu okukhanyayo nokwesikhashana kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

7 Khulani niye kuKristu, iNhloko

Ukuhlomisa abangcwele umsebenzi wokukhonza, nokwakha umzimba kaKristu, size sifike sonke ebunyeni bokukholwa nasekwazini iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ekukhuleni ebudodeni, esilinganisweni sobukhulu boMoya. ukugcwala kukaKristu,...ngothando lukhuluma iqiniso kuphela, lukhule kukho konke kuye oyinhloko, uKristu, okuthe ngaye umzimba wonke uhlanganiswa, uhlanganiswa, amalunga onke akhonza inhloso yawo, asekelane njengokwe umsebenzi wesitho ngasinye, okwenza umzimba ukhule futhi uzakhe othandweni. Efesu 4:12-13,15-16

8 Uvuko oluhle kakhulu

Owesifazane wavuswa abakhe abafileyo. Abanye bakhuthazelela ukuhlushwa kanzima futhi benqaba ukukhululwa (umbhalo wokuqala wawuwukuhlengwa) ukuze bathole uvuko olungcono. Hebheru 11:35

2. Thandaza futhi ucele noma nini

(1) Thandaza njalo futhi ungadangali

UJesu wenza umfanekiso ukuze afundise abantu ukuthandaza njalo bangadangali. Luka 18:1

Noma yini eniyicela emkhulekweni, kholwani nje, futhi niyoyithola. ” Mathewu 21:22

(2) Tshela uNkulunkulu lokho okufunayo ngomthandazo nangokunxusa

Ningakhathazeki ngalutho, kepha kukho konke izicelo zenu mazaziwe nguNkulunkulu ngokukhuleka nokunxusa kanye nokubonga. Ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu okudlula ukuqonda konke kuyakulondoloza izinhliziyo zenu nemicabango yenu kuKristu Jesu. Filipi 4:6-7

(3) Thandaza ngoMoya oNgcwele

Kodwa, bazalwane abathandekayo, zakheni ekukholweni okungcwele kakhulu, nikhuleke ngoMoya oNgcwele;

Zigcineni othandweni lukaNkulunkulu, nibheke emseni weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, kube ngukuphila okuphakade. Jude 1:20-21

(4) Thandaza ngomoya nangokuqonda

UPawuli wathi, “Kuyini lokhu? Ngifuna ukuthandaza ngomoya futhi futhi nangokuqonda, ngifuna ukucula ngomoya futhi nangokuqonda. 1 Korinte 14:15

(5) UMoya oNgcwele uyasikhulekela ngokububula

#UMoya oNgcwele ukhulekela abangcwele ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu#

Ngaphezu kwalokho, uMoya oNgcwele uyasisiza ebuthakathakeni bethu; Ohlola izinhliziyo uyayazi imicabango kaMoya, ngokuba uMoya ukhulumela abangcwele ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu. Roma 8:26-27

(6) Qaphela, linda futhi uthandaze

Ukuphela kwezinto zonke sekusondele. Ngakho-ke qaphelani, nizithibe, lindani, nikhuleke; 1 Petru 4:7

(7) Imithandazo yabantu abalungile iphumelela kakhulu ekuphulukiseni.

Uma kukhona kini ohluphekayo, akakhuleke; Uma egula phakathi kwenu, makabize amalunga ebandla, amgcobe ngamafutha egameni leNkosi, amkhulekele. Umkhuleko wokukholwa uyakumsindisa ogulayo, iNkosi imvuse; (Funda amaHebheru 10:17) Ngakho-ke vumani izono zenu komunye nomunye futhi nithandazelane, ukuze niphulukiswe. Umkhuleko womuntu olungileyo unamandla amakhulu. Jakobe 5:13-16

(8) Thandaza futhi ubeke izandla phezu kwabagulayo ukuze baphulukiswe

Ngaleso sikhathi uyise kaPhubiliyu wayelele enomkhuhlane nesihudo. UPawulu wangena, wamkhulekela, wambeka izandla, wamphulukisa. IzEnzo 28:8
UJesu wayengenakukwazi ukwenza izimangaliso lapho, kodwa wabeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo abambalwa kuphela wabaphulukisa. Marku 6:5

Ungasheshi ukubeka izandla phezu kwabanye; ungahlanganyeli ezonweni zabanye, kodwa zigcine uhlanzekile. 1 Thimothewu 5:22

3. Yiba yisosha likaKristu elihle

hlupheka kanye nami njengebutho elihle likaJesu Kristu. 2 Thimothewu 2:3

Ngase ngibona, bheka, iWundlu limi entabeni yaseSiyoni, kumi kanye nalo abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amane nane, belotshwe igama lalo negama likaYise emabunzini abo. …Laba abangcoliswanga nabesifazane; Balandela iWundlu nomaphi lapho liya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengolibo kuNkulunkulu nakulo iWundlu. IsAmbulo 14:1, 4

4. Ukusebenza kanye noKristu

Ngokuba thina siyizisebenzi kanye noNkulunkulu; nina niyinsimu kaNkulunkulu nesakhiwo sakhe. 1 Korinte 3:9

5. Kukhona izikhathi eziyi-100, ezingama-60, nezingama-30

Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle, yathela isithelo, enye ngekhulu, enye ngamashumi ayisithupha, enye ngamashumi amathathu. Mathewu 13:8

6. Thola inkazimulo, umvuzo, nomqhele

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. Roma 8:17
ngijonge emgomeni, emklomelweni wokubizwa kwaphezulu kukaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu. Filipi 3:14

(INkosi yathi) Ngiyeza masinyane, futhi kufanele ubambelele kulokho onakho, ukuze kungabikho muntu okuphuca umqhele wakho. IsAmbulo 3:11

7. Ukubusa noKristu

Babusisiwe futhi bangcwele labo abahlanganyela ovukweni lokuqala! Ukufa kwesibili akunamandla phezu kwabo. bayakuba ngabapristi bakaNkulunkulu nabakaKristu, babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. IsAmbulo 20:6

8. Busa kuze kube phakade naphakade

Ubusuku abuyikuba khona; izibani nokukhanya kwelanga azisayikuba khona, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu uyakuzikhanyisela. Bayobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade. IsAmbulo 22:5

Ngakho-ke, amaKristu kumelwe ahlome izikhali eziphelele ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke ukuze akwazi ukumelana namaqhinga kadeveli, amelane nesitha ngezinsuku zosizi, futhi afeze konke futhi ame aqine. Ngakho yimani niqine,

1Bopha izinkalo zakho ngeqiniso,
2 Gqokani isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga,

5 Hloniphani isigqoko sensindiso, nithathe inkemba kaMoya eyizwi likaNkulunkulu;
6 Khulekani ngezikhathi zonke ngazo zonke izinhlobo zokunxusa nokunxusa ngoMoya;

articles.title: “Gqoka Izikhali Zomoya” 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sihlola ubudlelwane futhi sihlanganyela: AmaKristu kumelwe agqoke izikhali ezingokomoya ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke.

ISIFUNDO 6: Gqokani isigqoko sensindiso nibambe inkemba kaMoya oNgcwele

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabase-Efesu 6:17 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Futhi nigqoke isigqoko sokuzivikela sensindiso, futhi nithathe inkemba kaMoya, eyizwi likaNkulunkulu;

1. Gqokani isigqoko sensindiso

(1) Insindiso

UJehova waziqambela insindiso yakhe, ubonakalisile ukulunga kwakhe emehlweni ezizwe;
Hlabelelani kuJehova, nibonge igama lakhe. Shumayela insindiso Yakhe nsuku zonke! IHubo 96:2

Oletha izindaba ezinhle, ukuthula, nezindaba ezinhle, nensindiso uthi kulo iZiyoni: UNkulunkulu wakho uyabusa! Zinhle izinyawo zalendoda eqwala intaba! Isaya 52:7

Umbuzo: Abantu bayazi kanjani insindiso kaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Ukuthethelelwa kwezono - ke uyazi insindiso!

Qaphela: Uma “unembeza” wakho wenkolo uhlala unecala, unembeza wesoni ngeke uhlanzwe futhi uthethelelwe! Ubungeke wazi insindiso kaNkulunkulu - Bheka kumaHeberu 10:2.
Kufanele sikukholelwe lokho uNkulunkulu akushoyo eBhayibhelini ngokwamazwi Akhe. Amen! Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Izimvu zami ziyalizwa izwi lami, futhi ngiyazazi, futhi ziyangilandela.”— IsAmbulo 10:27
Ukuze abantu bakhe bazi insindiso ngokuthethelelwa kwezono zabo...

Yonke inyama izobona insindiso kaNkulunkulu! Luka 1:77,3:6

Umbuzo: Izono zethu zithethelelwe kanjani?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(2) Insindiso ngoJesu Kristu

Umbuzo: Iyini insindiso kuKristu?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuJesu! Kholwa yivangeli!

(INkosi uJesu) yathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

(UPawuli wathi) Kangilanhloni ngevangeli; Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

Ngakho uyakholwa kuJesu nasevangelini! Lelivangeli liyinsindiso kaJesu Kristu Uma ukholwa kulelivangeli, izono zakho zingathethelelwa, zisindiswe, zizalwe kabusha, futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.

Umbuzo: Ulikholwa kanjani leli vangeli?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

[1] Kholwa ukuthi uJesu wayeyintombi nto eyakhulelwa futhi yazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele - Mathewu 1:18, 21
[2] Ukukholelwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu—Luka 1:30-35
[3] Kholwa ukuthi uJesu weza enyameni - 1 Johane 4:2, Johane 1:14
[4] Ukukholelwa kuJesu kuyindlela yokuqala yokuphila kanye nokukhanya kokuphila - Johane 1:1-4, 8:12, 1 Johane 1:1-2
[5] Kholwa eNkosini uNkulunkulu owabeka izono zethu sonke kuJesu - Isaya 53:6

[6] Kholwa othandweni lukaJesu! Wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu. 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(Qaphela: UKristu wafela izono zethu!

1 ukuze sonke sikhululwe esonweni - Roma 6:7;

2 Bakhululiwe emthethweni nasekuqalekisweni kwawo - Roma 7:6, Galathiya 3:13;
3 Ukukhululwa emandleni kaSathane - IzEnzo 26:18
4 Ukukhululwa Ezweni - Johane 17:14
Futhi wangcwatshwa!
5 Sikhulule ebuntwini obudala nasezenzweni zabo - Kolose 3:9;
6 KwabaseGalathiya 2:20
Ivuswe ngosuku lwesithathu!

7 Ukuvuka kukaKristu kusenze sazalwa kabusha futhi kwasithethelela! Amen. 1 Petru 1:3 namaRoma 4:25

[7] Ukutholwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu- Galathiya 4:5
[8] Gqokani ubuntu obusha, nembathe uKristu - Galathiya 3:26-27
[9] UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu - Roma 8:16
[10] Siguqulele (umuntu omusha) embusweni weNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo - Kolose 2:13
[11] Ukuphila kwethu okusha kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu - Kolose 3:3
[12] Nxa uKristu ebonakala, nathi siyakubonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni.”— Kolose 3:4

Lokhu kuyinsindiso kaJesu Kristu Wonke umuntu okholwa kuJesu ungumntwana kaNkulunkulu. Amen.

2. Bamba inkemba kaMoya oNgcwele

(1) Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe

Umbuzo: Ungawuthola kanjani uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe?

Impendulo: Yizwa ivangeli, indlela yeqiniso, futhi ukholwe kuJesu!

Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. Efesu 1:13
Ngokwesibonelo, uSimoni Petru washumayela endlini “yabeZizwe” uKorneliyu Laba beZizwe bezwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwabo, futhi bakholwa kuJesu Kristu, futhi uMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwabo bonke ababemlalele. Bheka izEnzo 10:34-48

(2) UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngezinhliziyo zethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

Ngokuba bonke abaholwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Animamukelanga umoya wobugqila ukuba nihlale ekwesabeni; abantwana, okungukuthi, izindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu, izindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye.
KwabaseRoma 8:14-17

(3) Umcebo ufakwa esitsheni sobumba

Sinale ngcebo ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. 2 Korinte 4:7

Umbuzo: Iyini le ngcebo?

Impendulo: NguMoya oNgcwele weqiniso! Amen

“Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami. Futhi ngiyakucela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma uMduduzi; yena ngezansi), ukuze abe nani phakade, oyiqiniso. Umhlaba. ningemamukele uMoya oNgcwele; ngokuba awumboni, awumazi, kepha uyamazi, ngokuba uhlezi kini, uyakuba kini.

3. LiyiZwi likaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Liyini iZwi likaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Ivangeli elishunyayelwa kini liyizwi likaNkulunkulu!

(1) Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Johane 1:1-2

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. Johane 1:14

(3) Kholwa evangelini futhi uzalwe kabusha.

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokomusa wakhe omkhulu usephinde wasizala ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo... Nizelwe kabusha, kungengembewu ebhubhayo kodwa ngembewu engenakonakala, Ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelimiyo. …Izwi leNkosi kuphela elihlala phakade.

Leli yivangeli elashunyayelwa kini. 1 Petru 1:3, 23, 25

Bafowethu nodadewethu!

Khumbula ukuqoqa.

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu
