articles.title: “Gqoka Izikhali Zomoya” 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sihlola ubudlelwane futhi sihlanganyela: AmaKristu kumelwe agqoke izikhali ezingokomoya ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke.

Isifundo 5: Sebenzisa ukholo njengesihlangu

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabase-Efesu 6:16 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngaphezu kwalokho, nithatha isihlangu sokukholwa esinamandla okucima yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi;

(Qaphela: Inguqulo yephepha ithi "vine"; inguqulo ye-electronic "isihlangu")

1. Ukholo

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukukholwa?
Impendulo: “Ukukholwa” kusho ukukholwa, ukwethembeka, iqiniso, no-ameni “ubuhle” kusho isimilo, ubungcwele, ukulunga, uthando, intokozo, ukuthula, ukubekezela, umusa, ukulunga, ukwethembeka, ubumnene, nokuzithiba;

2. Ukuzethemba

(1) incwadi

Umbuzo: Ithini incwadi?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ukukholwa kungukuqiniseka ngezinto ezithenjwayo, kuyiqiniso ngezinto ezingabonwayo. Abantu basendulo babenobufakazi obumangalisayo kule ncwadi.
Ngokukholwa siyazi ukuthi imihlaba yadalwa ngezwi likaNkulunkulu, ukuze okubonwayo kudalwe ngokusobala. ( Hebheru 11:1-3 )

Ngokwesibonelo, umlimi utshala ukolweni ensimini ulindele ukuthi uma uhlamvu lukakolweni luwela emhlabathini futhi lutshalwe, luyothela okusanhlamvu okuningi. Lokhu kungukuqiniseka ngezinto ezithenjwayo, ubufakazi bezinto ezingabonwayo.

(2) Isekelwe okholweni nasokholweni

Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” (KwabaseRoma 1:17)

(3) Ukholo nesithembiso

Kholwa kuJesu uthole ukuphila okuphakade:
“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade.
Ukusuka ekukholweni kuye ekukholweni.
Ngokusekelwe okholweni: Kholwa kuJesu futhi usindiswe futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.
Kuze kube seqophelweni lokukholwa: Landela uJesu futhi uhambe Naye ukuze ushumayele ivangeli, futhi wamukele inkazimulo, umvuzo, umqhele, nokuvuka okungcono kakhulu. Amen!

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. ( Roma 8:17 )

3. Ukuthatha ukholo njengesihlangu

Phezu kwalokho, nithathe isihlangu sokukholwa eningacima ngaso yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi;

Umbuzo: Ungalusebenzisa kanjani ukholo njengesihlangu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1)Ukholo

1 Kholwa ukuthi uJesu wakhulelwa yintombi nto wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele - Mathewu 1:18,21
2 Kholwa ukuthi uJesu unguLizwi owenziwe inyama - Johane 1:14
3 Ukukholelwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu—Luka 1:31-35
4 Kholwa kuJesu njengoMsindisi, uKristu, noMesiya - Luka 2:11, Johane 1:41
5 Ukukholwa eNkosini kubeka isono sethu sonke phezu kukaJesu - Isaya 53:8
6 Kholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatshwa, futhi wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu - 1 Korinte 15:3-4
7 Ukukholelwa ukuthi uJesu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasenza sazalwa kabusha - 1 Petru 1:3
8 Ukukholelwa ovukweni lukaJesu kuyasithethelela— Roma 4:25
9 Ngenxa yokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala kithi, ubuyena bethu obusha abuseyona ingxenye yomuntu omdala nenyama - Roma 8:9
10 UMoya oNgcwele ufakazelana nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu - Roma 8:16
11 Gqokani ubuntu obusha, nembathe uKristu - Gal 3:26-27
12 Kholwa ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele usinika izipho ezihlukahlukene, igunya namandla (njengokushumayela ivangeli, ukuphulukisa abagulayo, ukukhipha amademoni, ukwenza izimangaliso, ukukhuluma ngezilimi, njll.) - 1 Korinte 12:7-11
13 Thina esahlupheka ngenxa yokholo lweNkosi uJesu siyakukhazinyuliswa kanye nayo - Roma 8:17
14 Ukuvuka ngomzimba ongcono — KumaHebheru 11:35

15 Busani loKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane laphakade. Amen—IsAmbulo 20:6,22:5

(2) Ukholo luyisihlangu sokucima yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi

1 Qondani inkohliso yomubi - Efesu 4:14
2 bangamelana namaqhinga kadeveli - Efesu 6:11
3 Yenqaba zonke izilingo— Mathewu 18:6-9
(Isibonelo: imikhuba yalelizwe, izithombe, imidlalo yamakhompiyutha, amanethiwekhi omakhalekhukhwini, ubuhlakani bokwenziwa... ukulandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo - Efesu 2:1-8)
4. Ukumelana nesitha ngosuku lwenkathazo - Efesu 6:13
(Njengoba kulotshiwe eBhayibhelini: USathane washaya uJobe futhi wamthela amathumba kusukela ezinyaweni kuya ekhanda lakhe - Jobe 2:7; isithunywa sikaSathane safaka iva enyameni kaPawulu - 2 Korinte 12: 7)
5 Ngithi kini: Xwayani imvubelo yabaFarisi (abathiwa balungile ngomthetho) nabaSadusi (abangakholelwa ekuvukeni kwabafileyo) lokhu akubhekiseli esinkwa uyaqonda? ” Mathewu 16:11
6 melanani naye, niqinile ekukholweni, nazi ukuthi abazalwane benu emhlabeni wonke nabo babhekene nokuhlupheka okufanayo. UNkulunkulu womusa wonke owanibizela enkazimulweni yakhe yaphakade kuKristu, senihluphekile isikhashana, yena uqobo uyakuniphelelisa, aniqinise, aniphe amandla. 1 Petru 5:9-10

7 Ngakho lalelani uNkulunkulu. Melanani noSathane, khona uyakunibalekela; Sondelani kuNkulunkulu, khona uNkulunkulu uyakusondela kinina… Jakobe 4:7-8

(3)Labo abanqobayo ngoJesu

(Kungcono kunodeveli, okungcono kunomhlaba, kungcono kunokufa!)

Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uyalinqoba izwe; Ngubani onqoba izwe na? Akuyena yini okholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu? 1 Johane 5:4-5

1 “Onendlebe makezwe lokho akushoyo uMoya emabandleni. Onqobayo ngiyakumnika ukuba adle emthini wokuphila ePharadesi likaNkulunkulu. ’” IsAmbulo 2:7
2 ...Onqobayo akayikulinyazwa ngokufa kwesibili. ’”
IsAmbulo 2:11
3 Onqobayo ngiyakumnika imana elifihliweyo, netshe elimhlophe, okulotshwe kulo igama elisha, okungayi kulazi muntu, kuphela olamukelayo. ’”—IsAmbulo 2:17
4 Onqobayo nogcina imiyalo yami kuze kube sekupheleni, ngiyakumnika amandla phezu kwezizwe ... futhi ngiyakumnika inkanyezi yokusa. IsAmbulo 2:26, 28
5 Lowo onqobayo uyakwembathiswa okumhlophe, negama lakhe angiyikulesula encwadini yokuphila, kepha uyakulivuma igama lakhe phambi kukaBaba naphambi kwezingelosi zakhe zonke. IsAmbulo 3:5
6 Onqobayo ngizamenza insika ethempelini likaNkulunkulu wami, njalo kasoze aphinde aphume lapho. Futhi ngizobhala phezu kwakhe igama likaNkulunkulu wami, negama lomuzi kaNkulunkulu wami, okuyiJerusalema Elisha, elehla ezulwini, kuNkulunkulu wami, negama lami elisha. IsAmbulo 3:12

7 Onqobayo ngizamnika ukuthi ahlale lami esihlalweni sami sobukhosi, njengoba nje lami nganqoba ngahlala loBaba esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi. IsAmbulo 3:21

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

bafowethu nodadewethu
Khumbula ukuqoqa

articles.title: “Gqoka Izikhali Zomoya” 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sihlola ubudlelwane futhi sihlanganyele ukuthi amaKristu okumelwe agqoke izikhali ezingokomoya ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke

Isifundo 4: Ukushumayela Ivangeli Lokuthula

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyabase-Efesu 6:15 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: “Nifakile ezinyaweni zenu ukuzilungiselela ukuhamba ngevangeli lokuthula.”

1. Ivangeli

Umbuzo: Liyini ivangeli?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) UJesu wathi

UJesu wathi kubo: “Yilokhu engakusho kini ngisenani, ukuthi kumelwe kugcwaliseke konke okulotshwe ngami emthethweni kaMose, nakubaprofethi nasemaHutsheni bangakwazi ukuqonda imiBhalo, futhi bathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi uKristu kufanele ahlupheke futhi avuke kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, futhi ukuphenduka nokuthethelelwa kwezono kufanele kushunyayelwe egameni lakhe, kusukela eJerusalema zonke izizwe (iVangeli likaLuka. 24:44-47)

2. Wathi uPetru

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usinike ukuzalwa kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo ukuze sibe nefa elingenakonakala, elingenabala nelingabuni, eligcinelwe nina ezulwini. …Nizelwe ngokusha, kungengambewu eyonakeleyo, kodwa ngengenakonakala, ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelimiyo. ...kepha izwi leNkosi limi phakade. Leli yivangeli elashunyayelwa kini. (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 1:3-4, 23, 25.)

3. Wathi uJohane

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. ( Johane 1:1-2 )

Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi sidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwabonakaliswa kithi.) (1 Johane 1:1-2)

4. Wathi uPawulu

Futhi niyosindiswa ngalelivangeli, uma ningakholwa ngeze kodwa nibambelele kulokho enginishumayeza kona. Ngokuba lokho enganinika khona nami: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo (1 Korinte 15:2-4)

2. IVangeli Lokuthula

(1)Ikuphumuze

Wozani kimi nina nonke enikhatheleyo nenisindwayo, mina ngizakuniphumuza. Bekani ijoka lami phezu kwenu nifunde kimi, ngokuba ngimnene, ngithobekile ngenhliziyo, niyakufumana ukuphumula kwemiphefumulo yenu. ( Mathewu 11:28-29 )

(2) ukuphulukiswa

Walenga esihlahleni futhi wathwala izono zethu mathupha ukuze kuthi, sesifile esonweni, siphilele ukulunga. Ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa. (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 2:24.)

(3) Thola ukuphila okuphakade

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade.

(4) adunyiswe

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye.

( Roma 8:17 )

3. Gqoka ivangeli lokuthula ezinyaweni zakho njengezicathulo zokukulungiselela ukuhamba

(1)Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu

Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kuye wonke okholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa” (KwabaseRoma 1:16-17).

(2) UJesu washumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu

UJesu wadabula imizi yonke nemizana yonke, efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa izifo zonke nezifo zonke. Lapho ebona izixuku, waba nesihe ngazo, ngoba zazilusizi futhi zibuthakathaka njengezimvu ezingenamalusi. ( Mathewu 9:35-36 )

(3) UJesu wathuma izisebenzi ukuthi ziyovuna

Ngakho wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna kukhulu, kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana. Ngakho-ke, celani iNkosi yokuvuna ukuba ithumele izisebenzi ekuvuneni kwayo.”

Anisho yini ukuthi, ‘Kusasele izinyanga ezine kufike ukuvuna’? Ngithi kini: Phakamisani amehlo enu, nibheke amasimu; Umvuni uyakwamukela inkokhelo yakhe, abuthe okusanhlamvu kube ngukuphila okuphakade, ukuze ohlwanyelayo nomvuni bajabule kanyekanye. Njengoba isisho sithi: ‘Omunye uyahlwanyela, omunye avune’, futhi lokhu kuyiqiniso ngokusobala. Mina nginithumele ukuvuna lokho eningakukhandlelanga, nithokozele umshikashika wabanye. ( Johane 4:35-38 )

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

bafowethu nodadewethu

Khumbula ukuqoqa

articles.title: Ukugqoka Izikhali Zomoya 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola inhlanganyelo nokwabelana amaKristu kumelwe agqoke izikhali ezingokomoya ezinikezwa uNkulunkulu nsuku zonke:

Isifundo 3: Sebenzisa ukulunga njengesivikelo sesifuba ukumboza amabele akho

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabase-Efesu 6:14 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngakho-ke yimani niqinile, nibhince ibhande leqiniso okhalweni, futhi nimboze isifuba senu isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga;


1. Ubulungiswa

Umbuzo: Buyini ubulungisa?
Impendulo: "I-Gong" isho ubulungisa, ubuqotho kanye nobuqotho;

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli! “Ukulunga” kubhekisela ekulungeni kukaNkulunkulu!

2. Ukulunga komuntu

Umbuzo: Ingabe abantu “banakho ukulunga”?

Impendulo: Cha.

【Akekho umuntu olungileyo】

Njengoba kulotshiwe:
akakho olungileyo, akakho noyedwa.
akukho ukuqonda;
akakho ofuna uNkulunkulu;
Bonke baphambukile endleleni efanele.
nibe yize ndawonye.
akakho owenza okuhle, akakho noyedwa;

( Roma 3:10-12 )

【Konke abantu abakwenzayo kubi】

Umphimbo wabo ungamangcwaba avulekile;
Basebenzisa ulimi lwabo ukukhohlisa,
Ukuphefumula kwenyoka okunobuthi kusezindebeni zakhe;
Umlomo wakhe wawugcwele iziqalekiso nomunyu.
Ukubulala nokopha,
Izinyawo zabo ziyandiza,
Kuyoba nonya nonya endleleni.
Indlela yokuthula abayazi;
Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu akukho emehlweni abo.

( Roma 3:13-18 )

【Kulungisiswa ngokholo】

(1)

Umbuzo: UNowa wayeyindoda elungile!

Impendulo: UNowa (wayekholelwa) eNkosini, wenza konke uNkulunkulu ayemyale ngakho, ngakho uNkulunkulu wabiza uNowa ngendoda elungile.

Kodwa uNowa wathola umusa emehlweni kaJehova.
Inzalo kaNowa ibhaliwe ngezansi. UNowa wayeyindoda elungile futhi engumuntu ophelele esizukulwaneni sakhe. UNowa wahamba noNkulunkulu. …Yilokho uNowa akwenza. Konke uNkulunkulu ayemyale ngakho, wakwenza.

( Genesise 6:8-9, 22 )

(2)

Umbuzo: U-Abrahama wayeyindoda elungile!
Impendulo: U-Abrahama (wakholwa) kuJehova, uNkulunkulu wamlungisisa!
Wamkhiphela ngaphandle, wathi: "Bheka phezulu ezulwini, ubale izinkanyezi. Ungazibala na?" ukulunga kwakhe.

( Genesise 15:5-6 )

(3)

Umbuzo: Ingabe uJobe wayeyindoda elungile?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

"Umsebenzi"

1 Ubuqotho obuphelele:

Kwakukhona indoda egama layo linguJobe ezweni lase-Uzi. ( Jobe 1:1 )

2Omkhulu phakathi kwabaseMpumalanga:

Impahla yakhe yayiyizimvu eziyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, namakamela ayizinkulungwane ezintathu, namabhangqa ezinkabi angamakhulu ayisihlanu, nezimbongolo zezinsikazi ezingamakhulu amahlanu, nezinceku nezincekukazi eziningi. Lo muntu mkhulu kunabo bonke abantu baseMpumalanga. ( Jobe 1:3 )

3 UJobe uzibiza ngokuthi ulungile

ngigqoka ukulunga;
Gqoka ubulungisa njengesambatho sakho nomqhele.
Ngingamehlo ezimpumputhe.
Izinyawo ezikhubazekile.
Nginguyise kwabampofu;
Ngithola icala lomuntu engingakaze ngimbone.
...Inkazimulo yami iyanda kimi;
Umnsalo wami uyaqina esandleni sami. …Ngikhetha izindlela zabo, futhi ngihlala endaweni yokuqala….

( Jobe 29:14-16, 20, 25 )

UJobe wake wathi: “Ngilungile, kodwa uNkulunkulu ubususile ubulungisa bami;

Qaphela: (Ukuphenduka kukaJobe) Jobe 38 kuya ku-42, uJehova waphendula inkulumo kaJobe Ngemva kokuba uJobe elalele amazwi kaJehova.

Wayesethi uJehova kuJobe: “Ophikisana noSomandla angaphikisana na? Labo abaphikisana noNkulunkulu bangaphendula lezi! …(Jobe) Ngimubi! Ngizokuphendula ngithini? Kwadingeka ngivale umlomo ngezandla zami. Ngasho kanye ngangaphendula; ngasho kabili futhi angiphindanga ngasho. ( Jobe 40:1-2, 4-5 )

Ngicela ungilalele, ngifuna ukukhuluma ngiyakucela, ngicela ungibonise. Ngake ngezwa ngawe ngaphambili,
Ngiyakubona manje ngamehlo ami. Ngakho-ke ngiyazizonda mina (noma ukuhumusha: amazwi ami) futhi ngiphenduke othulini nasemlotheni. ( Jobe 42:4-6 )

Kamuva, uJehova wabonisa umusa uJobe, futhi kamuva uJehova wambusisa kakhulu kunakuqala.

Ngakho-ke, ukulunga kukaJobe kwakuwukulunga komuntu (ukuzibona elungile), futhi wayemkhulu phakathi kwabantu baseMpumalanga. Yathi: “Ngaphuma ngaya esangweni, ngamisa isihlalo esigcawini, bangigwema, amakhosana ayeka ukukhuluma, avala umlomo ngezandla abaholi bathula banamathisela ulimi lwabo olwangeni lwemilomo yabo. Ongizwayo ngezindlebe zakhe uthi ngibusisiwe;

…udumo lwami luyakhula emzimbeni wami; Lapho abantu bengizwa, babheka phezulu futhi balindele isiqondiso sami buthule.

Ngakhetha izindlela zabo, futhi ngahlala endaweni yokuqala… (Jobe 29:7-11,20-21,25)

---Futhi yathini iNkosi uJesu? ---

“Maye kinina lapho bonke abantu bekhuluma okuhle ngani!…” (Luka 6:26).

UJobe wathi ulungile futhi “ulungile”, kodwa inhlekelele yehlela yena nomndeni wakhe Kamuva, uJobe waphenduka phambi kukaJehova! Ngake ngezwa ngawe, kodwa manje sengikubona ngamehlo ami. Ngakho-ke ngiyazizonda (noma ukuhumusha: amazwi ami), futhi ngiphenduke othulini nasemlotheni! Ekugcineni uNkulunkulu wabusisa uJobe ngezibusiso eziningi kunakuqala.

3. Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

【Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu】

Kuhlanganisa: uthando, umusa, ubungcwele, umusa wothando, owephuza ukuthukuthela, ukungacabangi okubi, umusa, injabulo, ukuthula, ukubekezela, umusa, ubuhle, ukwethembeka, ubumnene, ukuthobeka, ukuzithiba, ubuqotho, ukulunga, ukukhanya, ukulunga Indlela iyiqiniso, ukuphila, ukukhanya, ukuphulukisa, nensindiso. Wafela izoni, wangcwatshwa, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu, futhi wenyukela ezulwini! Abantu mabakholwe leli vangeli futhi basindiswe, bavuswe, bazalwe kabusha, babe nokuphila, futhi babe nokuphila okuphakade. Amen!

Bantwanyana bami, nginilobela lokhu ukuze ningoni. Uma umuntu ona, sinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo. ( 1 Johane 2:1 )

4. Ubulungiswa

Umbuzo: Ubani olungile?

Impendulo: UNkulunkulu ulungile! Amen.

Uyakwahlulela izwe ngokulunga, ahlulele abantu ngobuqotho. ( IHubo 9:8 )
Ukulunga nokulunga kuyisisekelo sesihlalo sakho sobukhosi; ( IHubo 89:14 )
Ngokuba uJehova ulungile, uthanda ukulunga; ( IHubo 11:7 )
UJehova waziqambela insindiso yakhe, futhi ubonakalisile ukulunga kwakhe emehlweni ezizwe (IHubo 98:2)
ngoba uyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba. Uyakwahlulela izwe ngokulunga, nezizwe ngobulungisa. ( IHubo 98:9 )
UJehova wenza ubulungisa futhi uyabaphindisela bonke aboniwe. ( IHubo 103:6 )
UJehova unomusa, ulungile; ( IHubo 116:5 )
Wena Jehova ulungile, nezahlulelo zakho ziqotho. ( IHubo 119:137 )
UJehova ulungile ezindleleni zakhe zonke, ulesihawu ezindleleni zakhe zonke. ( IHubo 145:17 )
Kepha uJehova Sebawoti uphakeme ngenxa yokulunga kwakhe; uNkulunkulu oNgcwele ungcwelisiwe ngenxa yokulunga kwakhe. ( Isaya 5:16 )
Njengoba uNkulunkulu elungile, uyobuyisela usizi kulabo abanihluphayo (2 Thesalonika 1:6)

Ngabheka, ngabona ukuthi amazulu avulekile. Kwakukhona ihhashi elimhlophe, nomgibeli walo wayebizwa ngokuthi oThembekileyo noQiniso, owahlulelayo futhi olwe ngokulunga. ( IsAmbulo 19:11 )

5. Sebenzisa ukulunga njengesivikelo sesifuba ukumboza amabele akho

Umbuzo: Ungayivikela kanjani inhliziyo yakho ngokulunga?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Kusho ukukhumula umuntu omdala, ukugqoka ubuntu obusha, nokwembatha uKristu! Zihlomise nsuku zonke ngokulunga kweNkosi uJesu Kristu, futhi ushumayele uthando lukaJesu: UNkulunkulu uluthando, umusa, ubungcwele, umusa wothando, wephuza ukuthukuthela, ongabheki okubi, uthando, injabulo, ukuthula, ukubekezela, umusa. , ubuhle, Ukwethembeka, ubumnene, ukuthobeka, ukuzithiba, ubuqotho, ukulunga, ukukhanya, indlela, iqiniso, ukuphila, ukukhanya kwabantu, ukuphulukiswa, nokusindiswa. Wafela izoni, wangcwatshwa, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu, futhi wenyukela ezulwini ukuze silungisiswe! Hlala ngakwesokunene sikaSomandla. Abantu mabakholwe leli vangeli futhi basindiswe, bavuswe, bazalwe kabusha, babe nokuphila, futhi babe nokuphila okuphakade. Amen!

6. Gcina iTao, gcina iqiniso, futhi uvikele inhliziyo

Umbuzo: Ungayiphakamisa kanjani indlela yeqiniso futhi uvikele inhliziyo yakho?

Impendulo: Thembela kuMoya oNgcwele futhi ubambelele ngokuqinile eqinisweni nasezindleleni ezinhle! Lokhu kuvikela inhliziyo, njengesibuko.

1 Qapha inhliziyo yakho

Kumelwe uqaphe inhliziyo yakho ngaphezu kwakho konke okunye.
Ngoba imiphumela yokuphila ivela enhliziyweni.

( IzAga 4:23;

2 Thembela kuMoya oNgcwele ukuba ugcine indlela enhle

Gcina amazwi aphilileyo owawezwa kimi ngokukholwa nothando olukuKristu Jesu. Kufanele uvikele izindlela ezinhle oziphathisiwe nguMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi.

( 2 Thimothewu 1:13-14 )

3 Loba ngubani olizwayo ilizwi kodwa angalizwisisi

Lowo ozwa izwi lombuso wezulu akaliqondi, omubi uyeza, akuthathe okuhlwanyelwe enhliziyweni yakhe; ( Mathewu 13:19 )

Ngakho, uyaqonda?


7. Hamba noNkulunkulu

INkosi ukubonisile, O muntu, okuhle.
Ufunani kuwe?
Uma nje wenza ubulungisa futhi uthanda umusa,
Hamba noNkulunkulu wakho ngokuthobeka.

(Funda uMika 6:8.)

8. Abantu abayizi-144 000 balandela uJesu

Ngase ngibona, bheka, iWundlu limi entabeni yaseSiyoni, kumi kanye nalo abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amane nane, belotshwe igama lalo negama likaYise emabunzini abo. … Laba bantu abangcoliswanga ngabesifazane; Balandela iWundlu nomaphi lapho liya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengolibo kuNkulunkulu nakulo iWundlu. (Funda isAmbulo 14:1, 4.)

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Bafowethu nodadewethu!

Khumbula ukuqoqa.

2023.08.30

articles.title: “Gqoka Izikhali Zomoya” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ukwabelana ngethrafikhi

Isifundo 2: Gqokani izikhali zomoya nsuku zonke

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabase-Efesu 6:13-14 futhi siyifunde ndawonye:

Ngakho hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana nesitha ngosuku losizi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime. Ngakho yima uqine, uzibhince ngeqiniso...

1:Bhinca ukhalo lwakho ngeqiniso

Umbuzo: Liyini iqiniso?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) UMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso

UMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso:

Lo nguJesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi nangegazi, kungengamanzi odwa kodwa ngamanzi negazi, efakaza ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngokuba uMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso. ( 1 Johane 5:6-7 )

Umoya Weqiniso:

“Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami. Futhi ngiyakucela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma uMduduzi; yena ngezansi), ukuze abe nani phakade, oyiqiniso. Umhlaba. lingemamukele; ngokuba alimboni, alimazi, kepha nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhlezi kini, uyakuba kini (Johane 14:15-17).

(2) UJesu uyiqiniso

Liyini iqiniso?
UPilatu wambuza: “Uyinkosi na?” UJesu waphendula wathi: “Uthi mina ngiyinkosi. ezwini lami uPilatu wabuza wathi: Liyini iqiniso?

( Johane 18:37-38 )

UJesu uyiqiniso:

UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami.

(3) UNkulunkulu uyiqiniso

IZwi linguNkulunkulu:

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. ( Johane 1:1-2 )

IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyiqiniso:

Abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Bangcwelise ngeqiniso; Njengalokhu ungithumile emhlabeni, nami ngibathumile emhlabeni. Ngenxa yabo ngiyazingcwelisa, ukuze nabo bangcweliswe ngeqiniso.

( Johane 17:16-19 )

Phawula: Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu! UNkulunkulu uyiZwi, iZwi lokuphila (bona 1 Johane 1:1-2). IZwi lakho liyiqiniso, ngakho-ke, uNkulunkulu uyiqiniso. Amen!

2:Ungabopha kanjani ukhalo lwakho ngeqiniso?

Umbuzo: Ungabopha kanjani ukhalo lwakho ngeqiniso?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Qaphela: Ukusebenzisa iqiniso njengebhande ukubopha okhalo lwakho, okungukuthi, indlela kaNkulunkulu, iqiniso likaNkulunkulu, amazwi kaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele, kunegunya futhi kunamandla kubantwana bakaNkulunkulu namaKrestu! Amen.

(1) Ukuzalwa kabusha
1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Bazalwa okholweni lwevangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:12-13

(2) Gqoka ubuntu obusha futhi nembathe uKristu

Gqoka umuntu omusha:

Futhi nigqoke ubuntu obusha, owadalwa ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele. ( Efesu 4:24 )

Gqoka indoda entsha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe. ( Kolose 3:10 )

Gqoka uKristu:

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. ( Galathiya 3:26-27 )

Gqokani njalo iNkosi uJesu Kristu futhi ningalungiseleli inyama ukufeza izinkanuko zayo. ( Roma 13:14 )

(3) Hlala kuKristu

Umuntu omusha uhlala kuKristu:

Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. (Funda amaRoma 8:1.)

Lowo ohlala kuye akoni; (Bala u-1 Johane 3:6.)

(4) Ukuzethemba-Angiseyena ophilayo manje

Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; (Galathiya 2:20)

(5) Indoda entsha ihlanganyela noKristu futhi ikhule ibe umuntu omdala

Ukuhlomisa abangcwele umsebenzi wokukhonza, nokwakha umzimba kaKristu, size sifike sonke ebunyeni bokukholwa nasekwazini iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ekukhuleni ebudodeni, esilinganisweni sobukhulu boMoya. ukugcwala kukaKristu,...ngothando lukhuluma iqiniso kuphela, lukhule kukho konke kuye oyinhloko, uKristu, okuthe ngaye umzimba wonke uhlanganiswa, uhlanganiswa, amalunga onke akhonza inhloso yawo, asekelane njengokwe umsebenzi wesitho ngasinye, okwenza umzimba ukhule futhi uzakhe othandweni. (Funda eyabase-Efesu 4:12-13, 15-16.)

(6) “Inyama” yendoda endala iwohloka kancane kancane

Uma nizwile izwi lakhe, nakwamukela ukulaywa kwakhe, nafunda iqiniso lakhe, nikhumule ubuntu benu obudala, owonakaliswa yizinkanuko zabo (Kwabase-Efesu 4:21-22). )

(7) Umuntu omusha “umuntu ongokomoya” wenziwa musha usuku nosuku kuKristu

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle uyabhidlika, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu okukhanyayo nokwesikhashana kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Kuvela ukuthi kasikhathali ngokubonwayo, kodwa okungabonwayo; (Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 4:16-18.)

Ukuze ukholo lwenu lunganciki ekuhlakanipheni kwabantu, kodwa lube semandleni kaNkulunkulu. (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 2:5.)

Qaphela:

UPawulu ungowezwi likaNkulunkulu nevangeli! Enyameni, wabhekana nezinhlupheko namaketanga emhlabeni lapho eboshiwe eFilipi, wabona unogada wejele egqoke izikhali ezigcwele. Ngakho wabhalela bonke abangcwele base-Efesu izibusiso ezingokomoya.

Qaphelani nina, ningenzi njengeziwula, kodwa njengabahlakaniphileyo. Sebenzisani ngokugcwele isikhathi, ngoba lezi zinsuku zimbi. Ungabi yisiwula, kodwa qonda ukuthi iyini intando yeNkosi. Funda eyabase-Efesu 5:15-17

Ezintathu: AmaKristu njengamasosha kaKristu

Gqoka lokho uNkulunkulu akunike khona nsuku zonke

-Izikhali Zomoya:

Ikakhulukazi lapho amaKristu ebhekene nezilingo, izinsizi, nezinsizi ngokwenyama; lapho izithunywa zikaSathane emhlabeni zihlasela imizimba yamaKristu, amaKristu kumelwe avuke njalo ekuseni, agqoke izikhali eziphelele ezingokomoya azinikezwe uNkulunkulu, futhi asebenzise iqiniso njengebhande lawo. Bhinca izinkalo zakho futhi ulungele umsebenzi wosuku.

(Njengoba uPawulu asho) nginezwi elilodwa lokugcina: Qina eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane. Ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi balomhlaba balobu bumnyama, nabawomoya ababi ezindaweni eziphakemeyo. Ngakho hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana nesitha ngosuku losizi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime. Ngakho-ke yimani niqinile, nibhince ibhande leqiniso… (Kwabase-Efesu 6:10-14 KJV).

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Bafowethu nodadewethu!

Khumbula ukuqoqa

articles.content:
---Uhlukaniswa kanjani phakathi kothando nokuphinga---

Namuhla sizohlola ukwabelana ngobudlelwane: uthando nokuphinga

Masivule iBhayibheli kuGenesise Isahluko 2, amavesi 23-25, futhi sifunde ndawonye:
Wathi umuntu: Lo uyithambo lamathambo ami nenyama yenyama yami, ungambiza ngokuthi owesifazane, ngokuba uthathwe endodeni.

Ngakho-ke indoda iyoshiya uyise nonina inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayoba nyamanye. Lezi zithandani bezinqunu ngaleso sikhathi futhi zingenawo amahloni.

1. Uthando

Umbuzo: Luyini uthando?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Uthando phakathi kuka-Adamu no-Eva

--Izithandani zazinqunu futhi zingenawo amahloni--

1 U-Adamu wathi ku-Eva: “Lo uyithambo lamathambo ami nenyama yenyama yami; ake ngikubize ngokuthi owesifazane.”
"Abesifazane" yizipho ezinhle kakhulu ezinikezwe nguNkulunkulu kubantu, bayiqiniso, umusa nobuhle! Kungukuncoma, umngane, induduzo, nomsizi!
2 Indoda iyoshiya abazali bayo;
3 Joyina umkakho,
4 Laba ababili baba munye.

5 Indoda nomkayo babenqunu, futhi bengenamahloni.

[Qaphela] U-Adamu no-Eva baseNsimini yase-Edene, izinhliziyo zabo zazimsulwa, zingcwele, uthando lweqiniso, iqiniso, ubuhle kanye nobuhle! Ngakho-ke, indoda nomfazi banqunu futhi abanamahloni Lolu uthando olungakangeni kubantu.)

(2)Uthando phakathi kuka-Isaka noRebeka

U-Isaka wamngenisa uRebheka etendeni likaSara unina, wamthatha abe ngumkakhe, wamthanda. U-Isaka wathola induduzo njengoba unina engasekho. Genesise 24:67

[Qaphela] u-Isaka ufanekisela uKristu, futhi uRebheka ufanekisela ibandla! U-Isaka washada noRebheka futhi wamthanda! Okungukuthi, uKristu ushada ibandla futhi uthanda ibandla.

(3)Uthando Lwengoma Yezingoma

【Indoda Nezithandani Ezithandekayo】

“Othandekayo” ufanekisela uKristu,
"Izithandani Ezingcono Kakhulu":
Eyoku-1 ifanekisela intombi emsulwa-2 Korinte 11:2, IsAmbulo 14:4;
U-2 ufanekisela ibandla-Efesu 5:32;

3 ifanekisela umlobokazi kaKristu - IsAmbulo 19:7.

Ngiyimbali yaseSharoni nomnduze wasesigodini.
Othandiweyo wami uphakathi kwabesifazane, njengomduze phakathi kwameva.
Othandiweyo wami uphakathi kwabantu njenge-apula phakathi kwezihlahla.
Ngahlala emthunzini wakhe ngentokozo, nganambitha isithelo sakhe;

Kuzwakala kumnandi. Ungingenisa endlini yedili, abeke uthando njengebhanela lakhe phezu kwami. IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo 2:1-4

Ngicela ungibeke enhliziyweni yakho njengophawu, ungithwale engalweni yakho njengesigxivizo.

Ngokuba uthando lunamandla njengokufa, nomhawu ononya njengesihogo; Uthando alunakucinywa ngamanzi amaningi, futhi alunakuminzwa ngezikhukhula. Uma umuntu eshintsha wonke amagugu omndeni wakhe ngothando, uyodelelwa. IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo 8:6-7

2. Ukuphinga

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuphinga nokuphinga?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ngokomoya ongcwele ozelwe kabusha wokholo:

1 Abangane bezwe—bheka uJakobe 4:4
2 Ibandla lihlangene namakhosi omhlaba—Bheka isAmbulo 17:2

3. Labo abasekelwe emthethweni-- bheka kwabaseRoma 7:1-3, Gal 3:10

(2) Ngokwemiyalo yezimiso zenyama:

1 Ungaphingi - Eksodusi 20:14
2 Lowo olahla umkakhe, aganwe ngomunye, uyaphinga; ” Luka 16:18

3 Lowo obuka owesifazane, amkhanuke, usephingile naye enhliziyweni yakhe.”—Mathewu 5:27-28.

3. Uhlukaniswa kanjani phakathi kothando nokuphinga

Umbuzo: AmaKristu alubona kanjani uthando?

Impendulo: Umshado ohlanganiswe nguNkulunkulu uluthando!

1 Umuntu ufuna ukushiya abazali bakhe,
2 Hlangana nomkakho,
3 Laba ababili baba munye,
4 Kungukubambisana kukaNkulunkulu,
5 Makungahlukaniswa muntu—Bheka uMathewu 19:4-6
6 Babehamba ze bobabili,

7 Awunamahloni—Bheka uGenesise 2:24

Umbuzo: AmaKristu akubona kanjani ukuphinga?

Impendulo: Noma iyiphi inkanuko "ngaphandle" umshado kaNkulunkulu odidiyelwe ukuphinga.

(Isibonelo:) Genesise 6:2 Lapho amadodana kaNkulunkulu ebona amadodakazi abantu ukuthi ayemahle, azithathela abafazi abazikhethela wona.

(Qaphela:) Ngokubona ubuhle bendodakazi yomuntu (inkanuko yenyama, inkanuko yamehlo), ukhetha ngokuthanda kwakhe (kanye nokuzigqaja kwalokhu kuphila) futhi ayithathe abe ngumkakhe (futhi akuveli kuBaba “ uNkulunkulu”) → Akuwona umshado ohlanganiswe uNkulunkulu . Bheka uJakobe 2:16
Genesise 3-4 (hhayi) UNkulunkulu ubambisana nabesifazane abangabantu ukuze babe nabantwana → “amadoda amakhulu, abantu abangamaqhawe nabadumile” → “amaqhawe, izithombe, abazidlayo, abazidlayo” abathanda ukuba “amakhosi” futhi benze ukuba abantu bakhulekelwe noma bakhulekelwe. .
UJehova wabona ukuthi ububi bomuntu bukhulu emhlabeni nokuthi yonke imicabango yemicabango yakhe mibi njalo, Genesise 6:5

4. Ukuziphatha kanye nezici (zothando, ukuphinga)

Umbuzo: Yiziphi izenzo uthando? Ingabe lezo zenzo ziyaphinga?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Indoda nomfazi

1 Umshado wokubambisana kukaNkulunkulu

Indoda iyoshiya abazali bayo futhi inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayoba nyamanye! Umshado ohlanganiswe uNkulunkulu awunakuhlukaniswa ngumuntu. Isibonelo, indoda ikhumbula umkayo noma inkosikazi ikhumbula umyeni wayo Laba ababili banqunu futhi "bahlangene" ngaphandle kwamahloni → lolu uthando. Sicela ubheke eyoku-1 Korinte 7:3-4.
Isibonelo: U-Adamu no-Eva - bheka kuGenesise 2:18-24
Isibonelo: U-Abrahama noSara - bheka kuGenesise 12:1-5

Isibonelo: U-Isaka noRebheka - bheka kuGenesise 24:67

2 Umshado obusiswe uNkulunkulu

Isibonelo: UNowa nomndeni wakhe - bheka uGenesise 6:18
Isibonelo: UJakobe wayethandwa uNkulunkulu, futhi abafazi bakhe ababili nezincekukazi ezimbili zazala izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli Lona kwakuwumshado owawubusiswe nguNkulunkulu!

Isibonelo: URuthe noBhowazi – Isikhombo Luka: 4:13

3 Akuwona umshado oqondiswa uNkulunkulu

Ngokwesibonelo, uma u-Abrahama ethatha isancinza futhi alale noHagari, u-Abrahama ‘uyoba namahloni’ enhliziyweni yakhe ngoba akamfanele uSara umkakhe! Ngakho-ke, umshado ongamjabulisi uNkulunkulu. Ekugcineni, iningi lenzalo kaHagari “owazala” u-Ishmayeli laphambuka ezindleleni zikaNkulunkulu futhi lamshiya uNkulunkulu.

4 UNkulunkulu akabheki ukuziphatha komuntu

Isibonelo: uThamashi noJuda

Ukuziphatha kukaTamari, umalokazana, kanye noyisezala kwakubhekwa njengesono “sobufebe” ngokwemithetho yenyama Nokho, uNkulunkulu akazange acabangele ukuziphatha kukaTamari UNkulunkulu nokholo lwakhe ekuzaleleni indlu kaJuda indodana uNkulunkulu wathi ulungile ubhalwe ohlwini lozalo lukaJesu. Bheka kuGenesise 38:24-26, Mathewu 1:3 kanye noDuteronomi 22 “Isimiso Sobumsulwa”.

Isibonelo: ULahabi noSalmoni—Mathewu 1:5

Isibonelo: UDavide noBhati-sheba

UDavide ‘waphinga waboleka inkemba ukuze abulale. Futhi ngenxa yokuthi uDavide wayemthanda uNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yonke futhi elandela intando kaNkulunkulu kukho konke (eholela ama-Israyeli ukuba athembele kuNkulunkulu), wabizwa ngokuthi indoda elandela inhliziyo kaNkulunkulu. Bheka izEnzo 13:22 kanye neyesi-2 Samuweli 11-12.

(2) Amadoda nabesifazane abangashadile

"Abafana namantombazane" kubhekiselwa kwabesilisa nabesifazane abangashadile Abafana namantombazane bathandane futhi bafuna ukuqala umndeni Lokhu kuyisiqalo sothando. Uma unemicabango evusa inkanuko nomunye umuntu enhliziyweni yakho, uyaphinga.

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: Kodwa mina ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo obuka owesifazane, amkhanuke, usephingile naye enhliziyweni yakhe. Mathewu 5:28

(3) Abafelokazi Izehlukaniso nezindaba zomshado

Ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe, ngaphandle kokuphinga, uyaphinga; ” Mathewu 19:9

[Njengombono kaPaul uqobo]

1 Kwabangashadile nabafelokazi

Uma ungakwazi ukuzibamba ungashada. Esikhundleni sokuvutha isifiso, kungaba ngcono ukushada. 1 Korinte 7:9

2 Uma umyeni wakho efa, ungaphinde ushade

Uma indoda isaphila, umfazi uboshiwe; 1 Korinte 7:39

(4) Izindaba zangaphandle
"I-Hongxing iphuma odongeni" kuchaza owesifazane oseqhakazile futhi izifiso zakhe zobulili zisebenza ngesikhathi se-estrus Kubhekisela ekubaleni kowesifazane nokujola nendoda. Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi owesilisa unobudlelwane bobulili ngaphandle komshado noma owesifazane uqomile, ukuziphatha kwabo ukuphinga.
(5)Ukuziphatha okubi
Kokubili ubufebe nobufebe phakathi kwabesilisa nabesifazane kuyizenzo zokuphinga.
Ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu wabanikela ezinkanukweni eziyihlazo. Abesifazane babo baphendule ukusetshenziswa kwabo kwemvelo kwaba ukusetshenziswa okuphambene nemvelo, kanjalo nabesilisa babo, abaye bashiya ukusetshenziswa kwabo kwemvelo, badliwa yinkanuko, bakhanukelana, futhi amadoda enza izinto eziyihlazo namadoda, futhi afanelwe yikho. ukuziphindiselela. Funda kwabaseRoma 1:26-27
(6)Ukushaya indlwabu

“Ubumnandi besono”: Abanye abesilisa noma abesifazane bathola ukwaneliseka ngokomzimba kanye nenjabulo esonweni ngokushaya indlwabu kanye nokushaya indlwabu, bazizwa bezisola, bebuhlungu futhi bengenalutho emiphefumulweni yabo.

(7)Amaphupho asebusuku (wet dreams)

"Ukucabanga nsuku zonke, ukuphupha njalo ebusuku": Umzimba womuntu wesilisa ukhipha amahomoni e-androgen futhi ukhiphe "isidoda" Ebusuku, uzolandela inkanuko yomzimba wakhe lapho elele, aphuphe elala nowesifazane amaziyo akazi; kunjalo nakwabesifazane." Uma uphupha ulala nendoda ukhulelwe, uyaphinga.

ULevitikusi 15:16-24, 22:4, 4 “Ukungcola kwendoda ebusuku” kubhekwa njengokungcolile, futhi kunjalo nangabesifazane.

5. Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

Umbuzo: Umuntu angakugwema kanjani ukuphinga?

Impendulo: Lowo okufanele “aphinde azalwe” futhi azelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke aphinge.

Umbuzo: Kungani?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha akayena owenyama - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9
2 Hlalani kuKristu Jesu—Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:1
3 Kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu—Bheka kwabaseKolose 3:3

4 Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu unomzimba womoya, ongenazo izinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama (umuntu omusha) akashadi futhi akabendiswa. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:44 noMathewu 22:30.

【Qaphela】

Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi wavuswa unomzimba womoya - bheka ku-1 Korinte 15:44 umuntu omusha akayena owomzimba omdala - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9, ngakho-ke owenziwe kabusha (umuntu omusha) akanawo amandla; izinkanuko nezifiso ezimbi zenyama, futhi akashadi noma ashade kufana nengelosi evela ezulwini! Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ngeke one, futhi ngeke aphinge.

Isibonelo, imiyalo yezimiso zenyama:

1 Ungabulali

UJesu wathi: “Abantu baleli zwe bayashada futhi bayendiswa; futhi njengoba bevusiwe, NjengeNdodana kaNkulunkulu Luka 20:34-36 .

[Qaphela:] Abantu abasha abazalwa kabusha futhi bavuswe ngeke baphinde bafe, njengezingelosi. Ngaleso sikhathi, ingabe udinga ukugcina umyalo othi “Ungabulali”? ukufa noma isiqalekiso. Bheka kusAmbulo 21:4, 22:3!

2 Ungaphingi

Isibonelo: Abantu abathanda ugwayi nabantu abangakuthandi ugwayi abantu abathanda ukubhema inyama yabo ithengiswe esonweni (bona kwabaseRoma 7:14). izinhliziyo zabo zilandela Inyama ithanda ukubhema;

Qaphela: Ngoba umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha ungumzimba womoya futhi akasenazo izinkanuko nezifiso ezimbi zenyama, abashadi futhi abashadi njengezingelosi.

Ngokuba lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa (bona kwabaseRoma 4:15).

Umuntu ozelwe kabusha usekhululekile kakade emthethweni, futhi asikho isidingo sokuba ugcine imiyalo (ukungafebi) nezimiso zenyama Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni futhi akoni. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

3 Ungebi

Qaphela: Labo abamisa ngaphambili wababiza futhi; Roma 8:30. Kulokhu, ingabe kusekhona ukweba embusweni kaNkulunkulu Ingabe usadinga ukuhlala ngokuthi “Ungebi”?

4 Ungafakazi amanga

Qaphela: Umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha unoBaba kuye, izwi likaKristu enhliziyweni yakhe, futhi uMoya oNgcwele uyazivuselela ukwenza izinto ezijabulisa uBaba Ngale ndlela, ingabe angakwazi ukufakaza "ubufakazi bamanga"? kulungile Ngoba uMoya oNgcwele uyakwazi ukuqonda zonke izinto, Izwi likaNkulunkulu likithi, futhi singakwazi ukubona ngisho nemicabango nezinhloso zezinhliziyo zethu. Ngakho-ke usadinga ukuthobela le mithethonqubo, akunjalo?

5 Ungabi nobugovu

Qaphela: Nina enizelwe nguNkulunkulu nonke ningabantwana bakaBaba waseZulwini futhi niyifa likaBaba oseZulwini. Yena ongayigodlanga eyakhe iNdodana, kepha wayinikela ngenxa yethu sonke, angayikusinika kanjani konke kanye nayo na? Roma 8:32 . Ngale ndlela, uma unefa likaYihlo osezulwini, usazofisa izinto zabanye abantu na?

Bafowethu nodadewethu, khumbulani ukuqoqa

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu


---2023-01-07---

articles.title: “Yazi UNkulunkulu Wakho Oyedwa Weqiniso”
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sihlola inhlanganyelo futhi sihlanganyele "Ukwazi UNkulunkulu Weqiniso"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade: ukwazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, noJesu Kristu, omthumileyo.

1. Yazi uNkulunkulu wakho weqiniso kuphela

Umbuzo: Ngubani igama likaNkulunkulu oyedwa weqiniso?

Impendulo: UJehova igama lakhe!

Ngakho okuwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, igama Lakhe nguJehova! Amen.

Njengoba nje uMose wathi: Ungubani igama lakho?

UNkulunkulu wathi kuMose: “Nginguye.” UNkulunkulu wathi futhi kuMose: “Uyakusho kanje kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: ‘UJehova, uNkulunkulu wawoyihlo, uNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, uNkulunkulu ka-Isaka. , futhi uNkulunkulu kaJakobe ungithumile kini: UJehova igama lami kuze kube phakade, futhi lokhu kuyisikhumbuzo sami ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane

Umbuzo: Yazi uNkulunkulu wakho weqiniso kuphela, njengoba uwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso!
Kungani abantu emhlabeni bekhulekela izithombe eziningi, onkulunkulu bamanga nezipoki? NjengoSakyamuni Buddha, uGuanyin Bodhisattva, uMuhammad, uMazu, uWong Tai Sin, unkulunkulu womnyango ekhaya, unkulunkulu wengcebo, unkulunkulu wempande yezenhlalo endaweni, uBodhisattva, njll., futhi kukhona onkulunkulu abaningi abangaziwa?

Impendulo: Ngoba izwe alinalwazi futhi alimazi uNkulunkulu weqiniso.

Njengoba uPawulu asho encwadini yezEnzo zabaPhostoli: “Ngithe ngihamba ngabona enikhuleka kukho, ngase ngihlangana ne-altare elinombhalo othi ‘UNkulunkulu Ongaziwa. yazi. Dala umkhathi nazo zonke izinto ezikuwo UNkulunkulu, oyiNkosi yezulu nomhlaba, akahlali emathempelini enziwe ngezandla, futhi akakhonzwa ngezandla zabantu, njengokungathi uswele utho, kodwa yena ngokwakhe unika wonke umuntu ukuphila nomoya nazo zonke izinto. ukuze adale zonke izizwe zabantu ukuba zihlale emhlabeni wonke, futhi wanquma kusengaphambili izikhathi zazo nemingcele yendawo esiyohlala kuyo, ukuze UNkulunkulu angase aqondwe, kodwa akakude kulowo nalowo kithi; . Abazelwe mabangacabangi ukuthi ubunkulunkulu bukaNkulunkulu bufana negolide, nesiliva, netshe eliqoshwe ngobuciko nangemicabango yomuntu. UNkulunkulu akabheki, kodwa manje uyala wonke umuntu ezindaweni zonke ukuba aphenduke, ngoba umisile usuku azokwahlulela ngalo izwe ngokulunga ngomuntu ammisile, futhi uyonika ithemba kubo bonke ngokumvusa ekufeni. ubufakazi.” IzEnzo 17:23-31.

2. Akekho unkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaJehova

Umbuzo: Ingabe ukhona omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu oyedwa weqiniso?

Impendulo: Mina nginguJehova, akakho omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami; Nakuba ningangazi, ngizokubhinca izinkalo zenu (okungukuthi, ngibophe izinkalo zenu ngeqiniso, ukuze nazi iqiniso, ukuze nazi uNkulunkulu weqiniso).

Kusukela lapho ilanga liphuma lize liyoshona khona, wonke umuntu azi ukuthi akekho omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami. Mina nginguJehova; akakho omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami. Isaya 45:5-6

【Okholwa nguJehova uyakusindiswa

Niyakusho, niveze imibono yenu, nibavumele babonisane bodwa. Ngubani owalibonisa kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo? Ngubani owakutshela endulo? Angisiye uJehova na? akakho uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami; Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye. Isaya 45:21-22

3 Owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso unabantu abathathu

(1) uBaba, iNdodana, uMoya oNgcwele

UJesu weza kubo, wathi kubo: “Ngiphiwe amandla onke ezulwini nasemhlabeni. Ngakho hambani nenze izizwe zonke abafundi, nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele. “ nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele) nibafundise ukugcina konke enginiyale ngakho, futhi mina nginani njalo kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe.” -20

(2) Amagama kaYise, neNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele

Umbuzo: Egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele! Ingabe igama likaNkulunkulu? Noma isihloko?

Impendulo: "Baba, Ndodana" yisiqu, hhayi igama! Isibonelo, ubaba wakho yilokho ombiza ngokuthi "uBaba" akulona igama elithi Li XX, Zhang XX, njll. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Obani amagama kaYise, iNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Igama likaYise: UJehova uBaba—Eksodusi 3:15
2 Igama leNdodana: UJehova iNdodana! ULizwi waba yinyama wabizwa ngokuthi uJesu! Bheka kuMathewu 12:21, Luka 1:30-31

3 Igama likaMoya oNgcwele: obizwa nangokuthi uMduduzi noma Ukugcotshwa—Johane 14:16, 1 Johane 2:27

(3) Okuwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso unabantu abathathu

Umbuzo: Baba, iNdodana, uMoya oNgcwele! Bangaki onkulunkulu abanjena?

Impendulo: Munye uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu weqiniso kuphela!

Kodwa sinoNkulunkulu oyedwa, uBaba, okuvela kuye zonke izinto, futhi esivela kuye iNkosi eyodwa, uJesu Kristu, okungaye zonke izinto nathi ngaye. 1 Korinte 8:6

Umbuzo: Bangobani laba bantu abathathu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UMoya oNgcwele munye
Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zeziphiwo, kepha uMoya munye. 1 Korinte 12:4
2 Kodwa yinye iNkosi, iNkosi uJesu Kristu!
Kukhona izinkonzo ezahlukene, kodwa iNkosi yinye. 1 Korinte 12:5
3 UNkulunkulu munye

Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zemisebenzi, kodwa nguNkulunkulu oyedwa osebenza zonke izinto kubo bonke. 1 Korinte 12:6

Umbuzo: UMoya oNgcwele munye, iNkosi munye, noNkulunkulu munye! Akubona onkulunkulu abathathu laba? Noma unkulunkulu?

Impendulo: “UNkulunkulu” unguNkulunkulu, ukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso!

UNkulunkulu oyedwa weqiniso unabantu abathathu: uMoya oNgcwele oyedwa, iNkosi eyodwa, noNkulunkulu oyedwa! Amen.

(Njengoba nje) kukhona umzimba munye noMoya munye, njengoba nje nabizelwa ethembeni linye. Yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, nakubo bonke. Efesu 4:4-6

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Kulungile, asabele ukuhlanganyela lapha namuhla!

Masikhuleke kuNkulunkulu kanyekanye: Siyabonga Abba Baba waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, futhi sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusivula amehlo ethu omoya ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso likamoya! Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, noJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: “Hambani NgoMoya” 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola, ithrafikhi, nokwabelana!

Isifundo 2: Indlela AmaKristu Abhekana Ngayo Nesono

Masivule iBhayibheli kwabaseGalathiya 5:25 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma siphila ngoMoya, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya.

Phinda uphendule kwabaseRoma 8:13 uma niphila ngokwenyama, nizakufa;

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyenze ngeziphambeko zenyama?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 engababaleli iziphambeko zabo (umuntu omutsha), kodwa esephathisiwe umlayezo wokubuyisana – khangela kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:19
2 Uma siphila ngoMoya, kumelwe futhi sihambe ngoMoya - Izikhombo Gal 5:25
3 Bulalani izenzo zomzimba ngoMoya oNgcwele—Funda kwabaseRoma 8:13
4 bulalani amalungu enu asemhlabeni - bheka kwabaseKolose 3:5
5 Thina (indoda endala) sabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi engiphilayo.
6 Zicabangeni (indoda endala) nifile esonweni - Bheka KwabaseRoma 6:11
7 Lowo ozonda ukuphila kwakhe (komuntu omdala) kuleli zwe kufanele alondoloze (umuntu omusha) ukuphila kwakhe okuphakade. Isikhombo mayelana 12:25

8 Imithetho Yokuziphatha Kwamakholwa Amasha—Bheka kwabase-Efesu 4:25-32 .

[ITestamente Elidala] Ngakho-ke, eTestamenteni Elidala, kwakukhona imithetho neziqondiso, kodwa akekho owalungisiswa ngomthetho phambi kukaNkulunkulu akunamphumela—Bheka kwabaseKolose 2:20-23

Umbuzo: Kungani kungasebenzi?

Impendulo: Ngokuba wonke umuntu osebenza ngomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso... Akekho olungisiswa ngomthetho Lokhu kusobala - bheka kwabaseGalathiya 3:10-11;

[ITestamente Elisha] ETestamenteni Elisha, nani nifile kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu...futhi manje senikhululiwe emthethweni - bhekani kwabaseRoma 7:4,6! Manje seningamaKrestu azelwe kabusha anobukhona bukaMoya oNgcwele Uma siphila ngoMoya oNgcwele, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya oNgcwele - bheka kwabaseGalathiya 5:25. Okusho ukuthi, kufanele sithembele kuMoya oNgcwele ukuba abulale zonke izenzo ezimbi zezifiso zenyama, sizonde impilo yesono (yomuntu omdala), futhi alondoloze (umuntu omusha) ekuphileni okuphakade! (Umuntu omusha) NgoMoya oNgcwele khiqiza: uthando, injabulo, ukuthula, ukubekezela, umusa, ukulunga, ukwethembeka, ubumnene, ukuzithiba! Galathiya 5:22-23 . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

9. Faka umcebo esitsheni sobumba

Sinale ngcebo ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. 2 Korinte 4:7

Umbuzo: Yini baby?

Impendulo: "Ingcebo" nguMoya oNgcwele weqiniso - bheka kuJohane 15:26-27

Umbuzo: Siyini isitsha sobumba?

Impendulo: "Isitsha sobumba" kusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu ufuna ukukusebenzisa njengesitsha esiyigugu - bheka ku-2 Thimothewu 2:20-21 .

Umbuzo: Kungani ngezinye izikhathi sihluleka ukukhombisa amandla kaMoya oNgcwele?

Okufana nalokhu: ukuphulukisa izifo, ukukhipha amademoni, ukwenza izimangaliso, ukukhuluma ngezilimi... njll.!

Impendulo: Lawa mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithi.

Ngokwesibonelo: Lapho amaKristu eqala ukukholwa kuJesu, ayeyoba nemibono namaphupho amaningi, futhi kwakuzokwenzeka izinto eziningi ezimangalisayo eduze kwawo. Kodwa manje kancane kancane ibonakala kancane noma iyanyamalala Isizathu siwukuthi ngemva kokukholelwa kuJesu, izinhliziyo zethu zalandela inyama, zakhathalela izinto zenyama, futhi zalandela izwe, futhi asikwazanga ukukhombisa amandla kaMoya oNgcwele.

10. Ukufa kuyasebenza kithi ukuveza impilo kaJesu

Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi. ...Kanjalo kithi kusebenza ukufa, kepha kini kusebenza ukuphila. 2 Korinte 4:10, 12

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuqala ukufa?

Impendulo: Ukufa kukaJesu kuyasebenza kithi! Uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe - Bheka KwabaseRoma 6:5 futhi sihlala sithwele umoya kaJesu kanye nathi. Yifa, uthabathe isiphambano sakho ube yindlela yeNkosi. 35. Uma unokuphila kukaJesu, ungaveza impilo kaJesu. Impilo kaMoya oNgcwele ifakaza ngempilo kaJesu!

“Ngaphambi kwalolo suku”, wonke umuntu kumelwe afe kanye, futhi wonke umuntu emhlabeni uyobhekana ngokwenyama “ukuzalwa, ukuguga, ukugula nokufa” ngisho nokufa ngenxa yezinye izinto; umzimba wenyama "ukuzalwa, ukuguga .Ukugula.Ukufa", ingasaphathwa eyokuhlushwa "isifo" nokufa ngenxa yobuhlungu bomzimba, ukufela esibhedlela, noma ukufela embhedeni wasesibhedlela; Kufanele sithandaze eNkosini uJesu ukuba yenze ukufa Kwakhe kusebenze kumuntu wethu omdala Kufanele sizimisele ukuthwala isiphambano sethu, silandele uJesu, silahlekelwe ukuphila kwethu kwakudala ngenxa yeqiniso nevangeli, futhi sihlangabezane nokufa kanye noKristu! Mhlawumbe lapho usukhulile, isifiso esingcono kakhulu siwukufa ngokwenyama ebuthongweni bakho noma ukufa ngokwemvelo nangokuthula ebuthongweni bakho.

11. Umuntu omdala kancane kancane uba mubi, futhi umuntu omusha uyakhula kancane kancane

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle uyabhidlika, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. 2 Korinte 4:16

Qaphela:

(Indoda endala) “Umzimba wangaphandle” ungumzimba obonakalayo ovela ngaphandle nakuba ubhujiswa, kancane kancane inyama yale ndoda endala iba yimbi ngenxa yokukhohlisa kwezinkanuko - bheka kwabase-Efesu 4:22 .

(Umuntu Omusha) Okuvuswa kanye noKristu kungumzimba womoya - bheka ku-1 Korinte 15:44 impilo yakho ifihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu - bheka kwabaseKolose 3: 3 ngokwalokho okukimi (umbhalo wokuqala: "umuntu " ") - Isikhombo KwabaseRoma 7:22.

→→Ongabonakali (umuntu omusha) ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, ohlanganiswe noKristu, kancane kancane uyakhula abe yindoda, egcwalisa isimo somzimba sikaKristu esiphelele - bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:12-13

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle (inyama yomuntu omdala) ubhujiswa, umzimba wangaphakathi (umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha) wenziwa musha usuku nosuku futhi "ukhula ube ngumuntu." Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula (ukukhumula izinhlupheko zomuntu omdala) kuyofeza kithi (umuntu omusha) isisindo esingenakuqhathaniswa nesaphakade senkazimulo. Kuvele ukuthi asinandaba nalokho esikubonayo (umuntu omdala), kodwa sinendaba nesingakuboni (umuntu omusha); bheka (umuntu omusha) ungunaphakade. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:16-18.

12. UKristu uyavela, futhi umuntu omusha uyavela futhi angene ekuphileni okuphakade

Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:4

1 Bazalwane abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu kalokhu, nalokho esiyakuba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; 1 Johane 3:2
2 Kodwa labo asebelele kuKristu, uNkulunkulu uzabaletha kanye loJesu – ngoba – khangela ku 1 KwabaseThesalonika 4:13-14
3 Kulabo abaphilayo futhi basasele, ngokuphazima kweso, ngokucwayiza kweliso, inyama efayo “iguqulwa” ibe umzimba womoya ongenakonakala— bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:52
4 Umzimba wakhe ophansi waguqulwa isimo ukuze ufane nomzimba wakhe okhazimulayo—Bheka kwabaseFilipi 3:21.
5 Uyohlwithwa kanye nabo emafwini ukuyohlangabeza iNkosi emoyeni - bheka 1 Thesalonika 4:17
6 Lapho uKristu ebonakala, nathi siyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni—Bheka kwabaseKolose 3:4
7 Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokupheleleyo! Kwangathi umoya wenu nomphefumulo nomzimba wenu kulondolozwe kungabi nacala ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, futhi uyokwenza. Funda ku-1 Thesalonika 5:23-24

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:
ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu
Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezingu-144,000 ezilandela iNkosi iWundlu.
Amen!
→→Ngimbona esesiqongweni nasegqumeni;
Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenzi abasekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abakholwa yilelivangeli, Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen!
Isikhombo kwabaseFilipi 4:3
Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa iziphequluli zabo ukusesha - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Hambani NgoMoya 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizohlola ukwabelana kwethrafikhi ndawonye

Isifundo 1: Indlela AmaKristu Abhekana Ngayo Nesono

Ake siphenye kwabaseRoma 6:11 eBhayibhelini lethu futhi silifunde ndawonye: Kanjalo nani kumelwe nizishaye nifile esonweni, kodwa niphilele uNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu.

1. Kungani abantu befa?

Umbuzo: Kungani abantu befa?
Impendulo: Abantu bafa ngenxa “yesono”.

Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. Roma 6:23

Umbuzo: “Isono” sethu sivelaphi?
Impendulo: Ivela kukhokho wokuqala u-Adamu.

Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile. Roma 5:12

2. Incazelo yegama elithi "ubugebengu"

(1) isono

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?
Impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono.

Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; 1 Johane 3:4

(2) Izono eziholela ekufeni, nezono (hhayi) eziholela ekufeni

Uma umuntu ebona umzalwane wakhe enza isono esingasi ekufeni, makamkhulekele, khona uNkulunkulu uyakumnika ukuphila; Konke ukungalungi kuyisono, futhi kukhona izono ezingaholeli ekufeni. 1 Johane 5:16-17

Umbuzo: Siyini isono esiholela ekufeni?

Impendulo: UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nomuntu!

njengokuthi:

1 Isono sika-Adamu sokwephulwa kwesivumelwano ensimini yase-Edene—Bheka uGenesise 2:17.
2 UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nama-Israyeli (uma umuntu ephula isivumelwano, kuyoba yisono) - bheka u-Eksodusi 20:1-17

3 Isono sokungakholelwa eTestamenteni Elisha --Bheka kuLuka 22:19-20 kanye noJohane 3:16-18.

Umbuzo: Siyini isono “esingaholela ekufeni”?

Impendulo: Iziphambeko zenyama!

Umbuzo: Kungani iziphambeko zenyama (hhayi) ziholela ekufeni?

Impendulo: Ngoba senifile - bheka kwabaseKolose 3:3;

Inyama yethu endala yabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu kanye nezinkanuko nezinkanuko zayo - bheka kwabaseGalathiya 5:24;

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kuwe, awuyena owenyama - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9;

Manje akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophila kimi - Reference Gal 2:20.

UNkulunkulu Nathi【iTestamente Elisha】

Wayesethi: "Angisayikukhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo." Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, ayisekho imihlatshelo yesono. KumaHeberu 10:17-18!

3. Ukubalekela ukufa

Umbuzo: Umuntu uphunyuka kanjani ekufeni?

Impendulo: Ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:23

(Uma nifuna ukukhululeka ekufeni, kufanele nikhululwe esonweni; uma nifuna ukukhululeka esonweni, kufanele nikhululwe emandleni omthetho.)

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba?
Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho?

Udosi lokufa yisono, futhi amandla esono umthetho. 1 Korinte 15:55-56

4. Baleka emandleni omthetho

Umbuzo: Ungaphunyula kanjani emandleni omthetho?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ngikhululekile emthethweni

Kanjalo, bazalwane bami, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe-ngababanye, yena owavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sithele izithelo kuNkulunkulu. ...Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala. yomkhosi. Roma 7:4, 6

2 Ukukhululeka Esiqalekisweni Somthetho

UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

3 Ukhululiwe emthethweni wesono nokufa

Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. KwabaseRoma 8:1-2

5. Ukuzalwa kabusha

Umbuzo: Yini oyikholelwayo ekuzalweni kabusha?

Impendulo: (Kholwa) ivangeli lizelwe kabusha!

Umbuzo: Liyini ivangeli?

Impendulo: Engakudlulisela kini kwakuyilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokwemiBhalo. 4

Umbuzo: Ukuvuswa kukaJesu kwasizala kanjani?

Impendulo: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usinike ukuzalwa kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo ukuze sibe nefa elingenakonakala, elingenabala nelingabuni, eligcinelwe nina ezulwini. Nina enigcinwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa nizakwamukela insindiso elungiselelwe ukwambulwa ngesikhathi sokugcina. 1 Petru 1:3-5

Umbuzo: Sizalwa kanjani kabusha?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya—Bheka uJohane 3:5-8
2 Uzalwe eqinisweni levangeli--bheka ku-1 Korinte 4:15;

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu—bheka uJohane 1:12-13;

6. Hlukana nekhehla nokuziphatha kwalo

Umbuzo: Ungalisusa kanjani ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo?

Impendulo: Ngokuba uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisasebenza isono kwabaseRoma 6:5-6

Qaphela: Safa, sangcwatshwa, futhi savuswa kwabafileyo noKristu! Isikhombo KwabaseKolose 3:9

7. Umuntu omusha (akuyena owakhe) umuntu omdala

Umbuzo: Liyini ikhehla?

Impendulo: Yonke inyama evela empandeni yenyama ka-Adamu ingeyomuntu omdala.

Umbuzo: Uyini umuntu osanda kufika?

Impendulo: Wonke amalungu azalwa ku-Adamu wokugcina (uJesu) angabantu abasha!

1 Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya—Bheka uJohane 3:5-8
2 Uzalwe eqinisweni levangeli--bheka ku-1 Korinte 4:15;

3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu—bheka uJohane 1:12-13;

Umbuzo: Kungani umuntu omusha (okungeyena owakhe) umuntu omdala?

Impendulo: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu (okungukuthi uMoya oNgcwele, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaBaba waseZulwini) uhlala kuwe, awuseyena owenyama (indoda endala ka-Adamu), kodwa (umuntu omusha) okaMoya oNgcwele (okungukuthi, okaMoya oNgcwele, kodwa okaKristu ungokaNkulunkulu uBaba). Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9?

8. Umoya Ongcwele Nenyama

1 umzimba

Umbuzo: Umzimba ungokabani?

Impendulo: Inyama ngeyekhehla futhi idayiswe esonweni.

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. Roma 7:14

2 UMoya oNgcwele

Umbuzo: Uvelaphi uMoya oNgcwele?
Impendulo: Evela kuNkulunkulu uBaba Umuntu omusha ungokaMoya oNgcwele

Kodwa nxa esefikile uMncedi engizamthuma evela kuBaba, uMoya weqiniso ophuma kuBaba, yena uzafakaza ngami. Johane 15:26

3 Ukungqubuzana kukaMoya oNgcwele nenkanuko yenyama

Ngokuba inyama ikhanuka okuphambene noMoya, kepha uMoya ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama: lezi zinto ezimbili ziyaphikisana, ukuze ningenze enikuthandayo. Galathiya 5:17

Umbuzo: Ziyini izinkanuko zenyama yomuntu omdala?
Impendulo: Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, nomona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. Galathiya 5:19-21

4 Umuntu omusha uyawuthokozela umthetho kaNkulunkulu;

Ngoba ngokwencazelo yangaphakathi (umbhalo wokuqala umuntu) (okungukuthi, umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha), (umuntu omusha), ngiyawuthanda umthetho kaNkulunkulu; kodwa nginomuzwa wokuthi kukhona omunye umthetho olwayo emzimbeni wami; nomthetho enhliziyweni yami futhi ungithumbe ngihambisane nomthetho wesono ezithweni. Ngilusizi kakhulu! Ngubani ongangisindisa kulomzimba wokufa na? Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ngale ndlela, ngilalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yami (umuntu omusha), kodwa inyama yami (umuntu omdala) ithobela umthetho wesono. KwabaseRoma 7:22-25

Umbuzo: Uyini umthetho kaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: "Umthetho kaNkulunkulu" umthetho kaMoya oNgcwele, umthetho wokukhululwa, nesithelo sikaMoya oNgcwele - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:2 - bheka ku-Gal 6: 2; yothando - bheka kwabaseRoma 13:10, Mathewu 22:37-40 kanye neyoku-1 Johane 4:16;

Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni - bheka ku-1 Johane 3:9 "Umthetho kaNkulunkulu" ngumthetho wothando. Ngale ndlela, ukungoni kungumthetho kaNkulunkulu. Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke aphule umthetho kanye nesono. Uyaqonda?

(Uma kukhona ubukhona boMoya oNgcwele, amakholwa avuselelwe azoqonda ngokushesha nje lapho ekuzwa, ngoba ngokushesha nje lapho amazwi kaNkulunkulu embulwa, azokhipha ukukhanya futhi enze iziwula ziqonde. Ngaphandle kwalokho, abanye abantu ngeke baqonde ngisho noma amazwi abo embulwa. izindebe zomile. Kungokufanayo nakwabanye "abefundisi noma abavangeli" isono,” izinhliziyo zabo ziba lukhuni, futhi baba nenkani nenkani.)

Umbuzo: Uyini umthetho wesono?

Impendulo: Owephula umthetho futhi enze izinto ezingalungile → Lowo oweqa umthetho futhi enze isono ungumthetho wesono. Bheka uJohane 13:4

Umbuzo: Uyini umthetho wokufa?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi - KwabaseRoma 8:2

#. .Ngosuku oyodla ngalo kuwo uyokufa nokufa— Genesise 2:17
# ..Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa - KwabaseRoma 6:23
# ..Uma ningakholwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu, nizofela ezonweni zenu - Johane 8:24
# ..Ngaphandle kokuba niphenduke, niyobhubha kanjalo nonke!— Luka 13:5

Ngakho-ke, uma ungaphenduki → ungakholelwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu, ungakholelwa evangelini, futhi ungakholelwa "eTestamenteni Elisha" Nizobhubha nonke → lokhu "umthetho wokufa". Uyaqonda?

4 Izono Zenyama Yomuntu Omdala

Umbuzo: Inyama yomuntu omdala yayilalela umthetho wesono, ingabe kufanele ivume izono zayo?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

[UJohane wathi: ] Uma sithi thina (umuntu omdala) asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho kithi. Uma sizivuma izono zethu, uNkulunkulu uthembekile futhi ulungile futhi uyosithethelela izono zethu futhi asihlanze kukho konke ukungalungi. Uma sithi thina (indoda endala) asonanga, sithatha uNkulunkulu njengomqambimanga, nezwi lakhe alikho kithi. 1 Johane 1:8-10

[UPawulu wathi: ] Ngoba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze thina (umuntu omusha) singabe sisaba izigqila zesono. KwabaseRoma 6:6; Roma 8:12

[UJohane wathi] Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; 1 Johane 3:9

【Qaphela:】

Abantu abaningi bacabanga ngephutha ukuthi lezi ziqephu ezimbili ku-1 Johane 1:8-10 kanye no-3:9 empeleni aziphikisani.

“Lowokuqala” ngowalabo abangazalwanga kabusha futhi abangakholwanga kuJesu, kuyilapho “okwakamuva” kungokwelabo abakholelwa kuJesu futhi benziwe kabusha (abantu abasha); enye” ingeyalabo abakholwa kuJesu.” Izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli zazihlala ku-1:1.

Futhi uPawulu wayewazi kahle umthetho futhi wathi, “Okwakuqala kuyinzuzo manje kuthiwa ukulahlekelwa ngenxa kaKristu – bheka kwabaseFilipi 3:5-7; uPawulu wathola isambulo esikhulu (umuntu omusha) futhi wahlwithwa. nguNkulunkulu ezulwini lesithathu, “ipharadesi likaNkulunkulu.”—Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 12:1-4 .

Futhi kuphela izincwadi ezalotshwa uPawulu: 1 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, anikho enyameni." 2 UMoya oNgcwele ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama. 4 Inyama negazi akunakuwuthwala uMbuso kaNkulunkulu, 5 INkosi uJesu nayo yathi inyama ayisizi lutho.

Ngokuba ozelwe kabusha (umuntu omusha) ulalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu futhi akoni, kuyilapho inyama (umuntu omdala) ithengiswe esonweni, kodwa ugcina umthetho wesono. Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kuwe, awuyena owenyama - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9 okusho ukuthi, (umuntu omusha) akayena owenyama (umuntu omdala), futhi (umuntu omusha) wenza ungabi nacala enyameni (okungukuthi, isikweletu sesono), ukulalela Inyama iyaphila - bona kwabaseRoma 8:12.

Ngale ndlela, umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha “akasazivumi” izono zenyama yomuntu omdala Uma uthi ufuna ukuvuma, kuvela inkinga, ngoba inyama (umuntu omdala) ilalela umthetho wesono nsuku zonke, nalabo. abephula umthetho nabenza izono banecala "lesono" niyocela igazi eliyigugu leNkosi "kaningi" ukuba lesule futhi lihlanze izono zenu. singcwelisa isivumelwano “njengesivamile” futhi sidelele uMoya oNgcwele womusa. Ngakho-ke, amaKristu akufanele abe iziwula, futhi akufanele awenze lusizi uMoya oNgcwele kaNkulunkulu kufanele aqaphe ngokukhethekile, aqaphele futhi aqonde izinto eziphathelene ‘nesivumelwano sokuphila nokufa.

Umbuzo: Ngiyakholwa ukuthi umuntu wami omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni noKristu futhi umzimba wesono angiseyena ophilayo manje , niphuze, nilale, nishade futhi nibe nomkhaya. Kuthiwani ngentsha encane? 7:14) , ukuphila enyameni kusathanda ukulalela umthetho wesono nokwephula umthetho nokwenza izono. Kulokhu, yini okufanele siyenze ngeziphambeko zenyama yethu yomuntu endala Akufanele yini sizishaye indiva?

Impendulo: Ngizoyichaza kabanzi esifundweni sesibili...

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli:
Izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenzi bayasekela, basize, futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli likaKristu! Futhi labo abakholwa lelivangeli, bashumayela futhi bahlanganyele ukholo, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila!

Bafowethu nodadewethu Khumbulani ukuqoqa

articles.title: Gqoka izikhali zomoya 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula bafowethu nodadewethu!

Masicinge, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye namuhla! Kwabase-Efesu BeBhayibheli:

Isandulelo sombhalo!

izibusiso zomoya

1: Thola ubudodana

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Usibusisile ngezibusiso zonke zomoya ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu: njengalokho uNkulunkulu wasikhetha kuye ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe, ukuze sibe ngcwele, singabi nacala phambi kwakhe, ngenxa yothando lwakhe ngathi, wasikhetha kuye, wasimisela ngaphambili ekuthathweni kwamadodana ngoJesu Kristu, ngokwentando yakhe enhle (Kwabase-Efesu 1:3-5)

2: umusa kaNkulunkulu

Sinokuhlengwa ngegazi lale Ndodana ethandekayo, ukuthethelelwa kwezono zethu ngokwengcebo yomusa wayo. Lomusa siphiwe ngokuchichimayo nguNkulunkulu kukho konke ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda konke kungokwentando yakhe, ayimisele ngaphambili ukuba asazise imfihlakalo yentando yakhe, ukuze asenze ekugcwaleni kwesikhathi; izinto zasezulwini ngokohlelo Lwakhe, konke okusemhlabeni kubumbene kuKristu. Kuye nathi sinefa, esamiselwa ngaphambili ngokwecebo lalowo owenza zonke izinto ngokwecebo lentando yakhe, ukuze ngathi thina ababengabokuqala kuKristu samukele inkazimulo yakhe uzodunyiswa. ( Efesu 1:7-12 )

Okwesithathu: Ukubekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe

Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. ( Efesu 1:13-14 )

Okwesine: Yifa noKristu, uvuke kanye noKristu, futhi ube sezulwini kanye Naye


Nanifile ngeziphambeko nezono zenu, yena wanenza niphile. enahamba kuzo ngokwendlela yaleli zwe, nilalela umbusi wamandla omkhathi, umoya osebenza manje kubantwana bokungalaleli. Sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, senza izinkanuko zenyama, silandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo, futhi ngokwemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo bonke abanye. Nokho, uNkulunkulu ocebile ngesihawu nosithanda ngothando olukhulu, usenza siphile kanye noKristu ngisho nalapho sasifile ngeziphambeko zethu. Kungomusa nisindisiwe. Wasivusa futhi, wasihlalisa kanye nathi ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu Jesu (Kwabase-Efesu 2:1-6)

Eyesihlanu: Hlomani izikhali ezinikelwe nguNkulunkulu

Nginamazwi okugcina: Qina eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane. Ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi balomhlaba balobu bumnyama, nabawomoya ababi ezindaweni eziphakemeyo. Ngakho hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana nesitha ngosuku losizi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime. Ngakho yimani niqine, nibophe izinkalo zenu ngeqiniso, nimboze isifuba senu isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga, nifake ezinyaweni zenu izicathulo zevangeli lokuthula. Phezu kwalokho nithathe isihlangu sokukholwa eningacima ngaso yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi, nesigqoko sokuzivikela sensindiso, nenkemba kaMoya eyiyo izwi likaNkulunkulu nikhuleka ngezikhathi zonke ngazo zonke izinhlobo zokunxusa nokunxusa ngoMoya; ngimemezele izimfihlakalo zevangeli, (Mina ngiyisithunywa esiboshwe ngamaketanga emfihlakalo yaleli vangeli), wangenza ukuba ngikhulume ngesibindi njengomsebenzi wami. ( Efesu 6:10-20 )

Isithupha: Dumisani uNkulunkulu ngezingoma zomoya

Khulumani omunye komunye ngamahubo, nezihlabelelo, nezihlabelelo zokomoya, nihlabelele, nidumise uJehova ngenhliziyo nangomlomo wenu. Bongani uNkulunkulu uBaba ngaso sonke isikhathi ngakho konke egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Kufanele sizithobe omunye komunye ngenxa yokuhlonipha uKristu.
( Efesu 5:19-21 )

Oyisikhombisa: Khanyisa amehlo enhliziyo yakho

Thandazelani iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu UNkulunkulu, uYise wenkazimulo, uninike uMoya wokuhlakanipha nokwambulelwa ekumazini yena, namehlo ezinhliziyo zenu akhanyiselwe, ukuze nazi ithemba lokubizwa kwakhe nethemba lokubizwa kwakhe ezweni. abangcwele Iyini ingcebo yenkazimulo yefa, nokuthi bukhulu kangakanani obudlulele bamandla akhe kithi esikholwayo ngokwamandla amakhulu awasebenzisa kuKristu ekumvuseni kwabafileyo nokumhlalisa ezulwini kwasezulwini. ubeka isandla saKhe sokunene, (Efesu 1:17-20)

Imibhalo yesandla yeVangeli

Bafowethu nodadewethu!

Khumbula ukuqoqa

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu
