articles.title: Umfanekiso Wesihlahla Somkhiwane
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!
Namuhla sifuna ukwabelana ngokuhlanganyela: Umfanekiso Wesihlahla Somkhiwane

Khona-ke wenza umfanekiso: “Umuntu othile wayenomkhiwane utshalwe esivinini sakhe, weza esihlahleni efuna isithelo, kodwa akasitholanga. Wathi kumgcini-nsimu: ‘Bheka, ngiza kuleli khiwane. Sekuphele iminyaka emithathu ngifuna izithelo, kodwa angizitholi, ngoba zidla umhlabathi ize! umhlabathi osizungezile bese ufaka ubulongwe kamuva, yikho-ke, noma ngiyobuye ngiwugawule.'

Luka 13:6-9

Amanothi Esingathekiso:

Ngakho wasebenzisa umfanekiso ukuze athi: “Umuntu othile wayenomkhiwane (“umkhiwane” ufanekisela ama-Israyeli) utshalwe esivinini (uBaba waseZulwini ungumlimi - bhekisela kuJohane 15:1) Yena (ebhekisela kuBaba Osezulwini). wafika wafuna isithelo phambi kwesihlahla, kodwa akasitholanga.

Wayesethi kumgcini-nsimu (uJesu), “Bheka, eminyakeni emithathu edlule kwazalwa uJesu, ethunywe nguNkulunkulu, washumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wenza ukuba abantu bakholwe ukuthi uJesu uyiNkosi. INdodana kaNkulunkulu kanye noKristu UnguMesiya noMsindisi! Wafela izoni Wavuswa futhi wanyukela ezulwini → "Labo abakholelwa kuJesu" → bazalwa kabusha, basindisiwe, banokuphila okuphakade, futhi bathela izithelo zokuqala ezingokomoya) beza kulo mkhiwane ukufuna isithelo, kodwa akakwazanga ukukuthola (ngoba). UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo) Njengezithelo zokuqala, futhi ama-Israyeli awakholelwa kuJesu, awazalwa ngokusha → awakwazi ukuthela izithelo zomoya). Ligawule, lidla izwe ngeze!

'Umphathi wensimu (okungukuthi, iNdodana yomuntu uJesu) wathi, 'Nkosi, kugcine kulonyaka ngize ngimbe inhlabathi ezungezile (ofanekisela umbuso wakwa-Israyeli → "ngaphandle") (ebhekisela ekwandeni ivangeli kwabezizwe) bese wengeza ubulongwe (Lifanekisela ukwanda kwenani lensindiso yabeZizwe kanye nokukhula okuchichimayo kwempilo yomzimba kaKristu) → Kusuka empandeni kaJese (umbhalo wokuqala uyindunduma) igatsha eliphuma empandeni yakhe liyothela isithelo.

Isaya 11:1

(Ama-Israyeli “abona” abeZizwe bakholelwa kuJesu: ukuzalwa kabusha, insindiso, ukubuya kukaJesu Kristu ekupheleni kosuku, ukuhlengwa kwemizimba yabeZizwe, nolibo; ekugcineni ama-Israyeli angena “eminyakeni eyinkulungwane” Iminyaka Eyinkulungwane Kamuva, wonke ama-Israyeli angempela akholwa ukuthi uJesu wayenguKristu noMsindisi Ngakho wonke umndeni wakwa-Israyeli wasinda - bheka kwabaseRoma 11:25-26 kanye neSambulo Isahluko 20).

Uma uthela isithelo esikhathini esizayo, makube njalo, kungenjalo, wugawule futhi. ’”

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

2023.11.05

articles.title: Ubhapathizo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sihlola ukwabelana kwethrafikhi: "Ubhapathizo" Iphethini Yempilo Entsha YobuKristu

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma Isahluko 6, amavesi 3-4, futhi siwafunde ndawonye:

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise.

Umbuzo: Ungamjoyina kanjani uJesu?

impendulo: kuJesu ngokubhapathizwa !

1 Bhaphathizwa kuJesu—KwabaseRoma 6:3
2 Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye esiphambanweni—KwabaseRoma 6:6
3 Yifa kanye naye— Roma 6:6
4 Wangcwatshwa kanye naye—Roma 6:4
5 Ngokuba abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni — Roma 6:7
6 Njengoba nihlanganiswe naye ekufeni okufana naye, niyakuba munye naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe.”— KwabaseRoma 6:5
7 Ukuvuswa kanye noKristu— Roma 6:8
8 Ukuze ngamunye wethu ahambe ekuphileni okusha.”— Roma 6:4

Umbuzo: Yiziphi izici “zokholo nokuziphatha” komKristu ozelwe ngokusha?

Impendulo: Konke ukunyakaza kunesitayela esisha

1. Ubhapathizo

Umbuzo: Iyini "inhloso" yokubhapathizwa?
Impendulo: Woza kuJesu! Mjoyine ngefomu.

(1) Ukuzimisela ukubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaJesu

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho-ke sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni,... KwabaseRoma 6:3-4

(2) Bahlanganiswe naye esimweni sokufa

Umbuzo: Kwakunjani ukuma “kokufa” kukaJesu?
Impendulo: UJesu wafa esihlahleni ngenxa yezono zethu.

Umbuzo: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufeni kwaKhe?

Impendulo: Ngoku “bhapathizelwa” ekufeni kukaJesu nokungcwatshwa kanye Naye;

“Ukubhapathizwa” kusho ukubethelwa, ukufa, ukungcwatshwa, nokuvuswa kanye noKristu! Amen. Bheka amaRoma 6:6-7

(3) Hlanganani Naye ekufaneni kokuvuka Kwakhe

Umbuzo: Kunjani ukuvuswa kukaJesu?
Impendulo: Ukuvuka kukaJesu kungumzimba womoya - 1 Korinte 15:42
Uma nibheka izandla nezinyawo zami, niyokwazi ukuthi yimina ngempela. Ngithinte, ubone! Umphefumulo awunamathambo futhi awunanyama. ” Luka 24:39

Umbuzo: Singahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufaneni Kwakhe kokuvuka?

Impendulo: Yidla isidlo seNkosi!

Ngoba inyama kaJesu → ayikubonanga ukonakala nokufa - bheka izEnzo 2:31

Uma sidla “isinkwa” somzimba wakhe, sinomzimba kaJesu phakathi kwethu. Amen! Lokhu kufanele kuhlanganiswe naye esimweni sokuvuka noma nini lapho sidla lesi sinkwa futhi siphuza le ndebe, siyohlala simunye aze abuye. Isikhombo 1 Korinte 11:26

2. (Ukukholwa) Umuntu omdala ufile futhi usekhululiwe esonweni

Umbuzo: Amakholwa aphunyuka kanjani esonweni?
Impendulo: UJesu wafela izono zethu, wasikhulula kuzo. Sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa, umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono, ngokuba owafayo ukhululiwe esonweni. Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-7 no 3:3 ngokuba senifile...!

3. (Ukholo) Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

Umbuzo: Kungani umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu engoni?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) UJesu wasebenzisa igazi lakhe ukuze ahlanze izono zabantu (kanye). Bheka kumaHeberu 1:3 no-9:12
(2) Igazi likaKristu elingenasici lihlanza izinhliziyo zenu (umbhalo wokuqala “unembeza” ubhekisela kumaHeberu 9:14
(3) Lapho unembeza usuhlanziwe, awusazizwa unecala— Hebheru 10:2

Umbuzo: Kungani ngihlale ngizizwa nginecala?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ngokuba ninomthetho, niphansi komthetho futhi niweqa umthetho, umthetho uyakulahla ngesono, nodeveli unimangalela ngesono. Bheka kwabaseRoma 4:15, 3:20, IsAmbulo 12:10
2 Igazi likaJesu lahlanza izono zabantu kuphela (kanye) wena (awukholwa) ukuthi igazi lakhe eliyigugu (kanye) laba yinhlawulo yaphakade yezono; ." "Kuyasebenza" → geza izono (izikhathi eziningi), asule izono, futhi aphathe igazi Lakhe njengelijwayelekile. Funda kumaHeberu 10:26-29
3 Labo abazizwa benecala abazalwa ngokusha! Okungukuthi, abakazalwa kabusha njengo (umuntu omusha), abakaqondi ivangeli, futhi abakayiqondi insindiso kaKristu; izinkanuko zika-Adamu azikho ebungcweleni bukaKristu.
4 Anikholwanga ukuthi umuntu omdala wabethelwa kanye noKristu, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe... Ngokuba owafayo ukhululiwe esonweni - KwabaseRoma 6:6-7, ngokuba nifile. .. Kolose 3:3
5 Kumelwe nizicabange (umuntu omdala) njengabafile esonweni, kodwa zicabangeni nina (umuntu omusha) ukuze niphilele uNkulunkulu ngoKristu Jesu. Roma 6:11
Ngokwesibonelo: UJesu wathi kubo: “Ukuba beniyizimpumputhe, ngabe aninasono;
6 Wonke umuntu owonayo weqa umthetho futhi akakhululwa emthethweni (ngokholo) ngoJesu bangaphansi komthetho futhi balala ngaphansi kwamandla omubi bangabantwana bakaSathane. Bheka uJohane 1:10

4. Izintombi ezimsulwa

(1) abantu abayi-144,000

La madoda ayengangcoliswanga ngabesifazane; Balandela iWundlu nomaphi lapho liya khona. Bathengwa phakathi kwabantu njengolibo kuNkulunkulu nakulo iWundlu. Awekho amanga angatholakala emilonyeni yabo; IsAmbulo 14:4-5

Umbuzo: Bavelaphi laba bantu abangaphezulu kuka-144,000?

Impendulo: IWundlu lathengwa kumuntu ngegazi lakhe - 1 Korinte 6:20

Umbuzo: Bamele obani abantu abangu-144 000 abalapha?

Impendulo: Ifanekisela abeZizwe abasindisiwe nabo bonke abangcwele!

(2) AmaKristu akholelwa evangelini futhi azalwa ngokusha ayizintombi ezimsulwa

Intukuthelo engiyizwayo ngawe iyintukuthelo kaNkulunkulu. Ngokuba ngaligana endodeni eyodwa, ukuze nginimise kuKristu niyizintombi ezimhlophe. 2 Korinte 11:2

5. Ukukhumula ikhehla u-Adamu

(1) Okuhlangenwe nakho→Ikhehla lihlehliswa kancane kancane

Umbuzo: Ngalilahla nini ikhehla lami, u-Adamu?
Impendulo: Mina (ngakholwa) ngokubethelwa esiphambanweni, ngafa, futhi ngangcwatshwa kanye noKristu, futhi ngaleyondlela ngikhumula indoda endala u-Adamu ngase ngikholelwa (isipiliyoni) ukuthi ukufa kukaJesu kwaqala kimi, futhi kancane kancane ngakhumula umuntu omdala. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:4:10-11 nabase-Efesu 4:22

(2) Okuhlangenwe nakho→Osanda kufika uyakhula kancane kancane

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. ...Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:9 → Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle (umuntu omdala) ubhujiswa, umuntu wangaphakathi (umuntu omusha) wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu okukhanyayo nokwesikhashana kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

6. Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila kini. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami unokuphila okuphakade ekugcineni. Mina ngiyomvusa, inyama yami iwukudla, negazi lami liwukuphuza

7. Gqokani ubuntu obusha futhi nembathe uKristu

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. Galathiya 3:26-27

8. Thanda ukushumayela ivangeli nokwenza abantu bakholwe kuJesu

Isici esisobala kakhulu sikaKristu ozelwe kabusha ukuthi uthanda ukushumayela ngoJesu emndenini wakhe, ezihlotsheni zakhe, ekilasini lakhe, asebenza nabo, nakubangane, ebatshela ukuthi bakholelwe evangelini futhi basindiswe futhi babe nokuphila okuphakade.
(Ngokwesibonelo) UJesu weza kubo wathi kubo: “Nginikwe lonke igunya ezulwini nasemhlabeni. Ngakho hambani niyokwenza abantu bazo zonke izizwe babe abafundi, nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaYise. uMoya oNgcwele ( nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele). 28:18-20

9. Ungabe usakhonza izithombe

AmaKrestu azelwe ngokusha awasazikhonzi izithixo, akhonza kuphela uJehova owadala izulu nomhlaba, iNkosi uJesu Kristu
Nanifile ngeziphambeko nezono zenu, yena wanenza niphile. enahamba kuzo ngokwendlela yaleli zwe, nilalela umbusi wamandla omkhathi, umoya osebenza manje kubantwana bokungalaleli. Sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, senza izinkanuko zenyama, silandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo, futhi ngokwemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo bonke abanye. Nokho, uNkulunkulu ocebile ngesihawu nosithanda ngothando olukhulu, usenza siphile kanye noKristu ngisho nalapho sasifile ngeziphambeko zethu. Kungomusa nisindisiwe. Wasivusa futhi wasihlalisa kanye nathi ezindaweni zasezulwini kanye noKristu Jesu. Efesu 2:1-6

10. Imibuthano yothando, ukutadisha iBhayibheli, nokudumisa uNkulunkulu ngezingoma ezingokomoya

AmaKristu azelwe ngokusha ayathandana futhi ayathanda ukuhlangana njengamalungu azolalela izintshumayelo, afunde futhi atadishe iBhayibheli, athandaze kuNkulunkulu, futhi adumise uNkulunkulu wethu ngezingoma ezingokomoya!
ukuze umoya wami ukuhubele ukudumisa, ungathuli. Ngiyakukubonga, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, kuze kube phakade. IHubo 30:12
Izwi likaKristu malihlale ezinhliziyweni zenu ngokucebile, nifundisana, niyalana ngamahubo, nangezihlabelelo, nangamaculo okomoya, nihubele uNkulunkulu izinhliziyo zenu zigcwele umusa. Kolose 3:16

11. Asibona abezwe

(Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho) Ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Angikuceli ukuba ubakhiphe emhlabeni, kodwa ngicela ukuba ubagcine komubi (noma kuhunyushwe ngokuthi: esonweni). Abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Johane 17:14-16

12. Ukulindela ukubuya kukaKristu ngokholo, ithemba, nothando

Manje kunezinto ezintathu ezihlala zikhona: ukholo, ithemba, nothando, okukhulu kunakho konke uthando. — 1 Korinte 13:13

Siyazi ukuthi yonke indalo iyabubula futhi isebenza ndawonye kuze kube manje. Akugcini lapho, nathi esinolibo lukaMoya siyabubula ngaphakathi, silindele ukuma kwethu njengamadodana, ukukhululwa kwemizimba yethu. KwabaseRoma 8:22-23
Ofakaza lokhu uthi: “Yebo, ngiyeza masinyane! Nkosi Jesu, ngifuna ukuthi uze!

Umusa weNkosi uJesu mawube nabo bonke abangcwele. Amen! IsAmbulo 22:20-21

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:
ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu
Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa ezingu-144,000 ezilandela iNkosi iWundlu. Amen
→→Ngimbona esesiqongweni nasegqumeni;
Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9
Ngabasebenzi beNkosi uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenzi abasekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi. abakholwa yilelivangeli, Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen!
Isikhombo kwabaseFilipi 4:3
Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Kholwani Evangelini” 12
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Kholwani Evangelini” 12

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

ISIFUNDO 12: Ukukholwa evangelini kukhulula imizimba yethu

KwabaseRoma 8:23 Akusikho lokho kuphela, kodwa nathi uqobo lwethu esinolibo lukaMoya siyabubula ngaphakathi, silindele ukuma kwamadodana, ukukhululwa kwemizimba yethu.

Umbuzo: Imizimba yethu iyohlengwa nini?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuphila kwethu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Kolose 3:3

Umbuzo: Ingabe ukuphila kwethu okuvuselelwe kanye nemizimba yethu ibonakala?

Impendulo: Umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu futhi akabonakali.
Kuvela ukuthi kasikhathali ngokubonwayo, kodwa okungabonwayo; 2 Korinte 4:18

(2) Ukuphila kwethu kubonakala

Umbuzo: Ukuphila kwethu kubonakala nini?

Impendulo: Lapho uKristu ebonakala, izimpilo zethu zizovela.

Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:4

Umbuzo: Ingabe ukuphila kubonakala kunomzimba?

Impendulo: Kukhona umzimba!

Umbuzo: Ingabe umzimba ka-Adamu? Noma umzimba kaKristu?
Impendulo: NguMzimba kaKristu! Ngoba Wasizala ngevangeli, singamalungu Akhe. Efesu 5:30

Qaphela: Okusezinhliziyweni zethu uMoya oNgcwele, uMoya kaJesu, noMoya kaBaba waseZulwini! Umphefumulo ungumphefumulo kaJesu Kristu! Umzimba ungumzimba kaJesu ongafi; ngakho-ke, umuntu wethu omusha awuwona umzimba womphefumulo womuntu omdala, u-Adamu. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokupheleleyo! Futhi sengathi umoya wenu, umphefumulo, nomzimba (okungukuthi, umphefumulo wakho ozelwe kabusha nomzimba) kungagcinwa kungenasici ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Uthembekile onibizayo, futhi uyokwenza. 1 Thesalonika 5:23-24

(3) Labo abalala kuJesu, uJesu weza nabo

Umbuzo: Baphi labo asebelele kuJesu Kristu?

Impendulo: Kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu!

Umbuzo: Uphi uJesu manje?

Impendulo: UJesu wavuswa wenyukela ezulwini, manje uhlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba Impilo yethu kanye neyalabo abalele kuJesu isezulwini. Isikhombo kwabase-Efesu 2:6

Umbuzo: Kungani amanye amabandla (njengamaSeventh-day Adventist) ethi abafileyo balala emathuneni kuze kube yilapho uKristu ebuya futhi, bese bephuma emathuneni futhi bavuswe?

Impendulo: UJesu uzokwehla ezulwini lapho ebuya futhi, futhi mayelana nalabo abalala kuJesu, yebo uyokwehliswa evela ezulwini;

【Ngoba umsebenzi wokuhlengwa kukaJesu Kristu usuqediwe】

Uma abafileyo besalele ethuneni, ukholo lwabo luyoba senkingeni enkulu kuyodingeka balinde kuze kube sekupheleni kwenkulungwane yeminyaka, ukwahlulela kokugcina, lapho ukufa neHayidesi kuyonikeza abafileyo phakathi kwabo kungalotshwanga encwadini yokuphila, uzakuphonswa echibini lomlilo. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka isAmbulo 20:11-15

Asifuni ukuba nibe ningazi, bazalwane, ngabaleleyo, ukuze ningadabuki njengabangenathemba. Uma sikholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa wabuye wavuka, ngisho nalabo abalele kuJesu uNkulunkulu uyobaletha kanye naye. 1 Thesalonika 4:13-14

Umbuzo: Labo asebelele kuKristu, ingabe bayovuswa benemizimba?

Impendulo: Kukhona umzimba, umzimba womoya, umzimba kaKristu! Isikhombo 1 Korinte 15:44

Ngokuba iNkosi uqobo iyakwehla ezulwini ngokumemeza, ngezwi lengelosi enkulu, nangecilongo likaNkulunkulu, nabafileyo kuKristu bayakuvuka kuqala; 1 Thesalonika 4:16

(4) Labo abaphilayo nabasele bayoguqulwa futhi bagqoke umuntu omusha futhi babonakale ngokuphazima kweso.

Manje nginitshela imfihlakalo: asiyikulala sonke, kodwa siyakuguqulwa sonke, ngokuphazima kweso, ngokucwayiza kweliso, lapho icilongo lokugcina likhala. Ngoba icilongo liyokhala, abafileyo bayovuswa bengenakonakala, futhi siyoshintshwa. Lokhu okonakalayo kumele kwembathe ukungafi; 1 Korinte 15:51-53

(5) Sizobona isimo sakhe sangempela

Umbuzo: Ngabe isimo sethu sangempela sibukeka kanjani?

Impendulo: Imizimba yethu ingamalungu kaKristu futhi ibonakala ifana Naye!

Bazalwane abathandekayo, manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; 1 Johane 3:2 naFilipi 3:20-21

kulungile! "Kholwa Evangelini" kwabelwana ngazo lapha.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Siyabonga Abba Baba waseZulwini, siyabonga uMsindisi uJesu Kristu, futhi sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokuba nathi njalo! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde iBhayibheli! Siyaqonda ukuthi lapho uJesu efika, sizobona isimo Sakhe sangempela, futhi umzimba wethu omusha uyovela, okungukuthi, umzimba uyohlengwa. Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla likaJesu Krestu

---2022 01 25---

articles.title: “Kholwani Evangelini” 11
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Kholwani Evangelini” 11

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isifundo 11: Ukukholwa evangelini kusenza sikwazi ukuthola ubudodana

Umbuzo: Ungabuthola kanjani ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Udonga oluhlukanisayo oluphakathi lwabhidlizwa

(2) UKristu wasebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze aqede inzondo

(3) Ubutha babhujiswa esiphambanweni

Umbuzo: Yiziphi izikhalo ezadilizwa, zaqedwa, futhi zacekelwa phansi?

Impendulo: Yimithethonqubo ebhalwe emthethweni.

Ngokuba yena ungukuthula kwethu, wenza laba ababili baba-nye, wadiliza ugange oluhlukanisayo, wachitha ubutha emzimbeni wakhe, yebo, imiyalo elotshiweyo emthethweni, ukuze enze okubili ngesandla sakhe; ngokwakhe Umuntu omusha ngaleyo ndlela uzuza ukuzwana. Ngemva kokuqeda ubutha esiphambanweni, siye sabuyisana noNkulunkulu ngesiphambano

(4) Imithetho nemibhalo eyichithayo

(5)Isuse

(6) Wabethelwa esiphambanweni

Umbuzo: Yini uKristu asigcobela yona? Susa ini?

Impendulo: Susa imibhalo emithethweni emelene nathi futhi eyingozi kithi, futhi uyisuse.

Umbuzo: Yayiyini “inhloso” kaJesu “yokwesula” imithetho, izimiso nemibhalo, ayisuse futhi ayibethele esiphambanweni?

Impendulo: Noma ubani owonayo weqa umthetho; 1 Johane 3:4

Bheka kusAmbulo 12:10 ngoba uSathane udeveli uphambi kukaNkulunkulu imini nobusuku esola → abafowethu nodadewethu → Ingabe kuphambene nomthetho? Ukukumangalela ngemithetho neziqondiso futhi kukugwebele ukufa? USathane kufanele athole imithetho, izimiso nezincwadi “njengobufakazi” bokufakazela ukuthi wephule umthetho phambi kwesihlalo sokwahlulela → ukugwebele ukufa futhi uthande uNkulunkulu wethu, iNkosi uJesu Kristu! Wesula izimiso nezincwadi zomthetho, ubufakazi obusimangalelayo futhi wasigwebela ukufa, futhi wazisusa, ezibethela esiphambanweni. Ngale ndlela, uSathane ngeke akwazi ukusebenzisa “ubufakazi” ukuze akusole, futhi ngeke akwazi ukukulahla ngecala noma akugwebele ukufa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Nanifile eziphambekweni nasekungasokini kwenyama yenu, kepha uNkulunkulu uniphilise kanye noKristu, esenithethelele (noma ekuhumushele: thina) iziphambeko zethu zonke, esesule konke okusemthethweni, esusa imibhalo. ubufakazi becala) obulotshwe ngathi nakithi, bubethelele esiphambanweni. Isikhombo KwabaseKolose 2:13-14

(7) Ukukhululeka emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho

Umbuzo: Ungabalekela kanjani umthetho nesiqalekiso?

Impendulo: Yifa emthethweni ngomzimba kaKristu

Kanjalo, bazalwane bami, nani nafile kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu... Kepha njengoba safa kuwo umthetho esiboshwe ngawo, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni... KwabaseRoma 7:4,6

UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

(8) Thola ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Ungabuthola kanjani ubudodana?
Impendulo: Ukuze ahlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ubuntwana.

Kwathi ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Galathiya 4:4-5

Umbuzo: Kungani labo abangaphansi komthetho kufanele bahlengwe?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Lowo owenza isono weqa umthetho, nokwephula umthetho kuyisono. 1 Johane 3:4
2 Wonke umuntu osebenza ngokomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Uqalekisiwe wonke umuntu ongaqhubeki enza konke okulotshwe encwadini yomthetho; kusobala; ngoba umBhalo uthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseGalathiya 3:10-11
3 Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka (noma ukuhunyushwa: kubangela isijeziso)
Ngakho →→
4 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - Roma 4:15
5 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono - Roma 5:13
6 Ngokuba ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile - KwabaseRoma 7:8

7 Loba ngubani owonayo ngaphandle komlayo, uzabhubha engelamlayo; Bheka amaRoma 2:12

( Ukwahlulela Okukhulu Kosuku Lokugcina: Abafowethu nodadewethu kufanele bahluze futhi banake. Labo (abangekho) ngaphansi komthetho, okungukuthi, labo abakuJesu Kristu, bayovuswa futhi babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. ngaphambi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka; Labo abangaphansi komthetho kuyofanele balinde kuze kube “ngemva” Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane Lababantu abafile bayonikelwa futhi bahlulelwe ngokwezenzo zabo ngaphansi komthetho neziphambeko nezono zabo. Encwadini yokuphila, waphonswa echibini lomlilo futhi wabhubha).
Uma ningakholwa ukuthi leli [vangeli] lingamandla kaNkulunkulu, ngicela ningakhali nigedle amazinyo ngoSuku Lokwahlulela. Bheka isAmbulo 20:11-15
Ngakho, uyaqonda?

kulungile! Yabelana ngakho lapha namuhla

Masikhuleke kanyekanye: Ngiyabonga Baba waseZulwini! Wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, eyazalelwa ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ihlenge labo ababengaphansi komthetho, sikhululwe emthethweni, futhi isinike ubudodana! Amen.
Ngokuba lapho kungekho-mthetho khona, akukho-kweqa umthetho, lapho kungekho-mthetho khona, asikho isono; .
UBaba waseZulwini usibiza ukuba sithandaze ngoMoya oNgcwele embusweni wakhe waphakade, othandweni lukaJesu Kristu, futhi sidumise uNkulunkulu wethu ngamaculo omoya ethempelini, Haleluya! Haleluya! Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

articles.title: Kholwa Evangelini 10
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Kholwa Evangelini》10

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

ISIFUNDO 10: Ukukholwa evangelini kusivuselela kabusha

Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama; lokho okuzelwe ngomoya kungumoya. Ungamangali lapho ngithi, “Kumelwe nizalwe ngokusha.” Johane 3:6-7

Umbuzo: Kungani kufanele sizalwe kabusha?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Uma umuntu engazalwa ngokusha, angewubone umbuso kaNkulunkulu - Johane 3:3
2 Awukwazi ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu - Johane 3:5
3 Inyama negazi akunakulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu - 1 Korinte 15:50

Ngakho, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ningamangali ngokuthi nimelwe ukuzalwa ngokusha.”

Uma umuntu engazalwa kabusha, akanawo uMoya Ongcwele Ngaphandle kwesiqondiso sikaMoya oNgcwele, angeke uliqonde iBhayibheli noma ulifunda kangaki, ngeke uliqonde iBhayibheli noma uqonde ukuthi yini iNkosi UJesu wathi. Ngokwesibonelo, abafundi ababelandela uJesu ekuqaleni abazange bakuqonde lokho uJesu ayekushilo futhi enyukela ezulwini, noMoya oNgcwele weza ngePhentekoste, bagcwaliswa ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi bamukela amandla, base beqonda. okwashiwo iNkosi uJesu. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Kungani inyama negazi kungenakulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Okubolayo (akukwazi) ifa lokungonakali.

Umbuzo: Kuyini okubolayo?

Impendulo: INkosi uJesu yathi! Okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama. Inyama yethu izalwa abazali bethu → sadalwa ngothuli luka-Adamu, inyama ka-Adamu izobola futhi ibone ukufa, ngakho akanakukwazi ukudla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu.

Umbuzo: Ingabe noJesu wayenomzimba wenyama negazi?
Impendulo: UJesu wazalwa nguBaba waseZulwini, wehla evela eJerusalema ezulwini, wakhulelwa intombi futhi wazalwa nguMoya oNgcwele, unguLizwi enyameni, ungowomoya, ungcwele, akanasono, akanakonakala, futhi akaboni ukufa! Bheka izEnzo 2:31
Inyama yethu, eyaphuma othulini luka-Adamu, ithengiswe esonweni, futhi inkokhelo yesono ingukufa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Singalidla kanjani ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Kumele azalwe kabusha!

Umbuzo: Sizalwa kanjani ngokusha?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuJesu! Kholwa ivangeli, uqonde izwi leqiniso, futhi wamukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu Siyamemeza: "Aba, Baba!" Konke okuvela kuNkulunkulu Ozelwe akoni, amen! Bheka ku-1 Johane 3:9 Lokhu kufakazela ukuthi usuzelwe kabusha Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Sizofunda futhi sabelane nabafowethu nodadewethu kabanzi mayelana "Ukuzalwa kabusha" esikhathini esizayo, ngizokwabelana ngakho lapha namuhla.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusiqondisa thina zingane ukuba sikholwe ivangeli futhi siqonde indlela yeqiniso, usivumele ukuba samukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, sibe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. , futhi uqonde ukuzalwa kabusha! Yilabo abazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya kuphela abangabona umbuso kaNkulunkulu futhi bangene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika izwi leqiniso nokusinika uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe ukuze asikhiqize kabusha! Amen

ENkosini uJesu! Amen

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

articles.title: “Kholwani Ivangeli” 9
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Kholwa IVangeli》9

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

ISIFUNDO 9: Kholwa eVangelini nasekuvukeni kanye noKristu

KwabaseRoma 6:8 Uma safa kanye noKristu, siyakukholwa futhi ukuthi siyakuphila kanye naye. Amen!

1. Kholwa ekufeni, ukumbelwa nokuvuka kanye noKristu

Umbuzo: Ungafa kanjani noKristu?

Impendulo: Ukufa noKristu “ngobhapathizo” ekufeni Kwakhe.

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. KwabaseRoma 6:3-4

Umbuzo: Ungaphila kanjani noKristu?

Impendulo: “Ukubhapathizwa” kusho ukufakaza ukufa Naye kanye nokufakaza ngokuphila noKristu! Amen

Nangcwatshwa kanye naye embhapathizweni, lapho navuswa futhi naye ngokukholwa ukusebenza kukaNkulunkulu owamvusa kwabafileyo. Nanifile eziphambekweni nasekungasokini kwenu kwenyama, kodwa uNkulunkulu uniphilise kanye noKristu, esenithethelele (noma thina) zonke iziphambeko zethu;

2. Uhlanganiswe noKristu ngokomthetho

Ngokuba uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe;

Umbuzo: Kwakunjani ukufa kukaJesu?

Impendulo: UJesu wafa esiphambanweni, futhi lesi kwakuyisimo sokufa Kwakhe!

Umbuzo: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ngendlela yokufa Kwakhe?

Impendulo: Sebenzisa indlela yokukholwa eNkosini! Uma ukholwa kuJesu nasevangelini, futhi “ubhapathizelwa” ekufeni kukaKristu, uhlanganiswa Naye esimweni sokufa, futhi umuntu wakho omdala ubethelwe kanye Naye.

Umbuzo: Kunjani ukuvuswa kukaJesu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Uvuko luwumzimba womoya

Umzimba ohlwanyelwe ubhekisela emzimbeni ka-Adamu, umuntu omdala, futhi umzimba ovuswayo ubhekisela emzimbeni kaKristu, umuntu omusha. Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Isikhombo 1 Korinte 15:44

(2) Inyama kaJesu ayinakonakala

Ekwazi lokhu kusengaphambili, wakhuluma ngokuvuka kukaKristu futhi wathi: “Umphefumulo wakhe awushiywanga eHayidese, nomzimba wakhe awubonanga ukonakala. ’—IzEnzo 2:31

(3) Ukuma kokuvuka kukaJesu

Uma nibheka izandla zami nezinyawo zami, niyakwazi ukuthi yimina ngempela. Ngithinte, ubone! Umphefumulo awunamathambo futhi awunanyama. ” Luka 24:39

Umbuzo: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufaneni Kwakhe kokuvuka?

Impendulo: Ngoba inyama kaJesu ayizange ibone ukonakala noma ukufa!

Uma sidla iSidlo seNkosi, iSidlo esiNgcwele, sidla umzimba waKhe futhi siphuze igazi leNkosi! Sinokuphila kukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu, futhi lokhu kuphila (okungahlangene ngalutho nenyama negazi lika-Adamu). Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha uyinyama negazi likaJesu . Kuze kufike uKristu futhi uKristu abonakale esesimweni Sakhe sangempela, imizimba yethu iyovela futhi ibonakale enkazimulweni kanye noKristu. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:2, Kol 3:4

3. Impilo yethu yokuvuka ifihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngokuba nafa (okungukuthi, umuntu omdala ufile), ukuphila kwenu (ukuphila kokuvuka noKristu) kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Isikhombo KwabaseKolose 3:3

Masikhuleke kuNkulunkulu kanyekanye: Siyabonga Abba Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, futhi sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokuba nathi njalo! Siholele kulo lonke iqiniso futhi siqonde ukuthi uma sikholelwa ekufeni kanye noKristu, siyokholwa futhi ekuphileni noKristu ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, sihlanganiswe naye ngokufana nokufa, sidle isidlo seNkosi; umzimba weNkosi nokuphuzwayo Igazi leNkosi liyohlanganiswa nayo ekufaneni kokuvuka kwayo! Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

articles.title: Kholwani IVangeli 8
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwani IVangeli" 8

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isifundo 8: Kholwa ukuthi ukuvuka kukaJesu kungokwabantu abalungile

(1) UJesu wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu

Umbuzo: Ingabe uJesu wavuswa ukuze silungisiswe?

Impendulo: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu (noma kwahunyushwa ngokuthi: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuselwa ukulungisiswa kwethu). Roma 4:25

(2) Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kusekelwe okholweni, ukuze ukholo

Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kuye wonke okholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

Umbuzo: Yini esekelwe okholweni futhi eholela ekukholweni?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ngokukholwa → Ukusindiswa ngokukholwa evangelini kungukuzalwa ngokusha!

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Bazalwa ngokholo lwevangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu—Johane 1:12-13
Ngakho lolo kholo → ukholo kuMoya oNgcwele luyavuselelwa futhi lukhazinyuliswe!

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Wasisindisa, kungengamisebenzi yokulunga esayenzayo thina, kodwa ngokomusa wakhe ngesigezo sokuzalwa kutsha nangokwenziwa basha kukaMoya oNgcwele. Thithu 3:5

(3)Isingeniso sikaYongyi

“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakini nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isiphambeko, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngobubi, kulethwe ukulunga okuphakade, kugcizelelwe umbono nesiprofetho, kugcotshwe oNgcwele uDaniyeli. 9:24.

Umbuzo: Kusho ukuthini ukuyeka isono?

Impendulo: Ukuyeka kusho ukuyeka, alisekho icala!

Ngokufa emthethweni osibophayo ngomzimba kaKristu, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni... Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa. Isikhombo KwabaseRoma 4:15 . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Kusho ukuthini ukususa isono?

Impendulo: Ukuhlanza kusho ukuhlanza igazi elingenasici lihlanza inhliziyo yakho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Kakhulu kangakanani igazi likaKristu owazinikela kuNkulunkulu ngoMoya ophakade engenasici, liyakuhlambulula izinhliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo na? ...Uma kungenjalo, ingabe imihlatshelo yayingeke ime kudala? Ngoba onembeza babakhulekeli sebehlanziwe futhi abasazizwa benecala. Hebheru 9:14, 10:2

Umbuzo: Kusho ukuthini ukuhlawulela izono?

Impendulo: Ukuhlengwa kusho ukufaka esikhundleni, ukuhlengwa. UNkulunkulu wenza uJesu ongenasono ukuba abe yisono ngenxa yethu, futhi ngokufa kukaJesu, sihlawulela izono zethu. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:21

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukwethulwa kweYongyi?
Impendulo: "Okwaphakade" kusho okuphakade, futhi "ukulunga" kusho ukulungisiswa!

Ukuhlawulelwa kwezono kanye nokuqeda inzalo yesono (ekuqaleni inzalo ka-Adamu); Amen Ngale ndlela, niyaqonda?

(4) Sesigeziwe, sangcweliswa, futhi salungisiswa ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Singcweliswa nini, silungisiswe, silungisiswe nini?

Impendulo: Ukungcweliswa kusho ukuba ngcwele ngaphandle kwesono;

Ukulungisiswa kusho ukuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; Njengoba nje uNkulunkulu edala umuntu ngothuli, uNkulunkulu wabiza u-Adamu ngokuthi “umuntu” ngemva kokuba “umuntu”! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Babenjalo abanye kini, kodwa senagezwa, senangcweliswa, senalungisiswa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu nangoMoya kaNkulunkulu wethu. 1 Korinte 6:11

(5) Masilungisiswe ngesihle

Ngoba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu; kodwa manje sebelungisisiwe ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngokuhlengwa okukuKristu Jesu. UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokholo lomuntu ukuze abonise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; owaziwayo ukuthi ulungile, futhi ukuze alungisise labo abakholwa kuJesu. KwabaseRoma 3:23-26

Sikhuleka ndawonye kuNkulunkulu: Siyabonga Abba Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, futhi sibonga uMoya oNgcwele ngokusiholela kulo lonke iqiniso futhi siqonde futhi sikholelwe ivangeli! Ukuvuka kukaJesu kuyasithethelela ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kusekelwe okholweni, futhi sisindiswa ngokukholwa evangelini! Kangangoba ukukholwa nokukholwa ekuvuselelweni kukaMoya oNgcwele kusilethela inkazimulo! Amen

Siyabonga Nkosi uJesu Kristu ngokusenzela umsebenzi wokuhlengwa, usenze sikwazi ukuqeda izono zethu, sisuse izono zethu, sihlawulele izono zethu, futhi sethule ukulunga okuphakade Labo abalungisiswa phakade bayothola ukuphila okuphakade. Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu siphiwa ngesihle, ukuze sigezwe, singcweliswe, futhi silungisiswe ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu. Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

“Kholwani Evangelini” 7

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isifundo 7: Ukukholelwa evangelini kusikhulula emandleni kaSathane ebumnyameni baseHayidesi

KwabaseKolose 1:13, Wasikhulula emandleni obumnyama, wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo;

(1) Phunyuka emandleni obumnyama naseHayidesi

Umbuzo: Kusho ukuthini “ubumnyama”?

Impendulo: Ubumnyama bubhekisela ebumnyameni obusebusweni bakwalasha, izwe elingenakukhanya futhi elingenakuphila. Isikhombo kuGenesise 1:2

Umbuzo: Lisho ukuthini iHayidesi?

Impendulo: IHayidesi futhi ibhekisela ebumnyameni, akukho ukukhanya, akukho ukuphila, nendawo yokufa.

Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; IsAmbulo 20:13

(2) Phunyuka emandleni kaSathane

Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi. 1 Johane 5:19

nginithuma kubo ukuze kuvuleke amehlo abo, baphenduke ebumnyameni, baye ekukhanyeni, basuke emandleni kaSathane, baye kuNkulunkulu; ’”—IzEnzo 26:18

(3)Asibona abezwe

ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Angikuceli ukuba ubakhiphe emhlabeni, kodwa ngicela ukuba ubagcine komubi (noma kuhunyushwe ngokuthi: esonweni). Abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Johane 17:14-16

Umbuzo: Kunini lapho singasekho khona emhlabeni?

Impendulo: Uyakholwa kuJesu! Kholwa yivangeli! Qonda imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli futhi wamukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu lwakho! Ngemva kokuba senizelwe kabusha, nisindisiwe, futhi nathathwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu, awuseyena owomhlaba.

Umbuzo: Ingabe amaxhegu ethu angawomhlaba?

Impendulo: Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi umzimba wesono usubhujisiwe “ngokubhapathizwa” safakwa ekufeni kukaKristu, futhi asisenabo abezwe;

Umbuzo: Uthi angiyena owalo mhlaba? Ngisaphila kulomhlaba ngokwenyama?

Impendulo: “UMoya oNgcwele enhliziyweni yakho uyakutshela”! bangabantu abasha abazelwe kabusha. Ingabe kucacile? Ireferensi kanye no-2:20

Umbuzo: Ingabe umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ungowomhlaba?

Impendulo: Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha uhlala kuKristu, kuBaba, othandweni lukaNkulunkulu, ezulwini nasezinhliziyweni zenu. Umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena owaleli zwe.

UNkulunkulu usisindise emandleni obumnyama, emandleni okufa, naseHayidesi, nasemandleni kaSathane, futhi wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, uJesu. Amen!

Sikhuleka kuNkulunkulu kanyekanye: Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa uJesu. ULizwi waba yinyama, wafela izono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu. Ngothando olukhulu lukaJesu Kristu, sazalwa kabusha kwabafileyo, ukuze silungisiswe futhi sithole isiqu samadodana kaNkulunkulu! Ngemva kokusikhulula ethonyeni likaSathane ebumnyameni beHayidesi, uNkulunkulu uye wathuthela abantu bethu abasha abazelwe kabusha wabangenisa embusweni waphakade weNdodana yaKhe ethandekayo, uJesu. Amen!

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwani IVangeli" 6

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isifundo 6: Ivangeli lisenza sikwazi ukukhumula umuntu omdala kanye nokuziphatha kwawo

[KwabaseKolose 3:3] Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Ivesi 9 Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.

(1) Lilahle ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo

Umbuzo: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi ufile?

Impendulo: “Wena” kusho ukuthi umuntu omdala ufile, wafa kanye noKristu, umzimba wesono usuchithiwe, futhi akasesona isigqila sesono, ngoba owafayo ukhululiwe esonweni. Bheka amaRoma 6:6-7

Umbuzo: “Umuntu wethu omdala, umzimba onesono” wafa nini?

Impendulo: Ngenkathi uJesu ebethelwa esiphambanweni, umuntu wakho omdala wesono wayesefile futhi engasekho.

Umbuzo: Ngangingakazalwa lapho iNkosi ibethelwa esiphambanweni! Uyabona, ingabe “umzimba wethu wesono” usaphila namuhla?

Impendulo: Ivangeli likaNkulunkulu lishunyayelwa kuwe! "Inhloso" yevangeli ikutshela ukuthi umuntu omdala ufile, umzimba wesono usuchithiwe, awusesona isigqila sesono, likutshela ukuthi kholwa ivangeli futhi usebenzise indlela yokukholelwa enkolweni yesono. Nkosi ukukholwa Ukuhlanganisa nokusebenzisa (ukholo) ekufananeni noKristu futhi uhlanganiswe naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe.

Umbuzo: Salilahla nini ikhehla?
Impendulo: Uma ukholwa kuJesu, ukholelwa evangelini, futhi uqonda iqiniso, uKristu wafela izono zethu, wangcwatshwa, futhi wavuka futhi ngosuku lwesithathu! Wavuswa kanye noKristu Lapho uzalwa kabusha, wawusukhumulile kakade umuntu omdala. Uyakholwa ukuthi lelivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu okukusindisa, futhi uzimisele “ukubhapathizwa” kuKristu futhi uhlanganiswe Naye ekufeni kwakhe okufana nokwaKhe; . ngakho,

“Ukubhapathizwa” kuyisenzo esifakaza ukuthi usukhumule ikhehla nobudala bakho. Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:3-7

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuziphatha kwekhehla?
Impendulo: Izinkanuko nezifiso ezimbi zekhehla.

Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, umona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. Galathiya 5:19-21

(2) Umuntu ozelwe kabusha akayona ingxenye yenyama yomuntu omdala

Umbuzo: Sazi kanjani ukuthi asibona abenyama yomuntu endala?

Impendulo: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kuwe, awuseyena owenyama kodwa ungowoMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. KwabaseRoma 8:9

Qaphela:

"UMoya kaNkulunkulu" unguMoya kaYise, uMoya kaJesu wacela uMoya oNgcwele othunywe uBaba ukuba uhlale ezinhliziyweni zenu → nizalwa kabusha:

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya - Johane 3:5-7
2 Bazalwa ngokholo lwevangeli - 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:12-13

Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha akaseyena owenyama endala, umzimba ofile wesono, noma umzimba obhujisiwe, umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ungokaMoya oNgcwele, ukaKristu, futhi okaNkulunkulu uYise , ukuphila okuphakade!

(3) Umuntu omusha uyakhula kancane kancane;

Umbuzo: Bakhulelaphi abasanda kuzalwa?

Impendulo: “Umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha” uhlala kuKristu Umzimba awukabonakali, futhi awukwazi ukuwubona ngeso lenyama, ngoba “umuntu omusha” ungumzimba womoya, umzimba kaKristu ovusiwe kaKristu futhi sikanye noKristu Sifihlwe kuNkulunkulu futhi sikhula kancane kancane bhekisela kwabaseKolose 3:3-4, 1 Korinte 15:44

Ngokuqondene nomzimba wesono obonakalayo womuntu omdala, ubhekana nokufa futhi umzimba wawo wangaphandle uyabhujiswa kancane kancane Umzimba womuntu omdala wawuvela ku-Adamu uthuli. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka uGenesise 3:19

Bheka amavesi amabili alandelayo:

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhidlika, inhliziyo engaphakathi (okungukuthi, uMoya kaNkulunkulu ohlala enhliziyweni) wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. 2 Korinte 4:16

Uma ulalele izwi lakhe, wamukela izimfundiso zakhe, wafunda neqiniso lakhe, kufanele ukhumule ubuntu bakho obudala ekuziphatheni kwakho kwangaphambili, okuya kubhebhetheka kancane kancane ngokukhohlisa kwenkanuko.

Efesu 4:21-22

Qaphela: Bafowethu nodadewethu! Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha useyikhumule impatho yomuntu omdala Kunzima ukuyiqonda lapha! sizokuchaza ngokuningiliziwe lapho sihlanganyela "Ukuphindukuzalwa" esikhathini esizayo Kuyoba sobala futhi kube lula ngabantu ukukuqonda.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokuhlale usikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi usivule izingqondo zethu ukuze sibone futhi sizwe izinceku ozithumayo ukuba zishumayele iqiniso likamoya futhi usenze siqonde IBhayibheli. Siyaqonda ukuthi uKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu futhi wembelwa, kangangokuthi siye sakhumula umuntu omdala kanye nokuziphatha kwawo, siye sazalwa kabusha ngokuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo, futhi uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu, futhi sizwa Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha "uphila kuKristu, kancane kancane wenziwa musha futhi akhule, futhi akhule agcwale isimo sikaKristu; futhi uhlangabezana nokukhumula umzimba wangaphandle womuntu omdala, obhidlizwa kancane kancane. Omdala umuntu wayeluthuli lapho ephuma ku-Adamu, futhi uyobuyela othulini.

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Kholwa Evangelini 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwa Evangelini" 5

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

ISIFUNDO 5: Ivangeli liyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo

Umbuzo: Kuhle yini ukukhululeka emthethweni? Noma kungcono ukugcina umthetho?

Impendulo: Ukukhululeka emthethweni.

Umbuzo: Kungani?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Wonke umuntu osebenza ngomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Uqalekisiwe wonke umuntu ongaqhubeki enza konke okulotshwe encwadini yomthetho.” KwabaseGalathiya 3:10
2 Kusobala ukuthi ngomthetho akakho olungisiswayo phambi kukaNkulunkulu;
3 Ngakho ngemisebenzi yomthetho akukho nyama eyolungisiswa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba umthetho uyicala lesono. KwabaseRoma 3:20
4 Nina enifuna ukulungisiswa ngomthetho senahlukanisiwe noKristu, niwile emseni. Galathiya 5:4
5 Ngoba umthetho awenzelwanga olungileyo, “okungabantwana bakaNkulunkulu,” kodwa owababi, nabangalaleliyo, nabangahloniphiyo, nezoni, nabangangcwele, nabangcolile, nombulali, nombulali, nezifebe. nesifebe, nesigebengu, nanoma yini enye ephambene nokulunga. 1 Thimothewu 1:9-10

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(1) Hlukana nomthetho ka-Adamu wokwephula isivumelwano

Umbuzo: Ikhululekile kumuphi umthetho?

Impendulo: Ukukhululwa esonweni esiholela ekufeni kuwumthetho ka-Adamu “wokwephula isivumelwano” uNkulunkulu ayala u-Adamu! (Kepha ungadli emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa!”) Lona umyalo womyalo.— Genesise 2:17

Umbuzo: Kungani bonke abantu bengaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho lapho “okhokho bokuqala” bephula umthetho?

Impendulo: Lokhu kufana ncamashi nesono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwafika kubo bonke abantu ngoba wonke umuntu wona. Roma 5:12

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?

Impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono → Noma ubani owonayo weqa umthetho; 1 Johane 3:4

Qaphela:

Bonke bonile, futhi ku-Adamu bonke babengaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho futhi bafa.

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba?
Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho?
Udosi lokufa yisono, futhi amandla esono umthetho.
Uma ufuna ukukhululwa ekufeni, kumelwe ukhululwe esonweni.
Uma ufuna ukukhululeka esonweni, kufanele ukhululeke emthethweni wesono.
Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 15:55-56

(2) sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho ngomzimba kaKristu

Bazalwane bami, nani nafile kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu... Kepha njengoba safa kuwo umthetho esiboshwe ngawo, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni... Bheka KwabaseRoma 7:4,6

UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

(3) Wahlenga ababengaphansi komthetho ukuze samukele ubudodana

Kodwa lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Galathiya 4:4-5

Ngakho, ivangeli likaKristu liyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. Izinzuzo zokukhululeka emthethweni:

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa; Roma 4:15
2 Lapho kungekho umthetho, isono kasibalwa. Roma 5:13
3 Ngoba ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile. KwabaseRoma 7:8
4 Lowo ongenawo umthetho futhi ongawulandeli umthetho uyabhubha. Roma 2:12
5 Noma ubani owona ngaphansi komthetho uyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho. Roma 12:12

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Sikhuleka ndawonye kuNkulunkulu: Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ethandekayo, uJesu, eyazalelwa ngaphansi komthetho, futhi yasihlenga emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho ngokufa nesiqalekiso somzimba kaKristu ulenga esihlahleni. UKristu wavuka kwabafileyo ukuze asivuselele futhi asenze sibe ngabalungileyo! Thola ukutholwa njengendodana kaNkulunkulu, ukhululwe, ukhululeke, usindiswe, uzalwe kabusha, ube nokuphila okuphakade. Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

IBandla elikuKristu iNkosi

articles.title: Kholwa Evangelini 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwa Evangelini" 4

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

ISIFUNDO 4: Ukukholwa evangelini kuyasikhulula esonweni


Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuphenduka?
Impendulo: “Ukuphenduka” kusho inhliziyo edabukileyo, edabukileyo, nedabukileyo, yazi ukuthi umuntu usesonweni, nasezinkanukweni ezimbi, nasezinkanukweni, naku-Adamu obuthakathaka, nasekufeni;

"Ushintsho" kusho ukulungiswa. AmaHubo 51:17 Umnikelo kaNkulunkulu ungumoya owaphukileyo;

Umbuzo: Ilungiswa kanjani?

Impendulo: Kholwa evangelini "Ukuphenduka" akusho ukukucela ukuba uguqule, uthuthukise, noma uguqule wena ngokwakho. Incazelo yangempela yokuthi "ukuphenduka" iwukuba ukholwe ivangeli Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwayo evangelini → liyasikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho umuntu omdala nobuntu obudala , baphunyuke kuSathane, baphunyuke ethonyeni likaSathane ebumnyameni baseHayidesi, bazalwe kabusha, basindiswe, bembathe umuntu omusha, bembathe uKristu; Nkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade!

→→Lokhu kuyiqiniso "ukuphenduka"! nenziwe basha engqondweni yenu futhi nembathe ubuntu obusha ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele - bheka kwabase-Efesu 4:23-24

Kwakungumuntu omdala, manje usengumuntu omusha;
Kanye esonweni, manje ebungcweleni;
Ekuqaleni ku-Adamu, manje kuKristu.
Ukukholelwa evangelini → ukuphenduka!
Guqula → Ngaphambili wawuyindodana ka-Adamu wenziwe ngothuli;

Manje indodana kaJesu, u-Adamu wokugcina. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Lingakholwa kanjani ivangeli?

Impendulo: Kholwa evangelini! Kholwa kuJesu nje!

Siyakholwa ukuthi uJesu Kristu, othunywe nguNkulunkulu, usenzele umsebenzi wokuhlenga (ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo). Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Sikholelwa kanjani emsebenzini wokuhlenga Sisebenza kanjani?

Impendulo: UJesu waphendula: “Lokhu kungumsebenzi kaNkulunkulu, ukuba nikholwe kuye amthumileyo.”

Umbuzo: Ungaliqonda kanjani leli vesi?
Impendulo: Kholwa kuJesu othunywe nguNkulunkulu ukuba azosenzela umsebenzi wokuhlenga!
Ngakholwa: Umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wensindiso uyasebenza kimi, futhi “umholo” womsebenzi kaJesu ubalelwa labo “abakholwayo”, futhi uNkulunkulu ungibala njengosebenzile → ngifana nomsebenzi kaNkulunkulu .Amen!

Ngakho uPawulu uthi kwabaseRoma 1:17! Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu “ngokholo→kusindiswa ngokukholwa!” futhi ngenxa yokukholwa→ukukholwa, uMoya oNgcwele usebenza “ukuhamba noNkulunkulu” ukwenza umsebenzi wokuvuselela, ukuze uthole inkazimulo, imivuzo, nemiqhele. Yilokhu uNkulunkulu akushoyo kwabakholwayo Ingabe niyayiqonda imfihlakalo yomsebenzi osenyameni?

Umbuzo: Sibalwa kanjani (ukholo) njengabasebenza ndawonye futhi sihamba noNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuJesu Kristu othunywe nguNkulunkulu ukuba enze umsebenzi wokuhlenga uKristu wafela izono zethu futhi wasikhulula ezonweni zethu.

(1) INkosi yabeka izono zabo bonke abantu kuJesu

Sonke sidukile njengezimvu, yilowo nalowo uphendukele endleleni yakhe; Isaya 53:6

(2) UKristu wafela “bonke” abantu

Ngokuba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela;

(3) Abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni

Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono; KwabaseRoma 6:6-7

[Qaphela:] UJehova uNkulunkulu wabeka izono zabo bonke abantu kuJesu, futhi uJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni ngenxa yabo bonke, ukuze bonke bafe - 2 Korinte 5:14 → Abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni - Roma 6:7; ” bafa, futhi bonke bakhululwa esonweni. Amen! Ulibonile futhi ulizwile. Leli yivangeli elithunyelwe izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ukuba zikutshela ukuthi ukhululiwe “lelivangeli”, “umholo” womsebenzi kaJesu uzokubalelwa kuwe yinsindiso kaNkulunkulu Amandla asebenza kulabo “abakholwayo” Lena imfihlakalo yensindiso kaNkulunkulu. Uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke lelivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwa ukuthi uJesu wasifela esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, ukuze sikhululwe esonweni. Uyawuqonda umfuziselo wale "mfundiso" Uma ungakholwa ukuthi lelivangeli likukhululile esonweni, uzolahlwa isono sakho futhi uzokwahlulelwa ekupheleni kosuku yona?

Masikhuleke kuNkulunkulu kanyekanye: Abba othandekayo, Baba waseZulwini! Wabeka izono zabantu bonke phezu kukaJesu Kristu owafela izono zethu, ukuze sonke sikhululwe ezonweni zethu. Amen! Babusisiwe labo abalibonayo, abalizwayo, futhi abalikholwa leli vangeli “Inkokhelo” yomsebenzi kaJesu wokuhlenga ibuyiselwa enyameni yalabo abakholwayo Lokhu kuwukusebenzelana noNkulunkulu nokwenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu.

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Kholwa Evangelini 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwa Evangelini" 3

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isifundo 3: Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu

KwabaseRoma 1:16-17 (uPawulu wathi) Anginamahloni ngevangeli; Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.”

1. Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Liyini ivangeli?

Impendulo: (Wathi uPawuli) Engikudlulisele kini futhi yilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo. 15:3-4

Umbuzo: Ayini amandla evangeli?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuvuswa kwabafileyo

Mayelana neNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu, owazalwa enzalweni kaDavide ngokwenyama, futhi wabonakaliswa ukuthi iyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ngamandla ngomoya wobungcwele ngokuvuka kwabafileyo. KwabaseRoma 1:3-4

(2) Kholwa ovukweni lukaJesu kwabafileyo

Kamuva, abafundi abayishumi nanye behlezi etafuleni, uJesu wabonakala kubo futhi wabakhuza ngokungakholwa kwabo nobulukhuni benhliziyo, ngoba abazange bakholwe yilabo abambona ngemva kokuvuka kwakhe. Wayesethi kubo: “Hambani niye ezweni lonke, nishumayele ivangeli kukho konke okudaliweyo
UTomase wazibuza ngokuvuka kukaJesu:

Ngemva kwezinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili, abafundi babesendlini futhi, noTomase enabo, neminyango yavalwa. UJesu weza wema phakathi kwabo, wathi: “Ukuthula makube kinina.” Wayesethi kuTomasi: “Yelula umunwe wakho, uthinte izandla zami, usifake ohlangothini lwami; kodwa kholwa!” UTomase wathi kuye: “Nkosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami!” UJesu wathi kuye: “Babusisiwe abangabonanga nabakholwayo.” 20:26-29

2. Kholwa kulelivangeli futhi uzosindiswa

(1) Kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe futhi usindiswe

Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa; Lezi zibonakaliso ziyakubalandela abakholwayo: Ngegama lami bayakukhuluma ngezilimi ezintsha; , futhi bayolulama. ” Marku 16:16-18

(2) Kholwa kuJesu futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade

(3) Noma ubani ophila futhi akholwe kuJesu akasoze afe

UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila. Lowo okholwa yimi uyakuphila, noma efa; futhi lowo ophilayo ekholwa yimi kasoze afa naphakade. Uyakukholwa lokhu na?

(Ingabe uyakuqonda okwashiwo iNkosi uJesu? Uma ungaqondi, lalela ngokucophelela)

Ngakho uPawulu wathi! Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kuye wonke okholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.”

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Siyabonga Nkosi Jesu ngokufela izono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wavuka futhi ngosuku lwesithathu! UJesu wavuswa kuqala kwabafileyo njengolibo, ukuze sikwazi ukubona futhi sizwe ivangeli “lokuvuka kwabafileyo” Leli vangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwa kulo kaJesu, iNkosi uJesu futhi izosenza sihlanganyele naye Uvuko, ukuzalwa kabusha, insindiso, ukuphila okuphakade! Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukuqoqa

umuzi enkosini uJesu Krestu

articles.title: Kholwani IVangeli 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwani IVangeli" 2

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ubudlelwano futhi sabelane "Ukukholelwa Evangelini"

Isifundo 2: Liyini iVangeli?

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Umbuzo: Liyini ivangeli lombuso?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1. UJesu washumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu

(1) UJesu wagcwaliswa ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi washumayela ivangeli

“UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu; umusa kaNkulunkulu ngeJubili leNirvana” Luka 4:18-19.

Umbuzo: Ungaliqonda kanjani leli vesi?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

UJesu wabhapathizwa emfuleni iJordani, egcwele uMoya oNgcwele, futhi ngemva kokuholela ehlane ukuba alingwe, waqala ukushumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu!

“UMoya weNkosi (okungukuthi, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya oNgcwele)
Kimi (okungukuthi uJesu),
Ngoba Yena (okungukuthi, uBaba waseZulwini) ungigcobile,
Ngicele ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu (okusho ukuthi banqunu futhi abanalutho, abanakho ukuphila nokuphila okuphakade bheka iSambulo 3:17).

Ngithunyelwe ukubika:

Umbuzo: Yiziphi izindaba ezinhle uJesu azibika?

Impendulo: Abathunjiwe bazokhululwa

1 Abathunjwe nguSathane,
2 Labo ababotshwe amandla obumnyama leHayidesi,

3 Lokho ukufa okukuthathileyo kuzakhululwa.

Izimpumputhe zithola ukubona: okungukuthi, akekho eTestamenteni Elidala owabona uNkulunkulu, kodwa eTestamenteni Elisha, manje sebembonile uJesu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, wabona ukukhanya, futhi wakholwa kuJesu ukuze abe nokuphila okuphakade.

Abacindezelwe mabakhululwe: labo abacindezelwe yizigqila “zesono”, abaqalekisiwe nababoshwe umthetho, bakhululwe, bamemezele iJubili lomusa kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) UJesu wabikezela ukubethelwa nokuvuka izikhathi ezintathu

Esenyukela eJerusalema, wabizela eceleni abafundi abayishumi nambili endleleni, wathi kubo: “Bhekani, njengoba sikhuphukela eJerusalema, iNdodana yomuntu izonikelwa kubapristi abakhulu nababhali bamnikele kwabezizwe, bamklolode, bambethele esiphambanweni, abuye avuke ngosuku lwesithathu

(3) UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wathuma abafundi bakhe ukuba bayoshumayela ivangeli

UJesu wathi kubo: “Yilokhu engakusho kini ngisenani, ukuthi kumelwe kugcwaliseke konke okulotshwe ngami emthethweni kaMose, nakubaprofethi nasemaHutsheni bangakwazi ukuqonda imiBhalo, futhi bathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi uKristu kufanele ahlupheke futhi avuke kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, futhi ukuphenduka nokuthethelelwa kwezono kufanele kushunyayelwe egameni lakhe, kusukela eJerusalema izizwe zonke. Luka 24:44-47

Umbuzo: UJesu wabathuma kanjani abafundi bakhe ukuba bayoshumayela ivangeli?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi (cishe 28:19-20)

1 Ukukhulula abantu (abakholelwa evangelini) esonweni - KwabaseRoma 6:7
2 Ukukhululeka emthethweni nasekuqalekisweni kwawo - Roma 7:6, Gal 3:13
3 Khumulani umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - Kolose 3:9, Efesu 4:20-24
4 Ukukhululwa emandleni obumnyama naseHayidesi—Kolose 1:13
5 Ukukhululwa emandleni kaSathane— IzEnzo 26:18
6 Ukuzicabangela—Galathiya 2:20
7 UJesu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasenza kabusha— 1 Petru 1:3
8 Kholwa evangelini futhi wamukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu - Efesu 1:13
9 Ukuze samukele ukuma kwethu njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu — Gal 4:4-7
10 Bhaphathizwa kuKristu futhi uhlanganyele ukufa, ukungcwatshwa nokuvuka kwakhe - Roma 6: 3-8
11 Gqokani ubuntu obusha futhi nembathe uKristu - Gal 3:27
12 Sindiswa. Thola ukuphila okuphakade.
Isikhombo kuJohane 3:16, 1 Korinte 15:51-54, 1 Petru 1:4-5
Ngakho, uyaqonda?

2. USimoni Petru ushumayela ivangeli

Umbuzo: UPetru walishumayela kanjani ivangeli?

Impendulo: USimoni Petru wathi

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usinike ukuzalwa kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo ukuze sibe nefa elingenakonakala, elingenabala nelingabuni, eligcinelwe nina ezulwini. Nina enigcinwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa nizakwamukela insindiso elungiselelwe ukwambulwa ngesikhathi sokugcina.
…Nizelwe ngokusha, kungengambewu eyonakeleyo, kodwa ngengenakonakala, ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelimiyo. …Izwi leNkosi kuphela elihlala phakade. “Leli yivangeli elishunyayelwe kinina. 1 Petru 1:3-5,23,25

3. UJohane ushumayela ivangeli

Umbuzo: UJohane walishumayela kanjani ivangeli?
Impendulo: Wathi uJohane!
Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. …ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. … Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise, embonakalisile. Johane 1:1-2, 14, 18
Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kwambuliwe, sikubonile, namanje siyafakaza ukuthi sishumayela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba nokwambulwa kithi.) 1 Johane 1:1-2
“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade

4. UPawuli ushumayela ivangeli

Umbuzo: UPawulu walishumayela kanjani ivangeli?
Impendulo: UPawulu washumayela ivangeli kwabezizwe
Manje ngiyanitshela, bazalwane, ivangeli engalishumayeza nina, enalamukela futhi enimi kulo;
Engakunikeza futhi kini kwakuyilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo.

1 Korinte 15:1-4

Okulandelayo, sizogxila ekuthatheni ivangeli elashunyayelwa umphostoli uPawulu kithina abezizwe njengesibonelo, ngoba ivangeli uPawulu alishumayela linemininingwane eminingi futhi lijulile, livumela abantu ukuba baqonde iBhayibheli.

Namuhla siyakhuleka ndawonye: Siyabonga Nkosi Jesu ngokufela izono zethu, ukungcwatshwa, nokuvuka futhi ngosuku lwesithathu! Amen. Nkosi Jesu! Ukuvuka kwakho kwabafileyo kwembule ivangeli. Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu Khumbulani ukukuqoqa.

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Kholwa Evangelini 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Kholwa Evangelini" 1

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sihlola inhlanganyelo futhi sabelane "Ukukholwa Evangelini"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 1:15, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

Isandulelo:
Ngokwazi uNkulunkulu weqiniso, sazi uJesu Kristu!

→→Kholwa kuJesu!

Isifundo 1: UJesu UyiSiqalo Sevangeli

Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Marku 1:1

Umbuzo: Kholwa evangelini.
Impendulo: Ukukholelwa evangelini →→ (ukukholelwa) kuJesu! Igama likaJesu ivangeli Igama elithi "uJesu" lisho ukuthi: ngoba uzosindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo

Umbuzo: Kungani uJesu eyisiqalo sevangeli?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1. UJesu unguNkulunkulu ongunaphakade

1UNkulunkulu okhona nokhona

UNkulunkulu wathi kuMose, “Nginguye enginguye” Eksodusi 3:14
Umbuzo: UJesu waba khona nini?
Impendulo: IzAga 8:22-26
“Ekuqaleni kokudalwa kweNkosi,
Ekuqaleni, kungakadalwa zonke izinto, ngangikhona mina (okungukuthi, kwakukhona uJesu).
Kusukela phakade, kusukela ekuqaleni,
Umhlaba ungakabikho, ngamiswa.
Awukho kwalasha, nomthombo wamanzi amakhulu, engazalelwa kuwo.
zingakabekwa izintaba, namagquma engakaveli, mina ngazalwa.

UJehova engakadali umhlaba namasimu awo nomhlabathi wezwe, ngabazala. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

2 UJesu ungu-Alfa no-Omega

“Mina ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, uMninimandla onke, owayekhona nowayekhona nozayo,” kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu

3 UJesu ungowokuqala nowokugcina

Mina ngingu-Alfa no-Omega; ” IsAmbulo 22:13

2. Umsebenzi KaJesu Wokudala

Umbuzo: Ubani owadala umhlaba?

Impendulo: UJesu wadala umhlaba.

1 UJesu wadala imihlaba

UNkulunkulu, owakhuluma endulo kokhokho bethu ngabaprofethi izikhathi eziningi nangezindlela eziningi, usekhulumile kithi kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ngeNdodana ayimise ibe yindlalifa yakho konke, adala ngayo umhlaba wonke. Hebheru 1:1-2

2 Zonke izinto zadalwa uJesu

Ekuqaleni uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba - Genesise 1:1

Ngaye (uJesu) zonke izinto zenziwa; Cishe ngo-1:3

3 UNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe nangokufana naye

UNkulunkulu wathi: “Masenze umuntu ngomfanekiso wethu (ebhekisela kuYise, iNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele), afane nathi, babuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezinkomo. emhlabeni, naphezu kwawo wonke umhlaba.

Ngakho uNkulunkulu wabadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu wabadala owesilisa nowesifazane; Genesise 1:26-27

【Qaphela:】

“U-Adamu” wangaphambili wadalwa ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu uqobo Lwakhe (uJesu) “wayeyisithunzi” somfanekiso kaNkulunkulu kanye nesimo sakhe umzimba! —Bheka kwabaseKolose 2:17, Heberu 10:1; Roma 10:4.

Lapho “isithunzi” sembulwa, kuba → u-Adamu wokugcina uJesu! U-Adamu odlule 'wayeyisithunzi' → u-Adamu wokugcina, uJesu → ungu-Adamu wangempela, ngakho u-Adamu uyindodana kaNkulunkulu! Bheka uLuka 3:38 . Ku-Adamu bonke bafa ngenxa “yesono” kuKristu bonke bayovuswa ngenxa “yokuzalwa kabusha”! Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:22. Ngakho, ngiyazibuza ukuthi uyakuqonda yini?

Labo abakhanyiselwe uMoya oNgcwele bazoqonda lapho bebona futhi bezwa, kodwa abanye abantu ngeke baqonde ngisho noma izindebe zabo zomile. Labo abangaqondi bangalalela kancane kancane futhi bathandaze kuNkulunkulu kakhulu Lowo ofunayo uyokuthola, futhi uJehova uyomvulela umnyango ongqongqozayo! Kodwa akumele uphikise indlela kaNkulunkulu yeqiniso lapho abantu bephikisana nendlela yeqiniso futhi bengalwamukeli uthando lweqiniso, uNkulunkulu uyobanika inhliziyo engalungile futhi abenze bakholwe emangeni Ingabe uyakholelwa ukuthi awusoze waliqonda ivangeli noma ukuzalwa kabusha uze ufe? Bheka ku-2:10-12.
(Ngokwesibonelo, eyoku-1 Johane 3:9, 5:18) Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu “ngeke one futhi ngeke one,” abantu abaningi bathi “ozelwe nguNkulunkulu” uyoqhubeka ona. Kuyini isizathu? Uyakuqonda ukuzalwa kabusha, ungengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu?
NjengoJuda, owalandela uJesu iminyaka emithathu futhi wamkhaphela, nabaFarisi ababephikisana neqiniso, abazange baqonde ukuthi uJesu wayeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uKristu, kanye noMsindisi kwaze kwaba sekufeni kwabo.

Isibonelo, "umuthi wokuphila" ungumfanekiso weqiniso wento yokuqala Kukhona "isithunzi" somuthi ngaphansi komuthi wokuphila wembulwa "umthunzi" ka-Adamu odlule Jesu! UJesu ungumfanekiso weqiniso wento yokuqala. (Umuntu wethu omdala) uzalwa ngenyama ka-Adamu futhi futhi “uyisithunzi” sethu esizelwe kabusha (umuntu omusha) uzalwa ngevangeli likaJesu futhi ungumzimba kaKristu, mina wangempela, kanye nabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Amen! Isikhombo 1 Korinte 15:45

3. Umsebenzi kaJesu wokuhlenga

1 Isintu sawa ensimini yase-Edene

Wathi ku-Adamu: “Ngokuba ulalele umkakho, wadla kuwo umuthi engakuyala ngawo ukuba ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlabathi ngenxa yakho;
Kufanele usebenze impilo yakho yonke ukuze uthole ukudla emhlabathini.

Umhlaba uyakukuvezela ameva namakhakhasi, wena udle imifino yasendle. Ngesithukuthuku sobuso bakho uyakudla isinkwa sakho, uze ubuyele emhlabathini owazalwa kuwo. Uluthuli, futhi uyobuyela othulini. ” Genesise 3:17-19

2 Ngokushesha nje lapho isono singena ezweni kusukela ku-Adamu, ukufa kwehlela kuwo wonke umuntu

Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile. Roma 5:12

3. UNkulunkulu wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, futhi uyoba nokuphila okuphakade.

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade .Usindisiwe

4. UJesu uluthando lokuqala

1 uthando lokuqala

Nokho, kunento eyodwa okufanele ngikusole ngayo: ushiye uthando lwakho lokuqala. IsAmbulo 2:4

Umbuzo: Luyini uthando lokuqala?
Impendulo: “UNkulunkulu” uluthando (NgokukaJohane 4:16) uJesu ungumuntu kanye noNkulunkulu! Ngakho, uthando lokuqala nguJesu!

Ekuqaleni, wawunethemba lensindiso “ngokukholwa” kuJesu kamuva, kwadingeka uthembele ekuziphatheni kwakho “ukukholwa”, uzoshiya uJesu, futhi uzoshiya okwakho kokuqala uthando. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

2 Umyalo wokuqala

Umbuzo: Lalithini i-oda lokuqala?

Impendulo: Kufanele sithandane. Lona ngumyalo enawuzwa kwasekuqaleni. 1 Johane 3:11

3 Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena.

“Mfundisi, yimuphi umyalo omkhulu emthethweni na?” UJesu wathi kuye: “Woyithanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho . Owesibili ofana nawo: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena, kusekelwe umthetho wonke nabaprofethi.

Ngakho-ke, "ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, nguJesu! Amen, niyaqonda na?

Okulandelayo, sizoqhubeka nokwabelana ngombhalo wevangeli: "Kholwani Evangelini" UJesu uyisiqalo sevangeli, isiqalo sothando, nesiqalo sakho konke! Jesu! Leli gama "ivangeli" → ukusindisa abantu bakho ezonweni zabo! Amen

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Siyabonga Abba Baba osezulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusikhanyisela nokusiholela ekwazini ukuthi uJesu Kristu uyisiqalo sevangeli, isiqalo sothando, isiqalo sakho konke. ! Amen.

Egameni leNkosi uJesu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: “Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 8
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 8

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, futhi ukwabelana "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, noJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

ISIFUNDO 8: UJesu unguAlfa no-Omega

(1) INkosi ingu-Alfa no-Omega

INkosi uNkulunkulu ithi: “Mina ngingu-Alfa no-Omega (u-Alfa, u-Omega: uhlamvu lokuqala nelokugcina lwezinhlamvu zesiGreki), uMninimandla onke, owayekhona, nokhona, nozayo.” IsAmbulo 1:7-8

Umbuzo: Usho ukuthini u-Alfa no-Omega?

Impendulo: U-Alfa no-Omega → yizinhlamvu zesiGreki "zokuqala nezokugcina", okusho ukuthi owokuqala nowokugcina.

Umbuzo: Ithini incazelo yesikhathi esedlule, samanje nesaphakade?

Impendulo: "Ukhona enkathini edlule" kusho uSomandla kwaphakade, isiqalo, isiqalo, isiqalo, ngaphambi kokuba umhlaba ube khona → INkosi uNkulunkulu uJesu wayekhona, ukhona namuhla, futhi uyoba phakade! Amen.

Incwadi yezAga ithi:

“Ekuqaleni kokudalwa kweNkosi,
Ekuqaleni, kungakadalwa zonke izinto, ngangikhona mina (okungukuthi, kwakukhona uJesu).
Kusukela phakade, kusukela ekuqaleni,
Umhlaba ungakabikho, ngamiswa.
Awukho kwalasha, akukho mthombo wamanzi amakhulu, mina (ebhekise kuJesu) ngizelwe.
zingakabekwa izintaba, namagquma engakaveli, mina ngazalwa.
UJehova engakadali umhlaba namasimu awo nomhlabathi wezwe, ngabazala.
(UBaba waseZulwini) Uwamisile amazulu, futhi mina (ebhekisela kuJesu) ngilapho;
Wadweba isiyingi ebusweni bomgodi wakwalasha. Ngaphezulu wenza isibhakabhaka siqine, ngaphansi wenza imithombo izinze, ubeka imingcele yolwandle, uvimba amanzi ukuba angaweli umyalo wakhe, futhi umisa isisekelo somhlaba.
Ngaleso sikhathi mina (uJesu) nganginaye (uBaba) ngiyingcweti yezandla (unjiniyela),
Uthokoza Ngaye nsuku zonke, ehlala ethokoza ebukhoneni Bakhe, ejabulela indawo ayilungiselele umuntu (ebhekisela esintwini) ukuba ahlale kuyo, futhi (uJesu) ujabulela ukuphila phakathi kwabantu.

Manje, madodana ami, ngizweni, ngokuba ubusisiwe ogcina izindlela zami. IzAga 8:22-32

(2) UJesu ungowokuqala nowokugcina

Lapho ngimbona, ngawa ngasezinyaweni zakhe njengokungathi ngifile. Wabeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwami, wathi: “Ungesabi, mina ngingowokuqala nowokugcina;

ophilayo bengifile, futhi bheka, ngiphila kuze kube phakade naphakade; IsAmbulo 1:17-18

Umbuzo: Lisho ukuthini elokuqala nelokugcina?

Impendulo: "Okokuqala" kusho kusukela phakade, kusukela ekuqaleni, ekuqaleni, ekuqaleni, ngaphambi kokuba umhlaba ube khona → UJesu wayesevele ekhona, wamiswa, futhi wazalwa! “Ukuphela” kubhekisela ekupheleni kwezwe, lapho uJesu enguNkulunkulu waphakade.

Umbuzo: UJesu wafela bani?

Impendulo: UJesu wafa “kanye” ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu. 1 Korinte 15:3-4

Umbuzo: UJesu wafela izono zethu futhi wangcwatshwa yini?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Sikhulule esonweni

Ukuze singabe sisaba izigqila zesono - Roma 6:6-7

2 Ukukhululeka emthethweni nasekuqalekisweni kwawo - Roma 7:6, Gal 3:13
3 Khumulani umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - Kolose 3:9
4 nilahle izinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama - Gal 5:24
5 Ngokuphuma kimi, angiseyimi ophilayo - Gal 2:20
6 Ezweni - Johane 17:14-16

7 Wakhululwa kuSathane - IzEnzo 26:18

Umbuzo: UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu.
Impendulo: Sithethelele! Roma 4:25 . Masivuswe, sizalwe kabusha, sisindiswe, samukelwe njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade kanye noKristu! Amen

(UJesu) Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama (okubhekisela ekufeni naseHayidesi) futhi wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo;

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngangifile, futhi manje sengingophilayo phakade naphakade, futhi nginezihluthulelo zokufa nezeHayidesi. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu?”

(3) UJesu uyisiqalo nesiphetho

Ingelosi yathi kimi: “Lawo mazwi ayiqiniso, athembekile. INkosi uNkulunkulu wemimoya yabaprofethi ithumile ingelosi yayo ukukhombisa izinceku zayo okumelwe zenzeke masinyane sheshani nize kini." Wozani! "

IsAmbulo 22:6-7, 13

Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini, iNkosi uJesu Kristu, noMoya oNgcwele ngokuba njalo nathi bantwana, ehlale ekhanyisela amehlo ezinhliziyo zethu, futhi esihola thina bantwana (izinkulumo ezingu-8 sezizonke) Ukuhlolwa, ukuhlanganyela nokwabelana: Yazi uJesu Kristu oye wamthanda. uthumile!

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Siholele kulo lonke iqiniso futhi sazi iNkosi uJesu: UnguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uMsindisi, uMesiya, noNkulunkulu osinika ukuphila okuphakade! Amen.

Ithi iNkosi uNkulunkulu: "Mina ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, ngingowokuqala nowokugcina, ngiyisiqalo nesiphetho. NginguSomandla, owayekhona, nowayekhona, nozayo. Amen!

Nkosi Jesu, ngicela uze ngokushesha! Amen

Ngiyakucela egameni leNkosi uJesu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.
