articles.title: “Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 7

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, nokwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

ISIFUNDO 7: UJesu Uyisinkwa Sokuphila

Ngokuba isinkwa sikaNkulunkulu yilowo owehla ezulwini, onika izwe ukuphila. Bathi: "Nkosi, siphe njalo lokhu kudla." ” UJesu wathi, “Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila.” Oza kimi kasoze alamba; Johane 6:33-35

Umbuzo: UJesu Uyisinkwa Sokuphila! Ngakho ingabe “imana” liyisinkwa sokuphila na?
Impendulo: “Imana” uNkulunkulu aliwisa ehlane eTestamenteni Elidala liwumfanekiso wesinkwa sokuphila nomfanekiso kaKristu, kodwa “imana” “iyisithunzi” → “isithunzi” sibonakala singuJesu Kristu, futhi UJesu uyimana yangempela, ungukudla kweqiniso kokuphila! Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Ngokwesibonelo, eTestamenteni Elidala, “imbiza yegolide yemana, nenduku ka-Aroni ehlumayo, nezibhebhe ezimbili zomthetho” ezazigcinwe emphongolweni wesivumelwano konke kwakufanekisela uKristu. Funda KumaHebheru 9:4
“Imana” liyisithunzi nomfanekiso, hhayi isinkwa sangempela sokuphila Ama-Israyeli afa ngemva kokudla “imana” ehlane.

Ngakho-ke iNkosi uJesu yathi: "Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Okholwayo unokuphila okuphakade. Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila. Oyihlo badla imana ehlane, bafa. Lesi yisinkwa esehla ezulwini. Uma Niyakudla, aniyikufa, niyakuqonda lokhu?

(1)Isinkwa sokuphila singumzimba kaJesu

Umbuzo: Siyini isinkwa sokuphila?
Impendulo: Umzimba kaJesu uyisinkwa sokuphila, futhi igazi likaJesu liwukuphila kwethu! Amen

Mina ngiyisinkwa esiphilayo esehle ezulwini; uma umuntu esidla lesi sinkwa, uyakuphila phakade. Isinkwa engizasinika sona siyinyama yami engizayinikela impilo yomhlaba. Ngakho abaJuda baphikisana bodwa, besithi: Lo angasinika njani inyama yakhe ukuthi siyidle? ” Johane 6:51-52

(2) Ukudla inyama yeNkosi nokuphuza igazi leNkosi kuyoholela ekuphileni okuphakade

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila kini. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami unokuphila okuphakade ekugcineni. Mina ngiyomvusa, inyama yami iwukudla, negazi lami liwukuphuza

(3) Abantu abadla isinkwa sokuphila bayophila phakade

Umbuzo: Uma umuntu edla isinkwa sokuphila, ngeke afe!
Amakholwa adla isidlo seNkosi ebandleni futhi adle isinkwa seNkosi sokuphila Kungani imizimba yabo ifile?

Impendulo: Uma umuntu edla inyama yeNkosi futhi ephuza igazi leNkosi, uyoba nokuphila kukaKristu → Lokhu kuphila (1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngezwi leqiniso levangeli, 3) ozelwe nguNkulunkulu), lempilo “yomuntu omusha” ezelwe nguNkulunkulu Ungaze ukubone ukufa! Amen. Qaphela: Sizochaza ngokuningiliziwe lapho sabelana ngokuthi "Ukuzalwa kabusha" esikhathini esizayo!

(Ngokwesibonelo) UJesu wathi kuMarta: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila. ” Johane 11:25-26

Inyama, eyaphuma “othulini” lukakhokho wethu u-Adamu futhi “yazalwa ngabazali bethu, yathengiswa esonweni esibhubhayo nesibona ukufa. Bonke abantu bafa kanye

Yilabo kuphela abavuswe nguNkulunkulu, abavuswe kanye noKristu, abadla inyama yeNkosi futhi baphuze igazi leNkosi, abanokuphila kukaKristu ukuphila okuphakade futhi ngeke akubone ukufa! UNkulunkulu uyosivusa futhi ngosuku lokugcina, okungukuthi, ukuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Amen! “Umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi ohlala kuKristu, ofihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, futhi ohlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, uyovela ngokwenyama esikhathini esizayo futhi abonakale noKristu enkazimulweni. Amen!

Ngakho, uyaqonda? Kolose 3:4

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Abba Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokuholela bonke abantwana bakho kuwo wonke amaqiniso futhi bakwazi ukubona amaqiniso kamoya, ngoba amazwi akho angumoya nokuphila! Nkosi Jesu! Nina niyisinkwa seqiniso sokuphila kwethu. Uma abantu bedla lokhu kudla kweqiniso, bayophila phakade labo abadla inyama yeNkosi futhi baphuze igazi leNkosi bayothola ukuphila kukaKristu. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika lokhu kudla kweqiniso kwempilo ukuze sibe nokuphila kukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu. Lo “muntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu unokuphila okuphakade futhi akasoze akubona ukufa! Amen. Ukuphela kwezwe kuyoba ukubuya kukaKristu, futhi ukuphila komuntu omusha nomzimba wethu kuyovela, kubonakala kanye noKristu enkazimulweni. Amen!

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

“Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 6

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3 futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, nokwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

ISIFUNDO 6: UJesu uyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila

UTomasi wathi kuye: “Nkosi, asazi lapho uya khona; pho, singayazi kanjani indlela na?” Wathi kuye: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; Baba ngaphandle kwami

Umbuzo: INkosi iyindlela! Hlobo luni lomgwaqo lo?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1. Indlela yesiphambano

"Umnyango" Umnyango Uma sifuna ukuthola lomgwaqo, kufanele sazi kuqala ukuthi ngubani "osivulela umnyango" ukuze sibone lendlela yokuphila okuphakade.

(1) UJesu uyisango! sivulele umnyango

(Yathi iNkosi) Mina ngiyisango; Johane 10:9

(2) Ake sibone indlela eya ekuphileni okuphakade

Noma ubani ofuna ukuzuza ukuphila okuphakade kufanele adlule endleleni yesiphambano sikaJesu!
(UJesu) wayesebizela ndawonye isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele.

Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho, kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangevangeli uyakukusindisa. Marku 8:34-35

(3) Sindiswa futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade

Umbuzo: Ngingayisindisa kanjani impilo yami?

Impendulo: "Ithi iNkosi" Lahla impilo yakho kuqala.

Umbuzo: Ungalahlekelwa kanjani ukuphila kwakho?
Impendulo: Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu, "kholwa" evangelini leNkosi uJesu, ubhapathizwe kuKristu, ubethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, uchithe umzimba wakho wesono, futhi ulahlekelwe ukuphila kwakho "umuntu omdala" ku-Adamu; futhi Uma uKristu wafa, wangcwatshwa, wavuswa, wazalwa kabusha, futhi wasinda, uyoba nokuphila “okusha” okwavuswa ku-Adamu wokugcina [uJesu] lokhu ukuphila okuyosindiswa! Bheka amaRoma 6:6-8

Ngakho-ke, uJesu wathi: "Indlela yami" → le ndlela yindlela yesiphambano. Uma abantu emhlabeni bengakholelwa kuJesu, ngeke baqonde ukuthi lena indlela eya ekuphileni okuphakade, indlela kamoya, nendlela yokusindisa izimpilo zabo. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

2. UJesu uyiqiniso

Umbuzo: Liyini iqiniso?

Impendulo: "Iqiniso" lingunaphakade.

(1) UNkulunkulu uyiqiniso

NgokukaJohane 1:1 Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu.
Johane 17:17 Bangcwelise ngeqiniso;

Igama elithi “Tao” lithi → UNkulunkulu, elithi “Tao” lakho liyiqiniso, ngakho-ke, uNkulunkulu uyiqiniso! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) UJesu uyiqiniso

Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, futhi uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, futhi uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu, futhi iZwi likaNkulunkulu liyiqiniso → futhi amazwi Awakhulumayo angumoya, ukuphila, neqiniso! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(3) UMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso

Lo nguJesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi nangegazi, kungengamanzi odwa kodwa ngamanzi negazi, efakaza ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngokuba uMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso. 1 Johane 5:6-7

3. UJesu ungukuphila

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuphila?
Impendulo: UJesu ungukuphila!
Ku (uJesu) kukhona ukuphila, futhi lokhu kuphila kuwukukhanya kwabantu. Johane 1:4
Lobu bufakazi buwukuthi uNkulunkulu usinike ukuphila okuphakade; futhi lokhu kuphila okuphakade kuseNdodaneni Yakhe (uJesu). Uma umuntu eneNdodana kaNkulunkulu (uJesu), unokuphila uma engenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, akanako ukuphila. Ngakho, uyaqonda? 1 Johane 5:11-12

Umbuzo: Ingabe ukuphila kwethu okungokwenyama kuka-Adamu kunokuphila okuphakade?

Impendulo: Ukuphila kuka-Adamu akunakho ukuphila okuphakade ngoba u-Adamu wona futhi wathengiswa esonweni, futhi inkokhelo “yesono” ingukufa ku-Adamu Labo abaphuma emzimbeni wesono, inyama iwuthuli futhi iyobuyela othulini, ngakho ayikwazi ifa lokuphila okuphakade, futhi okonakalayo akunakudla ifa lokungonakali. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Bheka amaRoma 7:14 noGenesise 3:19

Umbuzo: Singakuthola kanjani ukuphila okuphakade?

Impendulo: Kholwa kuJesu, kholwa evangelini, uqonde indlela yeqiniso, futhi wamukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu! Zalwa ngokusha, wamukele ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, wembathe umuntu omusha wembathe uKristu, usindiswe, ube nokuphila okuphakade! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Sabelana ngakho lapha namuhla! Imithandazo yendoda elungileyo inamandla futhi iyasebenza, ukuze bonke abantwana bafakaze ngomusa kaNkulunkulu.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Abba Baba waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokuhlale ekhanyisela amehlo ezinhliziyo zethu ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde iBhayibheli, ukuze bonke abantwana bazi ukuthi uJesu INkosi uJesu isivulela umnyango. Masibone ukuthi lendlela yesiphambano iyindlela yokuphila okuphakade. Nkulunkulu! Usivulele indlela entsha nephilayo ukuba sidlule evelini leli lingumzimba wakhe (uJesu), lisivumela ukuba singene eNgcwelengcwele ngokuzethemba, okuwukungena embusweni wezulu nokuphila okuphakade! Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.content:
“Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 5

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, futhi ukwabelana "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, nokwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

ISIFUNDO 5: UJesu unguKristu, uMsindisi kanye noMesiya

(1) UJesu unguKristu

Umbuzo: Usho ukuthini uKristu, uMsindisi, uMesiya?

Impendulo: "UKristu" ungumsindisi → ubhekisela kuJesu,

Igama elithi "Jesu" lisho
Ukuze asindise abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Mathewu 1:21
Ngokuba nizalelwe namuhla uMsindisi, uKristu iNkosi, emzini kaDavide. Luka 2:11

Ngakho-ke, “uJesu” unguKristu, uMsindisi, noMesiya. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka uJohane 1:41

(2) UJesu unguMsindisi

Umbuzo: Kungani uNkulunkulu esisindisa?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ngokuba bonke bonile basilalelwe inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu;
2 Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu.

Roma 6:23

Umbuzo: Sivelaphi “isono” sethu?

Impendulo: Kusuka kukhokho "u-Adamu".

Lokhu kufana nje nesono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa (u-Adamu), nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwafika kubo bonke abantu ngoba bonke abantu bonile. Roma 5:12

(3) UJesu Kristu othunywe uNkulunkulu uyasisindisa

Umbuzo: UNkulunkulu usisindisa kanjani?

Impendulo: UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izosisindisa

Uyosho futhi usho ukucabanga kwakho;
Mababonisane bodwa.
Ngubani owalibonisa kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo? Ngubani owakutshela endulo?
Angisiye uJehova na?
Kakho unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami;
nginguNkulunkulu olungileyo noMsindisi;
akakho omunye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami.
Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nizakusindiswa;
Ngoba mina nginguNkulunkulu futhi akekho omunye.

Isaya 45:21-22

Umbuzo: Singasindiswa ngobani?

Impendulo: Sindisa ngoJesu Kristu!

Ayikho insindiso ngomunye ngaphandle (kukaJesu); ” IzEnzo 4:12

Umbuzo: Kuzokwenzekani uma umuntu engakholwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu noMsindisi?

Impendulo: Kufanele bafele ezonweni zabo futhi bonke bazobhubha.

UJesu wathi kubo: “Nina ningabaphansi, mina ngingowaphezulu; nina ningabomhlaba, kepha mina angisiye owaleli zwe; KwakunguKristu owafela esonweni.”— Johane 8:23-24 .
(INkosi uJesu yaphinda yathi) Ngiyanitshela, qha! Uma ungaphenduki (ukholelwa evangelini), nonke nizobhubha ngale ndlela! ” Luka 13:5

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Yilokho kuphela esabelana ngakho namuhla!

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusivula amehlo ezinhliziyo zethu ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya, nokwazi iNkosi uJesu njengoKristu, uMsindisi, uMesiya, futhi Sihlenge esonweni, esiqalekisweni somthetho, emandleni obumnyama naseHayidesi, kuSathane, nasesandleni sokufa. Nkosi Jesu!
Noma kukhona izimpi, nezifo, indlala, ukuzamazama komhlaba, ukuzingelwa, noma izinhlupheko emhlabeni, noma ngihamba esigodini sethunzi lokufa, angesabi okubi, ngokuba wena unathi, futhi nginokuthula ezweni. Kristu! Wena unguNkulunkulu wesibusiso, idwala lami engithembele kuye, isihlangu sami, uphondo lwensindiso yami, inqaba yami ephakeme, nesiphephelo sami. Amen Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli kusuka

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

ISIFUNDO 4: UJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo

(1) Yathi ingelosi! Lokho enikuthwalayo yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu

Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu. Uzokhulelwa, ubelethe indodana, futhi ungayiqamba ngokuthi uJesu. OPhezukonke uJehova uNkulunkulu uyomenza abe yinkosi phezu kwendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe awuyikuba nasiphelo.

UMariya wathi engelosini: "Angishadile. Kungenzeka kanjani lokhu?" Ingelosi yaphendula, yathi: “UMoya oNgcwele uzakuza phezu kwakho, namandla oPhezukonke akusibekele; (Noma ukuhunyushwa: Lowo ozozalwa uyobizwa ngokuthi ungcwele, futhi uyobizwa ngokuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu). Luka 1:30-35

(2) Wathi uPetru! UyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo

UJesu wathi: "Nithi ngingubani na?"

USimoni Petru waphendula wathi kuye: “Wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo.” Mathewu 16:15-16;

(3) Yonke imimoya engcolile ithi, uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu

Njalo lapho omoya abangcolileyo bembona, bawa phansi phambi kwakhe, bakhale, bathi: “Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.”

Umbuzo: Kungani imimoya engcolile imazi uJesu?

Impendulo: "Umoya ongcolile" ingelosi eyawa ngemuva kukaSathane, futhi umoya omubi ophethe abantu emhlabeni. Ngakho-ke, ingabe uyaqonda? :4

(4) UJesu ngokwakhe wathi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu

UJesu wathi: “Akulotshiwe yini emthethweni wenu ukuthi: ‘Mina ngathi ningonkulunkulu’? namanje ngithi kuye: ‘Uyahlambalaza,’ oweza ezweni ethi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu na?

(5) Ukuvuswa kukaJesu kwabafileyo kwembula ukuthi wayeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: UJesu wabembula kanjani labo ababekholelwa kuye ukuthi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu?

Impendulo: UJesu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wenyukela ezulwini ukuze abonise ukuthi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu!

Ngoba ezikhathini zasendulo, akakaze abe khona umuntu emhlabeni onganqoba ukufa, ukuvuka, nokwenyukela ezulwini! NguJesu kuphela owafela izono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu. UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wazibonakalisa eyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu enamandla amakhulu! Amen
Mayelana neNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu, owazalwa enzalweni kaDavide ngokwenyama, futhi wabonakaliswa ukuthi iyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ngamandla ngomoya wobungcwele ngokuvuka kwabafileyo. KwabaseRoma 1:3-4

(6) Wonke umuntu okholwa kuJesu uyindodana kaNkulunkulu

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Galathiya 3:26

(7) Labo abakholwa kuJesu banokuphila okuphakade

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Okholwa yiNdodana unokuphila okuphakade; akayikwamukela ukuphila okuphakade (umbhalo wokuqala awubonakali) ukuphila okuphakade), ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luhlezi phezu kwakhe” Johane 3:16.36.

Sabelana ngakho lapha namuhla!

Bafowethu nodadewethu, masikhuleke kanyekanye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusihola ukuze sazi uJesu Kristu owamthuma waba yinyama futhi wazalwa emhlabeni iqiniso futhi uhlala phakathi kwethu. Nkulunkulu! Ngiyakholwa, kepha anginakho ukukholwa okwanele, ngicela ungiphe amandla ababuthakathaka, uphulukise abagulayo inhliziyo yami edabukileyo Sikholwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu nokuphila okuphakade. Ngoba wena wathi: Wonke okholwa kuJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Amen! Ngiyakucela egameni leNkosi uJesu. Amen Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
“Ukwazi uJesu Kristu” 3

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, futhi ukwabelana "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane 17:3, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, nokwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

ISIFUNDO 3: UJesu wabonisa indlela yokuphila

Umbuzo: Ukuzalwa kukaJesu kumelela bani?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Yembula uBaba waseZulwini

Uma beningazi mina, beniyakumazi noBaba. Kusukela manje niyamazi futhi nimbonile. "
Ongibonile mina umbonile uBaba... mina ngikuBaba, noBaba ukimi, anikholwa na?

Johane 14:7-11

(2) Ukuveza uNkulunkulu

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. …ULizwi waba yinyama (okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu waba yinyama) futhi wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. Johane 1:1-2, 14

Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, kuphela iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise embonakalisile. Johane 1:18

(3) Bonisa ukukhanya kokuphila komuntu

Kuye (uJesu) kukhona ukuphila, futhi lokhu kuphila kuwukukhanya kwabantu. Johane 1:4

Ngakho uJesu waphinda wathi ebantwini: “Mina ngiwukukhanya kwezwe. Ongilandelayo kasoze ahamba ebumnyameni kodwa uzakuba lokukhanya kwempilo

[Qaphela:] “Ubumnyama” bubhekisela eHayidesi, isihogo, uma ulandela uJesu, ukukhanya kweqiniso, ngeke usangena ebumnyameni baseHayidesi.
Uma amehlo akho efiphele (engakwazi ukubona ukukhanya kweqiniso), umzimba wakho wonke uzoba sebumnyameni. Uma ukukhanya okuphakathi kwakho kuba mnyama (ngaphandle kokukhanya kukaJesu), bukhulu kangakanani ubumnyama! ” Mathewu 6:23
UGenesise 1:3 UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya,” kwaba khona ukukhanya. Lokhu “kukhanya” kusho ukuthi uJesu ungukukhanya, ukukhanya kokuphila komuntu! Ngalokhu kukhanya kokuphila, uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba kanye nazo zonke izinto wasebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha, waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa. Bheka kuGenesise Izahluko 1-2

Ngakho, uJohane wathi! UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi kuye abukho nhlobo ubumnyama. Leli yilizwi esilizwile eNkosini futhi salibuyisela kini. 1 Johane 1:5 Niyakuqonda lokhu na?

(4) Bonisa indlela yokuphila

Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. 1 Johane 1:1
“Ekuqaleni” kusho “ekuqaleni kwendalo kaJehova,
Ekuqaleni, kungakadalwa zonke izinto.
Ngikhona (ebhekisa kuJesu).
Kusukela phakade, kusukela ekuqaleni,
Umhlaba ungakabikho, ngamiswa.
Awukho kwalasha, nomthombo wamanzi amakhulu, engazalelwa kuwo. IzAga 8:22-24

Wathi uJohane! Leli “zwi lokuphila uJesu” selibonakalisiwe, futhi silibonile, futhi manje sifakaza ukuthi sidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwabonakala kithi. 1 Johane 1:2 Niyakuqonda lokhu na?

Sabelana ngakho lapha namuhla!

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Abba Baba osezulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokusiholela kulo lonke iqiniso, ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso likamoya, futhi siqonde uJesu Kristu omthumileyo.

1 Ukubonisa uBaba wethu osezulwini,

2 Ukubonisa uNkulunkulu,

3 Ukukhombisa ukukhanya kwempilo yomuntu,

4 Bonisa indlela yokuphila! Amen

Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.

Bafowethu nodadewethu Khumbulani ukukuqoqa.

Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi wena owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, nokwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. …“ULizwi” waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise.

2 UJesu wayebuthakathaka enyameni njengathi

3 UJesu waba yinyama, uNkulunkulu waba yinyama, loMoya waba yinyama;
4 UJesu wayengenasono enyameni futhi wayengenakona - Hebheru 4:15 inyama yethu ithengiswe esonweni - KwabaseRoma 7:14;
5 Inyama kaJesu ayikuboni ukonakala - IzEnzo 2:31;
6 UJesu akazange akubone ukufa enyameni; Genesise 3:19
7 “Umoya” okuJesu unguMoya Ongcwele; 1 Korinte 15:45

Ngokunjalo yena uqobo embathe inyama legazi;

Ukuze ngokufa ambhubhise olamandla okufa.
ungusathane futhi uzobakhulula labo
Umuntu oyisigqila impilo yakhe yonke ngenxa yokwesaba ukufa.

Hebheru 2:14-15

Namuhla sihlanganyela lapha

Ngoba amazwi akho anjengokukhanya kokuntwela kokusa, okuya kukhanya njalo kuze kube semini, ukuze sonke simbone uJesu! Yazi ukuthi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo uyiZwi elenziwe inyama, uNkulunkulu owenziwe inyama, noMoya owenziwe inyama! Ukuhlala phakathi kwethu kugcwele umusa neqiniso. Amen

articles.title: Ukwazi uJesu Kristu 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Ukwazi uJesu Kristu" 1

Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla sifunda ukwabelana kobudlelwane "Ukwazi uJesu Kristu"

Isifundo 1: Ukuzalwa KukaJesu Kristu

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kuJohane 17:3 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukuba bazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, noJesu Kristu omthumileyo. Amen

1. UMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele

Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshiwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayemiselwe uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. Mathewu 1:18
Ngenyanga yesithupha, ingelosi uGabriyeli yathunyelwa nguNkulunkulu emzini waseGalile (obizwa ngokuthi iNazaretha) entombini eyayithembisene umshado nendoda yendlu kaDavide, ogama layo linguJohane. Igama lentombi kwakunguMariya;...ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya! Ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu; ingelosi, “Angikashadi, kungani lokhu kwenzeka? Ingelosi yaphendula: "UMoya oNgcwele uzokwehlela phezu kwakho, namandla oPhezukonke akusibekele. Ngakho-ke, okungcwele okuzozalwa kuyothiwa iNdodana kaNkulunkulu." Luka 1:26-27,30-31,34-35
Lamavesi amabili athi! UMoya oNgcwele weza kuMariya, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, wazalwa yintombi nto. Amen!

Umbuzo: Uyini umehluko phakathi “kokuzalwa” kukaJesu “nokuzalwa” kwethu?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

【Intombi ekhulelwe ngoMoya oNgcwele】

Umbuzo: Iyini intombi?

Impendulo: Thina bantu sithola ukuzalwa → "amantombazane" abizwa ngokuthi → amantombazane amancane (izingane) lapho ezalwa kusukela esibelethweni sikanina, abe → izintombi, abe → amantombazane; ngemva kokuba amantombazane eshade eHuaichun, aba → abesifazane;

Ngakho-ke, "intombi" iminyaka ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini nangaphambi kokuba intombazane ikhule futhi ikhulelwe Ibizwa ngokuthi "intombi"! Umzimba "wentombazane" uqala uku-ovulate ngenxa yezici zomzimba, futhi ukuya esikhathini kwenzeka ngemva kokukhipha i-ovulation Intombazane ibizwa ngokuthi "intombazane" lapho ikhulelwe, futhi intombazane oganwa indoda abelethe ingane “umfazi”. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke, uJesu wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya futhi wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. Njengoba nje umka-Abrahama uSara, owayesemdala kakhulu futhi wayeka ukuya esikhathini uNkulunkulu naye wamthembisa ukukhulelwa futhi abelethe indodana, u-Isaka wayengumntwana uNkulunkulu ayemthembise ukumzala, futhi u-Isaka wayefanekisela uKristu. Amen

→→Kuthiwani ngathi? Izalwa ngokuhlangana kowesifazane nowesilisa Iphuma enyameni eyadalwa othulini luka-Adamu nobubi". Niyakuqonda kahle lokhu?

2. Yiqambe ngokuthi uJesu

Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba uthole umusa kuNkulunkulu; ukhulelwe, ubelethe indodana, uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu.”— Luka 1:30-31

Igama elithi Jesu lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen

Uzozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba uyosindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. ” Mathewu 1:21

3. Amazwi kaNkulunkulu kufanele agcwaliseke

Zonke lezi zinto zenzeka ukuze kugcwaliseke okwashiwo iNkosi ngomprofethi ukuthi: “Intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana, bayakuyiqamba igama lokuthi u-Emanuweli (okusho ukuthi “uNkulunkulu unathi.”) Mathewu 1 :22-23

KULUNGILE! Iyabelana lapha namuhla.

Masikhuleke ndawonye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, sibonge uMoya oNgcwele ngokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso likamoya. Ngokuba izwi lakho liyisibani ezinyaweni zami nokukhanya endleleni yami. Amazwi akho, lapho evuliwe, anika ukukhanya futhi enze abalula baqonde. Masiqonde iBhayibheli futhi siqonde ukuthi uJesu Kristu owamthuma, wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu! Igama likaJesu ivangeli, okusho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen

Ngegama likaJesu! Amen

Ivangeli elinikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo.
Bafowethu nodadewethu! Khumbula ukukuqoqa.

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

articles.title: Babusisiwe abazingelwa ngenxa yokulunga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abazingelwa ngenxa yokulunga, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabo.
——Mathewu 5:10

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Ukuphoqa: bi po
Incazelo: ukunxusa ngokuqinile;
Synonymes: ukucindezela, ukucindezelwa, ukucindezelwa, ukucindezelwa.
Ama-Antonimu: ukuzola, ukuncenga.

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

KuJesu, ivangeli, iZwi likaNkulunkulu, iqiniso, futhi ukuphila okungasindisa abantu!
Ukuthukwa, ukunyundelwa, ukucindezelwa, ukuphikiswa, ukushushiswa, ukushushiswa, nokubulawa.

Babusisiwe abazingelwa ngenxa yokulunga! Ngoba umbuso wezulu ungowabo. Nibusisiwe, uma abantu benithuka, benizingela, bekhuluma konke okubi ngani, beqamba amanga ngenxa yami! Jabulani nijabule, ngokuba umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini. Kanjalo amadoda azingela abaprofethi ababengaphambi kwenu. "
( Mathewu 5:10-11 )

(1) UJesu washushiswa

Esenyukela eJerusalema, wabizela eceleni abafundi abayishumi nambili endleleni, wathi kubo: “Bhekani, njengoba sikhuphukela eJerusalema, iNdodana yomuntu izonikelwa kubapristi abakhulu nababhali uyakunikelwa kwabezizwe, bahlekiswe, bashaywe, babethelwe esiphambanweni;

(2) Abaphostoli bashushiswa

uPeter
Bengithi kufanele nginikhumbuze nginivuse ngisekuleli dokodo, ngazi ukuthi siyeza isikhathi sokuba ngiphume kuleli dokodo, njengoba nje iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu yangibonisa. Futhi ngizokwenza konke okusemandleni ami ukugcina lezi zinto esikhumbuzweni sakho ngemva kokufa kwami. (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 1:13-15.)

UJohane
Mina Johane ngingumfowenu nomhlanganyeli kanye nani osizini nasembusweni nasekubekezeleni kukaJesu, ngasesiqhingini esithiwa iPhatmose ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu nangenxa yobufakazi bukaJesu. ( IsAmbulo 1:9 )

uPaul
nokuzingelwa nokuhlupheka engabhekana nakho e-Antiyokiya, nase-Ikoniyu, naseListra. Ukuzingelwa okungakanani ngakubekezelela; ( 2 Thimothewu 3:11 )

(3) Abaprofethi bashushiswa

Jerusalema! Jerusalema! Nibulala abaprofethi, nikhanda ngamatshe abathunywe kini. Bengithanda kangakanani ukubuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho njengesikhukhukazi sibuthela amatshwele aso ngaphansi kwamaphiko aso; ( Luka 13:34 )

(4) Ukuvuswa kukaKristu kusenza sibe ngabalungileyo

UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu (noma kwahunyushwa ngokuthi: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuselwa ukulungisiswa kwethu). ( Roma 4:25 )

(5) Silungisiswa ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu

Manje, ngomusa kaNkulunkulu, silungisiswa ngesihle ngokuhlengwa kukaKristu Jesu. UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokholo lomuntu ukuze abonise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; owaziwayo ukuthi ulungile, futhi ukuze alungisise labo abakholwa kuJesu. ( Roma 3:24-26 )

(6) Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye

UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. ( Roma 8:16-17 )

(7) Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu

Khona (uJesu) wabizela kubo izixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: "Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe (noma ukuhunyushwa). umphefumulo wakhe ngezansi) uyakulahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe;

(8)Shumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu

UJesu weza kubo, wathi kubo: “Ngiphiwe amandla onke ezulwini nasemhlabeni. Ngakho hambani nenze izizwe zonke abafundi, nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele. “ nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele) nibafundise ukugcina konke enginiyale ngakho, futhi mina nginani njalo kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe.” 18-20) Umkhosi)

[9 Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu

Nginamazwi okugcina: Qina eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane. Ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi balobu bumnyama bomhlaba, nobubi bomoya ezindaweni eziphakemeyo. Ngakho hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana nesitha ngosuku losizi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime. Ngakho yimani niqine,

1 Bopha izinkalo zakho ngeqiniso,
2 Gqoka isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga,
3 Futhi beka ezinyaweni zakho ukulungiselela ukuhamba nevangeli lokuthula.
4 Phezu kwalokho nithathe isihlangu sokukholwa eningacima ngaso yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi;
5 nifake isigqoko sensindiso;
6 Thatha inkemba kaMoya, eyizwi likaNkulunkulu;
7 Thembela kuMoya oNgcwele futhi uthandaze ngazo zonke izinhlobo zokunxusa ngaso sonke isikhathi;
8 Hlalani nilindile, ningakhathali kulokhu, nikhulekele abangcwele bonke.
( Efesu 6:10-18 )

(10) Umcebo wembulwa esitsheni sobumba

Sinale ngcebo (uMoya weqiniso) esitsheni sobumba ukukhombisa ukuthi lamandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; ( 2 Korinte 4:7-9 )

(11) Ukufa kukaJesu kuyasebenza kithi ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu nakho kubonakale kithi

Ngoba thina esiphilayo sihlala sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emizimbeni yethu efayo. Kulo mbono, ukufa kuyasebenza kithi, kodwa ukuphila kuyasebenza kuwe. ( 2 Korinte 4:11-12 )

(12) Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhujiswa, inhliziyo engaphakathi yenziwa musha usuku nosuku.

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. umzimba wangaphandle ( Indoda endala Nakuba ibhujisiwe, inhliziyo yami ( Umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu enhliziyweni ) ivuselelwa usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Kuvela ukuthi kasikhathali ngokubonwayo, kodwa okungabonwayo; (Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 4:17-18.)

Ihubo: UJesu Unamandla

Imibhalo Yesandla YeVangeli

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

articles.title: Babusisiwe abalamulayo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abalamulayo, ngokuba bayakuthiwa ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu.

——Mathewu 5:9

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Harmony: Pinyin [he mu]
Incazelo: (Esamile) Hlanganani ngokuzwana ngaphandle kokuxabana.
Amazwi afanayo: ubungane, umusa, ukuthula, ubungane, ubungane, ukuzwana, ukuzwana, njll.
Ama-Antonyms: umzabalazo, ukuxabana, ukuphikisa, ukungezwani.
Umthombo: Xuanding, Qing Dynasty, "Amarekhodi Ezibani Zasekwindla Ngobusuku Bemvula. Izazi ZakwaNanguo" "Yiba ngabantwana basekhweni lakho futhi uzwane nabakwenu."

buza: Ingabe abantu emhlabeni bangakwazi ukwenza ukuthula nabanye?
impendulo: Kungani abezizwe bexabana?

Kungani abezizwe bexabana? Kungani zonke izizwe ziceba okuyize? ( IHubo 2:1 )

Qaphela: Bonke bonile → isono, nomthetho, nezinkanuko nezifiso zenyama → imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, imibuthano, imibango, ukuhlubuka, umhawu (eminye imiqulu yasendulo yengeza igama elithi "ukubulala"), ukudakwa, imibuthano exokozelayo, njll. (Galathiya 5:19-21)
Ngakho-ke, abantu emhlabeni abakwazi ukwenza ukuthula phakathi kwabantu. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

1. Umenzi wokuthula

buza: Singakwenza kanjani ukuthula?
impendulo: Umuntu omusha uyadalwa ngoKristu,
Bese kuba nokuzwana!

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

Ngokuba yena ungukuthula kwethu, wenza ababili baba-nye, wadiliza ugange oluhlukanisayo, wachitha ubutha emzimbeni wakhe, yebo, izimiso ezilotshwe emthethweni, ukuze adale umuntu omusha ezimbili, ngaleyo ndlela kuzuzwe ukuzwana. ( Efesu 2:14-15 )

buza: UKristu umdala kanjani umuntu omusha Ngaye?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Sikhulule esonweni

Qaphela: UKristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula esonweni. Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-7

(2) Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho

Qaphela: Esiphambanweni, uKristu wahlanganisa (izulu, umhlaba, uNkulunkulu nomuntu) baba munye, futhi wabhidliza udonga oluhlukanisayo phakathi (okungukuthi, umthetho wamaJuda, kodwa abeZizwe abanayo imithetho; umzimba wakhe ukuqeda inzondo, imithetho ebhalwe emthethweni. Bheka amaRoma 7:6 nabaseGalathiya 3:13 .

(3) Asilahle ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo

Qaphela: Futhi ingcwatshiwe, ukuze silahle ukuziphatha kwendoda endala Bheka KwabaseKolose 3:9.

(4) Ukuvuka kukaKristu kwadala umuntu omusha Ngaye

Qaphela: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usenze kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo (1 Petru 1:3).

buza: Ubani owazalwa ngomuntu omusha owadalwa ngokuvuka kukaKristu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya—Johane 3:5-7
2 Bazalwa eqinisweni levangeli— 1 Korinte 4:15 noJakobe 1:18
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu— Johane 1:12-13

2 Ngoba bayobizwa ngokuthi amadodana kaNkulunkulu

buza: Umuntu angabizwa kanjani ngokuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Kholwa evangelini, kholwa endleleni yeqiniso, futhi ukholwe kuJesu!

(1) Ukubekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe

Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. ( Efesu 1:13 )
Qaphela: Kholwa evangelini nakuKristu Njengoba ukholwa Kuye, ubekwe uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe UNkulunkulu →→ uyobizwa ngokuthi indodana kaNkulunkulu. Amen.

(2) Noma ubani oholwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu uyindodana kaNkulunkulu

Ngokuba bonke abaholwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Animamukelanga umoya wobugqila, ukuze nihlale ekwesabeni; (Funda incwadi 8:14-16.)

(3) Shumayela ivangeli, wenze abantu bakholwe kuJesu Kristu, futhi wenze ukuthula phakathi kwabantu kuKristu

【 UJesu ushumayela ivangeli lombuso 】

UJesu wadabula imizi yonke nemizana yonke, efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa izifo zonke nezifo zonke. ( Mathewu 9:35 )

【 Uthunyelwe ukushumayela ivangeli ngegama likaJesu 】

Lapho ebona izixuku, waba nesihe ngazo, ngoba zazilusizi futhi zibuthakathaka njengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Ngakho wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna kukhulu, kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana. Ngakho-ke, celani iNkosi yokuvuna ukuba ithumele izisebenzi ekuvuneni kwayo.”

Qaphela: UJesu wenza ukuthula, futhi igama likaJesu yiNkosi yokuthula! Labo abashumayela uJesu, abakholelwa ivangeli, futhi abashumayela ivangeli eliholela ensindisweni bangabenzi bokuthula → Babusisiwe abanokuthula, ngoba bayobizwa ngokuthi amadodana kaNkulunkulu. Amen!

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. ( Galathiya 3:26 )

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa Enkosini UJesu Isihlabelelo

Umbhalo wevangeli!

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

2022.07.07

articles.title: Babusisiwe abahlanzekile enhliziyweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abahlanzekile enhliziyweni, ngokuba bayakubona uNkulunkulu.
— Mathewu 5:8

Ukuhumusha kwesichazamazwi sesiShayina

inhliziyo ehlanzekile qīngxīn
( 1 ) Isimo esinokuthula, akukho ukukhathazeka, ingqondo ehlanzekile nezifiso ezimbalwa
( 2 ) Susa imicabango ephazamisayo, yenza umoya wakho uzole futhi ube nokuthula, ube nenhliziyo ehlanzekile, futhi inyanga ibe mhlophe futhi ihlanzekile.
( 3 ) kusho futhi ukuba nenhliziyo ehlanzekile nokuba ngumuntu omsulwa njalo.

1. Imiphumela yokuphila ivela enhliziyweni

Kumele uqaphe inhliziyo yakho ngaphezu kwanoma yini enye (noma ukuhumusha: kufanele uqaphe inhliziyo yakho ngokucophelela), ngoba imiphumela yokuphila kwakho ivela enhliziyweni yakho. ( IzAga 4:23 )

1 indela : Yiba msulwa enhliziyweni futhi ube nezifiso ezimbalwa, yidla ngokushesha futhi uphindaphinde igama likaBuddha, ulingise iSakyamuni futhi uhlakulele umzimba - ube nguBuddha ngokushesha, futhi "uhambe" ukuze ubone uBuddha Ophilayo ulungile.
2 Abapristi bamaTao: Khuphuka intaba uyokwenza ubuTao futhi ube umuntu ongafi.
3 nun: Ebona emhlabeni ofayo, wagunda izinwele zakhe, waba indela, washada futhi wabuyela eBuddhism.
4 Bakhohliswa (izinyoka), futhi bacabanga ukuthi ilungile .
→→Kukhona indlela ebonakala ilungile kumuntu, kodwa ekugcineni iba yindlela yokufa. ( IzAga 14:12 )
→→Qaphelani, funa izinhliziyo zenu zidukiswe, niphambuke endleleni elungile, nikhonze futhi nikhonze abanye onkulunkulu. ( Duteronomi 11:16 )

2. Inhliziyo yomuntu inenkohliso futhi yimbi ngokwedlulele.

1 Izinhliziyo zabantu zimbi kakhulu

Inhliziyo yomuntu inenkohliso ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto futhi imbi ngokwedlulele. ( Jeremiya 17:9 )

2 Inhliziyo iyakhohlisa

Ngokuba ngaphakathi, okungukuthi enhliziyweni yomuntu kuphuma imicabango emibi, ubufebe, ukweba, ukubulala, ukuphinga, ukuhaha, ububi, inkohliso, ukuxhwala, umhawu, ukunyundela, ukuzidla, nokuzidla. Bonke lobu bubi buvela ngaphakathi futhi bungangcolisa abantu. ” ( Marku 7:21-23 )

3 Unembeza ulahlekelwe

Ngakho-ke ngisho lokhu eNkosini: Ningabe nisahamba ebuzeni bezizwe. Izingqondo zabo zenziwe mnyama futhi zihlukanisiwe nokuphila uNkulunkulu abanike zona ngenxa yokungazi kwabo nobulukhuni bezinhliziyo zabo, bahileleka ekukhanukeni futhi benza yonke inhlobo yokungcola. ( Efesu 4:17-19 )

buza: Uyini umuntu ohlanzekile enhliziyweni?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

AmaHubo 73:1 UNkulunkulu unomusa kwabahlanzekile enhliziyweni kwa-Israyeli!
2 Thimothewu 2:22 Balekela izinkanuko zobusha, uphishekele ukulunga, nokukholwa, nothando, nokuthula kanye nabakhuleka eNkosini ngenhliziyo emhlophe.

3. Unembeza ohlanzekile

buza: Ungawuhlanza kanjani unembeza wakho?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Hlanza kuqala

Kepha ukuhlakanipha kwaphezulu kuqala kuhlanzekile, bese kuba-nokuthula, nobumnene, kugcwele isihawu, kuthela izithelo ezinhle, akunabandlululo, nokuzenzisa. ( Jakobe 3:17 )

(2) Igazi likaKristu elingenasici lihlanza izinhliziyo zenu

Kakhulu kangakanani igazi likaKristu owazinikela kuNkulunkulu ngoMoya ophakade engenasici, liyakuhlambulula izinhliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo na? ( Hebheru 9:14 )

(3) Uma unembeza wakho usuhlanziwe, awube usazizwa unecala.

Uma kungenjalo, ingabe imihlatshelo yayingeke ime kudala? Ngoba onembeza babakhulekeli sebehlanziwe futhi abasazizwa benecala. ( Hebheru 10:2 )

(4) Aqede izono, asuse izono, ahlawulele izono, alethe ukulunga okuphakade →→“Ulungisisiwe phakade” futhi unokuphila okuphakade! Uyaqonda?

“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakini nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isiphambeko, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngobubi, kungeniswe ukulunga okuphakade, kugcizelelwe umbono nesiprofetho, kugcotshwe oNgcwele, Daniyeli 9:24).

4. Thatha umqondo kaKristu njengenhliziyo yakho

buza: Ungaba kanjani nomqondo kaKristu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Wathola uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe

Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. ( Efesu 1:13 )

(2) UMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, futhi anibona abenyama

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kepha umphefumulo uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga. ( Roma 8:9-10 )

(3) UMoya oNgcwele nezinhliziyo zethu ziyafakaza ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

Ngokuba bonke abaholwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Animamukelanga umoya wobugqila, ukuze nihlale ekwesabeni; Isahluko 14-16)

(4) Yiba nomqondo kaKristu njengenhliziyo yakho
Mawube kini lowo mqondo owawukuKristu Jesu: yena enesimo sikaNkulunkulu akathi ukulingana noNkulunkulu kuyinto yokubamba, kepha wazenza ize, ethatha isimo senceku, ezalwa engumuntu. enjengomuntu, wazithoba, walalela kwaze kwaba sekufeni, yebo, ekufeni esiphambanweni. (Funda eyabaseFilipi 2:5-8.)

(5) Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu

Wayesebizela kubo isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa umphefumulo wakhe; okufanayo ngezansi) Uyolahlekelwa ukuphila kwakho;

(6) Shumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu

UJesu wadabula imizi yonke nemizana yonke, efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa izifo zonke nezifo zonke. Lapho ebona izixuku, waba nesihe ngazo, ngoba zazilusizi futhi zibuthakathaka njengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Ngakho wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna kukhulu, kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana. Ngakho-ke celani iNkosi yokuvuna ukuba ithumele izisebenzi ekuvuneni kwayo.”

(7) Sihlupheka kanye laye, njalo sizakhazinyuliswa kanye laye

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. ( Roma 8:17 )

5. Bayobona uNkulunkulu

(1) USimoni Petru wathi: “Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo”!

UJesu wathi kuye: "Wena uthi ngingubani na?" USimoni Petru wamphendula: "Wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo." akusiyo Inyama ukwambulele lokhu, kodwa uBaba osezulwini ukwambulile (Mathewu 16:15-17).

Qaphela: AmaJuda, kuhlanganise “noJudas,” abona uJesu njengeNdodana yomuntu, kodwa awazange ambone uJesu njengeNdodana kaNkulunkulu uJudasi walandela uJesu iminyaka emithathu ngaphandle kokubona uNkulunkulu.

(2) UJohane usezibonele ngamehlo akhe futhi wathinta abasafufusa

Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi sidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwembulwa kithi.) ( 1 Johane 1:1-2 )

(3) Wabonakala kubazalwane abangamakhulu amahlanu ngesikhathi esisodwa

Enganinikela khona futhi: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi wembelwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo, wabonakaliswa kuKhefase; kwaboniswa abaphostoli abayishumi nambili; Khona-ke kwembulwa kuJakobe, kwase kuba kubo bonke abaphostoli, futhi ekugcineni kimi, njengomuntu ongakazalwa. ( 1 Korinte 15:3-8 )

(4) Ukubona indalo kaNkulunkulu ngomsebenzi wendalo

Lokho okwakwaziwa ngoNkulunkulu kwembulwa ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngoba uNkulunkulu ukwambulile kubo. Kusukela ekudalweni komhlaba, amandla kaNkulunkulu angunaphakade nobuNkulunkulu bakhe bekwaziwa ngokucacile, nakuba engabonakali, angaqondwa ngezinto ezidaliwe, ashiye umuntu engenazaba. ( Roma 1:19-20 )

(5) Ukubona uNkulunkulu ngemibono namaphupho

‘Ezinsukwini zokugcina, kusho uNkulunkulu, ngiyothululela uMoya wami phezu kwabantu bonke. amadodana enu namadodakazi enu ayakuprofetha, izinsizwa zenu zibone imibono; ( IzEnzo 2:17 )

(6) Lapho uKristu ebonakala, sibonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni

Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. ( Kolose 3:4 )

(7) Sizobona isimo sakhe sangempela

Bazalwane abathandekayo, manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; ( 1 Johane 3:2 )

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Babusisiwe abahlanzekile enhliziyweni, ngoba bayobona uNkulunkulu

Ihubo: INkosi iyindlela Iqiniso

Umbhalo wevangeli!

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

articles.title: Babusisiwe abanesihawu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abanesihawu, ngokuba bayakuhawukelwa;
— Mathewu 5:7

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Ububele: [lian xu], ubhekisela othandweni nesihawu.
Synonimes: isihawu, ububele, umusa, ukuphana, ububele.
I-Antonym: inonya.

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

uzwelo : Isho umusa, uzwelo, ukucabangela nokunakekela.

Ngithanda ubuhle (noma ukuhumusha: uzwelo ), abayithandi imihlatshelo, bakhetha ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu kuneminikelo yokushiswa. Hoseya 6:6

buza: Ubani omuhle?
impendulo: UJesu wathi kuye: “Ungibizelani ngokuthi ngimuhle na? Akekho omuhle ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu yedwa . Marku 10:18

uJehova Kuhle Uqotho, ngakho uzafundisa izoni indlela eqondileyo. IHubo 25:8

buza: Ingabe umusa nozwela lwasemhlabeni lubalulekile?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Umuntu wenyama uthengiswe esonweni
Njengoba umBhalo uthi → Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kodwa mina ngingowenyama futhi ngithengisiwe esonweni. Roma 7:14

(2) Abantu benyama bathanda “ ubugebengu "umthetho
Kepha ngibona sengathi kukhona omunye umthetho ezithweni olwa nomthetho enhliziyweni yami, ongithumbile, ongenza ngilandele umthetho wesono ezithweni. Roma 7:23

(3) Abantu benyama banendaba nezinto zenyama
Ngoba labo abaphila ngokwenyama babeka izingqondo zabo ezintweni zenyama;

(4)Abacabanga okwenyama bafile
Ukunaka kwenyama kungukufa;...Ngokuba ukunaka kwenyama kungubutha kuNkulunkulu; ngokuba akuwuthobeli umthetho kaNkulunkulu; Abasenyameni abanakumthokozisa uNkulunkulu. KwabaseRoma 8:5-8

Qaphela: Ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu, akekho umuntu olungile Isihawu sabantu basemhlabeni siwukunakekela inyama nokuba nesihe ezintweni zenyama, ukucabangela inyama efayo nebolayo. Ngakho-ke, emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, ukuziphatha kwabo akubhekwa njengokuhle noma ububele. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Ingabe abantu emhlabeni banalo ububele, isihe, nomusa?
impendulo: Cha.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Ngoba bonke bonile futhi basilalelwe inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu. Isoni yilowo owephula isivumelwano futhi one, futhi kuthiwa ngomubi.
“Isihawu nesihe” sababi nabo banonya.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, izoni (abantu abayizoni) abakholwanga kuNkulunkulu, kuJesu, noma evangelini! Akukho ukuzalwa kabusha futhi akukho sibopho sikaMoya oNgcwele." Kuhle "isithelo. Emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, ababi, "ububele nozwelo" Bakhe bonke bawukuzenzisa, abazenzisi, abantu ababi abanakho ukulunga;

"Eyomuntu omubi" umusa "Ingase ikusize, ikusize, noma ikukhohlise, ikuholele ekuhlubukeni kuNkulunkulu nensindiso kaKristu, ngakho-ke kwababi." umusa "Inonya futhi. Uyayiqonda lento?

Olungileyo uphephisa inkomo yakhe, kodwa impilo yomuntu omubi umusa Futhi enonya . Bheka izAga 12:10

1. UJehova unesihe, uthando, umusa nomusa

UJehova wathi phambi kwakhe: “UJehova, uJehova umusa UNkulunkulu onomusa, ophuza ukuthukuthela, ogcwele uthando neqiniso. Eksodusi 34:6

(1) Yiba nomusa kwabamesabayo uNkulunkulu
Njengoyise ehawukela abantwana bakhe, injalo iNkosi uzwelo Abamesabayo! IHubo 103:13

(2) Ukuhawukela abampofu
Wonke amakhosi ayokhothama phambi kwayo futhi zonke izizwe ziyoyikhonza. Ngoba uyokhulula abampofu lapho bekhala, futhi uyokhulula abampofu abangenabani ongabasiza. uyafuna uzwelo Abampofu nabampofu, sindisa izimpilo zabampofu. IHubo 72:11-13

(3) Yiba nomusa kulabo abaphendukela kuNkulunkulu
Abamesabayo uJehova bakhuluma bodwa, uJehova walalela; kwakukhona incwadi yesikhumbuzo phambi kwakhe kwabamesabayo uJehova, bakhumbula igama lakhe.
“Bayakuba ngabami ngosuku engilumisile,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “bayakuba ngabami ngokukhethekile, ngibe nomusa kubo njengakumuntu.” uzwelo Khonza eyakho indodana. Malaki 3:16-17

2. UJesu uyasithanda isihawu futhi uhawukela wonke umuntu

(1) UJesu uthanda isihe
'Ngiyakuthanda uzwelo , akayithandi imihlatshelo. ’ Uma uqonda incazelo yaleli gama, ngeke ubheke abangenacala njengabanecala. Mathewu 12:7

(2) UJesu wabonisa umusa kuwo wonke umuntu
UJesu wayihamba imizi yonke nemizana efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa izifo zonke nezifo zonke. Lapho ebona abantu abaningi, yena umusa ngokuba bahluphekile, bangenamakhaya njengezimvu ezingenamalusi. Mathewu 9:35-36

Ngaleso sikhathi abantu abaningi baphinde babuthana futhi kwakungekho ukudla. UJesu wabiza abafundi bakhe wathi: “Mina umusa Bonke laba bantu, ngokuba sebehlezi nami izinsuku ezintathu, bengenalutho lokudla; Marku 8:1-2

buza: UJesu unesihe kuwo wonke umuntu Inhloso Kwenzenjani?
impendulo: Mabazi ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu futhi baphendukele kuNkulunkulu .

Ngokwesibonelo, uJesu wadabula imizi yonke nemizana eshumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu, ephulukisa abagulayo futhi ekhipha amademoni, enza izibonakaliso nezimangaliso, futhi esuthisa abantu abangaphezu kwezinkulungwane ezinhlanu ngezinkwa ezinhlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili, ukuze imizimba yabo iphele. yayingelapheka futhi yaneliseke.

( Inhloso ) iwukubazisa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uKristu, noMsindisi, nokuthi ukukholwa kuJesu kuzobenza babe nokuphila okuphakade. Uma kungenjalo, ngeke kube nenzuzo emizimbeni yabo yenyama ukuphulukiswa nokwaneliseka uma bengakholelwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu.

Kungakho iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ningasebenzeli ukudla okuphelayo, kodwa sebenzelani ukudla okuhlala kuze kube ngukuphila okuphakade, eyonipha khona iNdodana yomuntu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uBaba uyibeke uphawu ngokukaJohane 6 Isahluko 27

( Qaphela: Abantu emhlabeni bangase ngezikhathi ezithile babe nozwelo nozwelo, kodwa bengenakho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu noma uMoya oNgcwele ngaphakathi kubo, futhi abakwazi ukushumayela ivangeli likaNkulunkulu ophilayo. Isihawu nesihawu sabo sikhathalela kuphela inyama yomuntu eyonakala, futhi abanandaba nokuphila “kwaphakade” komuntu. Ngakho-ke, ububele nozwelo lwabo akusizi ngalutho futhi ngeke kube isibusiso. ) Ngakho, uyaqonda?

3 AmaKristu ahamba noNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo enobubele

(1) Yeka ukuthi uNkulunkulu unesihe esijule kangakanani kuwo wonke umuntu

Nake ningamlaleli uNkulunkulu, kodwa manje ngenxa yokungalaleli kwabo (Israyeli) niye naduka. uzwelo . Ngakho, (Israyeli)
Nabo kabalalelanga, ngakho ngenxa yalokho abakupha khona uzwelo , manje (u-Israyeli) uhlanganisiwe uzwelo . Ngoba uNkulunkulu uvalele bonke abantu ekungalalelini ngenjongo yokuba uzwelo Wonke umuntu. KwabaseRoma 11:30-32

(2) Sathola isihe futhi saba abantu bakaNkulunkulu

Kepha nina niluhlanga olukhethiweyo, ubupristi obobukhosi, isizwe esingcwele, abantu bakaNkulunkulu, ukuze nishumayele ubukhosi balowo owanibiza niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okumangalisayo. Beningesona isizwe ngaphambili, kodwa manje seniyisizwe sikaNkulunkulu; uzwelo , kodwa manje seliphuphuthekile uzwelo . 1 Petru 2:9-10

(3) Yiba nesihe futhi uhambe noNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo enobubele

INkosi ukubonisile, O muntu, okuhle. Ufunani kuwe? Uma nje wenza ubulungiswa, Sihawukele , hamba noNkulunkulu wakho ngokuthobeka. Mika 6:8

Ngakho-ke, masisondele ngesibindi esihlalweni somusa ukuze sizuze uzwelo , thola umusa futhi ube usizo oluwusizo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi . Hebheru 4:16

Ihubo: Amazing Grace

Umbhalo wevangeli!

articles.title: Babusisiwe abalambele futhi bomele ukulunga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abalambele, bomele ukulunga, ngokuba bayakusuthiswa.
— Mathewu 5:6

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

omile[jt ke]
1 Ulambile futhi womile
2 Kuyisingathekiso sokulangazela okulindelwe kanye nendlala.
Muyi [mu yl] encoma umusa nokulunga.

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

1. Ukulunga komuntu

buza: Ingabe kukhona ukulunga emhlabeni?
impendulo: Cha.

Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Akakho olungileyo, akakho noyedwa oqondayo, akakho ofuna uNkulunkulu ngisho linye kwabaseRoma 3:10 -12

buza: Kungani bengekho abantu abalungile?
impendulo: Ngoba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu;

2. Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu

buza: Kuyini ukulunga?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu ungukulunga, uJesu Kristu, olungileyo!

Bantwanyana bami, nginilobela lokhu ukuze ningoni. Uma umuntu ona, sinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo.
1 Johane 2:1

3. Olungile ( buyisela ) abangalungile, ukuze sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuKristu

Ngokuba noKristu wahlupheka kwaba kanye ngenxa yesono (ikhona imiqulu yasendulo: ukufa), okungukuthi Ukulunga esikhundleni sokungalungi ukusiholela kuNkulunkulu. Ngokukhuluma ngokwenyama, wabulawa ngokomoya, wavuswa. 1 Petru 3:18

UNkulunkulu wenza ongasazi isono, okwe Saba yisono ukuze sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye. 2 Korinte 5:21

4. Abalambele futhi bomele ukulunga

buza: Bangasuthiswa kanjani labo abalambele futhi bomele ukulunga?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Yidlani amanzi aphilayo awaphiwe nguJehova

Owesifazane wathi: “Nkosi, asinazo izinto zokukha amanzi, nomthombo ujulile; ungawathathaphi amanzi aphilayo na? Ukhokho wethu uJakobe wasishiyela lo mthombo, yena namadodana akhe nemfuyo yakhe baphuza emanzini. amanzi." , ungcono kunaye? Ingabe likhulu kakhulu?” UJesu waphendula: “Lowo ophuza lawa manzi uyophinde ome;

buza: Ayini amanzi aphilayo?
impendulo: Imifula yamanzi aphilayo igeleza isuka esiswini sikaKristu, futhi abanye abakholwayo bayokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe! Amen.

Ngosuku lokugcina lomkhosi, okwakuwusuku olukhulu kunawo wonke, uJesu wema waphakamisa izwi wathi: “Uma ekhona owomile, makeze kimi, aphuze, okholwa yimi, njengokusho kombhalo ukuthi: ‘Phuma. esiswini sakhe kuyakugobhoza amanzi aphilayo.” ” UJesu washo lokhu ebhekisela kuMoya oNgcwele abayowamukela abakholwa nguye. UMoya oNgcwele wawungakanikezwa ngoba uJesu wayengakakhazinyuliswa. Johane 7:37-39

(2) Yidla isinkwa seNkosi sokuphila

buza: Siyini isinkwa sokuphila?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UJesu uyisinkwa sokuphila

Okhokho bethu badla imana ehlane, njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: “Wabanika isinkwa esivela ezulwini ukuba badle.” ’”

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: UMose akaninikanga isinkwa esivela ezulwini, kodwa uBaba uninika isinkwa soqobo esivela ezulwini, ngokuba isinkwa sikaNkulunkulu siyisinkwa esehla ezulwini, onika umhlaba ukuphila.”

Bathi: “Nkosi, siphe njalo lesi sinkwa!”
UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila noma ubani oza kimi akasoze alamba;
Kodwa nginitshelile, nangibona, kepha anikakholwa namanje. Johane 6:31-36

2 Yidlani linathe eNkosini Inyama futhi Igazi

(UJesu wathi) Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila. Okhokho benu badla imana ehlane, bafa. Lesi yisinkwa esehla ezulwini, ukuze kuthi, uma abantu besidla, bangafi. Mina ngiyisinkwa esiphilayo esehle ezulwini;

Isinkwa engizasipha sona siyinyama yami engizayinikela impilo yomhlaba. Ngakho abaJuda baphikisana bodwa, besithi: Lo angasinika njani inyama yakhe ukuthi siyidle? "

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila kini. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami unokuphila okuphakade ekugcineni. usuku ngiyomvusa.
Johane 6:48-54

(3) Ukulungisiswa ngokholo

buza: Ulambele futhi womele ukulunga! Umuntu angakuthola kanjani ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Umuntu ulungisiswa ngokukholwa kuJesu Kristu!

1 Celani, lizaphiwa;
2Funani, lizathola;
3ngqongqothani, niyakuvulelwa umnyango; Amen.

(UJesu wathi) “Ngiyaphinda ngithi kini: Celani, niyophiwa; Ngokuba ocelayo uyaphiwa, nofunayo uyafumana, nongqongqothayo uyavulelwa.
“Ngumuphi uyise phakathi kwenu ongathi indodana yakhe icela isinkwa ayinike itshe na? Ecela inhlanzi, kuthiwani uma umnika inyoka esikhundleni senhlanzi? Uma ucela iqanda, uma umnika ufezela? Uma nina, enibabi, nikwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle; ” Luka 11:9-13

buza: Kulungisiswa ngokukholwa! Kanjani( incwadi ) ukulungisiswa?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1( incwadi ) Ukulungisiswa kwevangeli

Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kuye wonke okholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Ivangeli lensindiso → (UPawulu) Lokho engakushumayela kini futhi: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu ngokwemiBhalo, wafela izono zethu ,

→Sikhulule esonweni,
→Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo ,
Futhi wangcwatshwa,
→Asikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe;
Futhi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokusho kweBhayibheli.
→ Ukuvuka kukaKristu kusenza abalungileyo , (Okungukuthi, ukuvuswa, ukuzalwa kabusha, ukusindiswa, nokwamukelwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu kanye noKristu. Ukuphila okuphakade.) Amen!

2 Balungisiswa ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu

Manje, ngomusa kaNkulunkulu, silungisiswa ngesihle ngokuhlengwa kukaKristu Jesu. UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokholo lomuntu ukuze abonise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; owaziwayo ukuthi ulungile, futhi ukuze alungisise labo abakholwa kuJesu. KwabaseRoma 3:24-26

Uma uvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuthi uJesu uyiNkosi, ukholwa enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamvusa kwabafileyo, uyakusindiswa. Ngoba umuntu angalungisiswa ngokukholwa ngenhliziyo, futhi angasindiswa ngokuvuma ngomlomo wakhe. KwabaseRoma 10:9-10

3 Ukulungisiswa ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu (uMoya oNgcwele)

Babenjalo abanye kini, kodwa senagezwa, senangcweliswa, senalungisiswa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu nangoMoya kaNkulunkulu wethu. 1 Korinte 6:11

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Babusisiwe abalambele futhi bomele ukulunga, ngoba bayosuthiswa. Amen! Niyakuqonda lokhu?

Ihubo: Njengenyamazane Ixukuza Emfudlaneni

Umbhalo wevangeli!

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

2022.07.04

articles.title: Babusisiwe abamnene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abamnene, ngokuba bayakudla ifa lomhlaba.
— Mathewu 5:5

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Omnene: (ifomu) emnene futhi ethambile, (eduze) ethobekile futhi ethobekile.
Njengobumnene, ubumnene, ubumnene, ubumnene, ubumnene, imfudumalo, ubumnene nokucabangela.
Inkondlo ka-Ai Qing ethi "Bouquet. Vienna":"Ilanga lingakhanya ngamafasitela akho futhi lithinte amehlo akho ngeminwe emnene..."

Ama-Antonimu: anolaka, anonya, aluhlaza, anonya, anobudlova, anonya, akhukhumele.

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

Ninganyundeli, ningaxabani, kepha yibani nokuthula; Bonisa ubumnene kuwo wonke umuntu . Thithu 3:2

Zithobe kukho konke, mnene , nibekezele, nibekezelelane ngothando, nisebenzise isibopho sokuthula ukuze nigcine ubunye bukaMoya. Efesu 4:2-3

buza: Ubani umuntu omnene?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1)Ububele bukaKristu

“Yishoni kwabesifazane baseSiyoni ukuthi: ‘Bheka, iNkosi yakho iyeza kuwe; umnene , futhi egibele imbongolo, okungukuthi, egibele ithole lembongolo. ’”—Mathewu 21:5

(2) INkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngimnene futhi ngithobekile ngenhliziyo”!

Wozani kimi nina nonke enikhatheleyo nenisindwayo, mina ngizakuniphumuza. Ngimnene futhi ngithobekile ngenhliziyo , thathani ijoka lami phezu kwenu nifunde kimi, khona niyakufumana ukuphumula kwemiphefumulo yenu. Mathewu 11:28-29

buza: Ubumnene buvelaphi?
impendulo: Kusukela phezulu.

buza: Ubani ovela phezulu?
Impendulo: UJesu, iNdodana kaBaba waseZulwini.

(UJesu wathi) Uma nginitshela izinto ezisemhlabeni futhi ningakholwa, ningakholwa kanjani uma nginitshela okusezulwini? Akakho owenyukele ezulwini, kuphela iNdodana yomuntu eyehla ezulwini futhi isesezulwini. Johane 3:12-13

buza: Ungakwamukela kanjani ububele obuvela phezulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Hlanza kuqala

buza: Indlela yokuhlanza?
impendulo: Lapho unembeza wakho uhlanzekile, awusazizwa unecala. !

Uma kungenjalo, ingabe imihlatshelo yayingeke ime kudala? Ngoba labo abathandazayo, Uma unembeza usuhlanziwe, awube usazizwa unecala. . Hebheru 10:2

buza: Ngingahlanza kanjani ngaphandle kokuzizwa nginecala?
impendulo: ( incwadi ) Igazi likaKristu elingenasici lihlanza (unembeza) wakho emisebenzini yakho efile, futhi inhliziyo yakho (unembeza) ikholelwa ukuthi ngegazi eliyigugu likaKristu, "uzuze " geza "Angisazizwa nginecala Amen!

Kakhulu kangakanani igazi likaKristu owazinikela kuNkulunkulu ngoMoya ophakade engenasici, liyakuhlambulula izinhliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo na? Bheka kumaHeberu 9:14

(2)Okokugcina ukuthula, ubumnene nobumnene

Kepha ukuhlakanipha kwaphezulu kuqala kuhlanzekile, bese kuba ukuthula; Emnene futhi emnene , egcwele isihe, ethelayo, engenabandlululo, engenakuzenzisa. Jakobe 3:17

(3) Sebenzisa ukuthula ukuze uhlwanyele izithelo zothando

Futhi okwenza ukuthula yisithelo sokulunga esihlwanyelwe ngokuthula. Jakobe 3:18

(4) Ubumnene buyizithelo zikaMoya oNgcwele

Isithelo sikaMoya siluthando, nokujabula, nokuthula, nokubekezela, nobubele, nobuvi, nokukholeka, mnene ,lawula. Awukho umthetho omelene nezinto ezinjalo.
Galathiya 5:22-23

(5) Abamnene bayodla ifa likaBaba waseZulwini

LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso sefa lethu kuze kube abantu bakaNkulunkulu (abantu: Umbhalo wokuqala uyimboni ) wahlengwa ukuze kudunyiswe inkazimulo yaKhe.
Efesu 1:14

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. ... Uma ningabakaKristu, niyinzalo ka-Abrahama, niyizindlalifa ngokwesithembiso.
Galathiya 3:26, 29

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Babusisiwe abamnene, ngokuba bayokudla ifa lomhlaba. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa ngiyakholwa

Umbhalo wevangeli!

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

2022.07.03

articles.title: Babusisiwe abalilayo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Babusisiwe abalilayo! ngoba bona bazaduduzwa.
— Mathewu 5:4

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Ukulila: Igama lesiShayina
Ukuphimisela: āi tòng
Incazelo: Kudabukisa kakhulu, kudabukisa kakhulu.
Umthombo: "Incwadi Yobukhosi BakaHan Kamuva · Ji Zun Zhuan":"Umshayeli wenqola wafika ezombona egqoke izingubo ezingenalutho, embuka futhi ekhala futhi elila.

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

khala : ukulila, ukulila, ukukhala, ukudabukisa, ukudabukisa → njengokuthi "ukwesaba ukufa", "ukwesaba ukulahlekelwa", ukukhala, ukukhala, ukudabuka nokudabuka ngezihlobo ezilahlekile.

USara waphila waze waba neminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amabili nesikhombisa, iminyaka yokuphila kukaSara. USara wafa eKiriyati Araba, eyiHebroni, ezweni laseKhanani. U-Abrahama wamlilela, wamkhalela. Bheka kuGenesise Isahluko 23 Amavesi 1-2

buza: Uma othile elilela “inja,” ingabe lokhu kuyisibusiso?
impendulo: Cha!

buza: Ngale ndlela, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “ khala Kusho ukuthini ukuthi "Babusisiwe abantu!"
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(Babusisiwe abaphuthelwa, abalilayo, nabadabukileyo ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu, nabashisekela ivangeli)

(1) UJesu ulilela iJerusalema

“Jerusalema, Jerusalema, wena obulala abaprofethi, okhanda ngamatshe abathunywe kuwe; indlu ishiywe kini, ngithi kini: Anisayikungibona kusukela manje, nize nithi: 'Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi.'

(2) UJesu wakhala izinyembezi lapho ebona abantu bengakholelwa emandleni kaNkulunkulu okuvusa.

Lapho uMariya efika kuJesu futhi embona, wawa phansi ezinyaweni zakhe wathi: "Nkosi, ukuba ubukhona, umfowethu ngabe akafanga." Babubula ezinhliziyweni zabo, bekhathazekile, babuza bathi: "Nimbekephi na?" UJesu wakhala . Johane 11:32-35

(3) UKristu wakhala kakhulu futhi wathandazela izono zethu ngezinyembezi, enxusa uBaba waseZulwini ukuba asithethelele izono zethu ezinkulu.

Ngenkathi uKristu esenyameni, waba nezwi elikhulu khala , wakhuleka ngezinyembezi eNkosini eyayingamsindisa ekufeni, futhi yaphendulwa ngenxa yokuzinikela kwakhe. Bheka kumaHeberu 5:7

(4) UPetru wayiphika iNkosi kathathu, wakhala kamunyu

UPetru wakhumbula amazwi kaJesu: “Ngaphambi kokuba iqhude likhale, uzongiphika kathathu.” akhale kamunyu . Mathewu 26:75

(5) Abafundi balilela ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni

Ekuseni ngovivi ngosuku lokuqala lwesonto, uJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi okokuqala wabonakala kuMariya Magdalena (lowo uJesu akhipha kuye amademoni ayisikhombisa).
Waya wabikela abantu ababemlandela uJesu; lusizi nikhale . Bezwa ukuthi uJesu uyaphila nokuthi ubonwe nguMariya, kodwa abakholwanga. Marku 16:9-11

(6) Ibandla laseKorinte lashushiswa ngenxa kaPawulu! Akukho, ukulila kanye nomdlandla

Nasekufikeni kwethu eMakedoniya, asibanga nakuthula emizimbeni yethu, sizungezwe izinsizi, kukhona izimpi ngaphandle, nokwesaba phakathi. Kodwa uNkulunkulu oduduza abadanileyo, wasiduduza ngokufika kukaThithu, kungeyisikho ngokufika kwakhe kuphela, kodwa langenduduzo ayithola kini, ngoba uniduduzile; khala , kanye nentshiseko ngami, konke kwangitshela futhi kwangenza ngajabula nakakhulu. 2 Korinte 7:5-7

(7) Dabukisa, ukhale, futhi uphenduke ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu

ngoba Ubuhlungu ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu , okuveza ukuzisola ngaphandle kokuzisola, okuholela ekusindisweni; Uyabona, lapho udabukile ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu, uzozala inkuthalo, ukukhononda, ukuzizonda, ukwesaba, ukulangazelela, umdlandla, nokujeziswa (noma ukuhumusha: ukuzigxeka). Kuzo zonke lezi zinto nizibonakalise nihlanzekile.
2 Korinte 7:10-11

ukulila incazelo:

1 Kepha ukudabuka kwezwe, ukulila, ukukhala, nokudabuka kwenhliziyo kuyabulala abantu. .

(Isibonelo, abathandi bezinja namakati, abanye abantu "balila" ngemuva kokulahlekelwa yinja noma ikati, abanye baze bakhale futhi bakhale ngokufa "kwengulube", futhi izwe likhala kabuhlungu ngokugula noma lonke uhlobo losizi nokudabuka Loluhlobo “lokuzila”, ukukhala, usizi, nokuphelelwa ithemba kubulala abantu ngoba abakholelwa kuJesu Kristu njengomsindisi.

2 Babusisiwe abadabukileyo, baphenduke, futhi bakhale ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu

Ngokwesibonelo, eTestamenteni Elidala, u-Abrahama walilela ukufa kukaSara, uDavide waphenduka phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngenxa yezono zakhe, uNehemiya wahlala phansi wakhala izinyembezi lapho kubhidlizwa izindonga zaseJerusalema, umthelisi wathandazela ukuphenduka, uPetru wamphika kathathu uJehova. sakhala kabuhlungu, noKristu ngezono zethu Bekhuleka bekhala kakhulu becela intethelelo kaBaba, abafundi balilela ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni. , ibandla laseKorinte liyaphuthelwa, liyalila, futhi liyashisekela ukushushiswa kukaPawulu, ukuhlupheka kwamaKristu enyameni emhlabeni, ukukhuleka kuBaba oseZulwini nokulila, ukukhala, nokudabuka, kanye nemizwa yamaKristu ngezihlobo zabo, abangani, abafunda nabo, futhi ozakwabo ababazungezile, njll. Labo abalindile nabo bayoba lusizi futhi badabuke ngoba abakholelwa ukuthi uJesu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi unokuphila okuphakade. Bonke laba bantu bakholelwa kuNkulunkulu nakuJesu Kristu! “Ukulila” kwabo kubusisiwe. Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Babusisiwe abalilayo →→ Babusisiwe abadabukileyo, abaphendukayo, abalilayo, nabakhala ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu, bayakududuzwa ngale ndlela?

buza: " khala " Iyiphi induduzo abantu abayitholayo?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Inceku eyayigqilazwe impilo yayo yonke ngenxa yokwesaba ukufa yakhululwa

Ngokuba njengoba abantwana behlanganyela igazi nenyama, naye ngokunjalo wagqoka inyama negazi, ukuze ngokufa ambhubhise yena onamandla okufa onguSathane, abakhulule ababegqilazwe kukho konke ukuphila kwabo. ukuze (isono) ngokwesaba ukufa. Hebheru 2:14-15

(2) UKristu uyasisindisa

INdodana yoMuntu yeza ukuzofuna nokusindisa okulahlekile. Bheka kuLuka isahluko 19 ivesi 10

(3) Ukukhululwa emthethweni wesono nokufa

Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. KwabaseRoma 8:2

(4) Kholwa kuJesu, usindiswe, ube nokuphila okuphakade

Nginilobela lezi zinto nina enikholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade.

( Kuphela uma unokuphila okuphakade lapho ungathola khona induduzo Uma ungenayo induduzo yokuphila okuphakade, ungayitholaphi? Ingabe uqinisile? )-Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 5 Ivesi 13

Ihubo: Ngabethelwa kanye noKristu

Umbhalo wevangeli!

Ivela: Bafowethu nodade beBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu!

articles.title: Babusisiwe abampofu emoyeni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
UJesu ebona isixuku wakhuphukela entabeni, futhi lapho esehlezi phansi, futhi abafundi bakhe beza kuye, wavula umlomo wakhe, wabafundisa, wathi:

" Babusisiwe abampofu emoyeni; Ngoba umbuso wezulu ungowabo. — Mathewu 5:1-3

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia

Igama lesiShayina: nesizotha
Igama langaphandle: onomqondo ovulekile;othobekile
I-Pinyin: hawu xīn

Qaphela: Kusho ukungazitheli ngabandayo noma ukuzikhukhumeza.
Amazwi afanayo: agodliwe, anesizotha, anesizotha, ahloniphekile, athobekile.

Isibonelo, yakha umusho: Ukunganaki futhi ukwazi ukwamukela imibono yabanye abantu.
Kuphela ngokufunda "ngokuthobeka" nokucela izeluleko kwabanye lapho singathuthuka khona ngokuqhubekayo.

( 1 ) Lapho uthuthuka futhi uzuza ulwazi, imfundo, ingcebo, isikhundla, nodumo, uyokhukhumala, uzikhukhumeze, uzikhukhumeze futhi uzigqaje, futhi uyoba inkosi yakho futhi uyone.
( 2 ) Kukhona futhi uhlobo lomuntu “olubonisa ukuthobeka” ngokuzithoba → Le mithetho yenza abantu bakhulekele egameni lokuhlakanipha, bakhulekele ngasese, babonise ukuthobeka, futhi baphathe imizimba yabo ngokhahlo, kodwa empeleni ayinawo umphumela ekunqandeni inkanuko. inyama. Kolose 2:23

Ngakho-ke, okungenhla " ngokuzithoba "Labo abanegama lokuhlakanipha ababusisiwe → kodwa maye. Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: "Lapho abantu bekhuluma okuhle ngawe, maye kini. Uyaqonda? Bheka uLuka 6:26

buza: Ngale ndlela, obani iNkosi uJesu ebhekisela kubo ‘njengabampofu emoyeni’?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli

Ukuthobeka: kubhekisela encazelweni yobumpofu.
Thobeka: kubuye kusho ubumpofu.

“Zonke lezi zinto zenziwe yizandla zami,” usho uJehova, “kodwa lezi yizinto engizinakile. ngokuzithoba (Umbhalo wokuqala uthi ubumpofu ) abadabukileyo nabathuthumela ngamazwi ami. Bheka ku-Isaya isahluko 66 ivesi 2

UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba uJehova ungigcobile ukuba ngishumayele izindaba ezinhle ezithobekile umuntu (noma ukuhumusha: Shumayela ivangeli kwabampofu )--Bheka u-Isaya 61:1 noLuka 4:18

buza: Isiphi isibusiso esikhona kwabampofu emoyeni?
impendulo: ukuphenduka ( incwadi ) IVangeli → Ukuzalwa kabusha, insindiso.

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ( Johane 3:5 )
2 Bazalwa eqinisweni levangeli ( 1 Korinte 4:15 )
3 Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu! ( Johane 1:12-13 )

uzalwe kabusha ( Omusha ) bangangena embusweni weZulu, futhi uMbuso weZulu ungowabo. Ngakho, uyaqonda? — Johane 3:5-7

Ukuba mpofu emoyeni kusho ukungabi nalutho, ukuba mpofu, ukungabi nalutho, cha mina (uJehova kuphela osenhliziyweni yakho) Amen!

uLazaru umnxibi: ezulwini

“Kwakukhona umuntu othile ocebile owayegqoka ezibubende nelineni elicolekileyo futhi ephila ngokunethezeka nsuku zonke futhi kwakukhona isinxibi esithile, uLazaru, sigcwele izilonda, sishiywa emnyango wesicebi ukuba sidle imvuthuluka eyayinezilonda. wawa etafuleni lesicebi, izinja zafika zakhotha izilonda zaso.

Isicebi: Ukuhlushwa eHayidesi

Nesicebi safa, sangcwatshwa. Esebuhlungwini eHayidese, waphakamisa amehlo akhe, wabona u-Abrahama ekude, noLazaru egone. Bheka uLuka 16:19-23

buza: " ngokuzithoba “Babusisiwe abantu, yiziphi izici zabo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Guqula isimo somntwana
INkosi yathi, “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi niphenduke nibe njengabantwana abancane, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu

(2)Zithobe njengengane
Ngakho-ke, yilowo nalowo ozithoba njengalo mntwana uyakuba mkhulu embusweni wezulu. Mathewu 18:4

(3)Phenduka ukholwe evangelini
INkosi uJesu yathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Korinte 15:3-4 Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu ashumayela kwabeZizwe. Ivangeli lensindiso ) Engakudlulisela kini kwakuyilokhu: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo .

1 (Ukholo) uKristu uyasikhulula esonweni —Bheka amaRoma 6:6-7
2 (Ukholo) uKristu uyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo —Bheka amaRoma 7:6 no-Gal 3:13

Futhi wangcwatshwa;
3 (Ukholo) UKristu usenza sikhumule umuntu omdala nokuziphatha kwakhe —Bheka amaKhol. 3:9

Futhi ngokweBhayibheli, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu!
4 (Ukholo) Ukuvuka kukaKristu kuwukulungisiswa kwethu! Lokho (ukholo) ukuthi siyavuswa, sizalwa kabusha, samukelwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu, sisindisiwe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade kanye noKristu! Amen —Bheka amaRoma 4:25

(4) "Zithulule" Akukho wena, kuphela iNkosi

Njengoba uPawulu asho:
Ngabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu
Akuseyimi engiphila manje !

Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; Bheka kwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 2 Ivesi 20

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Babusisiwe abampofu emoyeni, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabo;

Ihubo: INkosi iyindlela
