articles.title: Izulu Elisha Nomhlaba Omusha
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 21 ivesi 1 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngase ngibona izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye 《 izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha 》 Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” eNkosini uJesu Kristu ibandla Ukuthuma izisebenzi: ngelizwi leqiniso elilotshiweyo lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, lenkazimulo, lokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen.

Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabaqonde izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha okulungiselelwe iNkosi uJesu! YiJerusalema Elisha ezulwini, ikhaya laphakade! Amen . Le mithandazo engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 21:1] Ngaphinda ngabona izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha , ngokuba izulu lokuqala nomhlaba kudlulile, nolwandle alusekho.

buza: Iliphi izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha uJohane akubona?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1)Izulu nomhlaba kwangaphambili kudlulile

buza: Lisho ukuthini izulu nomhlaba odlule?
impendulo: " umhlaba odlule Yilokho uNkulunkulu akusho kuGenesise ( Izinsuku eziyisithupha zokusebenza izulu nomhlaba kwadalelwa u-Adamu nenzalo yakhe, ngoba ( U-Adamu ) waphula umthetho wawona wawa, nezulu nomhlaba lapho umhlaba nesintu kwaqalekiswa khona kudlulile akusekho.

(2)Ulwandle alusekho

buza: Bekungaba yizwe elinjani uma ulwandle lungasekho?
impendulo: " umbuso kaNkulunkulu " Izwe likamoya!

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Kumelwe nizalwe ngokusha”. 1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 Ivangeli leqiniso liyazalwa, 3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu →( incwadi )Ivangeli! Abasanda kuzalwa kuphela abangangena【 umbuso kaNkulunkulu 】Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Embusweni kaNkulunkulu, abantu ) kuzokwenzekani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UNkulunkulu uyosula zonke izinyembezi emehlweni abo ,
2 Ukufa akusekho.
3 Akusayikuba khona ukulila loba ukukhala loba ubuhlungu.
4 Ngeke kusaba nokoma noma ukulamba,
5 Ngeke kusaba khona iziqalekiso.

Azisekho iziqalekiso Isihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu neseWundlu sisemzini, nezinceku zakhe ziyakumkhonza ( IsAmbulo 22:3 )

(3) Yonke into ibuyekeziwe

Ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi wathi: bheka, ngenza konke kube kusha; ! Wathi: “Loba, ngokuba lawa mazwi athembekile, aqinisile.

Wathi kimi futhi: "Sekwenzekile!" Mina ngingu-Alfa no-Omega; ngiyakumnika amanzi omthombo wokuphila ngesihle kowomileyo ukuba aphuze. onqobayo , iyakudla ifa lalezi zinto: ngiyakuba nguNkulunkulu wayo, yona ibe yindodana yami. ( IsAmbulo 21:5-7 )

2. Umuzi oNgcwele wehla uvela ezulwini kuNkulunkulu

(1) Umuzi ongcwele, iJerusalema Elisha, wehla uvela ezulwini kuNkulunkulu

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 21:2] Ngaphinda ngabona Umuzi oNgcwele, iJerusalema Elisha, wehla uvela kuNkulunkulu ezulwini , elungisiwe njengomlobokazi ehlotshiselwe umyeni wakhe.

(2) Itabernakele likaNkulunkulu lisemhlabeni

Ngezwa izwi elikhulu livela esihlalweni sobukhosi lithi: bheka, itabernakele likaNkulunkulu lisemhlabeni; .

(3) UNkulunkulu ufuna ukuhlala nathi

Uyohlala nabo, futhi bayoba abantu bakhe. UNkulunkulu uyoba nabo mathupha , abe unkulunkulu wabo. ( IsAmbulo 21:3 )

3. IJerusalema Elisha

Isambulo [Isahluko 21:9-10] Enye yezingelosi eziyisikhombisa ezazinezitsha zegolide eziyisikhombisa ezigcwele izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa zokugcina yeza kimi, yathi: “Woza lapha, futhi ngizokwenza. umakoti ,leyo Umfazi WeWundlu , ngikubonise. “Ngaqhutshwa nguMoya oNgcwele, ingelosi yangithatha yangiyisa entabeni ende ukuze ngishumayele izwi likaNkulunkulu, Umuzi ongcwele iJerusalema wehla uvela esibhakabhakeni ngifundise.

buza: Lisho ukuthini iJerusalema Elisha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UMlobokazi kaKristu!
2 UmkaWundlu!
3 Ukuphila Okuphakade Indlu kaNkulunkulu!
4 Itabernakele likaNkulunkulu!
5 IBandla likaJesu Kristu!
6 IJerusalema Elisha!
7 Indlu yabo bonke abangcwele.
Endlini kaBaba kukhona izindawo zokuhlala eziningi Uma kungenjalo, ngabe senginitshelile. ngiya ukunilungisela indawo. Uma ngiya nginilungisela indawo, ngobuye ngize, nginithathele kimi, ukuze lapho ngikhona nani nibe khona. Inkomba ( Johane 14:2-3 )

buza: UMlobokazi kaKristu, uMfazi weWundlu, Indlu kaNkulunkulu Ophilayo, iBandla likaJesu Kristu, itabernakele likaNkulunkulu, iJerusalema Elisha, iDolobha Elingcwele ( Isigodlo Somoya ) Yakhiwa kanjani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( 1 ) UJesu ngokwakhe uyitshe legumbi eliyinhloko (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 2:6-7.)
( 2 ) Abangcwele bakha umzimba kaKristu ( Efesu 4:12 )
( 3 ) Singamalungu omzimba wakhe ( Efesu 5:30 )
( 4 ) Sifana namatshe aphilayo ( 1 Petru 2:5 )
( 5 ) elakhiwe njengesigodlo esingokomoya ( 1 Petru 2:5 )
( 6 ) Yiba yithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele ( 1 Korinte 6:19 )
( 7 ) Phila ebandleni likaNkulunkulu ophilayo ( 1 Thimothewu 3:15 )
( 8 ) Abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu bayisisekelo ( IsAmbulo 21:14 )
( 9 ) Izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli ngamasango ayishumi nambili (Funda isAmbulo 21:12.)
( 10 ) Kunezingelosi eziyishumi nambili emnyango (Funda isAmbulo 21:12.)
( 11 ) Yakhiwe egameni labaprofethi ( Efesu 2:20 )
( 12 ) amagama abangcwele ( Efesu 2:20 )
( 13 ) Ithempeli lomuzi yiNkosi uNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke neWundlu ( IsAmbulo 21:22 )
( 14 ) Asikho isidingo sokuba ilanga noma inyanga zikhanyise edolobheni ( IsAmbulo 21:23 )
( 18 ) Ngoba inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu iyakhanya (Funda isAmbulo 21:23.)
( 19 ) NeWundlu liyisibani somuzi ( IsAmbulo 21:23 )
( 20 ) akusekho busuku (Funda isAmbulo 21:25.)
( amashumi amabili nanye ) Ezitaladini zomuzi kukhona umfula wamanzi okuphila ( IsAmbulo 22:1 )
( amashumi amabili nambili ) Gcobani esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu neseWundlu ( IsAmbulo 22:1 )
( amashumi amabili nantathu ) ngapha nangapha komfula kukhona umuthi wokuphila ( IsAmbulo 22:2 )
( amashumi amabili nane ) Umuthi wokuphila uthela izithelo eziyishumi nambili inyanga ngayinye! Amen.

Qaphela: " Umlobokazi kaKristu, uMfazi weWundlu, Indlu kaNkulunkulu Ophilayo, IBandla likaJesu Kristu, itabernakele likaNkulunkulu, iJerusalema Elisha, Idolobha Elingcwele "Yakhiwe ngu uKrestu Jesu okwe itshe legumbi , siza phambi kukaNkulunkulu njenga phila idwala , singamalungu omzimba wakhe, yilowo nalowo wenza owakhe umsebenzi wokwakha umzimba kaKristu, oxhumene nenhloko kaKristu, umzimba wonke (okungukuthi, ibandla) uxhumene futhi ufanelana naye, uzakha othandweni; yakhiwe yaba isigodlo sikamoya, futhi iba ithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele→ →Indlu kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, iBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu, uMlobokazi kaKristu, uMfazi weWundlu, iJerusalema Elisha. Leli yidolobha lethu laphakade , ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: " angifuni Zibekeleni ingcebo emhlabeni; ukulunywa yizimbungulu ,ukwazi Okugqwalile , akhona namasela amba imigodi azoyintshontsha. uma kuphele Zibekeleni ingcebo ezulwini, lapho inundu nokugqwala kungoni, nalapho amasela engagqekezi khona, ebe. Ngokuba lapho kukhona ingcebo yakho, nenhliziyo yakho iyakuba lapho. ”→→Ngezinsuku zokugcina wena Hhayi ukushumayela ivangeli, wena Ngeke futhi amagugu.esiliva.egolide noma umcebo ukusekela Ivangeli umsebenzi ongcwele, ukusekela Izinceku nezisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu! Zibekeleni ingcebo ezulwini . Lapho umzimba wakho ubuyela othulini futhi ingcebo yakho yasemhlabeni ingasuswa, ikhaya lakho laphakade liyoceba kangakanani esikhathini esizayo? Umzimba wakho ungavuswa kanjani ngobuhle kakhulu? Ingabe uqinisile? ( Mathewu 6:19-21 )

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa! Kodwa anginalo ukholo olwanele Ngicela usize iNkosi

Ngashukunyiswa uMoya oNgcwele, ingelosi yangithatha yangiyisa entabeni ende, yangibonisa umuzi ongcwele, iJerusalema, owehla uvela ezulwini kuNkulunkulu. Inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu yayisemzini; Kwakukhona ugange olude olunamasango ayishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kukhona izingelosi eziyishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kwakulotshwe amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli. Kukhona amasango amathathu ngasempumalanga, amasango amathathu ngasenyakatho, amasango amathathu ngaseningizimu, nangasentshonalanga amasango amathathu. Ugange lomuzi lunezisekelo eziyishumi nambili, naphezu kwezisekelo kukhona amagama abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu. Lowo owakhuluma nami wayephethe umhlanga wegolide njengombusi ( Qaphela: " Umhlanga wegolide njengombusi "Linganise umKristu iyasetshenziswa igolide , isiliva , itshe eliyigugu Bekezela? Usasebenzisa izimila , utshani Kuthiwani ngesakhiwo esingokoqobo? , ngakho, uyaqonda? ), linganisa umuzi namasango awo nezindonga zawo. Umuzi uyisikwele, ubude nobubanzi bawo kuyafana. Izulu lasebenzisa umhlanga ukukala umuzi; Amamayela ayizinkulungwane ezine esewonke , ubude, nobubanzi, nokuphakama konke kwakufana; Ikhulu namashumi amane nane indololwane.

Izingange zejaspi, umuzi uyigolide elicwengekileyo, njengengilazi ekhanyayo. Izisekelo zogange lomuzi zazihlotshiswe ngamatshe ayigugu ahlukahlukeneyo: isisekelo sokuqala sasiyitshe lesafire; Eyesishiyagalombili yayiyikrisolite ebomvu; Amasango ayishumi nambili angamaparele ayishumi nambili, futhi isango ngalinye liyiparele. Izitaladi zomuzi zaziyigolide elicwengekileyo, njengengilazi ekhanyayo. Angibonanga ithempeli emzini, ngokuba iNkosi uNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke neWundlu bayithempeli lawo. Umuzi awudingi ilanga nenyanga ukuwukhanyisa, ngokuba inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu iyawukhanyisa, nesibani sawo iWundlu. Izizwe ziyakuhamba ekukhanyeni kwawo, namakhosi omhlaba ayakumnika lowo muzi. Amasango omuzi awavalwa emini, abukho ubusuku lapho. Abantu bayonika lowo muzi inkazimulo nodumo lwezizwe. “Akuyikungena emzini ongcolileyo, noma owenza izinengiso noma wamanga; kuphela igama elotshwe ewundluneni incwadi yokuphila Abaphezulu kuphela okumele bangene. . ( IsAmbulo 21:10-27 )

Ingelosi yangikhombisa futhi lokho emigwaqweni yomuzi umfula wamanzi aphilayo , ucwebezela njengekristalu, ugeleza uvela esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu neseWundlu. ngapha nangapha komfula kukhona umuthi wokuphila , Thelani izithelo eziyishumi nambili, nithele izithelo njalo ngenyanga Amaqabunga esihlahleni angawokwelapha izizwe zonke. Akusayikuba khona isiqalekiso, ngokuba isihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu neseWundlu sisemzini; Igama lakhe liyobhalwa emabunzini abo. Akusekho busuku; Ngeke basebenzise izibani noma ukukhanya kwelanga, ngoba uJehova uNkulunkulu uyobakhanyisela . Bayobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade . Yayisithi kimi ingelosi: “Lawo mazwi ayiqiniso, athembekile; uJehova uNkulunkulu wemimoya yabaprofethi uthumile ingelosi yakhe ukuba ibonise izinceku zayo okumelwe zenzeke masinyane. bheka, ngiyeza masinyane; Babusisiwe abagcina iziprofetho kule ncwadi! ( IsAmbulo 22:1-7 )

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli kusuka
ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Ukwabelana ngombhalo, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu Izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenza ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu.

Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila ! Amen.

→ Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho ngoPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, Amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila . Amen!

Ihubo: UJesu unqobile Ngaye singena ekhaya laphakade

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Isigwebo Sosuku Lwembubhiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 20 amavesi 12-13 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila.

Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo. Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isigwebo Sosuku Lwembubhiso" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen.

Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” eNkosini uJesu Kristu ibandla Ukuthuma izisebenzi: ngelizwi leqiniso elilotshiweyo lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, lenkazimulo, lokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen.

Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabaqonde ukuthi “izincwadi zavulwa,” nolwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

♦ isahlulelo sosuku lwembubhiso ♦

1. Isihlalo sobukhosi esikhulu esimhlophe

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 20:11] Ngaphinda ngabona Isihlalo sobukhosi esikhulu esimhlophe esihlezi phezu kwaso ;Izulu nomhlaba kubalekile ebusweni bakhe, ayisekho indawo engabonwa.

buza: Ubani ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi esikhulu esimhlophe?
impendulo: INkosi uJesu Kristu!

Ebukhoneni beNkosi, izulu nomhlaba ngeke kuphunyuke emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, futhi akukho ndawo engabonwa.

2. Izihlalo zobukhosi eziningana

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 20:4] Ngaphinda ngabona izihlalo zobukhosi eziningana , kukhona nabahleli phezu kwayo...!

buza: Ubani ohlezi ezihlalweni zobukhosi eziningana?
impendulo: Bangcwele ababuse noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane!

Okwesithathu: Ohlezi esihlalweni unegunya lokwahlulela

buza: Ubani onegunya lokwahlulela?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( 1 ) INkosi uJesu Kristu inegunya lokwahlulela

UYise akahluleli muntu, kepha unike iNdodana konke ukwahlulela... Ngokuba njengalokhu uYise enokuphila ngokwakhe, kanjalo unikile ukuthi neNdodana ibe nokuphila ngokwayo; wamnika igunya lokwahlulela . ( Johane 5:22, 26-27 )

( 2 ) Millennium ( uvuko lokuqala ) unegunya lokwahlulela

buza: Obani abayovuswa okokuqala ngqá phakathi nenkulungwane yeminyaka?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Imiphefumulo yalabo abanqunywa amakhanda ngenxa yokufakaza ngoJesu nangenxa yeZwi likaNkulunkulu ,
2 nalabo abangakhulekanga kuso isilo nomfanekiso waso ,
3 noma imiphefumulo yalabo abathole uphawu lwakhe emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo , Bavusiwe bonke!

Ngase ngibona izihlalo zobukhosi, nabantu behlezi phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokwahlulela. Ngabona ukuvuka kwemiphefumulo yalabo ababenqunywe amakhanda ngenxa yobufakazi babo ngoJesu nangenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu, nalabo ababengazange basikhulekele isilo nomfanekiso waso, noma ababengamukelanga uphawu emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo. . futhi babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. Lokhu kungukuvuka kokuqala. ( Abanye abafileyo abakavuswa , ize iphele iminyaka eyinkulungwane. ( IsAmbulo 20:4-5 )

(3) Abangcwele banegunya lokwahlulela

Awazi Abangcwele bayakwahlulela izwe na? Uma izwe lahlulelwa yinina, anifanele ukwahlulela nokuncane lokhu na? ( 1 Korinte 6:2 )

4. UNkulunkulu wahlulela izwe ngokulunga

【 wamisa isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sokwahlulela 】

Kepha uJehova uhlezi eyinkosi kuze kube phakade; ( IHubo 9:7 )

【 Yahlulelani izwe ngokulunga 】

Uyakwahlulela izwe ngokulunga, ahlulele abantu ngobuqotho. ( IHubo 9:8 )

【 ukwahlulela ngobuqotho 】

ngizakwahlulela ngobuqotho ngesikhathi esimisiweyo. ( IHubo 75:2 )

buza: UNkulunkulu uzahlulela kanjani zonke izizwe ngokulunga, ngobuqotho, nangokwahlulela?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ungahluleli ngalokho okubona ngamehlo akho, ungahluleli ngalokho okuzwa ngezindlebe zakho

UMoya kaJehova uyakuba phezu kwakhe, uMoya wokuhlakanipha nowokuqonda, uMoya weseluleko nowamandla, umoya wolwazi nowokumesaba uJehova. Uyakuthokoza ngokumesaba uJehova; Ungahluleli ngalokho okubona ngamehlo akho, ungahluleli ngalokho okuzwa ngezindlebe zakho ;Inkomba (Isaya Isahluko 11 Amavesi 2-3)

buza: Ukwahlulela akusekelwe ekuboneni, ezenzweni noma ekuzweni. Kulokhu, uNkulunkulu ukhipha isahlulelo ngasiphi isisekelo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(2) UNkulunkulu uzokhanya iqiniso icala

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:2] Siyabazi abenza lokhu: UNkulunkulu uyomahlulela ngokweqiniso .

buza: Liyini iqiniso?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso —1 Johane 5:7
2 Umoya weqiniso — Johane 14:16-17
3 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya — Johane 3:5-7

Qaphela: Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha kuphela ongangena embusweni kaNkulunkulu,” umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ” → ngoMoya oNgcwele enhliziyweni vuselela --Labo abaphikelela ekwenzeni okuhle futhi befuna inkazimulo nodumo nezibusiso ezingapheli; UNkulunkulu uzokunika ukuphila okuphakade ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
(You you shall not judge) Siyabazi abenza lokhu; UNkulunkulu uzokhanya iqiniso umahlulele . Niyabahlulela abenza okunjalo, kepha nina nithi ningababalekela ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu na? …Uyovuza wonke umuntu ngokwezenzo zakhe. Kulabo abaphikelela ezenzweni ezinhle, befuna inkazimulo nodumo nokungabhubhi, babuyisele ukuphila okuphakade; 2) 2-3 izigaba, 6-8 izigaba)

(3) Ngokuvumelana ne IVangeli likaJesu Kristu icala

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:16] uNkulunkulu ngoJesu Kristu Usuku lokwahlulelwa kwezimfihlo zabantu , ngokuvumelana ne ivangeli lami kusho.

buza: Luyini Usuku Lokwahlulela Lwezinto Eziyimfihlo?
impendulo: " imfihlo "Kufihliwe, yilokho abanye abantu abangakwazi → sizalwa kabusha" Omusha “Ukuphila kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu; Usuku lwezimfihlo ” ukwahlulela okukhulu kosuku lokugcina → ngokwevangeli lami ( → uPaul ) ukwahlulelwa kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu elishunyayelwa nguMoya oNgcwele. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

mina( uPaul ) engazamukela ngadlulisela kini: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu ngokwemiBhalo,

wafa ngenxa yezono zethu ( 1 " incwadi " Ukhululekile esonweni, ukhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho ),

Futhi wangcwatshwa ( 2 " incwadi " Hlukanisa ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo ); futhi ngokweBhayibheli,

Wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ( 3 " incwadi " Sizalwa kabusha ngokuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo, kusenza silungisiswe, sizalwe kabusha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen . (1 Korinte 15:3-4).

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. noma Ukuhunyushwa: Yahlulelani izwe elingezansi), ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye, labo abangakholwa, sebevele balahliwe, ngokuba bengakholwa egameni likaNkulunkulu iNdodana ezelwe yodwa! igama likaJesu 】Kunjalo→→ 1 ukuze nikhululwe esonweni, nasemthethweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho; 2 Hlukanisa ikhehla nemikhuba yalo, 3 Ukuze ulungisiswe, uvuswe, uzalwe kabusha, usindiswe, futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade! Amen! Labo abakholelwa kuye → wena( incwadi ) Ukufa kukaKristu esiphambanweni - kukukhulule esonweni → wena ( kholwani ) ngeke agwetshwe; abantu abangakholwa , Icala selinqunyiwe . Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( Johane 3:16-18 )

(4) Ngokuvumelana ne lokho uJesu akushumayela icala

NgokukaJohane Isahluko 12:48 (UJesu wathi) Lowo ongalayo futhi ongawamukeli amazwi ami unomahluleli; intshumayelo yami Uyakwahlulelwa ngosuku lokugcina.

1 indlela yokuphila

buza: Lokho uJesu akushumayela!
→→Iyini iTao?
impendulo: " umgwaqo "UNkulunkulu!" umgwaqo "Ukuba yinyama" unkulunkulu ” waba inyama →→ Igama lakhe nguJesu ! Amen.

Amazwi nokushumayela kukaJesu →→angumoya, ukuphila, nokukhanya kokuphila komuntu! Abantu mabazuze ukuphila, bathole ukuphila okuphakade, bazuze isinkwa sokuphila, futhi bathole ukukhanya kokuphila kuKristu! Amen . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayekuNkulunkulu, IZwi linguNkulunkulu . ...Kuye kwakukhona ukuphila, futhi lokhu kuphila kwakuwukukhanya kwabantu. … ULizwi waba yinyama , uhlala phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. Isikhombo (Johane 1:1,4,14)

UJesu waphinda wathi esixukwini: Mina ngingukukhanya kwezwe. Ongilandelayo kasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uzakuba lokukhanya kwempilo . ’ (Johane 8:12)

2 Labo abamukela uJesu bangabantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu

Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa ebizweni lakhe. Banjalo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, nangentando yomuntu; ozelwe nguNkulunkulu . Inkomba ( Johane 1:12-13 )

(5) Ngaphansi komthetho, ukwahlulelwa ngokwalokho okwenziwa ngaphansi komthetho

KwabaseRoma [Isahluko 2:12] Bonke abonile bengenamthetho, bayakubhubha kanjalo ngaphandle komthetho; Noma ubani owona ngaphansi komthetho uyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho .

buza: Kuyini ukungabi khona komthetho?
impendulo: " akukho mthetho "leyo ngaphandle komthetho →Ngomzimba kaKristu, sifa kuwo umthetho osibophayo, Manje senikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo —Izikhombo (Roma 7:4-6)
→→Uma nikhululekile emthethweni, aniyikwahlulelwa ngokomthetho . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Siyini isono ngaphansi komthetho?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Angizimisele ukuboleka ( UKristu ) umuntu okhululekile emthethweni — Roma 7:4-6
2 Noma ngubani ophila ngomthetho --Engeza isahluko 3 ivesi 10
3 Labo abagcina umthetho futhi befuna ukulungisiswa ngomthetho ;
4 Lowo owile emseni --Engeza isahluko 5, ivesi 4.

【 xwayisa 】
Njengoba laba bantu bengazimisele ukukhululeka emthethweni, bangaphansi komthetho → ngokusekelwe ekusebenzeni komthetho, labo abalungisiswa ngumthetho, labo abaphula umthetho, nalabo abaphula umthetho → uyokwahlulelwa ngokwezenzo zakhe ngaphansi komthetho . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Namuhla abaningi abadala bebandla, abefundisi noma abashumayeli bakufundisa ukugcina umthetho futhi abazimisele ukuwuwephula ( UKristu ) bakhululwa emthethweni, futhi uNkulunkulu wabanika njengokusho kwabo ( ngaphansi komthetho ), kufanele ulandise ngakho konke okwenzile → Bonke bahlulelwa ngokwemisebenzi yabo . ( Mathewu 12:36-37 )

Bayawazi umthetho, bephula umthetho, benza amacala, basafuna ukuhlala esihlalweni bahlulele abanye? Ukwahlulela izoni? Ukwahlulelwa kwabaphilayo nabafileyo? Ukwahlulelwa kwezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli? Ingelosi yokwahlulela? Labo abafundisa amanga akufanele babe namaphupho amnandi bona ngokwabo bagcina umthetho futhi baphule umthetho futhi bonile, futhi bawile emseni. Uthi, akunjalo?

(6) Yilowo nalowo uyokwahlulelwa ngokwalokho akwenzile ngaphansi komthetho

buza: Abafileyo bayokwahlulelwa ngasiphi isisekelo?
impendulo: balandele ukwenza ngaphansi komthetho lokwahlulelwa.

buza: Ingabe abafileyo banemizimba yenyama?
impendulo: " umuntu ofile "Abanayo imizimba yenyama, futhi ngenxa yokuthi abazi ukuthi yimaphi amagama abangawachaza, bangabizwa kuphela " efile "

buza: " umuntu ofile "Kusuka kuphi?"
impendulo: Ukhululwe olwandle, ithuna, ukufa neHayidesi, ijele lomphefumulo . ( 1 Petru 3:19 )

Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo. Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; Bonke bahlulelwa ngokwemisebenzi yabo . ( IsAmbulo 20:12-13 )

(7) Abangcwele bayokwahlulela umhlaba

Awazi Abangcwele bayakwahlulela izwe na? ? Uma izwe lahlulelwa yinina, anifanele ukwahlulela nokuncane lokhu na? ( 1 Korinte 6:2 )

(8) Ukwahlulelwa kwezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli iqembu

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nina eningilandelayo, nxa iNdodana yomuntu isihlezi esihlalweni sayo senkazimulo ekubuyiselweni kwayo, nani niyakuhlala ezihlalweni zobukhosi eziyishumi nambili, Ukwahlulelwa Kwezizwe Eziyishumi Nambili Zakwa-Israyeli . ( Mathewu 19:28 )

(9) Ukwahlulelwa kwabafileyo nabaphilayo

Wasiyala ukuba sishumayele kubantu, sifakazele ukuthi umiswe nguNkulunkulu; ukuze ngibe ngumahluleli wabaphilayo labafileyo . Inkomba ( IzEnzo 10:42 )

(10) Ukwahlulelwa kwezingelosi eziwile

Awazi Siyazahlulela yini izingelosi? ? Kakhulu kangakanani ngezinto zalokhu kuphila? ( 1 Korinte 6:3 )

buza: Ingabe bakhona abangalahlwa futhi abangahlulelwa?

impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Yiba phakathi kwabafileyo, bembelwa, futhi bavuka kanye noKristu — ( Roma 6:3-7 )
2 Labo abakhululiwe emthethweni ngoKristu ( Roma 7:6 )
3 Abahlala kuKristu ( 1 Johane 3:6 )
4 Labo abazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ( Johane 3:5 )
5 Abazelwe ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu ( 1 Korinte 4:15 )
6 Ozelwe ngeqiniso ( Jakobe 1:18 )
7 Abazelwe nguNkulunkulu ( 1 Johane 3:9 )

Qaphela: Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni futhi ngeke one → Abantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu bahlala kuKristu futhi banoKristu njengomlamuleli bakhululekile esonweni nasemthethweni Akukho mthetho wokulahla noma wokulawula, ngakho-ke bangona kanjani ? Ulahlwe yini? Kwahlulelwa ngani? Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa. Ingabe uqinisile? Uyaqonda? Isikhombo (Roma 4:15)

→→Abonayo bangabakaSathane, futhi isiphetho sabo siyichibi lomlilo nesibabule. . Uyaqonda?

Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni , ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. ( 1 Johane 3:9-10 )

6. Igama alirekhodiwe ku incwadi yokuphila "okukhulu

(4) Iqembu labantu abalandela ingelosi ewile, “inyoka”, inyoka yakudala, udrako omkhulu obomvu, noSathane udeveli.

buza: Uma igama lomuntu lingarekhodwa ku-" incwadi yokuphila 》Kuzokwenzekani?
impendulo: Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo. Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; Bonke bahlulelwa ngokwemisebenzi yabo . Ukufa neHayidesi nakho kwaphonswa echibini lomlilo; ukufa kwesibili . Uma igama lomuntu lingarekhodwa incwadi yokuphila eliphezulu , Waphonswa echibini lomlilo . ( IsAmbulo 20:12-15 )

articles.title: Ifayela lecala selivuliwe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 20 ivesi 12 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ifayela lecala selivuliwe" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabaqonde ukuthi “izincwadi zivuliwe” futhi abafileyo bayokwahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ifayela lecala liyanwebeka:

→→Nahlulelwa ngokwezenzo zabo .

IsAmbulo 20 [Isahluko 12] Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Ifayela lecala liyavulwa , kwavulwa omunye umqulu, oyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwezenzo zabo ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi. .

(1) Wonke umuntu umiselwe ukufa, futhi ngemva kokufa kuyoba nokwahlulelwa

Ngokudalelwa, wonke umuntu umiselwe ukufa kanye. Ngemva kokufa kukhona ukwahlulelwa . ( Hebheru 9:27 )

(2) Ukwahlulela kuqala endlini kaNkulunkulu

Ngoba isikhathi sesifikile, Ukwahlulela kuqala ngendlu kaNkulunkulu . Uma kuqala ngathi, uyakuba yini umphumela walabo abangakholwa ivangeli likaNkulunkulu na? (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 4:17.)

(3) Bhaphathizelwa kuKristu, ufe, umbelwe, futhi uvuke futhi ukuze ukhululwe ekwahlulelweni

buza: Kungani labo ababhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu bekhululekile ekwahlulelweni?
impendulo: ngoba" abhapathizwe “Labo abafa noKristu bahlanganiswa noKristu ngesimo sokufa kwakhe → Umuntu omdala uye wahlulelwa kanye noKristu , babethelwa kanyekanye, bafa kanyekanye, bangcwatshwa ndawonye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe → Ukwahlulela kuqala ngendlu kaNkulunkulu ;

UKristu wavuka kwabafileyo ukuzalwa kabusha kuthina, Akuseyimi engiphila manje , nguKristu ophilayo ngenxa yami! Ngizalwe kabusha ( Omusha ) ukuphila kusezulwini, kuKristu, kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba! Amen. Uma uhlala kuKristu, umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona, futhi wonke umntwana ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona! asikho isono Umuntu angahlulelwa kanjani? Ingabe uqinisile? ngakho uvikelekile ekwahlulelweni ! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? ngakho, Sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukunyakaza kwethu sibe nokuphila okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Ngokuba uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, Ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono ;Izikhombo (Roma 6:3-6)

(4)Uvuko lokuqala lweminyaka eyinkulungwane Akukho ukwabelana , bonke abanye abafileyo bahlulelwa

Lokhu kungukuvuka kokuqala. ( Abanye abafileyo abakavuswa , ize iphele iminyaka eyinkulungwane. (IsAmbulo 20:5)

(5) UJehova uyakwahlulela abantu bakhe, abaphindisele

Amahubo [9:4] Ngokuba ungiphindisele, wangivikela;
Ngoba siyazi ukuthi ngubani owathi: " Ngeyami impindiselo, ngiyakubuyisela "; futhi futhi: "UJehova uyokwahlulela abantu bakhe. “Maye kangakanani ukuwela ezandleni zikaNkulunkulu ophilayo! ( Hebheru 10:30-31 )

(6) INkosi yaphindisela abantu futhi yavumela amagama abo Shiya igama lakho encwadini yokuphila

Ngenxa yalesi sizathu, kunjalo Ngisho nabafileyo sebeshunyayezwe ivangeli Sidinga ukubabiza Inyama yahlulelwa ngokomuntu , yabo Ingokomoya kodwa ukuphila ngoNkulunkulu . ( 1 Petru 4:6 )

( Qaphela: Uma nje kuyigatsha elimila empandeni ka-Adamu. cha kusuka ku" inyoka “Imbewu ezelwe, ukhula oluhlwanyelwe nguSathane, Bonke banethuba Shiya igama lakho elotshwe encwadini yokuphila , lolu luthando, umusa nokulunga kukaNkulunkulu uBaba; uma " inyoka “Inzalo ezalwa ngu Lokho uSathane akuhlwanyelayo kukhuphula ukhula Ayikho indlela yokushiya igama lakho encwadini yokuphila →→abanjengoKhayini, uJuda owakhaphela iNkosi, nabantu abafana nabaFarisi abaphikisana neNkosi uJesu neqiniso, kusho uJesu! Uyise wabo ngudeveli, futhi bangabantwana bakhe. Lababantu akudingeki bashiye amagama abo noma bawakhumbule, ngoba iChibi loMlilo lingelabo. Ngakho, uyaqonda? )

(7) Ukwahlulelwa kwezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwaIsrayeli

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nina eningilandelayo, nxa iNdodana yomuntu isihlezi esihlalweni sayo senkazimulo ekubuyiselweni kwayo, nani niyakuhlala ezihlalweni zobukhosi eziyishumi nambili, Ukwahlulelwa Kwezizwe Eziyishumi Nambili Zakwa-Israyeli . ( Mathewu 19:28 )

(8) Ukwahlulelwa kwabafileyo nabaphilayo

Ngenhliziyo enjalo, kusukela manje ungaphila isikhathi sakho esisele kulo mhlaba hhayi ngokwezifiso zabantu kodwa kuphela ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu. Ngokuba sekuyisikhathi eside silandela izinkanuko zabezizwe, siphila ubufebe, nezifiso ezimbi, nokudakwa, nokudakwa, nasekuphuzeni, nokukhonza izithombe okunengekayo; Kulezi zinto bayakuxaka ukuthi awuhambi nabo endleleni yokuchitheka, bese bayakunyundela. Bazobe bekhona Ukulandisa phambi kukaJehova owahlulela abaphilayo nabafileyo . ( 1 Petru 4:2-5 )

(9)Ukwahlulelwa kwezingelosi eziwile

Kukhona lezo zingelosi ezingagcinanga imisebenzi yazo, zashiya izindawo zazo zokuhlala, kepha uJehova wazibopha ngamaketanga ebumnyameni kuze kube phakade; Ilinde ukwahlulelwa kosuku olukhulu . Inkomba ( Jude 1:6 )
Noma izingelosi zonile, uNkulunkulu akazange abekezelele, waziphonsa esihogweni, wazinikela emgodini wobumnyama. ilinde ukuqulwa kwecala . (2 Petru 2:4)

(10) Ukwahlulelwa kwabaprofethi bamanga nalabo abaye bakhulekela isilo nomfanekiso waso

“Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “ngiyokwenza Bhubhisa igama lezithixo emhlabeni , ngeke lisakhunjulwa; Ngeke kusaba baprofethi bamanga nemimoya engcolile . Inkomba (Zakariya 13:2)

(11) Ukwahlulelwa kwalabo abamukele uphawu lwesilo emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo

Ingelosi yesithathu yabalandela, yathi ngezwi elikhulu: Uma noma ubani okhulekela isilo noma umfanekiso waso futhi amukele uphawu ebunzini lakhe noma esandleni sakhe , nalo muntu uyophuza iwayini lolaka lukaNkulunkulu iwayini elithululelwe endebeni yolaka lukaNkulunkulu liyoba msulwa futhi lingaxutshwa. Uyakuhlushwa emlilweni nesibabule phambi kwezingelosi ezingcwele naphambi kweWundlu. Umusi wokuhlushwa kwakhe ukhuphuka kuze kube phakade naphakade. Labo abakhulekela isilo nomfanekiso waso futhi bamukele uphawu lwegama laso ngeke baphumule imini nobusuku. (Funda isAmbulo 14:9-11.)

(12) Uma igama lomuntu lingalotshiwe encwadini yokuphila, waphonswa echibini lomlilo.

Uma igama lomuntu lingalotshiwe encwadini yokuphila, yena waphonswa echibini lomlilo . ( IsAmbulo 20:15 )

Kepha amagwala, nabangakholwayo, nabanengekayo, nababulali, nezifebe, nabathakathi, nabakhonza izithombe, nabo bonke abaqamba amanga, bayakuba sechibini lomlilo elivutha isibabule; ( IsAmbulo 21:8 )

Ukwabelana ngombhalo wevangeli! UMoya kaNkulunkulu washukumisa izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen kanye nabanye asebenza nabo ukuthi basekele futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thumela izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo futhi bahlanganyela nabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo, nokuhlengwa komzimba. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: UNkulunkulu unika bonke abantwana bakhe amagama amasha Kulotshwe Encwadini Yokuphila! --- ♥ "Incwadi Yokuphila" ♥ ---

eyodwa," incwadi yokuphila 》Igama lirekhodiwe

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 3:5] Onqobayo uyogqokiswa okumhlophe, futhi mina ngeke ngimlandele incwadi yokuphila ligcobe ibizo layo, njalo izalivuma ibizo layo phambi kukaBaba laphambi kwezingilosi zonke zikaBaba.

buza: Igama likabani elilotshwe encwadini yokuphila?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Igama likaJesu

Inzalo ka-Abrahama, inzalo kaDavide, Uhlu lozalo lukaJesu Kristu ("inzalo", "inzalo": umbhalo wokuqala uthi "indodana". Okufanayo ngezansi): ... Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayegane uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya. wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. ...Izozala indodana, futhi kufanele uyikhiphe Iqanjwe uJesu , ngoba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. ( Mathewu 1:1, 18, 21 )

(2) Amagama abaphostoli bakaJesu abangu-12

(Idolobha Elingcwele iJerusalema) Udonga lunezisekelo eziyishumi nambili, Phezu kwesisekelo kukhona amagama abaPhostoli abayiShumi namBili beWundlu . ( IsAmbulo 21:14 )

(3) Amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli

Ngashukunyiswa uMoya oNgcwele, ingelosi yangithatha yangiyisa entabeni ende, yangibonisa umuzi ongcwele, iJerusalema, owehla uvela ezulwini kuNkulunkulu. Inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu yayisemzini; Kwakukhona ugange olude olunamasango ayishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kukhona izingelosi eziyishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kwakulotshwe amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli. Inkomba (IsAmbulo 21, amavesi 10-12)

(4) Amagama abaprofethi

Uzobona u-Abrahama, u-Isaka, uJakobe, futhi Bonke abaprofethi basembusweni kaNkulunkulu , kodwa niyoxoshwa ngaphandle, lapho kuyakuba khona ukukhala nokugedla amazinyo. Isikhombo (Luka 13:28)

(5) Amagama abangcwele

buza: Obani abangcwele?
impendulo: " abangcwele " Kusho ukusebenza ndawonye noKristu! Izinceku nezisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu!

KwabaseFilipi [4:3] Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu asho → Ngiyanincenga-ke, nina eningalingani ijoka, ukuba nisize laba besifazane ababili, ngoba bashikashikeka kanye nami evangelini, noKlementi, nabanye abasebenza nami; Amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila .

Awu Nkosi yami, abangcwele , nonke nina baphostoli nabaprofethi, thokozani ngayo, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukuphindisele phezu kwayo. ( IsAmbulo 18:20 )

(6) Igama lomphefumulo wolungileyo liyapheleliswa

Kepha nize entabeni yaseSiyoni, umuzi kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, iJerusalema lasezulwini. Kukhona amashumi ezinkulungwane ezingelosi, kukhona umhlangano omkhulu wamadodana amazibulo, amagama awo asezulwini, kukhona uNkulunkulu owahlulela bonke, nemiphefumulo yabalungileyo eyenziwe yaphelela (KumaHeberu 12:22-22). 23)

(7) Abalungileyo basindiswa egameni lensindiso kuphela

Uma kunjalo Abalungileyo bayasindiswa , abantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu nezoni bayoma kuphi? ( 1 Petru 4:18 )

“Khona uyakusukuma uMikayeli, ingelosi enkulu, ovikela abantu bakho, kube khona usizi olukhulu, olungazange lube khona kusukela ekuqaleni kwesizwe kuze kube manje; Wonke umuntu obhalwe encwadini , izosindiswa. Abaningi balabo abalele othulini lomhlaba bayophaphama. Phakathi kwabo kukhona labo abanokuphila okuphakade. ukuthotshiswa , ezondwa phakade. ( Daniyeli 12:1-2 )

2. Igama elisha

Onendlebe makezwe lokho akushoyo uMoya oNgcwele emabandleni! Onqobayo ngiyakumnika imana elifihliweyo, ngimnike itshe elimhlophe; Kubhalwe igama elisha etsheni ; kakho owaziyo ngaphandle kwalowo owamukelayo. ( IsAmbulo 2 ivesi 17 )

buza: Iyini imana efihliwe?
impendulo: " imana efihliwe “Kubhekiselwa kusinkwa sokuphila, futhi isinkwa sokuphila siyiNkosi uJesu,” imana efihliwe ” libhekisela eNkosini uKristu.

UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila. Lowo oza kimi akasoze alamba; okholwa yimi kasoze oma.

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukumnika itshe elimhlophe?
impendulo: " Shiraishi "Kumelela ubumsulwa nokungabi nasici," Shiraishi “Idwala lomoya, idwala lomoya nguKristu; Shiraishi ” libhekisela eNkosini uJesu Kristu.

Bonke baphuza amanzi afanayo omoya. Abakuphuzayo kwaphuma edwaleni lomoya elalibalandela; ( 1 Korinte 10:4 )

buza: Lisho ukuthini uma lithi (igama elisha) etsheni elimhlophe?
impendulo: 【 igama elisha 】Okungukuthi, ngaphandle kwamagama abazali bakho abawaqamba ngawo phansi lapho bekuzala → EZulwini, uBaba waseZulwini ukunika elinye igama igama elisha ! Igama lasezulwini, igama likamoya, igama laphezulu ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Ngingalithola kanjani itshe elimhlophe engingabhala kulo igama elisha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya — Johane 3:5-7
(2) Bazalwa ngezwi leqiniso levangeli — 1 Korinte 4:15
(3) Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu — Johane 1:12-13

Ngakho-ke, lapho abazali bakho bekuzala enyameni, bakunika igama emhlabeni, uJesu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa eyathunyelwa uBaba waseZulwini, yafela izono zethu, yangcwatshwa, yavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu! UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo ukuzalwa kabusha Xhumana nathi →→ 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya , 2 Uzelwe ezwini leqiniso levangeli , 3 ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ! Ngale ndlela, uBaba usinike, abantwana bethu abazelwe nguNkulunkulu, itshe elimhlophe → okungukuthi INkosi Kristu ! Bhala amagama amasha kuKristu! leyo" incwadi yokuphila "Kuqoshwe phakathi igama lakho elisha ! Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

3. Abantu abasha abazelwe kabusha kuphela abangaqoshwa "Encwadini Yokuphila"

(1) Umuntu akanakungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu ngaphandle kokuba azalwe ngokusha

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuba umuntu ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya Uma ungakwenzi, awukwazi ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu. Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama; lokho okuzelwe ngomoya kungumoya. Ngithe: ' kufanele uzalwe ngokusha ', ungamangali. Umoya uphephetha nomaphi lapho othanda khona, futhi uyawuzwa umsindo wawo, kodwa kawazi lapho uvela khona nalapho oya khona. (Funda uJohane 3:5-8.)

(2) Labo abasebenza kanye noNkulunkulu balotshiwe encwadini yokuphila

Ngiyabancenga u-Eyofa noSintike ukuba babe nhliziyonye eNkosini. Ngiyakuncenga-ke wena oyijoka eliqinisileyo, ukuba usize laba besifazane ababili abashikashikeka kanye nami evangelini, noKlemente, nezinye izisebenzi zami; Amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila . ( Filipi 4:2-3 )

(3) Onqobayo uyolotshwa encwadini yokuphila

Onqobayo uyakwembathiswa okumhlophe, negama lakhe angiyikulesula encwadini yokuphila. futhi ngiyolivuma igama lakhe phambi kukaBaba naphambi kwezingelosi zonke zikaBaba. Onendlebe makezwe lokho akushoyo uMoya emabandleni. ( IsAmbulo 3:5-6 )

Ukwabelana ngokulotshiweyo kwevangeli! UMoya kaNkulunkulu washukumisa izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen kanye nabanye asebenza nabo ukuthi basekele futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila ! Amen.

→ Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho ngoPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, Amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila . Amen!

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 20 ivesi 10 futhi sifunde ndawonye: USathane owabadukisayo waphonswa echibini lomlilo nesibabule, lapho kwakukhona isilo nomprofethi wamanga. Bayohlushwa imini nobusuku kuze kube phakade naphakade.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ngemuva kweMillennium" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thumela izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi lahlanganyelwa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo, nokuhlengwa komzimba. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabakuqonde lokho emva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane (Ukunqotshwa kokugcina kukaDeveli kwaphonswa khona Ichibi lomlilo nesibabule ngaphakathi) . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

---Ngemva Kweminyaka Eyinkulungwane---

(1) Ngemva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane, uSathane wakhululwa

buza: Udedelwa kuphi uSathane?
impendulo: Ukukhululwa ejele, ejele noma kwalasha.

buza: Kungani uyidedela?
Impendulo: Bonisa ubulungisa bukaNkulunkulu, uthando, ukubekezela, isihe, amandla kanye nokuhlenga kwabantu bakaNkulunkulu abakhethiwe →Yonke imindeni yakwa-Israyeli iyosindiswa . Amen
Inkomba ( Roma 11:26 )

Ekupheleni kweminyaka eyinkulungwane, uSathane uyokhululwa etilongweni lakhe ( IsAmbulo 20:7 )

Ngase ngibona ingelosi yehla ezulwini, iphethe isihluthulelo sakwalasha neketanga elikhulu esandleni sayo. Yambamba udrako, inyoka endala, ebizwa ngokuthi uDeveli noSathane, yambopha iminyaka eyinkulungwane, yamphonsa kwalasha, yawuvala ngophawu, ukuze angabe esakwazi ukudukisa izizwe . Lapho iminyaka eyinkulungwane isiphelile, kumelwe ikhululwe okwesikhashana . ( IsAmbulo 20:1-3 )

(2) Phumani nidukise izizwe zonke emhlabeni wonke ukuba zibuthene ukulwa

(USathane) uyaphuma ukudukisa izizwe emagumbini omane omhlaba, uGogi noMagogi, Mabahlangane balwe . Inani labo likhulu ngangesihlabathi solwandle. ( IsAmbulo 20:8 )

(3) Zungezani ikamu labangcwele nomuzi othandekayo

Bakhuphuka bagcwalisa umhlaba wonke, bahaqa ikamu labangcwele nomuzi othandekayo. Kwehla umlilo uvela ezulwini wabashisa . ( IsAmbulo 20:9 )

(4) Ukunqotshwa kukaSathane kokugcina

buza: Kwakukuphi ukunqotshwa kokugcina kukaSathane uDeveli?

Izintshumayelo zokwabelana ngombhalo, zishukunyiswa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . umsingathi Ivangeli likaJesu Kristu liyivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! articles.title: Millennium
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 20 ivesi 4 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngase ngibona izihlalo zobukhosi, nabantu behlezi phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokwahlulela. Ngabona ukuvuka kwemiphefumulo yalabo ababenqunywe amakhanda ngenxa yobufakazi babo ngoJesu nangenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu, nalabo ababengazange basikhulekele isilo nomfanekiso waso, noma ababengamukelanga uphawu emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo. . futhi babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Millennium" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabaqonde abangcwele abavuswa kwabafileyo okokuqala enkulungwaneni yeminyaka! Babusisiwe, bangcwelisiwe, futhi bayobusa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. Amen !

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Uvuko ngaphambi kweMinyaka Eyinkulungwane

IsAmbulo [Isahluko 20:4] Ngase ngibona izihlalo zobukhosi, nabantu behlezi phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokwahlulela. Ngabona imiphefumulo yalabo ababenqunywe amakhanda ngenxa yobufakazi babo ngoJesu nangenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu, nalabo ababengazange basikhulekele isilo noma umfanekiso waso, futhi bengamukelanga uphawu lwaso emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo. Bonke bavuswa futhi babusa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane .

buza: Obani abavuswa ngaphambi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Imiphefumulo yalabo abafakaza ngoJesu futhi banqunywa amakhanda ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu

buza: Iyini imiphefumulo yalabo abanqunywa amakhanda ngenxa yenjongo kaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Bayimiphefumulo yalabo ababulawa ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu nangenxa yobufakazi babo bevangeli likaJesu Kristu.
→→( njenge ) Lapho ngivula uphawu lwesihlanu, ngabona ngaphansi kwe-altare imiphefumulo yalabo ababebulewe ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu nangenxa yobufakazi... Kwase kunikezwa yilowo nalowo izingubo ezimhlophe...! Inkomba (IsAmbulo 6:9)

(2) Akazange akhulekele isilo noma umfanekiso waso

buza: Labo bantu abangakaze bakhulekele isilo nomfanekiso wesilo?
impendulo: Akakaze akhulekelwe " inyoka "Izinyoka zasendulo, odrago amakhulu abomvu, odeveli, uSathane. Izilo nezithombe zesilo - uma ungakhulekeli onkulunkulu bamanga, uGuanyin, uBuddha, amaqhawe, amadoda amakhulu nezithixo emhlabeni, konke okusemhlabeni, olwandle, nolwandle. izinyoni esibhakabhakeni, njll.

(3) Awukho umphefumulo othole uphawu ebunzini noma ezandleni.

buza: Angikaze ngihlupheke" yona "Imuphi uphawu?"
impendulo: Abazange baluthole uphawu lwesilo emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo .
Futhi kwenza wonke umuntu, omkhulu noma omncane, ocebile noma ompofu, okhululekile noma oyisigqila, ukuba athole uphawu esandleni sakhe sokunene noma ebunzini labo. ...Nakhu ukuhlakanipha: Oqondayo makabale isibalo sesilo; (Funda isAmbulo 13:16, 18.)

【Qaphela:】 1 Imiphefumulo yalabo abafakaza ngoJesu futhi banqunywa amakhanda ngenxa yeZwi likaNkulunkulu; 2 Abazange basikhulekele isilo nomfanekiso waso; 3 Akekho umuntu othole uphawu lwesilo ebunzini noma ezandleni zakhe; Bavusiwe bonke! Amen
→→ Thola inkazimulo, umvuzo, novuko olungcono! →→Yebo 100 izikhathi, zikhona 60 izikhathi, zikhona 30 Izikhathi! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle, yathela isithelo, enye ngekhulu, enye ngamashumi ayisithupha, enye ngamashumi amathathu. Onezindlebe zokuzwa makalalele! "
→→ Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bayibona le ndlela yeqiniso futhi Ngokuthula ukulinda, Ngokuthula lalela, Ngokuthula kholwa, buthule umhlaba gcina izwi ! Uma ungalaleli, uzolahlekelwa . ( Mathewu 13:8-9 )

(4) Bonke bavusiwe

buza: Obani abavusiwe?
impendulo:

1 Imiphefumulo yalabo abafakaza ngoJesu futhi banqunywa amakhanda ngenxa yeZwi likaNkulunkulu , (Njengabaphostoli abangamashumi amabili nabangcwele abangamaKristu abaye balandela uJesu futhi bafakaza ngevangeli kuyo yonke iminyaka)

2 abasikhonzanga isilo nomfanekiso waso; 3 Cha, akekho othole uphawu lwesilo ebunzini lakhe noma ezandleni zakhe. .

Bavusiwe bonke! Amen.

(5)Lokhu kungukuvuka kokuqala

(6) Bonke abanye abafileyo abakavuswa

buza: Obani abanye abafileyo abangakavuswa na?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
" abanye abafileyo "Ongakavuswa" kusho:
1 Abantu abakhonza “inyoka”, udrako, udeveli noSathane ;
2 Abakhulekela isilo nomfanekiso waso ;
3 Labo abamukele uphawu lwesilo emabunzini abo nasezandleni zabo .

(7) Babusisiwe abahlanganyela ekuvukeni kokuqala futhi babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane

buza: Umhlanganyeli ovukweni lokuqala → Isiphi isibusiso esikhona?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Nibusisiwe, ningcwele nina enesabelo ekuvukeni kokuqala;
2 Ukufa kwesibili kakulamandla phezu kwabo.
3 Banikwa ukwahlulela.
4 Bazakuba ngabapristi bakaNkulunkulu labakaKristu, babuse kanye loKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. ( IsAmbulo 20:6 )

2. Busa NoKristu Iminyaka Eyinkulungwane

(1) Busa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane

buza: Uhlanganyele ovukweni lokuqala lokubusa noKristu (isikhathi esingakanani)?
Impendulo: Bayoba ngabapristi bakaNkulunkulu nabakaKristu, babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane! Amen.

(2)Ukuba umpristi kaNkulunkulu noKristu

buza: Abapristi bakaNkulunkulu noKristu babusa phezu kobani?
impendulo: Phatha inzalo yakwa-Israyeli eyizi-144,000 phakathi nenkulungwane yeminyaka .

buza: Zingaki izizukulwane ezivela ezimpilweni eziyi-144,000 (eminyakeni eyinkulungwane)?
impendulo: Inani labo lalilikhulu ngangesihlabathi solwandle, bagcwalisa umhlaba wonke.

Qaphela : Inzalo yabo ayizalwa nezingane ezifa ngemva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa, futhi abekho abantu abadala abangasuthi ngokuphila → NjengoSeti, indodana eyazalelwa “u-Adamu no-Eva” kuGenesise, no-Enoshe, uKhenani, uMethusela, ULameka, noNoh Iminyaka yokuphila iyafana. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Bagcwalisa umhlaba ngokuzala nokuzala. Ngokwesibonelo, umkhaya kaJakobe wafika eGibhithe, abantu abangu-70 sebebonke (bheka uGenesise 46:27). kwakungabantu abangu-600 000 kuphela abakwazi ukulwa ngemva kweminyaka engu-20. Izinkulungwane ezintathu namakhulu amahlanu namashumi amahlanu, abesifazane ababuyayo , kukhona abantu asebekhulile abengeziwe kanye nabantu abaneminyaka engaphansi kwamashumi amabili ubudala, kunama-Israyeli ayizi-144 000 ngemva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane Baphila isikhathi eside, inzalo yabo eyabusiswa uJehova eminyakeni eyinkulungwane iyobalwa. Inani labo lalilikhulu ngangesihlabathi solwandle, ligcwele umhlaba wonke. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Inkomba (IsAmbulo 20:8-9) no-Isaya 65:17-25.

(3)Ngemva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane

buza: Ovukweni lokuqala!
Babusa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane!
Kuthiwani-ke ngemva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane?
Asengamakhosi na?
impendulo: Bayobusa kanye noKristu,
Phakade! Amen.
Akusayikuba khona isiqalekiso, ngokuba isihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu neseWundlu sisemzini; Igama lakhe liyobhalwa emabunzini abo. Ubusuku abuyikuba khona; izibani nokukhanya kwelanga azisayikuba khona, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu uyakuzikhanyisela. Bayobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade . ( IsAmbulo 22:3-5 )

3. USathane wayevalelwe kwalasha iminyaka eyinkulungwane

buza: Wavelaphi uSathane?
impendulo: ingelosi ewa ezulwini .

articles.title: Ukubuya Kwesibili KukaJesu (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 8 ivesi 23 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Akugcini lapho, nathi esinolibo lukaMoya siyabubula ngaphakathi, silindele ukuma kwethu njengamadodana, ukukhululwa kwemizimba yethu. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukubuya Kwesibili KukaJesu" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabaqonde ukuthi iNkosi uJesu Kristu yafika futhi imizimba yethu yahlengwa! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

UMkristu: Umzimba hlengiwe!

KwabaseRoma 8:22-23 Siyazi ukuthi yonke indalo iyabubula futhi ishikashikeka kuze kube manje. Akusikho lokho kuphela, kodwa nathi esinolibo lukaMoya siyabubula ngaphakathi, silindele ukuma kwethu njengamadodana. Kungukuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu .

buza: Umzimba wobuKristu uhlengwa kanjani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1. Ukuvuka kwabafileyo

(1) KuKristu bonke bayovuswa

Njengalokhu ku-Adamu bonke bayafa, ngokunjalo kuKristu bonke bayakuphiliswa. ( 1 Korinte 15:22 )

(2)Abafileyo bayovuswa

Ngomzuzwana nje, ngokuphazima kweso, Lapho icilongo likhala okokugcina . Ngokuba icilongo liyakukhala, Abafileyo bayovuswa bengafi , nathi kudingeka sishintshe. ( 1 Korinte 15:52 )

(3) Abafileyo kuKristu bayovuswa kuqala

Manje lokhu sikusho kini ngokwezwi leNkosi: Thina esisekhona sisasekhona kuze kube sekufikeni kweNkosi asiyikubandulela labo asebalala. Ngokuba iNkosi uqobo iyakwehla ezulwini ngokumemeza, ngezwi lengelosi enkulu, nangecilongo likaNkulunkulu; Abafileyo kuKristu bayovuswa kuqala . ( 1 Thesalonika 4:15-16 )

2. Okubolayo, gqoka okungonakali

【Gqoka ukungafi】

Lokhu okonakalayo kumele kube (kube: umbhalo wasekuqaleni uthi gqoka Okufanayo ngezansi) Ongafi , lokhu okufayo kumelwe kube okungenakufa. ( 1 Korinte 15:53 )

3. Edelelekile ( Shintsha ) ukuba nenkazimulo

(1)Siyizakhamuzi zasezulwini

Kodwa thina izakhamizi zasezulwini , futhi nilindele uMsindisi, iNkosi uJesu Kristu, ukuthi eze evela ezulwini. Inkomba (Filipi 3:20)

(2) thobekile →shintsha isimo

Uzosenza Umzimba othobekile uyashintsha ukuma , efana nomzimba Wakhe okhazimulayo. Inkomba (Filipi 3:21)

4. (Ukufa) kugwinywe ukuphila kukaKristu

buza: (Ukufa) wagwinywa ubani?
impendulo: " fa " Ukuvuswa nguKristu futhi kugwinywe impilo yokunqoba .

(1)Ukufa kugwinywe ukunqoba

Nxa lokhu okubolayo sekwembethe ukungonakali, lalokhu okufayo sekwembethe ukungafi, khona-ke kulotshiwe ukuthi: Amazwi athi “ukufa kugwinywe ngokunqoba” abe yiqiniso. . ( 1 Korinte 15:54 )

(2) Lo ofayo ugwinywe ukuphila

Uma sibubula sisebenza kuleli tende, asizimisele ukukukhumula lokhu, kodwa ukwembatha lokhuya. ukuze lokhu okufayo kuginywe ngukuphila . (2 Korinte 5:4)

5. Ibala ukuhlangana kweNkosi emafini

【 Ukuhlwithwa KwamaKristu Aphilayo 】

Kusukela manje sizokwenza Labo abaphilayo futhi abasele bayohlwithwa kanye nabo emafwini ,ehlangabeza iNkosi emoyeni. Ngale ndlela, siyoba neNkosi kuze kube phakade. (1 Thesalonika 4:17)

6. Ngokuqinisekile siyobona isimo sangempela seNkosi

【 Lapho iNkosi ibonakala, imizimba yethu nayo ibonakala 】
→→Kumelwe sibone isimo sakhe sangempela!

Bazalwane abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu manje, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali, kodwa siyazi ukuthi Uma iNkosi ibonakala, sizofana nayo, ngoba sizoyibona njengoba injalo . (1 Johane 3:2)

7. Siyoba neNkosi kuze kube phakade! Amen

(1) UNkulunkulu uyoba nathi ngabanye

Ngase ngizwa izwi elikhulu livela esihlalweni sobukhosi, lithi: “Bheka, itabernakele likaNkulunkulu likubantu; UNkulunkulu ngokwakhe uyoba nabo futhi abe nguNkulunkulu wabo . ( IsAmbulo 21:3 )

(2) Ukufa akusekho

UNkulunkulu uyosula zonke izinyembezi emehlweni abo; ukufa akusekho , futhi ngeke kusaba khona ukulila, ukukhala noma ubuhlungu, ngoba izinto ezidlule zidlulile. ( IsAmbulo 21:4 )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, okungukuthi Ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo ! Amen

1. IWundlu livula uphawu lwesikhombisa

Lapho iWundlu livula uphawu lwesikhombisa ,izulu lathula cishe imizuzwana emibili. Ngase ngibona izingelosi eziyisikhombisa zimi phambi kukaNkulunkulu, zanikwa amacilongo ayisikhombisa. ( IsAmbulo 8:1-2 )

buza: Kwenzekani cishe imizuzwana emibili kuthulekile esibhakabhakeni?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Kunamacilongo ayisikhombisa anikezwa izingelosi eziyisikhombisa
(2) Bonke abangcwele bembatha iphunga likaKristu, beze phambi kukaNkulunkulu
(3) Ingelosi yasithatha umcengezi, yawugcwalisa ngomlilo wase-altare, yawuthululela emhlabathini .

Kwafika enye ingelosi nesitsha segolide sempepho, yema ngase-altare. Yanikwa impepho eningi ukuba ayinikele kanye nemithandazo yabangcwele bonke e-altare legolide eliphambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Kwenyuka umusi wempepho nemikhuleko yabangcwele esandleni sengelosi kuNkulunkulu. . Ingelosi yayisithatha isitsha sempepho, yasigcwalisa ngomlilo wase-altare, yawuthululela emhlabeni; ( IsAmbulo 8:3-5 )

2. Ingelosi yesikhombisa yashaya icilongo

(1)Icilongo lakhala kakhulu okokugcina
(2) Umbuso waleli zwe usungoweNkosi yethu noKristu wayo
(3) UJesu Kristu uyobusa njengenkosi kuze kube phakade naphakade
(4)Abadala abangamashumi amabili nane bakhonza uNkulunkulu

Ingelosi yesikhombisa yasibetha icilongo layo, kwavela izwi elikhulu ezulwini, lithi: Imibuso yaleli zwe isibe imibuso yeNkosi yethu nekaKristu wayo Uyobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade. “Amalunga angamashumi amabili nane ayehlezi ezihlalweni zawo phambi kukaNkulunkulu awa phansi ngobuso, akhuleka kuNkulunkulu, athi: “O Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Mninimandla onke, owayekhona nokhona, siyakubonga! Ngoba unamandla amakhulu futhi uyinkosi. Izizwe zithukuthele, futhi ulaka lwakho selufikile, futhi ihora lokwahlulelwa kwabafileyo selifikile; wozani labo abayokonakalisa umhlaba. (Funda isAmbulo 11:15-18.)

3 Ingelosi yesikhombisa yathululela isitsha emoyeni

Ingelosi yesikhombisa yathululela isitsha sayo emoyeni, kwavela izwi elikhulu esihlalweni sobukhosi ethempelini, lithi: Kwenzekile ! ( IsAmbulo 16:17 )

buza: Okwenzekile [kwenziwe]!
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Izinto zikaNkulunkulu ezingaqondakali sezifeziwe

Ingelosi engayibona ihamba phezu kolwandle nasemhlabeni yasiphakamisela isandla sayo sokunene ezulwini, yafunga yena owadala izulu nakho konke okukulo, nomhlaba nakho konke okusemhlabeni, nolwandle nakho konke okukulo, ophila kuze kube phakade naphakade. njalo, ithi: “Asisekho isikhathi (noma ukuhunyushwa: akusekho ukubambezeleka).” Kodwa lapho ingelosi yesikhombisa ishaya icilongo, imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu iyogcwaliseka, njengoba nje uNkulunkulu eshumayele izindaba ezinhle ezincekwini zakhe abaprofethi. ( IsAmbulo 10:5-7 )

(2)Umbuso waleli zwe usungoweNkosi yethu uKristu

Ingelosi yesikhombisa yashaya icilongo layo, kwase kuba khona izwi elikhulu ezulwini, lithi: “Imibuso yalelizwe isibe umbuso weNkosi yethu nokaKristu wayo, futhi iyobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade ( IsAmbulo 11:15 )

(3) INkosi uNkulunkulu wethu, uMninimandla onke, iyabusa

Kwavela izwi esihlalweni sobukhosi, lithi: "Dumisani uNkulunkulu wethu, nonke nina zinceku zikaNkulunkulu, nonke enimesabayo, abakhulu nabancane!" izwi lokuduma okukhulu, lithi: “Haleluya, ngokuba iNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu, uMninimandla onke, iyabusa.” ( IsAmbulo 19:5-6 )

(4) Sesifikile isikhathi somshado weWundlu

(5)Umakoti usezilungisile

(6) Bembathiswe ilineni elicolekileyo, elikhanyayo nelihlanzekileyo

(7) Ibandla (umlobokazi) uyahlwithwa

Masijabule futhi simnike inkazimulo. Ngoba umshado weWundlu usufikile, nomakoti usezilungisile, futhi uphiwe umusa wakhe ukuba agqoke ilineni elicolekileyo, elikhanyayo nelimhlophe. (Ilineni elicolekileyo lingukulunga kwabangcwele.) Ingelosi yathi kimi: “Loba: Babusisiwe abamenyelwe esidlweni sakusihlwa somshado weWundlu ! ” Wayesethi kimi: “Leli yizwi likaNkulunkulu eliyiqiniso. ( IsAmbulo 19:7-9 )

articles.title: Ukubuya Kwesibili KukaJesu (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMathewu Isahluko 24 kanye nevesi 30 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngaleso sikhathi isibonakaliso seNdodana yomuntu siyobonakala ezulwini, futhi zonke izizwe zomhlaba ziyolila. Bazayibona iNdodana yomuntu iza iphezu kwamayezi ezulu ilamandla lenkazimulo enkulu .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukubuya Kwesibili KukaJesu" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu, ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi isenze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya: Bonke abantwana mabaluqonde lolo suku futhi balindele ukufika kweNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. INkosi uJesu iza ngefu

buza: INkosi uJesu yeza kanjani?
Impendulo: Iza ngamafu!

(1) Bhekani, uyeza ngamafu
(2) Wonke amehlo afuna ukumbona
(3) Bazabona iNdodana yomuntu iza ngamayezi ezulu ilamandla lenkazimulo enkulu.

Bheka, Uza ngamafu ! Wonke amehlo ayombona, ngisho nalabo abamgwazayo; Yiqiniso lokhu. Amen! Inkomba (IsAmbulo 1:7)

Ngaleso sikhathi isibonakaliso seNdodana yomuntu siyobonakala ezulwini, futhi yonke imindeni yomhlaba iyolila. Bayakubona iNdodana yomuntu inamandla nenkazimulo enkulu; Eza emafini evela esibhakabhakeni . ( Mathewu 24:30 )

2. Uhambe kanjani, uzobuya kanjani

(1) UJesu wenyukela ezulwini

buza: UJesu wenyukela kanjani ezulwini ngemva kokuvuswa kwakhe?
impendulo: Ifu lamsusa
(UJesu) wayesekushilo lokho, futhi besabhekile. Wakhushulelwa phezulu , Ifu lamsusa , angabe esabonwa. Inkomba (IZenzo 1:9)

(2) Izingelosi zafakaza ukuthi weza kanjani

buza: INkosi uJesu yeza kanjani?
impendulo: Njengoba nje umbone enyukela ezulwini, uyobuya futhi.

Esenyuka begqolozele ezulwini, bheka, kwasukuma amadoda amabili embethe izingubo ezimhlophe, athi: “Madoda aseGalile, nimeleni nibheke ezulwini na? Lo Jesu onyuselwe ezulwini esuka kinina? , Njengoba nje umbone enyukela ezulwini, kanjalo uyobuya kanjalo . ( IzEnzo 1:10-11 )

Ezintathu: Uma seziphelile izinhlekelele ngalezo zinsuku

(1) Ilanga liyoba mnyama, nenyanga ngeke ikunikeze ukukhanya kwayo, nezinkanyezi ziyakuwa ezulwini. .

buza: Izophela nini inhlekelele?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 Umbono Wezinsuku ezingama-2300 —Daniyeli 8:26
2 Lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa — Mathewu 24:22
3 unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka —Daniyeli 7:25
4 Kufanele kube nezinsuku eziyi-1290 - — Dan. 12:11 .

" Lapho inhlekelele yangalezo zinsuku isiphelile , ilanga liyokuba mnyama, nenyanga ngeke ikukhanyise, izinkanyezi ziyokuwa ezulwini, namandla ezulu ayozanyazanyiswa. ( Mathewu 24:29 )

(2) Izibani ezintathu zizohlehla

Ngalolo suku, ngeke kube khona ukukhanya, futhi izibani ezintathu ziyohlehla . Lolo suku luyokwaziwa nguJehova; ngeke kube yimini noma ebusuku, kodwa kuyoba khona ukukhanya kusihlwa. (Funda uZakariya 14:6-7.)

4 Ngaleso sikhathi, isibonakaliso seNdodana yomuntu siyobonakala ezulwini

buza: Ini Omen Ibonakala ezulwini?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Umbani uvela empumalanga futhi ukhanya ubheke entshonalanga

Umbani uvela empumalanga , ikhanya iqonde entshonalanga. kuyakuba njalo nokufika kweNdodana yomuntu. ( Mathewu 24:27 )

(2) Icilongo lengelosi lakhala kakhulu okokugcina

Uyothumela izithunywa zakhe, Kuzwakala ngecilongo , eqoqa abantu bakhe abakhethiwe kuzo zonke izinhlangothi (isikwele: umoya embhalweni wokuqala), kusukela kolunye uhlangothi lwesibhakabhaka kuya kolunye uhlangothi lwesibhakabhaka. ( Mathewu 24:31 )

(3) Konke okusezulwini, nasemhlabeni, naphansi komhlaba kuyakubona iNdodana yomuntu iza emafwini inamandla nenkazimulo enkulu. .

Ngaleso sikhathi, Isibonakaliso seNdodana yomuntu siyobonakala ezulwini Khuphukani, futhi bonke abantu bomhlaba bayokhala. Bazayibona iNdodana yomuntu iza iphezu kwamayezi ezulu ilamandla lenkazimulo enkulu. ( Mathewu 24:30 )

5. Eza nazo zonke izithunywa

buza: UJesu wafika nobani lapho efika?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Labo asebelele kuJesu babuthwa ndawonye
Uma sikholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa wabuye wavuka, ngisho nalabo asebelele kuJesu uNkulunkulu uyobaletha kanye naye. (1 Thesalonika 4:14)

(2) Ukuza nazo zonke izithunywa
Nxa iNdodana yomuntu iza ngenkazimulo kaYise nezingelosi zayo, iyakuvuza wonke umuntu ngokwemisebenzi yakhe. ( Mathewu 16:27 )

(3) Ukufika kwezinkulungwane zabangcwele balethwa iNkosi
U-Enoke, inzalo yesikhombisa ka-Adamu, waprofetha ngalaba bantu, ethi: “Bheka, iNkosi iyeza nezinkulungwane zabangcwele bayo.

6 Njengoba kwakunjalo emihleni kaNowa, kuzakuba njalo lapho iNdodana yomuntu ifika

Njengoba kwenzeka emihleni kaNowa, kuyakuba njalo lapho iNdodana yomuntu ifika. Ezinsukwini zangaphambi kukazamcolo, abantu babedla, bephuza, beshada futhi bendiswa njengenjayelo kwaze kwaba usuku uNowa angena ngalo emkhunjini ngokungazi, uzamcolo wafika wabakhukhula bonke. kuyakuba njalo nokufika kweNdodana yomuntu. ( Mathewu 24:37-39 )

7 UJesu ugibele ihhashi elimhlophe futhi uza nawo wonke amabutho asezulwini.

Ngabheka, ngabona amazulu evulekile. Kukhona ihhashi elimhlophe, futhi ogibele kulo kuthiwa uthembekile futhi uneqiniso , uyahlulela, alwe ngokulunga. Amehlo akhe anjengelangabi lomlilo, nasekhanda lakhe kukhona imiqhele eminingi; Wayembethe izingubo ezifafazwe ngegazi; Amabutho onke asezulwini amlandela, egibele amahhashi amhlophe, embethe ilineni elicolekileyo, elimhlophe nelihlanzekileyo. Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma inkemba ebukhali ukuze ashaye izizwe. Uyobusa phezu kwabo ngentonga yensimbi, futhi uyonyathela isikhamo sewayini lolaka lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke. Engutsheni yakhe nasethangeni lakhe kwakulotshwe igama elithi: “Inkosi yamakhosi noMbusi wababusi.”

8 Kepha lolo suku nalelo hora akakho olaziyo.

(1) Akekho owazi lolo suku nehora .
(2) Akusikho okwenu ukwazi izinsuku uBaba azimisile .
(3) nguBaba kuphela owaziyo .

Sebebuthene, bambuza uJesu, bathi: “Nkosi, uyakuwubuyisela umbuso ku-Israyeli ngalesi sikhathi na? Akusikho okwenu ukwazi izikhathi nezinsuku uBaba azimisile ngamandla akhe. . Inkomba ( IzEnzo 1:6-7 )

“Kepha lolo suku nalelo hora akakho owaziyo ngalo, nazingelosi ezulwini, naNdodana; NguBaba kuphela owaziyo . Inkomba ( Mathewu 24: Isahluko 36 )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

impendulo: " I-Armagedoni ” kubhekiselwa kumademoni amathathu abiza amakhosi ukuba abuthene ndawonye.

(1)Imimoya engcolile emithathu

buza: Obani imimoya engcolile emithathu?
impendulo: Bayimimoya yamadimoni.

buza: Imimoya emithathu engcolile yenzani?

Ngase ngibona umbono ezulwini, omkhulu nongavamile; Izingelosi eziyisikhombisa zilawula izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa zokugcina , ngoba ulaka lukaNkulunkulu lwaphela kulezinhlupho eziyisikhombisa.

buza: Ziyini izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa zokugcina ezilawulwa izingelosi eziyisikhombisa?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu uthukuthele izitsha eziyisikhombisa zegolide → Yehlisani izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa .

Esinye sezidalwa ezine sanika izingelosi eziyisikhombisa izitsha zegolide ezigcwele ulaka lukaNkulunkulu ophilayo kuze kube phakade naphakade. Ithempeli lagcwala umusi ngenxa yenkazimulo namandla kaNkulunkulu. Ngakho akekho owayengangena ethempelini zize ziphele izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa ezibangelwa izingelosi eziyisikhombisa. ( IsAmbulo 15:7-8 )

2. Izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa ezathunyelwa izingelosi eziyisikhombisa

buza: Ziyini izinhlupho eziyisikhombisa ezilethwa izingelosi eziyisikhombisa?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ingelosi yokuqala yathululela isitsha

Ngase ngizwa izwi elikhulu liphuma ethempelini, lithi kuzo izingelosi eziyisikhombisa: “Hambani nithululele emhlabeni izitsha eziyisikhombisa zolaka lukaNkulunkulu.” ( IsAmbulo 16:1 )

(1)Thela indishi phansi

Ingelosi yokuqala yahamba, yathululela isitsha sayo emhlabeni, kwase kuvela izilonda ezimbi nezibuhlungu kulabo ababenophawu lwesilo nabakhulekela umfanekiso waso. ( IsAmbulo 16:2 )

(2) Kunezilonda ezimbi kulabo abanophawu lwesilo

buza: Uyini umuntu onophawu lwesilo?
impendulo: uphawu lwesilo 666 →Labo abathole uphawu lwesilo emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo.

Futhi kwenza wonke umuntu, omkhulu noma omncane, ocebile noma ompofu, okhululekile noma oyisigqila, ukuba athole uphawu esandleni sakhe sokunene noma ebunzini labo. Akakho ovunyelwe ukuthenga noma ukuthengisa, kuphela onophawu, igama lesilo, noma inombolo yegama lesilo. Nakhu ukuhlakanipha: oqondayo makabale isibalo sesilo; amakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisithupha nesithupha . ( IsAmbulo 13:16-18 )

(3) Izilonda ezimbi zenzeka kubantu abakhulekela izilo

buza: Obani abantu abakhonza izilo?
impendulo: " Labo abakhonza izilwane "kusho ukukhonza" inyoka ", odrago, odeveli, uSathane nazo zonke izithixo zamanga zezwe. Njengokukhonza uBuddha, ukukhulekela uGuanyin Bodhisattva, ukukhulekela izithombe, ukukhulekela abantu abakhulu noma amaqhawe, ukukhulekela konke okusemanzini, izidalwa eziphilayo emhlabeni, izinyoni zezulu. , njll. Wonke abhekisela kubantu abakhonza izilwane . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

articles.title: Inceku Ehluphekayo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 8 amavesi 16-17 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Inceku Ehluphekayo" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Uma sihlupheka kanye noKristu, nathi siyokhazinyuliswa kanye naye! Amen !

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ukuhlupheka KukaJesu Kristu

(1) UJesu wazalwa futhi walala emkhombeni

buza: Yayikuphi ukuzalwa nokubekwa kweNkosi ekhazimulayo Yomhlaba Wonke?
impendulo: Elele emkhombeni
Ingelosi yathi kubo: “Ningesabi; nginibikela izindaba ezinhle zokuthokoza okukhulu okuzakuba kubantu bonke, ngokuba nizalelwe namuhla uMsindisi onguKristu iNkosi emzini kaDavide. Umntwana, kuhlanganise nokuzembathisa izindwangu nokulala emkhombeni kuyisibonakaliso.”— Luka 2:10-12 .

(2) Ukuthatha isimo sesigqila futhi enziwe ngomfanekiso womuntu

buza: Unjani uMsindisi uJesu?
impendulo: ethatha isimo senceku, enziwe ngomfanekiso wabantu
Mawube kini lowo mqondo owawukuKristu Jesu: yena enesimo sikaNkulunkulu akathi ukulingana noNkulunkulu kuyinto yokubamba, kepha wazidela, ethatha isimo senceku, wazalwa engumuntu. ukufana; Isikhombo ( KwabaseFilipi) Incwadi 2, amavesi 5-7 )

(3) Ukubalekela eGibhithe ngemva kokubhekana noshushiso

Kwathi sezihambile, ingilosi yeNkosi yabonakala kuJosefa ngephupho, yathi: Vuka, uthabathe umntwana lonina, ubalekele eGibhithe, uhlale khona ngize ngikutshele; ngoba uHerodi uzalidinga ukuze ambhubhise.” Ngakho uJosefa wasukuma wathatha umntwana nonina ebusuku waya eGibhithe, bahlala khona waze wafa uHerode. Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuba kugcwaliseke okwashiwo iNkosi ngomprofethi, ethi: “INdodana yami ngayibiza iphuma eGibhithe.” ( Mathewu 2:13-15 )

(4) Wabethelwa esiphambanweni ukuze asindise isintu esonweni

1 Isono sabo bonke sibekwe phezu kwakhe

Umbuzo: Isono sethu sibekwe kubani?
Impendulo: Isono sabo bonke abantu sibekwe phezu kukaJesu Kristu.
Sonke sidukile njengezimvu, yilowo nalowo uphendukele endleleni yakhe; Inkomba ( Isaya 53:6 )

2 Waholwa njengewundlu eliyiswa ekuhlatshweni

Wacindezelwa, kodwa akazange awuvule umlomo wakhe lapho ehlupheka wayiswa njengewundlu ekuhlatshweni, futhi njengemvu phambi kwabagundi bayo, kanjalo akazange awuvule umlomo wakhe. + Wasuswa ngenxa yokucindezela + nokwahlulelwa + kodwa labo ababenaye abacabanga ukuthi washaywa + futhi wanqunywa ezweni labaphilayo + ngenxa yesono sabantu bami na? Inkomba ( Isaya 53:7-8 )

3 ekufeni, yebo ekufeni esiphambanweni

Efunyenwe enesimo njengomuntu, wazithoba, walalela kwaze kwaba sekufeni, yebo, ekufeni esiphambanweni. Ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa kakhulu, wamnika igama eliphezu kwawo wonke amagama, ukuze ngegama likaJesu amadolo onke aguqe, awabasezulwini, nawasemhlabeni, naphansi komhlaba, nezilimi zonke zithi: “UJesu Kristu uyiNkosi.” kube ludumo kuNkulunkulu uBaba. (Funda eyabaseFilipi 2:8-11.)

2: Abaphostoli bahlupheka ngesikhathi beshumayela ivangeli

(1) Umphostoli uPawulu wahlupheka lapho eshumayela ivangeli

INkosi yathi ku-Ananiya: "Qhubeka! Uyisitsha sami esikhethiweyo sokufakaza ngegama lami phambi kwabezizwe namakhosi nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. Futhi ngizombonisa (uPawulu) okufanele kwenziwe ngenxa yegama lami." Ukuhlupheka okukhulu” ( IzEnzo 9:15-16 ).

(2) Bonke abaphostoli nabafundi bashushiswa futhi babulawa

1 UStefanu wabulawa ukholo —Bheka izEnzo 7:54-60
2 UJakobe, umfowabo kaJohane, wabulawa —Bheka izEnzo 12:1-2
3 UPetru uyabulawa —Bheka eyesi-2 Petru 1:13-14
4 UPawuli uyabulawa
Manje ngithululwa njengomnikelo, futhi ihora lokusuka kwami selifikile. Ngikulwile ukulwa okuhle, ngiliqedile ibanga, ngigcinile ukukholwa. Kusukela manje kubekelwe mina umqhele wokulunga, eyawunginika wona ngalolo suku iNkosi eyahlulela ngokulunga; ( 2 Thimothewu 4:6-8 )
5 Abaprofethi babulawa
“Jerusalema, Jerusalema, wena obulala abaprofethi nokhanda ngamatshe abathunywe kuwe, njengesikhukhukazi sibuthela amatshwele aso phansi kwamaphiko aso, kepha aniyikukhuluma 23:37)

3. Izinceku nezisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu ziyahlupheka lapho zishumayela ivangeli

(1) UJesu wahlupheka

Impela uzithwalele usizi lwethu, wathwala usizi lwethu; Kodwa yalinyazwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu, yachotshozwa ngobubi bethu. Ngesijeziso sakhe sinokuthula; Inkomba ( Isaya 53:4-5 )

(2) Izisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu ziyahlupheka lapho zishumayela ivangeli

1 Abanabo ubuhle obuhle
2 Ukubukeka kabi kunabanye
3 Abamemezi noma baphakamise amazwi abo ,
futhi izwi labo lizwakala ezitaladini
4 Badelelwa futhi balahlwa ngabanye
5 Ubuhlungu obuningi, ubumpofu, nokuzulazula
6 bavame ukuzwa usizi
(Ngaphandle komthombo wemali engenayo, ukudla, okokugqoka, indawo yokuhlala kanye nezinto zokuhamba konke kuyizinkinga)
7 ukuhlangabezana noshushiso
(“ ukwamukela kwangaphakathi "→→Abaprofethi bamanga, abazalwane bamanga bayanyundela nokwakha inkolo;" ukwamukela kwangaphandle "→→ Ngaphansi kokulawula kwenkosi esemhlabeni, kusukela ku-inthanethi kuya ekulawuleni okungaphansi, sabhekana nezithiyo, ukuphikiswa, ukusolwa, abantu bangaphandle abangakholwa, nokunye ukushushiswa okuningi.)
8 Bakhanyiselwa nguMoya oNgcwele futhi bashumayela iqiniso levangeli →→ IBhayibheli. Uma amazwi kaNkulunkulu esevuliwe, iziwula zingaqonda, zisindiswe, futhi zibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen!

UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. ( Roma 8:16-17 )

impendulo: " inyoka “USathane uSathane, inkosi yomhlaba, inceku yakhe.
