impendulo: " Inombolo ” ibhekisela ku icilongo okusho ukuthi, izingelosi eziyisikhombisa ziphethe amacilongo ayisikhombisa ezandleni zazo zase zilungele ukubetha.

buza: Liyini icilongo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1)Ngempi

Insimbi yomoya esetshenziswa ukudlulisa imiyalo ebuthweni ezinsukwini zakudala yayisesimweni seshubhu elineshubhu elincanyana nomlomo omkhulu Waqala ukwenziwa ngoqalo, ukhuni, njll., futhi kamuva lwenziwa ngethusi, isiliva noma igolide.
UJehova wathi kuMose: “Kumelwe wenze amacilongo amabili esiliva, amacilongo akhandwe ngesando, ukuze ubize ibandla futhi umise ikamu, lapho nishaya lawa macilongo, yonke inhlangano iyakuza kuwe futhi ihlangane phakathi kwenhlangano. Emnyango wetabernakele, uma ushaya isingqimba esisodwa, zonke izikhulu zebutho lakwa-Israyeli ziyakubuthana kuwe; Ukuze nilwe nezitha zenu ezinicindezelayo, shayani icilongo ngezwi elikhulu , ngesikhumbuzo phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, Futhi isindiswe esitheni . Inkomba ( Numeri 10:1-5, 9 no-31:6 )

Numeri [Isahluko 31:6] Ngakho uMose wathuma amadoda ayinkulungwane esizweni ngasinye ukulwa , wathuma uFinehasi indodana ka-Eleyazare umpristi kanye naye; shayani icilongo kakhulu .

(2) Isetshenziselwa ukudumisa

Umculo wezinsimbi owawudlalwa eTestamenteni Elidala wawubizwa ngokuthi " uphondo ”, shayani icilongo nidumise uNkulunkulu.

Ninikele ngeminikelo yokushiswa neminikelo yokuthula ngezinsuku zenu zokujabula, nangemikhosi yenu, nangokwethwasa kwenyanga yenu. shaya icilongo , lokhu kuyakuba yisikhumbuzo phambi kukaNkulunkulu wakho. nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. ” Inkomba ( Numeri 10:10 kanye neyoku-1 IziKronike 15:28 )

buza: Isho ukuthini lapho ingelosi ishaya icilongo layo?
Impendulo: Buthani amaKrestu ukusuka kolunye uhlangothi lwezulu kuya kolunye uhlangothi lwezulu .

3. Ukukhala kwecilongo lokugcina

buza: icilongo indandatho yokugcina Kuzokwenzekani kithi?
Impendulo: UJesu uyeza futhi imizimba yethu sihlengiwe! Amen!

(1)Abafileyo bayovuswa
(2) Ungabi ngongafi
(3) Imizimba yethu kudingeka ishintshe

(4)Ukufa kuginywe yimpilo kaKristu

Umzuzwana nje, ngokucwayiza kweliso, icilongo igalelo lokugcina isikhathi. Ngokuba icilongo liyakukhala, Abafileyo bayovuswa bengafi , nathi kudingeka sishintshe. Lokhu okonakalayo kumele kube (kube: umbhalo wasekuqaleni uthi gqoka ; okufanayo ngezansi) ukungafi, lokhu okufayo kufanele kugqoke ukungafi. Nxa lokhu okubolayo sekwembethe ukungonakali, lalokhu okufayo sekwembethe ukungafi, khona-ke kulotshiwe ukuthi: Ukufa kugwinywe ukunqoba “Amazwi agcwaliseka. Inkomba ( 1 Korinte 15:52-54 )

(5) Nihlwithwe kanyekanye emafwini ukuyohlangabeza iNkosi
Ngokuba iNkosi uqobo iyakwehla ezulwini ngokumemeza, ngezwi lengelosi enkulu, nangecilongo likaNkulunkulu, nabafileyo kuKristu bayakuvuka kuqala; Ngemva kwalokho thina esiphilayo esisele sizahlwithwa kanye labo emayezini ukuze sihlangabeze iNkosi emoyeni. Ngale ndlela, siyoba neNkosi kuze kube phakade. ( 1 Thesalonika 4:16-17 )

(6) Ngokuqinisekile siyobona isimo sangempela seNkosi

Bazalwane abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu manje, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; Siyazi ukuthi uma iNkosi ibonakala, sizofana nayo ngoba sizoyibona njengoba injalo . (1 Johane 3:2)

impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ukwembula Izimpawu Zophawu Lokuqala:

1 Ngibone ihhashi elimhlophe → (Lifana nobani?)
2 Ukugibela ihhashi → (Ubani ogibele ihhashi elimhlophe?)
3 Ukubamba umnsalo → (Wenzani ngomnsalo?)
4 Futhi wanikwa umqhele → (Ubani owamnika umqhele?)
5 Waphuma → (Waphumelani?)
6 Ukunqoba nokunqoba → (Ubani owinile futhi wanqoba futhi?)

3. Hlukanisa oKristu beqiniso/bamanga

(1)Indlela yokuhlukanisa iqiniso kwamanga

"Ihhashi elimhlophe" → limelela uphawu lobungcwele
"Indoda egibele ihhashi iphethe umnsalo" → ifanekisela impi noma impi
“Futhi wanikwa umqhele” → enomqhele negunya
"Futhi waphuma" → Shumayela ivangeli?
“Ukunqoba nokunqoba futhi” → Ukushumayela ivangeli kunokunqoba nokunqoba futhi?

amasonto amaningi Bonke bakholelwa ukuthi “ogibele ihhashi elimhlophe” umelela “uKristu”
Lifanekisela abaphostoli bebandla lokuqala abashumayela ivangeli futhi banqoba futhi futhi.

(2) Izici zikaKristu, iNkosi yamaKhosi:

1 Ngawabuka amazulu evuleka
2 Kukhona ihhashi elimhlophe
3 Ogibele ihhashi kuthiwa uthembekile futhi uneqiniso
4 Uyahlulela futhi enze impi ngokulunga
5 amehlo akhe anjengomlilo
6 Ekhanda lakhe kukhona imiqhele eminingi
7 Kukhona negama elilotshwe kuyo ongaziwa muntu ngaphandle kwakhe.
8 Wayegqoke izingubo ezifafazwe igazi lomuntu
9 Igama lakhe iZwi likaNkulunkulu.
10 Amabutho asezulwini amlandela egibele amahhashi amhlophe, embethe ilineni elicolekileyo, elimhlophe nelihlanzekileyo.
11 Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma inkemba ebukhali ukuze ashaye izizwe
12 Engutsheni yakhe nasethangeni lakhe kwakulotshwe igama lokuthi: “Inkosi yamakhosi, uMbusi wababusi.”

Qaphela: uKristu weqiniso →Wehla ezulwini egibele ihhashi elimhlophe nasemafwini, ubizwa ngokuthi oThembekileyo noQiniso, futhi ngokulunga uyahlulela futhi enze impi. Amehlo akhe anjengomlilo, nasekhanda lakhe kukhona imiqhele eminingi, negama elilotshiwe kuye elingaziwa muntu, kuphela yena. Wayembethe izingubo ezifafazwe ngegazi labantu, futhi igama lakhe kwakunguLizwi likaNkulunkulu. Amabutho onke asezulwini amlandela egibele amahhashi amhlophe, embethe ilineni elicolekileyo, elimhlophe nelimhlophe. "Asikho isidingo sokuthatha umnsalo" → Inkemba ebukhali yaphuma emlonyeni wakhe ( UMoya oNgcwele uyinkemba ), ekwazi ukushaya izizwe.. Engutsheni yakhe nasethangeni lakhe kwakulotshwe igama elithi: “Nkosi yamakhosi, uMbusi wababusi.

→ umKristu →Ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi balomhlaba wobumnyama, nabawomoya ababi ezindaweni eziphakemeyo inkemba yomoya ) leyo IZwi likaNkulunkulu Imithombo eminingi nganoma yisiphi isikhathi umthandazo Thandazela ukunqoba/uSathane. Ngale ndlela, ingabe niyaqonda futhi niyakwazi ukuhlukanisa umehluko? Bheka eyabase-Efesu 6:10-20

articles.title: Izimpawu eziyisikhombisa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Ake sivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo 5:5 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Omunye wabadala wathi kimi: “Bheka, iNgonyama yesizwe sakwaJuda, iMpande kaDavide, (IWundlu) Unqobile , Ikwazi ukuvula umqulu nokuvula izimpawu eziyisikhombisa .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Izimpawu eziyisikhombisa" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Qonda imibono neziprofetho zeNcwadi yeSambulo lapho iNkosi uJesu yavula khona izimpawu eziyisikhombisa zencwadi. Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

"Izimpawu eziyisikhombisa"

IWundlu liyakufanelekela ukuvula izimpawu eziyisikhombisa

1. [Seal]

buza: Kuyini uphawu?
impendulo: " phrinta " ibhekisela ezimpawini, izimpawu, izimpawu, nezimpawu izikhulu zasendulo, amakhosi, nababusi ngokuvamile okwenziwa ngegolide ne-jade.

IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo [8:6] Ngicela ungigcine enhliziyweni yakho njengo imprint , yifake engalweni njengesigxivizo...!

2. [Seal]

buza: Kuyini uphawu?
impendulo: " uphawu “Incazelo yeBhayibheli ibhekisela ekusebenziseni kukaNkulunkulu ( phrinta ) ukuvala, ukuvala, ukuvala, ukufihla nokuvala.

(1) Imibono neziprofetho ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa nesikhombisa zavalwa

“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakho nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isono, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngobubi, nokwethulwa (noma ukuhumusha: ukwambulwa) ukulunga okuphakade, Beka uphawu lwemibono neziprofetho , futhi nigcobe oNgcwele. ( Daniyeli 9:24 )

(2) Umbono wezinsuku ezingama-2300 uyavalwa

Umbono wezinsuku ezingu-2,300 uyiqiniso, kodwa Kufanele uwuvale lo mbono , ngoba uphathelene nezinsuku eziningi ezizayo. (Funda uDaniyeli 8:26.)

(3) Isikhathi esisodwa, isikhathi esibili, isigamu sesikhathi, sifihliwe futhi sinandiswe kuze kube sekupheleni

Ngamuzwa owayemi phezu kwamanzi embethe ilineni elicolekileyo, ephakamisela ezulwini izandla zakhe sobunxele nesokunene, efunga uJehova ophilayo kuze kube phakade, ethi: Unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka , lapho amandla abangcwele ephulwa, zonke lezi zinto ziyogcwaliseka. Lapho ngizwa lokhu, angizange ngikuqonde, ngakho ngathi: "Nkosi yami, yini ukuphela kwalezi zinto?" Wathi, “Daniyeli, qhubeka; ngokuba Lawa mazwi afihliwe futhi avaliwe , kuze kube sekupheleni. ( Daniyeli 12:7-9 )

(4) Kuyoba yizinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye

Kusukela esikhathini sokususwa komnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, nokumiswa kwesinengiso esichithayo, kuyakuba yizinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye. ( Daniyeli 12:11 )

(5) INkosi uMikayeli iyosukuma

“Khona uMikayeli, ingelosi enkulu, ovikela abantu bakho, uyosukuma, futhi kuyoba khona usizi olukhulu, olungakaze lube khona kusukela ekuqaleni kwesizwe kuze kube manje Incwadi izosindiswa ( Daniyeli 12:1 ).

(6) Izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi amathathu nanhlanu

Ubusisiwe olinda kuze kube usuku lwenkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi amathathu nanhlanu. ( Daniyeli 12:12 )

(7)Fihla lawa mazwi futhi unamathelise le ncwadi

Abaningi balabo abalele othulini lomhlaba bayophaphama. Phakathi kwabo kukhona abanokuphila okuphakade, futhi abanye abanamahloni futhi banengwa kuze kube phakade... Daniyeli, kufanele Fihla lawa mazwi, vala le ncwadi , kuze kube sekupheleni. Abaningi bazobe begijima beya le nale (noma kuhunyushwe ngokuthi: ukufunda ngobuqotho), futhi ulwazi luzokwanda. (Funda uDaniyeli 12:2-4.)

3. Umqulu uvalwe uphawu [ngezimpawu eziyisikhombisa]

(1) Ubani ofanelekayo ukuvula umqulu futhi aqaqe izimpawu zawo eziyisikhombisa?

Ngase ngibona esandleni sokunene salowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi umqulu ulotshwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle, unamathelisiwe ngezimpawu eziyisikhombisa. Ngase ngibona ingelosi enamandla imemeza ngezwi elikhulu, ithi: “Ngubani ofanele ukuvula incwadi nokuthukulula izimpawu zayo na?” ( IsAmbulo 5:1-2 )

(2) Lapho uJohane ebona ukuthi akekho ofanele ukuvula incwadi, wakhala kakhulu

akakho ezulwini, nasemhlabeni, naphansi komhlaba, ongavula incwadi, ayibuke; Ngenxa yokuthi kwakungekho muntu owayefanelekela ukuvula noma ukubuka umqulu, ngahlengezela izinyembezi. ( IsAmbulo 5:3-4 )

(3) Abadala batshela uJohane ukuthi ubani owayengavula izimpawu eziyisikhombisa

Enye yamalunga yathi kimi: “Ungakhali; bheka, iNgonyama yesizwe sakwaJuda, iMpande kaDavide; (IWundlu) Unqobile , Ikwazi ukuvula umqulu nokuvula izimpawu eziyisikhombisa . ’ ( IsAmbulo 5:5 )

(4)Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo

Kwakukhona njengolwandle lwengilazi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi, lufana nekristalu. Esihlalweni sobukhosi nasekuzungezeni isihlalo sobukhosi kwakukhona izidalwa ezine eziphilayo, zigcwele amehlo ngaphambili nangemuva. Inkomba (IsAmbulo 4:6)

buza: Ziyini izidalwa ezine eziphilayo?
impendulo: Ingelosi- Amakherubi .

Ikherubi ngalinye lalinobuso obune: ubuso bokuqala babungubuso bekherubi, ubuso besibili babungubuso bomuntu, obesithathu babungubuso bengonyama, nobesine babungubuso bokhozi. . ( Hezekeli 10:14 )

(5) Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo zifanekisela amavangeli amane

buza: Zifanekiselani izidalwa ezine?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Isidalwa esiphilayo sokuqala sasifana nengonyama
Ifanekisela iVangeli likaMathewu →→ uJesu uyinkosi
Isidalwa esiphilayo sesibili sasifana nethole
Ifanekisela iVangeli likaMarku →→ uJesu uyinceku
Isidalwa sesithathu esiphilayo sasinobuso obunjengobomuntu
Ifanekisela iVangeli likaLuka →→ uJesu uyindodana yomuntu
Isidalwa sesine sasinjengokhozi olundizayo
Ifanekisela iVangeli likaJohane →→ uJesu ungunkulunkulu

(6)Ama-engeli ayisikhombisa namehlo ayisikhombisa

buza: Asho ukuthini amakhona ayisikhombisa namehlo ayisikhombisa?
impendulo: " Ama-engeli ayisikhombisa namehlo ayisikhombisa "leyo imimoya kankulunkulu eyisikhombisa .

Qaphela: " imimoya eyisikhombisa ” Kodwa amehlo kaJehova aqalaza emhlabeni wonke.
(Funda uZakariya 4:10.)

buza: Ziyini izinti zezibani eziyisikhombisa?
impendulo: " Izinti zezibani eziyisikhombisa “Amabandla ayisikhombisa lawo.

buza: Zisho ukuthini izibani eziyisikhombisa?
impendulo: " izibani eziyisikhombisa " futhi libhekisela ku imimoya kankulunkulu eyisikhombisa

buza: Kusho ukuthini Izinkanyezi Eziyisikhombisa?
impendulo: " izinkanyezi eziyisikhombisa “Amabandla ayisikhombisa isithunywa .

Ngase ngibona isihlalo sobukhosi, nezidalwa ezine eziphilayo, neWundlu emi phakathi kwamalunga, sengathi lihlatshiwe; Ama-engeli ayisikhombisa namehlo ayisikhombisa ,leyo imimoya kankulunkulu eyisikhombisa , Ithunyelwe emhlabeni wonke . Inkomba (IsAmbulo 5:6; 1:20)

IsAmbulo [5:7-8] Lokhu inyama yemvu Yeza yawuthatha umqulu esandleni sokunene salowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi. Wathatha umqulu , nezidalwa ezine eziphilayo namalunga angamashumi amabili nane awa phansi phambi kweWundlu, ngamunye ephethe ihabhu nesitsha segolide esigcwele impepho, okwakuwumthandazo wabo bonke abangcwele.

buza: Lisho ukuthini elithi "Qin"?
impendulo: Bamdumisa uNkulunkulu ngezwi lamahabhu.

buza: Lisho ukuthini elithi "iphunga"?
impendulo: lokhu elimnandi Kungumthandazo wabo bonke abangcwele! eyamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu umoya umhlatshelo.
Kubo bonke abangcwele izingoma zokomoya cula izindumiso, ngo Thandaza ngoMoya oNgcwele .khuleka!
Lapho niza (bona) eNkosini, nani nifana namatshe aphilayo, akhiwe abe indlu yomoya ukukhonza njengabapristi abangcwele. Nikelani imihlatshelo engokomoya eyamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu ngoJesu Kristu . UPetru ( 1 Incwadi 2:5 )

(7) Izidalwa ezine namalunga angamashumi amabili nane ahlabelela ingoma entsha

1 Izidalwa ezine zihlabelela ingoma entsha

buza: Zifanekiselani izidalwa ezine ezicula ingoma entsha?
impendulo: Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo zifanekisela: " IVangeli likaMathewu, iVangeli likaMarku, iVangeli likaLuka, iVangeli likaJohane ”→IWundlu likaNkulunkulu lithumela abafundi ngeqiniso lamavangeli amane, futhi amaKristu angamaqiniso evangeli asindisa bonke abantu futhi asakazwa emhlabeni wonke nasemikhawulweni yomhlaba.

[Izidalwa ezine zicula iculo elisha] elifanekisela uNkulunkulu inyama yemvu sebenzisa okwakho Igazi Hlabelelani iculo elisha, elithengwe ezizweni zonke, nezilimi, nabantu, nezizwe; → Emva kwalokho ngabona, bheka, isixuku esikhulu ebesingenakubalwa muntu, siphuma kuzo zonke izizwe, nemindeni, nabantu, nezilimi, simi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi naphambi kweWundlu, sembethe izingubo ezimhlophe, siphethe amagatsha esundu ezandleni zaso. , bememeza ngezwi elikhulu, bememeza bethi: "Insindiso mayibe kuNkulunkulu wethu ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, nakulo iWundlu!" phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi, bakhuleka UNkulunkulu uthi: “Amen! Isibusiso, nenkazimulo, nokuhlakanipha, nokubonga, nodumo, namandla, makube kuNkulunkulu wethu kuze kube phakade naphakade. Amen ( IsAmbulo 7:9-12 )

2 Abadala abangamashumi amabili nane

buza: Obani abadala abangamashumi amabili nane?
impendulo: Israyeli 12 Isizwe + inyama yemvu 12 umphostoli

ITestamente Elidala: Izizwe Eziyishumi Nambili Zakwa-Israyeli

Kwakukhona ugange olude olunamasango ayishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kukhona izingelosi eziyishumi nambili, nasemasangweni kwakulotshiwe. Amagama ezizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli . ( IsAmbulo 21:12 )

ITestamente Elisha: AbaPhostoli Abayishumi Nambili

Ugange lwalunezisekelo eziyishumi nambili, naphezu kwezisekelo Amagama abaphostoli abayishumi nambili beWundlu . ( IsAmbulo 21:14 )

3 Bahlabelela izingoma ezintsha

Bahlabelela isihlabelelo esisha, bathi: “Ufanele ukuwuthatha umqulu nokuvula izimpawu zawo; nabapristi uNkulunkulu obusa phezu komhlaba.” Ngase ngibona, ngezwa izwi lezingelosi eziningi zizungeze isihlalo sobukhosi nezidalwa eziphilayo namalunga, izinkulungwane nezinkulungwane zazo ngenani, zisho ngezwi elikhulu zithi: “Lilifanele iWundlu elilingeneyo wabulawa, ingcebo, nokuhlakanipha, namandla, nodumo, nenkazimulo, nodumo.” Ngase ngizwa konke okusezulwini, nasemhlabeni, naphansi komhlaba, nasolwandle, nakho konke okudaliweyo, kuthi: “Makube kuye ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi nakulo iWundlu isibusiso nodumo nenkazimulo namandla kuze kube phakade naphakade. Izidalwa ezine eziphilayo zathi: “Amen!” Nabadala bawa phansi bakhuleka. ( IsAmbulo 5:9-14 )

1. Isoni esikhulu sinqoba izwe

buza: Isoni esikhulu siwuzuza kanjani umbuso?
impendulo: Wasebenzisa inkohliso ukuze athathe umbuso lapho abantu bengakakulungeli
“Kuyakuvela umuntu odelelekile esikhundleni sakhe njengenkosi, okungekho muntu oke wamnika udumo lombuso, kepha ozuza umbuso ngamazwi athophayo lapho engalungisiwe. ( Daniyeli 11:21 )

Kulabo abamvumayo uyobakhazimulisa, abanikeze amandla phezu kwabantu abaningi, futhi abanikeze amazwe njengezifumbathiso. (Funda uDaniyeli 11:24, 39.)

4 Lahlani iminikelo yokushiswa imihla yonke, ningcolise indawo engcwele, niziphakamise

Iyakuvusa impi, ingcolise indawo engcwele, inqaba, isuse umnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, imise isinengiso esiyincithakalo. ... “Inkosi iyokwenza noma yini eyithandayo, futhi iyoziphakamisa phezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu, futhi iyokhuluma amazwi angajwayelekile ngoNkulunkulu wawonkulunkulu, iyophumelela kuze kuphele ulaka lukaJehova, ngoba lokho akushilo kuyokwenzeka .Ngeke abe nandaba nohlu lwakhe ngoNkulunkulu wokhokho bakhe, noma uNkulunkulu ofiswa abesifazane, ngoba uyoziphakamisa ngaphezu kwakho konke okunye ( Daniyeli 11:31, 36-37 )

(5) Abangcwele bayokuwa ngenkemba yakhe

Uyosebenzisa amazwi ahlakaniphile ukuyenga labo abenza okubi futhi baphule isivumelwano; Abahlakaniphileyo babantu bayakufundisa abaningi, nokho bayakuwa ngenkemba izinsuku eziningi, noma bashiswe ngomlilo, bayiswe ekuthunjweni nasekuphangweni. Lapho bewa, bathola usizo oluncane, kodwa abantu abaningi beza kubo ngamazwi athophayo. Abanye kwabahlakaniphileyo bawa, ukuze abanye bacwengisiswe, ukuze babe mhlophe, babe mhlophe kuze kube sekupheleni, ngokuba ngesikhathi esimisiwe le nto iyophela. ( Daniyeli 11:32-35 )

2. Kumele kube nenhlekelele enkulu

buza: Iyiphi inhlekelele?
impendulo: Kusukela ekuqaleni komhlaba kuze kube manje, ayikaze ibe khona inhlekelele enjalo, futhi ayizange ibe khona inhlekelele enjalo kusukela ngaleso sikhathi. .

“Nikubonile okwashiwo umprofethi uDaniyeli, isinengiso sencithakalo ' yimani emhlabathini ongcwele (Labo abafunda lombhalo badinga ukuqonda). Ngaleso sikhathi abaseJudiya mababaleke baye ezintabeni; Maye kwabakhulelweyo nabancelisayo ngalezo zinsuku! Khulekani ukuthi nxa nibaleka, kungabi khona ubusika nesabatha; Ngoba ngaleso sikhathi kuyoba khona usizi olukhulu kusukela ekuqaleni kwezwe kuze kube manje, akukaze kube khona usizi olunjalo, futhi ngeke kuphinde kube khona. . ( Mathewu 24:15-2 )

3. Izinsuku eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amathathu

buza: Zingaki izinsuku eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amathathu?
impendulo: Ngaphezu kweminyaka engu-6, cishe iminyaka engu-7 .

Ngase ngizwa oNgcwele ekhuluma, omunye oNgcwele wabuza oNgcwele owakhuluma wathi: “Ngubani osusa umnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke nesono sokubhubhisa, onyathela phansi indlu engcwele namabutho akwa-Israyeli? thatha ukuze umbono ugcwaliseke na?” Wathi kimi, “Ezinsukwini eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amathathu, indlu engcwele iyohlanjululwa... Umbono wezinsuku ezingu-2,300 uyiqiniso , kodwa kumelwe uwuvale lo mbono ngoba uphathelene nezinsuku eziningi ezizayo. ” Inkomba (Daniyeli 8:13-14 kanye 8:26)

4. Lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa

buza: Yiziphi izinsuku ezizofinyezwa?
impendulo: Izinsuku ezingama-2300 zosizi olukhulu zizofinyezwa .

Ngokuba kuyakuba khona usizi olukhulu, olungazange lube khona kusukela ekuqaleni kwezwe kuze kube manje, futhi olungasayikuphinde lube khona. Uma lezo zinsuku zingafinyezwanga, akukho nyama eyakusindiswa; Kodwa ngenxa yabakhethiweyo lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa . ( Mathewu 24:21-22 )

Qaphela: INkosi uJesu yathi: " lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa "," ngalolo suku " Ibhekiselwa ngaluphi usuku?

→→ ibhekisela kumprofethi uDaniyeli ebona Inhlekelele umbono, Kuchaza Ingelosi uGabriyeli 2300 izinsuku Umbono uqinisile, kodwa kufanele uwuvale lo mbono ngoba uphathelene nezinsuku eziningi ezizayo.

( 2300 izinsuku Imfihlakalo ayikwazi ukuqondwa ingqondo yomuntu, ulwazi lomuntu, noma ifilosofi yomuntu UMoya oNgcwele ), kungakhathaliseki ukuthi unolwazi noma unolwazi kangakanani, awusoze wakwazi ukuqonda izinto zasezulwini nezikamoya)
Ngiyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngothando lwakho, sibonge iNkosi uJesu Kristu ngomusa wakho, futhi ngiyabonga ngokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele.
Siholele kulo lonke iqiniso →→ 2300 izinsuku Izinsuku zosizi olukhulu ziyancipha , konke kwambulwe kithi bantwana bakaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Ngoba amasonto amaningi esikhathini esidlule " umchazi "Konke Akachazanga ngokucacile Lokho okwashiwo umprofethi uDaniyeli " Imfihlakalo "Yezinsuku Eziyizinkulungwane Ezimbili Namakhulu Amathathu" Okushoyo ukuthi kubangela ukuba ibandla lidideke kakhulu futhi lingalungile ngokwezimfundiso. Akufanele kube njalo" Isonto lama-Seventh-day Adventist " Ellen White Sebenzisa eyakho i-Neo-Confucianism ukubala ukuthi kusukela ku-456 BC kuya ku-1844 BC, uphenyo nokuqulwa kwecala ezulwini kwaqala.

Emihlanu, unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, ingxenye yonyaka

(1) Isoni siphula amandla abangcwele

buza: Koze kube nini ukuthi umuntu wesono aphule amandla abangcwele?
impendulo: Unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka
Ngamuzwa owayemi phezu kwamanzi embethe ilineni elicolekileyo, ephakamisela ezulwini izandla zakhe sobunxele nesokunene, efunga uJehova ophilayo kuze kube phakade, ethi: Unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka , lapho amandla abangcwele ephulwa, zonke lezi zinto ziyogcwaliseka. ’ ( Daniyeli 12:7 )

(2) Abangcwele bayonikelwa ezandleni zakhe

Iyakukhuluma amazwi okuzibonga koPhezukonke, ihluphe abangcwele boPhezukonke, ifune ukuguqula izikhathi nemithetho. Abangcwele bayonikelwa ezandleni zakhe isikhathi, nesikhathi, nengxenye yesikhathi . ( Daniyeli 7:25 )

(3) Ukushushiswa kwabesifazane (isonto)

Lapho udrako ebona ukuthi uphonswe phansi, washushisa owesifazane owayezele umntwana wesilisa. Owesifazane wanikwa amaphiko amabili okhozi olukhulu, ukuze andizele ehlane, endaweni yakhe, enyoka; Unyaka owodwa, emibili nengxenye . ( IsAmbulo 12:13-14 )

(4)Izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye

buza: Ungakanani unyaka, iminyaka emibili, nengxenye yonyaka?
impendulo: izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye → Yilokho ( Iminyaka emi-3 nengxenye ).
Kusukela ngesikhathi sokususwa komnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, kumiswe isinengiso esiyincithakalo, kuyakuba khona izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye . ( Daniyeli 12:11 )

Qaphela: 2300 izinsuku Usizi Olukhulu lungokoqobo; Kodwa ngenxa yabakhethiweyo lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa .

buza: Yiziphi izinsuku zokunciphisa inhlekelele?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka
Inkomba (IsAmbulo 12:14 noDaniyeli 12:7)

2 izinyanga ezingamashumi amane nambili
( IsAmbulo 11:2 )

3 izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye
( Daniyeli 12:11 )

4 izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisithupha
Inkomba (IsAmbulo 11:3; 12:6)

5 Izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi amathathu nanhlanu
( Daniyeli 12:12 )

Izinsuku Eziyisi-6 Zosizi → Iminyaka emi-3 nengxenye .
→→Umbono owabonwa umprofethi uDaniyeli,
→→Ingelosi uGabriyeli iyachaza 2300 izinsuku Umbono wosizi olukhulu ungokoqobo;
→→ INkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngenxa yabakhethiweyo kuphela, lezo zinsuku ziyofinyezwa→→ngenxa Iminyaka emi-3 nengxenye 】 Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

articles.title: Izimpawu zokubuya kukaJesu (Isifundo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuDaniyeli Isahluko 7, amavesi 2-3, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: UDaniyeli wathi: “Ngabona umbono ebusuku, ngabona imimoya yomine yezulu ikhuphuka ivunguza phezu kolwandle. Izilo ezine ezinkulu zaphuma olwandle, ngasinye sinesimo esihlukile :

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Izimpawu Zokubuya KukaJesu" Cha. 6 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Labo abaqonda izilo zikaDaniyeli nesAmbulo umbono .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

umbono wesilo

buza: " isilo "Kusho ukuthini?"
impendulo: " isilo ” ibhekisela esihlokweni esithi “inyoka”, udrako, uSathane, udeveli, nomphik’ ukristu ( IsAmbulo 20:2 )

buza: " isilo "Kufanekiselani?"
impendulo: " isilo “Futhi ifanekisela imibuso yalelizwe, umbuso kaSathane.
1 Umhlaba wonke usezandleni zomubi →Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 5:19
2 Izizwe zonke zomhlaba →Bheka kuMathewu 4:8
3 Imibuso Yomhlaba →Ingelosi yesikhombisa yabetha icilongo layo, kwase kuba khona izwi elikhulu ezulwini, lithi: “Imibuso yalelizwe isibe umbuso weNkosi yethu nokaKristu wayo, futhi iyobusa kuze kube phakade naphakade. 15)

1. Izilo ezine ezinkulu zaphuma olwandle

UDaniyeli [Isahluko 7:2-3] UDaniyeli wathi: “Ngabona umbono ebusuku, futhi ngabona imimoya yomine yezulu ikhuphuka futhi ivunguza phezu kolwandle. Izilo ezine ezinkulu zenyuka ziphuma olwandle, yileso naleso sinesimo esihlukile;

Esokuqala sifana nengonyama → UMbuso WaseBhabhiloni

Sasinamaphiko okhozi; ngisabheka, amaphiko esilo asuswa, isilo sasukuma emhlabathini, sema ngezinyawo ezimbili njengomuntu, sazuza inhliziyo yesilo. (Daniyeli 7:4)

Isilo sesibili sifana nebhere → amaMede namaPheresiya

Kwakukhona esinye isilo esifana nebhere, isilo sesibili, sihlezi ngakuso, sinezimbambo ezintathu emlonyeni waso. Omunye wayala isilo, “Vuka udle inyama eningi.” ( Daniyeli 7:5 )

Isilo sesithathu sifana nengwe → the devil Greek

Emva kwalokho ngabona, bheka, esinye isilo esifana nengwe, sinamaphiko amane enyoni emhlane waso, nesilo sasinamakhanda amane; (Daniyeli 7:6)

Isilo sesine sasisabekayo → UMbuso WamaRoma

Ngase ngibona embonweni wasebusuku, bheka, isilo sesine sasiyesabeka kakhulu, sinamandla amakhulu, sinamandla, sinamazinyo amakhulu ensimbi, sashwabadela, sahlafuna okuseleyo, sanyathela okuseleyo phansi kwezinyawo zaso. Lesi silo sihluke kakhulu kwezilo ezintathu zokuqala, sinezimpondo eziyishumi ekhanda laso. Ngathi ngisabuka izimpondo, bheka, kwavela uphondo oluncane phakathi kwazo; Lolu phondo lunamehlo, njengamehlo omuntu, nomlomo okhuluma amazwi ayihaba. ( Daniyeli 7:7-8 )

Inceku yawuchaza umbono wesilo sesine.

buza: okwesine" isilo "Libhekise kubani?"
impendulo: umbuso waseRoma

(Qaphela: Ngokomlando, kusukela eBhabhiloni → iMede-Pheresiya → Inkosi Yedemoni LamaGreki → UMbuso WamaRoma.)

buza: Inhloko yesilo sesine ine " eziyishumi jiao "Kusho ukuthini?"
impendulo: Ikhanda linayo" eziyishumi jiao “Yisilo sesine ( umbuso waseRoma ) uyovuka phakathi kwamakhosi ayishumi.

buza: Obani amakhosi ayishumi azovela eMbusweni WaseRoma?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
27 BC - 395 AD → Umbuso WaseRoma
395 AD - 476 AD → Western Roman Empire
395 AD - 1453 AD → Eastern Roman Empire
UMbuso WaseRoma wasendulo wawuhlanganisa: i-Italy, iFrance, iJalimane, iSpain, iPortugal, i-Austria, iSwitzerland, iGrisi, iTurkey, i-Iraq, iPalestine, iGibhithe, i-Israel, neVatican. Kanye namazwe amaningi ahlukana noMbuso WamaRoma, kuhlanganise neRussia yanamuhla, i-United States, namanye amazwe amaningi.

buza: kanjalo" eziyishumi jiao " amakhosi ayishumi Ubani?
impendulo: Abakalinqobi izwe okwamanje
buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Ngoba abakafiki, kodwa lapho befika bayovela futhi bayozuza umbuso → kusukela “Kuyamangalisa” UMbuso WaseBhabhiloni → IMede-Pheresiya → IGrisi → UMbuso WamaRoma → Izinyawo ingxenye yobumba nengxenye yensimbi eziyishumi " izinzwane " Ziyizimpondo eziyishumi namakhosi ayishumi .
Izimpondo eziyishumi ozibonayo zingamakhosi ayishumi . ( IsAmbulo 17:12 )

buza: Okunye" Xiaojiao "Kusho ukuthini?"
impendulo: " Xiaojiao ” → “ uphondo "Kubhekiselwa ezilo kanye nezinyoka zasendulo. Lolu phondo lunamehlo, njengamehlo omuntu →" inyoka “Wabonakala esesimweni somuntu, wayenomlomo okhuluma izinto ezinkulu → Waze wahlala ngisho ethempelini likaNkulunkulu, ezibiza ngokuthi uNkulunkulu → Lo muntu kwakungu-2 Thesalonika 2:3-4 ( NW ) uPaul ) wathi " Kwambulwa isoni esikhulu ", unguKristu wamanga. Yilokho ingelosi eyakusho, "Khona-ke kuyovela inkosi."

Washo lokhu owayemi khona: “Isilo sesine singumbuso wesine oyofika ezweni, wehluke kuyo yonke imibuso, udle umhlaba wonke, uwunyathele phansi kwezinyawo zawo, uphume kulo mbuso. kuyakuvela amakhosi ayishumi, khona-ke kuyakuvela inkosi ehlukile kunawokuqala; futhi uyozama ukuguqula izikhathi nemithetho. Abangcwele bayonikelwa ezandleni zakhe isikhathi, nesikhathi, nengxenye yesikhathi . ( Daniyeli 7:23-25 )

2. Umbono wezinqama nezimbuzi

Ingelosi uGabriyeli ichaza umbono

(1)Inqama enezimpondo ezimbili

buza: Ingubani inqama enezimpondo ezimbili?
impendulo: inkosi yezindaba nePheresiya
Inqama enezimpondo ezimbili oyibonileyo iyinkosi yamaMede namaPheresiya. ( Daniyeli 8:20 )

(2) imbuzi yenkomo

buza: Ingubani imbuzi ye-billy?
impendulo: inkosi yamaGreki

buza: Ingubani inkosi yaseGrisi?
impendulo: U-Alexander Omkhulu (amarekhodi omlando)
Impongo iyinkosi yaseGrisi (ngesiGreki: umbhalo wokuqala uthi Yawan; okufanayo ngezansi); uphondo olukhulu phakathi kwamehlo yinkosi yokuqala. ( Daniyeli 8:21 )

(3)2300 Day Vision

1 Umunwe omkhulu wophondo oluphukile →Inkosi yamaGreki "u-Alexander Omkhulu" yafa ngo-333 BC.

2 Impande yophondo olukhulu ihlumela amagumbi amane →Igama elithi "Amakhosi Amane" libhekisela emiBusweni Emine.
UCassander →wabusa iMakedoniya
ULysimachus → Wabusa i-Thrace ne-Asia Minor
USeleucus → Wabusa iSiriya
UPtolemy → Wabusa IGibhithe
Inkosi uPtolemy →323-198 BC
Inkosi uSeleucid → 198-166 BC
Inkosi uHasmani → 166-63 BC
Umbuso WamaRoma → 63 BC kuya ku-27 BC-1453 BC

3 Kwakhula umbuso omncane kwelinye lamagumbi amane → Ekupheleni kwamagumbi amane, kwavela inkosi.
buza: Ubani lolu phondo oluncane oluya luba namandla?
impendulo: umbuso waseRoma
buza: Kuyakuvela inkosi eyakuthatha iminikelo yakho yokushiswa imihla yonke, ichithe indlu yakho engcwele.
impendulo: Umphikukristu.
Ngo-AD 70, uMbuso WaseRoma onyanyekayo nobhubhisayo " Jikelele uThithu" Wathumba iJerusalema, wabhubhisa iminikelo yokutjhiswa, watjhabalalisa nethempeli. Ungummeleli Womphikukristu .

→→Ekupheleni kwale mibuso emine, lapho izono zalabo abeqa umthetho sezigcwele, kuyovela inkosi, enesimo esisabekayo futhi enamandla okusebenzisa izinto ezimbaxa-mbili... Iyosebenzisa amandla ukuze ifeze ukukhohlisa kwayo, futhi uyozidla enhliziyweni yakhe, lapho abantu bengakulungele, uyobabhubhisa abantu abaningi; Umbono wezinsuku ezingu-2,300 uyiqiniso , kodwa kumelwe uwuvale lo mbono ngoba uphathelene nezinsuku eziningi ezizayo. (Funda uDaniyeli 8:23-26.)

3. INkosi yaseNingizimu neNkosi yaseNyakatho

(1)Inkosi yaseNingizimu

buza: Ingubani inkosi yaseningizimu?
impendulo: Ptolemaeus I Soter... inkosi yamazwe amaningi emva kwezizukulwane eziyisithupha. Manje libhekisela eGibhithe, Iraq, Iran, Turkey, Syria, Palestine namanye amazwe amaningi anezinkolelo zobuqaba → bonke abamele "isilo", inkosi yaseningizimu.
“Inkosi yaseningizimu iyoba namandla, omunye wezinduna zayo zibe namandla kunayo, futhi iyoba negunya, negunya layo liyoba likhulu.” ( Daniyeli 11:5 ) Inkosi yaseningizimu iyoba namandla amakhulu kunawo wonke.

(2)Inkosi yaseNyakatho

buza: Ingubani inkosi yasenyakatho?
impendulo: U-Antiochus I kuya ku-Epiphanes IV, njll., kamuva ubhekisela eMbusweni WaseRoma, uMbuso WaseTurkey Ottoman ... nakwamanye amazwe. Abanye bathi yiRussia,” Amarekhodi omlando ayesabeka "Ngeke ngisaxoxa ngakho lapha. Kukhona namabandla amaningi asebenzisa ukucabanga kwawo kwe-Neo-Confucian ukwenza umbhedo. I-Seventh-day Adventist ithi iSonto LamaRoma Katolika, kanye ne-United States. Uyakholelwa? Ukukhuluma? umbhedo uzoholela emangeni futhi udeveli angasetshenziswa kalula.

(3)Isinengiso sencithakalo

1 unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka
Ngamuzwa owayemi phezu kwamanzi embethe ilineni, ephakamisela isandla sakhe sokhohlo nesokunene ezulwini, efunga ophilayo kuze kube phakade, ethi: “Akuyikuba yisikhathi, nezikhathi ezimbili, nenxenye yesikhathi, lapho amandla abangcwele eyokwephulwa futhi konke kwenzeka.” ( Daniyeli 12:7 )

2 izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye
Kusukela esikhathini sokususwa komnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, nokumiswa kwesinengiso esichithayo, kuyakuba yizinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye. ( Daniyeli 12:11 )

buza: Mingaki iminyaka eyinkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye?
impendulo: iminyaka emithathu nengxenye → Isinengiso sencithakalo" isoni “Kwambulwa ukuthi lapho umnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke usususiwe, nesinengiso esiyincithakalo sesimisiwe, kuyakuba yizinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye, okungukuthi, isikhathi, nezikhathi, nenxenye yesikhathi,” iminyaka emithathu nengxenye "Yephula amandla abangcwele futhi ushushise amaKristu.

3 Izinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi amathathu nanhlanu

articles.title: Izimpawu zokubuya kukaJesu (Isifundo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu Isahluko 24 kanye nevesi 32 futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Lokhu ningakufunda emkhiwaneni: lapho amagatsha esethamba, ehluma amaqabunga, niyazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Izimpawu Zokubuya KukaJesu" Cha. 5 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu mabawuqonde umfanekiso womkhiwane ohluma futhi umila amaqabunga.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

UJesu wabatshela omunye umfanekiso: “Bhekani umkhiwane nayo yonke eminye imithi; ukuhluma Uma ulibona, uyokwazi ngokwemvelo ukuthi ihlobo liyasondela. …Ngakho, njengoba nibona lezi zinto kancane kancane zenzeka, nizokwazi ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. ( Luka 21:29, 31 )

Umfanekiso Wesihlahla Somkhiwane (Ukuhluma)

1. Intwasahlobo

buza: umkhiwane ( ukuhluma ) Amaqabunga akhula ngasiphi isikhathi sonyaka?
Impendulo: intwasahlobo

buza: Umelelani umkhiwane?
impendulo: " umkhiwane ” ufanekisela abantu bakaNkulunkulu abakhethiwe [u-Israyeli]

(1) AmaJuda angenazithelo

UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi umkhiwane "u-Israyeli" wawunamaqabunga kuphela futhi ungenazithelo → njengoba uJohane uMbhapathizi asho, "Kumelwe nithele isithelo esivumelana nokuphenduka... Manje imbazo isibekiwe empandeni yomuthi; Yilowo nalowo muthi ongatheli izithelo ezinhle uyanqunywa, uphonswe emlilweni . ( Mathewu 3:8, 10 )

(2) Indunduma kaJese ( ukuhluma ) igatsha

U-Isaya [Isahluko 11:1] Kusukela embhalweni wokuqala kaJese (umbhalo wokuqala uthi Dun) I-Betfair Amagatsha aphuma ezimpandeni zakhe ayothela izithelo.
【 iTestamente elidala "UNkulunkulu wamisa nabantu bakwa-Israyeli" isivumelwano somthetho "Umuthi wakwa-Israyeli ngaphansi komthetho" umkhiwane “Amaqabunga kuphela angeke athele izithelo, Vele ugawule .
【 ITestamente Elisha 】UNkulunkulu kanye ( okusha abantu bakwa-Israyeli" isivumelwano somusa ” → Betfa from Jesse’s Pier ( YiNkosi uJesu ); Igatsha elizelwe empandeni kaJesu Kristu liyothela izithelo . Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(3) Umkhiwane (omilayo) umila amaqabunga

buza: Kusho ukuthini uma umkhiwane (omilayo) ukhula amaqabunga?
impendulo: Bukela ku" ITestamente Elisha "Njengenduku ka-Aroni" ukuhluma ” → UNumeri Isahluko 17 Ivesi 8 Kwathi ngangomuso wangena etendeni lokuhlangana, owayazi ukuthi u-Aroni wesizwe sakwaLevi Izisebenzi sezihlumile, zakhiqiza imiqumbe, zaqhakaza futhi zakhiqiza amabhilikosi avuthiwe .
Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Nxa nibona amagatsha omkhiwane esethamba, ehluma, niyakwazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze → Umkhiwane usuzothela “Lapho nibona lezi zinto zenzeka kancane kancane, yazini ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Amen

2. Ihlobo

buza: Umkhiwane uthela ngasiphi isikhathi sonyaka?
impendulo: ihlobo

(1) Isithelo sikaMoya oNgcwele

buza: egqumeni likaJese kuyakumila igatsha, lithele siphi isithelo na?
Impendulo: Isithelo sikaMoya
buza: Ziyini izithelo zikaMoya?
impendulo: Isithelo sikaMoya oNgcwele si Uthando, injabulo, ukuthula, ukubekezela, umusa, ubuhle, ukwethembeka, ubumnene, ukuzithiba . Awukho umthetho omelene nezinto ezinjalo. ( Galathiya 5:22-23 )

(2) UJesu washumayela ivangeli kumaJuda iminyaka emithathu

Ngakho wasebenzisa isingathekiso: “Umuntu unomkhiwane (ebhekisela ku Israyeli etshalwe esivinini ( Indlu kaNkulunkulu ) ngaphakathi. Wafika esihlahleni efuna isithelo, kodwa akasitholanga. Ngakho wathi kumgcini-nsimu, ‘Bheka, mina (ebhekisela ku baba osezulwini ) Sekuyiminyaka emithathu ngiza kulo mkhiwane ngifuna isithelo, kodwa angisitholi. Ligawule lidle izwe ngeze! 'Umlimi ( UJesu ) wathi: "Nkosi, wugcine kulo nyaka ngize ngimbe umhlabathi owuzungezile ngifake ubulongwe lapho. Uma uthela isithelo ngokuzayo, wuyeke uhambe. Ngaphandle kwalokho, ugawule futhi." ’” (Funda uLuka 13:6-9.)

3. Ikwindla

(1) Ukuvuna

buza: Avuthwa nini amakhiwane?
impendulo: ikwindla

buza: iyini inkathi ekwindla
impendulo: inkathi yokuvuna

Ningasho yini ukuthi, ‘Ngesikhathi sokuvuna kusekhona izinyanga ezine '? Ngithi kini: Phakamiselani amehlo enu endle, nibheke; Izitshalo sezivuthiwe (zimhlophe embhalweni wokuqala) futhi zilungele ukuvunwa. Umvuni uyakwamukela inkokhelo yakhe futhi ubuthe okusanhlamvu kube ukuphila okuphakade , ukuze umhlwanyeli nomvuni bajabule kanyekanye. Njengoba isisho sithi: 'Umuntu ohlwanyelayo ( UJesu uhlwanyela imbewu ), lo muntu uyavuna’ ( AmaKristu ayashumayela ), lesi sitatimende siyiqiniso ngokusobala. Mina nginithumele ukuvuna lokho eningakukhandlelanga, nithokozele umshikashika wabanye. ” Inkomba ( Johane 4:35-38 )

(2)Isikhathi sokuvuna ukuphela kwezwe

Waphendula wathi: “Ohlwanyela imbewu enhle yiNdodana yomuntu; usathane; Isikhathi sokuvuna singukuphela kwezwe; abavunayo yizingelosi . ( Mathewu 13:37-39 )

(3) Ukuvuna izitshalo emhlabathini

Ngase ngibona, bheka, ifu elimhlophe, naphezu kwefu kwakuhlezi onjengeNdodana yomuntu, enomqhele wegolide ekhanda layo, esandleni sayo inesikela elibukhali. Enye ingelosi yaphuma ethempelini, yamemeza ngezwi elikhulu kuye ohlezi phezu kwefu, yathi: Yelula isikela lakho uvune, ngokuba ukuvuna sekufikile, umhlaba usuvuthiwe; . “Ohlezi phezu kwefu waliphonsa isikela lakhe emhlabeni, kwavunwa isivuno somhlaba.” ( IsAmbulo 14:14-16 )

4. Ubusika

(1)Usuku lokwahlulela

buza: Ubusika bunjani?
impendulo: I-Hibernation (ukuphumula) ukuphumula ngenkathi ebandayo.

buza: Aphumula kuphi amaKristu?
Impendulo: Phumula kuKristu! Amen

impendulo: " ubusika " Lifanekisela ukuphela kwezwe nokuza kosuku lokwahlulela.

Mathewu [Isahluko 24:20] Khulekani ukuba lapho nibaleka, kungabi khona ubusika noma isabatha.

Qaphela: INkosi uJesu yathi →→Khulekani ukuthi lapho nibaleka →→" phunyuka "Vele ubaleke ungaze uhlangane" ubusika ” noma “”An Idethi yenzalo ” → Ungamane uhlangabezane nosuku lokwahlulela; iSabatha “Anikwazi ukwenza umsebenzi, nibaleke, nikhose; ngakho-ke, nxa nibaleka, aniyikuhlangana nobusika nesabatha; niyakuqonda lokhu na?

(2) Umkhiwane awutheli futhi uyaqalekiswa

impendulo: nquma, shisa .

Qaphela: Uma umkhiwane ungatheli izithelo, uyagawulwa, uma ubuna, ushiswe.

( UJesu “Wabona umkhiwane ngasendleleni, wasondela kuwo, kepha akafumananga lutho emthini, kuphela amaqabunga; ( Mathewu 21:19 )

UDaniyeli 9:1-2 Ngomnyaka wokuqala wokubusa kukaDariyu indodana ka-Ahashiveroshi umMede, okwakungumnyaka wokuqala wokubusa kwakhe, mina Daniyeli ngafunda encwadini izwi likaJehova lafika. kuJeremiya umprofethi mayelana neminyaka yokuchithwa kweJerusalema; Iminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa isiphetho .

1 Kusukela emyalweni wokwakha kabusha iJerusalema

Ngomnyaka wokuqala kaKoresi inkosi yasePheresiya, ukuze kugcwaliseke amazwi akhulunywa ngomlomo kaJeremiya, uJehova wavusa inhliziyo kaKoresi inkosi yasePheresiya, wamenza ukuba akhiphe isimemezelo kulo lonke izwe: UKoresi, inkosi yasePheresiya, uthi: ‘UJehova uNkulunkulu wezulu uyale ukuba zonke izizwe zinikwe mina, futhi wangiyala ukuba ngimakhele indlu eJerusalema lakwaJuda abantu bakhuphukela eJerusalema lakwaJuda. ukuvuselela ithempeli likaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli eJerusalema (Yena yedwa unguNkulunkulu). Sengathi uNkulunkulu angaba nalendoda. Inkomba ( Ezra 1:1-3 )

2 Ithempeli lakhiwa ngomnyaka wesithupha wenkosi uDariyu

Abadala bakwaJuda bakha ithempeli ngenxa yamazwi enduduzo ashiwo uHagayi umprofethi noZakariya indodana ka-Ido, futhi konke kwaphumelela. Balakha njengokwesiyalezo sikaNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli nangomthetho kaKoresi, noDariyu, no-Aritahishashita, amakhosi asePheresiya. Ngomnyaka wesithupha wenkosi uDariyu, ngosuku lwesithathu lwenyanga yokuqala ka-Adari, leli thempeli laqedwa. . Isikhombo ( Ezra 6:14-15 )

3 Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nanhlanu lwenyanga ka-Eluli inkosi u-Aritahishashita, ugange lwaqedwa.

Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nanhlanu lwenyanga ka-Eluli, udonga lwaqedwa, kwathatha izinsuku ezingamashumi ayisihlanu nambili ukwakhiwa. Lapho zonke izitha zethu nabezizwe abasizungezile bekuzwa lokhu, bethuka futhi bahwaqabala, ngoba babona ukuthi umsebenzi usuphelile ngoba wawuvela kuNkulunkulu wethu. ( Nehemiya 6:15-16 )

2. UJesu wabikezela ukubhujiswa kwethempeli (okwesibili)

(1) UJesu waprofetha ukuthi ithempeli laliyobhujiswa

Lapho uJesu esondela eJerusalema, wawubona umuzi, wawukhalela, wathi: “Sengathi ngabe uyazi namuhla ukuthi yikuphi ukuthula kwenu; igoqo likuhaqe, likuhaqe nxazonke, likuchithe wena nabantwana bakho phakathi kwakho, akuyikusala ngisho netshe phezu kwetshe lakho, ngokuba awusazi isikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwakhe.” Isahluko 19 amavesi 41-44)

(2) UJesu wabikezela ukuthi ithempeli laliyokwakhiwa ngezinsuku ezintathu

buza: UJesu wasebenzisani ukwakha ithempeli ngezinsuku ezintathu?
Impendulo: Yenza umzimba wakhe ube yithempeli
UJesu wamphendula wathi: Dilizani lelithempeli; Ngizobuye ngilakhe phakathi kwezinsuku ezintathu . Khona-ke abaJuda bathi: "Kwathatha iminyaka engamashumi amane nesithupha ukwakhiwa kwaleli thempeli. Wena uzolivusa ngezinsuku ezintathu na?" " Kepha uJesu washo lokhu ngomzimba wakhe njengethempeli . Ngakho ngemva kokuvuka kwakhe kwabafileyo, abafundi bakhumbula ayekushilo futhi bakholelwa eBhayibhelini nalokho uJesu ayekushilo. ( Johane 2:19-22 )

(3) Ithempeli lasemhlabeni labhidlizwa ngo-70 AD

buza: Isinengiso sencithakalo →Ubani owabhidliza ithempeli okwesibili?
impendulo: Ujenene wamaRoma → uThithu .

Qaphela: UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wazalwa kabusha, okuyinto eyashiwo iNkosi uJesu ( izinsuku ezintathu ) futhi wamiswa futhi ebandleni, wenza umzimba wakhe ithempeli, ithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele, hhayi ithempeli elenziwe ngezandla → Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi kuqhubeke, ibandla eJerusalema "UStefanu" wabulawelwa iNkosi, ibandla laseJerusalema lashushiswa kanzima amaJuda, futhi ivangeli leNkosi uJesu Kristu lasakazwa emhlabeni ongaphandle→" Phakathi kweyodwa noma eyisikhombisa , uyokwenza isivumelwano esiqinile nabaningi” → “ E-Antiyokiya "... nokunye okuningi ( Owezizwe ) ibandla lasungulwa.
Bonke abaphostoli nabafundi bayaqonda ukuthi wonke angamathempeli akhiwa iNkosi uJesu Kristu ngezinsuku ezintathu, hhayi amathempeli enziwe ngezandla. IJerusalema lamaJuda liyithempeli elenziwe ngezandla, "isithunzi", hhayi isithombe sangempela, okungukuthi, iNdawo Engcwele yeqiniso, ithempeli elingenakubhujiswa → yiJerusalema lasezulwini! Amen

(4) Umlando weJerusalema emva kuka-70 AD

Imibhalo egciniwe yomlando ibonisa ukuthi ngo-AD 70 iThempeli laseJerusalema lathunjwa futhi labhidlizwa ujenene ongumRoma u-Titus → Egcwalisa amazwi eNkosi, “Akusekho itshe phezu kwetshe elingayikubhidlizwa; Kuphela udonga ohlangothini olusentshonalanga ( Udonga Olukhalayo ), yizizukulwane zakamuva kuphela ezizokwazi le nqubo yomlando.

buza: Yimuphi umlando owabhekana nakho ngemva kokubhujiswa kweThempeli Lesibili?
impendulo: Kusukela emlandweni ka-70 AD→→

1 Ujenene wamaRoma "uThithu" kanye neNkosi yaseBabiloni bobabili babengamadoda akhohlakele awenza imbubhiso enengekayo Ngemva kokuba uJenene Titus ebhubhise futhi ashise iThempeli Lesibili, wakha ithempeli likankulunkulu ophakeme waseRoma "uJupiter" emanxiweni ethempeli waqamba kabusha isifundazwe sakwaJuda saba yiPalestine.

2 Ngo-637 AD, umbuso wamaSulumane wavuka futhi ngemva kokuthatha iPalestine, (isinengiso sembubhiso) wakha "i-Al-Aqsa Mosque" endaweni yethempeli kanye "ne-Aqsa Mosque" eseduze nayo, esekhona nanamuhla ngo-2022. AD.

3 NgoMeyi 14, 1948 AD, u-Israyeli wamenyezelwa njengesizwe;
IDolobha Elisha laseJerusalema latholwa ngoFebhuwari 24, 1949 phakathi neMpi Ephakathi YaseMpumalanga Yaphinde yatholakala ngemva kokuphela “kweMpi Yezinsuku Eziyisithupha” ngo-June 5, 1967;

4 Izwe lakwa-Israyeli nePalestine, ngenxa yokuthi " eJerusalema "Izindaba zobunikazi zivame ukubandakanya ukusetshenziswa kwezikhali. Ngonyaka wezi-2021, i-Israel izobe isingelinye lamazwe aqine kakhulu eMpumalanga Ephakathi mayelana nezempi kanye nokuvikela izwe, umnotho, ubuchwepheshe, nezimo zokuphila eziyisisekelo.
manje( Udonga Olukhalayo ) Esigcawini esivulekile kulapho ama-Israyeli ethandaza khona, ephenduka, ekhala, futhi ekhononda kuNkulunkulu iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane Manje abuyele ezweni lawo futhi ayabonga. Kunjalo ( Udonga Olukhalayo Thandazela ukuthula, thandazela ithemba( UMesiya ) ukusindisa nokuvuselela isizwe sakwa Israel nokwakhela izizwe zonke indlu yokukhuleka njengo “Solomoni”.

3. Ukufika kukaJesu ( phambili ) kuwuphawu lwezinto ezizayo

buza: UJesu ufika ( phambili ) Yiziphi izimpawu (ezisobala) ezizovela?
impendulo: Kwambulwa isoni esikhulu. Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Uphawu lokuqala

" yimani emhlabathini ongcwele "
“Uyabona ‘isinengiso sencithakalo’ umprofethi uDaniyeli akhuluma ngaso yimani emhlabathini ongcwele (Labo abafunda lombhalo badinga ukuqonda). Bheka kuMathewu isahluko 24 ivesi 15

(2)Isibonakaliso sesibili

" Kwamiswa itende elinjengesigodlo phakathi kwentaba engcwele "
Uyoba phakathi kolwandle nentaba engcwele ekhazimulayo misa Ufana nesigodlo itabernakele ; nokho lapho ukuphela kwakhe kufika, akakho oyokwazi ukumsiza. ” Daniyeli 11:45

(3)Isibonakaliso sesithathu

" ahlale ethempelini likaNkulunkulu "
→→Izoni ezinkulu nabangenamthetho ziyambulwa, yebo Ehlezi endlini kaNkulunkulu Ukuthi unguNkulunkulu (2 Thesalonika 2:3-4)

(4)Isibonakaliso sesine

Abangcwele bayonikelwa ezandleni zakhe Isikhathi esisodwa, izikhathi ezimbili, nengxenye yesikhathi--inkomba (Daniyeli 7:25)

(5)Isibonakaliso sesihlanu

Bayowunyathela umuzi ongcwele izinyanga ezingamashumi amane nambili (Khona manje iminyaka emithathu nengxenye ) kanye Unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka Futhi (iminyaka emithathu nengxenye)→→ Nganikwa umhlanga ukuba ube yinduku yokulinganisa; futhi othile wathi: “Sukuma! Ithempeli ne-altare likaNkulunkulu , futhi bonke ababekhonza ethempelini balinganiswa. Kodwa igceke elingaphandle kwethempeli kumelwe lishiywe lingenakulinganiswa, ngoba ngelezizwe. Bayowunyathela umuzi ongcwele Izinyanga ezingamashumi amane nambili. ( IsAmbulo 11:1-2 )

(6) Abantu emhlabeni wonke balandela isilo futhi bathola uphawu lwesilo ezandleni noma emabunzini abo (666) —Bheka isAmbulo 13:16-18

Qaphela: ngaphezulu (6 uphawu ) zihlobene neJerusalema" Ithempeli likaNkulunkulu "Kuhlobene, kusukela ngo-AD 70 ( Ithempeli libhidliziwe ) kwaze kwaba ngu-2022, lapho u-Israyeli ebuyiselwa embusweni ngo-1948, naseJerusalema emhlabeni namuhla, ama-Israyeli kuphela ( Udonga Olukhalayo )......!

→Ngaphezu kwalokhu (6 uphawu ) izovela, okungukuthi Kwambulwa isoni esikhulu , njengoba umprofethi uDaniyeli asho:

→Isinengiso sencithakalo yimani emhlabathini ongcwele

→Ngisho ahlale ethempelini likaNkulunkulu uthi ungunkulunkulu

→ Ukwamukela uphawu lwesilo esandleni noma ebunzini (666)

→ Abangcwele bayonikelwa ezandleni zakhe Unyaka owodwa, iminyaka emibili, isigamu sonyaka

→ bayowunyathela umuzi ongcwele izinyanga ezingamashumi amane nambili

Nomphostoli uPawulu wathi →Ngokuba umoya osithekileyo wokungabi namthetho uyasebenza; Kuphela manje kukhona eyodwa vimba kwe, linda kuze kube yileso sikhathi Okuvimbayo kuyasuswa , khona-ke lo muntu ongenamthetho uyokwambulwa . INkosi uJesu iyombhubhisa ngomoya womlomo wayo futhi imbhubhise ngenkazimulo yokufika kwayo. (2 Thesalonika 2:7-8)

articles.title: Izimpawu zokubuya kukaJesu (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Thesalonika isahluko 2 ivesi 3 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ningavumeli muntu ukuba aniyenge kungakhathaliseki ukuthi yiziphi izindlela zakhe;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Izimpawu Zokubuya KukaJesu" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Ukuze bonke abantwana bakaNkulunkulu bakwazi ukuhlukanisa izoni nalabo abangenamthetho .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

umnyakazo wezoni lezaphulimthetho

1. Isoni esikhulu

buza: Ubani isoni esikhulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Indodana yokulahlwa

buza: Iyini indodana yokulahlwa?
impendulo: " indodana yokulahlwa "Labo abahlubukayo nabavukela inkolo →" Shiya iTao “Okungukuthi, ngaphandle kwezwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso; ngokumelene nenkolo “Lokho wukumelana, ukuvimbela, kanye nokumelana neBandla likaJesu Kristu.
Ungavumeli muntu akuyenge, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi yiziphi izindlela zakhe, ngoba ngaphambi kwalolo suku kuyoba khona ukuhlubuka. Futhi umuntu wesono uyembulwa, indodana yokulahlwa . (2 Thesalonika 2:3)

2 Amadodana okungalaleli, amadodana olaka

buza: Iyini indodana yokungalaleli?
impendulo: " indodana yokungalaleli ” ibhekisela emimoyeni emibi elawula imikhuba yaleli zwe futhi ehamba esibhakabhakeni.
Ngokwesibonelo, kuyakudida ukuthi “yimiphi imikhosi namaholide okugubha, ukukhulekela izithombe zamanga nokuhlanganyela emikhubeni nasemisebenzini yaleli zwe.
Ngalezo zinsuku nahamba ngendlela yaleli zwe nangokulalela umbusi wombusi womkhathi okhona manje. Umoya omubi usebenza emadodaneni okungalaleli . Sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, senza izinkanuko zenyama, silandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo, futhi ngokwemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo bonke abanye. Inkomba ( Efesu 2:2-3 )

3 Udeveli one-aura esibhakabhakeni

buza: Ubani idemoni eline-aura emoyeni?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 Ababusayo ,
2 labo abanegunya ,
3 Umbusi waleli zwe elimnyama ,
4 Nemimoya emibi yomoya ezindaweni eziphakemeyo .
→ Njengoba kulotshiwe, “Wathi umprofethi uDaniyeli” Idemoni Inkosi yasePheresiya "futhi" Usathane waseGrisi yasendulo "njll.
Nginamazwi okugcina: Qina eNkosini nasemandleni ayo. Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane. Ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi balobu bumnyama bomhlaba, nobubi bomoya ezindaweni eziphakemeyo. ( Efesu 6:10-12 )

2. Izimpawu Zesoni Esikhulu

buza: Yiziphi izici zesoni esikhulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Melana neNkosi
2. Ziphakamise
3 Khonzwa
4 Ngisho ehlezi ethempelini likaNkulunkulu, ezishaya uNkulunkulu
Ngokwesibonelo “Melanani noJehova, niziphakamise. Wena umkhulu kunabo bonke abakhonzwa njengezithixo, uzisho ukuthi ungonkulunkulu nonkulunkulukazi.
umelana neNkosi futhi uziphakamisa ngaphezu kwakho konke okuthiwa uNkulunkulu nakho konke okukhonzwayo, Ngisho ehlezi ethempelini likaNkulunkulu, ethi unguNkulunkulu . (2 Thesalonika 2:4)

3. Ukunyakaza Kwesoni Esikhulu

(1) Inqubo yokunyakaza kwesoni

buza: Sihamba kanjani isoni esikhulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 Lo muntu ongenamthetho uyeza, enze ezakhe izimanga;
2 enze izimangaliso
3 Yenzani zonke izimangaliso zamanga
4 Usebenza yonke inhlobo yenkohliso yokungalungi kulabo ababhubhayo.

Manje, emhlabeni wonke " ukunyakaza okuthakazelisayo ", ukudida laba bantu ( incwadi )kusuka emangeni → 1 Yizimangaliso ezenziwa "imimoya emibi", 2 isimangaliso noma ukuphulukiswa, 3 enze zonke izimangaliso zamanga, 4 Sebenza yonke inkohliso engalungile kulabo ababhubhayo → njengoba "begcwele imimoya emibi" futhi bawele phansi futhi benze zonke izimangaliso zamanga. Laba bantu bakhohliswa imimoya emibi futhi ( Ungakukholwa ) indlela yeqiniso Inhliziyo engazimisele ukwamukela uthando lweqiniso.

( Ngokwesibonelo " I-Charismatic “Kumelwe niqaphele ikakhulukazi ezemidlalo nezithombe eziningi zamanga nezimangaliso zezwe. Ningadukiswa yikho futhi nibe ngabantwana bokubhubha.
→Ongenamthetho uza ngokomsebenzi kaSathane, esebenza ngazo zonke izinhlobo zezimangaliso, nezibonakaliso, nezimangaliso zamanga, nangayo yonke inkohliso yokungalungi kwababhubhayo; ngokuba abalwamukeli uthando lweqiniso ababhubha ngalo ingasindiswa. Ngakho-ke, uNkulunkulu ubanika ingqondo eyinkohliso, ebenza bakholwe amanga, ukuze wonke umuntu ongakholwa iqiniso kodwa ojabulela ukungalungi alahlwe. ( 2 Thesalonika 2:9-12 )

Mathewu [Isahluko 24:15] Ukubonile okwashiwo umprofethi uDaniyeli “Isinengiso sencithakalo” simi endaweni engcwele (abafunda lombhalo kufanele baqonde).

buza: Zaziyini iziprofetho ezashiwo umprofethi uDaniyeli?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1)Amaviki angamashumi ayisikhombisa

UDaniyeli 9:24 “Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakini nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuphele isiphambeko, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngesono, futhi kulethwe ukuphila okuphakade. . Ukulunga, ukuvala imibono neziprofetho, nokugcoba oNgcwele (noma: noma ukuhumusha) .

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu isahluko 24 ivesi 3 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Njengoba uJesu ehlezi eNtabeni Yeminqumo, abafundi bakhe bakhuluma bodwa bebodwa, bathi: “Sitshele, lezi zinto zenzeka nini na? Siyini isibonakaliso sokuza kwakho nesokuphela kwezwe na? "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Izimpawu Zokubuya KukaJesu" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Bonke abantwana mabaziqonde izimpawu zokuza kweNkosi uJesu Kristu futhi baqaphe futhi baqaphe Chitha sonke isikhathi sakho emhlabeni! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(Uthando lokuqala → ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu yebo Ngokusekelwe okholweni, okuholela okholweni ;

【 Ngokusekelwe okholweni 】UMoya oNgcwele olungisiswa ngokukholwa, usindisiwe ngokukholwa, wamukele izithembiso ngokukholwa;

【 ukuze incwadi 】Njengoba siphila ngoMoya oNgcwele, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngoba incwadi Ukuvuselelwa KoMoya Ongcwele isenzo Thola inkazimulo, uthole umvuzo, uthole umqhele.

Sindiswa ngu ( incwadi ), ingabe inkazimulo isancike ( incwadi )→ Uthando lokuqala lwebandla lase-Efesu yebo【 Ngokusekelwe okholweni ], Bese uthembele emisebenzini yenyama ukuze uyiqedele ; Ayithembekile UMoya oNgcwele uyavuselela futhi uyaphelelisa →Ilahliwe【 ukuze incwadi 】→kwesokunxele ( incwadi ) usanda kuhamba ( unkulunkulu ), ilahliwe UMoya oNgcwele , kwesokunxele ( unkulunkulu ) ukushiya ( njenge ), ngoba ( unkulunkulu )leyo( njenge )! Ngakho isonto lalulahla uthando lwalo lokuqala. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) Isonto laseSmirna

→Hlala uqinisile futhi uhlupheke

(3) IBandla lasePhergamu

→Ngalalela izimfundiso zikaBhalami futhi ngakha amaqembu nezingxabano
(Ukulalela izimfundiso zikaBalami wukuthanda imali; ukulalela izifundiso zamaNikolawu kungukwakha amaqeqebana nokuhlukana)

(4) IBandla laseThiyathira

→Vumelani u-Izebeli, owesifazane ozibiza ngomprofethi, ukuba afundise
(“UmProfethi Owesifazane u-Izebeli” ubhekisela okholweni olufebayo, ibandla lobufebe → 1 Yabelana namakhosi omhlaba ( funda isAmbulo 17:1-6 ) 2 Ngokusekelwe ekugcinweni komthetho (bona kwabaseRoma 7:1-6), 3 Yenza ubungane nezwe (bona uJakobe 4:4)

(5) IBandla laseSardesi

→Ibandla elinciphayo
(Ibandla lokuzisholo: elithi liyaphila kodwa lifile ngempela)

(6) Isonto lasePhiladelphia
→Ibandla elisekela iqiniso futhi elishumayela ivangeli leqiniso

(7) IBandla laseLawodikeya

→Ukufudumala, ukuceba ngemali, kakade ucebile, ukuphila kahle ngenxa yezimo zomnotho, isonto elinabantu abaningi abacebile →Kodwa abazi ukuthi “” impilo kamoya "Bampofu, badabukile, bampofu, abayizimpumputhe, futhi banqunu. Abazange bagqoke umuntu omusha futhi bagqoke uKristu. Ngokwesibonelo, iSonto LamaKatolika LaseVatican namuhla, namasonto amaningi acebile eYurophu naseMelika angamasonto aseLawodikeya.

3. Ukusungulwa kweBandla

(1)Itshe lekhona

buza: Liyini itshe legumbi?
impendulo: Ezikhathini zasendulo, lapho kwakhiwa futhi kwakhiwa izindlu, "amatshe ekhoneni namatshe" ayesetshenziswa njengongqimba lokuqala lwesisekelo sokuzinzisa indlu.
Ngokuba thina siyizisebenzi kanye noNkulunkulu; nina niyinsimu kaNkulunkulu nesakhiwo sakhe. Ngokomusa kaNkulunkulu engiwuphiweyo, njengenduna ehlakaniphileyo ngabeka isisekelo, futhi abanye bakhela phezu kwaso; ( 1 Korinte 3:9-10 )

[UJesu Kristu] Yena uqobo uyitshe legumbi

1 kwabaseKorinte 3:11 Ngokuba akakho ongabeka esinye isisekelo, kuphela isisekelo esibekiwe, esinguJesu Kristu.
nakhelwe phezu kwesisekelo sabaphostoli nabaprofethi, uKristu Jesu uqobo lwakhe eyitshe legumbi, inkomba (Kwabase-Efesu 2:20).

(2) Idwala, idwala elingokomoya

NgokukaMathewu 16:18 Kepha ngithi kuwe: Wena unguPetru, phezu kwaleli dwala ngiyakulakha ibandla lami;

buza: Isonto lakhiwe phezu kwaleli dwala →Lisho ukuthini idwala?
impendulo: " idwala ” kusho UKristu

Qaphela: " idwala ” ayibhekiseli emadwaleni aphansi;
Idwala elingokomoya elivela ezulwini →“ idwala elingokomoya ” → lokho Idwala nguKristu ! Amen.
Bonke babhapathizwa kuMose efwini naselwandle; Lokho ababekunatha kwakuphuma edwaleni lomoya elalibalandela; Lelo dwala linguKristu . ( 1 Korinte 10:2-4 )

(3) Abaphostoli, abaprofethi, nabangcwele bakhelwe phezu kwedwala

buza: AmaKristu akhelwe kanjani phezu kwesisekelo?
impendulo: Ngoba simsebenzise kabili ( insindiso esiphambanweni sikaKristu ) waphefumulelwa nguMoya oNgcwele ( Phuza amanzi angokomoya afanayo → Wazalwa ngamanzi noMoya oNgcwele ), babe nokufinyelela kuBaba. Ngakho aniseyibo abafokazi nabafokazi, kodwa niyizakhamuzi ezikanye nabangcwele namalungu endlu kaNkulunkulu, nakhiwe phezu kwesisekelo sabaphostoli nabaprofethi, uKristu Jesu uqobo lwakhe eyitshe legumbi, yilowo nalowo ngaye ixhunywe kahle futhi kancane kancane iba ithempeli leNkosi. Kuyena nani nakhiwa kanyekanye ukuba kube indawo yokuhlala kaNkulunkulu ngoMoya oNgcwele. ( Efesu 2:18-22 )

4. Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe

(1)Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe
Kwabase-Efesu 1:23 Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe, ukugcwala kwakhe ogcwalisa konke kukho konke.

(2) Uyinhloko yebandla
KwabaseKolose 1:15-18 INdodana Ethandekayo ingumfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ongabonakali, izibulo ngaphambi kwendalo yonke. Ngokuba kwadalelwa kuye zonke izinto, ezisezulwini noma ezisemhlabeni, ezibonakalayo nezingabonakali, noma izihlalo zobukhosi, noma ubukhosi, noma izikhulu, namandla, konke kwadalelwa yena; Ukhona ngaphambi kwazo zonke izinto, futhi zonke ziqiniswa kuye. Futhi uyinhloko yomzimba webandla. Uyisiqalo, ngowokuqala ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngowokuqala kuzo zonke izinto.

5. Singamalungu omzimba wakhe

(1)Nina ningamalungu omzimba wakhe

1 Korinte 12:27 Nina ningumzimba kaKristu, futhi ngamunye wenu uyisitho.

(2)Thina singamathambo nenyama yomzimba wakhe

Efesu 5:30 Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imibhalo yengeza: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe).

buza: Sazi kanjani ukuthi singamathambo Akhe nenyama Yakhe?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo → umzimba womoya (1 Korinte 15:44)
2 Umzimba womoya uvela → unenyama namathambo ( Luka 24:38-39 )
3 thina ( bheka ) umzimba obonakalayo → uyithambo nenyama ka-Adamu
4 thina ( bheka )Umzimba ongekho → uyithambo nenyama kaJesu
5 Umzimba ovuswe kanye noKristu → umzimba womoya
6 Kuzelwe uNkulunkulu, umzimba womoya → kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu (Kolose 3:3)
7 UKristu uzophinde avele → Imizimba yethu yomoya izovela futhi ibonakale kanye noKristu enkazimulweni! Amen

6. Ubunye bebandla kanye nokumiswa komzimba kaKristu

buza: Ungawakha kanjani umzimba kaKristu?
impendulo: Ukuba munye okholweni, ubunye bebandla buwubunye bomzimba kaKristu →→ Sebenzisa isibopho sokuthula komunye nomunye, futhi nilwele ukulondoloza ubunye benhliziyo obunikezwa uMoya oNgcwele. munye umzimba noMoya munye, njengalokho nabizelwa ethembeni linye. Yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, nakubo bonke. Wanika abanye abaphostoli, abanye abaprofethi, abanye abavangeli, abanye abelusi nabafundisi, ukuze abangcwele bahlomele umsebenzi wenkonzo, nokwakha umzimba kaKristu, size sifike sonke ebunyeni bokukholwa, sazi. INdodana kaNkulunkulu, isilethwe ekubeni yindoda epheleleyo, ifinyelele ekukhuleni kukaKristu,...kodwa sikhuluma iqiniso othandweni, sikhule ezintweni zonke kuye oyiNhloko, uKristu, okuvela kuye lonke. umzimba uhlangene, amalunga onke enkonzweni yawo efanele, Ngokusizana ngokomsebenzi womzimba ngamunye, umzimba uyakukhula, uzakhe othandweni. Isikhombo ( Efesu 4, amavesi 3-6, 11-13, 15-16 )

7. Ibandla liyingoduso kaKristu

Efesu 5:30-32 Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imibhalo yengeza: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). Ngenxa yalokhu indoda iyakushiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayakuba nyamanye. Le yimfihlakalo enkulu, kepha ngikhuluma ngoKristu nebandla.

Qaphela: IBandla liyisoka likaJesu Kristu,” ingoduso "Libhekisela kumkaJesu ongashadile, oyintombi emsulwa. Intombi emsulwa iyakhula →" abe intombazane enhle ” Okusho ukuthi, uvuko lomzimba omuhle kakhulu → Lapho uKristu ebuya ukuzothatha umfazi, uyibandla ! Amen

【 Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele 】

→→Kuwuphawu lukaJesu Kristu lothando kumlobokazi wakhe ( indandatho yomshado ): Ngicela ungigcine enhliziyweni yakho njengophawu ( Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele ), yifake engalweni yakho njengesitembu. Ngokuba uthando lunamandla njengokufa, nomhawu ulukhuni njengesihogo; Uthando alunakucinywa ngamanzi amaningi, futhi alunakuminzwa yizikhukhula. Uma umuntu eshintsha wonke amagugu omndeni wakhe ngothando, uyodelelwa. (IsiHlabelelo SeziHlabelelo 8:6-7)

8. Isidlo Sakusihlwa Somshado WeWundlu

【 ujesu Krestu uyashada esontweni 】

Ngase ngizwa okuthile okunjengezwi lesixuku, izwi lamanzi amaningi, nezwi lokuduma okukhulu, lithi: “Haleluya! ngoba, Isikhathi somshado weWundlu sesifikile; , naphiwa umusa wokwembatha ilineni elicolekileyo, elikhanyayo nelimhlophe. (Ilineni elicolekileyo lingukulunga kwabangcwele.) Ingelosi yathi kimi: “Loba: Babusisiwe abamenyelwe esidlweni somshado weWundlu.” Yathi kimi: “Leli liyiqiniso likaNkulunkulu ” ( IsAmbulo 19:6-9 )

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:

ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe.
Njengezintombi ezimsulwa eziyi-144,000 ezilandela iNkosi iWundlu.

Amen!

→→Ngimbona esesiqongweni nasegqumeni;
Laba ngabantu abahlala bodwa, ababalwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Numeri 23:9
Ngezisebenzi eNkosini uJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDade uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nezinye izisebenzi ezisekela umsebenzi wevangeli ngentshiseko ngokunikela ngemali nokusebenza kanzima, nabanye abangcwele abasebenza nathi esikholwa lelivangeli , amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila.
