articles.title: Ukusindiswa Komphefumulo (Isifundo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Korinte 12, ivesi 10, sifunde ndawonye: Wanika umuntu oyedwa amandla okwenza izimangaliso, ukuba umprofethi, nokwahlukanisa imimoya, ukukhuluma ngezilimi, nokuhumusha izilimi.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Cela iNkosi ukuthi inikeze zonke izingane zakho zonke izipho zomoya → ikhono lokwehlukanisa imimoya ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Umoya kaBaba waseZulwini

(1)Baba wemimoya yonke

UBaba wethu wenyama uhlala esiyala isikhashana njengokwentando yakhe; ( Hebheru 12:10 )

buza: abantu abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi ( umoya ) ivela kubani?
impendulo: Kuvela kuBaba →Konke okuzelwe noma okudaliwe kuvela kuMoya kaNkulunkulu! Amen

buza: Uyini umoya ozelwe?
impendulo: UMoya weNdodana kaBaba unguMoya ozelwe
Kuzo zonke izingelosi, iyiphi uNkulunkulu angakaze athi kuyo: “Wena uyiNdodana yami, namuhla ngikuzele”? Iyiphi akhomba kuyo athi: “Mina ngiyoba nguYise, yona ibe yindodana yami”? Isikhombo (Hebheru 1:5)

buza: UNkulunkulu wathi kubani: Wena uyindodana yami?
impendulo: U-Adamu —Bheka uLuka 3:38
U-Adamu wangaphambili wadalwa ngomfanekiso nangomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu → ngakho u-Adamu “ Isithunzi "→U-Adamu wokugcina ungu-Adamu wokuqala" Isithunzi "Umzimba wangempela, Ying'er umzimba wangempela manifest → okungukuthi U-Adamu wokugcina uJesu , uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu! Amen
Bonke abantu babhapathizwa, futhi uJesu wabhapathizwa. Ngithe ngisakhuleka kwavuleka izulu. UMoya oNgcwele kweza phezu kwakhe kunjengejuba; kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: Uyindodana yami ethandekayo, ngijabule ngawe . (Funda uLuka 3:21-22.)

(2) Umoya kuBaba oseZulwini

buza: Umoya KuBaba Osezulwini →Uyini Umoya?
impendulo : UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya weqiniso! Amen.
Kodwa nxa esefikile uMncedi engizamthuma evela kuBaba, uMoya weqiniso ophuma kuBaba, yena uzafakaza ngami. Isikhombo (Johane 15:26)

2. Umoya kaJesu

buza: Uyini umoya okuJesu?
impendulo: Umoya kaBaba, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya oNgcwele! Amen.
Bonke abantu babhapathizwa, futhi uJesu wabhapathizwa. Ngithe ngisakhuleka kwavuleka izulu. UMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwakhe , emise okwejuba, kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “ Uyindodana yami ethandekayo, ngijabule ngawe . ( Luka 3:21-22 )

3. Umoya Ongcwele

buza: Umoya KuBaba Osezulwini →Uyini Umoya?
impendulo: Moya oNgcwele!

buza: Umoya KuJesu →Uyini Umoya?
impendulo: Futhi Moya oNgcwele!

buza: Ungokabani uMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: UnguMoya kaBaba waseZulwini kanye noMoya weNdodana ethandekayo uJesu!

【 UMoya oNgcwele 】 yebo Umoya kaYise, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya weNdodana ethandekayo uJesu, noMoya kaKristu konke kuvela → “umoya owodwa” kuMoya oNgcwele!
1 KwabaseKhorinte 6:17 Kodwa ohlanganiswe leNkosi u Yibani nomoya munye neNkosi . Ingabe uJesu wayemunye noYise? ube! Kulungile! UJesu wathi → Mina ngikuBaba noBaba ukimi → Mina noBaba simunye. ( Johane 10:30 )
Njengoba kulotshiwe →munye umzimba noMoya munye, njengoba nje nabizelwa ethembeni linye. Yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, nakubo bonke. Isikhombo ( Kwabase-Efesu 4:4-6 ). Ngakho, uyaqonda?

4. Umoya ka-Adamu

Izwi leNkosi ngo-Israyeli. usho uJehova oweneka izulu, owamisa izisekelo zomhlaba, wabumba umoya phakathi kwabantu; (Zakariya 12:1)
buza: Ubani owadala umuntu ngaphakathi →( umoya )?
impendulo: Jehova!
buza: UJehova uNkulunkulu akayena ujenene ( ethukuthele ) emakhaleni ka-Adamu? Ngale ndlela, umoya okuye awuyena uNkulunkulu.” eluhlaza ’—Genesise 2:7
impendulo: futha" ethukuthele "Waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya ("umoya" noma "umoya") igazi ”) → umoya ka-Adamu ( igazi ) umuntu ophilayo.
(1) Umzimba ka-Adamu → wenziwe ngothuli (Bheka uGenesise 2:7.)
(2) Umoya ka-Adamu → nawo wadalwa (Funda uZakariya 12:1.)
(3) Umphefumulo ka-Adamu → wemvelo (Funda eyoku-1 Korinte 15:44.)
Ngakho u-Adamu" umzimba womzimba “Zonke zidalwe nguNkulunkulu!
Qaphela:
1 Uma Adam" umoya "Bekuyi wazalwa umoya, bese ungaphakathi kuye" umoya ” ngisho uMoya weNkosi, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele → ngeke abe “ inyoka “Udeveli uSathane unqotshiwe, ( Igazi ) umphefumulo ngeke ube namabala.
2 Uma u-Adamu umoya ukuba wazalwa umoya, inzalo yakhe futhi iwumoya kaJehova, umoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele uNkulunkulu akadingi ukwehlisa; umoya ) enzalweni ka-Adamu → Numeri 11:17 lapho ngizoza ngikhulume nawe, futhi ngizokhuluma nawe. bapheni uMoya owehlele phezu kwenu , bazohlanganyela lomthwalo wemfanelo obalulekile wokunakekela abantu kanye nawe, ukuze ungawuthwali wedwa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

5. Umoya Wabantwana BakaNkulunkulu

(1) Umzimba wabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

buza: Ingabe labo abazelwe enyameni bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: ozelwe yinyama cha Abantwana bakaNkulunkulu (KwabaseRoma 9:8)

Kuphela
1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ,
2 Nizelwe ngeqiniso levangeli,
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu → Umzimba womoya ungumntwana kaNkulunkulu , bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:44

(2) Igazi labantwana bakaNkulunkulu

buza: Izingane ezizalwe ngenyama → "ngaphakathi" Igazi "Igazi likabani?"
impendulo: Ngekakhokho u-Adamu" Igazi ", thula" inyoka "Ilahlekile Igazi ;

buza: abantwana bakaNkulunkulu ( Igazi )igazi likabani?
Impendulo: KukaKristu Igazi ! Omsulwa, ongenabala, ongcwele Igazi ! Amen →→Ngegazi eliyigugu likaKristu njengelewundlu elingenasici nasici. ( 1 Petru 1:19 )

(3) Umoya wabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

buza: Umoya ozelwe yinyama →Umoya kabani?
impendulo: Umoya ka-Adamu ungumuntu ophilayo wenyama negazi!

buza: Umoya Wabantwana BakaNkulunkulu →Umoya Kabani?
Impendulo: UMoya kaBaba oseZulwini, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, noMoya oNgcwele! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Isikhombo (Roma 8:9)

6. Ukuphelelisa imiphefumulo yabalungileyo

buza: Kuyini ukuphelelisa umphefumulo womuntu olungileyo?
impendulo: UJesu Kristu( umphefumulo ) ngemva kokuba umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuphelile, wathi: " Kwenziwe ! "Ehlise ikhanda, Nika umphefumulo wakho kuNkulunkulu . Isikhombo (Johane 19:30)

buza: Obani abaphelelisa imiphefumulo yabalungileyo?
impendulo: Lapho besaphila ngokomzimba, ngoba ( incwadi ) Abantu abalungisiswa nguNkulunkulu → Njengoba kulotshiwe enkathini yeTestamente Elidala, bahlanganisa: U-Abela, u-Enoke, uNowa, u-Abrahama, uLoti, u-Isaka, uJakobe, uJosefa, uMose, uGideyoni, uBharaki, iNdodana kaKhamu, uJefta, uDavide, uSamuweli, nabaprofethi...njll. " iTestamente elidala “Ngesikhathi besaphila, ngoba ( incwadi ) walungisiswa nguNkulunkulu,” ITestamente Elisha “Ngokufa kukaJesu Kristu ngenxa yezono zethu, ukungcwatshwa kwakhe, nokuvuka kwakhe ngosuku lwesithathu, umphefumulo ) Umsebenzi wokuhlenga waqedwa →→ amathuna avuleka, futhi imizimba eminingi yabangcwele ababelele yavuswa. Ngemva kokuba uJesu evusiwe, baphuma ethuneni bangena emzini ongcwele futhi babonakala kubantu abaningi. ( Mathewu 27:52-53 )

7. Umoya osindisiwe

buza: Iyini imimoya esindisiwe?
impendulo: 1 Isibonelo, ngesikhathi sikaNowa ezikhathini zasendulo eTestamenteni Elidala, ngaphandle kwamalungu ayisishiyagalombili omndeni kaNowa angena emkhunjini, imizimba yabo yahlulelwa futhi yabhujiswa ngozamcolo, kodwa (imiphefumulo) yabo yasindiswa ngokukholelwa evangelini →→( UJesu ) owahamba ngayo washumayela emimoyeni eboshiwe, leyo engalalelanga uNkulunkulu ngenkathi uNowa elungisa umkhumbi futhi uNkulunkulu walinda ngesineke. Ngaleso sikhathi ababaningi abantu abangena emkhunjini futhi basindiswa emanzini, abayisishiyagalombili kuphela...Ngenxa yalesi sizathu ngisho nabafileyo bashunyayezwa ivangeli, ukuze bahlulelwe ngokwenyama yabo. Ukuphila kwabo okungokomoya kuncike kuNkulunkulu . Isikhombo (1 Petru isahluko 3 amavesi 19-20 no-4 ivesi 6)

2 Kwaphinde kwaba nodaba lwabantu abaphingayo ebandleni laseKorinte, okungukuthi, othile wathatha umama wakhe ongamzali "uPawuli" wathi →Umuntu onjalo makamnikele kuSathane ukuze onakalise inyama yakhe. ukuze umphefumulo wakhe usindiswe ngosuku lweNkosi uJesu . Isikhombo (1 Korinte 5:5).

Qaphela : Umphefumulo osindisiwe lapha → usindiswe nje, ngaphandle kwenkazimulo, umvuzo noma umqhele. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

8. Umoya Wengelosi

buza: Ingabe izingelosi zadalwa uNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Insimu Yase-Edene Ezulwini →UNkulunkulu wadala izingelosi
2 Insimu Yase-Edene emhlabeni → UNkulunkulu wadala u-Adamu

Wawusensimini yase-Edene, wembethe yonke inhlobo yamatshe aligugu: amarubi, namarubi, nedayimane, nebherilo, neshohamu, namajaspi, namasafire, nesimaragidu, namarubi, negolide; ,bakhona bonke ngosuku owadalwa ngalo Kulungiswe kahle. ( Hezekeli 28:13 )

buza: Ingabe izingelosi zingabonakala ngeso lomuntu?
impendulo: Amehlo abantu angabona kuphela izinto ezisemhlabeni wenyama, imizimba yezingelosi →Yebo umzimba womoya , singabonakali emehlweni ethu. Umzimba womoya wengelosi uyavela futhi ungabonwa ngamehlo abantu kuphela. Njengentombi uMariya yabona ingelosi uGabriyeli eyamemezela lesi simemezelo, futhi abelusi babona zonke izingelosi lapho uKristu ezalwa → Njengoba nje kwavela umzimba kaKristu ongokomoya wovuko, bonke abafundi bangawubona, uKristu wenyukela ezulwini! Bonke bayibona ingelosi eyayilethe izindaba ezinhle. Bheka izEnzo 1:10-11

buza: Zingobani izingelosi eNsimini yase-Edene?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 uMikayeli →Imelela ingelosi eyinhloko elwayo ( Daniyeli 12:1 )
2 UGabriyeli →Imelela ingelosi eletha izindaba ezinhle (Luka 1:26)
3 Lusifa →Limelela ukudumisa izingelosi ( Isaya 14:11-12 )

(1)Ingelosi Ewayo

buza: Ingubani ingelosi ewile?
impendulo: U-Lucifer →Lusifa
“O nkanyezi ekhanyayo, Ndodana yokusa, uweleni ezulwini? Kungani wena, mnqobi wezizwe, unqunyelwe emhlabathini na?

buza: Zingaki izingelosi ezalandela "uLusifa" futhi zawa?
impendulo: Ingxenye yesithathu yezingelosi yawa
Kwavela omunye umbono ezulwini: udrako omkhulu obomvu enamakhanda ayisikhombisa nezimpondo eziyishumi, nemiqhele eyisikhombisa emakhanda akhe ayisikhombisa. Umsila wayo wadonsa ingxenye yesithathu yezinkanyezi esibhakabhakeni waziphonsa phansi. ...Reference ( IsAmbulo 12:3-4 )

buza: "Inkanyezi Ekhanyayo, Indodana Yasekuseni" Ngemva Kokuwa KukaLusifa →Ubani igama lakhe?
impendulo: Udrako, udrako omkhulu obomvu, inyoka endala, ebizwa nangokuthi uSathane, noBelzebule, inkosi yamademoni, uBheliyali, indoda yesono, Umphikukristu. .

Ngase ngibona ingelosi yehla ezulwini, iphethe isihluthulelo sakwalasha neketanga elikhulu esandleni sayo. Yambamba udrako, inyoka yasendulo, obizwa nangokuthi uDeveli, obizwa nangokuthi uSathane, yambopha iminyaka eyinkulungwane ( IsAmbulo 20:1-2 )

(2)Umoya wengelosi ewile

buza: Umoya wengelosi ewile →Imuphi umoya?
impendulo: Umoya kasathane, umoya omubi, umoya wamaphutha, umoya womphikukristu .
Bayimimoya yamademoni eyenza izimanga futhi ephuma iye kuwo wonke amakhosi omhlaba ukuze abuthene ukuze alwe ngosuku olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke. ( IsAmbulo 16:14 )

(3) Imimoya ewile yengxenye eyodwa kwezintathu yezingelosi

buza: Umoya owile wengxenye eyodwa kwezintathu yezingelosi →Imuphi umoya?
impendulo: Nemimoya yamadimoni, imimoya emibi, imimoya engcolile .
Ngabona imimoya engcolile emithathu efana namaxoxo iphuma emlonyeni kadrako, nasemlonyeni wesilo, nasemlonyeni womprofethi wamanga. ( IsAmbulo 16:13 )

(4) Umphikukristu, umoya womprofethi wamanga

buza: Ungawubona kanjani umoya wabaprofethi bamanga?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Izwi elaphuma emlonyeni wabo →

1 Njengomoya omubi “wexoxo” ongcolile
2 Melanani noKristu, melanani noNkulunkulu, melanani neqiniso, bhidisani indlela yeqiniso, futhi nishumayele indlela kayebo nocha.
3 Ukubethela kabusha iNdodana kaNkulunkulu futhi ihlaze obala, ukugeza izono usuku nosuku, unyaka nonyaka kuze kube sekupheleni, ukuze kususwe izono zikaKristu igazi eliyigugu ) njengento evamile, futhi uklolodela uMoya oNgcwele womusa.
Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Bayini abazalwane bamanga?
impendulo: Ngaphandle kokuba khona koMoya oNgcwele → Zenza ningabantwana bakaNkulunkulu .

buza: Kanjani ukutshela?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Cha Yazi uJesu (bheka uJohane 1:3:6)
2 Ngaphansi komthetho ( bheka Gal. 4:4-7 )
4 Cha Qonda ukusindiswa kwemiphefumulo kuKristu
5 Cha Qonda iqiniso levangeli
6 Enyameni ka-Adamu, hhayi kuKristu
7 Cha ukuzalwa kabusha
8 Cha Akukho Moya kaBaba, akukho Moya kaJehova, akukho Moya kaNkulunkulu, akukho Moya weNdodana ethandekayo uJesu, akukho Moya oNgcwele.
Ngakho, uyaqonda? Uyazi ukuthi ungayibona kanjani imimoya?

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Amazing Grace

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli ukusesha - Nkosi ibandla likaJesu Krestu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Insindiso Yomphefumulo (Isifundo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Korinte 15 kanye nevesi 44 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Okuhlwanyelwe kungumzimba wenyama, okuvuswa kungumzimba womoya. Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 6 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi lahlanganyelwa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Masikholelwe ivangeli futhi sizuze umphefumulo nomzimba kaJesu! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Amadodana namadodakazi azalwa nguNkulunkulu

---Thola uMzimba kaKristu---

1. Kholwa futhi uphile noKristu

buza: Kanjani( incwadi ) bavuswe kanye noKristu?
impendulo: Uma siye sahlanganiswa naye ekufeni kwakhe, siyohlanganiswa naye ekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe ( Roma 6:5 )

buza: Indlela yokuhlangana naye ngokomzimba?
impendulo: Umzimba kaKristu ulenga okhunini,

( incwadi ) Umzimba wami ulenga phezu kwezinkuni,
( incwadi Umzimba kaKristu ungumzimba wami,
( incwadi ) Lapho uKristu efa, umzimba wami wesono wafa,
→→lokhu Hlanganyela naye ngesimo sokufa ! Amen
( incwadi ) Ukumbelwa kukaKristu kungukumbelwa kwami ngokomzimba.
( incwadi ) Ukuvuka komzimba kaKristu kuwukuvuka komzimba wami.
→→lokhu ukuhlanganiswa naye esimweni sokuvuka ! Amen
Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Uma sifa kanye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. Inkomba ( Roma 6:8 )

2. UKristu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasenza kabusha

buza: Sizalwa kanjani ngokusha?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli → Qonda iqiniso!

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya —Bheka uJohane 3:5
2 Bazalwa eqinisweni levangeli —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu —Bheka uJohane 1:12-13
Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usenze kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo (1 Petru 1:3)

3. Uvuko umzimba kamoya

buza: Sivuswe kanye noKristu umzimba wenyama Uvuko?
impendulo: Uvuko lunjalo umzimba womoya ; cha ukuvuka ngokomzimba .

Okuhlwanyelwe kungumzimba wenyama, okuvuswa kungumzimba womoya. Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya. ( 1 Korinte 15:44 )

buza: Uyini umzimba womoya?
Impendulo: Umzimba kaKristu → umzimba womoya!

buza: Ingabe umzimba kaKristu uhlukile kithi?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UKristu ( umgwaqo ) saba yinyama;
2 UKristu ( unkulunkulu saba yinyama;
3 UKristu ( umoya ) saba yinyama;
4 umzimba kaKristu Ongafi ;imizimba yethu ibona ukubola
5 umzimba kaKristu Ukungaboni ukufa Imizimba yethu ibona ukufa.

buza: Sikuphi manje nemizimba yethu evusiwe esesimweni sikaKristu?
Impendulo: Ezinhliziyweni zethu! Imiphefumulo yethu nemizimba yethu kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu →UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngezinhliziyo zethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Amen! Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:16 nakwabaseKolose 3:3

buza: Kungani singakwazi ukubona umzimba ozelwe nguNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Umzimba wethu ovusiwe kanye noKristu → Yebo umzimba womoya ,thina( Indoda endala ) iso lenyama Angiboni ( Omusha ) umzimba womoya.

Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu asho → Ngakho-ke, asidangali. ( ebonakalayo ) Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhujiswa, umzimba wangaphakathi ( omusha ongabonakali ) ivuselelwa usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Kuvele ukuthi asiyona into uGu Nian ayibona ( Umzimba ), kodwa ukunakekela okungabonwayo ( umzimba womoya ngoba okubonwayo kungokwesikhashana (); Ekugcineni umzimba uzobuyela othulini ), okungabonakali ( umzimba womoya ) ingunaphakade. Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( 2 Korinte 4:16-18 )

buza: kungani abaphostoli iso lenyama Umzimba kaJesu ovusiwe obonakalayo?
impendulo: Umzimba kaJesu ovusiwe umzimba womoya →Umzimba kaJesu womoya awunqunyelwe ngendawo, isikhathi, noma izinto ezibonakalayo ngesikhathi esisodwa, noma ungafihlwa emehlweni abo anqunu →Amehlo abo avuleka, bambona. Kusenjalo uJesu wanyamalala. Isikhombo ( Luka 24:3 ) kanye neyoku-1 Korinte 15:5-6

buza: Imizimba yethu kamoya ibonakala nini?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Usuku uKristu abuya ngalo!

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. ( Kolose 3:3-4 )

2 Kufanele ubone isimo sakhe sangempela

Niyabona ukuthi uthando olungaka asinike lona uBaba lokuba sibizwe ngokuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; Yingakho umhlaba ungasazi ( kuzalwa kabusha umuntu omusha ) ngoba angikaze ngimazi ( UJesu ). Bazalwane abathandekayo, manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali;

→→ Qaphela: “Uma iNkosi ibonakala, sizobona isimo sayo sangempela, futhi lapho sivela nayo, siyobona nemizimba yethu yomoya”! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( 1 Johane 3:1-2 )

Okwesine: Singamalungu omzimba wakhe

Anazi yini ukuthi umzimba wenu uyithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele na? LoMoya oNgcwele ovela kuNkulunkulu uhlala kini, anisibo abenu (1 Korinte 6:19).

buza: Ingabe imizimba yethu iyithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Wazalwa nguNkulunkulu ( engabonakali ) → " umzimba womoya “Yithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuthi umzimba obonakalayo →uvela ku-Adamu, umzimba wangaphandle uyowohloka kancane kancane, ugule futhi ufe →le mvaba yewayini endala ayinakuthwala iwayini elisha ( UMoya oNgcwele ), ingavuza, ngakho inyama yethu ayilona ithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele;

【 ithempeli lomoya ongcwele 】yebo Kubhekise kokungabonakali → umzimba womoya , ungumzimba kaKristu, thina singamalungu omzimba wakhe, leli yithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

→Ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imiqulu yasendulo inezela: Amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe). ( Efesu 5:30 )

【 umhlatshelo ophilayo KwabaseRoma 12:1 Ngakho ngiyanincenga, bazalwane bami, ngobubele bukaNkulunkulu ukuba ninikele imizimba yenu ibe-ngumnikelo ophilileyo;

buza: Ingabe umhlatshelo ophilayo ubhekisela emzimbeni wami wenyama?
impendulo : Umhlatshelo ophilayo kusho ukuzalwa kabusha " umzimba womoya ” → Umzimba kaKristu ungumhlatshelo ophilayo, futhi singamalungu omzimba wakhe ayimihlatshelo ephilayo → Ingcwele futhi ejabulisa uNkulunkulu, lena inkonzo yakho yokomoya

Qaphela: Uma ungakuqondi ukuzalwa kabusha nokuqonda, uzonikela ngomzimba wakho → Lo mzimba uvela ku-Adamu, ungcolile futhi ungcolile, ungowokubola nokufa, futhi ungumhlatshelo wokufa.
Uma unikela ngomhlatshelo ophilayo ofunwa uNkulunkulu, unikela ngomhlatshelo ofile. Kulungile! Ngakho-ke, kufanele wazi ukuthi ungaba ngcwele kanjani.

5. Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi futhi ufakaze ngokwamukela umzimba weNkosi

Isitsha esisibusisayo asiyena yini umhlanganyeli wegazi likaKristu na? Isinkwa esisihlephulayo asihlanganyeli yini umzimba kaKristu na? ( 1 Korinte 10:16 )

buza: ( incwadi ) wavuswa kanye noKristu, ingabe wayesenawo kakade umzimba kaKristu? Kungani usafuna ukwamukela isidumbu sakhe?
impendulo: mina( incwadi ) ukuze sithole umzimba womoya kaKristu, nathi kufanele fakazi Zuza umzimba kaKristu futhi uzoba nokuningi esikhathini esizayo isipiliyoni Ukubonakaliswa ngokomzimba okungokomoya →UJesu ubonakala ngeso lenyama” ikhekhe “Esikhundleni somzimba wakhe (isinkwa sokuphila), enkomishini” ijusi yamagilebhisi “Esikhundleni sakhe Igazi , ukuphila , umphefumulo →Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa Inhloso uyasibiza gcina isithembiso , yigcinele ezinye izinjongo Igazi isungulwe kanye nathi ITestamente Elisha , gcina indlela, sebenzisa ( ukuzethemba ) gcina okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu ngaphakathi ( umzimba womzimba )! Kuze kube yilapho uKristu ebuya futhi umzimba wangempela uvela → Kufanele nizihlole ukuze nibone ukuthi ninokholo yini, futhi nizihlole. Anazi yini ukuthi uma ningabokwanga, ninoJesu Kristu phakathi kwenu na? Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( 2 Korinte 13:5 )

6. Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, aniyikuba yinyama.

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. ( Roma 8:9 )

buza: UMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala enhliziyweni, pho kungani singebona abenyama?
impendulo: Lapho uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, niyoba ngumuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ( Omusha ) yebo engabonakali → ngu " umzimba womoya "Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu" Omusha “Umzimba womoya awusiye owa ( Indoda endala ) inyama. Umzimba womuntu omdala wafa ngenxa yesono, nomphefumulo wakhe ( umzimba womoya ) izimpilo ezilungisiswa ngokukholwa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kepha umphefumulo uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga. ( Roma 8:10 )

7. Wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

1 Johane 3:9 Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye;

buza: Kungani abazelwe nguNkulunkulu bengoni?
impendulo: Ngoba izwi likaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala lisho “imbewu”) likhona enhliziyweni yakhe, akanakona →
1 Lapho iZwi likaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, noMoya oNgcwele kaNkulunkulu kukhona enhliziyweni yakho, uzalwa ngokusha ( Omusha ),
2 Umuntu omusha ungumzimba womoya ( akusikho okwakho ) ikhehla elonayo enyameni,
3 Umphefumulo nomzimba womuntu omusha kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Ezulwini! Nizalwa kabusha niyizidalwa ezintsha ezulwini. Amen - bheka kwabase-Efesu 2:6
4 Ukufa komzimba womuntu omdala ngesono, ekufeni kukaKristu, kucinyiwe futhi kwangcwatshwa ethuneni. Akuseyimi ophilayo, nguKristu ophilelayo manje. Omusha" Isiphi isono esingenziwa kuKristu? Ingabe uqinisile? Ngakho-ke uPawulu wathi → Kufanele futhi uhloniphe isono sakho ( bheka ) yena ufile, njalo ( bheka ) kuze kube yilapho umzimba wakhe onesono ubuyela othulini, uyokufa futhi ezwe ukufa kukaJesu. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:11

8. Noma ngubani owonayo akamazi uJesu

1 Johane 3:6 Lowo ohlala kuye akoni;

buza: Kungani abantu abonayo bengamazi uJesu?
impendulo: soni, soni →

1 Angikaze ngimbone, angikaze ngimazi uJesu ,
2 Ukungaqondi ukusindiswa kwemiphefumulo kuKristu,
3 Awukabutholi ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu ,
4 Abantu abenza isono → abazalwa kabusha .
5 Abantu abenza ubugebengu bangesikhathi senyoka → bangabantwana benyoka nosathane .

Siyazi ukuthi lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona; ( 1 Johane 5:18 )

Qaphela: Wazalwa uNkulunkulu →" umzimba womoya "Kufihlwe kuNkulunkulu kanye noKristu. UKristu manje ungakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba osezulwini. Ukuphila kwakho okuphinde kwazalwa nakho kukhona. Omubi usemhlabeni nebhubesi elibhodlayo lizulazula. Lingakulimaza kanjani? Kunjalo! Ngakho UPawulu Uthi → Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula makaningcwelise ngokuphelele, futhi kwangathi umoya wenu nomphefumulo nomzimba wenu kulondolozwe kungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. articles.title: Insindiso Yomphefumulo (Isifundo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 6 ivesi 53 futhi sifunde ndawonye: UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila kini. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami unokuphila okuphakade ekugcineni. usuku ngiyomvusa ngalo

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Asikholwe ivangeli - sizuze uJesu Igazi. Ukuphila.Umphefumulo! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

---Umzimba womphefumulo womntwana ozelwe nguNkulunkulu---

1: Umsebenzi wokudala usuqediwe

buza: Uzoqedwa nini umsebenzi wokudala?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa!
→→Konke sekumi ngomumo. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo wawusuphelile, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. ( Genesise 2:1-2 )

2: Umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuqediwe

KumaHebheru Isahluko 4:3 Kodwa thina esikholwayo singangena kulokho kuphumula, njengoba nje uNkulunkulu asho: “Ngifungile ekuthukutheleni kwami, ngathi: ‘Abayikungena ekuphumuleni kwami!’” Eqinisweni, umsebenzi wokudala uqala ngokudala usuqediwe kusukela kulo mhlaba.

buza: Ungangena kanjani ekuphumuleni kukaKristu?
impendulo: ( incwadi ) Umsebenzi kaKristu wokuhlenga usuqediwe

Kwathi uJesu enambitha uviniga, wathi: Kwenziwe ! "Ehlise ikhanda, Nika umphefumulo wakho kuNkulunkulu . Isikhombo (Johane 19:30)

Qaphela: UJesu wathi: " Kwenziwe "! Wasehlisa ikhanda. Nika umphefumulo wakho kuNkulunkulu . Amen! UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izosenzela lokhu →【 ukusindiswa kwemiphefumulo 】Sekuqediwe futhi kungenwe ekuphumuleni! →→Njengoba nje uNkulunkulu aqeda umsebenzi wakhe wokudala ngezinsuku eziyisithupha, uNkulunkulu waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Kanjani( incwadi ) ekuphumuleni kukaKristu?
impendulo: ( incwadi ) wafa, wangcwatshwa, futhi wavuswa kanye noKristu → ukuzalwa kabusha, ukuzalwa kukaNkulunkulu, thola Umzimba wakhe womphefumulo! wena thola Umzimba kaKristu womphefumulo ungumntwana ozelwe uNkulunkulu →Manje usungenile kakade ( UKristu ), hhayi phakathi ( U-Adamu )ri →→ Lokhu kungena ekuphumuleni kukaKristu . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Okwesithathu: Thola igazi eliyigugu likaJesu

-------( impilo, umphefumulo )-------

buza: Ungalithola kanjani igazi eliyigugu likaJesu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) UJehova wesula ububi babantu bonke, buyela ) kuJesu

Sonke sidukile njengezimvu, yilowo nalowo uphendukele endleleni yakhe; Inkomba ( Isaya 53:6 )

buza: Isiphi isono esilethwa uJehova? buyela ) kuJesu?
impendulo: (Isono Sabo Bonke) Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Isono (sabeka) kuJesu ,
2 Isono (beka) kuJesu ,
3 Isono (sabeka) kuJesu . Amen

Qaphela: UJehova uNkulunkulu wenza bonke abantu babe “isono”, “isono” “nesono” →→( buyela ) kuJesu→→Ngokufa kukaJesu, izono zabo bonke abantu→→

1 "yeka" isono,

2 “Susa” isono,
3 “Ukuhlawulela” izono, Akuhlali ngisho nechashaza lesono kuwo wonke umuntu → biza ukuhlengwa ;
4 Isingeniso (Yongyi) Uyolungisiswa kuze kube phakade futhi uyoba nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.

Uma ushiya ezinye" Udoti “Kuwe, uyokona; manje Sethula iZwi likaNkulunkulu ( Ukulungisiswa ) ikhona enhliziyweni yakho, awusoze wona. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:9.
“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakini nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isiphambeko, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngobubi, kungeniswe ukulunga okuphakade, kugcizelelwe umbono nesiprofetho, kugcotshwe oNgcwele, noma: Ukuhumusha) Inkomba (Daniyeli 9:24).

(2) UKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu

buza: UKristu wafela izono zethu →Ngayiphi injongo?
impendulo: " Inhloso "ukuphela ( U-Adamu ) umzimba wesono ukubhujiswa ( thina ) umzimba wesono → usikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, nasebudaleni buka-Adamu.
→→Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaJesu luyasikhuthaza. Ngoba sicabanga ukuthi umuntu" okwe “Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa (bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14). Labo abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni (bheka amaRoma 6:7) → incwadi Wonke umuntu ufile, kufanele kube ( incwadi ) futhi wonke umuntu wakhululwa esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, futhi wakhumula umuntu omdala. Amen

(3) uKristu ( Igazi ) ukuphuma

Kodwa lapho efika kuJesu futhi amthola efile, awazange ayaphule imilenze yakhe. Kodwa elinye lamasosha lamgwaza ohlangothini ngomkhonto, futhi khona lapho Igazi bese kuphuma amanzi . ( Johane 19:33-34 )

(4)Thina( Igazi kanye noKristu ( Igazi ) ziphume ndawonye

buza: thina Igazi kanjani naye Igazi Siphume ndawonye?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UJehova wehlisela phezu kwakhe isono sabo bonke abantu →Ngumphefumulo nomzimba wawo wonke umuntu ( buyela ) kuJesu Kristu,
2 UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni →Yithi esabethelwa esiphambanweni,
3 uJesu ( Igazi ) ukuphuma → ingeyethu ( Igazi ) iyaphuma,
4 ( Igazi )leyo impilo, umphefumulo ! UJesu wavuma ( ukuphila ) → Yithi Yeka Impilo evela ku-Adamu →" lahlekelwa "impilo," lahlekelwa “Umphefumulo ka-Adamu ongcolile futhi ongcolile,
5. “Ukulahlekelwa” ukuphila nomphefumulo womuntu →" Faka " Zuza impilo nomphefumulo kaJesu →→ Yilokho Usindise impilo yami nomphefumulo wami ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe (noma ukuhunyushwa ngokuthi: umphefumulo; okufanayo ngezansi) uyolahlekelwa yikho; 35)

(5) Wangcwatshwa

Qaphela: UJesu wafa ngokulengiswa emthini → okungukuthi, umzimba wethu wesono wafa, futhi umzimba wesono wangcwatshwa → okungukuthi, umzimba wethu wesono wangcwatshwa, nathi” uthuli “Umzimba ofika ekugcineni ubuyela othulini futhi ubuyela ethuneni. Bheka uGenesise 3:19; Igazi ) akazange angcwatshwe, kodwa walahleka, walahlwa, futhi wageleza ngaphansi kwesiphambano. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(6) Ukuvuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu

Ukuvuka kukaKristu → Sithethelele , Ukuvuka, ukuzalwa kabusha, ukusindiswa, ukutholwa njengamadodana, uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, nokuphila okuphakade kanye naye. ! Amen.
UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu (noma kwahunyushwa ngokuthi: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuselwa ukulungisiswa kwethu). Inkomba ( Roma 4:25 )

Qaphela: Sivuswa kanye noKristu → azalwe kabusha Omusha " Faka " Umoya kaKristu · Igazi ·Impilo·Umphefumulo Nomzimba ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Abantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu:

1 Abokuqala bayinzalo yabantu; manje bayinzalo yabesifazane
2 Ngaphambili abantwana baka-Adamu; manje likaKristu izingane
3 Kudala kwakungumoya ka-Adamu; manje likaKristu umoya
4 Kwake kwaba yigazi lika-Adamu; manje likaKristu Igazi
5 Ngaphambili kwakukhona ukuphila kuka-Adamu; manje likaKristu ukuphila
6 Umphefumulo ka-Adamu ;manje likaKristu umphefumulo
7 Owokuqala kwakungumzimba ka-Adamu; manje likaKristu Umzimba

Qaphela: amasonto amaningi imfundiso Iphutha lithi ( hlanganisa ) azikwazi ukuhlukaniswa, zizo →→
1 Umoya Wenyama Ka-Adamu noMoya kaKristu hlanganisa okomoya
2 Umoya wendoda yethu endala noMoya oNgcwele hlanganisa okomoya
3 Igazi lomuntu wethu omdala negazi likaKristu hlanganisa Igazi elilodwa
uma kuphele (hlanganisa) Ukushumayela kungase konakale, futhi amabandla amaningi “ Yilokho okungalungile "Ukuhlanganisa umoya wendoda yethu endala noMoya oNgcwele ( hlanganisa ) ungumoya.

ngoba Umoya okuBaba unguMoya oNgcwele, umoya okuJesu unguMoya oNgcwele, futhi umoya osebantwaneni abazelwe kabusha unguMoya oNgcwele → Bonke baphuma emoyeni owodwa (uMoya oNgcwele) !

Njengoba nje insimbi nodaka kungenakuhlangana ndawonye, amafutha namanzi akukwazi kuhlangana ndawonye. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(7) Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa futhi unikeze ubufakazi bokwamukela igazi likaJesu

buza: UJesu usimisa kanjani isivumelwano esisha nathi?
impendulo: UJesu wasebenzisa igama lakhe ( Igazi ) wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi
NgokukaLuka 22:20 Ngokufanayo, ngemva kokudla, wathatha inkomishi, wathi: “Le ndebe iyiyo ngisebenzise Igazi isivumelwano esisha , kwakho ageleze aphume .

buza: Silamukela kanjani igazi likaJesu
Impendulo: Kholwa evangelini ! Ukuzalwa kabusha, uvuko, nokutholwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu →→ Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa ( Yidlani umzimba weNkosi , Phuza eNkosini Igazi ) wukufakaza nokwamukela Umzimba weNkosi, igazi leNkosi, impilo yeNkosi, umphefumulo weNkosi ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

( njenge ) UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila kinina; Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, uhlala kimi, nami ngihlala kuye.

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Amen.

Imizimba yomphefumulo yabantwana abazalwa nguNkulunkulu

1. Ukuthola Umoya KaJesu

buza: kuJesu ( umoya ) →Imuphi umoya?
impendulo: kuJesu ( umoya )→NguMoya kaBaba oseZulwini, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya kaNkulunkulu →Nguwo Umoya munye ( UMoya oNgcwele )!
Qaphela: thola ( UMoya oNgcwele ), okungukuthi, ukuthola →uMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaBaba oseZulwini, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya kaNkulunkulu! Amen. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

buza: Ungawuthola kanjani uMoya oNgcwele othenjiswe nguNkulunkulu?
Impendulo: Kholwa evangelini!
NgokukaMarku 1:15 [UJesu] wathi: “Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, nombuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Kholwa ivangeli ! "

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: njengabaphostoli ( uPaul ) Ivangeli kwabezizwe
Manje ngiyanishumayeza, bazalwane, ivangeli engalishumayeza nina, enalamukela nokumi kulo; uzosindiswa yilelivangeli . ( 1 Korinte 15:1-2 )

buza: Kumele usindiswe ngokukholwa yiliphi ivangeli ongakholwa kulo futhi usindiswe?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
[1 KwabaseKhorinte 15:3] Ngoba lokho enganinika khona futhi: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo,

buza: Iyiphi inkinga uKristu ayixazulula lapho efela izono zethu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Sikhulule esonweni

uKristu ngowethu" ubugebengu "Wabethelwa futhi wafa → UKristu yedwa" okwe "Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa (bona 2 Korinte 5:14) → Labo abafile bakhululiwe esonweni (bona amaRoma 6: 7)
Qaphela: UKristu ungumuntu oyedwa" okwe “Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa → Lowo ofile ukhululiwe esonweni, futhi bonke bayafa, ( incwadi ) futhi wonke umuntu wakhululwa esonweni. Amen

(2) Abakhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho
Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni osibophayo. Manje usukhululekile emthethweni , usicela ukuba sikhonze iNkosi ngokuvumelana nobusha bomoya (umphefumulo: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwemikhuba yakudala. Isikhombo (KwabaseRoma 7:6) kanye no-Gal 3:13

【1 Korinte 15:4】 Wangcwatshwa

(3) Hlukanisa ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo
Ningaqambelani amanga; ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.
Qaphela: Ngabethelwa kanye noKristu, futhi umzimba wesono wabhujiswa → Ngakhululwa emzimbeni wokufa. Bheka amaRoma 7:24-25

[1 Korinte 15:4] wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu ngokweBhayibheli,

(4) Ukuvuka kukaKristu → kusenza silungisiswe, sivuswe kanye Naye, sizalwe kabusha, sisindiswe, samukelwe njengabantwana, samukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.
UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu; Ivuselwe ukulungisiswa kwethu ). Inkomba ( Roma 4:25 )

(5) Baphunyukile emandleni obumnyama beHayidese
Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama futhi wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo ( Kolose 1:13 )

(6) Ku (inyoka, udrako) uSathane
Ngiyakuthuma kubo, ukuze amehlo abo avulwe, baphenduke ebumnyameni, baye ekukhanyeni; Suka emandleni kaSathane uye kuNkulunkulu Ngokukholwa kimi niyakwamukela ukuthethelelwa kwezono nefa kanye nabo bonke abangcwelisiwe. ’” (Izenzo 26:18)

(7) Ezweni

ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. Isikhombo (Johane 17:14)

(8) Sihambise embusweni weNdodana yethu ethandekayo futhi ubhale amagama ethu encwadini yokuphila
Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama futhi wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo ( Kolose 1:13 )

Qaphela: UNkulunkulu usidlulisele embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo → amagama alotshwe encwadini yokuphila asho ukuthi usidlulisele embusweni kaJesu nombuso kaNkulunkulu → okuwumbuso wezulu! Amen

Thola okuthenjisiwe【 UMoya oNgcwele 】 uphawu
Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. Isikhombo ( Kwabase-Efesu 1:13 )

buza: Liyini izwi leqiniso? Ivangeli elisisindisayo?

3 Hlukanisani ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo
4 Ukuvuka kukaKristu → kusenza silungisiswe, sivuswe kanye Naye, sizalwe kabusha, sisindiswe, samukelwe njengabantwana, samukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen
5 Baphunyukile emandleni obumnyama beHayidese
6 Ukhululiwe kuSathane (inyoka, udrako).

7 emhlabeni
8 Amagama ethu mawadluliselwe embusweni weNdodana yethu ethandekayo futhi alotshwe encwadini yokuphila! Amen
Leli yizwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, enikholwe kuye, enamukela kuye isithembiso. UMoya oNgcwele 】Okophawu! Amen.
( Qaphela: " incwadi "Abantu baleli vangeli → Wabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe ;" Ungakukholwa "Abantu baleli vangeli → Awukwazi ukuthola uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele . ) Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Qaphela: Uthole okwakuthenjisiwe【 UMoya oNgcwele 】okomaka →okungukuthi thola UMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaBaba ! Amen.
Roma 8:16 UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, uyithikithi lethu lokungena embusweni wezulu, futhi uwubufakazi nobufakazi bokuthi sinefa likaBaba wethu osezulwini → Lo Moya Ongcwele ubufakazi befa lethu (umbhalo wokuqala uyisibambiso), kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (abantu: umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa, ukuze inkazimulo Yakhe idunyiswe. Inkomba ( Kwabase-Efesu 1:14 ), uyakuqonda lokhu?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sihlola, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngendlela yokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu →Ukwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe wukwamukela uMoya kaJesu noMoya kaBaba waseZulwini ! Amen

Qhubeka uhlanganyele kumagazini olandelayo: Insindiso yomphefumulo

1 Ungamzuza kanjani uJesu Igazi ( impilo, umphefumulo )

2 Ungawuthola kanjani umzimba kaJesu

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu Isahluko 1 nevesi 18 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshiwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayemiselwe uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: ukuqonda. Umphefumulo nomzimba kaJesu Kristu! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

U-Adamu Wokugcina: Umzimba Womphefumulo KaJesu

1. Umoya kaJesu

(1)Umoya kaJesu uyaphila

buza: UJesu wazalwa kubani?
impendulo: UJesu wazalwa uBaba Wasezulwini Lapho uJesu ebhapathizwa → → kwaba nezwi elivela ezulwini lithi: “Lo yiNdodana yami ethandekayo, engithokozile ngayo.” ( Mathewu 3:17 ) → Zonke izingelosi, uNkulunkulu unazo njalo uthi Iyiphi ethi: "Wena uyindodana yami, namuhla ngikuzele"? Iyiphi akhomba kuyo athi: “Mina ngiyoba nguYise, yona ibe yindodana yami”? Isikhombo (Hebheru 1:5)

buza: KaJesu umoya Ingabe iluhlaza? Noma yenziwe?
impendulo: Njengoba uJesu ezelwe nguYise, umoya ) nabo bazalwa uBaba waseZulwini, hhayi njengo-Adamu owadala umuntu. umoya ".

(2)Umoya kaBaba waseZulwini

buza: KaJesu umoya →Umoya kabani?
impendulo: EkaBaba waseZulwini umoya →Okungukuthi, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova uNkulunkulu, noMoya woMdali → Ekuqaleni, uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba. Umhlaba wawungenasimo futhi ungenalutho, futhi ubumnyama babuphezu kobuso bakwalasha; umoya kaNkulunkulu Ukugijima emanzini. ( Genesise 1:1-2 )

Qaphela: umoya kaJesu →NguMoya kaBaba, uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova, uMdali, uMoya owadala umuntu →→ Nakuba UNkulunkulu unomoya Unamandla anele okudala abantu abaningi. Kungani udala umuntu oyedwa kuphela? Nguye ofuna abantu babe nenzalo ehlonipha uNkulunkulu...Reference (Malakhi 2:15)

(3) Umoya kaYise, uMoya weNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele → umoya owodwa

buza: Ubani igama likaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Kubizwa ngokuthi uMduduzi, obuye abizwe ngokuthi ukugcoba → Ngizocela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma Ukuhumusha: Umduduzi; ofanayo ngezansi), ukuze abe nani phakade, uMoya weqiniso… Reference (Johane 14:16-17) kanye neyoku-1 Johane 2:27.

buza: UMoya oNgcwele Ivelaphi?
Impendulo: UMoya oNgcwele uvela kuBaba oseZulwini →Kepha ngiyakunithumela uMduduzi ovela kuBaba okhona uMoya weqiniso ophuma kuBaba ; nxa esefikile yena uzafakaza ngami. Isikhombo (Johane 15:26)

buza: kuBaba ( umoya ) →Imuphi umoya?
impendulo: kuBaba ( umoya ) → kunjalo UMoya oNgcwele !

buza: kuJesu ( umoya ) →Imuphi umoya?
impendulo: kuJesu ( umoya ) → NoMoya oNgcwele
→ Bonke abantu babhapathizwa, futhi uJesu wabhapathizwa. Ngithe ngisakhuleka kwavuleka izulu. UMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwakhe , emise okwejuba, kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo, engithokozile ngawe.” ( Luka 3:21-22 )

Qaphela:

1 Ngokuka (umoya):
Umoya KuBaba Osezulwini, Umoya KaNkulunkulu, Umoya KaJehova → ungu UMoya oNgcwele !
Umoya ohlala kuJesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNkosi → NoMoya oNgcwele !
UMoya oNgcwele UnguMoya kaBaba noMoya kaJesu bonke baphuma koyedwa, futhi “. Umoya munye ” → UMoya oNgcwele . ( 1 Korinte 6:17 )

2 Ngokusho (umuntu):
Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zeziphiwo, kepha uMoya munye.
Kukhona izinkonzo ezahlukene, kodwa iNkosi yinye.
Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zemisebenzi, kodwa nguNkulunkulu oyedwa osebenza zonke izinto kubo bonke. ( 1 Korinte 12:4-6 )

3 Yisho ngokwe (isihloko)
UYise, iNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele →Igama likaYise libizwa ngokuthi uBaba uJehova, igama leNdodana libizwa ngokuthi uJesu iNdodana, negama likaMoya oNgcwele libizwa ngokuthi uMduduzi noma uGcobo. Bheka kuMathewu Isahluko 28 Ivesi 19 neSivumelwano Isahluko 14 Amavesi 16-17.
[1 Korinte 6:17] Kepha ohlanganiswe neNkosi nguye Yibani nomoya munye neNkosi . Ingabe uJesu wayemunye noYise? ube! Kulungile! UJesu wathi →ngikuBaba noBaba ukimi → Mina nobaba simunye . ( Johane 10:30 )
Njengoba kulotshiwe, kanjalo →munye umzimba noMoya munye, njengalokho nabizelwa ethembeni linye. Yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, nakubo bonke. Isikhombo ( Kwabase-Efesu 4:4-6 ). Ngakho, uyaqonda?

2. Umphefumulo KaJesu

(1) UJesu Kristu akanasono

buza: UJesu wazalwa ngaphansi komthetho.
impendulo: Awukho umthetho owaphulwa! Amen

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Ngokuba lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa, nokweqa umthetho → Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka. Isikhombo (Roma 4:15)

Qaphela: Nakuba uJesu Kristu azalelwa ngaphansi komthetho, akayena owomthetho → Waba umpristi, hhayi ngokwezimiso zenyama (umthetho), kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli (okuqala, okungenakubhubhiswa) (ukukhonza uNkulunkulu ). Isikhombo ( Hebheru 7:16 ). Njengoba uJesu" iSabatha "Yelapha abantu ngokomthetho wenyama. → UJesu wephula "iSabatha" eMithethweni Eyishumi yomthetho, ngakho abaFarisi abangamaJuda bazama ngazo zonke izindlela ukubamba uJesu futhi bambhubhise uJesu! Ngoba wephule umthetho "Umthetho akulandelwa" iSabatha ". Reference ( Mathewu 12:9-14 )

KwabaseGalathiya [5:18] Kepha uma niholwa nguMoya, aniphansi komthetho
UJesu wayeholwa nguMoya oNgcwele →Nakuba wazalelwa ngaphansi komthetho, akazange amkhonze uNkulunkulu ngokwemithetho yenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli, Hhayi lapha Umthetho umi kanje:

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa; —Bheka amaRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile —Bheka amaRoma 7:8
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono kasisona isono —Bheka amaRoma 5:13

[UJesu] Umthetho ngaphandle kwezimiso zenyama awukho ngaphansi komthetho; iSabatha Ukwelapha izifo zabantu, ngokomthetho, " Bala icala ”, kodwa akanawo umthetho → Isono akusona isono . Uma ungekho umthetho, angeke kube khona ukwephulwa komthetho uma kungekho ukwephulwa komthetho, yibuphi ubugebengu obuzokwenziwa? Ingabe uqinisile? Uma unomthetho → yahlulela futhi ulahle ngokomthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka amaRoma 2:12 .

1 UJesu akenzanga isono

Ngokuba umpristi wethu omkhulu akakwazi ukuzwelana nobuthakathaka bethu. Walingwa kuzo zonke izindawo njengathi, Ukuthi akenzanga cala . ( Heberu 4:15 ) kanye neyoku-1 Petru 2:22

2 UJesu akanasono
UNkulunkulu uyabakhulula abangenasono Lowo ongasazi isono waba yisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze kuye sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu. ( 2 Korinte 5:21 ) no-1 Johane 3:5 .

(2)UJesu ungcwele

Ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Yibani ngcwele, ngoba ngingcwele . (Funda eyoku-1 Petru 1:16.)
Kuyasifaneleka ukuba sibe nompristi omkhulu onjalo ongcwele, ongenabubi, ongenabala, owahlukanisiwe nezoni, ophakeme ngaphezu kwamazulu. ( Hebheru 7:26 )

(3) KukaKristu ( Igazi ) engenasici, engangcolisiwe

1 Petru 1:19 kodwa ngegazi eliyigugu likaKristu njengelewundlu elingenasici nasici.

Qaphela: kaKristu" igazi eliyigugu "Akunasici, akunasici → ukuphila zikhona Igazi phakathi →lokhu ukuphila Yilokho → umphefumulo !
Umphefumulo KaJesu Kristu → Alinabala, alingcolile, futhi lingcwele! Amen.

3. Umzimba kaKristu

(1)ULizwi waba yinyama
ULizwi waba yinyama , uhlala phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. ( Johane 1:14 )

(2) UNkulunkulu waba yinyama
NgokukaJohane 1:1-2 Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu; IZwi linguNkulunkulu . ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni.
Qaphela: Kwakukhona iTao ekuqaleni, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu → iTao yaba inyama → UNkulunkulu waba inyama! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(3) “Umoya” waba inyama
Qaphela: UNkulunkulu "UnguMoya" →" unkulunkulu "waba yinyama → yi" umoya "Yiba yinyama!→→ UNkulunkulu ungumoya (noma akanazwi) , ngakho abamkhulekelayo kumelwe bamkhulekele ngomoya nangeqiniso. Inkomba (Johane 4:24) → Ukukhulelwa kwentombi uMariya kwavela “kuMoya oNgcwele”! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka kuMathewu isahluko 1 ivesi 18

(4) Inyama kaKristu ayinakonakala

buza: Kungani umzimba kaKristu ( Cha ) ukubona ukubola?
impendulo: Ngoba uKristu enyameni → 1 ukuzalwa komuntu , 2 inyama yaphezulu , 3 Umzimba ongokomoya ! Amen. Ngakho-ke, umzimba wakhe awunakonakala → UDavide, engumprofethi futhi azi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayefungile kuye ukuthi omunye wenzalo yakhe wayeyohlala esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, wakubona kusengaphambili lokhu futhi wakhuluma ngokuvuka kukaKristu, ethi: ‘ Umphefumulo Wakhe awushiywa eHayidesi; . ’ (Funda izEnzo 2:30-31.)

(5) UJesu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wayengenakuboshwa ukufa

UNkulunkulu wachaza ubuhlungu bokufa futhi wamvusa, ngoba wayengenakuboshwa ukufa. . Inkomba ( IzEnzo 2:24 )

buza: Kungani umzimba wethu wenyama ubona ukubola? Ingabe bazoguga, bagule noma bafe?
impendulo: Ngoba sonke siyinzalo kakhokho wethu u-Adamu,

Umzimba ka-Adamu wawu "" uthuli "Kwakhiwe →
Nemizimba yethu nayo" uthuli “Kwadalwa;
Lapho u-Adamu esenyameni, wayesevele " Thengisa "uphiwe isono,
Imizimba yethu nayo" Thengisa "Nikeza ubugebengu
ngoba【 ubugebengu 】Inani labasebenzi fa →Ngakho imizimba yethu yenyama izobola, iguge, igule, ife, futhi ekugcineni ibuyele othulini.

buza: Imizimba yethu ingakhululeka kanjani ekuboleni, ekuguleni, ekudabukeni, ebuhlungu, nasekufeni?

impendulo: INkosi uJesu yathi →Kufanele ukuzalwa kabusha ! Bheka uJohane 3:7.

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya
2 Bazalwa eqinisweni levangeli
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu
4 Ukuzuza ubuNdodana bukaNkulunkulu
5 Yamukelani uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe
6 Thatha isidumbu sikaJesu
7 Lowo owazuza uJesu Igazi (impilo, umphefumulo)
Kungale ndlela kuphela esingazuza ngayo ifa lokuphila okuphakade! Amen

( Qaphela: Bafowethu nodadewethu! 1 Ukuzuza uKristu" umoya “Okungukuthi, uMoya oNgcwele, 2 Thola uKristu" Igazi "Khona manje impilo, umphefumulo , 3 Thola umzimba kaKristu →Bathathwa njengezingane ezizelwe nguNkulunkulu! kungenjalo wena Bangabazenzisi, bezenza abantwana bakaNkulunkulu, njengezilwane nezimfene ezizenza abantu. Namuhla, abadala bebandla abaningi, abefundisi, nabashumayeli abayiqondi insindiso yemiphefumulo kuKristu, futhi bonke bazenza abantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Konke kungokwami nevangeli ( lahlekelwa ) yokuphila → lahlekelwa Umzimba wakho womphefumulo unjalo Thola umphefumulo nomzimba kaKristu → Kufanele ulondoloze ukuphila ,leyo Usindise umzimba wami womphefumulo ".)

buza: Ungawuthola kanjani umzimba womphefumulo kaKristu?

Amen

Ihubo: INkosi iyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuZakariya isahluko 12 ivesi 1 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Izwi leNkosi ngo-Israyeli. usho uJehova oweneka izulu, owamisa izisekelo zomhlaba, wabumba umoya phakathi kwabantu;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya: Qonda umzimba womphefumulo kakhokho u-Adamu.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

U-Adamu, ukhokho wesintu→→umzimba womphefumulo

1. Umoya ka-Adamu

(1) Umoya (umoya) ka-Adamu wadalwa

buza: Ingabe umoya ka-Adamu wadalwa? Kuseluhlaza?
impendulo: Adam" umoya "yakhiwe →→【 Ubani owadala umoya ngaphakathi kumuntu 】→→Ubani owadala umuntu? umoya ” → → → INkosi ithi → Izwi likaJehova ngo-Israyeli yeka izulu, nakhe izisekelo zomhlaba. Ubani owadala umoya ngaphakathi kumuntu INkosi ithi: Reference (Zakariya 12:1)

(2) Izingelosi (imimoya) nazo ziyadalwa

buza: Ingabe “imimoya” yezingelosi nayo yadalwa?
impendulo: "Inkanyezi ekhanyayo, indodana yokusa", amakherubi amboze umphongolo wesivumelwano → amakherubi athi " Ingelosi "→ingelosi" umzimba womzimba “Zonke zidalwe uNkulunkulu→ kusukela osukwini lokudalwa kwakho Wawuphelele ezindleleni zakho, kepha kwabonakala ukungalungi phakathi kwakho. ( Hezekeli 28:15 )

(3) Inyama negazi lika-Adamu (umoya).

buza: Adam" umoya "Kusuka kuphi?"
impendulo: "Ngaphakathi Kwendalo Yomuntu" umoya "UJehova →→uJehova uNkulunkulu" ethukuthele “Vuthela emakhaleni akhe, abe yinto ethile ( umoya ) womuntu ophilayo u-Adamu! →→UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba-ngumuntu ophilayo igama lakhe ngokuthi u-Adamu. ( Genesise 2:7 )

buza: Ingabe “umoya” ka-Adamu wemvelo noma ongokomoya?
impendulo: Adam" umoya ” Ngokwemvelo →→ Ngakho kulotshiwe: “Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba umoya ( Umoya: noma uhunyushwe ngokuthi igazi "Umuntu ophilayo"; u-Adamu wokugcina waba ngumoya ophilisa abantu. Owemvelo uza kuqala , bese kuba khona abangokomoya. ( 1 Korinte 15:45-46 )

2. Umphefumulo ka-Adamu

(1) Ukwephulwa kwesivumelwano sika-Adamu

---Yidla emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi---

UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” (Genesise 2:16-17)
buza: U-Adamu wasephula kanjani isivumelwano?
impendulo: Kwathi owesifazane (u-Eva) ebona ukuthi isithelo somuthi sasilungele ukudliwa, siyabukeka emehlweni, futhi sibukeka kahle emehlweni, futhi sihlakaniphisa abantu, wathatha isithelo wasidla, wasinika umyeni wakhe. U-Adamu). ( Genesise 3:6 )

(2) U-Adamu waqalekiswa ngumthetho

buza: Yaba yini imiphumela yokwephula kuka-Adamu isivumelwano?
impendulo: Ngaphansi Kwesiqalekiso Somthetho →" Uma nje usidla uzokufa nokufa. "
UJehova uNkulunkulu →→ Wathi ku-Adamu: “Ngenxa yokuthi ulalele umkakho, wadla kulowo muthi engakuyala ngawo ukuba ungadli kuwo, umhlabathi uqalekisiwe ngenxa yakho; uyakusebenza izinsuku zonke zokuhamba kwakho ukuze uthole okudliwayo. kusuka kuyo. Uyakukhulela ameva namakhakhasi; Bukela ku ( Genesise 3:17-19 )

(3) Umphefumulo ka-Adamu wangcoliswa

buza: Ingabe inzalo (imiphefumulo) ka-Adamu nayo ingcolile?
impendulo: Adam" umphefumulo ” → Yiba Inyoka.Dragon.Develi.Ukungcola.kaSathane. . Thina bantu sonke siyinzalo kakhokho wethu u-Adamu, futhi umoya ogeleza ngaphakathi kithi uyinzalo Igazi "→ Sekuvele kungcolile, akuhlanzekile futhi akungcolile," ukuphila "Khona manje" umphefumulo "konke kuthintekile" inyoka “Ukungcola.
Njengoba kulotshiwe →Bazalwane abathandekayo, njengoba sinalezi zithembiso, Zihlanzeni kukho konke ukungcola komzimba nomphefumulo , mesabe uNkulunkulu futhi ungcweliswe. (2 Korinte 7:1)

3. Umzimba ka-Adamu

(1) Umzimba ka-Adamu

…yenziwe ngothuli...

buza: Wavelaphi umzimba kakhokho wokuqala u-Adamu?
impendulo: " uthuli “Wadala → UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu! →→ UJehova uNkulunkulu wabumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe ukuphila, waba umuntu ophilayo, ongokomoya, Igama lakhe kwakungu-Adamu. Bheka ku- (Genesise 2:7) Futhi thina bantu sonke siyinzalo ka-Adamu, futhi imizimba yethu nayo ingeyomhlaba. → Umuntu wokuqala wavela emhlabeni futhi engowomhlaba;...Izikhombo (1 Korinte 15:47)

(2) U-Adamu uthengiselwe esonweni

buza: U-Adamu ephule isivumelwano wayithengisela bani?
impendulo: "Adamu" 1 Eyasemhlabeni, 2 Okwenyama negazi, 3 Lapho sisenyameni, sathengiswa kubo ubugebengu ” → Sonke siyinzalo yakhe, futhi sathengiswa kuye ngenkathi sisenyameni. ubugebengu ” → Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, Isithengisiwe esonweni . Isikhombo (Roma 7:14)

buza: Uyini inkokhelo yesono?
impendulo: Yebo fa →→Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. ( Roma 6:23 )

buza: Ukufa kuvelaphi?
impendulo: fa kusuka ubugebengu Iza → Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, kanjalo ukufa kwehlela wonke umuntu ngenxa yokuthi wonke umuntu wona. ( Roma 5:12 )

buza: Ingabe wonke umuntu uzofa?
impendulo: Ngoba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu
→" ubugebengu "Inkokhelo ingukufa → Kumiselwe ukuba bonke abantu bafe kanye, futhi ngemva kwalokho kube ukwahlulelwa. Reference (Hebheru 9:27)

buza: Bayephi abantu ngemva kokufa?
impendulo: abantu" fa "Kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa kamuva → Umzimba womuntu ungowomhlaba, futhi umzimba uzobuyela emhlabeni ngemva kokufa; uma umuntu engakwenzi" incwadi "Ukuhlengwa kukaJesu Kristu, okomuntu" umphefumulo "uzokwenza → 1 “ehlela eHayidesi”; 2 Isahlulelo Sosuku Lwembubhiso → igama Akukhunjulwa incwadi yokuphila Uma esukuma, uyophonswa echibini lomlilo → Leli chibi lomlilo lingelokuqala ukufa kwesibili , “Umphefumulo” ubhubha phakade . →→Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo. Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; Ukufa neHayidesi nakho kwaphonswa echibini lomlilo; Uma igama lomuntu lingalotshiwe encwadini yokuphila, uyakuphonswa echibini lomlilo. Inkomba ( IsAmbulo 20:12-15 ), uyakuqonda lokhu?

(3) Umzimba ka-Adamu uzobola

buza: Kwenzekani emzimbeni wasemhlabeni?
impendulo: Njengalowo ongowasemhlabeni, banjalo bonke abasemhlabeni; Isikhombo (1 Korinte 15:48).

Uluthuli, futhi uyobuyela othulini. ’ (Genesise 3:19)

(Qaphela: Bafowethu nodadewethu! Ukuqonda umzimba womphefumulo ka-Adamu kuqala → ukuqonda umzimba wethu womphefumulo kuphela "Esihlokweni Sokushumayela" esilandelayo lapho ungaqonda ukuthi uJesu Kristu uwusindisa kanjani umzimba wethu womphefumulo. )

articles.title: Insindiso Yomphefumulo (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kumaHeberu Isahluko 11 Ivesi 4 Ngokukholwa u-Abela wanikela kuNkulunkulu umhlatshelo owawungcono kunalowo uKayini anikela ngakho, wazuza kanjalo ubufakazi bokulungisiswa kwakhe, ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu ngesipho sakhe. Nakuba afa, wayesakhuluma ngenxa yalolu kholo.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Insindiso Yemiphefumulo" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya→ Qonda ukuthi umphefumulo uyakhuluma.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Umphefumulo uyakhuluma

(1) Umphefumulo ka-Abela uyakhuluma

Ngokukholwa u-Abela wanikela kuNkulunkulu umhlatshelo owawungcono kunalowo uKayini anikela ngakho, wazuza kanjalo ubufakazi bokulungisiswa kwakhe, ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu ngesipho sakhe. Nakuba afa, wayesakhuluma ngenxa yalolu kholo. ( Hebheru 11:4 )
buza: U-Abela wafa ngokwenyama kodwa esakhuluma? Ukhuluma ngani?
impendulo: Umphefumulo uyakhuluma, ngumphefumulo ka-Abela okhulumayo!

(2) Igazi lika-Abela lakhala kuNkulunkulu

buza: Umphefumulo ka-Abela ukhuluma kanjani?
impendulo: INKOSI yathi: “Wenzeni (Kayini)? Igazi lomfowenu (u-Abela) liyakhala kimi ngezwi elivela emhlabathini.” ( Genesise 4:10 )

buza: Igazi linezwi elikhala kuNkulunkulu lisemhlabathini, ingabe “igazi” nalo linezwi lokukhuluma?
impendulo: ngoba" Igazi "Kukhona ukuphila kulo, egazini." ukuphila ” Ukukhuluma → Levitikusi 17:11 Ngoba umphefumulo wesidalwa esiphilayo usegazini igazi engilinika lona ukuze lenze ukubuyisana kwemiphefumulo yenu e-altare; ngoba Igazi Kukhona ukuphila kuwo , ukuze ihlawulele izono.

3. Ukuphila →→[umphefumulo]

------ -Impilo yomuntu injalo Igazi phakathi -------

buza: " Igazi "Ikhona impilo kulento" ukuphila "Ingabe umphefumulo?"
impendulo: " ukuphila ": Noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi umphefumulo, Igazi Impilo yangaphakathi umphefumulo →→Ngoba, noma ubani ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe ( Impilo: noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi umphefumulo; ) loba ngubani olahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami uzayithola. ( Mathewu 16:25 )

buza: " Igazi "Kunezwi elikhulumayo, ngumphefumulo okhulumayo?"
impendulo: womuntu" Igazi “Kukhona ukuphila kulo, ku Igazi "nge ukuphila "Ngumuntu" umphefumulo ” → “ Igazi "Kunezwi elikhulumayo, okusho ukuthi" umphefumulo "Khuluma!"

2. Umphefumulo uyakwazi ukukhuluma ngaphandle komzimba

(1)Umphefumulo ukhulumela phezulu

IsAmbulo 6:9-10 Lapho selivula uphawu lwesihlanu, ngabona phansi kwe-altare imiphefumulo yalabo ababebulewe ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu nangenxa yobufakazi; memeza kakhulu "Jehova, ongcwele noqinisileyo, koze kube nini ungahluleli abaphila emhlabeni, uphindisele igazi lethu na?"

buza: Obani labo ababulawa ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: ongcwele! Babulawa ngokwenyama ngenxa yamaKristu agcina iqiniso futhi afakaza ngoJesu ". umphefumulo "Uhlukanisiwe nomzimba," umphefumulo “Phindiselani igazi likaNkulunkulu. Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ningabesabi ababulala umzimba kodwa bengenakuwubulala umphefumulo kodwa yesabani lowo ongabhubhisa kokubili umzimba nomphefumulo esihogweni. ( Mathewu 10:28 )

(2) I-Incorporeal " umphefumulo “Khuluma, asizwe

buza: " umphefumulo "Ukukhuluma → Ingabe izindlebe zomuntu ziyakuzwa?"
impendulo: kuphela" umphefumulo "Ukukhuluma, akekho ongakuzwa! Isibonelo, uma uthi buthule enhliziyweni yakho: "Sawubona" → lokhu " umphefumulo wokuphila "Khuluma! Kodwa lokhu" umphefumulo "Lapho ukhuluma, uma umsindo ungadluli ezindebeni zenyama, izindlebe zomuntu azikwazi ukuzwa, kuphela." umphefumulo wokuphila “Lapho imisindo ikhishwa ngolimi nezindebe, izindlebe zomuntu ziyakwazi ukuyizwa;
Esinye isibonelo ukuthi abantu abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi " ngaphandle komzimba "ukuphikisana, nini" umphefumulo "Ukushiya umzimba," umphefumulo "Ungawubona owakho umzimba. Kodwa umzimba womuntu iso lenyama Angiboni" umphefumulo ", angikwazi ukuthinta" umphefumulo ", ayikwazi ukusetshenziswa ne " umphefumulo "Khuluma futhi akezwa" umphefumulo "Izwi elikhulumayo.

Ngoba uNkulunkulu ungumoya →→Ngakho ngiyakwazi ukuzwa eka-Abela “ umphefumulo "Amazwi enkulumo, nalabo ababulawa ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu" umphefumulo "Izwi lokukhuluma. Kodwa izindlebe zethu zenyama azikwazi ukuzwa inkulumo yomphefumulo, futhi umphefumulo awukwazi ukubonakala ngeso lenyama, futhi awukwazi ukuthintwa ngezandla.

Ngokuqondene nabangakholelwa kuNkulunkulu , abakholelwa ukuthi abantu banemiphefumulo, futhi bakholelwa ukuthi konke lokhu kuwukwazi nezifiso emzimbeni womuntu .

empeleni" umphefumulo "Lowo ongaphila yedwa ngaphandle komzimba usengakwazi ukukhuluma! Njengoba kulotshiwe → Khuluma izinto ezingokomoya kubantu abangokomoya; kodwa abantu benyama ngeke baqonde noma baqonde. Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyakuqonda?

3. Umzimba ngaphandle komphefumulo ufile

EkaJakobe 2:26 Njengoba umzimba ngaphandle komphefumulo ufile, kanjalo nokukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile.

buza: Bekuzokwenzekani ukube umzimba ubungenawo umphefumulo?
impendulo: Umzimba ufile ngaphandle komphefumulo →→Impilo yomuntu "isegazini", " ukuphila ” → ithi “ umphefumulo "," Igazi “Igeleza isitho ngasinye somzimba, nezitho zinokuphila. Igazi "Lapho ingagelezi emilenzeni yomzimba, kuba ndikindiki futhi ulahlekelwe ukwazi, futhi umzimba uzofela kuleyo ndawo. Ngokwesibonelo, abanye abantu bahlushwa i-hemiplegia, okungukuthi, i-hemiplegia, kanti ingxenye yomzimba iqulekile. Ngakho-ke, umzimba ongenawo umphefumulo ufile→→" umphefumulo "Ukushiya umzimba, okungukuthi" umphefumulo wokuphila "Ukushiya umzimba, lutho" umzimba ophilayo "leyo fa kwe. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(Qaphela: umphefumulo "Lapho ishiya umzimba - njengomlomo" ethukuthele ",akusiyo lento ebukekayo esithombeni, isithombe sifakwe ukuze sikwazise ubudlelwano phakathi komphefumulo nomzimba)

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Njengoba nje kulotshiwe eBhayibhelini: Ngizobhubhisa ukuhlakanipha kwabahlakaniphileyo futhi ngilahle ukuqonda kwabahlakaniphileyo - bayiqembu lamaKristu avela ezintabeni anesiko elincane nolwazi oluncane Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyakhuthaza , ebabiza ukuba bashumayele ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa: Ukukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuJakobe Isahluko 2, amavesi 19-20, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Nikholwa ukuthi munye kuphela uNkulunkulu, futhi nikukholelwa kahle lokho; Wena muntu oyize, uyathanda ukwazi ukuthi ukukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile na?

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya→ Qonda ukuthi ukukholwa kuNkulunkulu ngaphandle kokukholelwa kuMsindisi uJesu nokholo ngaphandle kokuvuselelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kufile.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ukuzethemba Nokuziphatha

(1) AmaJuda akholelwa kuNkulunkulu kodwa hhayi kuJesu, futhi ukuziphatha kwawo kokugcina umthetho kufile

EkaJakobe 2:19-20 Uyakholwa ukuthi munye kuphela uNkulunkulu, futhi ukholwa kahle; Wena muntu oyize, uyathanda ukwazi ukuthi ukukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile na?

buza: Kungani ukuziphatha kokugcina umthetho kwamaJuda kufile?
impendulo: "umJuda" ukuzethemba →Kholwa kuNkulunkulu, Kodwa ungakholwa kuJesu ! UJakobe wathi → Nikholelwa ukuthi kukhona uNkulunkulu oyedwa kuphela okholelwa lokho.

buza: "umJuda" Ukuziphatha "Kwenzenjani?"
impendulo: gcina umthetho

buza: Kungani imikhuba yokugcinwa komthetho ifile?
impendulo: Uma wehluleka ukuwugcina umthetho, uyakuba ngaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho; kuthululwa kithi, kungenxa yokuthi sonile kuNkulunkulu. (Daniyeli 9:11)

(2) AmaJuda (akholelwa kuJesu) futhi agcina umthetho (ukuziphatha) nawo afile

EkaJakobe Chapter 2 Verse 8 Kulotshiwe ukuthi: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.

buza: Kungani “umsebenzi” wamaJuda akholelwa kuJesu futhi agcina umthetho ufile?
impendulo: Ngokuba ogcina umthetho wonke kepha akhubeke kokukodwa unecala kuwo wonke. Kuvela ukuthi lowo owathi: “Ungaphingi,” wabuye wathi: “Ungabulali, noma ungafebi kodwa ubulala, usuke weqa umthetho. ( Jakobe 2:10-11 )

→UJakobe wathi: “Yibani ngabenzi bezwi, ningabi abalizwayo kuphela ngokugcina ngokucophelela umthetho ophelele owenza abantu bakhululeke, ningakhohlwa ngemva kokuwuzwa, kodwa empeleni niwenze.

UJakobe wacela ukukholwa kuJesu " futhi "Abazalwane abangamaJuda abagcina umthetho bayobusiswa nakanjani uma benza ukulunga komthetho → Bangakwazi ukwenza ukulunga komthetho? Cha, kuyini lokhu?" ipulaki “Mayelana nabantu, abakwazi nhlobo ukufeza ukulunga komthetho.

(3) Bakholelwa kuJesu futhi ukuziphatha kwabo ekugcineni umthetho kuwela emseni.

buza: Kungani bengakwazi ukuphila ngokuvumelana nokulunga komthetho?
impendulo: Wonke umuntu ophila ngomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; kusobala; ngoba iBhayibheli lithi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” ( Galathiya 3:10-11 )

ngakho ( uPaul ) wathi→→Nina enifuna ukulungisiswa ngomthetho nihlukanisiwe noKristu ngakho-ke nihlukanisiwe Kuwa emseni . Isikhombo (Galathiya 5:4)

2. Ukholo LobuKristu Nokuziphatha

(1) Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wenze ngoMoya oNgcwele

" ukuzethemba →"Kholwa kuJesu," Ukuziphatha “NgoMoya oNgcwele

isenzo

KwabaseGalathiya 5:25 Uma siphila ngoMoya, masihambe futhi ngoMoya.

buza: Kuyini ukuphila ngoMoya oNgcwele?

---*Izingelosi ziyafakaza: UJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu*---
Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu. weNkosi oPhezukonke UNkulunkulu uyomnika isihlalo sobukhosi sikayise uDavide, futhi uyobusa phezu kwendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe ngeke uphele.” UMariya wathi engelosini: “Lokhu kuzokwenzeka kanjani kimi ngoba angishadile? “Waphendula wathi: “UMoya oNgcwele uzakuza phezu kwakho, namandla oPhezukonke akusibekele; Indodana kaNkulunkulu) (Luka 1:30-35).

(2) UJesu unguMesiya

NgokukaJohane 1:41 Waya kuqala kumfowabo uSimoni, wathi kuye: “Simfumene uMesiya.”
NgokukaJohane 4:25 Owesifazane wathi: “Ngiyazi ukuthi uMesiya (othiwa uKristu) uyeza, futhi lapho esefikile uzositshela zonke izinto.”

UNkulunkulu wathi kuMose: “Nginguye enginguye” futhi wathi: “Yilokhu oyakukusho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: ‘Lowo okhona ungithumile kini.’” ( Eksodusi 3:14 ) Ngakho-ke, uMose wathi: “NginguJehova, nginguye;

1: UJesu uyinzalo yowesifazane

buza: Ingabe uJesu wayengowozalo lwendoda noma lowesifazane?

Impendulo: UJesu uyinzalo yowesifazane

(1) UJesu wazalwa yintombi nto eyakhulelwa uMoya oNgcwele

Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshiwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayemiselwe uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. …ngokuba lokho akukhulelweyo kwakungoMoya oNgcwele. ( Mathewu 1:18, 20 )

1 Isiprofetho Sokuzalwa Kwentombi →→Ngakho-ke iNkosi uqobo iyakuninika isibonakaliso: Intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana, iyobizwa ngokuthi u-Imanuweli (okusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu unathi). ( Isaya 7:14 )

2 Ukugcwaliseka Kokuzalwa Kwentombi →→Esacabanga ngalokhu, kwabonakala kuye ingelosi yeNkosi ephusheni, ithi: “Josefa, ndodana kaDavide, ungesabi, thatha uMariya umkakho, ngokuba lokho akukhulelweyo kuphuma emlonyeni wakhe. uMoya oNgcwele." Woza. Izozala indodana. Kufanele uyiqambe igama. Igama lakhe nguJesu, ngokuba nguye oyakusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo ” Manuel” (ehunyushwe ngokuthi “Emmanuel”) UNkulunkulu unathi.” ( Mathewu 1:20-23 )

(3) UJesu wakhulelwa yintombi ngoMoya oNgcwele

buza: Ingabe uJesu wazalwa nguBaba?
impendulo: Ingabe uNkulunkulu uBaba unguMoya? Yebo! →→UNkulunkulu ungumoya (noma akanazwi), ngakho labo abamkhonzayo kumelwe bamkhulekele ngomoya nangeqiniso. (Johane 4:24), ingabe uMoya kaBaba unguMoya oNgcwele? Yebo! Ingabe Umoya KaJesu UnguMoya Ongcwele? Yebo! Ingabe uMoya kaYise, uMoya weNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele munye? Kuvela emoyeni munye na? Yebo. Ngakho-ke, konke okuzelwe nguMoya oNgcwele futhi okuzelwe nguMoya kuzelwe nguBaba futhi kuzelwe nguNkulunkulu. Inzalo yamadoda

buza: Sizalwa ngokabani ngokwenyama kubazali bethu?
impendulo: Inzalo yamadoda ,

Zonke izingane ezizalwa ngokuhlangana kwendoda nowesifazane ziyinzalo yendoda, njengabantwana abazalwa “ukhokho wokuqala” u-Adamu nomkakhe u-Eva → Ngolunye usuku, indoda “u-Adamu” yalala nomkayo u-Eva. , u-Eva wakhulelwa, wazala uKayini (okusho ukuzuza), wathi: “UJehova ungiphe indoda; U-Abela wayengumalusi; uKayini wayengumlimi. ( Genesise 4:1-2 )
U-Adamu wabuye walala nomkakhe, wazala indodana, wayiqamba igama lokuthi uSeti, okusho ukuthi: “UNkulunkulu ungiphe enye indodana esikhundleni sika-Abela, ngokuba uKayini wambulala naye; waqamba igama layo ngokuthi u-Enoshe. Ngaleso sikhathi abantu babiza igama likaJehova. ( Genesise 4:25-26 )

buza: "Ukhokho wokuqala wesintu" U-Adamu "Ivelaphi?"
impendulo: Ivela othulini !

(1) UJehova uNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngothuli

UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. ( Genesise 2:7 )

(2) U-Adamu wayengokwemvelo

IBhayibheli futhi liloba lokhu: “Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa njengenyama)”; ( 1 Korinte 15:45 )

(3) Ozelwe ngothuli uyobuyela othulini

buza: Kungani abantu bephelela emhlabeni?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ngokuba abantu bephule umthetho, bonile, badla emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi.

UJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kodwa ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngoba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” 2:15) -17 amafindo)

2 Ukwephula isivumelwano nokwenza ubugebengu, ukuthola isiqalekiso somthetho

Wathi ku-Adamu: “Ngokuba ulalele umkakho, wadla kuwo umuthi engakuyala ngawo ukuba ungadli kuwo, umhlabathi uqalekisiwe ngenxa yakho; uyakusebenza izinsuku zonke zokuhamba kwakho ukuze uthole ukudla kuwo. ." kufanele Uyakukhulela ameva namakhakhasi; uyakudla isinkwa sakho ngezithukuthuku zobuso bakho, uze ubuyele othulini, ngokuba wazalwa ngothuli; ( Genesise 3:17-19 )

(4) Wonke umuntu uyafa

Ngokudalelwa, wonke umuntu umiselwe ukufa kanye, futhi ngemva kokufa kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa. ( Hebheru 9:27 )

(5) Kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa ngemva kokufa

Qaphela: Wonke amadodana namadodakazi enzalo yomuntu onile, asilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu, futhi angaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho → Bonke abantu bamiselwe ukufa kanye, futhi bayokufa, futhi ngemva kokufa kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa, futhi bayojeziswa ngokwalokho abakwenzile ngaphansi komthetho Ukwahlulela→→ukubhujiswa kwesibili--bhekisela kusAmbulo 20:13-15

Ngabona abafileyo, abakhulu nabancane, bemi phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi. Izincwadi zavulwa, nenye incwadi yavulwa, eyincwadi yokuphila. Abafileyo bahlulelwa ngokwalokho okulotshwe kulezi zincwadi nangokwezenzo zabo. Ngakho ulwandle lwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; Ukufa neHayidesi nakho kwaphonswa echibini lomlilo; Uma igama lomuntu lingalotshiwe encwadini yokuphila, uyakuphonswa echibini lomlilo. Bheka kuSambulo Isahluko 20

(6) UJesu wathi! kufanele uzalwe ngokusha

buza: Kungani kufanele sizalwe kabusha?
impendulo: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngokusha, angewubone umbuso kaNkulunkulu, futhi angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. Uma umuntu engazalwa kabusha, uyobhekana nokwahlulelwa kosuku lokugcina → ephonswa echibini lomlilo, okuwukufa kwesibili (okungukufa komphefumulo). Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke uJesu waphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngokusha, angewubone umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Ngaphandle kokuba umuntu azalwe. ngamanzi noMoya Uma uzelwe yinyama, ungengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
