Bacabanga ukuthi uKristu uhlanza amakholwa kuphela ( Ngaphambili futhi nikholwe eNkosini ( ); ngemva ) izono azikenziwa, njenganamuhla, zakusasa, zakusasa, nezono zengqondo, zokufunga nokunye. Uma sezenzile, baqala ukuvuma izono zabo, baphenduke, bathandazele. kaKristu" Igazi "Wozani nigeze izono, nisule izono, nisibekele kakhulu. Uma nenza izono zonke izinsuku, zigezeni zonke izinsuku, nizigcobe zonke izinsuku. Kusukela ekuqaleni konyaka." geza “Ngokuphela konyaka.

buza: Iyini imiphumela uma uhlanza izono zakho izikhathi eziningi?

impendulo: Uma ugeza izono izikhathi eziningi, uKristu kuzofanele achithe igazi lakhe izikhathi eziningi;

1 ( negative ) UKristu wasebenzisa “ Igazi " kanye Ukungena eNdaweni Engcwele kuhlanza abantu ezonweni zabo
Wangena kanye kuphela endaweni engcwele, kungengagazi lezimbuzi nelamathole, kodwa ngelakhe igazi, esezuze ukubuyisana okuphakade. ( Hebheru 9:12 )

2 ( negative ) wendodana yakhe Igazi Hlanza futhi zonke izono zethu
Uma sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono. (1 Johane 1:7)

3 ( negative ) Umhlatshelo kaKristu owodwa wenza labo abangcweliswa baphelele phakade
Ngale ntando singcwelisiwe ngokunikelwa komzimba kaJesu Kristu kanye kuphela. …Ngokuba ngomhlatshelo munye ubenza baphelele phakade abangcwelisiweyo. ( Hebheru 10:10, 14 )

4 Okubi nakakhulu ukuthi →kakhulu kangakanani uma abantu beyinyathele phansi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, bayenza isivumelwano esingcwelisayo kwe Igazi Kuphathe njengokujwayelekile , futhi uklolodele uMoya oNgcwele womusa, kufanele sibe nzima kangakanani isijeziso okufanele asithole, uyacabanga? ( Hebheru 10:29 ).

Qaphela: “Isonto lasendlini” abadala, abefundisi, nabashumayeli bayawagwema la mavesi ayisixwayiso aqinile.

(2) Ukuzimisela ukuba yisigqila sesono ngaphansi komthetho

buza: Ingabe bukhona ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu ngaphansi komthetho?
impendulo: Cha!

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: UKristu wahlenga ababephansi komthetho ukuze bathole ubudodana → Lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ubudodana. . ( Galathiya 4:4-5 )

Qaphela: Uma uzimisele ukuba ngaphansi komthetho, uyokwephula umthetho kuyisono. njenge ) UJesu waphendula wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Wonke umuntu owonayo uyisigqila sesono. 34-35)

(3) Uyaphika ukuthi noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

buza: Ingabe izingane ezizelwe kabusha zona?
impendulo: Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; ( 1 Johane 3:9 )
Siyazi ukuthi lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona; ( 1 Johane 5:18 )

1 Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni; →(KULUNGILE)
2 Wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni →(KULUNGILE)
3 Lowo ohlala kuye akoni →(KULUNGILE)

buza: Kungani abazelwe nguNkulunkulu bengoni?
impendulo: Ngoba izwi (imbewu) likaNkulunkulu likhona enhliziyweni yakhe, akanakona.

buza: Kuthiwani uma othile enza ubugebengu?
impendulo : Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Lowo owonayo akambonanga —1 Johane 3:6
2 Loba ngubani owonayo kamazi (Engaqondi insindiso kaKristu)- 1 Johane 3:6
3 Wonke owonayo ungokaSathane; — 1 Johane 3:8

buza: Zingabakwabani izingane ezingoni? Abakabani abantwana abanesono?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
【1】Abantwana abazalwa nguNkulunkulu→→abasoze bona!
【2】Izingane ezizalwa yizinyoka→→isono.
Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. ( 1 Johane 3:10 )

Qaphela: UmKrestu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu → ngeke one → Kuyiqiniso leBhayibheli! KwabaseRoma 8:9 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, anisibo abenyama kodwa ningabakaMoya →→Ngamanye amazwi, ekaNkulunkulu umoya Uma lihlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, niyokwenza akusikho okwakho inyama →Akuyona eyakho Indoda endala yona yathatha umzimba wokufa; okuka UMoya oNgcwele . okuka UKristu . okuka unkulunkulu → "Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu" Omusha "Ukuphila kufihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu, pho umuntu angona kanjani? Ucabanga ukuthi lokho kulungile? —Bheka eyabaseKolose 3:3

Noma ubani owona ungokaSathane → Kuphinde kube iqiniso leBhayibheli. Uyaqonda?

Namuhla abaningi" isonto lasendlini “Inkohliso iwukuthi ngemva kokuba umuntu ekholwe eNkosini futhi esindisiwe, nakuba engumuntu olungileyo, usuke eyisoni. Abantu abangakholwa kuJesu , wathi futhi akaqhubeki nokwenza ubugebengu bocansi futhi akajwayele ukwenza ubugebengu bocansi Uyakholelwa? ) Uyini umehluko phakathi kwenkolelo yakho neyezwe? Ingabe uqinisile? ( unkulunkulu ) wathi usuku oyodla ngalo kumele lube fa ," inyoka “Akuqiniseki ukuthi uzokufa; unkulunkulu ) uthi wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kufanele Ungoni," inyoka "Kuthiwa ngeke kube nesono esiqhubekayo noma esijwayekile. Uyawubona umehluko uma ulalelisisa? Ungumntwana ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. Ukholwa futhi ulalele bani? Noma ngubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona - leli iqiniso leBhayibheli ! awukwazi iqiniso zihlobene" amanga "Cha, ungakholwa lutho" iBhayibheli elisha lokuhumusha 》, laba bantu bashintsha ngokuzenzakalelayo incazelo yasekuqaleni yeBhayibheli ezindaweni eziningi ( Isithombe esingezansi ), abantwana bakaNkulunkulu bakholelwa kuphela emazwini okuqala eBhayibheli. Uyaqonda? →→ Bathi amaKristu alungile futhi ayizoni ngesikhathi esifanayo angumuntu omusha kanye nomuntu omdala ngesikhathi esifanayo angabakaNkulunkulu nodeveli ngesikhathi esifanayo →→ Akukho mehluko phakathi kobumnyama no ukukhanya, umuntu omdala nomuntu omusha, nesoni nolungileyo Awukho umehluko phakathi kwabantu, abenyama nabangokomoya, abanobudemoni nabaphezulu. bengahlukani → → Vele ubeke " isigamu ghost uhhafu unkulunkulu "Abantu bayaphuma, belungile noma bengalungile, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ufuna ukuba lolu hlobo lwenkolelo lufe → → lokhu kungenxa yokuthi abaqondi" ukuzalwa kabusha “Ishunyayelwa abashumayeli abangamaqili→→ Indlela ka-yebo no-cha . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(4) Shumayela iqiniso lokulungile nokungalungile

【Umbhalo】
2 KWABASEKORINTE 1:18 Njengoba uNkulunkulu ethembekile, ngithi: Akekho uyebo noqhabo ezwini esilishumayela kini.

buza: Kuyini →→ yebo nocha?
impendulo: Yebo futhi cha
Incazelo yeBhayibheli: ibhekisela kokulungile nokungalungile, njengoba kushiwo ngaphambili yebo ", bese ethi " Cha "; ngaphambi kokuthi " kwesokudla ", bese ethi " okungalungile "; ngaphambi kokuthi " ukuqinisekiswa, ukuqashelwa "; kamuva wathi" Nokho, phika ", ukukhuluma noma ukushumayela → okulungile nokungalungile, okungahambisani. Abafowethu nodadewethu bangase babhekisele ku-" Indlela ka-yebo no-cha "isihloko.

(5) Phika uma ususindisiwe, usindisiwe njalo

Abafowethu nodadewethu bangabhekisela kokuthi “IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu” ukuze bathole lesi sihloko.

(6) Ukugcina iSivumelwano Esisha kungukukholwa nokugcina iZwi;

Bakufundisa ukugcina isivumelwano esisha ( futhi ) gcina umthetho weTestamente Elidala → laba bantu bayiziphingi → bheka kwabaseRoma 7:1-6

(7) Izoni ezinomusa

"Izoni" zikhanyiselwa ngomusa kaJesu Kristu futhi zikholelwa evangelini, lapho ziqonda iqiniso, zibekwe uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe. → → zilungile! Hhayi isoni. Awukwazi ukuhlala uyisoni naphezu kokuthola umusa. Isibonelo, "isiboshwa" sibizwa ngokuthi yisiboshwa. Inkulumo ethi “isoni esinomusa” ayitholakali eBhayibhelini, futhi angazi ukuthi yaqanjwa ngubani.

(8) Isoni esilungisisiwe

“Izoni” → manje sezilungisiswa ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngokuhlengwa kukaKristu Jesu. Isikhombo (KwabaseRoma 3:24). "Izoni" zilungisiswa ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu kanye nokuhlengwa kukaKristu Jesu → Manje abantwana bakaNkulunkulu babizwa ngokuthi balungile asikwazi ukubiza abantwana bakaNkulunkulu ngokuthi "izoni ezilungisiwe", okungaguquki futhi okungaguquki. Uyaqonda?

“Amasonto asezindlini” nawo anezimfundiso eziningi ezididayo neziyiphutha, engingeke ngingene kuzo lapha.

2. Three-Self Church

buza: Liyini i-Three-Self Church?
impendulo: Ibandla elizibusayo, elizisekelayo, elizazisayo, nelizimele. babe" isibani "Cha" Amafutha “Ehlukanisiwe noKristu, ungumngane wamakhosi omhlaba. Bheka isAmbulo 17:1-6
Awukho umehluko ezimfundisweni eziningi phakathi kwamabandla asekhaya kanye namabandla kaThathu-Self Acishe afane.

3. UbuKatolika

Igama eligcwele lobuKhatholika "iSonto LamaRoma Katolika", elaziwa nangokuthi iSonto LamaRoma Katolika, noma "iSonto LamaKatolika" ngamafuphi. "UPapa" umelela igunya laphezulu emhlabeni futhi uncintisana ngegunya laphezulu noKristu, iNkosi yamaKhosi kanye neNkosi yamakhosi.

Okwesine: Ihlelo le-Charismatic, i-Lingling, khala futhi uzalwe kabusha

" I-Charismatic “Umoya” ongenamthetho uyanyakaza, ubeka izandla ukuze uthandazele ukuphulukiswa, wenza izimangaliso, ukhuluma ngezilimi, iziprofetho, ugcwala imimoya emibi futhi uwela phansi, ugingqika, uklabalase futhi uhleke kuqhume.
" Iqembu le-Lingling “Phishekelani ukugcwaliswa kukaMoya oNgcwele, hlabelelani izingoma zokomoya, nidansise ngokomoya, futhi nikhulume ngezilimi.
" Khala uzalwe kabusha “Ngemuva kokuvuma izono nokuphenduka, amakholwa kumele akhale kabuhlungu izinsuku ezintathu nobusuku obuthathu ukuze azalwe kabusha.

Eyesihlanu: Umbani Wasempumalanga

"Umbani Wasempumalanga" owaziwa nangokuthi uNkulunkulu uSomandla
UKristu “wamanga” wesifazane wadalwa.

Isithupha: Sifuna Izimvu Ezilahlekile, Ivangeli Lomusa, Mark Tower

" Izimvu Ezilahlekile "Imelwe ngu-Yao Guorong
" ivangeli lomusa “UJoseph Ping, uLin Huihui noXiao Bing bangabamele.
" Izimvu Ezilahlekile "futhi" ivangeli lomusa "Konke kudlulisiwe → Indlela ka-yebo no-cha , okungaguquki.
" Izindlu zikaMarco "Okwethulwa eKorea, umzimba wenyama uyatshalwa ukuze ube yiTao.

Silikhomba kanjani ibandla likaNkulunkulu ophilayo? Sebenzisa iBhayibheli" Wei Zi "Kala nje uzokwazi.
Ngokwesibonelo:

1 " Isonto lamaSeventh-day Adventist “Uma ulapho, ucabanga ukuthi konke abakushoyo kulungile;
2 " isonto lasendlini “Uma ulalela intshumayelo yakhona, uzophinde uzwe ukuthi abakushoyo ngempilo kunengqondo;
3 " Sandwich Church ” Ungacabanga futhi ukuthi lokhu abakhuluma ngakho kuyefana “nesonto lasendlini”.
4 " IVangeli Lomusa noma Izimvu Ezilahlekile "Uma ubalalela uzodideka amazwi abo → Ngeke ukwazi ukusho ukuthi yimaphi amanga nokuthi yimaphi ayiqiniso. Ngoba abakushoyo Ukungahambisani, okulungile nokungalungile .

Siyababona" imfundiso "Kuphela uma kuhlukile emazwini aphefumulelwe yiBhayibheli lapho singasho khona →→ Lokho abakushumayelayo akulona ivangeli, kodwa imfundiso yabo siqu, izimiso zokuphila, isikole samabanga aphansi sezwe kanye namanga angenalutho. Kuyindlela yokuphila ngaphandle kokuzalwa kabusha. .

Njengoba uJohane axwayisa: “Bazalwane abathandekayo, ningakholwa yibo bonke omoya, kodwa hlolani omoya ukuthi bangabakaNkulunkulu yini, ngokuba baningi abaprofethi bamanga abaphumele ezweni. Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 4 Ivesi 1 → Abafowethu nodadewethu kufanele bazi indlela yokuhlukanisa lokho " umoya weqiniso "→→Shumayela iqiniso leBhayibheli, okuyivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe; futhi" Umoya wephutha "Isuka eBhayibhelini, ayilandeli amazwi kaKristu aphefumulelwe, idida indlela yeqiniso yeNkosi, futhi ishumayela izimfundiso Zakhe, amanga angenalutho nezimfundiso zezwe. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Umbhalo wevangeli ovela ku:
ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu

Laba bangabantu abangcwele abahlala bodwa futhi ababalwa phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe.

articles.title: Amaphutha Emfundisweni Yebandla Lanamuhla (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Isonto lama-Adventist

--Ifushanisiwe njengeBandla lama-Seventh-day Adventist

--amaphutha emfundiso:

1. Abagcina incwadi → iSabatha

NgokukaMarku 2:27-28 (UJesu) wathi futhi kubo: “Isabatha lenzelwa umuntu, hhayi umuntu ngenxa yesabatha.

buza: Liyini iSabatha?
Impendulo: "Umsebenzi wokudala usuphelile"
Sebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha uphumule ngolwesikhombisa! →→Konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni kudaliwe. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo wawusuphelile, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. ( Genesise 2:1-2 )

KumaHebheru 4:9 Ngakho kumele kube lelinye iSabatha labantu bakaNkulunkulu.

buza: Liyini elinye iSabatha?
Impendulo: "Umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuphelile"
( Johane 19:30 ) Lapho uJesu enambitha (ekuqaleni wawamukela) uviniga, wathi, “ Kwenzekile ! “Wagebisa ikhanda lakhe wanikela umphefumulo wakhe kuNkulunkulu.

Qaphela: 【 umphefumulo 】Umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuqediwe! Amen. Wonke umuntu okholwa kuJesu → ukuKristu: 1 hlengwa, 2 lala ngoxolo, 3 Thola impilo kaKristu, 4 Thola ukuphila okuphakade! Amen
Kuyoba nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha →→Kuwukuphumula kuJesu Kristu, lokhu ukuphumula kwangempela! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Isexwayiso:

( Isonto lama-Seventh-day Adventist ) Gcina iSabatha Lencwadi → " NgoMgqibelo ” → ISabatha emthethweni weMithetho Eyishumi kaMose, izincwadi zibiza ukufa, futhi bagcina iSabatha elibiza ukufa “namaJesuit Eqiniso” kanye “nama-Seventh-day Adventist” nawo agcina izincwadi zosuku.

buza: Kungani iSabatha ligcinelwa ukufa?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuthi babengakwazi ukugcina “iSabatha” bakhandwa ngamatshe ngokomthetho kaMose. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Ngakho-ke uPawulu uthi: Gcinani izinsuku zenu, nezinyanga, nemikhosi, neminyaka, futhi nginovalo ngani, funa ngizikhandlekele ize. ( Galathiya 4:10-11 )

buza: Kuyini ukugcina iSabatha kweqiniso?
impendulo: 【 Izwa intshumayelo 】→【 isiteshi 】→【 Gcina iTao 】

1 " Izwa intshumayelo “Salizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu.
2 " isiteshi “Njengoba nikholelwa evangelini, endleleni yeqiniso, nakuJesu!
3 " Gcina iTao “Gcina endleleni enhle ngoMoya oNgcwele
4 Kuphi( incwadi ) Abantu bakaJesu manje →→ Phumula kuJesu Kristu ! Amen→→Mina【 Kholwa, gcina indlela 】leyo gcina 【 isabatha 】→ Gcina iSabatha impilo yakho yonke, hhayi ukuba ugcine izinsuku. isabatha ". Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Zanini kimi nina nonke enikhatheleyo nenisindwayo, mina ngizakuniphumuza, ngimnene, ngithobekile ngenhliziyo; ngenxa yezinhliziyo zenu ( Mathewu 11:28-29 )

Isexwayiso kwabangakholwa:

Ukube uJoshuwa wayebanike ukuphumula, uNkulunkulu wayengeke akhulume ngezinye izinsuku. Kulo mbono, kumelwe kube nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha okusalele abantu bakaNkulunkulu. Ngoba ongena ekuphumuleni uphumule emisebenzini yakhe, njengoba nje noNkulunkulu waphumula kweyakhe. Ngakho-ke, kumelwe silwele ukungena kulokho kuphumula, funa noma ubani alingise ukungalaleli futhi awe. ( Hebheru 4:8-11 )

2. Labo abagcina incwadi → umthetho

( 2 Korinte 3:6 ) Uye wasenza ukuba sibe yizikhonzi zalesi sivumelwano esisha, hhayi ngombhalo, kodwa ngomoya; abantu baphile.

buza: Yimaphi amagama abiza ukufa?
impendulo: Umthetho→→Uma ugcina izimiso zomthetho, uzokufa.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: ( Ukugcina umthetho kuwukwenza izinto zomthetho ) Wonke umuntu osekelwe emisebenzini yomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; ngomthetho kusobala; ngoba iBhayibheli lithi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” ( Galathiya 3:10-11 ) Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Qaphela: AmaSeventh-day Adventist →abafundisa ukuqaphela - izinto eziletha ukufa nokulahlwa. amazwi ) umthetho, okuyisiphetho nesiqalekiso. Uyaqonda?

3. IBandla Losuku Lwesikhombisa lakhiwe phezu kwesisekelo (sabaprofethi bamanga)

( Heberu 11-2 ) UNkulunkulu, owakhuluma kudala kokhokho bethu ngabaprofethi izikhathi eziningi nangezindlela eziningi, manje usekhulumile kithi kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ngeNdodana, ayimise futhi indlalifa yakho konke kuye kwadalwa imihlaba.

buza: UNkulunkulu wakhuluma ngobani ezikhathini zasendulo?
impendulo: Abaprofethi bakhuluma → " Emandulo “Okungukuthi, iTestamente Elidala, elakhulunywa kokhokho izikhathi eziningi nangezindlela eziningi.

buza: Ubani uNkulunkulu akhuluma ngaye ezinsukwini zokugcina?
impendulo: Indodana yakhe yakhuluma → " ukuphela komhlaba "Kubhekiselwa eTestamenteni Elisha, uNkulunkulu ukhuluma nathi ngeNdodana yakhe uJesu. Wonke umuntu okholwa kuJesu uyindodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi izinsuku zokugcina zikhulunywa ngeNdodana kaNkulunkulu→ uPetru, uJohane, uPawulu Izincwadi zevangeli ezishunyayelwa, njll., futhi sonke singamadodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi uNkulunkulu ukhuluma ngathi → shumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu! Amen

buza: "Abaprofethi" kusho isiprofetho Kuya kubani? Ima Kakade?
impendulo: uJohane uMbhapathizi
Ngokuba bonke abaprofethi nomthetho baprofetha, kwehle kuze kufike kuJohane. ( Mathewu 11:13 )

Qaphela: Abaprofethi nomthetho baprofetha kwaze kwaba nguJohane → Abaprofethi baprofetha ukuzalwa kukaKristu, baprofetha ukuthi uKristu wayeyosindisa abantu Bakhe, alungise indlela yeNkosi futhi aqondise izindlela Zakhe, abaprofethi baprofetha kwaze kwaba nguJohane.

buza: Namuhla amasonto amaningi anezimangalo zokuthi →" umprofethi ”→Kwenzakalani?

articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyesi-2 Korinte Isahluko 1, ivesi 18, sifunde ndawonye: NgoNkulunkulu othembekile, ngithi, izwi esilishumayezayo alinayebo noqhabo. .

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngokuthi sibona kanjani "Indlela Yokulunga Nengalungile" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Siyabonga ebandleni elithi “Woman of Merit” ngokuthumela izisebenzi ukuba zihlanganyele izwi leqiniso ngamazwi alotshwe ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli elisenza sisindiswe, sikhazinyuliswe, futhi sihlengwe imizimba yethu. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Fundisa abantwana bakaNkulunkulu ukuthi bahlukanise kanjani → indlela yokulungile nokungalungile . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Yebo no cha

【Umbhalo】
2 KWABASEKORINTE 1:18 Njengoba uNkulunkulu ethembekile, ngithi, ukushumayela kwethu kini kwakungesiye uyebo noqhabo. .

buza: Kuyini →→ yebo nocha?
impendulo: Yebo futhi cha
Incazelo yeBhayibheli: Ibhekisela kokulungile nokungalungile Kwashiwo ngaphambili ukuthi " yebo ", bese ethi " Cha "; ngaphambi kokuthi " kwesokudla ", bese ethi " okungalungile "; ngaphambi kokuthi " ukuqinisekiswa, ukuqashelwa "; kamuva wathi" Nokho, phika ”, khuluma noma ushumayele → okulungile nokungalungile, okungahambisani .

2. Indlela yokulungile nokungalungile

buza: Ithini →→indlela kayebo nocha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) negative UmKrestu Igazi uhlanza izono zabantu

buza: Igazi leNkosi ( kangaki ) ukuhlambulula abantu ezonweni zabo?
impendulo: " kanye →→oKristu Igazi Kukodwa kuphela ukuhlanzwa kwezono, hhayi ukuhlanzwa kaningi kwezono.

1 UKristu wasebenzisa owakhe Igazi , kanye kuphela
Wangena kanye kuphela endaweni engcwele, kungengagazi lezimbuzi nelamathole, kodwa ngelakhe igazi, esezuze ukubuyisana okuphakade. ( Hebheru 9:12 )

2 anikele ngomzimba wakhe kube kanye
Ngale ntando singcwelisiwe ngokunikelwa komzimba kaJesu Kristu kanye kuphela. ( Hebheru 10:10 )

3 Wanikela ngomnikelo wesono
Kodwa uKristu wanikela ngomhlatshelo owodwa waphakade ngenxa yezono futhi wahlala ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu. ( Hebheru 10:12 )

4 UJesu Igazi asihlanze ezonweni zonke
Uma sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono. ( 1 Johane 1:7 )

5 Ukuze labo abangcweliswayo bapheleliswe kuze kube phakade
Ngokuba ngomhlatshelo wakhe munye ubenza baphelele phakade abangcwelisiwe. ( Hebheru 10:14 )

Qaphela: UmKrestu Igazi Kuphela" kanye "Esehlanziwe umuntu ezonweni zakhe → umenza ongcwelisiweyo apheleliswe phakade → abe ngcwele phakade, angabi nasono, futhi alungisiswe! Amen. Akahlanzi izono izikhathi eziningi; njenge Ukugeza izono izikhathi eziningi, uKristu kwakuyodingeka ophe izikhathi eziningi, uKristu wayezohlupheka futhi abulawe izikhathi eziningi →→Uma umcela ukuba aphinde ahlanze izono, ubulala uJesu futhi bayiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, iWundlu. Igazi "Kuphathe njengokujwayelekile. Uyezwa?

buza: Indlela yokubona →" Yebo futhi cha "Ukuhlanzwa kwezono?"
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ithi "hlanza" ngaphambili ithi "phika" kamuva.
( Heberu 1:3 ) Ungukubengezela kwenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, umfanekiso wangempela wobunjalo bukaNkulunkulu, futhi usekela zonke izinto ngomyalo wakhe onamandla. Wahlanza abantu ezonweni zabo , ehlezi ngakwesokunene soMkhulu phezulu.

Uma zenziwa, cela nje" igazi lenkosi ) ukugeza izono, ukusula izono, nokusibekela→→Yilokhu abashumayela ngakho→” Indlela ka-yebo no-cha ". (2) negative ngaphandle komthetho

buza: Ungaphunyula kanjani emthethweni nesiqalekiso sawo?

buza: Kuthiwani uma othile enza ubugebengu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

buza: Zingabakwabani izingane ezingoni? Abakabani abantwana abanesono?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
【1】Abantwana abazalwa nguNkulunkulu→→abasoze bona!
【2】Izingane ezizalwa yizinyoka→→isono.
Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. ( 1 Johane 3:10 )

Amasonto amaningi namuhla akholelwa ngephutha ukuthi: Ngemva kokuba umuntu ekholwe eNkosini futhi asindisiwe, nakuba engumuntu olungileyo, ubuye abe yisoni. Bathi amaKristu awaqhubeki enza izono zobulili futhi awajwayele izono zobulili → AmaKristu alungile futhi ayizoni ngesikhathi esifanayo angumuntu omusha nomuntu omdala ngesikhathi esifanayo; udeveli ngasikhathi sinye → Bese benza igama elilodwa: isigamu ghost uhhafu unkulunkulu “Baphume abantu bakhuluma Ngokushesha okulungile futhi ngezinye izikhathi okungalungile AmaTao, lolu hlobo lwenkolelo kuthiwa lufile noma cha→→Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi abaqondi.” ukuzalwa kabusha "Kukhulunywe umshumayeli oyisigwegwe→→ Indlela ka-yebo no-cha . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

articles.title: I-FAQ: Uphawu Lwesilwane
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade, Amen!

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo isahluko 13 ivesi 16 futhi silifunde ndawonye: Futhi yenza wonke umuntu, abakhulu nabancane, abacebile nabampofu, abakhululekile nezigqila, ukuba bamukele uphawu esandleni sabo sokunene noma emabunzini abo.

Namuhla sizohlola, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Uphawu Lwesilwane" Khulekani: "Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo"! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho" ibandla "Thumelani izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi vula izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, lingezwa futhi libone iqiniso likamoya→ Qonda ukuthi luyini uphawu lwesilo . Amen!

Lemikhuleko engenhla, nokunxusa, nokunxusa, nokubonga, nezibusiso kungegama leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

uphawu lwesilo

1. Izilwane ezingenayo ingokomoya

(1) Abantu bezilwane

AmaHubo 92:6 Izilwane aziqondi, neziwula aziqondi.
AmaHubo 49:20 Umuntu ohlala ehloniphekile engavuswanga ufana nesilwane esifile.

buza: Yini isilo?
impendulo: “Ingokomoya lomuntu” lifana nelemfuyo UMdali usafuna ukukholelwa ukuthi abantu bavela ezilwaneni nasemfuyweni, futhi bakholelwa embonweni kaDarwin wokuziphendukela kwemvelo. Abavumayo ukuthi bavela ezilwaneni yizinyoka, odrako, izingulube, izinja njll. Lolu hlobo lwabantu lubizwa ngezilwane.
Kuvela ukuthi ulaka lukaNkulunkulu lwembulwa luvela ezulwini kubo bonke abantu abangamhloniphi uNkulunkulu nabangalungile, labo abenza izinto ezingalungile nabathiya iqiniso. Lokho okwakwaziwa ngoNkulunkulu kwembulwa ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngoba uNkulunkulu ukwambulile kubo. Kusukela ekudalweni komhlaba, amandla kaNkulunkulu angunaphakade nobuNkulunkulu bakhe bekwaziwa ngokucacile, nakuba engabonakali, angaqondwa ngezinto ezidaliwe, ashiye umuntu engenazaba. Ngoba, nakuba babemazi uNkulunkulu, abazange bamkhazimulise njengoNkulunkulu noma babonge. Imicabango yabo yaba yize, nezinhliziyo zabo eziwubuwula zaba mnyama. Bezisholo ukuthi bahlakaniphile, baba yiziwula, bashintsha inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ongabhubhiyo baba nezithombe zabantu ababhubhayo, nezinyoni, nezilwane, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo. Inkomba ( Roma 1:18-23 )

(2) Izilwane ezingenayo ingokomoya

2 Petru Isahluko 2 Ivesi 12 Kodwa kubonakala sengathi laba bantu abanawo umoya futhi bazalwa njengezilwane ezizobanjwa futhi zibulawe. Lapho benyundela izinto abangazazi futhi bonakalisa abanye, bona ngokwabo bayokonakala.
Jude 1:10 Kodwa laba bantu bahleba abangakwaziyo. Bazazi ngokwemvelo izinto ezifanayo nezilwane ezingenamphefumulo, futhi kulokhu bazonakalisa bona.

2. Khulekani umfanekiso wesilo nilandele isilo

buza: Uyini umfanekiso wesilo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Endulo, ama-Israyeli abumba amathole egolide

UJehova wathi kuMose: “Yehla, ngokuba abantu bakho owabakhipha ezweni laseGibithe bonile, baphambukile masinyane endleleni engabayala ngayo, bazenzela ithole elibunjiweyo, balikhonza; Nikela imihlatshelo, nithi: ‘Nangu unkulunkulu wakho, Israyeli, owakukhipha ezweni laseGibithe.’” Eksodusi 32:7-8 .

(2) Isithombe segolide saseBhabhiloni

“O nkosi, uphuphe isithombe esikhulu, isithombe sasinde kakhulu, sicwebezela kakhulu, simi phambi kwakho, futhi ukubonakala kwaso kwakwesabeka kakhulu, nenhloko yaso kwakuyigolide elicwengekileyo, isifuba saso nezingalo zaso kuyisiliva; isisu sawo nokhalo lwawo kwakuyigolide elicwengekileyo, imilenze iyinsimbi, izinyawo inxenye ziyinsimbi, inxenye iyibumba (Daniyeli 2:31-33).

(3) Izithombe zamanga ezenziwe abantu

Baguqule iqiniso likaNkulunkulu amanga, bakhonza futhi bakhonza indalo esikhundleni soMdali. UJehova makabongwe kuze kube phakade naphakade. Amen! Roma 1:25

(4) Yenza isithombe sesilo siphile futhi sikwazi ukukhuluma

Futhi sanikwa amandla ukuze unike umfanekiso isilo ukuphila ukuze ukwazi ukukhuluma, futhi enze ukuba bonke abangawukhulekeli umfanekiso wesilo babulawe. IsAmbulo 13:15

buza: Lesi “silo” savelaphi?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Kwasekuphuma isilo elwandle

Ngabona isilo sikhuphuka elwandle, sinezimpondo eziyishumi namakhanda ayisikhombisa, nasezimpondweni zaso kukhona imiqhele eyishumi, nasemakhanda aso kunegama lenhlamba. IsAmbulo 13:1

Qaphela: Isilo esiphuma olwandle sibhekisela ku-→ umuntu wesono uyavela → futhi uqala ukuthola uphawu.

2 Esinye isilo senyuka emhlabeni

Ngase ngibona esinye isilo sikhuphuka emhlabeni, sinezimpondo ezimbili njengewundlu, sikhuluma njengodrako. IsAmbulo 13:11

Qaphela: Isilo esikhuphuka emhlabeni sibhekisela kumprofethi wamanga, oza emhlabeni ukuze akhohlise abantu.

buza: Lesi “silo” simelelani?
impendulo: “Isilo” sibhekisela embusweni omelela umhlaba.

→→Lezi zilo ezine ezinkulu zingamakhosi amane azovela emhlabeni. Bheka kuDaniyeli isahluko 7 ivesi 17
→→Nakhu okwashiwo isikhonzi: “Isilo sesine singumbuso wesine oyofika ezweni, futhi uyokwahluka kuyo yonke eminye imibuso, futhi uyoshwabadela wonke umhlaba futhi uwunyathele phansi kwezinyawo zawo :23

buza: Zibhekiselaphi izimpondo eziyishumi zalesi “silo”?
impendulo: Amakhosi ayishumi aphuma kulo "mbuso".
→→Izimpondo eziyishumi ozibonayo zingamakhosi ayishumi, zingakawamukeli umbuso, kodwa ziyoba negunya elifanayo nelezilo negunya elifanayo nelamakhosi. IsAmbulo 17:12
→→Ngokuqondene nezimpondo eziyishumi, kulo mbuso kuyakuvela amakhosi ayishumi, Kamuva kwavela enye inkosi , ngokungafaniyo nalawo angaphambili; Daniyeli 7:24

buza: Sisho ukuthini “isilo” esinamakhanda ayisikhombisa?
impendulo: izintaba eziyisikhombisa
→→Inhliziyo ehlakaniphile ingacabanga lapha. Amakhanda ayisikhombisa ayizintaba eziyisikhombisa owesifazane ayehlezi phezu kwazo, iSambulo 17:9 (ukuze uthole incazelo eningiliziwe, ngicela ubheke “Umbono Wesilo”)

buza: Lo “mfanekiso wesilo” ungakhuluma kanjani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Abantu abaningi bayakuyitadisha ngokukhuthala, nolwazi luyakwanda.
Daniyeli, fihla leli zwi futhi unamathelise le ncwadi kuze kube sekupheleni kwesikhathi. Abaningi bazobe begijima beya le nale (noma kuhunyushwe ngokuthi: ukufunda ngobuqotho), futhi ulwazi luzokwanda. —Daniyeli 12:4
2 Ubuhlakani bokwenziwa budala izilo nezithombe zesilo
3 Unamehlo omuntu — Dan 7:8
4 Ukuba negunya, amandla, nekhono lokukhuluma.
5 Abantu emhlabeni wonke balandela “isilo” futhi bakhulekela “umfanekiso wesilo” —IsAmbulo 13:15
6 Uphawu Lwesilo “Umuntu nomshini kuba munye.”

3. Uphawu Lwesilo 666

(1) Uphawu olutholiwe esandleni sokudla noma ebunzini

Futhi kwenza wonke umuntu, abakhulu nabancane, abacebile nabampofu, okhululekile nesigqila, ukuba bathole uphawu esandleni sabo sokunene noma ebunzini labo. ( IsAmbulo 13:16 )

(2) Bonke abantu emhlabeni balandela isilo futhi bakhulekela udrako

... umhlaba wonke wamangala, wasilandela isilo, wakhuleka kudrako, ngokuba wanika isilo amandla akhe, bakhuleka kuso isilo, bathi: “Ngubani onjengalesi silo, ngubani ongalwa naso na? IsAmbulo Isahluko 13 Amavesi 3-4

buza: Kungani bonke abantu emhlabeni balandela isilo futhi bakhulekela udrako ngaleso sikhathi?
impendulo: Njengoba incwadi kaDaniyeli ithi “ Ucwaningo ngokucophelela ”→ ubuhlakani bokwenziwa( Ukuhlanganiswa komshini womuntu ) kuzovela, futhi abantu emhlabeni wonke kuzodingeka bathembele "ezilo" ukuze bathole ulwazi, njenganamuhla ngo-2022 AD, abantu bancike kakhulu "kuma-smartphone". Isibonelo, uma abantu befuna ukufunda "isiNgisi", khona-ke badinga kuphela ukukopisha "inkumbulo" eqoqwe "esilo" ku-"imprint" etholwe ngumuntu ezandleni zabo noma ebunzini funda "isiNgisi" kanzima Lolu hlobo lwekhono lolimi → "Ulwazi luzokhula." Ngaleso sikhathi, labo abathola “uphawu lwesilo” bayoba nolwazi oluningi futhi babe “abahlakaniphile” labo abangazange baluthole uphawu lwesilo bayosalela emuva, ngoba ngeke kube khona ukuthengiselana ngemali yephepha ngaleso sikhathi; isikhathi Uma ungatholi "uphawu lwesilo", ngeke ukwazi ukwenza ibhizinisi , bazocabanga ukuthi uyinqaba, bakushushise noma bakubulale. Kanjalo nesilo senza ukuba wonke umuntu, abakhulu nabancane, abacebile nabampofu, okhululekileyo nesigqila, bamukele uphawu esandleni sabo sokunene noma emabunzini abo. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka isAmbulo 13:16

(3) Labo abamagama abo angalotshwanga encwadini yokuphila

Yamukela uphawu lwesilo → Bonke abakhileyo emhlabeni bayosikhulekela, abamagama abo angalotshiwe encwadini yokuphila yeWundlu elahlatshwa kusukela ekusekelweni kwezwe. Onezindlebe makezwe! Ophanga abantu uyakuthunjwa; Lokhu kungukubekezela nokukholwa kwabangcwele. ( IsAmbulo 13:8-10 )

(4) Inombolo yophawu lwesilo ingamakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisithupha nesithupha

“Akakho ovunyelwe ukuthenga noma ukuthengisa, kuphela onophawu, igama lesilo, noma isibalo segama lesilo. Nakhu ukuhlakanipha: oqondayo makabale isibalo sesilo, ngokuba iyinombolo yomuntu, nenombolo yaso ingamakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisithupha nesithupha. (Funda isAmbulo 13:17-18.)

buza: Usho ukuthini u-666?
impendulo: Inani labantu abamukela uphawu lwesilo.

" 7 " Kusho ngokuphelele futhi kumelela uNkulunkulu!
(1) Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya
(2) Bazalwa ngezwi leqiniso levangeli
(3) Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu
Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha obekwe uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele " 7 "→ Limelela abantwana bakaNkulunkulu, ngakho" 7 ” lisho ngokuphelele;

futhi" 6 "Kusho ukungapheleli; ukwamukela uphawu lwesilo" 666 "Kufana nengxenye yensimbi nengxenye yobumba. Abantu bazimisele ukuyifunda. Ubuhlakani bokwenziwa bubonakala njengokuhlanganiswa komshini womuntu." Isigamu-isilwane, ingxenye-umuntu ", yiba njengenunu, akuyona into uNkulunkulu ayidala ngothuli ekuqaleni" U-Adamu “Kunje → Njengoba nje ubonile insimbi ixubene nobumba, nesizwe siyohlanganiswa nazo zonke izinhlobo zabantu, kodwa ngeke zixube omunye nomunye, njengoba nje insimbi ingaxubani nobumba. 43)

buza: Simelelani “isilo”?
impendulo: “Isilo” simelela inyoka yasendulo, udrako, udeveli, uSathane, nomprofethi wamanga.
Ngase ngibona ingelosi yehla ezulwini, iphethe isihluthulelo sakwalasha neketanga elikhulu esandleni sayo. Yambamba udrako, inyoka endala, obizwa nangokuthi uDeveli noSathane, yambopha iminyaka eyinkulungwane ( IsAmbulo 20:1-2 )
Isilo sabanjwa, nomprofethi wamanga, owenza izimangaliso phambi kwaso ukuze adukise labo abamukela uphawu lwesilo nabakhulekela umfanekiso waso, wabanjwa kanye nesilo. Bobabili baphonswa bephila echibini lomlilo elivutha isibabule ( IsAmbulo 19:20 )

buza: Ungasho kanjani ukuthi kuwuphawu lwesilo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 Lingakholwa kuJesu,
2 bengakholwa yivangeli leqiniso,
3 Kabazalwa nguNkulunkulu,
4 Ngaphandle kophawu lukaMoya oNgcwele,
5 Ngaphandle kophawu lukaJesu,
6 Ngaphandle kophawu lukaNkulunkulu,

Labo amagama abo ayengalotshwanga encwadini yokuphila kusukela ekusekelweni komhlaba → Balandela isilo futhi bakhulekela udrako, futhi " umoya" Okungukuthi, imimoya yamademoni, imimoya emibi, nemimoya engcolile → in esandleni noma ku ebunzini uthole uphawu , ukuhlanganiswa komshini womuntu" Isigamu-isilwane, ingxenye-umuntu “Lolu wuphawu lwesilo;

(1) Labo abangabakaJesu Kristu → babekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele, babekwa uphawu nguJesu, futhi babekwa uphawu nguNkulunkulu ;

(2) Labo abangabenyoka amakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisithupha nesithupha. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ihubo: Sikhululwe Emandleni Amnyama EHayidesi

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sizohlola, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane lapha.

articles.title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa: Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade, Amen!

Asiphenye emaBhayibhelini ethu, Kwabase-Efesu 1:13: Ngemva kokuzwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwe kuKristu, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso kuye.

Namuhla sizohlola, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele" Khulekani: "Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo"! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho" ibandla "Thumelani izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elikhulunywa yibo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu nevangeli lokungena embusweni wezulu! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu. ukuqonda iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe, Sibone iqiniso likamoya→ Qonda indlela yokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu . Amen!

Lemikhuleko engenhla, nokunxusa, nokunxusa, nokubonga, nezibusiso kungegama leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1: Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele

buza: Luyini uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( 1 ) ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya —Bheka uJohane 3:5
( 2 ) ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 4:15 noJakobe 1:18
( 3 ) ozelwe nguNkulunkulu —Bheka uJohane 1:12-13

Qaphela: 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Bazalwa NguNkulunkulu → Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningakaMoya, ofakazelana nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Sine ngaphakathi [ UMoya oNgcwele 】 Kwamukele nje Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? (Funda amaRoma 8:9, 16.)

2: Izindlela zokubekwa uphawu nguMoya oNgcwele

buza: Wabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele→ indlela Kwenzenjani?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli!

[UJesu] wathi: “Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, nombuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Kholwa ivangeli ! ” Inkomba (Marku 1:15)

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Lokho mina (uPawulu) engikudlulisele kini kwakuwukuthi: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokwemiBhalo, nokuthi wangcwatshwa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokwemiBhalo. KwabaseKorinte 1 Tomasi 15:1-4).

Qaphela: Umpostoli uPawuli washumayela ivangeli lensindiso kwabezizwe→ibandla laseKorinte uPawuli wathi niyosindiswa ngokukholwa kulelivangeli! Phakathi kwabaPhostoli Abayishumi Nambili, uPawulu wakhethwa mathupha iNkosi uJesu ukuba abe umphostoli futhi wathunyelwa ngokukhethekile ukuba abe ukukhanya kwabeZizwe.

buza: Lingakholwa kanjani ivangeli?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokweBhayibheli

(1) incwadi sikhululekile esonweni
Lapho uKristu efela bonke, bonke bafa → ngoba lowo ofile ukhululiwe esonweni - bheka Roma 6:7 → Bonke bafa, futhi bonke bakhululiwe esonweni → incwadi Abantu bakhe abalahlwa (okungukuthi, " incwadi “UKristu wafela bonke, futhi bonke bakhululiwe esonweni)→ incwadi Bonke bakhululiwe esonweni → Lowo ongakholwa uselahliwe ngoba engakholwanga egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa【 UJesu 】→ igama likaJesu Kusho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo . Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka ku-2 Korinte 5:14 kanye neSivumelwano 3:18

(2) incwadi Ngikhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo

1 Ngikhululekile emthethweni
Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje nathi ngaphandle komthetho , usicela ukuba sikhonze iNkosi ngokuvumelana nobusha bomoya (umphefumulo: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwemikhuba yakudala. Inkomba ( Roma 7:6 )
2 Ikhululwe Esiqalekisweni Somthetho Owodwa
UKristu wasihlenga ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu Ukhululekile esiqalekisweni somthetho ; Ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Wonke umuntu olenga emthini uqalekisiwe.” ( Galathiya 3:13 )

Futhi wangcwatshwa!

(3) incwadi Likhumule ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo kwakudala
ningaqambelani amanga; Isivele isusiwe Umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe, inkomba (Kolose 3:9)

(4) incwadi Ukhululekile kudeveli “wenyoka”.USathane
ngiyakuthuma kubo, ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, baphenduke ebumnyameni, baye ekukhanyeni, basuke emandleni kaSathane, baye kuNkulunkulu; bangcwelisiwe. ’” (Izenzo 26:18)

(5) incwadi Sikhululiwe emandleni obumnyama naseHayidesi
Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama futhi wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo ( Kolose 1:13 )

Futhi ngokweBhayibheli, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu!

(6) incwadi UNkulunkulu udlulisele amagama ethu embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo →Bheka kuKol. 1:13
(7) incwadi Ukuvuka kukaKristu → yebo Sithethelele ! leyo Masizalwa kabusha, sivuswe kanye noKristu, sisindiswe, samukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, samukele ubudodana, sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen . Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka amaRoma 4:25 .

3. Ukubekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe

(1) Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele

IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo 8:6 Ake ungibeke enhliziyweni yakho njengophawu, ungithwale njengesigxivizo engalweni yakho.

buza: Ungabekwa kanjani uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe?
Impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli futhi uqonde iqiniso!
Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. ( Efesu 1:13 )

Qaphela: Ngokuba nizwile izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu → njengabaphostoli " uPaul "Shumayela ivangeli lensindiso kwabezizwe, futhi nizwe iqiniso levangeli → Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokusho kweBhayibheli → 1 Ukukholwa kuyakhulula esonweni; 2 Ukholo lukhululiwe emthethweni nesiqalekiso sawo; 3 Ukukholwa kulahla ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo; 4 Ukukholwa kubalekela (inyoka) uSathane; 5 Ukholo lwaphunyuka emandleni obumnyama naseHayidesi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu → 6 Ukholo ludlulisela amagama ethu embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo; 7 Kholwa oVukweni lukaKristu→ yebo Sithethelele ! leyo Masizalwa kabusha, sivuswe kanye noKristu, sisindiswe, samukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, samukele ubudodana, sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen. →Ngakholwa futhi kuKristu Njengoba ngangikholelwa Kuye, ngabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe! Amen . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

【 UMoya oNgcwele 】Kuyithikithi lethu lokungena embusweni wezulu, futhi kuwubufakazi nobufakazi bokuthola ifa likaBaba Osezulwini → Lo Moya Ongcwele uwubufakazi (isibambiso embhalweni wokuqala) befa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (abantu:) ifa embhalweni wokuqala) sihlengiwe, Kube ludumo lwenkazimulo yaKhe. Isikhombo ( Kwabase-Efesu 1:14 )

(2)Uphawu lukaJesu

KwabaseGalathiya 6:17 Kusukela manje makungangikhathazi muntu, ngokuba mina nginaye uphawu lukaJesu .

(3) uphawu lukaNkulunkulu

IsAmbulo 9:4 Waziyala wathi: “Ningoni utshani emhlabeni, nanoma yisiphi isitshalo esiluhlaza, nanoma yimuphi umuthi, ngaphandle kwamaqhubu asebunzini lenu. Uphawu lukaNkulunkulu .

Qaphela: Njengoba nani nakholwa kuKristu, lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu→ Wabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe →Kusukela manje " Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele "Leyo uphawu lukaJesu , uphawu lukaNkulunkulu → Sonke sivela kuMoya munye, iNkosi eyodwa, noNkulunkulu oyedwa ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( Efesu 4:4-6 )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila! Amen. → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: Amagugu abekwe ezitsheni zobumba

Yamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sakho ukusesha - IBandla likaJesu Kristu - Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379 noma 869026782

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sifunile, saxhumana, futhi sabelane lapha Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

Isexwayiso: Bafowethu nodadewethu! Uma uqonda ukuzalwa kabusha futhi uqonda ivesi levangeli elikusindisayo, liyokwanela ukuphila kwakho konke → Ngokwesibonelo, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Amazwi ami angumoya nokuphila.” Amavesi eBhayibheli awawona amazwi → UyiZwi, Ungukuphila ! Umbhalo uba impilo yakho → Ungowakho ! Unganaki kakhulu izincwadi zikamoya noma okuhlangenwe nakho kwabanye abantu → izincwadi ngaphandle kweBhayibheli. Akusizi ngalutho kuwena nhlobo Izincwadi zikamoya eziningi “ezenziwe” zisebenzisa ifilosofi yazo nezimfundiso zezwe ukuze zinifundise ubufakazi bazo (bamanga), hhayi ubufakazi bokusindiswa kukaKristu ekwazini uKristu nasekuqondeni insindiso.

articles.title: Isimo Sengqondo SamaKristu Lapho Ebhekana Nezinhlekelele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli ku-Eksodusi isahluko 5 ivesi 3 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Bathi: “UNkulunkulu wamaHeberu usihlangabeze;

Namuhla sihlola, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane " Isimo Sengqondo SamaKristu Lapho Ebhekana Nezinhlekelele 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Siyabonga "Cathedral Women's Church" ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe nelikhulunywe ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli elisenza sisindiswe, sikhazinyuliswe, futhi sihlengwe imizimba yethu kuleli zwe eliyisigwegwe, elihlubukayo, neligcwele isono, siyayiqonda intando yakho futhi sisifundisa ukuthi singabhekana kanjani nazo zonke izinhlobo zezinhlekelele nezinhlupho→ Ungabambelela kanjani eqinisweni ngokubekezela nokholo futhi uchithe sonke isikhathi sakho emhlabeni . Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Impi, indlala, isifo, isomiso, imvula enamandla, isichotho kanye nezinhlekelele zomlilo

buza: Ubani obangela izimpi, indlala, izifo eziwumshayabhuqe nezinye izinhlekelele?
impendulo: Zonke izinhlobo zezinhlekelele nezinhlupho zivela kuNkulunkulu.

buza: Sazi kanjani ukuthi inhlupho ivela kuNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Izinhlupho eGibhithe lasendulo

UJehova wathi kuMose: “Yana kuFaro, uthi kuye: ‘Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu wamaHeberu, uthi: Bavumele abantu bami ukuba bahambe, bangikhonze; uyakubaphoqa ukuba bahlale, isandla sakhe siyakuba phezu kwemfuyo yensimu yakho, phezu kwamahhashi, nezimbongolo, namakamela, nezinkomo, nezimvu. isifo . ...uma ngelula isandla sami ngisisebenzisa isifo Hlasela wena nabantu bakho, futhi ngabe kade waqedwa ebusweni bomhlaba. (Funda u-Eksodusi 9:1-3, 15.)

(2) Izinhlupho abhekana nazo ama-Israyeli eTestamenteni Elidala

1 ukwephulwa kwenkontileka

Ngiyakunehlisela inkemba ukuba niphindisele ngokwephula isivumelwano, nginibuthele emizini yenu; Thumela isifo phakathi kwenu , ikunikele esandleni sezitha zakho. ( Levitikusi 26:25 )

2 Ubufebe, ukukhononda nokuhlangana

Ngaleso sikhathi Wafa ngesifo , enabantu abangu-24,000. ( Numeri 25:9 )
Ngaphandle kwalabo abafa ngenxa kaKhora. Wafa ngesifo , ingqikithi yabantu abangu-14,700. ( Numeri 16:49 )

3 Imiphumela yokungalaleli

“Uma ungalilaleli izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ungenzi nokuqaphela yonke imiyalo yakhe nezimiso zakhe; ITestamente Elidala libhekisela emthethweni; ), njengoba ngikuyala namuhla, lezi ziqalekiso ezilandelayo ziyokulandela futhi zikwehlele: ... Uqalekisiwe lapho uphuma, futhi uqalekisiwe lapho ungena. … UJehova uyokwenza ukuba isifo sinamathele kuwe , aze akubhubhise ezweni owangena ukulidla. UJehova uyakukuhlasela ngesifo sofuba, nangomkhuhlane, nangomlilo, nangomalaleveva, nangenkemba, nangokoma, nangesikhutha. zonke lezi ziyokusukela uze ubhujiswe. ( Duteronomi 28:15, 19, 21-22 )

(3) Kwenzekani kuDavide ngemva kokuba esebale abantu

Ngakho, INkosi ithumela izifo Futhi kanye nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, kusukela ekuseni kuze kube isikhathi esimisiwe, kwafa abantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa kusukela kwaDani kuze kufike eBeri Sheba. ( 2 Samuweli 24:15 )

2. UNkulunkulu uthumela izinhlekelele

buza: Kungani uNkulunkulu ethumela izinhlekelele nezinhlupho?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu uthumela izinhlekelele kulabo abamelene noNkulunkulu, ezivimbela abantu ukuba bazi uNkulunkulu weqiniso okuwukuphela kwakhe, futhi ezivimbela abantu ukuba bakhulekele uNkulunkulu weqiniso - njengoFaro waseGibhithe lasendulo futhi kukhona abaprofethi bamanga abaphambanisa indlela yeqiniso INkosi nalabo abangakholelwa endleleni yeqiniso yevangeli, futhi abenza amacala amabi Izinhlupho ezithunyelwa uNkulunkulu zilungiselelwa abantu ukubhubhisa ababi. manje abaningi umKristu Bonke bandikindiki akekho noyedwa owazi umsuka wezimpi, indlala, izifo, isomiso, izimvula ezinkulu, isichotho, nomlilo. Baningi abaprofethi bamanga ebandleni ababhebhethekisa izifo futhi baxosha izinhlekelele ngegama likaJehova, negama likaJesu, nangegama likaMoya oNgcwele. Ingabe balifundile iBhayibheli?

(1) UNkulunkulu wajezisa iSidoni
ngiyakuletha isifo eSidoni, ngichithe igazi ezitaladini zalo. Ababuleweyo bayakuwa phakathi kwalo, inkemba ifike phezu kwalo inhlangothi zonke, bazi ukuthi nginguJehova. ( Hezekeli 28:23 )
(2) UNkulunkulu ubhubhisa ababi
Yisho kanje kubo, isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Kuphila kwami, abasenkangala bayakuwa ngenkemba; emihumeni, bayakufa ngesifo. ( Hezekeli 33:27 )
(3) UNkulunkulu ujezisa uGogi
Ngizomjezisa ngesifo nangegazi. ngiyakuthuma imvula, nesichotho, nomlilo, nesibabule phezu kwakhe, phezu kwempi yakhe, naphezu kwabo bonke abantu abanaye. ( Hezekeli 38:22 )

3. Isimo sengqondo samaKristu ngenhlekelele (inhlupho)

2 KwabaseThesalonika 1:4 Lathi emabandleni kaNkulunkulu siyazincoma ngani ngenxa yokubekezela lokukholwa kwenu phezu kwakho konke ukuhlukuluzwa lezinhlupheko enabekezelela ngazo.

(1) Yilwa "Miaomiao"

buza: Ingabe i-"Miaomiao" ingavimbela isifo?
impendulo: Awukwazi ukukuqapha.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Manje uyazi" Yehlisa isifo “NgokukaNkulunkulu, owavuswa nguNkulunkulu, akukho-sizo ngabo ukuba baziqaphe → Njengoba kulotshiwe - Hezekeli 33:27... Labo abasezinqabeni nasemigedeni bayoshaywa futhi bafe. → "Ezinqabeni ”→ Yilokho kuphela ababi Labo abathembele ku-"Miao Miao" njengesivikelo sokuzivikela noma ukuzivikela, nalabo abacashe emigedeni, basazohlushwa yisifo futhi bafe.

IsAmbulo 20:11 Izulu nomhlaba kwabaleka ebusweni bakhe. Izulu noma umhlaba ngeke usiphunyuke isahlulelo sikaNkulunkulu ), engasabonakali. Ucabanga ukuthi i-Miaomiao ingakuvikela? Kulungile! Abanye abantu basabela emzimbeni wonke ngemva kokuthatha i-"Miao Miao", futhi abanye abantu baze bafe ngemva kokuthatha i-"Miao Miao" uma uthatha "i-Miao Miao", ukuzivikela komzimba wakho kuzokwehla futhi uzoba sengozini yokuthola igciwane, futhi ungase ufe.

Ngakho-ke, lapho bebhekene nezinhlekelele noma izifo, kuhle ukuba abazalwane nodade bangazithatheli izinqumo, ngoba umzimba wakho KwakuyiNkosi uJesu eyayisebenzisa " Igazi “Nathengwa ngenani, nifakwa ekufeni kukaKristu. Ngeke ufe ngenxa yesifo segciwane ), thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu, ufe kanye Naye ivangeli likaKristu Lowo ofakaza. Uyaqonda?

Njengoba nazi ukuthi izinhlupho zivela kuNkulunkulu ukuba zibhubhise ababi, yilo usuku lapho uJehova ethumela izifo ukuze aphindisele kwababi. Ngoba wena ( incwadi ) Ivangeli indlela yeqiniso, futhi ( incwadi ) sewamukele uJesu Kristu futhi wazi ukuthi ungumntwana ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, lezi zifo ezibangelwa amagciwane zingafika kanjani kuwe? Ingabe uqinisile?

IVangeli likaLuka 【Isahluko 11 Amavesi 11-13】 Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho → Ubani phakathi kwenu, ongubaba, uma indodana yakho (noma indodakazi yakho) icela isinkwa, ungayinika itshe? Ecela inhlanzi, kuthiwani uma umnika inyoka esikhundleni senhlanzi? Uma ucela iqanda, uma umnika ufezela? Uma nina, enibabi, nikwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle (nina nonke niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle kakhulu kangakanani uYihlo osezulwini uzakubapha abacela kuye uMoya oNgcwele na? ” Kulungile?

Ngaphandle uma wena ( incwadi ) iminyaka eminingi kangaka indlela yamanga , uzenza umntwana kaNkulunkulu, mzenzisi, wathi uzongenwa igciwane ubulawe yisifo, akumele ungumntwana kaNkulunkulu. AmaKristu amaningi "afuna" futhi kamuva azisole Uma ungazi ukuthi wenzeni, kufanele uthintane nozakwenu bebandla namadikoni eNkosini uJesu Kristu! Njengoba sigijima ohambweni lukamoya, kufanele sibe nenhliziyo yobunye kanye nenkonzo Abafowethu nodadewethu kufanele basekelane, badonsane futhi bakhuthazane, ngoba singofakazi bakaJehova esizukulwaneni sokugcina→ Wena, omuhle kunabo bonke abesifazane, uma ungazi, vele ulandele ezinyathelweni zezimvu ...Inkomba (IsiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo 1:8)

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa! Kodwa anginalo ukholo olwanele, ngakho ngicela ungisize!

(2)Uphawu lwesilo 666

buza: Ingabe i-"Miao Miao" iwuphawu lwesilo?
impendulo: Futhi kwenza wonke umuntu, omkhulu noma omncane, ocebile noma ompofu, okhululekile noma oyisigqila, ukuba athole uphawu esandleni sakhe sokunene noma ebunzini labo. ( IsAmbulo 13:16 ) → “Ezincane” - ezinye zinezandla zesobunxele, ezinye zinezandla zokunene futhi abakalutholi uphawu lwazo emabunzini abo.

Uma ulikholwa ngempela ivangeli futhi uqonda imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli, njengoba ukholelwa kuJesu Kristu, uyokwamukela okuthenjisiwe " UMoya oNgcwele "Okophawu!" Uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele ; akwenzeki ukuba aphinde alwemukele uphawu lwesilo ; I-Miaomiao "Akukona ukwamukela uphawu lwesilo. Uyakuqonda lokhu?"

buza: Luyini uphawu lwesilo?

impendulo: I-Artificial intelligence synthesis (ukuhlanganiswa komshini womuntu) kubizwa inunu "Isigamu-isilwane, isigamu-umuntu".

I-Q&A "Uphawu Lwesilwane" inezimpendulo ezinemininingwane.

(3) Lapha kulele ukubekezela nokholo lwabangcwele

IsAmbulo 14:12 Yilokhu ukubekezela kwabangcwele abagcina imiyalo kaNkulunkulu nokukholwa kukaJesu .
buza: Yini abangcwele abayibekezelela?
impendulo: Lapho ubhekene nenhlekelele, usizi, nokushushiswa→ Namanje kholwa kuJesu futhi ugcine ukholo .

Lapho kubhekene nezinhlekelele nezifo:

1 Thatha isinyathelo ukuze “ubonakale” → Laba bantu abakholwa kuJesu bakhuluma ngokungakholwa, kodwa izinhliziyo zabo zikude noJesu incwadi "Yi"Miao Miao" othembele kuyo. Akusizi ngalutho ngawe ukucula "INkosi uyisiphephelo sami" nsuku zonke; laba bantu bathatha isinyathelo sokuqala se-"Miao Miao", futhi kungokwabo ukubamba isiphephelo se-"Miao Miao" .
2 I-Passive "Miao Miao" →Ukudideka kanye nokuthi "Miao Miao".
3 Kuphoqeleke ukuthi "Miao Miao" →Ukuphoqwa, ngisho nokuthunjwa noma ukuboshwa ukuze kube "i-Miao Miao".
4. Yiba nesineke kuze kube sekupheleni. , ngoba uNkulunkulu esikholelwa kuye uthembekile futhi uthembekile, futhi uNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sethu! (Hhayi i-Miaomiao).
Qaphela:
Cha. 1 Uhlobo lomuntu: " sobala “Ningakholwa kuJesu;
Cha. 2 izinhlobo kanye…
Cha. 3 Imbewu: Nkosi hawukela pha Uma unokubekezela nokholo futhi ubambelela ngokuqinile endleleni enhle ngokwethembela kuMoya oNgcwele, ngisho noma kungeyona izikhathi eziyikhulu, uzosindiswa izikhathi ezingama-60 noma ezingama-30, noma ungasindiswa nje;
Cha. 4 Abantu: Kubekezelele kuze kube sekupheleni → fakaza ngoJesu → Ufakaza ngani? fakazi Lapho sibhekene nenhlekelele【 UNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sami 】Uthembekile futhi uthembekile, fakazi " ingane "La mandla amakhulu abekwe esitsheni sobumba" sobala "Kuvela kuNkulunkulu, fakazi Nakuba bawa inkulungwane eceleni kwakho nezinkulungwane eziyishumi ngakwesokunene sakho, lokhu " isifo “Akukho nhlekelele ezokwehlela. Lapha kulele ukubekezela nokholo lwabangcwele. Bangofakazi bakaJehova, abalungiselelwa nguNkulunkulu izikhathi eziyikhulu.

4. UJehova uyisiphephelo sami

Akukho bubi noma isifo esiwumshayabhuqe ngeke sehlele phezu kwakho, noma iyiphi inhlekelele ngeke isondele etendeni lakho. Amen !

IHubo 91:

【Ivesi 1】Ohlala ekusithekeni koPhezukonke uyakuhlala emthunzini kaSomandla.
( Qaphela: Uhlala kuphi manje? Uyakholwa ukuthi uhlala kuJesu Kristu? )

[Ivesi 2] Ngizothi ngoJehova: “Uyisiphephelo sami nenqaba yami, uNkulunkulu wami, engimethembayo.”
( Qaphela: UJehova uyisiphephelo sami, lowo engithembele kuye → “Inhlupho” ivele ikufakazele → Ingabe uNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sakho futhi uncika kuNkulunkulu? Noma uthembele ku-"Miaomiao"? )

【Ivesi 3】Uyakukhulula ogibeni lomcuphi nasoshayweni olunobuthi.
( Qaphela: Uyokukhulula ogibeni lomcuphi wezinyoni → “ogibeni “lwenyoka” uSathane udeveli” nasosizini olunobuthi. )

[Ivesi 4] Uyakusibekela ngezimpaphe zakhe;
( Qaphela: Uyokumboza ngezimpaphe zakhe, uyophephela ngaphansi kwamaphiko akhe; )

[Ivesi 5] Ngeke wesabe okwesabisa ebusuku, noma imicibisholo endiza emini,
( Qaphela: Ngeke wesabe ukwesabeka kwasebusuku → noma ukwesaba kokuzamazama komhlaba okungazelelwe; noma imicibisholo endiza emini → imicibisholo elimazayo )

【Ivesi 6】Ningayesabi inhlupho efika ebusuku, noma ushevu obulala abantu emini.
( Qaphela: Angilwesabi isifo esihamba ebumnyameni → Angesabi isifo esihamba ebusuku ngingazi noma igciwane elibulala abantu emini; )

【Ivesi 7】Noma kuwa inkulungwane eceleni kwakho, nezinkulungwane eziyishumi ngakwesokunene sakho, lesi sifo asiyikusondela kuwe.
( Qaphela: Nakuba zikhona " ababi "Izinkulungwane zabantu ziwela eceleni kwakho," ababi “Izinkulungwane zabantu ziyakuwa ngakwesokunene sakho,” isifo Kodwa akukho nhlekelele ezosondela kuwe. )

【Ivesi 8】Ungabheka ngamehlo akho kuphela ubone ukuphindiselwa kwababi.

( Qaphela: Umi kuKristu futhi ubukele ngamehlo akho → Ubona ukujeziswa kwababi futhi ubhujiswa izinhlekelele )

【Ivesi 9】UJehova uyisiphephelo sami;
( Qaphela: INkosi iyindawo yami yokuhlala; Amen )

【Ivesi 10】Akukho okubi okuyokwehlela, nenhlekelele ayiyikusondela etendeni lakho.
( Qaphela: Akukho okubi okuyokwehlela, futhi akukho nhlekelele ngeke isondele etendeni lakho→ " ithende "Kuyitende lesikhashana → kusho umzimba phansi → Ayikho inhlupho noma inhlekelele ezofika kuwe! Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:1-4 neyesi-2 Petru 1:13-14 )

[Ivesi 11] Ngokuba uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe, ukuba zikugcine ezindleleni zakho zonke.
( Qaphela: Ngoba uyoyala izingelosi Zakhe esikhundleni sakho → ziyizingelosi ukuze zikuvikele kuzo zonke izindlela zakho → Wonke umuntu okholelwa kuJesu uyoba nezingelosi eduze kwakhe ukuze zikuvikele. )

[Ivesi 12] Bayokuthwala ngezandla zabo, funa ushaye unyawo lwakho etsheni.
( Qaphela: Izingelosi zizokuphakamisa ngezandla ukuze zikuvimbele ukuthi ungalimali )

[Ivesi 13] Uyonyathela phezu kwengonyama nenyoka, unyathele phansi ibhongo lengonyama nenyoka.

( Qaphela: UKristu unqobile, futhi unqobile udeveli, uSathane, futhi unyathele phansi ibhongo lengonyama nenyoka. )

[Ivesi 14] UNkulunkulu uthi: “Ngokuba engithanda ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakhe, ngiyakumkhulula;

(Qaphela: Uma uthanda uNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yonke, uNkulunkulu uyokusindisa futhi adlulisele igama lakho embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo - bheka kwabaseKolose 1:13 )

[Ivesi 15] Uma engibiza, ngiyakumphendula;

( Qaphela: Uma ubiza uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uzongiphendula ezikhathini ezinzima futhi asenze abapristi basebukhosini. )

[Ivesi 16] Ngizomnelisa ngezinsuku ezinde futhi ngimbonise insindiso yami. "

( Qaphela: Ngizomanelisa ngempilo ende → "ujabulele impilo ende" kusho kuze kube yilapho itende lenyama emhlabeni lidilizwa uNkulunkulu ngiyokwambulela insindiso yami → okungukuthi, ingcebo iyokwambulwa ku isitsha sobumba! Amen )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila! Amen. → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: UJehova uyisiphephelo sami

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.
