articles.title: Imibuzo Nezimpendulo: Uma sithi asonanga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Masiqhubeke nesifundo sethu sika 1 Johane 1:10 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma sithi asonanga, senza uNkulunkulu umqambimanga, nezwi lakhe alikho kithi.


1. Wonke umuntu wonile

buza: Sesike sone thina?
impendulo: " babe ”→ Ngoba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu (Roma 3:23)

2. Isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa

buza: Isono sethu sivelaphi?
impendulo: Ukuvela kumuntu oyedwa (u-Adamu) → Lokhu kufana nje nesono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwafika kuwo wonke umuntu ngoba wonke umuntu bonile. ( Roma 5:12 )

3. Uma sithi asonanga

buza: Uma elithi "thina" sithi asonanga → "thina" kusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha? Noma ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha?
impendulo: lapha" thina "yebo Ubhekisela kulokho akusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha akusho ukuthi ( ; incwadi ) weza kuJesu futhi waqonda iqiniso levangeli, ( ukuzalwa kabusha ) kusho ungcwele emva.

Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho → angizanga ukuzobiza abalungileyo (abantu abazishaya abalungile, abazibona belungile futhi abangenasono), kodwa izoni → 1 Thimothewu Isahluko 1:15 “UKristu Jesu weza ezweni ukuze asindise izoni.” La mazwi athembekile futhi ayancomeka kakhulu. Ngiyinduna yezoni. kuyabonakala" USawuli "Ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha, bashushisa uJesu namaKristu; ngemva kokukhanyiselwa nguKristu." uPaul "Yazi → Mina phakathi kwezoni" USawuli “Nguyena onecala elikhulu.

buza: Ingabe uJesu, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uYise, wona?
impendulo: Cha! →Ngokuba umpristi wethu omkhulu akakwazi ukuzwelana nobuthakathaka bethu. Walingwa kuzo zonke izici njengathi, kodwa engenasono. ( Hebheru 4:15 )

buza: Ingabe thina esizelwe nguNkulunkulu sesake sona?
impendulo: Cha !
buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; ( 1 Johane 3:9; 5:18 )

Qaphela: Ngakho lapha" thina "Kubhekisela kulokho okwashiwo ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha, njengaku" thina “Esikhathini esidlule, ngangingalizwa ivangeli, ngangingamazi uJesu, futhi ngangingazange ( incwadi ) UJesu, ongazalwa ngokusha ukuze amlandele ( Ukukhanya ) abantu kanye" wena ” bayafana → bonke bangaphansi komthetho, bayizaphuli-mthetho, futhi bayizigqila zesono.
UJohn uthi ( Bhala ) kulabo abakholwa kuNkulunkulu, kodwa ( Ungakukholwa ) Abafowabo bakaJesu abangamaJuda bathi babengenaye umlamuleli, uJesu Kristu! bona ( incwadi ) gcina umthetho, ucabange ukuthi awonanga.
Amazwi kaJohane akhuthazayo ngomusa athi “ bona "Ithi →" thina “Uma sithi asonanga, senza uNkulunkulu umqambimanga, nezwi lakhe alikho kithi.
Bese eyoku-1 Johane isahluko 2 ivesi 1 iqala ngokuthi “Johane” kusukela ku-“ thina "Shintsha ithoni ibe" wena ”→Bafana bami abancane, ngizonitshela la mazwi Bhala Okwakho (okungukuthi dlula Ivangeli lanikwa bona) ukuze ningoni. Uma umuntu ona, sinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo.

buza: UJohane wabatshela kanjani ukuthi bangoni?
impendulo: UJohane wabatshela ukuthi bazi uJesu Kristu → kholwa kuJesu →Ukuzalwa kabusha, uvuko, insindiso, ukuphila okuphakade!

Uma umuntu ona, sinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo → Uyinhlawulo ngezono zethu, futhi kungezona ezethu kuphela kodwa nezono zezwe lonke. ( 1 Johane 2:2 )

Qaphela: UJohane watshela labo abangaphansi komthetho ukuba bagcine umthetho, futhi ukwephula umthetho nokungawulaleli umthetho kuyisono → umuntu owenza ubugebengu →SinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo. Yazini ukuthi uJesu Kristu wathunyelwa evela kuYise, owayeyinhlawulo yezono zethu futhi wabethelwa esiphambanweni, ukuze thina Ayisatholakali ( ubugebengu ), Ayisatholakali ( umthetho )→

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa;

2 Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile.

3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asisona isono.

【 ukuvuka 】→Sithethelele, khiqiza kabusha, vusa, sindisa, futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade! Amen
Siyazi ukuthi lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni; UMoya oNgcwele "Izosivikela ( Omusha ningoni, sizelwe nguNkulunkulu ( Omusha ) ukuphila kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ngakho angona kanjani? Kulungile? Ababi ngeke bakwazi ukusilimaza. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ihubo: Uhlanza izono

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sabelana ngemibuzo nezimpendulo emavesini 8-10 eSahluko 1 sikaJohane 1 njengoba sihlanganyela futhi sifunda. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani njalo!

articles.title: Imibuzo nezimpendulo: Uma sivuma izono zethu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Masiqhubeke nesifundo sethu sika 1 Johane 1:9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma sizivuma izono zethu, uthembekile futhi ulungile futhi uyosithethelela izono zethu futhi asihlanze kukho konke ukungalungi.

1. Cela icala

buza: Uma sizivuma izono zethu → elithi “thina” libhekisela ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha? Noma ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha?
impendulo: lapha" thina ” kusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha , babengamazi uJesu, babengamazi ( incwadi ) UJesu akazange aliqonde iqiniso levangeli ngesikhathi engaphansi komthetho.

buza: kungani lapha" thina "Ingabe kusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha?"
impendulo: Ngoba ngaphambi kokuba sizalwe kabusha, sasingamazi uJesu noma siyizwisisi imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli singaphansi komthetho Abantu → bavume izono zabo.

2. Ukuvuma izono ngaphansi komthetho

(1) U-Akhani uyalivuma icala → UJoshuwa wathi ku-Akani, "Ndodana yami, ngiyakuncenga, ukunikeza inkazimulo kuJehova, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, futhi uvume isono sakho phambi kwakhe. Ngitshele lokho okwenzile, futhi ungangifihleli u-Akani." UJoshuwa wathi: “Ngempela ngonile kuJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.” (Joshuwa 7:19-26)

Qaphela: U-Akhani walivuma icala lakhe → ubufakazi becala lakhe baqinisekiswa, futhi wakhandwa ngamatshe waze wafa ngokomthetho → Umuntu owaphula umthetho kaMose, ngisho nofakazi ababili noma abathathu, akazange ahawukelwe futhi wafa. ( Hebheru 10:28 )

(2) INkosi uSawule yalivuma icala layo → 1 Samuweli 15:24 USawule wathi kuSamuweli: “Ngonile, ngeqile umyalo kaJehova nezwi lakho, ngoba ngesaba abantu futhi ngalalela izwi labo.

Qaphela: Ukungalaleli → kusho ukwephulwa kwesivumelwano (“isivumelwano” umthetho) → Isono sokungalaleli siyefana nesono sokuthakatha; Ngokuba ulahlile umyalo kaJehova, uJehova ukulahlile ukuba ube yinkosi. ( 1 Samuweli 15:23 )

(3) UDavide wavuma →Lapho ngithule ngingazivumi izono zami, amathambo ami abuna ngokuba ngibubula usuku lonke. …Ngimemezela izono zami kuwe futhi angizifihli izenzo zami ezimbi. Ngathi: "Ngizozivuma izono zami kuJehova." ( IHubo 32:3, 5 ) (4) UDaniyeli uvuma izono zakhe →Ngathandaza ngasivuma isono sami kuJehova uNkulunkulu wami, ngathi: “Jehova, Nkulunkulu omkhulu nowesabekayo, ogcina isivumelwano nesihawu kwabathanda uJehova, abagcina imiyalo yakhe, sonile, senza ububi senze okubi nokuhlubuka, siphambukile emiyalweni yakho nezahlulelo zakho,... wonke u-Israyeli weqile umthetho wakho, uphambukile, akalilalelanga izwi lakho; UMose, inceku yakho, uthululelwe phezu kwethu, ngokuba sonile (Funda uDaniyeli 9:4-5, 11.)

(5) USimoni Petru uvuma izono zakhe → Lapho uSimoni Petru ebona lokhu, wawa emadolweni kaJesu wathi: “Nkosi, suka kimi, ngokuba ngiyisoni!” ( Luka 5:8 )
(6) Ukuvuma icala lomlando wentela →Umthelisi wama kude, engazange alokothe ngisho nokuphakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini, wamane washaya isifuba sakhe wathi: “O Nkulunkulu, ngihawukele mina soni! (Bala uLukha 18:13.)
(7) Kufanele nivume izono zenu komunye nomunye → Ngakho vumani izono omunye komunye, nithandazelane, ukuze niphulukiswe. Umkhuleko womuntu olungileyo unamandla amakhulu. ( Jakobe 5:16 )
(8) Uma sizivuma izono zethu , uNkulunkulu uthembekile futhi ulungile, futhi uyothethelela izono zethu futhi asihlanze kukho konke ukungalungi. ( 1 Johane 1:9 )

3. Ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha" thina "" wena “Konke ngaphansi komthetho

buza: Kufanele nivume izono zenu komunye nomunye → Kubhekiselwa kubani lokhu?
impendulo: AmaJuda! Incwadi kaJakobe iyisibingelelo (incwadi) eyabhalwa uJakobe, umfowabo kaJesu, kubantu → bezizwe eziyishumi nambili ezihlakazekile - bheka kuJakobe Isahluko 1:1.

AmaJuda ayeshisekela umthetho (kuhlanganise noJakobe ngokwakhe ngaleso sikhathi) - lapho ezwa lokhu, akhazimulisa uNkulunkulu futhi athi kuPawulu: "Mfowethu, bheka ukuthi zingaki izinkulungwane zabaJuda ezikholiwe eNkosini, futhi zonke zishiseka. ngokomthetho.”—IzEnzo 21:20.
Nansi incwadi kaJakobe → " wena “Vumani izono zenu komunye nomunye → kubhekisela eqinisweni lokuthi amaJuda ayeshisekela umthetho, futhi ( incwadi Nkulunkulu, Dan ( Ungakukholwa Jesu, ukuswela ( umlamuleli ) UJesu Kristu uMsindisi! Babengakhululekile emthethweni, babengaphansi komthetho, amaJuda ayephula umthetho futhi ephula umthetho. Ngakho uJakobe wathi kubo → " wena “Vumelanani izono zenu omunye komunye, nikhulekelane ukuba niphulukiswe; isifo selashwa ) Qonda insindiso → Kholwa kuJesu → Ngemivimbo Yakhe, uyophulukiswa → Thola ukuphulukiswa kwangempela → azalwe kabusha futhi asindiswe !

buza: Uma sizivuma izono zethu→" thina "Libhekise kubani?"
impendulo: " thina ” kubhekisela eqinisweni lokuthi ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha, umuntu wayengamazi uJesu futhi engenaye ( incwadi ) UJesu, lapho engazalwa ngokusha → wema phambi komkhaya wakubo, abafowabo nodadewabo futhi wasebenzisa → “thina”! Yilokhu futhi uJohane akusho kubafowabo abangamaJuda, ngoba incwadi uNkulunkulu, kodwa ( Ungakukholwa Jesu, ukuswela ( umlamuleli ) UJesu Kristu uMsindisi! Bacabanga ukuthi bawugcinile umthetho futhi abonanga, futhi akudingeki bavume → njengokuthi " uPaul "Umcela kanjani umuntu ukuba avume izono zakhe kuyilapho egcina umthetho ngokungenasici? Akwenzeki ukuthi avume izono zakhe, akunjalo! Ngemva kokukhanyiselwa nguKristu, uPawulu wakwazi ubuyena bangempela." Indoda endala “Ngaphambi kokuba uzalwe kabusha, uyinhloko yezoni.

Ngakho lapha" UJohane "Bhala ku- Ungakukholwa ) Abafowabo bakaJesu abangamaJuda ngaphansi komthetho bathi → “ thina “Uma sizivuma izono zethu, uNkulunkulu uthembekile futhi ulungile futhi uyothethelela izono zethu futhi asihlanze kukho konke ukungalungi. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Ihubo: Uma sizivuma izono zethu

kulungile! Yilokho kuphela esikwabele ngakho namuhla Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani njalo! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo nezimpendulo: Uma sithi asinacala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
[UmBhalo] 1 Johane (Isahluko 1:8) Uma sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho kithi.

Isandulelo: Lamavesi amathathu aku 1 Johane 1:8, 9, no 10 angamavesi aphikisana kakhulu ebandleni namuhla.

buza: Kungani kuyindinyana eyindida?
impendulo: 1 Johane (Isahluko 1:8) Uma sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa futhi iqiniso alikho kithi.
futhi 1 Johane (5:18) Siyazi ukuthi wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni…! Kukhona futhi uJohane 3:9 othi “Ningoni” futhi “Ningoni” → Ukwahlulela ngamazwi (aphikisanayo) → “ Kusho ngaphambili “Uma sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho kithi; Xoxa ngakho kamuva “Siyazi ukuthi wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni; futhi akoni futhi angoni→ Ithi "akukho bugebengu" izikhathi ezintathu zilandelana ! Ithoni iqinisekisa kakhulu. Ngakho-ke, asikwazi ukuchaza iBhayibheli ngokusekelwe emazwini kuphela Kufanele siqonde intando kaNkulunkulu, ngoba amazwi kaNkulunkulu angumoya nokuphila! Hhayi amagama. Khuluma izinto ezingokomoya kubantu bakamoya, kodwa abantu benyama ngeke bakwazi ukuziqonda.

buza: Kuyashiwo lapha ukuthi "siya" isono, kodwa "thina" ngeke sone.
1 →" thina "Unecala? Noma awunacala?;
2 →" thina "Uzowenza ubugebengu? Noma ngeke wenze icala?"
impendulo: Siqala ku【 ukuzalwa kabusha 】Abantu abasha bakhuluma nabantu abadala!

1. UJesu, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uBaba, wayengenasono

buza: UJesu wazalwa kubani?
impendulo: Ubaba ozelwe nguNkulunkulu → Ingelosi yaphendula: “UMoya oNgcwele uyakukwehlela phezu kwakho, namandla oPhezukonke akusibekele, okungcwele okuzozalwa kuyothiwa iNdodana kaNkulunkulu iNdodana kaNkulunkulu) (Luka 1:35).

buza: Ingabe uJesu wayenesono?
impendulo: INkosi uJesu ayinasono →Niyazi ukuthi uJehova wabonakala ukuba asuse izono zabantu, ngokuba asikho isono kuye. ( 1 Johane 3:5 ) neyesi-2 Korinte 5:21 .

2. Nathi esizelwe nguNkulunkulu (umuntu omusha) asinasono

buza: thina incwadi Ngemva kokufunda ngoJesu nokuqonda iqiniso → Wazalwa ngobani?
impendulo:
1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya — Johane 3:5
2 Bazalwa ngeqiniso levangeli — 1 Korinte 4:15
3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu → Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa egameni lakhe. Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. ( Johane 1:12-13 )

buza: Ingabe sikhona isono ekuzalweni kukaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: engenacala ! Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke one → Siyazi ukuthi wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke one; omubi ngeke akwazi ukumlimaza. ( 1 Johane 5:18 )

3. Thina esizalwa ngegazi ( Indoda endala ) onecala

buza: Ingabe thina, esiphuma ku-Adamu futhi sizalwa abazali, sinecala?
impendulo: enecala .
buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Lokhu kufana nesono esivela ( U-Adamu ) Umuntu oyedwa wangena emhlabeni, futhi ukufa kweza ngesono, futhi ukufa kwehlela kubo bonke ngenxa yokuthi bonke bonile. ( Roma 5:12 )

4. “Thina” kanye “nawe” kweyoku-1 Johane

1 Johane 1:8 Uma sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho kithi.

buza: Ubani othi "thina" lapha?
impendulo: Cha" incwadi "UJesu, owashiwo ngabantu abangazange baqonde indlela yeqiniso futhi abangazange bazalwe kabusha! Ngokwesibonelo, lapho sishumayela ivangeli kumalungu omndeni, izihlobo, abangani, esifunda nabo, kanye nozakwethu → sizosebenzisa " thina “Yiba nobudlelwano obuseduze nabo,” kusho yena thina "→ Uma uthi awunacala, uyazikhohlisa! Ngeke usebenzise amagama okusola." wena ".

Encwadini yoku-1 kaJohane, “uJohane” ukhuluma nabafowabo abangamaJuda, incwadi ) UNkulunkulu → Kodwa ( Ungakukholwa "UJesu, uswele" umlamuleli “Abakholwayo nabangakholwayo abanakuboshelwa ndawonye ngokulinganayo,” UJohane "Awukwazi ukuhlanganyela nabo ngoba abakwazi." ukukhanya kweqiniso “Jesu, bayizimpumputhe futhi bahamba ebumnyameni.

Ake sifune imininingwane [1 Johane 1:1-8]:

(1)Indlela yokuphila

Ivesi 1: Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, esalizwa, sayibona, sayibona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sathinta ngezandla zethu.
Ivesi 2: (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi sidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwabonakala nathi.)
Ivesi 3: Simemezela kini lokho esikubonile nesikuzwileyo, ukuze nibe nenhlanganyelo nathi. Kuyinhlanganyelo yethu noBaba kanye neNdodana Yakhe, uJesu Kristu.
Ivesi 4: Sinilobela lezi zinto, ukuze injabulo yenu yanele.

Qaphela:
Isigaba 1 → Endleleni yokuphila,
Isigaba 2 → Dlula ( Ivangeli ) ukuphila okuphakade kuwe,
Ivesi 3 → Ukuze nibe nenhlanganyelo nathi futhi nihlanganyele noYise neNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu.
Isigaba 4 → Sibeka lawa magama ( Bhala ) kuwe,
(“ thina ” kusho incwadi Abantu bakaJesu;" wena ” kubhekiselwa kubantu abangakholwa kuJesu)

(2)UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya
Ivesi 5: UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi kuye abukho nhlobo ubumnyama. Leli yilizwi esilizwile eNkosini futhi salibuyisela kini.
Ivesi 6: Uma sithi sinenhlanganyelo noNkulunkulu kodwa sibe sihamba ebumnyameni, sinamanga futhi asihambi eqinisweni.
Ivesi 7: Uma sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono.
Ivesi 8: Uma sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho kithi.

Qaphela:
Ivesi 5 → UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, " thina "Kubhekisela kulabo abakholwa kuJesu futhi balandele ukukhanya, futhi bathole umvuzo" wena “Umyalezo usho ukuthi ukushumayela ivangeli akukwenzi ( incwadi UJesu akazange amlandele Ukukhanya "abantu,

Isigaba 6 → " thina "Kusho ukukholwa kuJesu nokumlandela" Ukukhanya "abantu," njenge ” kusho ngokuqagela Uma sithi inoNkulunkulu ( Ukukhanya ) yaphambana, kodwa isahamba ebumnyameni ( thina futhi" Ukukhanya "Sinobudlelwane kodwa sisahamba ebumnyameni. Ngabe siqamba amanga? Asisenzi iqiniso.)
Ngenxa yokuthi sinenhlanganyelo nokukhanya, akunakwenzeka ukuba siqhubeke sihamba ebumnyameni uma sisahamba ebumnyameni, kufakazela ukuthi asinabudlelwane nokukhanya → lokho kusho ukuthi siqamba amanga futhi asilisebenzisi iqiniso; . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Isigaba 7 → Nathi → ( njenge ) hambani ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, nibe nenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula ezonweni zonke.

Isigaba 8 → Nathi → ( njenge ) Ukuthi asinacala kuwukuzikhohlisa, futhi iqiniso alikho ezinhliziyweni zethu.
buza: lapha" thina "Ingabe kusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha? Noma ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha?"
impendulo: lapha" thina ” kusho Kusho ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha
buza: Kungani?
impendulo: ngoba" thina "futhi" wena "Okungukuthi, → abamazi uJesu! Cha ( incwadi ) UJesu, ngaphambi kokuba azalwe kabusha→ wayeyisoni esikhulu phakathi kwezoni nesoni→【 thina 】Animazi uJesu, ningamazi ( incwadi ) UJesu, ngaphambi kokuba azalwe kabusha → ngalesi sikhathi【 thina 】Uma sithi asinacala, siyazikhohlisa, neqiniso alikho ezinhliziyweni zethu.

thina ( incwadi )Jesu, qonda iqiniso levangeli! ( incwadi )Igazi likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, liyasihlambulula ezonweni zonke→Sizalwa ngokusha” Omusha "Kuphela ongakwazi ukuba nenhlanganyelo noNkulunkulu, ukhulume nokukhanya, futhi uhambe ekukhanyeni, njengoba nje noNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Ihubo: Indlela Yesiphambano

kulungile! Yilokho kuphela esikwabele ngakho namuhla Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani njalo! Amen

articles.title: I-Trivia: Injabulo Esonweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
KumaHebheru 11:24-25 Ngokukholwa uMose esekhulile wala ukubizwa ngokuthi indodana yendodakazi kaFaro. Angamane ahlupheke kanye nabantu bakaNkulunkulu kunokuba ajabulele izinjabulo zesikhashana zesono.


buza: Ziyini izinjabulo zesono?
impendulo: Ezweni elinesono, ukujabulela injabulo yesono kubizwa ngokuthi injabulo yesono.

buza: Ukwehlukanisa kanjani injabulo yesono nenjabulo yokujabulela uNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1. Inyama ithengiswe esonweni

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. Inkomba (Roma 7:14) → Ngokwesibonelo, uMose eGibhithe wayeyindodana yabantwana bakaFaro, futhi iGibhithe limelela izwe, izwe elinesono. Lapho uMose ongumIsrayeli ekhula, wayazi ukuthi wayengabantu bakaNkulunkulu abakhethiwe, isizwe esingcwele esikhethiwe. Wenqaba ukubizwa ngendodana yabantwana bakaFaro futhi ajabulele ingcebo yaseGibhithe → kuhlanganise lonke ulwazi, ukufunda, ukudla, ukuphuza nezinjabulo zaseGibhithe. Wayengamane ahlupheke kanye nabantu bakaNkulunkulu kunokuba ajabulele injabulo yesono okwesikhashana Lapho ebona ukuhlupheka kwabantu, wabona ukuthotshiswa kukaKristu → Wenqaba ukuba indodana yabantwana bakaFaro wabaleka eGibhithe waya ehlane. 40. Ngemva kweminyaka engu-40 elusa izimvu kwaMidiyani, wakhohlwa ukuthi ungubani njengendodana nendodakazi kaFaro waseGibhithe, futhi wakhohlwa lonke ulwazi, imfundo namathalenta eGibhithe kuphela lapho eseneminyaka engu-80 ubudala lapho uNkulunkulu embiza khona ukuba ahole ama-Israyeli aphuma eGibhithe. Njengoba nje iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Noma ubani ongafani nomntwana ngeke akwazi ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu kuphela owasebenzisa uMose ukuze abuyele esimweni somntwana umntwana ubuthakathaka futhi akanciki olwazini lwezwe nasekufundeni nasekuhlakanipheni, ethembele kuphela ekuhlakanipheni kukaNkulunkulu. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
UMose uyindodana yabantwana bakaFaro, efanekisela inyama ethengiswe esonweni, nenyama ejabulela impahla yenkosi yaseGibhithe esonayo kanye nakho konke ukudla, okuphuzwayo, ukudlala, nezinjabulo. Ukuzijabulisa ngokomzimba kwalezi zinjabulo → kubizwa ngokuthi ukujabulela injabulo yesono!
Ngakho-ke, uMose wenqaba ukuba indodana yabantwana bakaFaro, kodwa wayezimisele ukuhlupheka enyameni kanye nabantu → ngoba lowo owahlupheka enyameni uyekile ukona. Inkomba (1 Petru Isahluko 4:1), uyakuqonda lokhu?

2. Abazelwe nguNkulunkulu abasibo abenyama

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Isikhombo (Roma 8:9)
buza: Kungani izinto ezizelwe nguNkulunkulu zingezona ezenyama?
impendulo: UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaYise, uMoya kaKristu, noMoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu “bangumoya munye” futhi lowo nguMoya oNgcwele, uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya oNgcwele, uhlala ezinhliziyweni zenu → okungukuthi, uMoya oNgcwele uhlala kuKristu (singamalungu omzimba Wakhe), Njengoba ningumzimba kaKristu, aniwona umzimba wenu kaKristu ungokaMoya oNgcwele UKristu ukuwe, (umzimba ka-Adamu akusiwo owethu) umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya (uMoya oNgcwele) uphila ngokulunga. ( Roma 8:10 ) uyakuqonda lokhu?

3. Ubumnandi besono nenjabulo yokuthokozela uNkulunkulu

buza: Ukwehlukanisa kanjani injabulo yesono nenjabulo yokujabulela uNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuthokoza esonweni

1 Inyama ithengiswe esonweni —Bheka amaRoma 7:14
2 Ukunaka kwenyama kungukufa —Bheka amaRoma 8:6
3 Ukudla yisisu, lesisu singukudla, kodwa uNkulunkulu uzakwenza kokubili kubhubhise. —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 6:13

Qaphela: Lapho sisenyameni, sase sithengiswa kakade esonweni → Uma nilandela inyama futhi nigxilisa ingqondo enyameni, okungukuthi ukufa, ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa. Ukudla yisisu, futhi isisu senyama siwukudla → → Uyicabangela inyama, njalo udla kahle, uphuza kahle, udlale kahle, futhi ujabulele ubumnandi benyama → → ujabulele ubumnandi besono! Ngokwesibonelo, lapho usebenza kanzima ukuze wenze imali, uhlale udla kahle ukuze uthole umzimba wakho, ugqoke kahle umzimba wakho, futhi uthenga i-villa ukuze uhlale kuyo kahle . Kukhona nemidlalo, amadrama ezithombe, ezemidlalo, ukudansa, ukunakekelwa kwezempilo, ubuhle, ukuhamba... nokunye! Kusho ukuthi [uphila] ku-Adamu, emzimbeni ka-Adamu, emzimbeni ka-Adamu [onesono] → ujabulele injabulo nokuzijabulisa [komzimba onesono]. Lokhu ukulandela inyama nokunakekela izinto zenyama → injabulo yesono. Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Umuntu omusha esizelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena owenyama. Izinto ngomzimba → Uma nje ninokudla nezingubo, kufanele neneliswe . ( 1 Thimothewu 6:8 )

(2)Jabulela injabulo kaNkulunkulu

1 izingoma zokudumisa ezingokomoya — Efesu 5:19
2. Thandaza njalo — Luka 18:1
3 Ngiyabonga njalo — Efesu 5:20
Bongani uNkulunkulu uBaba ngaso sonke isikhathi ngakho konke egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.
4. Zimisele ukunikela kubasebenzi ukuze basakaze ivangeli futhi balethe ivangeli lensindiso kubantu. —2 Korinte 8:3
5 Beka iminikelo nengcebo ezulwini — Mathewu 6:20
6 Abasebenzi abathola iziteshi zefeksi → “Noma ubani onamukelayo uyangamukela mina;
7 Thatha isiphambano sakho utshumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu — Marku 8:34-35 . Nakuba sihlupheka futhi sihlupheka enyameni ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu, sisenenjabulo enkulu emiphefumulweni yethu Lena injabulo yokujabulela uNkulunkulu kuKristu! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ihubo: Wena uyiNkosi yodumo

kulungile! Yilokho kuphela esikwabele ngakho namuhla Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani njalo! Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo nezimpendulo: Ubugebengu Bamabomu (Isifundo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukusesha ngezikhathi ezithile, ithrafikhi, yabelana ngama-FAQ "Ubugebengu Benhloso" Cha. 2 Ekhuluma, sengathi uNkulunkulu angasinika inhliziyo enokuthula, ukuze kungakhathaliseki ukuthi sibonani noma sizwani, siqonde intando yakho! Amen

5. Yonke indalo inezifiso zobugovu

(1) Savelaphi isono sika-Adamu?

buza: Adam" ubugebengu "Kusuka kuphi?"
impendulo: U-Adamu no-Eva

1 Ubuthakathaka benyama ( ngoba ) Umyalo Womthetho → "Kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa."
2 →( inyoka ) wakhohlisa owesifazane u-Eva,
3 →U-Eva walingwa, engokwenyama" ngoba "Umthetho ( wazalwa )Izifiso ezimbi nazo ziyizifiso zobugovu,
4 →Lapho u-Adamu no-Eva bekhulelwa izifiso zenyama, " dla “Isithelo somuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi,
5 →Nje ( wazalwa ) waphuma esonweni, futhi lapho isono sesikhulile,
6 →Mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa, futhi kuyisono ukweqa umthetho - nje ngibelethe fa Woza.
kanjalo" fa "kusuka" ubugebengu "Woza;" ubugebengu "Ngenyama ( ngoba ) ozelwe ngomthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) "Inkanyezi Ekhanyayo, Indodana Yasekuseni" Ubugebengu

buza: kaSathane" ubugebengu "Kusuka kuphi?"
impendulo: (inyoka) USathane wenza izinto ezimbi →

1 ( Hezekeli 28:15 ) Wawuphelele ezindleleni zakho kusukela osukwini lokudalwa kwakho, kodwa kwatholakala ukungalungi kuwe → Konke ukungalungi kuyisono. ( 1 Johane 5:17 )
2 ( Hezekeli 28:16 ) Ngenxa yokuthi nihweba kakhulu, nigcwele ubudlova. Ngamanye amazwi, uSathane wakhulelwa lapho egcwele izifiso zakhe. 】, okuholela ebugebengwini【 azale isono 】 ngalokho ngiyakunikhipha entabeni kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba niyingcolisile indawo engcwele. Nina makherubi ayesibekela umphongolo wesivumelwano, nginichithile ematsheni acwebezelayo acwebezela njengomlilo.

Qaphela: UNkulunkulu akazisindisi izingelosi ezona zawa, ngakho-ke ngeke sikufunde noma sikuchaze lapha. Bafowethu nodadewethu, ngicela nibhekisele ku (Hebheru 2:16) kanye (IsAmbulo 20:7-10)

6. Ukuhlenga abaphansi komthetho

(1)Ukhululiwe emthethweni

buza: Kungani wephula umthetho?
impendulo: Umthetho uthi ngoba Inyama ibuthakathaka futhi ayinakwenza lutho →→Lapho sisenyameni, asinakwenza ukulunga okufunwa umthetho, futhi inyama iyokwenza ( ngoba )Umthetho → Ukuzalwa kwesifiso esibi kuyinkanuko, inkanuko izala isono lapho sekhulelwe, nesono, lapho sesikhule ngokugcwele, siveza ukufa →→ Ngakho uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe siqu ukuba ibe ngumnikelo wesono, elahla isono ngo inyama - ebethelwe esiphambanweni Nkulunkulu, asisindise emthethweni ngokufa. Bheka kwabaseRoma isahluko 8 ivesi 3 nesahluko 7 ivesi 6

(2) Ukukhululwa esiqalekisweni somthetho

UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

(3) Thenga labo abangaphansi komthetho

→→Masithole ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu!

Vula (KwabaseGalathiya 4:4-7) futhi nifunde ndawonye: “Kepha lapho sekufikile ukuphelela kwesikhathi, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, izelwe ngowesifazane, izelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze thola ubudodana. Njengoba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu (imibhalo yokuqala: eyethu), ememeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” futhi njengoba uyindodana, wethembele kuyo iNdlalifa kaNkulunkulu.

buza: Bukhona ubundodana ngaphansi komthetho?
impendulo: Abangaphansi komthetho bayizigqila, izigqila zesono → Njengoba “beyizigqila”, abawona amadodana. Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho → Inceku ayikwazi ukuhlala ekhaya kuze kube phakade; Isikhombo ( Johane 8:35 ), uyaqonda?

7. Ngemva kokufunda iqiniso

buza: Iliphi iqiniso esilifundayo?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ufundile → Lapho sisenyameni, lokho kungenxa yokuthi “ umthetho "futhi【 wazalwa 】Izifiso ezimbi, okungukuthi, izinkanuko, zisebenza ezithweni zethu, lapho izinkanuko zenyama sezisebenza, zizala isono, kuthi lapho isono sesivuthiwe, sizale ukufa. ( Roma 7:5; Jakobe 1:18 )
(2) Ufundile → Njengoba umthetho wawubuthakathaka ngenxa yenyama futhi ungenakukwenza okuthile, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe siqu ifana nenyama enesono ukuba ibe umnikelo wesono, ilahla isono enyameni ( Roma 8:3 )
(3) Ufundile →Ngaphandle komthetho! Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko. ( Roma 7:6 )
(4) Ufundile →Uphunyukile esiqalekisweni somthetho! UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;
(5) Ufundile → UKristu wazalwa ngaphansi komthetho ukuze ahlenge abaphansi komthetho ukuze thina samukele ubudodana ! ( Galathiya 4:4-7 )

8. Uma ona ngamabomu, awusayikuba khona umnikelo wesono;

Ngokuba uma sona ngamabomu emva kokwamukela ukwazi iqiniso, awusekho umhlatshelo wezono;

buza: Buyini ubugebengu bamabomu?
impendulo: Ngoba ngemva kokuthola indlela yeqiniso, siyazi ngokucacile: 1 Lapho sisenyameni, inyama ( ngoba )Umthetho→ wazalwa Izifiso ezimbi, izifiso ezimbi zizalelwa isono, lapho sesikhulelisiwe, sizala ukufa;

2 Njengoba umthetho ubuthakathaka ngenxa yenyama, awukwazi ukwenza okuthile → ukulunga komthetho kungenza isono kuphela;

3 UKristu waba ngumnikelo wethu wesono, wabethelwa esiphambanweni wafa;

4 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo;

5 ukuze ahlenge abaphansi komthetho, asinike ukutholwa →→【 Uma ungakukholwa 】 Lena indlela yeqiniso, Shaya ucingo

Ubugebengu bamabomu.

buza: Kungani ngemva kokufunda indlela yeqiniso, Uma ungakholelwa eqinisweni Ubugebengu bamabomu nje?
impendulo: Ngoba ngaphansi komthetho uyisigqila, isigqila sesono, inyama iyokwenza ngoba Umthetho wazala isono. Uzimisele futhi ngamabomu ngaphansi komthetho → weqa umthetho ngamabomu, weqa umthetho, ukwephula umthetho kuyisono → lokhu kubizwa ngesono samabomu . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Uma wona ngamabomu, awusayikuba khona umnikelo wesono na?
impendulo: Munye kuphela umnikelo wesono! Akukho ukubuyisana kwesibili noma okuningi.

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 UKristu kuphela kanye ULizwi waba yinyama, wazalwa ngaphansi komthetho - Gal 4:4-7
2 UKristu kuphela kanye Nikelani umnikelo wesono— Hebheru 10:10-14
3 Wafa esonweni, kuphela kanye — Roma 6:10
4 UKristu kuphela kanye Ukuchithwa kwegazi kuhlanza izono zomuntu— Hebheru 9:12-14

Ngokuba emva kokuba sesamukele ulwazi lweqiniso, akukho ukuhlawulelwa kwezono ngaphandle kukaKristu uMsindisi wethu; Uma ungakukholwa! Awusekho umnikelo wesono .
Uma uKristu ehlawulela izono izikhathi eziningi, kwakuyodingeka afe izikhathi eziningi ;
Uma uKristu ehlanza izono izikhathi eziningi, kwakuyodingeka achithe igazi lakhe izikhathi eziningi ;
Uma kunjalo, kumelwe ukuba wahlupheka izikhathi eziningi kusukela ekudalweni komhlaba - bheka amaHeberu 9:25-26.

Kodwa uKristu, owafa esonweni, kuphela kanye , anihlenge ngaphansi komthetho, anikhulule emthethweni→ Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa . Uma ubuyela emuva ugcine umthetho uzimisele ukuba yisigqila somthetho uyakuba yisigqila sesono → Uyoba njengenja ephenduka idle ukudla ekukhafulayo, noma ingulube egezwayo. bese igingqika ibuyele odakeni. ngakho, Uma ungalikholwa iqiniso futhi ushiye uMsindisi uJesu Kristu, ngeke usaba khona umhlatshelo wezono. → Linda kuphela ngokwesaba ukwahlulelwa nomlilo oqothulayo ozoqeda zonke izitha (ukwahlulela kokugcina). ( Hebheru 10:27 ) Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu?

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, egqugquzelwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa! Kodwa anginalo ukholo olwanele, ngakho ngicela usizo eNkosini

Yamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sakho ukusesha - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Imibuzo nezimpendulo: Ubugebengu Ngamabomu (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kumaHeberu Isahluko 10, amavesi 26-27, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma sona ngamabomu ngemva kokwazi iqiniso, umnikelo wesono uyobe ungasekho.

Namuhla ake sifune, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ngokuthi yini "Ubugebengu Benhloso" Cha. 1 ) Uyakhuluma futhi athandazele: Siyabonga, Abba, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, futhi siyabonga, Moya oNgcwele, ngokuba nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi eziloba ngezandla zikhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu yenze umsebenzi omuhle ebandleni, igqabule wonke amaketango nezithiyo zesitha, futhi iholele bonke abantwana babuyele ebandleni ukuze baqonde iqiniso leBhayibheli. UMsindisi uhlala ekhanyisa amehlo ezinhliziyo zethu futhi evula izingqondo zethu - singaliqonda iBhayibheli → sikwazi ukuzwa nokubona iqiniso elingokomoya → Qonda ukuthi buyini ubugebengu bamabomu !

INkosi mayiphendule imikhuleko yethu, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, kanye nezibusiso egameni leNkosi uJesu! Amen

1. Ubugebengu bamabomu

buza: Buyini ubugebengu bamabomu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) " ngamabomu "isiCantonese" Isibani esikhethekile, isibani esikhethekile "Kusho ngamabomu, ngamabomu, ngamabomu, ngamabomu;
(2) " ubugebengu ” kusho ukuthi ukwephula umthetho nokwephula imiyalo neziqondiso zomthetho kuyisono;
(3) " ubugebengu bamabomu "Kusho "ukukhanya okukhethekile" okungukuthi ngamabomu, ngenhloso, nangokwazi → ngokwazi ukuthi ukwephula umthetho nokwephula imiyalo yomthetho kuyisono → ukwephula ngamabomu imiyalo neziqondiso zomthetho → kubizwa ngokuthi isono samabomu. Ngale ndlela , uyaqonda ngokucacile ?

2. Incazelo “yesono” → ukwephula umthetho

buza: Siyini isono?
impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono → Noma ubani owonayo weqa umthetho; (1 Johane 3:4)

3. Ukungalenzi kanjani ubugebengu

buza: Kanjani ukwenza ubugebengu?
impendulo: Awukho umthetho!

buza: Kungani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
(1) Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa —Bheka amaRoma 4:15
(2) Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono —Bheka amaRoma 5:3
(3) Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile —Bheka amaRoma 7:8

" Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho nesono” : Njengoba uPawulu asho → Singathini? Umthetho uyisono na? Lutho neze! Ukuthi nje ukube bekungengenxa yomthetho, bengingeke ngisazi ukuthi siyini isono → (Okusho ukuthi, ukube bekungengenxa yomthetho, bengingeke ngisazi ukuthi siyini isono, ngokuba umthetho uwukuba yenza abantu bazi ngesono - bheka kwabaseRoma 3:21). Umthetho uthi, "Ungafisi" → " Ungabi nobugovu "Kungumthetho wokugcina phakathi kweMithetho Eyishumi yoMthetho. → Ngangingazi ukuthi kuyini ukuhaha. Nokho, isono sathatha ithuba lokusebenzisa umyalo "umthetho" ukwenza zonke izinhlobo zokuhaha zisebenze kimi. Ngoba mina akazange aye emthethweni, Isono sifile uPawulu wathi → ngangiphila ngaphandle komthetho; 1 Ngokuba lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa; 2 Awukho umthetho, futhi isono asilona icala, isibonelo, endulo, kwakungelona icala ukuba abalimi bakhuphuke intaba bayogawula izinkuni, ngoba wawungekho umthetho ngaleso sikhathi imithetho "yokwenqabela ukugawulwa kwemithi." Uma ukhuphuka intaba uyogawula izinkuni, uphula umthetho wehlathi nomthetho, futhi wenza icala ngokukhuphukela ezintabeni ukuyogawula. Uyaqonda? 3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile → Lapho kukhona umthetho, isono siphila; , ubeka " ubugebengu “Uma ufuna ukuphila, kufanele fa ," ubugebengu "Ngomthetho nemiyalo nabulawa. Ngakho, ingabe nizitshela → Ingabe kungcono ukuba nomthetho? Noma ukungabi nomthetho? Reference ( Roma 7:7-13 )

4. Umzimba ngoba Umthetho wazala isono

KwabaseRoma (Isahluko 7:5) Ngokuba ngesikhathi sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizelwe ngomthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, zathela isithelo sokufa.

(1) Inyama ngoba izifiso ezimbi ezivela emthethweni

buza: Ziyini izifiso ezimbi?
impendulo: " okubi Okungukuthi, isono, izenzo ezimbi, nemicabango emibi; funa "Okungukuthi, izifiso, izinkanuko, izinkanuko zenyama." izifiso ezimbi ” ibhekisela ekuziphatheni kwezenzo ezimbi, imicabango emibi nezinkanuko zenyama.

buza: inyama ngoba Ingabe umthetho ubangela izifiso ezimbi?
impendulo: Ngoba ngenkathi sisenyameni, lokho ngoba Izifiso ezimbi ezizalwa ngomthetho zisebenza emalungwini ethu, ziphumele esithelweni sokufa → okungukuthi, lezo zenyama. ngoba →【 umthetho 】→“ wazalwa "Izenzo ezimbi, imicabango emibi, nezinkanuko zenyama" izifiso ezimbi "Khona-ke inkanuko yenyama isebenza emalungwini ethu → inkanuko yenyama isebenza ekukhulelweni futhi izale" ubugebengu "Wozani → nizoveza isithelo sokufa."

(2) Ukukhulelwa kwesifiso sobugovu kungukuzalwa kwesono.

( Jakobe 1:15 ) Lapho inkanuko isithathile, ibeletha isono;

Qaphela: Ngenkathi sisenyameni, lokho ngoba " umthetho "futhi【 wazalwa 】Izifiso ezimbi, okungukuthi, izinkanuko, zisebenza ezithweni zethu, lapho izinkanuko zenyama sezisebenza, zizala isono, kuthi lapho isono sesivuthiwe, sizale ukufa.

buza: " fa "Kusuka kuphi?"
impendulo: " fa" →Ivela “esonweni”-- Roma 5:12

buza: "Isono" sivelaphi?
impendulo: "Isono" → enyameni ( ngoba) umthetho→ wazalwa Izifiso ezimbi, izifiso ezimbi ziyizifiso zobugovu ngokushesha nje lapho zikhulelwa→ wazalwa Phuma unecala.

Ngakho "ubudlelwane phakathi kwenyama, umthetho, isono, nokufa": 【Inyama】→ Ngenxa 【Umthetho】→ Zala 【Isono】→ Zala 【Ukufa】 .

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Nkosi! Ngiyakholwa ngiyakholwa

Yamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sakho ukusesha - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - Chofoza ngezansi Qoqa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: I-FAQ: Awukwazi ukubenza bazisole futhi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
【UmBhalo】 KumaHeberu 6:6 Uma behlubuka emfundisweni, ngeke kwenzeke ukubabuyisela ekuphendukeni. Ngokuba bayibethela kabusha iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, beyihlazisa obala.


1. Uma ulahla iqiniso

buza: Yiziphi izimiso okufanele sizilahle?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukukhululwa emfundisweni yesono

UKristu wafela izono zethu (esiphambanweni)--Bheka eyoku-1 kwabaseKorinte 15:3-4
Uma umuntu oyedwa efela bonke, bonke bayafa - bheka 2 Korinte 5:14
Labo asebefile bakhululiwe esonweni—bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7

Qaphela: Ukhululiwe emfundisweni yesono→uKristu yedwa” okwe "Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa, futhi abafileyo bayakhululwa esonweni. → Lapho bonke befa, bonke bakhululiwe esonweni. Lowo okholwa nguye akalahlwa. Labo abangakholelwa “enkululekweni esonweni” , icala selinqunyiwe. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka uJohane 3:18

(2) Umhlatshelo kaKristu owodwa wenza labo abangcweliswa baphelele phakade

Ngale ntando singcwelisiwe ngokunikelwa komzimba kaJesu Kristu kanye kuphela, futhi labo abangcweliswayo benziwa baphelele phakade, balungisiswe phakade, abangenasono phakade, futhi ngcwele phakade. ( Hebheru 10:10-14 )

(3)Igazi likaJesu ligeza zonke izono zethu

Uma sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono. (1 Johane 1:7)

(4) Ukugqashula emfundisweni yomthetho

Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko. Inkomba ( Roma 7:6 )

(5) Hlukanisa izimiso zendoda endala nokuziphatha kwayo

Ningaqambelani amanga; ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.

(6) Baphunyukile emandleni ezwe elingaphansi likaSathane elimnyama

Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama futhi wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo ( Kolose 1:13 )

(7) Imfundiso esenza sikwazi ukulungisiswa, sivuswe, sizalwe kabusha, sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade.

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usenze kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo (1 Petru 1:3)

2. Ngeke sibenze bazisole futhi.

buza: Usho ukuthini ngokungakwazi ukubenza baphenduke futhi?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( Heberu 6:4 ) Ngokuqondene nalabo abaye bakhanyiswa, banambitha isipho sasezulwini, futhi baba abahlanganyeli kuMoya oNgcwele.

buza: Ikuphi ukukhanya okutholiwe?
impendulo: Ukukhanyiselwa nguNkulunkulu nokukhanyiselwa kwevangeli→ Selokhu nezwa izwi leqiniso→ uKristu wafela izono zethu, wembelwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu→ 1 Ukhululiwe emfundisweni yesono, 2 Wanikela ngomhlatshelo kwaba kanye kuphela, engcwelisa imfundiso yokuphelela okuphakade. 3 Igazi lakhe lihlanza umuntu ezonweni zonke. 4 Ngikhululekile emfundisweni yomthetho, 5 Ukulahla umuntu omdala nezimiso zokuziphatha kwakhe, 6 Sikhululiwe ezimisweni zobumnyama nasemandleni eHayidese; 7 Ukuze ulungisiswe, uvuswe, uzalwe kabusha, usindiswe, wamukele uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade! →Lelo yivangeli eningasindiswa ngalo, ninambitha isipho sasezulwini, nibe nabahlanganyeli bakaMoya oNgcwele.

( Heberu 6:5 ) Labo abaye banambitha izwi elihle likaNkulunkulu futhi baqaphela amandla enkathi ezayo.

buza: Iyiphi indlela enhle?
impendulo: " indlela enhle ” → Nina enizwile izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu → okuyindlela enhle futhi nina enanambitha izwi elihle likaNkulunkulu futhi naqaphela amandla enkathi ezayo → uMoya oNgcwele othethelelayo, ovusayo. , uvuselela, usindisa, futhi wamukela izithembiso, abantu abanokuphila okuphakade Ingabe uyaqonda?

( Heberu 6:6 ) Uma beyishiya imfundiso, ngeke babuyiselwe ekuphendukeni. Ngokuba bayibethela kabusha iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, beyihlazisa obala.

buza: Uma silahla iqiniso → yisiphi isimiso esisishiyayo?
impendulo: Ukulahla lokhu osekushiwo ngenhla " ngehora lesikhombisa "Isimiso→【 iqiniso lokusindiswa 】UKristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula esonweni → Uma wena " Ungakukholwa "Ukukhululeka emfundisweni yesono, imfundiso yomthetho, ukulahla le mfundiso. Isibonelo, amabandla amaningi namuhla afundisa ukuthi uJesu wazihlanza izono ngaphambi kokuba ngikholwe eNkosini; izono zakusasa, izono zakusasa. ngakusasa, futhi izono zomqondo azikagezwa →Lena "? ilahliwe “Umhlatshelo kaKristu owodwa wenza labo abangcweliswa baphelele phakade, futhi igazi Lakhe libahlambulule kuso sonke isono→ Iqiniso leli . Kukhona nalabo abazisola ngemisebenzi yabo efile nsuku zonke, bavume izono zabo futhi baphenduke nsuku zonke, futhi bathandazele igazi leNkosi nsuku zonke ukuba lesule izono zabo futhi bahlanze izono zabo → bheka igazi lesivumelwano elamngcwelisa. njengokujwayelekile → laba bantu banenkani, bayahlubuka, futhi abaphenduki, futhi baba ugibe lukaSathane ilahliwe Imfundiso yensindiso kaKristu ithi iqiniso; Njengoba nje inja iphenduka idle lokho ekuphalazayo; Inkolelo yabo iwukuchezuka eqinisweni lensindiso → Ngeke sibenze bazisole futhi. , ngoba sebeyibethele kabusha iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, beyihlazisa obala. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa Enkosini UJesu Isihlabelelo

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yocwaningo lwethu, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana namuhla. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, kanye nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani njalo. Amen

articles.title: Imibuzo nezimpendulo: Ngaphandle kokuba nibe njengabantwana, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade, Amen!

Ake sivule iBhayibheli kuMathewu Isahluko 18 Ivesi 3 futhi silifunde ndawonye. UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi niphenduke nibe njengabantwana abancane, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu.

Namuhla siyasesha, sixhumane futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ngaphandle kokuba niphenduke nifane nabantwana, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu." Khulekani: "Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo"! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho “ibandla” uthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu nokungena embusweni wezulu! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele usihola kanjani sonke ukuba sibuyele esimweni sabantwana futhi asambulela imfihlakalo yokungena evangelini lombuso wezulu. . Amen!

Lemikhuleko engenhla, nokunxusa, nokunxusa, nokubonga, nezibusiso kusegameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【UmBhalo】 Mathewu 18:1-3 Ngaleso sikhathi abafundi beza kuJesu bambuza bathi: “Ngubani omkhulu embusweni wezulu na?” UJesu wabiza umntwana omncane, wammisa phakathi kwabo, wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningaphenduki, nibe njengabantwana abancane, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu.

1. Isitayela sengane

buza: Siyini isitayela sengane?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Bheka ukubukeka komntwana ngokusekelwe ebusweni bakhe : Umusa → Wonke umuntu uyawuthanda uma ewubona Izingane zinokuthula, umusa, ubumnene, ubumsulwa, ubuhle, ubumsulwa...njll.!
2 Bheka isitayela somntwana ngokusuka enhliziyweni : Akukho nkohliso, nokungalungi, nobubi, nobubi, akukho ukuphinga, nokuxhwala, nokukhonza izithombe, nokuthakatha, nokubulala, nokudakwa, nokuzitika, nokunye.
3 Bheka isitayela somntwana ekuthembeleni kuso : Bathembe njalo abazali bakho, thembela kubazali bakho, futhi ungalokothi uthembele kuwena.

2. Izingane azinayo imithetho

buza: Ingabe ikhona imithetho yezingane?
impendulo: Awukho umthetho wezingane.

1 Njengoba kulotshiwe → Ngokuba umthetho ubangela ulaka; Isikhombo (Roma 4:15)
2 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho siphambeko → Ngoba akukho mthetho, izeqo azithathwa njengezeqo, njengoba nje nabazali ababona izingane zabo zingezona izeqo.
3 ITestamente Elisha uBaba waseZulwini ngeke azikhumbule iziphambeko zenu → ngoba akukho mthetho! UYihlo osezulwini akayikukhumbula iziphambeko zenu ngaphandle komthetho → “Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke ezinhliziyweni zabo; bona.” Wayesethi: “Angisayikuzikhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki ukuba kube nemihlatshelo yezono. ( Hebheru 10:16-18 )

buza: Faka umthetho ezinhliziyweni zabo, abanawo umthetho na?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Isiphetho somthetho nguKristu →Bheka eyabaseRoma 10:4 .
2 Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle →Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, awuwona umfanekiso wangempela wale nto-bheka amaHeberu 10:1.
3 Umfanekiso weqiniso nesimo somthetho nguKristu →Bheka kuKol. 2:17 . Ngale ndlela, uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano esisha nabo, ethi: “Ngiyobhala imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo futhi ngiyoyibeka ezinhliziyweni zabo → okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu [ UKristu 】Kulotshwe ezinhliziyweni zethu, njengesiHlabelelo seziHlabelelo Isahluko 8:6 Ngicela ungifake enhliziyweni yakho njengophawu, ungithwale njengesigxivizo engalweni yakho...! Futhi uyokufaka phakathi kwabo → uNkulunkulu uyokwenza impilo kaKristu 】Yifake ngaphakathi kwethu. Ngale ndlela, uyasiqonda isivumelwano esisha uNkulunkulu asenze nathi?

3. Abantwana abasazi isono

buza: Kungani izingane zingasazi isono?
impendulo : Ngoba izingane azinawo umthetho.

buza: Uyini umsebenzi womthetho?
impendulo: Umsebenzi womthetho uthi Bagwebe abantu ngesono →Ngakho ngemisebenzi yomthetho akukho nyama eyakulungisiswa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba Umthetho wenzelwe ukwazisa abantu ngezono zabo . Inkomba ( Roma 3:20 )

Kungumthetho ukwenza abantu baqaphele izono zabo. Ngokuba abantwana bengenawo umthetho, kabasazi isono;

1 Ngokuba lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa; —Bheka amaRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono kasisona isono —Bheka amaRoma 5:13
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile — Roma 7:8, 9

Izigaba ezifana nokuthi " uPaul "Ethi → Ngangiphila ngaphandle komthetho; kodwa lapho kufika umyalo womthetho, isono saphinde saphila → "Inkokhelo yesono ingukufa," futhi ngafa. Ingabe uyawufuna umthetho? → phila esonweni, hamba futhi ulahle " ubugebengu "Uma uphila → uzofa. Uyaqonda?"
Ngakho-ke, uma umntwana engenawo umthetho, akanaso isiphambeko; akakwazi ukulahla ingane. Hamba ubuze ummeli oqeqeshiwe ukuthi umthetho ungayenza yini ingane inecala. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

4. Ukuzalwa kabusha

buza: Ngingabuyela kanjani efomini lengane?
Impendulo: Ukuzalwa kabusha!

buza: Kungani kuzalwe kabusha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukhokho u-Adamu wadala umuntu
Ngoba uJehova uNkulunkulu wadala “u-Adamu” ngothuli, futhi u-Adamu waba indoda ekhulile engenawo “noyedwa” wazalwa ". Futhi siyinzalo ka-Adamu, futhi umzimba wethu wenyama uvela ku-Adamu. Ngokusho " kudaliwe "Ethi imizimba yethu iwuthuli → ayidluliswanga" wazalwa "Iyinto yabantu abadala" uthuli “. (Lokhu akusekelwe emfundisweni yomshado nokuzalwa ka-Adamu no-Eva, kodwa endalweni yezinto ezibonakalayo “uthuli”. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda? Bheka uGenesise 2:7 .

(2) Umzimba ka-Adamu uthengiselwe isono

1 Isono sangena emhlabeni ngo-Adamu yedwa
Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile. Isikhombo (Roma 5:12)
2 Inyama yethu ithengiswe esonweni
Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. Isikhombo (Roma 7:14)
3 Inkokhelo yesono ingukufa
Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. Inkomba (KwabaseRoma 6:23) → Ngakho ku-Adamu bonke bafa.

buza: Singazalwa kanjani kabusha njengabantwana?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya — Johane 3:5
(2) Uzelwe ngezwi leqiniso levangeli —1 Korinte 4:15; Jakobe 1:18
(3) Evela kuNkulunkulu — Johane 1:12-13

Qaphela: “U-Adamu” owadalwa ngaphambili wayengowomhlaba → wadalwa njengomuntu omkhulu; isiphetho kwe" U-Adamu "UJesu wazalwa ngokomoya futhi esengumntwana! Wayengumntwana owaba uLizwi, uNkulunkulu, noMoya →【 Ingane 】Akukho mthetho, akukho lwazi lwesono, akukho sono →→U-Adamu wokugcina uJesu akanasono” Angibazi ubugebengu ” → UNkulunkulu umenza angabi nasono ( Awunacala: umbhalo wokuqala uwukungazi ukuthi unecala ), waba yisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze kuye sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu. Isikhombo (2 Korinte 5:21)→→Kanjalo nathi 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Uzelwe uNkulunkulu →→ u-Adamu omncane wokugcina → → akanawo umthetho, akasazi isono, futhi akanasono → → ufana nengane!

Nakhu okwashiwo iNkosi uJesu: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningaphenduki nibe njengabantwana abancane, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu→→ Inhloso yokuqala yokubuyela esimweni somntwana 【 ukuzalwa kabusha 】→→Noma ubani ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya oNgcwele, ozelwe ngezwi leqiniso levangeli, noma ozelwe nguNkulunkulu angangena embusweni wezulu. Inkomba ( Mathewu 18:3 ), uyakuqonda lokhu?

kanjalo" Ithi iNkosi "Noma ubani ozithoba njengale ngane encane" Kholwa ivangeli "Yena mkhulu embusweni wezulu. Noma ngubani owamukela umntwana onje ngenxa yegama lami." Abantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu, izinceku zikaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu” Ukungamukela nje . ( Mathewu 18:4-5 )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Amazing Grace

Yamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sakho ukusesha - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

articles.title: Imibuzo Nezimpendulo: Bonke laba bafa benokholo futhi abazitholanga izithembiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
KumaHeberu 11:13, 39-40 Bonke laba bafa ekukholweni, bengazamukelanga izithembiso, kepha bezibona zikude, bezamukela ngentokozo, bevuma ukuthi bangabafokazi ezweni, kuluhambo.

… Laba yibo bonke abathole ubufakazi obuhle ngokholo, kodwa abangakasitholi isithembiso;

1. Abantu basendulo bathola ubufakazi obumangalisayo kulencwadi

1 Ukukholwa kuka-Abela

Ngokukholwa u-Abela wanikela kuNkulunkulu umhlatshelo owawungcono kunalowo uKayini anikela ngakho, wazuza kanjalo ubufakazi bokulungisiswa kwakhe, ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu ngesipho sakhe. Nakuba afa, wayesakhuluma ngenxa yalolu kholo. ( Hebheru 11:4 )
buza: U-Abela wafa ngokwenyama kodwa esakhuluma? Ukhuluma ngani?
impendulo: Umphefumulo uyakhuluma, ngumphefumulo ka-Abela okhulumayo!
buza: Umphefumulo ka-Abela ukhuluma kanjani?
impendulo: INKOSI yathi: “Wenzeni (Kayini)? Igazi lomfowenu (u-Abela) liyakhala kimi ngezwi elivela emhlabathini.” ( Genesise 4:10 )
buza: Igazi Ilizwi lakhala kuNkulunkulu livela emhlabeni, lathi: Igazi "Azobe ekhona namazwi akhulumayo?"
impendulo: " Igazi “Okungukuphila, ngoba egazini kukhona ukuphila → Levitikusi 17:11 → Levitikusi 17:11 Ngoba umphefumulo wezidalwa eziphilayo usegazini. Impilo, ngakho ingahlawulela izono.
buza: " Igazi "Kukhona ukuphila kuwo → Ingabe lokhu "ukuphila" kuwumphefumulo?
impendulo: abantu" Igazi "Kukhona ukuphila kulo," impilo yegazi "Umphefumulo womuntu →" Igazi "Kunezwi elikhulumayo, okusho ukuthi" umphefumulo "Ukukhuluma! Incorporeal" umphefumulo "Ungabuye ukhulume!"
buza: " umphefumulo "Khuluma → Ingabe izindlebe zomuntu ziyakuzwa?"
impendulo: kuphela" umphefumulo "Ukhuluma, akekho ongakuzwa! Isibonelo, uma uthi buthule enhliziyweni yakho: "Sawubona" → lokhu " umphefumulo wokuphila "Khuluma! Kodwa lokhu" umphefumulo "Lapho ukhuluma, uma umsindo ungadluli ezindebeni zenyama, izindlebe zomuntu azikwazi ukuzwa, kuphela." umphefumulo wokuphila “Lapho imisindo ikhishwa ngolimi nezindebe, izindlebe zomuntu ziyakwazi ukuyizwa;
Esinye isibonelo ukuthi abantu abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi " ngaphandle komzimba "ukuphikisana, nini" umphefumulo "Ukushiya umzimba," umphefumulo "Ungawubona owakho umzimba. Kodwa umzimba womuntu iso lenyama Angiboni" umphefumulo ", angikwazi ukuthinta ngezandla" umphefumulo ", ayikwazi ukusetshenziswa ne " umphefumulo "Khuluma futhi akezwa" umphefumulo "Izwi elikhulumayo. Ngoba UNkulunkulu ungumoya →→Ngakho ngiyakwazi ukuzwa eka-Abela “ umphefumulo “Izwi lokukhuluma alizwakali ezindlebeni zethu zenyama futhi alibonakali ngamehlo ethu enqunu.

Ngokuqondene nabantu abangakholelwa ebukhoneni bukaNkulunkulu, abakholelwa ukuthi abantu banemiphefumulo bakholelwa ukuthi konke lokhu kuwukwazi nezifiso ezisemzimbeni womuntu Lapho lokhu kuqaphela kungasekho, umzimba uyafa ubuyele othulini, futhi abantu bayaphela, njengezilwane ezingenazo. Okufanayo. empeleni" umphefumulo "Nabangakwazi ukushiya isidumbu bahlale bodwa nabo bangakhuluma! Uyakuqonda lokhu? Kulungile! Mayelana" umphefumulo "Yilokho okwabelwana ngakho. Ngizokwabelana ngakho ngokuzayo【 ukusindiswa kwemiphefumulo ] Ake sixoxe ngakho ngokuningiliziwe.
(1) Ukuphila noma umphefumulo →→Bheka kuMathewu 16:25 Ngoba noma ubani ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe ( Ukuphila: noma umphefumulo ; okufanayo ngezansi) uyolahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami uyokuthola.
(2) Umphefumulo ukhulumela ubulungisa →→Bheka isAmbulo 6:9-10 Lapho livula uphawu lwesihlanu, ngabona ngaphansi kwe-altare labo ababulawa ngenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu nangenxa yobufakazi. Umphefumulo, umemeza kakhulu "Jehova, ongcwele noqinisileyo, koze kube nini ungahluleli abaphila emhlabeni, uphindisele igazi lethu na?"

2 Ukholo luka-Enoke

Ngokukholwa u-Enoke wathathwa ukuze angaboni ukufa, futhi akekho owayengamthola, ngoba uNkulunkulu wayesemkhulisile kakade; ( Hebheru 11:5 )

3 Ukholo lukaNowa

Ngokukholwa uNowa, owaxwayiswa nguNkulunkulu ngezinto ayengakaziboni, wenza ukwesaba okukhulu, wakha umkhumbi ukuze umkhaya wakhe usindiswe. Ngakho wasilahla leso sizukulwane, futhi yena ngokwakhe waba indlalifa yokulunga okuvela ekukholweni. ( Hebheru 11:7 )

4 Ukholo luka-Abrahama, u-Isaka, noJakobe

Ngokukholwa u-Abrahama walalela umyalo, waphuma waya endaweni ebizwa ngokuthi ifa, lapho ephuma, wayengazi lapho eya khona. Ngokukholwa wahlala eyisivakashi ezweni lesithembiso njengasezweni lezihambi, ehlala ematendeni, njengo-Isaka noJakobe, ababengamalungu esithembiso esifanayo. ( Hebheru 11:8-9 )

2. Bonke laba bantu bafa benokholo futhi abakutholanga lokho ababethenjisiwe.

Qaphela: Njengo-Abrahama, uNkulunkulu wathembisa ukuthi inzalo yakhe yayiyoba ngangezinkanyezi zezulu futhi ibe ngangesihlabathi esisogwini lolwandle ezingenakubalwa → kodwa akazange ayibone inzalo yakhe esaphila, futhi yafa ibe ningi njengezinkanyezi ezisemkhathini. isibhakabhaka. →→Ukukholwa kukaSara, noMose, noJosefa, noGideyoni, noBaraki, noSamsoni, noJefta, noDavide, noSamuweli, nabaprofethi... Abanye bakhuthazelela ukugconwa, nokubhaxabulwa, ngamaketanga, nokuboshwa, nokunye ukulingwa, bakhandwa ngamatshe, banqunywa ngesaha, balingwa, babulawa ngenkemba, bahambahamba bembethe izikhumba zezimvu nezimbuzi, bahlupheka, nosizi, nobuhlungu; ukuzulazula ehlane, izintaba, imigede, nasemigedeni engaphansi komhlaba, abantu abawufanelekeli umhlaba. →→
Laba bantu bakholelwa esithembisweni sikaNkulunkulu emhlabeni, kodwa basibona sisekude futhi basemukela ngenjabulo futhi bayavuma ukuthi bangabafokazi nezihambi emhlabeni. Abasho izinto ezinjalo bakhombisa ukuthi bafuna ukuthola ikhaya ezulwini, babekezelela ukugconwa, ukushaywa, ukuboshwa, ukuboshwa, nokulingwa yonke imihlobo, ukukhandwa ngamatshe, nokusaha, nokulingwa, nokubulawa kanye nabafileyo. bezulazula bembethe izikhumba zezimvu nezimbuzi, behlupheka , usizi, ukuhlupheka, ukuzulazula ehlane, ezintabeni, emigedeni, nasemigedeni engaphansi komhlaba → Ngenxa yokuthi ababona abezwe futhi abakufanelekele ukuba sezweni, bafa bengatholi lutho emhlabeni → Laba bantu basindiswe bonke Ofile ekukholweni akakakwamukelanga okwathenjiswayo. ( Hebheru 11:13-38 )

3. Ukuze bangapheleli ngaphandle uma bekwamukela kanye nathi

Bonke laba bantu bathola ubufakazi obuhle ngokholo, kodwa abakakutholi lokho okwathenjiswa, ngoba uNkulunkulu usilungiselele izinto ezingcono, ukuze bangabi ngabaphelele ngaphandle kokuba bakuthole kanye nathi. ( Hebheru 11:39-40 )

buza: Iyiphi into engcono uNkulunkulu asilungiselele yona?
impendulo: insindiso kaJesu Krestu →→ UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu Kristu, owaba yinyama → Wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu, wembelwa, futhi wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu. →→ Masilungisiswe, sizalwe kabusha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, sithole umzimba kaKristu, sithole ukuphila kukaKristu, sizuze ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, sithole uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, futhi sizuze ukuphila okuphakade! UNkulunkulu akagcini ngokusinika ubudodana, kodwa futhi usinika uvuko olusinika inkazimulo, imivuzo, imiqhele, nomzimba omuhle kakhulu! Amen.
Abantu basemandulo eTestamenteni Elidala bonke bafa benokholo, kodwa abawutholanga uMoya oNgcwele owawuthenjiswe nguNkulunkulu lapho befa! Ngaphandle kukaMoya oNgcwele, abukho ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu. Ngoba ngaleso sikhathi uJesu Kristu umsebenzi wokuhlenga 】Ayikaqedwa → ETestamenteni Elidala, noma uMoya oNgcwele ungahamba kumuntu, iNkosi uSawule iyisibonelo. UMoya oNgcwele akahlali emzimbeni omdala wesikhumba sewayini somuntu omdala; Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Bantu beTestamente Elisha, labo abakholelwa kuJesu esizukulwaneni sethu babusiswe kakhulu→→【 Umsebenzi kaKristu wokuhlenga usuphelile 】→→ Noma ubani okholwa kuJesu udla umzimba Wakhe—azuze umzimba Wakhe, aphuze igazi Lakhe—uzuza igazi Lakhe eliyigugu, uthola umphefumulo nokuphila kukaKristu, uthola ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Amen

Abantu eTestamenteni Elidala bonke bathola ubufakazi obuhle ngokukholwa, kodwa abazange bakuthole lokho ababethenjisiwe, ukuze kuthi uma bengakwemukeli kanye nathi, bangapheleliswa. Ngakho-ke, uNkulunkulu nakanjani uyovumela labo abaseTestamenteni Elidala abakholelwa kuNkulunkulu ukuba babusiswe njengathi futhi bazuze ifa lombuso wezulu ndawonye. Amen!

kanjalo" uPaul "Yithi → Uma sikholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa wabuye wavuka, futhi labo abalala kuJesu noJesu uyohlwithwa kanye nathi emafwini, ukuze kulondolozwe imiphefumulo nemizimba yabo futhi imizimba yabo ihlengwe. umzimba weqiniso ibonakala , ukuhlangabezana neNkosi emoyeni, futhi ngale ndlela, siyoba neNkosi kuze kube phakade. Amen ! Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( 1 Thesalonika 4:14-17 )

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Ukushumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu ivangeli elenza abantu basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo. Amen

Ihubo: Nkosi! ngilapha

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

KULUNGILE! Yilokho kuphela esikwabelana ngakho namuhla.

articles.title: Inqubekela-phambili Yomhambi WobuKristu (Isifundo 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuLuka isahluko 23 amavesi 42-43 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Wathi kuye: "Jesu, ngikhumbule, lapho usufike embusweni wakho."

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngeNqubekela phambili YePilgrim ndawonye “Ukufa Okuphelele, Ndawonye EPharadesi” Cha. 8 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi uqhubeke ukhanyisela amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Thatha isiphambano sakho nsuku zonke, futhi noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yeNkosi kanye nevangeli uyosindisa ukuphila kwakhe! Londoloza ukuphila ekuphileni okuphakade → ukufa okuphelele futhi uhlale epharadesi neNkosi → thola inkazimulo, umvuzo, nomqhele. Amen !

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Liyini ipharadesi? Likuphi ipharadesi?
impendulo: Ikhaya lasezulwini elijabulisayo, iTestamente Elidala lifanekisela iKhanani, izwe eligeleza ubisi nezinyosi, iTestamente Elisha yiJerusalema lasezulwini, umbuso wezulu, izulu, umbuso kaNkulunkulu, umbuso kaBaba, umbuso wabathandekayo; Ndodana, nedolobha lakubo elimangalisayo.

UmBhalo Oyisethenjwa:

Wathi: “Jesu, ngicela ungikhumbule lapho usufike embusweni wakho.” UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namuhla uzakuba nami eParadisi

Ngiyamazi umuntu ekuKristu owahlwithwa wayiswa ezulwini lesithathu eminyakeni eyishumi nane edlule (ukuthi wayesemzimbeni angazi, noma wayengaphandle komzimba yini, angazi; nguNkulunkulu yedwa owaziyo. ) Ngiyamazi lo muntu (Ukuthi wayesemzimbeni noma wayengaphandle komzimba, angazi, nguNkulunkulu kuphela). 2 Korinte 12:2-4

Onendlebe makezwe lokho akushoyo uMoya oNgcwele emabandleni! Onqobayo ngiyakumnika ukuba adle emthini wokuphila ePharadesi likaNkulunkulu. ’—IsAmbulo 2:7

【1】Ukushumayela ivangeli lensindiso

Ngakho-ke ningabesabi, ngokuba akukho okufihliweyo okungayikwambulwa, nokufihliweyo okungayikwaziwa. Engikukhulume ngasese kini, kukhulumeni obala, nalokho enikuzwa ezindlebeni zenu, kukhulumeni obala. Kumemezeleni endlini ningabesabi ababulala umzimba kepha bengenakuwubulala umphefumulo;

Qaphela: UJesu wasitshela “izimfihlo ezifihliwe kuze kube phakade” futhi washumayela ivangeli lensindiso! Amen. Ningabesabi ababulala umzimba kodwa bengakwazi ukubulala umphefumulo → Kodwa uNkulunkulu unamandla okuqinisa izinhliziyo zenu ngokwevangeli engalishumayelayo noJesu Kristu engamshumayelayo nangokwemfihlakalo efihliwe kuze kube phakade. Bheka kwabaseRoma 16:25

Ofakazi abaningi abafela ukholo

Qaphela: Njengoba sinofakazi abaningi kangaka abasihaqileyo njengefu, masilahle konke okusindayo nesono esisithandela kalula, futhi masiwugijime ngokubekezela umncintiswano obekwe phambi kwethu, sibheke kuMqalisi noMqalisi wokukholwa kwethu. .UJesu Wokugcina (noma ukuhumusha: ukubheka kuJesu ongumqambi nomphelelisi weqiniso). Ngenxa yentokozo eyayibekwe phambi kwakhe wakhuthazelela isiphambano, edelela ihlazo laso, futhi wahlala ngakwesokunene sesihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu. KumaHeberu Isahluko 12 Amavesi 1-2 → Abanjengo-Abela, uNowa, u-Abrahama, uSamsoni, uDaniyeli... nabanye abaprofethi, isela eliphendukile elabethelwa esiphambanweni noJesu, uStefanu, uJakobe Brothers, abaPhostoli, amaKristu Ngokukholwa banqoba imibuso eyizitha, benza ukulunga, bazuza izithembiso, bavala imilomo yezingonyama, bacisha amandla omlilo, baphunyuka obukhali benkemba, baba nesibindi empini, banqoba izizwe zabezizwe . Owesifazane wavuswa abakhe abafileyo. Abanye bakhuthazelela ukuhlushwa kanzima futhi benqaba ukukhululwa (umbhalo wokuqala wawuwukuhlengwa) ukuze bathole uvuko olungcono. Abanye bakhuthazelela ukugconwa, nokubhaxabulwa, ngamaketanga, nokuboshwa, nokunye ukulingwa, bakhandwa ngamatshe, banqunywa ngesaha, balingwa, babulawa ngenkemba, bahambahamba bembethe izikhumba zezimvu nezimbuzi, bahlupheka, nosizi, nobuhlungu; ukuzulazula ehlane, izintaba, imigede, nasemigedeni engaphansi komhlaba, abantu abawufanelekeli umhlaba. Bonke laba bantu bathola ubufakazi obuhle ngokholo, kodwa abakakutholi lokho okwathenjiswa, ngoba uNkulunkulu usilungiselele izinto ezingcono, ukuze bangabi ngabaphelele ngaphandle kokuba bakuthole kanye nathi. Hebheru 11:33-40

[2] Thatha isiphambano sakho nsuku zonke ulandele uJesu

UJesu wabe esethi esixukwini: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe imihla ngemihla, angilandele. Ukuphila; noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe “ngenxa yami” uyosindisa ukuphila kwakhe

1 Thatha isiphambano sakho, ulingise uKristu
KwabaseFilipi 3:10-11 ukuze ngimazi uKristu namandla okuvuka kwakhe, nokuba ngihlupheke kanye naye, ngifaniswe nokufa kwakhe, ukuze futhi ngizuze ukuvuka kwabafileyo “okuwukuthi, ukukhululwa kokuphila kwami. umzimba."

2 Ukulwa ukulwa okuhle
Njengoba “uPawulu” asho → manje ngithululwa njengomnikelo wokuphuzwayo, futhi ihora lokumuka kwami selifikile. Ngikulwile ukulwa okuhle, ngiliqedile ibanga, ngigcinile ukukholwa. Kusukela manje kubekelwe mina umqhele wokulunga, eyawunginika wona ngalolo suku iNkosi eyahlulela ngokulunga; Bheka kweyesi-2 Thimothewu Isahluko 4 Amavesi 6-8

3 Isikhathi sokusuka etendeni sesifikile
Njengoba “uPetru” esho → ngibone kudingekile ukuba nginikhumbuze futhi nginikhuthaze ngisekuleli tende ngokwazi ukuthi siyeza isikhathi sokuba ngiphume kuleli tende, njengoba iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ingibonisile. Futhi ngizokwenza konke okusemandleni ami ukugcina lezi zinto esikhumbuzweni sakho ngemva kokufa kwami. 2 Petru 1:13-15

4 Babusisiwe abafela eNkosini
Ngezwa izwi livela ezulwini lithi: “Loba ukuthi: Kusukela manje kuqhubeke, babusisiwe abafileyo eNkosini! ” IsAmbulo 14:13

【3】Inqubekelaphambili YePilgrim isiphelile, sindawonye ePharadesi

(1) AmaKristu ayabaleka ekhaya

AmaKristu athatha isiphambano sawo alandele uJesu, ashumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu, futhi aqhube iNtuthuko Yomhambi:

isigaba sokuqala " Kholwa ekufeni “Izoni” ezikholelwa kumuntu omdala ziyofa;
isigaba sesibili " Bona ukufa “Bheka, izoni ziyafa; bheka, abasha bayaphila.
Isigaba sesithathu " Ukuzonda ukufa “Zonda ukuphila kwakho, ukulondolozele ukuphila okuphakade.
Isigaba 4 " Ufuna ukufa “Bethela esiphambanweni kanye noKristu ukuze kucekelwe phansi umzimba wesono futhi ningabe nisaba isigqila sesono.
isigaba sesihlanu " Buyela ekufeni “Ngokubhapathizwa nihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, futhi niyohlanganiswa naye ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe.
Isiteji sesithupha " qalisa Ukufa” kwembula impilo kaJesu.
Isigaba 7 " ukuzwa ukufa “Uma nihlupheka kanye noKristu esigabeni sokuvangela, niyokhazinyuliswa kanye Naye.
Isigaba 8 " Ukufa okuphelele “Itende lenyama ladilizwa uNkulunkulu → lapho inkazimulo , umvuzo , umqhele Igcinelwe thina → ePharadesi noKristu. Amen!

(2)Ukuba neNkosi epharadesi

NgokukaJohane Isahluko 17 Verse 4 Ngikukhazimulisile emhlabeni, njengoba ngiwufezile umsebenzi onginike wona ukuba ngiwenze.
NgokukaLuka 23:43 UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namuhla uzakuba nami eParadisi.
IsAmbulo 2:7 Onqobayo ngiyakumnika ukuba adle emthini wokuphila oseParadisi likaNkulunkulu. "

(3) Umoya, umphefumulo nomzimba kuyalondolozwa

UNkulunkulu ngokwakhe uzoniphelelisa: uNkulunkulu womusa wonke owanibizela enkazimulweni yakhe yaphakade kuKristu, senihluphekile isikhashana, yena uqobo uyakuniphelelisa, aniqinise, aniphe amandla. Amandla makube kuye kuze kube phakade naphakade. Amen! 1 Petru 5:10-11

Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokupheleleyo! Futhi ngethemba eyakho Umoya, umphefumulo nomzimba kuyalondolozwa , ngingenasici ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, futhi uyokwenza. 1 Thesalonika 5:23-24

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: Zonke izizwe ziyofika zidumise uJehova

Yamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sakho ukusesha - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

Isikhathi: 2021-07-28

articles.title: Inqubekela-phambili Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Korinte 15, amavesi 3-4, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Enganinikela khona futhi: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi wangcwatshwa ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo, uma safa kanye noKristu hlala Naye; 2 Thimothewu 2:11

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngeNqubekela phambili YePilgrim ndawonye ngezikhathi ezithile "Ukubona ukufa, impilo iqala kuwe" Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu nelodumo lwenu nokuhlengwa komzimba wenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi uqhubeke ukhanyisela amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Qonda ukuthi sithatha isiphambano sethu futhi sibhekane nokufa ukuze impilo kaJesu yembulwe kithi! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Akuseyimi ophilayo, nguKristu ophilayo ngenxa yami.

Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; Galathiya 2:20
Ngoba kimi, ukuphila kunguKristu, futhi ukufa kuyinzuzo. Filipi 1:21 .

buza: Manje akuseyena ophilayo → Ubani ophilayo?
impendulo: NguKristu ophila kimi → "ophila" kimi → ngoba ngiphila nguKristu; Kristu. Enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu uBaba. Amen! →Ngakho “uPawulu” wathi kwabaseFilipi 1:21 →Kimi ukuphila kunguKristu, nokufa kuyinzuzo. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Okwesibili: Sihlupheka kanye Naye, futhi sizokhazinyuliswa kanye Naye

buza: "Izihlupheki noKristu" Inhloso "Kwenzenjani?"
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Simiselwe ukuhlupheka

Kufanele sidlule ebunzimeni obuningi ukuze singene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. IzEnzo 14:22
Ukuze kungabikho muntu onyakaziswa izinsizi ezihlukahlukene. Ngokuba nina ngokwenu niyazi ukuthi kumiselwe ukuba sihlupheke. 1 Thesalonika 3:3

(2) Injabulo enkulu phakathi kwazo zonke izinhlobo zezilingo

Kungathi kuyinjabulo yonke lapho nibhekene nezilingo eziningi, nazi ukuthi ukuvivinywa kokholo lwenu kuveza ukukhuthazela. Kepha ukubekezela makuphumelele, ukuze nina, "thina," nibe ngabaphelele futhi abaphelele, ningantuli lutho. Jakobe 1:2-4
Jabulani ethembeni; bekezelani osizini; Roma 12:12

(3) Ukuhlupheka umzimba wenyama kanye nokugqashula esonweni

Njengoba iNkosi yahlupheka enyameni, nani kufanele nisebenzise lolu hlobo lomqondo njengesikhali, ngoba lowo ohlupheke enyameni useyekile ukona. Inkomba (1 Petru 4:1)

(4) Masidunyiswe!

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. Roma 8:17

Qaphela: Uma uhlupheka emhlabeni ngokubulala abantu, ukulunguza, ukwenza ububi, kanye nokuba nomsindo, uhlushwa ukuhlupheka kwakho "kokuCantonese" akukona ukuhlupheka endleleni yeNkosi lezi zinhlupheko. Ngakho, ingabe kucacile?
Kodwa makungabikho noyedwa phakathi kwenu ohluphekayo ngoba ebulala, eba, noma esenza okubi, noma egabadela. ( 1 Petru 4:15 )

3. Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu

Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane. …

1 sebenzisa iqiniso njengebhande lokubopha okhalo;
2 sebenzisa ubulungisa Yisebenzise njengesihlangu sesifuba ukumboza isifuba sakho,
3 Sebenzisa futhi Ukuphepha Ivangeli kufanele libekwe ezinyaweni zakho njengezicathulo zokukulungiselela ukuhamba.
4 Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukubamba ukholo njengesihlangu sokucima yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi;
5 bese wembatha insindiso umakalabha,
6 bamba UMoya oNgcwele Inkemba yakhe iyizwi likaNkulunkulu;
7 Ukuthembela kuMoya oNgcwele, uhlale ukulungele ngazo zonke izindlela thandazela 4 lindani, ningakhathali kulokhu, nikhulekele abangcwele bonke. Bheka eyabase-Efesu 6:10-18

4. Zizwa ngendlela yeNkosi → Ukuphila kuzoqala kuwe

(1) Kholwa evangelini lensindiso
Engakunikeza futhi kini yilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, ekhululiwe esonweni, nasemthethweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, wembelwa, ekhumula umuntu omdala nesiqalekiso. yomthetho Ukuziphatha komuntu omdala; futhi ngokweBhayibheli, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → ukuze silungisiswe, sizalwe kabusha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade. Amen! 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(2) Kholwa ukuthi ikhehla lifile

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:3-4

(3)Yizwani indlela yeNkosi

" fa "Yenza ngaphakathi kwethu,
" wazalwa "Kepha kuyasebenza kini. Reference (2 Korinte 4:10-12)

Thatha isiphambano sakho nsuku zonke futhi ulandele uJesu:
1 thatha indlela yesiphambano →Bhubhisa umzimba wesono,
2 Thatha indlela kamoya →Khuluma ngezinto ezingokomoya,
3 Thatha indlela eya ezulwini →Shumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu.

Isigaba sesithathu " Ukuzonda ukufa “Zonda ukuphila kwakho, ukulondolozele ukuphila okuphakade;

" Izwa impilo " Omusha “KuKristu” inhliziyo iyenziwa ibentsha usuku nosuku futhi ikhulela ekubeni umuntu omdala, egcwele isimo sikaKristu! Amen!

【 Qaphela: 】 →→Isigaba sesikhombisa isigaba sokushumayela ivangeli nokushumayela iqiniso.
