articles.title: Intuthuko Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Korinte 4, amavesi 7 no-12, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Le ngcebo sinayo ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. …Kanjalo kithi kusebenza ukufa, kepha kini kusebenza ukuphila.

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngeNqubekela phambili YePilgrim ndawonye “Ukuqala Ukufa Ukuze Kwembule Ukuphila KukaJesu” Cha. 6 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu nelodumo lwenu nokuhlengwa komzimba wenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi ukufa kukaJesu kusebenza kithi ukususa ukusoka kwenkanuko; Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Faka umcebo esitsheni sobumba

(1)Ingane

buza: Lisho ukuthini elithi "baby"?
impendulo: “Ingcebo” ibhekisa kuMoya oNgcwele weqiniso, uMoya kaJesu, kanye noMoya kaBaba waseZulwini!
Ngiyakucela kuBaba, aninike omunye uMduduzi ukuba abe nani kuze kube phakade, uMoya weqiniso, lowo izwe elingemamukele, ngokuba lingamboni. Kepha nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhlala nani, futhi ukini. Bheka uJohane 14:16-17
Ngokuba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu, omemeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” ( KwabaseGalathiya 4:6 )
Ogcina imiyalo kaNkulunkulu uhlala kuNkulunkulu, noNkulunkulu uhlala kuye. Siyazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu uhlala kithi ngenxa kaMoya oNgcwele asinike wona. Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:24

(2)Ubumba

buza: Kusho ukuthini "ubumba"?
impendulo: Izitsha zobumba ziyizitsha ezenziwe ngobumba
1 babe" Igolide nesiliva ” → Njengesitsha esiyigugu, kuyisingathekiso somuntu ozelwe kabusha futhi wasindiswa, umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu.
2 babe" izitsha zobumba ”→Njengesitsha esithobekile, kuyisingathekiso somuntu othobekile, indoda endala yenyama.
Emndenini ocebile, azikho izitsha zegolide nezesiliva kuphela, kodwa futhi nezitsha zokhuni nezitsha zobumba; Uma umuntu ezihlanza kokuphansi, uyakuba yisitsha esihloniphekayo, esingcwelisiwe, esiwusizo eNkosini, esilungiselwe yonke imisebenzi emihle. Bheka eyesi-2 Thimothewu 2:20-21;
UNkulunkulu uyovivinya umsebenzi womuntu ngamunye wokwakha ngomlilo ukuze abone ukuthi ungema yini - bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 3:11-15.
Anazi yini ukuthi umzimba wenu uyithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele na? Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 6:19-20.

[Qaphela]: Ukukhululwa ezintweni eziphansi → kubhekisela kumuntu omdala ohlukanisiwe nenyama, ngoba umuntu omdala ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena owenyama → bhekisela kwabaseRoma 8:9; isitsha sodumo, esingcwelisiwe, esilungele ukusetshenziswa yiNkosi, futhi silungiselwe ukuhamba zonke izinhlobo zezenzo ezinhle →【 izitsha eziyigugu ] libhekisela emzimbeni weNkosi uKristu, [ izitsha zobumba 】Liphinde libhekisele emzimbeni kaKristu → uNkulunkulu "uzowugcina umcebo" UMoya oNgcwele "beka" izitsha zobumba "Umzimba kaKristu → wembula ukuphila kukaJesu! Njengoba nje ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni kwakhazimulisa uNkulunkulu uBaba, ukuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo kwazalwa kabusha → UNkulunkulu uyokwenza futhi" ingane “sabekwa kithi esizelwe nguNkulunkulu njengezitsha zodumo” izitsha zobumba “Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe, lokhu” ingane “Amandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, awaveli kithi,” ingane "Ukwembula impilo kaJesu! Amen. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

2. Injongo kaNkulunkulu yokuqala ukufa kithi

(1) Umfanekiso wohlamvu lukakolweni

Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi uhlamvu lukakolweni luwele emhlabathini futhi lufe, luhlala luhlala lunye kuphela uhlamvu olulodwa; Othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; ozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyakukulondela ukuphila okuphakade. Johane 12:24-25

(2)Usufile

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:3-4

(3) Babusisiwe abafela eNkosini

Babusisiwe abafela eNkosini. “Yebo,” kusho uMoya oNgcwele, “baphumula ekukhandlekeni kwabo, nesithelo somsebenzi wabo sabalandela. ” IsAmbulo 14:13.

Qaphela: Inhloso kaNkulunkulu ngokudala ukufa kithi yile:

1 Ukusoka ukususa inyama: UKristu “uyakulahla” ukusoka enyameni - bheka kwabaseKolose 2:11.
2 Ifanele ukusetshenziswa okuyinhloko: Uma umuntu ezihlanza kokuphansi, uyakuba yisitsha esihloniphekayo, esingcwelisiwe, esiwusizo eNkosini, esilungiselwe yonke imisebenzi emihle. Bheka ku-2 Thimothewu isahluko 2 ivesi 21. Ingabe uyaqonda?

3. Ukuphila akuseyimi, ngibonisa impilo kaJesu

(1) Ukuphila akuseyena

Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; Bheka kwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 2 Ivesi 20
Ngoba kimi, ukuphila kunguKristu, futhi ukufa kuyinzuzo. Bheka eyabaseFilipi 1:21

(2) UNkulunkulu wabeka “ingcebo” “esitsheni sobumba”

Sinale “ngcebo” kaMoya oNgcwele ebekwe “esitsheni sobumba” ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:7-9

(3) Ukufa kuyasebenza kithi ukuze kwembule ukuphila kukaJesu

Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi. Ngoba thina esiphilayo sihlala sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emizimbeni yethu efayo. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:10-11.

Qaphela: UNkulunkulu wenza kusebenze ukufa kithi ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe emizimbeni yethu efayo → ukukhombisa ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi → ngale ndlela, ukufa kusebenza kithi → abaphilayo Akusemina → Sekusemina “UJesu Owambuliwe” → lapho ubona uMsindisi, bheka kuJesu, kholwa kuJesu → wazalwa Kodwa iyasebenza kuwe . Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

UNkulunkulu wenza kusebenze ukufa kithi futhi ahlangabezane "nezwi leNkosi" → Wonke umuntu uthola isipho sokukholwa ngendlela ehlukile, abanye bade noma bafushane, abanye abantu banesikhathi esifushane kakhulu, kanti abanye abantu banesikhathi eside kakhulu, iminyaka emithathu, eyishumi iminyaka, noma amashumi eminyaka . UNkulunkulu ubeke “ingcebo” “ezitsheni zethu zobumba” ukuze abonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu → UMoya Ongcwele ubonakala kubo bonke abantu kube kuhle → Wanikeza abanye abaphostoli, abanye abaprofethi, futhi abanye Labo abashumayela ivangeli bahlanganisa abefundisi nabafundisi → Indoda le yaphiwa amazwi okuhlakanipha nguMoya oNgcwele, enye indoda yaphiwa amazwi olwazi ngoMoya oNgcwele. Omunye angenza izimangaliso, omunye abe ngumphrofethi, omunye ahlukanise imimoya, omunye akhulume ngezilimi, omunye ahumushe izilimi. Konke lokhu kwenziwa nguMoya oNgcwele futhi kwabelwa umuntu ngamunye ngokwentando yakhe. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 12:8-11

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Amagugu abekwe ezitsheni zobumba

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nani nonke. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

Isikhathi: 2021-07-26

articles.title: Intuthuko Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyabaseRoma Isahluko 6 Ivesi 4 Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise.

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngeNqubekela phambili YePilgrim ndawonye ngezikhathi ezithile "Ekufeni KukaKristu Ngokubhapathizwa" Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso angokomoya → Ukubhapathizelwa ekufeni kwenza konke ukunyakaza kwethu kufaniswe nokuphila okusha. ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) ekufeni ngobhapathizo

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufeni kwakhe, siyakuba munye naye ekuvukeni kwaKhe;

buza: Iyini “inhloso” yokubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu →?
impendulo: "Inhloso" ithi →

1 Hlanganyela naye ngesimo sokufa → abhubhise umzimba wesono;
2 Hlanganyela naye ngesimo sovuko → usinike impilo entsha kukho konke umnyakazo! Amen.

Qaphela: Wabhapathizelwa “ekufeni” → ekufeni kukaKristu, efa kanye Naye, uKristu washiya umhlaba futhi walengiswa esihlahleni “ fa umile ” → Kungukufa okukhazimulayo AmaKristu abhapathizwa, futhi nguNkulunkulu osenza sikhazinyuliswe u-Adamu ewela phansi noma elele phansi, okuwukufa okuyihlazo UKristu Kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba amakholwa “abhapathizwe” Ukubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu kuwukuba ukhazinyuliswe Ingabe uyakuqonda kahle lokhu?

(2) Bahlanganiswe naye esimweni sokufa

Uma siye sahlanganiswa naye ekufeni kwakhe, siyohlanganiswa naye ekuvukeni kwakhe okufana nokwakhe ( Roma 6:5 )
buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufeni kwaKhe?
impendulo: "Bhabhaphathizwa"! Unquma “ukubhapathizwa” → ukubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu → okungukuthi ukuhlanganiswa Naye ekufeni okufana nokufa Kwakhe → ukubethelwa! Nabhapathizwa, “ekufeni” kukaKristu! UNkulunkulu uzokuvumela ukuba ubethelwe kanye Naye . Ngakho-ke iNkosi uJesu yathi → Bekani ijoka lami phezu kwenu nifunde kimi, ngokuba ijoka lami lilula nomthwalo wami ulula → “Nabhapathizelwa” ekufeni Kwakhe, futhi nabalelwa esiphambanweni noKristu, akulula yini bahlanganiswe naye ekufaneni kokufa na? Ingabe umthwalo ulula? Yebo, kunjalo! Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6 : Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono;

(3) Hlanganani Naye ekufaneni kokuvuka Kwakhe

buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufaneni Kwakhe kokuvuka?
impendulo: Yidla uphuze iSidlo seNkosi! Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa nina; Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami. →Lowo odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, uhlala kimi, nami kuye.

Qaphela: Yidla uphuze okweNkosi Inyama futhi Igazi →→Ingabe umzimba weNkosi unomumo? Yebo! Lapho sidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa, ingabe sidla futhi siphuze “ umumo "Umzimba negazi leNkosi? Yebo! →→ Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade, mina-ke ngiyomvusa ngosuku lokugcina (Johane 6:54). uyovuswa kwabafileyo Sihlanganiswe Naye esimweni saKhe Ngaso sonke isikhathi sidla isidlo seNkosi sakusihlwa, okwandisa ukholo lwethu lusuka ekukholweni, lusuka emandleni luye enkazimulweni, kanye nokuphila okusha usuku nosuku indlela, niyezwa?

(4) Sinikeze isitayela esisha kukho konke umnyakazo esiwenzayo

Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:17
nenziwe basha engqondweni yenu, nembathe umuntu omusha owadalwa ngokomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele. Bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:23-24

(5) Phuzani kuMoya oNgcwele munye futhi nibe umzimba munye

Njengoba nje umzimba umunye kodwa unezitho eziningi, futhi nakuba izitho ziziningi, zisewumzimba owodwa, kunjalo nangoKristu. Noma singamaJuda noma singamaGreki, noma siyizigqila noma sikhululekile, sonke sabhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele munye, saba umzimba munye, futhi siphuza uMoya oNgcwele munye. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 12:12-13

(6) Yakhani umzimba kaKristu, nihlanganiswe ekukholweni, nikhule, nizakhe othandweni.

Wanikeza abanye abaphostoli, abanye abaprofethi, abanye abavangeli, abanye abelusi nabafundisi, ukuze abangcwele bahlomele umsebenzi wenkonzo, nokwakha umzimba kaKristu, size sifinyelele sonke ebunyeni bokukholwa nasekwazini uNkulunkulu. Indodana yakhe yakhula yaba yindoda evuthiweyo, yafinyelela esimweni sokugcwala kukaKristu, okwathi ngaye umzimba wonke uhlanganiswa ngokufaneleyo, nezitho zonke zisebenzela injongo yawo, nelungu ngalinye lisekelana ngokomsebenzi umzimba wonke, ukuze umzimba ukhule, futhi nizakhe othandweni. Bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:11-13, 16

[Qaphela]: Sihlanganiswe noKristu “ngobhapathizo” → ukufa nokungcwatshwa kanye Naye → Uma siye sahlanganiswa Naye ngokufana nokufa Kwakhe, siyophinde sihlanganiswe Naye ekufananeni kokuvuka Kwakhe → Ngazo zonke izenzo esizenzile Kukhona izitayela ezintsha. NjengoKristu owavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. →Gqoka umuntu omusha, nembathe uKristu, niphuze kuMoya oNgcwele munye, futhi nibe umzimba munye → "YiBandla likaJesu Kristu" →Yidla ukudla okungokomoya futhi niphuze amanzi omoya kuKristu, futhi nikhule nibe yindoda evuthiwe, egcwele wesiqu sokugcwala kukaKristu → Ngaye wonke umzimba uhlanganiswa ngokufanele, futhi wonke amalunga anomsebenzi wawo, futhi asizana omunye nomunye ngokomsebenzi wesitho ngasinye, ukuze umzimba ukhule futhi uzakhe ngaphakathi uthando. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(7) Landela ezinyathelweni zeNkosi

Lapho amaKristu egijima iNtuthuko Yomhambi, awagijimi ewodwa, kodwa ajoyina ibutho elikhulu Wonke umuntu uyasizana futhi athandane kuKristu futhi agijime ndawonye → sibheke kuJesu, umsunguli nomphelelisi wokholo lwethu → gijimani niqonde esiphambanweni. , futhi sifanele ukwamukela umklomelo wokubizwa okuphezulu kukaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu. Bheka eyabaseFilipi 3:14 .

NjengesiHlabelelo SeziHlabelelo 1:8 Umuhle kakhulu phakathi kwabesifazane→" owesifazane "Ngokubhekisela ebandleni, kakade usebandleni likaJesu Kristu" → Uma ungazi, vele ulandele izinyathelo zezimvu...!

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Usefile, usengcwatshiwe

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nani nonke. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 4)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:14-15 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela; phila .

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngeNqubekela phambili YePilgrim ndawonye "Ngoba ngifuna ukuhlanganiswa noKristu futhi ngibethelwe esiphambanweni" Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi: ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo yethu, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso angokomoya → Uthando lukaKristu luyangikhuthaza ngoba ngifuna ukuba umuntu omdala abethelwe kanye naye ukuze kubhidlizwe umzimba wesono ukuze singabe sisaba izigqila zesono. . Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza

Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasishukumisela ngoba "ngifuna" ukuhlanganiswa Naye ngendlela yokufa - ukubethelwa, ukufa nokungcwatshwa ndawonye → ukusikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho. , futhi kusukela kumuntu omdala Kanye nokuziphatha komuntu omdala, ukuze konke ukunyakaza esikwenzayo kunesitayela esisha! Amen

buza: Luyini uthando lukaKristu?
impendulo: UKristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → wasikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, futhi wembelwa → wakhumula umuntu omdala nemikhuba yakhe, futhi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → ukuze asenze Ukulungisiswa "UJesu UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wasenza kabusha → ukuze samukele ukutholwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! UNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi wathumela iNdodana yakhe ukuba ibe yinhlawulo yezono zethu.

2. Ngoba sifuna ukuhlanganiswa naye esimweni sokufa

buza: Ngoba sicabangani?
impendulo: Ngoba sifuna ukuhlanganiswa naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe→“uKristu” umuntu oyedwa” okwe “Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa → bonke bayafa → abafileyo bayakhululwa esonweni → ngakho bonke bayakhululwa esonweni - Bheka amaRoma 6:7.
futhi yena" okwe "Bonke bafa," okwe "Ungcwatshwe yibo bonke → "uvuswe kwabafileyo" → futhi" okwe "Wonke umuntu uyaphila! Amen. → Ukuze labo abaphilayo bangabe besaziphilela bona." Indoda endala “Philelani iNkosi eyafa yabuye yavuka ngenxa yabo.” ( KwabaseGalathiya 2:20 )

3. Hlangana Naye ngesimo sokuvuka

buza: Ingabe siphilela iNkosi manje? Noma uKristu uphilela thina?
impendulo: UKristu hhayi kuphela okwe "Siyafa," okwe "Singcwatshiwe kodwa" okwe "Siphila! Impilo yami entsha ihlezi kuKristu! Amen → Ngokwesibonelo, "UKristu uyimpande yokuphila, futhi thina singamagatsha akhe axhunywe empandeni → ayimpande." bamba “Njengoba amagatsha ephila, amagatsha mawathele izithelo ezengeziwe zikaMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Qaphela: Hhayi mina" okwe "UJehova uyaphila, kodwa uJehova" okwe "Ngiyaphila; hhayi igatsha" okwe "Izimpande zomuthi ziyaphila → ziyizimpande zomuthi" vumela "Amagatsha aphila futhi athela izithelo eziningi. Lokho kucace ngokwanele!"
Ubheka amabandla amaningi namuhla" sebenzisa amandla "Umhlaba kufanele uphilele uJehova, hhayi" sebenzisa amandla "Kholwa ukuthi iNkosi inakho" okwe "Siphila. → Uma ngiphila, philani u-Adamu, philani isoni; uKristu ungiphilela → philani uKristu, philani inkazimulo, ukulunga, isihe nobungcwele bukaNkulunkulu uBaba. → Njengoba umphostoli "uPawulu" asho Sengibethelwe kanye noKristu, akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ukimi. kwami “Uyaphila; bheka kwabaseGalathiya 2:20
Ngakho manje sengiyaqonda insindiso kaKristu → Akusemina ophilayo, sekunguKristu." okwe "Siphila → ngoba sifuna ukuhlanganiswa naye esiphambanweni sakhe, ukufa nokungcwatshwa → ukubhubhisa umzimba wesono futhi singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono. Gqoka ubuntu obusha futhi ukhumule ubuntu obudala.

Lena Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi WobuKristu" Yizwani indlela yeNkosi " Isigaba 4 : Ngoba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela; Ufuna ukufa "→ Ufuna ukumjoyina esimweni sokufa :

isigaba sokuqala " incwadi "Ukufa" kusho ukuthi ikhehla liyafa,
isigaba sesibili " bheka “Ukufa” uzibheka njengomuntu ofile esonweni,
Isigaba sesithathu " inzondo Ukufa "ukuphila okuzonda isono,
Isigaba 4 " cabanga "Ukufa" kufuna ukuhlanganiswa Naye esimweni sokufa, ukubethelwa, ukufa nokungcwatshwa → umzimba wesono uyabhujiswa, ukhumule umzimba wesono nomuntu omdala; ngokufana nokuvuka Kwakhe, ukuze konke umnyakazo esiwenzayo ube nempilo entsha, sidumise uNkulunkulu uBaba, uyaqonda kahle?

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kuqhutshwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nani nonke. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 12 ivesi 25 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; ozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyakukulondela ukuphila okuphakade.

Namuhla siyaqhubeka sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye - Inqubekelaphambili Ye-Christian Pilgrim Zonda impilo yakho, gcina impilo yakho kuze kube phakade 》Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi, ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, nenkazimulo, nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso angokomoya → Zondani ukuphila kwenu okunesono; ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

NgokukaJohane 12:25 Lowo othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho;

1. Kwazise ukuphila kwakho

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukwazisa ukuphila kwakho?
impendulo: "Uthando" lisho uthando nothando! "Yazisa" isho ukuthi iyancisha futhi iyancisha. “Ukwazisa” ukuphila komuntu siqu kuwukuthanda, ukuthanda, ukwazisa, ukunakekela, nokuvikela ukuphila komuntu siqu!

2. Ulahlekelwe ukuphila kwakho

buza: Njengoba ukwazisa ukuphila kwakho, kungani kufanele ulahlekelwe yikho?
impendulo: " lahlekelwa "Kusho ukuyeka nokulahlekelwa. Ukulahlekelwa ukuphila kusho ukuyeka nokulahlekelwa ukuphila kwakho! →→" Lahla "Ngenxa nje yenzuzo → kubizwa ukuyeka;" ilahlekile "Ukuze nje uyibuyise→ ukulahlekelwa ukuphila komuntu , Kuwukuba nokuphila kweNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Uma ninokuphila kweNdodana kaNkulunkulu, niyoba nokuphila okuphakade. ! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka ku 1 Johane 5:11-12 Lobu bufakazi buwukuthi uNkulunkulu usinike ukuphila okuphakade; Uma umuntu eneNdodana kaNkulunkulu, unokuphila; uma engenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, akanakho ukuphila. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Ungakuthola kanjani ukuphila okuphakade? Ingabe ikhona indlela?
impendulo: ukuphenduka →→ Kholwa yivangeli!

Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"
futhi indlela eya enkazimulweni → Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu → Lahla ukuphila kwakho → Hlanganyeni Naye ekufaneni kokufa, futhi niyohlanganiswa Naye ngokufana nokuvuka Kwakhe → “UJesu” wabe esebizela kuso isixuku nabafundi bakhe futhi wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, khona-ke; Zidele, uthabathe isiphambano sakho, ungilandele;

Qaphela:

thola" ukuphila okuphakade "Indlela → yiyo" incwadi "Ivangeli! Kholwani ukuthi uKristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wangcwatshwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu → ukuze silungisiswe, sizalwe kabusha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, samukelwe njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen . Lena Indlela yokuthola ukuphila okuphakade → Kholwa evangelini!

indlela eya enkazimulweni →Bunye noKristu ekufaneni kokufa, futhi uhlanganiswe Naye ekufananeni kokuvuka Kwakhe. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:3-4

3. Labo abazonda ukuphila kwabo emhlabeni

(1) Thina esingabenyama sithengisiwe esonweni

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kodwa mina ngingowenyama, ngithengiswe esonweni, okungukuthi, usebenzela isono, uyisigqila sesono. Isikhombo (Roma 7:14)

(2) Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; ( 1 Johane 3:9 )

(3) Ukuzonda ukuphila komuntu emhlabeni

buza: Kungani uzonda ukuphila kwakho kulo mhlaba?
impendulo: Ngoba nikholiwe evangelini nakuKristu, nonke ningabantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu→→

1 Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona;

2 Umuntu omdala ozelwe enyameni, umuntu wenyama uthengiswe esonweni → uthanda umthetho wesono futhi ungumeqi womthetho;

3 Lowo ozonda ukuphila kwakhe emhlabeni.

buza: Kungani uzonda impilo yakho?
impendulo: Yilokhu esikwabelana nawe namuhla → Lowo ozonda ukuphila kwakhe kufanele alondoloze ukuphila kwakhe kuze kube phakade! Amen

Qaphela: Ezindabeni ezimbili zokuqala, sixoxile futhi sabelane nawe, Uhambo LukaKristu Lokuvakasha →
1. Ukukholelwa kumuntu omdala “yisoni” kuzofa, kodwa ukukholelwa kumuntu omusha kuyophila;
2 Bona umuntu omdala efa, futhi ubone umuntu omusha ephila.
3 Zonda ukuphila, ulondoloze ukuphila okuphakade.
Ukuqhuba iNtuthuko yePilgrim wukuthola indlela yeNkosi, kholwani.” umgwaqo "Ukufa kukaJesu, okusebenzayo ebuntwini bethu obudala, kuyokwambulwa kulo muntu ofayo." ingane "Impilo kaJesu! → Ukuzizonda" impilo yesono yomuntu omdala "isigaba sesithathu seNtuthuko Yomhambi WobuKrestu. Uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

Umoya nenyama empini

(1)Zonda umzimba wokufa

Njengoba “uPawulu” esho! Ngingowenyama futhi ngithengisiwe esonweni ngifuna "okusha" kodwa angikwenzi "okusha" kodwa ngizimisele ukwenza "okudala". Ngisho noma kunjalo, akuyena "omusha" owenzayo, kodwa "isono" esihlala kimi → Akukho okuhle kumuntu "omdala". "Okusha" Ngithanda umthetho kaNkulunkulu → "umthetho wothando, umthetho wokungalahlwa, umthetho kaMoya oNgcwele → umthetho onikeza ukuphila futhi oholela ekuphileni okuphakade" "endala" inyama yami ithobela umthetho we isono → siyangithumba futhi singibiza Ngigcina umthetho wesono ezithweni zami. Ngilusizi kakhulu! Ngubani ongangisindisa kulomzimba wokufa na? Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Isikhombo- KwabaseRoma 7:14-25

(2)Zonda umzimba ofayo

→Siyabubula, sishikashikeka kuleli tende, singathandi ukukuhlubula lokhu, kepha ukugqoka lokhu, ukuze lokhu okufayo kugingwe wukuphila. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 5:4

(3)Zonda umzimba owonakalayo

Nikhumule ubuntu benu obudala, owonakaliswa yizinkanuko zenkohliso, bheka kwabase-Efesu 4:22.

(4)Zonda umzimba ogulayo

→ U-Elisha wayegulela ukufa, 2 AmaKhosi 13:14 . Lapho ninikela ngezimpumputhe, akukubi lokhu na? Akubi yini ukuhlabela izinyonga nezigulayo? Bheka uMathewu 1:8

Qaphela: Sizalwa nguNkulunkulu" Omusha "Ukuphila akukona okwenyama → umzimba wokufa, umzimba ofayo, umzimba obolayo, umzimba wokugula → indoda endala inezinkanuko nezifiso ezimbi, ngakho iyakuzonda → Ukukhuluma ngamehlo akho, ukukhombisa ngezinyawo zakho, ukhomba ngeminwe yakho, unenhliziyo embi, njalo uceba amacebo amabi, uhlwanyela ukuxabana → Kukhona izinto eziyisithupha uJehova azizondayo, eziyisikhombisa eziyisinengiso enhliziyweni yakhe: amehlo azidlayo, ulimi lwamanga, izandla ezichitha igazi elingenacala, nenhliziyo eceba amacebo amabi, nezinyawo ezishesha ukwenza okubi, nofakazi wamanga ophafuza amanga, nohlwanyela ukuxabana phakathi kwabazalwane -19).

buza: Uyizonda ngayiphi indlela impilo yakho yakudala?

articles.title: Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi OngumKristu (Isifundo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 6 amavesi 10-11 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Wafa esonweni kanye; Kanjalo nani kufanele nizisho ukuthi ningabafileyo esonweni, kodwa niphilele uNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu.

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nawe - Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi WobuKristu “Bheka” bayafa izoni, “bheka, bayaphila abasha 》Cha. 2 khuluma! Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi, abaloba ngazo futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yakho, inkazimulo yakho, nokuhlengwa komzimba wakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuba ikhanyisele amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda uhambo lukamoya lomKristu: Kholwa ekufeni komuntu omdala futhi ufe kanye noKristu; ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Buka impilo yabasanda kungena

(1) Uma niphila kuKristu, aniyikulahlwa

Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu: Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. —Izikhombo (Roma 8:1-2)

(2) Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; Isikhombo (1 Johane 3:9 kanye 5:18)

(3) Ukuphila kwethu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. —Izikhombo (Kolose 3:3-4)

(4) Bheka “umuntu omusha” evuselelwa usuku nosuku kuKristu

Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; —Izikhombo (2 Korinte 5:17)
Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle uyabhidlika, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. —Izikhombo (2 Korinte 4:16)
Ukuze abangcwele bapheleliselwe umsebenzi wenkonzo, kwakhiwe umzimba kaKristu, okuthe ngaye umzimba wonke uhlanganiswa, namalunga wonke ulungiselwe umsebenzi wawo, namalunga asizana omunye komunye njengokusho kwawo. emsebenzini womzimba wonke, ukuze umzimba ukhule othandweni. (Funda eyabase-Efesu 4:12, 16.)

【Qaphela】" bheka “Phila impilo entsha→Impilo ezelwe nguNkulunkulu ifihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu→Izinto ezindala zidlulile, futhi zonke sezibe zintsha→” bheka “Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhidlizwa,” bheka “Kepha ngaphakathi senziwa basha usuku nosuku, sakha umzimba kaKristu, okukuye umzimba wonke uhlangene, ubambene, wonke amalungu asebenze inhloso yawo, asizana ngokomsebenzi wesitho ngasinye; ukuze umzimba ukhule futhi uzakhe othandweni Amen.

buza: “Umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akanakubonwa, athintwe, noma athintwe. Ngale ndlela, kanjani "ukubona" impilo entsha?
impendulo: Akekho esizukulwaneni sethu oye wabona ukuvuka kukaJesu → sizwa ivangeli futhi kholwani "UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo! UJesu wathi kuye (Thomas): "Ngokuba ungibonile, ukholiwe. ”Inkomba (Johane 20:29)→→ incwadi wafa kanye noKristu, incwadi Ukuphila noKristu → ngamehlo omoya” bheka "ulahlekile" Omusha "Bheka abantu abaphilayo, abangokomoya" umuntu womoya “Phila, phila kuKristu! Bona ngamehlo kamoya , cha Sebenzisa ngaphandle Abone ngeso lenyama →→Sebenzisa "" ebonakalayo "Ukholo olubheka umuntu omdala ekufeni; sebenzisa" Angiboni " Ukholo lubona abasha bephila ! Kunzima kakhulu ukuqonda lapha Uma uzibheka ngamehlo kamoya, ungabona amadala namasha!

[2] "Bheka" ukufa kwendoda endala → Yabethelwa, yafa futhi yangcwatshwa noKristu

(1) Buka ikhehla lifa

Wafa esonweni kanye; Kanjalo nani kufanele nizisho ukuthi ningabafileyo esonweni, kodwa niphilele uNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu. — Roma 6:10-11 .

Qaphela: " incwadi "Indoda endala ukufa kwesoni → ulalela intshumayelo, uqonde ivangeli, futhi ukholelwe ukuthi indoda endala iyafa → "ulwazi" olunjalo; bheka "Ukufa kwendoda endala → Lona "ulwazi", uhlangabezana nokufa futhi uhlangabezana 'nendlela yeNkosi' → Ukufa kukaJesu kucushwe kimi, kwembula ukuphila kukaJesu. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:10-12

(2) Bheka ukuziphatha kwekhehla ufe

Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono;
Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo - Kolose 3:9
AbangabakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo. — Galathiya 5:24 .

[Qaphela]: Umuntu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye nezinkanuko zenyama → "izinkanuko nezinkanuko zomuntu omdala" → Imisebenzi yenyama isobala, njengokuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, intukuthelo , amaqembu, izingxabano, izihlubuki, umona (eminye imiqulu yasendulo yengeza igama elithi "ukubulala"), ukudakwa, imibuthano exokozelayo, njll., kubethelwe esiphambanweni. Isibonelo, "ukuphinga" → Uma ubona owesifazane futhi unemicabango ekhanukelayo, khona-ke kufanele "umbone" ekufeni, okungukuthi, "ubone" ukuthi indoda endala ifile ngezinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama.
→ njengokuthi " uPaul "Lowo othi akukho okuhle enyameni yami. Akukona kimi ukwenza okuhle kodwa hhayi ukukwenza. Okuhle engikuthandayo angikwenzi kodwa okubi engingakuthandiyo ngenza okubi. → Yilokhu uPawulu abhekana nakho → "Bheka" Indoda endala yafa - ngisho nezinkanuko zenyama zabethelwa esiphambanweni.

(3) Kufa ngokubheka umthetho

Ngenxa yomthetho ngafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. — Galathiya 2:19

(4) Buka umhlaba ufa

Kodwa mina angisoze ngazibonga, kuphela ngesiphambano seNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, okubethelwe ngaso izwe kimi, nami emhlabeni. — Galathiya 6:14

[Qaphela]: " bheka "Lifa ikhehla" bheka "Ukufa kwezoni → lolu "ulwazi" nolwazi lweZwi likaNkulunkulu → mina" incwadi “Ukufa kuwukuzwa nokubona ulwazi lwencwadi yeBhayibheli; bheka "Ukufa kuwukwazi, ukuzwa amazwi eNkosi, nokwenza izindlela zeNkosi → kanjalo" uPaul "Yisho! Akuseyimi ophilayo manje, sekunguKristu ophilayo ngenxa yami. Uma sekungasemina ophilayo →【 bheka 】
1 Iso" bheka “Isono sakho sifile,
2 " bheka “Umthetho neziqalekiso zawo zifile;
3 " bheka “Umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe zenyama, izinkanuko nezinkanuko zifile;
4 " bheka “Amandla obumnyama uSathane afile,
5 " bheka “Umhlaba ubethelwe esiphambanweni futhi ufile,
6 " bheka "-Umphefumulo nomzimba wendoda endala ifile,
7 " bheka "Umuntu omusha ungumphefumulo ophilayo nomzimba kaKristu. Amen! Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

AmaKristu ahamba uhambo olungokomoya futhi agijimele ezulwini → UCarrie, oshiye izimfundiso zikaKristu, ukhohlwe umhlane wakhe." Vele ngikubize " bheka "Bheka ukufa kwendoda endala, ukufa kwezoni, ukufa kwezinkanuko ezimbi zomuntu omdala", lwela phambili futhi ubheke kuKristu→ Gijima uqonde esiphambanweni .

Nibusisiwe nina enilalelayo niqonde lelizwi nihambe endleleni kamoya nigijime endleleni eya ezulwini. Bheka ukuthi mangaki amabandla asekhona nanamuhla" isono "Uma ungakwazi ukuphuma, uzobe ulungisa futhi uziqondise ngomthetho nsuku zonke endodeni endala. → Guqula inyama, usule izono, futhi uhlanze izono. → Awukayishiyi isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu. Nisagijima niyizingelezi, njengama-Israyeli eTestamenteni Elidala, ayengenakungena ezweni laseKhanani ezulwini?

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, egqugquzelwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nawe - Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi WobuKristu Abakholwa ezoni bayafa, abakholwa abasha bayaphila 》Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi, abaloba ngazo futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yakho, inkazimulo yakho, nokuhlengwa komzimba wakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. buza: Iyini Inqubekelaphambili YePilgrim?

impendulo: "Inqubekelaphambili Yomhambi" kusho ukuthatha uhambo olungokomoya, indlela engokomoya, indlela yasezulwini, ukulandela uJesu nokuthatha indlela yesiphambano → UJesu wathi: "Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; akakho ongeza lapho ngaphandle Ngami, yiya kuBaba. - Johane 14:6.

buza: UJesu uyindlela→Sihamba kanjani kulo mgwaqo kamoya nasendleleni yasezulwini?
impendulo: Sebenzisa indlela yokukholwa eNkosini【 ukuzethemba 】Hamba! Ngoba akekho oke wahamba kulo mgwaqo, awazi ukuthi uhambe kanjani , ngakho uJesu wathi: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe; ulahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami futhi ngenxa yevangeli uzokusindisa→→ thatha indlela yesiphambano , Lena indlela kamoya, indlela yasezulwini, indlela yasezulwini →→Usivulele indlela entsha nephilayo, edabula isihenqo esingumzimba Wakhe. Isikhombo (Hebheru 10:20) kanye (Marku 8:34-35)

Qaphela: Umuntu omdala odalwe ngothuli “uyisoni” futhi akakwazi ukuthatha indlela kamoya noma indlela eya ezulwini kuphela “angathola” umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu - okungukuthi, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. Omusha "Kuphela ongakwazi ukuthatha indlela kamoya kanye nendlela yasezulwini→→Uma uJesu Kristu wavuswa futhi wenyukela ezulwini, lena indlela yasezulwini! Ingabe nikuqonda ngokucacile lokhu?

Intuthuko Yomhambi WobuKristu

【1】Ukukholelwa endodeni endala kusho ukufa "njengesoni"

(1) Kholwa ekufeni kwekhehla

UKristu “wafela” bonke, futhi bonke “bonke” bahlanganisa labo abafileyo, abaphilayo, nalabo abangakazalwa → okungukuthi, “bonke” abaphuma emzimbeni ka-Adamu bafa, futhi abadala. Yebo, abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni. → Uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela;

(2) Kholwa ekhehleni ubethelwe kanye nalo

Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe → Ngoba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisakhonza isono; ngoba ofileyo ukhululiwe esonweni. — Roma 6:6-7

(3) Kholwa ukuthi umuntu omdala ufile

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Reference-Kolose Isahluko 3 Ivesi 3

buza: Uqonde ukuthini ngoba ufile?

impendulo: Lishonile ikhehla lakho.

buza: Lashona nini ikhehla lethu?
impendulo: UKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu→ uKristu yedwa" okwe "Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa → Lowo ofile ukhululiwe esonweni, futhi bonke bayafa → Bonke bakhululiwe esonweni. →" incwadi Umuntu wakhe"→i incwadi UKristu yedwa" okwe “Wonke umuntu uyafa, futhi wonke umuntu “ukhululiwe esonweni” futhi akalahlwa; abantu abangakholwa , wayeselahliwe kakade ngenxa yokuthi wayengakholelwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa. " igama likaJesu “Kusho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. UJesu Kristu wanikela ngokuphila kwakhe ukuze akusindise ezonweni zakho, uzolahlwa. . Ngakho, uyaqonda? Inkomba - Johane 3:18 noMathewu 1:21

[2] Phila ngokukholelwa "kumuntu omusha" → uhlala kuKristu

(1) Kholwa kumuntu omusha futhi uphile futhi uvuswe kanye noKristu

Uma sifa kanye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. Inkomba ( Roma 6:8 )
Nanifile ngeziphambeko nokungasoki kwenyama yenu, kodwa uNkulunkulu uniphilise kanye noKristu, esenithethelele (noma ehumusha: ezethu) zonke iziphambeko;

(2) Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, anisibo abenyama

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. —Izikhombo (Roma 8:9)
Njengoba “uPaul” esho → ngidabukile! Ngubani ongangisindisa kulomzimba wokufa na? Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ngokwalokhu kubuka, ngilalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yami, kodwa inyama yami ilalela umthetho wesono. ( Roma 7:24-25 )

[3 Manje akusekho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu

Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. —Izikhombo (Roma 8:1-2)

(4) Impilo yomuntu omusha ifihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngokuba nafa, nokuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ongukuphila kwethu, lapho uKristu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. —Izikhombo (Kolose 3:3-4)

[Qaphela]: 1 incwadi Indoda endala “Okusho ukuthi izoni” zabethelwa esiphambanweni zafa kanye noKristu, futhi “zabhapathizwa” ekufeni kwakhe nasekungcwatshweni Kwakhe, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe. 2 incwadi" Omusha "Ivuswe kanye noKristu → "Umuntu omusha" ozelwe uNkulunkulu uhlala kuKristu - ngoba → bakhululiwe esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, kumuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo, nasebumnyameni besono. USathane emandleni omhlaba → ngoba awuyena owezwe, "umuntu omusha" owenziwe kabusha ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, udle ukudla okungokomoya futhi uphuze amanzi angokomoya! wesiphambano → → Yilokho-ke fa Uhlanganiswe ngokusemthethweni noKristu ( Kholwa ekhehleni ufe ), nakuye ukuvuka ehlangene naye ngesimo ( Kholwa empilweni entsha ). Umuntu omusha uhlala kuKristu, unezimpande futhi wakhiwe kuKristu, uyakhula, futhi azimise othandweni lukaKristu → Lapho uKristu ebonakala, " Omusha “Futhi wabonakala naye enkazimulweni. Niyakuqonda lokhu na? Bheka kwabaseKolose 3:3-4

Qaphela: Lena indlela yokuba amaKristu agijime endleleni eya ezulwini futhi athathe indlela yomoya eya ezulwini. Isigaba sokuqala: Kholwa ukuthi indoda endala “okungukuthi, isoni” yafa kanye noKristu; Omusha “Hlala noKristu →Phila kuJesu Kristu! Yidla ukudla okungokomoya, uphuze amanzi kamoya, futhi uhambe endleleni kamoya, indlela yasezulwini, kanye nendlela yesiphambano. isipiliyoni Hlukanisa ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo, kanye nesipiliyoni sokukhumula umzimba wokufa. Amen

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, egqugquzelwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabase-Efesu isahluko 4 ivesi 22 futhi sifunde ndawonye, Nikhumule umuntu omdala ekuziphatheni kwenu kokuqala, okubhedayo kancane kancane ngenkohliso yenkanuko;

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi uthandaze: Aba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi, ukuze impilo yethu engokomoya icebile futhi sikhule sibe abasha futhi abavuthiwe usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuqala kwemfundiso okufanele ishiye uKristu: Qonda indlela yokushiya umuntu omdala, ukhumule umuntu omdala ekuziphatheni nasezinkanukweni zenyama ;

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wenze ngoMoya oNgcwele

Uma siphila ngoMoya, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya . Isikhombo (Galathiya 5:25)

buza: Kuyini ukuphila ngoMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: " Ncika ku "Kusho ukuncika, ukuncika! Sithemba: 1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 Uzalwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu. Bonke ngoMoya munye, iNkosi eyodwa, noNkulunkulu oyedwa! Kungukuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo okusivuselelayo → siphila ngoMoya oNgcwele, izwi leqiniso likaJesu Kristu, futhi sizalwa nguNkulunkulu! Kufanele ungene eBandleni likaJesu Kristu futhi wakhe uMzimba kaKristu. Kufanele ugxiliswe futhi wakhiwe kuKristu nothando lukaNkulunkulu ukugcwala kukaKristu... Umzimba wonke uxhunywe Nguye Lapho izitho zivumelana, ilungu ngalinye linomsebenzi walo, futhi ilungu ngalinye liyasizana ngokomsebenzi walo, umzimba uyakhula kancane kancane futhi uzakhe othandweni. . Inkomba ( Kwabase-Efesu 4:12-16 ), ingabe lokhu kucacile kuwe?

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuhamba ngoMoya?

impendulo: " UMoya oNgcwele "Yenza kithi vuselela Umsebenzi Wakhe ukuhamba ngoMoya → Uyasisindisa hhayi ngemisebenzi yokulunga esiyenzile, kodwa ngokwesihe Sakhe, ngokugezwa kokuzalwa kutsha nokuvuselelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele. (Thithu 3:5) Lapha” ukuzalwa kabusha Umbhabhadiso uwumbhapathizo kaMoya oNgcwele. incwadi Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele, wenze ngokwethembela kuMoya oNgcwele, futhi uMoya oNgcwele wenza umsebenzi wokuvuselela:

1 Gqoka ubuntu obusha, kancane kancane uvuselele → Gqoka ubuntu obusha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe. Inkomba (Kolose 3:10)
2 Umzimba wangaphandle womuntu omdala uyashabalala, kodwa umuntu wangaphakathi womuntu omusha wenziwa musha usuku nosuku “ngoMoya oNgcwele” → Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle uyabhidlika, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. (2 Korinte 4:16)
3 UNkulunkulu wasilungiselela ukwenza imisebenzi emihle → Ngokuba singumsebenzi wakhe kuKristu Jesu sadalelwa imisebenzi emihle, ayilungisela ngaphambili uNkulunkulu ukuba senze imisebenzi emihle. (Kwabase-Efesu 2:10), uNkulunkulu usilungiselele “yonke imisebenzi emihle” ebandleni likaJesu Kristu→ 1 “Ukuzwa izwi” kuvuselelwa kancane kancane olwazini, ukuphuza ubisi olungokomoya olumsulwa nokudla ukudla okungokomoya, kukhula kube ngumuntu ovuthiwe, futhi kukhula esimweni sikaKristu; 2" "Prakthiza" UMoya oNgcwele kwenze kithi vuselela umsebenzi" ebizwa nge-xingdao ” Amazwi ahanjwa uMoya oNgcwele ezinhliziyweni zethu, amazwi uKristu awahambayo ezinhliziyweni zethu, amazwi uBaba uNkulunkulu awahambayo ezinhliziyweni zethu → lokhu ebizwa nge-xingdao ! UMoya oNgcwele ushumayela ivangeli kithi, ivangeli lensindiso→ ebizwa nge-xingdao ! Ukushumayela ivangeli elisindisa abantu kusho ukwenza zonke izinhlobo zezenzo ezinhle uma ungalishumayeli ivangeli, akusona isenzo esihle uma unemali yokunikela nokupha abampofu, lokhu akusona isenzo esihle ngeke bakhumbule izenzo ezinhle ozenzile ngenxa yabo. Ukusekela ivangeli, ukushumayela ivangeli, nokulisebenzisa evangelini kuyizenzo ezinhle kuphela . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) Gqoka ubuntu obusha futhi nembathe uKristu

nenziwe basha engqondweni yenu, nembathe umuntu omusha owadalwa ngokomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele. ( Efesu 4:23-24 )
Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. ( Galathiya 3:26-27 )

Qaphela: Nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokholo kuKristu Jesu nibhapathizwe kuKristu futhi nembathe ubuntu obusha, obungubuntu obusha Ukwembatha uKristu futhi wembathe umzimba kaKristu ovusiwe. Ngokuvuselelwa “koMoya oNgcwele”, umuntu omusha “uzokuguqula” Omusha "Ingqondo" Shintsha Okukodwa okusha→

1 Kwaba ku-Adamu" Shintsha "KuKristu,

2 Kuvela ukuthi uyisoni" Shintsha “Yiba olungileyo,

3 Kuvela ukuthi esiqalekisweni somthetho " Shintsha "Esibusisweni somusa,

4 Ekuqaleni eTestamenteni Elidala " Shintsha “ETestamenteni Elisha,

5 Kuvele ukuthi abazali bami bangizala" Shintsha “Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu,

6 Kuyavela ukuthi ngaphansi kwamandla obumnyama kaSathane " Shintsha “Embusweni wokukhanya kukaNkulunkulu,

7 Kwabonakala kungcolile futhi kungcolile” Shintsha "Kukhona iqiniso ekulungeni nasebungcweleni Amen!

"Ingqondo" Shintsha Okusha, lokho uNkulunkulu akufunayo kungokwakho” Inhliziyo ",wena incwadi" unembeza "Ngegazi likaJesu" kanye "Hlengiwe ngeke usazizwa unecala! vele" isoni "Uphi ozelwe kabusha mina! Sengikhona" umuntu olungileyo ", ukulunga nobungcwele beqiniso! Ingabe kunjalo? Ingabe umuntu omusha unesono? Akukho sono; angakwazi ukona? Angeke ona UKristu. Labo abazelwe nguNkulunkulu kufanele Labo abangakonayo → Ingabe kukhona ukuzalwa kabusha? inyoka “Abazelwe nguSathane bangabantwana bakaSathane. Niyaqonda kahle na? Niyawubona umehluko? Reference (1 Johane 3:6-10)

(3) Hlukanisa ikhehla ekuziphatheni kwakho kwangaphambilini

Lapho ufunda ngoKristu, akunjalo. Uma nizwile izwi lakhe, nakwamukela ukulaywa kwakhe, nafunda iqiniso lakhe, nikhumule ubuntu benu obudala, owonakaliswa yizinkanuko zabo (Kwabase-Efesu Isahluko 4, ivesi 22).

buza: Uma sikholwa kuJesu, asikayikhumuli yini indoda endala nokuziphatha kwayo? Kungani lisho lapha (ulahle indlela yakho endala yokwenza izinto?) Kolose 3:9
impendulo: Nafunda ngoKristu, nezwa izwi lakhe, namukela imfundiso yakhe, nafunda neqiniso lakhe → Lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwa kuKristu, nathola isithembiso " UMoya oNgcwele " kuwuphawu "lokuzalwa kabusha", umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha, umuntu womoya Okungukuthi, abantu bakamoya, abantu basezulwini” akusikho okwakho "Ikhehla lasemhlabeni nekhehla" isoni "Izenzo→ Ngakho-ke, njengoba senikholiwe kuJesu Kristu," kakade "Hlubula ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo kwakudala; vele ukubeke eceleni →" isipiliyoni "Khumula ikhehla ekuziphatheni kwakho kwangaphambilini (isibonelo, owesifazane okhulelwe, ingabe usenokuphila okusha esiswini sakhe - umntwana? Ingabe ingane kufanele iphume esibelethweni sikanina, ihlangabezane nokuhlukana nesisu sikanina, futhi izalwe futhi ukhule?), kumelwe Yilokhu okushiwo ukukhumula umuntu omdala ekuziphatheni kwakho kwangaphambili.

buza: Yiziphi izindlela ikhehla elalinazo esikhathini esidlule?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Izinkanuko zenyama yomuntu omdala

Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, umona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. ( Galathiya 5:19-21 )

2 Ukwanelisa izinkanuko zenyama

enahamba kuzo ngokwendlela yaleli zwe, nilalela umbusi wamandla omkhathi, umoya osebenza manje kubantwana bokungalaleli. Sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, senza izinkanuko zenyama, silandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo, futhi ngokwemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo bonke abanye. ( Efesu 2:2-3 )

buza: Ulilahla kanjani ikhehla ekuziphatheni kwakho kwangaphambilini?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu futhi wahlukaniswa nomzimba wokufa

(Njengoba uPawulu asho) Yeka indlela engilusizi ngayo! Ngubani ongangisindisa kulomzimba wokufa na? Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ngokwalokhu kubuka, ngilalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yami, kodwa inyama yami ilalela umthetho wesono. ( Roma 7:24-25 )

2 Ukukhumula umuntu omdala ngokuhlanganiswa noKristu ekufeni kwakhe ngokubhapathizwa

Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Inkomba ( Roma 6:4 )

3 UKristu uyanisoka ngokukhumula isimo sesono senyama

Naye nasokwa kuye ngokusoka okwenziwa ngaphandle kwezandla, lapho nahlushwa khona isimo senyama ngokusoka kukaKristu. Nangcwatshwa kanye naye embhapathizweni, okungawo futhi navuswa kanye naye ngokukholwa ekusebenzeni kukaNkulunkulu owamvusa kwabafileyo. ( Kolose 2:11-12 )

Qaphela: Ukholo nobhapathizo kukuhlanganisa noKristu→ 1 Isimo sokufa sihlangene noKristu, 2 ekufeni kukaKristu, 3 Gcwabe ikhehla likhiphe ikhehla nemikhuba yalo.
Nobabili" incwadi "UKristu" abhapathizwe “Hambani niye ekufeni, nihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa, futhi nihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, enasokwa ngakho ngokusoka kwemvelo yesono yenyama. Lokhu kuzoveza umphumela olandelayo :

(1) KaJesu fa Yenza kusebenze umuntu wethu omdala → "Umzimba wangaphandle womuntu omdala uyashabalala, ingxenye yangaphandle iyabola, futhi umuntu omdala kancane kancane uba mubi ngenxa yokukhohlisa kwezifiso zobugovu."
(2) KaJesu wazalwa Kwembulwa ebuntwini bethu obusha → "Ngakho-ke asidangali. Nakuba sichithwa ngaphandle, nokho ngaphakathi senziwa basha usuku nosuku. Yini evezwa umuntu ongaphakathi na? UJesu, uBaba, ukithi. UNkulunkulu usezinhliziyweni zethu → Umuntu omusha usezinhliziyweni zethu ngokwenziwa busha kukaMoya oNgcwele usuku nosuku Inomzimba, impande nesisekelo kuKristu ubisi futhi udle ukudla kokomoya futhi ukhule ube yindoda evuthiweyo Umzimba uyakhula kancane kancane, ugcwale isimo sikaKristu, uzakhe othandweni, futhi ube nokuphila okuchichimayo ngokwengeziwe.

Ngakho-ke, kufanele sikushiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu → sikhumule ubuntu obudala, sembathe ubuntu obusha, sishiye ubuntu obudala, sizakhe futhi sikhule kuKristu nasothandweni lwebandla likaJesu Kristu. . Amen!

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sihlolile, sahlanganyela, futhi sabelane lapha kumagazini olandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu, Isifundo 6

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila! Ukhunjulwe iNkosi. Amen!

Ihubo: Amagugu abekwe ezitsheni zobumba

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Ake sivule kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 ivesi 9 eBhayibhelini futhi sifunde ndawonye: ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe;

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude, futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze impilo yethu engokomoya ibe cebile, futhi kuyoba entsha usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuqala kwemfundiso okufanele ishiye uKristu: Yazini ukushiya umuntu omdala, nigqoke umuntu omusha, nigqoke uKristu, nigijimele emgomeni; .

(1) Ulikhiphile ikhehla

KwabaseKolose 3:9 Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemisebenzi yakhe.

buza: Sasinini" kakade “Nikhumule ikhehla nemikhuba yalo yakudala?
impendulo: Ukuzalwa kabusha! Lapho uJesu Kristu evuswa kwabafileyo, sazalwa kabusha umuntu omusha uye wakhumula umuntu omdala kanye nokuziphatha kwakhe nifile, lelo liyiVangeli lensindiso yenu, enakholwa ngayo kuKristu namukela isithembiso [ UMoya oNgcwele 】Okophawu→UMoya oNgcwele uwubufakazi "bokuzalwa kabusha" kanye nobufakazi bokuthola ifa likaBaba waseZulwini. Nizelwe ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngeqiniso levangeli likaNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? →Lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwa kuKristu, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. ( Efesu 1:13 )

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya
UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya?
impendulo: “Amanzi” angamanzi okuphila, amanzi omthombo wokuphila, amanzi aphilayo asezulwini, imifula yamanzi aphilayo ageleza aze afike ekuphileni okuphakade → ephuma esiswini sikaJesu Kristu - bhekisela ku (Johane 7:38-39) IsAmbulo 21:6;
" UMoya oNgcwele "UMoya kaYise, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya weqiniso → Kodwa lapho uMduduzi efika, engizomthumela evela kuBaba, uMoya weqiniso ophuma kuBaba, uzofakaza ngami. kaJohane 15:26), uyaqonda ngokucacile?

2 Bazalwa ngeqiniso levangeli

Nina enifunda ngoKristu ningaba nabafundisi abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi, kepha obaba bayingcosana, ngokuba mina nganizala ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu. ( 1 Korinte 4:15 )

buza: Ivangeli liyazala thina! Kusho ukuthini lokhu?
impendulo: Njengoba uPawulu asho! Mina ngizalizala ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu; Ivangeli "Ngazala wena → Liyini ivangeli?" Ivangeli ” Njengoba uPawulu asho: Ngoba lokho nami engakunikeza kini: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokwemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokwemiBhalo (Kol. ( 1 Korinte 15:3-4 )
buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi iZwi leqiniso lasizala?
impendulo: Ngokuvumelana nentando yakhe, wasizala ngezwi leqiniso, ukuze sibe njengolibo lwendalo yakhe yonke. ( Jakobe 1:18 )
"ULizwi Weqiniso" → Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, futhi uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu. UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila” - Isikhombo ( Johane 14:6 ), uJesu uyiqiniso nendlela yeqiniso → UNkulunkulu uBaba wavuka kwabafileyo “ngoJesu Kristu” ngokwezwi laKhe. intando
wazalwa Kithina, iqiniso levangeli wazalwa Sitholile! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu

Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa ebizweni lakhe. Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. ( Johane 1:12-13 )
buza: Indlela yokwamukela uJesu?
impendulo: Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, uhlala kimi, nami kuye. ( Johane 6:56 ) →Ingabe uJesu unguNkulunkulu? Yebo! “UNkulunkulu” ungumoya! Ingabe uJesu wazalwa ngoMoya? Yebo! Ingabe uJesu wayengokomoya? Yebo! Lapho sidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa, sidla futhi siphuze umzimba womoya weNkosi negazi likamoya → “samukela” uJesu, futhi singamalungu Akhe, akunjalo? Yebo! UNkulunkulu unguMoya → Noma ubani owamukela uJesu: 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu! Amen.
lokhu" ukuzalwa kabusha "Umuntu omusha akenziwanga ngobumba buka-Adamu, akazalwanga ngegazi labazali bethu, hhayi ngenkanuko, hhayi ngentando yomuntu, kodwa ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. "UNkulunkulu" ungumoya → thina esizalwa nguNkulunkulu a" umuntu womoya ", lena entsha mina" umuntu womoya "Umzimba womphefumulo →" umoya “NguMoya kaJesu,” umphefumulo "Ngumphefumulo kaJesu," umzimba "Kungumzimba kaJesu → uhlala kuKristu, ufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, nasezinhliziyweni zethu. Lapho uKristu ebonakala, lo muntu omusha" umuntu womoya ” wabonakala kanye noKristu enkazimulweni. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu?

(2) Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniyikuba yinyama

buza: Usho ukuthini uMoya kaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: UMoya kaNkulunkulu unguMoya kaBaba, uMoya kaJesu, noMoya oNgcwele weqiniso! Isikhombo (Galathiya 4:6)
buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi uMoya kaNkulunkulu, “uMoya oNgcwele,” ukuhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu?
impendulo: UMoya oNgcwele “uhlala” ezinhliziyweni zethu → okungukuthi, “sizalwa ngokusha” 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu.
buza: Ingabe uMoya oNgcwele “awuhlali” enyameni yethu?
impendulo: UMoya oNgcwele ngeke uphile enyameni yethu iphuma ku-Adamu, yenziwe ngothuli, futhi izalwa abazali iwayini elisha alikwazi ukuqukatha isikhwama esidala sesikhumba.
kanjalo" UMoya oNgcwele "Akuhlali ezingqalathini zewayini ezindala, enyameni ephelayo → umzimba womuntu omdala "inyama" iyabhujiswa futhi ibhujiswe ngenxa yesono, kodwa umphefumulo "okungukuthi, uMoya oNgcwele ohlala ezinhliziyweni zethu" uphila ulungisiswa ngokukholwa → Uma uKristu Ezinhliziyweni zenu umzimba wenu ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya wenu uphila ngenxa yokulunga (KwabaseRoma 8:10). UMoya oNgcwele "Akahlali enyameni yethu ebonakalayo, kepha uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala kini, enizelwe kabusha." umuntu womoya “Hhayi okwenyama, kodwa okukaMoya. Niyakuqonda lokhu?

buza: Ingabe uJesu wayengenawo umzimba wenyama negazi? Ingabe inawo nomzimba wenyama? Kodwa uMoya oNgcwele ungaphila kuye!
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 UJesu wazalwa yintombi uMariya futhi uyinzalo yowesifazane;
2 UJesu wehla evela ezulwini futhi wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele.
3 UJesu uLizwi waba yinyama, uNkulunkulu owenziwe inyama, uMoya waba yinyama, futhi inyama Yakhe ingokomoya; okwenyama kuyinyama; lokho okuzelwe ngomoya kungumoya. Inkomba (Johane 3:6)
4 Umzimba kaJesu wenyama awukuboni ukonakala noma ukubhujiswa, futhi umzimba Wakhe wenyama awukuboni ukufa.

Lapho sidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa, sidla inyama yeNkosi futhi siphuza igazi leNkosi → sizalwa kabusha ngaphakathi kwethu. umuntu womoya ” ongokomoya nowasezulwini, ngoba sinjalo
amalungu kaKristu→UMoya oNgcwele “ hlala ku “KuJesu Kristu, esingamalungu akhe,” UMoya oNgcwele "Futhi uhlala ekuzalweni kwethu kabusha" umuntu womoya "Emzimbeni. Amen! Moya oNgcwele" Ngeke ihlale "Emzimbeni obonakalayo wekhehla (inyama). Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Ngakho-ke, njengezidalwa ezintsha ezizelwe nguNkulunkulu eziphila ngoMoya oNgcwele, kufanele sihambe ngoMoya→ hamba isono, hamba Zisole ngezenzo zakho ezifile, hamba Isikole samabanga aphansi esingamagwala nesingenamsebenzi, hamba Umthetho obuthakathaka nongenalusizo futhi ongafezi lutho, hamba Indoda endala; gqoka Abasanda kufika, Phi gqoka uKristu . Lezi ziyiziqalo zemfundiso kaKristu Kufanele sishiye iziqalo, sigijime siqonde emgomweni, silwele ukufinyelela ekupheleleni. Amen!

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sihlolile, sahlanganyela, futhi sabelane lapha kumagazini olandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu, Isifundo 5

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kushukunyiswa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu. UKristu. Shumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo Amagama abo alotshwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: Ukuqala Kwemfundiso Yokushiya UKristu

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 8)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu Isahluko 11 nevesi 12 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kusukela esikhathini sikaJohane uMbhapathizi kuze kube namuhla, umbuso wezulu ungenwa ngokusebenza kanzima, futhi labo abasebenza kanzima bayowuthola.

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana ndawonye "Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu" Cha. 8 Khuluma futhi uthandaze: Aba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu, inkazimulo, nokuhlengwa komzimba. Ukudla kulethwa kude esibhakabhakeni, futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze kusenze sibe umuntu omusha, indoda yomoya, indoda yomoya! Yiba ngumuntu omusha usuku nosuku, ukhulela ekukhuleni okuphelele kukaKristu! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuqala kwemfundiso okufanele ishiye uKristu: Umbuso wezulu ungena ngokusebenza kanzima, futhi labo abasebenza kanzima bayowuthola! Sengathi singakhulisa ukholo phezu kokholo, umusa phezu komusa, amandla phezu kwamandla, nenkazimulo phezu kwenkazimulo. .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Ingabe kufanele usebenze kanzima ukuze ungene embusweni weZulu?

impendulo: “Sebenza kanzima” → Ngoba labo abasebenza kanzima bazozuza.

buza:

1 Umbuso wezulu awunakubonwa noma uthintwa ngeso lenyama, pho singasebenza kanjani kanzima? Ungangena kanjani?
2 Ingabe sitshelwa ukuba sigcine umthetho futhi sisebenze kanzima ukuze sihlakulele imizimba yethu enesono ukuze ibe abangafi noma oBuddha? Ingabe uzama ukuhlakulela umzimba wakho ube ngumuntu ongokomoya?
3 Ingabe ngiyazikhandla ukuze ngenze izinto ezinhle futhi ngibe umuntu olungile, ngizidela ukuze ngisindise abanye, futhi ngisebenza kanzima ukuze ngenze imali yokusiza abampofu?
4 Ngiyazikhandla yini ukushumayela egameni leNkosi, nokukhipha amademoni ngegama leNkosi, nokuphulukisa abagulayo, nokwenza izimangaliso eziningi egameni leNkosi?

impendulo: “Akubona bonke abashoyo kimi ukuthi, Nkosi, Nkosi, abayakungena embusweni wezulu; kuphela owenza intando kaBaba osezulwini oyongena.” ( Mathewu 7:21 )

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukwenza intando kaBaba oseZulwini? Ungayenza kanjani intando kaBaba waseZulwini? Ngokwesibonelo ( IHubo 143:10 ) Ngifundise ukwenza intando yakho, ngoba wena unguNkulunkulu wami. Umoya wakho muhle;
impendulo: Ukwenza intando kaBaba oseZulwini kusho ukuthi: Kholwa kuJesu! Lalela izwi leNkosi! → ( Luka 9:35 ) Kwavela izwi efwini, lithi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami, ekhethiweyo yami (kukhona imiqulu yasendulo: Lona yiNdodana yami ethandekayo), yilaleleni.

buza: UBaba waseZulwini usitshela ukuthi silalele amazwi eNdodana yethu ethandekayo uJesu! Wathini uJesu kithi?
impendulo: "UJesu" wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli."

buza: " Kholwa ivangeli "Ungangena embusweni wezulu?"
impendulo: lokhu【 Ivangeli ] Kungamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kulowo nalowo okholwayo... Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwa kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” (KwabaseRoma 1:16-17)

Qaphela:

1 【 Lokhu kulunga kusekelwe okholweni 】 lokhu" Ivangeli “Kungamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwayo →
" Kholwa ivangeli “Balungisisiwe, bemukela ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngesihle! Reference (KwabaseRoma 3:24)
" Kholwa ivangeli “Zizuzeleni ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu!
" Kholwa ivangeli "Ngenani embusweni wezulu. Amen! Inkomba ( Marku 1:15 ) → Lokhu kulunga kusekelwe okholweni, ngoba " incwadi "Abalungile bayosindiswa ngakho" incwadi "Phila → Yiba nokuphila okuphakade! Amen;

2 【 ukuze incwadi 】→Ukusindiswa nokwamukela ukuphila okuphakade kusekelwe okholweni; ukwamukela inkazimulo, umvuzo, nomqhele→kusekelwe okholweni! Insindiso nokuphila okuphakade kuncike " incwadi "; Ukuthola inkazimulo, imivuzo, kanye nemiqhele kusancike " incwadi "Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi “kuThomas”: “Ngenxa yokuthi ungibonile, ukholiwe; babusisiwe abangakaboni kodwa bakholwa.”

Ngakho, lokhu【 Ivangeli 】Kungamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwayo. 1 ) incwadi phezu kwencwadi, ( 2 ) Umusa phezu komusa, ( 3 ) amandla phezu kwamandla, ( 4 ) kusukela enkazimulweni kuye enkazimulweni!

buza: Sizama kanjani?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Eyokuqala: Umzamo【 Kholwa ivangeli 】Sindiswa ube nokuphila okuphakade

buza: Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu “kungokukholwa.” Umuntu angasindiswa kanjani ngokholo?
impendulo: Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa. Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( 1 ) Ukukholwa kuyakhulula esonweni
UKristu yedwa" okwe “Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa, futhi abafileyo bayakhululwa esonweni - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7; njengoba bonke befa, bonke bayakhululwa esonweni. Bheka 2 Korinte 5:14
( 2 ) Ukukholwa kukhululekile emthethweni
Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko. ( Roma 7:6 )
( 3 ) Ukukholwa kubalekela amandla obumnyama neHayidese
Wasikhulula emandleni obumnyama, wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, esinokuhlengwa ngayo nokuthethelelwa kwezono. ( Kolose 1:13-14 )
njengomphostoli" uPaul "Shumayela ivangeli lensindiso kwabezizwe → Engakwamukela futhi ngadlulisela kini: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu (wasikhulula kuzo) futhi wembelwa (wakhumula izono zethu) ngokusho kwemiBhalo indoda endala) ; futhi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu ngokweBhayibheli ( Ukulungisiswa, ukuvuka, ukuzalwa kabusha, insindiso, ukuphila okuphakade ), amen! ( 1 Korinte 15:3-4 )

Okwesibili: Sebenza kanzima【 Kholwa kuMoya oNgcwele 】Umsebenzi wokuvuselela uyakhazimula

buza: Ukukhazinyuliswa “ukukholwa” → Ungakholwa kanjani futhi ukhazinyuliswe?
impendulo: Uma siphila ngoMoya, kufanele futhi sihambe ngoMoya. (Galathiya 5:25)→“ incwadi “UBaba osezulwini ukimi,” incwadi "UKristu kimi," incwadi "Udumo kuMoya oNgcwele wenza umsebenzi wokuvuselela kimi! Amen.

buza: Ungathembela kanjani emsebenzini kaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Kholwa ukuthi ubhapathizo lungena ekufeni kukaKristu

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekuvukeni okufana naye;

(2) Ukukholwa kulahla ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo

Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe, nembatha omusha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe. ( Kolose 3:9-10 )

(3) Ukholo lukhululekile ezinkanukweni nasezifisweni zomuntu omdala

AbangabakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo. ( Galathiya 5:24 )

(4) Ingcebo yokukholwa yembulwa esitsheni sobumba

Le ngcebo sinayo ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; ( 2 Korinte 4:7-9 )

(5) Kholwa ukuthi ukufa kukaJesu kuyasebenza kithi futhi kwembula ukuphila kukaJesu

“Akuseyimi ukuphila” kuhlala kuthwala ukufa kukaJesu nathi, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu nakho kwembulwe kithi. Ngoba thina esiphilayo sihlala sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emizimbeni yethu efayo. ( 2 Korinte 4:10-11 )

(6) Ukholo luyisitsha esiyigugu, esifanele ukusetshenziswa yiNkosi

Uma umuntu ezihlanza kokuphansi, uyakuba yisitsha esihloniphekayo, esingcwelisiwe, esiwusizo eNkosini, esilungiselwe yonke imisebenzi emihle. ( 2 Thimothewu 2:21 )

(7) Thatha isiphambano sakho ushumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu

UJesu wayesebizela kubo izixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe; umphefumulo wakhe ngezansi) uyakulahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe;
Thina esiphila ngoMoya masihambe futhi ngoMoya → UMoya ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; futhi uma singabantwana, siyizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu, izindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. Ngakho, uyaqonda? ( Roma 8:16-17 )

Okwesithathu: Sibheke phambili ekubuyeni kukaKristu nokuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu

buza: Ukukholelwa kanjani ekuhlengweni kwemizimba yethu
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

( 1 ) Kholwa ekubuyeni kukaKristu, bheka phambili ekubuyeni kukaKristu

1 Izingelosi zifakaza ngokubuya kukaKristu
“Madoda aseGalile, nimeleni nibheke ezulwini na? UJesu lo, okhushulwe kini wayiswa ezulwini, uyobuya kanjalo, njengalokho nimbonile eya ezulwini.”
2 INkosi uJesu ithembisa ukuza maduze
“Bheka, ngiyeza masinyane, babusisiwe abagcina iziprofetho zale ncwadi.
3 Uza ngamafu
“Lapho usizi lwalezo zinsuku seluphelile, ilanga liyofiphazwa, nenyanga ngeke ikhiphe ukukhanya kwayo, nezinkanyezi ziyokuwa ezulwini, namandla ezulu ayozamazama Umuntu uyovela ezulwini, futhi yonke imindeni yomhlaba iyokhala Iyobona iNdodana yomuntu iza ngamafu ezulu inamandla nenkazimulo enkulu ( Mathewu 24:29-30 kanye nesAmbulo 1:7 ) .

( 2 ) Kumelwe sibone isimo sakhe sangempela

Bazalwane abathandekayo, manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; ( 1 Johane 3:2 )

( 3 ) Umoya wethu, umphefumulo nomzimba kuyalondolozwa

Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokupheleleyo! Kwangathi umoya wenu, nomphefumulo, nomzimba, kulondolozwe kungabi nacala ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Uthembekile onibizayo, futhi uyokwenza. ( 1 Thesalonika 5:23-24 )

Qaphela:

1 Lapho uKristu ebuya, siyohlangana neNkosi emoyeni futhi siphile neNkosi kuze kube phakade - reference (1 Thesalonika 4:13-17);

2 Lapho uKristu ebonakala, sibonakala kanye Naye enkazimulweni - Inkomba (Kolose 3:3-4);

3 Uma iNkosi ibonakala, sizofana nayo futhi siyibone njengoba injalo - (1 Johane 3:2);

4 Imizimba yethu ephansi “eyenziwe ngobumba” iyaguqulwa ibe njengomzimba waKhe okhazimulayo - Isikhombo ( Filipi 3:20-21 );

5 Umoya wethu, umphefumulo nomzimba kuyalondolozwa - Inkomba (1 Thesalonika 5:23-24) → Sizalwa ngoMoya namanzi, sizalwa ngokukholwa kwevangeli, ekuphileni kukaNkulunkulu kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, noKristu. Ngaleso sikhathi, nathi (umzimba ozelwe nguNkulunkulu) siyobonakala enkazimulweni. Ngaleso sikhathi siyobona isimo Sakhe sangempela, futhi siyophinde sizibone (isimo sangempela esizalwa nguNkulunkulu), futhi umoya wethu, umphefumulo, nomzimba wethu kuyolondolozwa, okungukuthi, umzimba uyohlengwa. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Kusukela esikhathini sikaJohane uMbhapathizi kuze kube manje umbuso wezulu ungenwa ngokusebenza kanzima, futhi labo abasebenza kanzima bayowuzuza. . ( Mathewu 11:12 )

buza: umzamo" incwadi "Batholani abantu?"
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 umzamo" incwadi “Ivangeli liyoholela ensindisweni,
2 umzamo" incwadi “Ukwenziwa kabusha kukaMoya oNgcwele kuyakhazinyuliswa,
