articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 17 ivesi 14 futhi sifunde ndawonye: ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe .

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi uthandaze: Aba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kulethwa kude esibhakabhakeni, futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze kusenze sibe umuntu omusha, indoda yomoya, indoda yomoya! Yiba ngumuntu omusha usuku nosuku, ukhulela ekukhuleni okuphelele kukaKristu! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Kufanele sikushiye isiqalo sezimfundiso zikaKristu: siqonde ukuthi singawushiya kanjani umhlaba singene enkazimulweni! Siphe umusa phezu komusa, amandla phezu kwamandla, inkazimulo phezu kwenkazimulo .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Imihlaba yadalwa ngamazwi kaNkulunkulu

UNkulunkulu, owakhuluma endulo kokhokho bethu ngabaprofethi izikhathi eziningi nangezindlela eziningi, usekhulumile kithi kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ngeNdodana ayimise ibe yindlalifa yakho konke, adala ngayo umhlaba wonke. ( Hebheru 1:1-2 )
Ngokukholwa siyazi ukuthi imihlaba yadalwa ngezwi likaNkulunkulu, ukuze okubonwayo kudalwe ngokusobala. ( Hebheru 11:3 )

buza: Ingabe imihlaba yadalwa “ngezwi likaNkulunkulu”?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa! Ngoba ngenkathi Ethi kwakuyikho, kwaba njalo ngenkathi Eyala ukuba kube njalo, kwaqiniswa. ( IHubo 33:9 )

1 Ngosuku lokuqala uNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya,” kwaba khona ukukhanya. ( Genesise 1:3 )
2 Ngosuku lwesibili uNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube-khona igebe phakathi kwamanzi ukuze kwahlukaniswe ingxenye engaphezulu nengaphansi.” (Genesise 1:6)
3 Ngosuku lwesithathu uNkulunkulu wathi: “Amanzi aphansi kwezulu mawaqoqekele ndawonye, kubonakale umhlabathi owomileyo. UNkulunkulu wabiza umhlabathi owomileyo ngokuthi “umhlaba” nokuqoqeka kwamanzi ngokuthi ulwandle. UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi kuhle. UNkulunkulu wathi: "Umhlaba mawuveze utshani, izitshalo ezithela imbewu, nemithi ethela izithelo enembewu kuyo ngezinhlobo zayo." ( Genesise 1:9-11 )
4 Ngosuku lwesine uNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube-khona izinkanyiso esibhakabhakeni zihlukanise imini nobusuku, zibe yizibonakaliso zezinkathi, nezinsuku, neminyaka, zibe yizinkanyiso esibhakabhakeni zokukhanyisa emhlabeni. ” Kwase kwenziwa. Ngakho uNkulunkulu wadala izinkanyiso ezimbili ezinkulu, ukukhanya okukhulu ukuze kubuse imini, nesikhanyiso esincanyana ukuba sibuse ebusuku (Genesise 1:14-16).
5 Ngosuku lwesihlanu, uNkulunkulu wathi: “Amanzi mawande nezilwane eziphilayo, kundiza izinyoni phezu komhlaba nasemkhathini.”
6 Ngosuku lwesithupha uNkulunkulu wathi: “Umhlaba mawuveze izilwane eziphilayo ngezinhlobo zazo: izinkomo, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, nezilo zasendle ngezinhlobo zazo. UNkulunkulu wathi: “Masenze abantu ngomfanekiso wethu, basifuze, babuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezinkomo ezisemhlabeni, nomhlaba wonke, naphezu komhlaba wonke. zonke izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ” Ngakho uNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu wabadala owesilisa nowesifazane. ( Genesise 1:24, 26-27 )
7 Ngosuku lwesikhombisa kwaqedwa konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo waphela, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi Wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. ( Genesise 2:1-2 )

(2) Isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwehlela wonke umuntu.

buza: " abantu "Kungani ufe?
impendulo: " fa ” saphuma esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwehlela wonke umuntu

buza: " wonke umuntu "Isono sivelaphi?

impendulo: " ubugebengu “Kusukela ku-Adamu umuntu oyedwa wangena emhlabeni, futhi bonke bonile.

buza: Kungani u-Adamu enecala?
impendulo: ngoba" umthetho ", Ukwephula umthetho, ukweqa umthetho, kuyisono → Noma ubani owonayo weqa umthetho; owephula umthetho kuyisono. Reference (1 Johane 3:4) → Noma ubani owona ngaphandle komthetho uyokwephula nomthetho. Umthetho uyabhubha. ; yilowo nalowo owona phansi komthetho uyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho (KwabaseRoma 2:12). Qaphela: Labo abangenawo umthetho ngeke balahlwe ngokomthetho, labo abephula umthetho bayokwahlulelwa, balahlwe futhi babhujiswe ngokomthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

buza: Umthetho ka-Adamu" umyalo "Kwenzenjani?"
impendulo: Ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi → UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala, ethi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kodwa ungawudli umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi. , ngoba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa!” ( Genesise 2:16-17 )

buza: Ubani owalinga u-Eva no-Adamu ukuba bone emthethweni?
impendulo: " inyoka “Udeveli walinga—u-Eva no-Adamu bonile.
Lokhu kunjengoba isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwehlela wonke umuntu ngenxa yokuthi wonke umuntu wona. ( Roma 5:12 )

Qaphela: Umuntu oyedwa wona, waletha isono kubo bonke, futhi bonke bona u-Adamu waqalekiswa ngomthetho, futhi bonke baqalekiswa ngomthetho Isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, futhi umhlaba waqalekiswa, futhi umhlaba waqalekiswa U-Adamu Ngenxa yokuthi umhlaba uqalekisiwe, ngeke usakwazi ukukhiqiza ameva namakhakhasi. "Isintu singaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho" → Isintu kuyodingeka sisebenze kanzima futhi sijuluke emhlabeni ukuze siziphilise kuze kube sekufeni futhi size sibuyele othulini. ( Genesise 3:17-19 )

(3) Izwe lonakele phambi kukaNkulunkulu

1 UKayini wabulala umfowabo u-Abela → UKayini wayekhuluma nomfowabo u-Abela; UKhayini wasukuma washaya umfowabo u-Abela, wambulala. ( Genesise 4:8 )

2 Umhlaba wonakele phambi kukaNkulunkulu:

(1) Izikhukhula zakhukhula umhlaba zabhubhisa umhlaba
UJehova wabona ukuthi ububi bomuntu bukhulu kakhulu emhlabeni, nokuthi yonke imicabango yemicabango yakhe mibi kuphela ngaso sonke isikhathi...Izwe lonakalisiwe phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi umhlaba wawugcwele ubudlova. UNkulunkulu wawubuka umhlaba, wabona ukuthi wonakele; Khona-ke uNkulunkulu wathi kuNowa: “Ukuphela kwayo yonke inyama sekufikile phambi kwami, ngokuba umhlaba ugcwele ubudlova bayo; umhlaba futhi wabhubhisa umhlaba wonke;
(2) Ekupheleni kwezwe, liyoshiswa futhi lincibilike ngomlilo
Bakhohlwa ngamabomu ukuthi kusukela kudala, amazulu ayekhona ngomyalo kaNkulunkulu, futhi umhlaba waphuma futhi waboleka amanzi. Ngakho-ke, izwe ngaleso sikhathi labhujiswa ngamanzi. Kodwa izulu lamanje nomhlaba kusekhona ngaleso siphetho kuze kube usuku lapho abangamesabi uNkulunkulu beyakwahlulelwa futhi babhujiswe, futhi bashiswe ngomlilo. …Kodwa usuku lweNkosi luyofika njengesela. Ngalolo suku, amazulu ayodlula ngomsindo omkhulu, futhi zonke izinto ezibonakalayo ziyoshiswa ngomlilo, futhi umhlaba nakho konke okukuwo kuyoshiswa. (Funda eyesi-2 Petru 3:5-7, 10.)

(4) Asibona abezwe

1 Labo abazelwe ngokusha abasibo abezwe

ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. ( Johane 17:14 )
buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuba ngowezwe?
impendulo: Umhlaba ungowezwe, uthuli lungolwezwe, u-Adamu owavela emhlabeni ungowomhlaba, nenyama yethu ezelwe ngabazali baka-Adamu iphuma ezweni.

buza: Ubani ongeyena owomhlaba?
impendulo: " ukuzalwa kabusha "Abantu abangebona abezwe!"

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya,
2 Bazalwa ngeqiniso levangeli ,
3 Nizelwe nguNkulunkulu!

Lokho okuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya. Inkomba ( Johane 3:6 ) → Indoda Yomoya! Okomoya, okwasezulwini, okwaphezulu, hhayi okothuli, ngakho " ukuzalwa kabusha "Abafayo akubona abomhlaba. Uyezwa?"
Okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama. Ingabe labo abazalwa emzimbeni wenyama bazokufa? uzofa. Konke okuzelwe yinyama, konke okwenziwe ngothuli, konke okwezwe kuyoshiswa kushabalale;
Kuphela " umoya "okuluhlaza" umuntu womoya "Anisoze nafa! → Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho: "Noma ubani ophilayo futhi okholwa yimi akasoze afa. Uyakukholwa lokhu? “Inkomba (Johane 11:26), Labo abaphila futhi bakholelwa kuJesu” umzimba wenyama "Ingabe uzokufa? Uzokufa, akunjalo! UJesu wavusa uLazaru owayengcwatshwe ethuneni izinsuku ezine. Ingabe umzimba wakhe wenyama uzofa? Ingabe uyokonakala? Uzobola, afe futhi abuyele othulini. Right! → Kuphela Yini? UNkulunkulu uvukile akakubonanga ukubola (Izenzo 13:37). ozelwe nguNkulunkulu , engaboni ukubola, ingabe ibhekisela kulowo muntu? Kusho ukuzalwa kabusha" umuntu womoya "Noma umuntu wenyama ngothuli? Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu" umuntu womoya →UJesu washo lokhu ukuze aqonde lokho ukuzalwa kabusha kwe" umuntu womoya "Ungalokothi ufe! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

2 UNkulunkulu uzadiliza amathente ethu emhlabeni

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukudiliza amatende asemhlabeni?
impendulo: " itende emhlabeni ” ibhekisela enyameni eyenziwe ngothuli lomuntu omdala → Ukufa kukaJesu kwenziwa kithi ukuze kubhubhise lomzimba wokufa, umzimba owohlokayo kancane kancane, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kukhule futhi kubonakale kithi inqubo yokucekela phansi inyama ibuhlungu kodwa inhliziyo iyajabula Ngakho-ke asidangali noma sichithwa ngaphandle, kodwa ngaphakathi senziwa basha usuku nosuku. Ngokuba ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuyakusisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo... lo mhlaba uwukuthi Uma ubhujiswa, uyobuyiselwa Indlu eyakhiwe nguNkulunkulu ingeyenziwe ngezandla, isezulwini kuze kube phakade; kuleli tende, engathandi ukukhumula lokhu, kodwa ukwembatha lokhu, ukuze lokhu okufayo kugingwe ngukuphila ( 2 Korinte 4:16 . 5:1-4 izigaba )

3 Ezweni nasenkazimulweni

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. ( Kolose 3:3-4 )

buza: Ithi lapha → Ngoba "usuvele ufile", ingabe sesifile ngempela? Ungibona kanjani ngisaphila?
impendulo: Awusaphili manje, ufile! wena" Omusha ” ukuphila kwakho kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu lokho wena “”. bona “Umzimba wesono wafa kanye noKristu, yena ufile → Ngokuba amehlo ethu asigxili kokubonwayo, kodwa okungabonwayo; ngokuba okubonwayo kungokwesikhashana, kepha okungabonwayo kungokwesikhashana. phakade.” ( 2 Korinte Isahluko 4, ivesi 18 )

Qaphela: Uthini manje bona "Umzimba womuntu ungowesikhashana. Lo mzimba wesono owohlokayo kancane kancane uzobuyela othulini futhi ufile emehlweni kaNkulunkulu. Ngemva kokukholelwa kuJesu, kufanele futhi bheka ngifile, angisaphili; Angiboni "Umuntu omusha owenziwe kabusha ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. UKristu uyimpilo yethu. Lapho uKristu ebuya futhi, lapho Evela! (Engabonakali Omusha Kulapho kuphela ongabona khona, isimo sikaKristu sangempela sizovela, futhi isimo sakho sangempela sizovela) , futhi nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sihlolile, sahlanganyela, futhi sabelane lapha kushicilelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu, Isifundo 8

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila! Ukhunjulwe iNkosi. Amen!

Ihubo: Asibona abomhlaba

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Ake siphendukele eBhayibhelini, uJohane Isahluko 1, ivesi 17: Umthetho wanikezwa ngoMose, umusa neqiniso kwavela ngoJesu Kristu .

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 6 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kulethwa kude esibhakabhakeni, futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze kusenze sibe umuntu omusha, indoda yomoya, indoda yomoya! Ukuba ngumuntu omusha usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuqala kwemfundiso okufanele ishiye uKristu: Ukushiya iTestamente Elidala nokungena eTestamenteni Elisha ;

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) ITestamente Elidala

Kusukela kuGenesise... Malaki → ITestamente Elidala

1 Umthetho Ka-Adamu

Insimu Yase-Edene: Umthetho Ka-Adamu→Umyalelo othi “Ungadli” isivumelwano
UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kodwa ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngoba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” 2 Isahluko 16) -17 amafindo)

2 UMthetho KaMose

INtaba iSinayi (iNtaba iHorebe) uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nama-Israyeli
UMose wabizela ndawonye bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kubo: “O Israyeli, lalela izimiso nezahlulelo engizisho kini namuhla, ukuze nizifunde futhi nizenze. UJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi entabeni yaseHorebe. Lesi sivumelwano akusona esasungulwa nokhokho bethu samiswa kanye nathi esiphila lapha namuhla (Duteronomi 5:1-3).

buza: Wawuhlanganisani uMthetho KaMose?
impendulo: Imiyalo, izimiso, izimiso, imithetho, njll.

1 umyalo : Imiyalo Eyishumi—Izikhombo ( Eksodusi 20:1-17 )
2 imithetho : Iziqondiso ezibekwe ngokomthetho, njengeziqondiso zeminikelo yokushiswa, iminikelo yempuphu, iminikelo yokuthula, iminikelo yesono, iminikelo yecala, iminikelo yokuphakanyiswa neminikelo yokuzuliswa... njll.! Bheka kuLevitikusi nakuNumeri 31:21
3 Imithetho nemithetho: Ukuqaliswa nokusebenza kwemithetho neziqondiso, njengezimiso zokwakha indlu engcwele, umphongolo wesivumelwano, itafula lezinkwa zokubukwa, izibani, amakhethini namakhethini, ama-altare, izingubo zabapristi, njll. → ( 1 AmaKhosi 2:3 ) Qaphela umyalo kaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, uhambe ngendlela yakhe njengokulotshiweyo emthethweni kaMose, ugcine izimiso zakhe, nemiyalo yakhe, nezahlulelo zakhe, nobufakazi bakhe. Ngale ndlela, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi wenzani, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi uya kuphi, uyophumelela.

(2) ITestamente Elisha

Mathewu…………Isambulo→iTestamente Elisha

umthetho Sanikwa ngoMose; umusa neqiniso Konke kuvela kuJesu Kristu. Inkomba (Johane 1:17)

1 ITestamente Elidala: Umthetho wanikezwa ngoMose
2 ITestamente Elisha: Kokubili umusa neqiniso kuvela kuJesu Kristu ITestamente Elisha lishumayela umusa neqiniso likaJesu Kristu, hhayi umthetho. Kungani “iTestamente Elisha” lingashumayeli iMithetho Eyishumi, izimiso, izimiso, nemithetho yeTestamente Elidala? Sizokhuluma ngakho ngezansi.

buza: Shumayela umusa kaJesu Kristu! Uyini umusa?
impendulo: Labo abakholelwa kuJesu balungisiswa ngokukhululekile futhi bathola ukuphila okuphakade mahhala → lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi umusa! ( Roma 3:24-26 )
Labo abasebenzayo abatholi inkokhelo njengesipho, kodwa njengomvuzo → Uma uzigcinela umthetho, ingabe uyasebenza? Kungumsebenzi. Uma ugcina umthetho, imuphi umholo oyowuthola? Ukukhululeka ekwahlulelweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho → Noma ubani osekelwe ekwenzeni umthetho uqalekisiwe. Uma ugcina umthetho futhi uwenza, "ingabe ungawugcina? Uma ungeke, uzowuthola muni umholo? → Inkokhelo eniyitholayo iyisiqalekiso. Inkomba ( Galathiya 3:10-11 ) Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu? ?
Kodwa kulowo ongenzi imisebenzi kodwa ekholwa kuNkulunkulu olungisisa ongamesabi uNkulunkulu, ukukholwa kwakhe kuyakuthiwa ukulunga. Qaphela: " Kuphela "Kusho ukuthi, thembela okholweni kuphela, kholwa kuphela →" Ukulungisiswa ngokukholwa →Lo Nkulunkulu olungileyo Isekelwe okholweni futhi iholela okholweni! UNkulunkulu ulungisisa ongamesabi uNkulunkulu, nokukholwa kwakhe kubalwa njengokulunga. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Inkomba ( Roma 4:4-5 ). Umusa uvela ngokukholwa; Ngakho-ke, njengoba kungomusa, akuncikile emisebenzini; Inkomba ( Roma 11:6 )

buza: Liyini iqiniso?

impendulo: UJesu uyiqiniso ! " iqiniso ” Ngeke nje kushintshe, kungunaphakade → UMoya oNgcwele iqiniso, uJesu iqiniso, ubaba unkulunkulu Kuyiqiniso! UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kokuba eze ngami.” ( Johane 14:6 ) Ingabe uyaqonda?

(3) ITestamente Elidala lalisebenzisa izinkomo nezimvu Igazi Yenza isivumelwano

Ngakho-ke isivumelwano sokuqala asenziwanga ngaphandle kwegazi, ngokuba lapho uMose eyala abantu ngokomthetho, wathatha iveli ebomvu nehisopi, wafafaza izincwadi ngegazi lamathole nelezimbuzi kubo bonke abantu, ethi: “Leli gazi liyisibambiso sesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu nani.” ( KumaHeberu 9:18-20 )

(4) ITestamente Elisha lisebenzisa elikaKristu Igazi Yenza isivumelwano

Engangishumayeza ngakho yikho engakwamukela eNkosini Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa ngenxa yami. wena." Imiqulu: ephukile), kufanele wenze lokhu ukuze urekhode Ngikhumbuleni.” Ngemva kokudla, wathatha nendebe, wathi: “Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami, noma nini lapho niphuza kuyo, kwenzeni lokhu ningikhumbula.” Noma nini lapho sidla lesi sinkwa futhi siphuza le ndebe , siveza ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike. ( 1 Korinte 11:23-26 )

buza: Isivumelwano esisha uJesu asenza nathi ngegazi lakhe siqu! → Ukuze ungikhumbule! Nakhu" khumbula "Ingabe kuwuphawu njengesikhumbuzo? Cha.
impendulo: " khumbula "Khumbula nje," funda "Khumbulani nje futhi nikhumbule! → Noma nini lapho nidla futhi niphuza umzimba negazi leNkosi," khumbula "khumbula, cabanga Ithi iNkosi! Yathini iNkosi uJesu kithi? → 1 UJesu uyisinkwa sokuphila, 2 Ukudla nokuphuza inyama negazi leNkosi kuyoholela ekuphileni okuphakade, futhi siyovuswa ngosuku lokugcina, okungukuthi, umzimba uyohlengwa → UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, uma nidle inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi leNdodana yomuntu, aninakuphila kinina; Inyama yami ingukudla isibili, negazi lami lihlala kimi, nami kuye. Isikhombo ( Johane 6:48.53-56 ) kanye Nezikhombo
( Johane 14:26 ) Kodwa uMsizi, uMoya oNgcwele, uBaba azowuthumela egameni lami, uyonifundisa zonke izinto futhi ngikubize cabanga konke engikushilo kuwe . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(5) Izinkomo nezimvu zeTestamente Elidala Igazi Awukwazi ukususa isono

buza: Igazi lezinkomo nelezimvu lingazisusa izono na?
impendulo: Isono asisoze saqedwa, isono asisoze saqedwa.
Kodwa le mihlatshelo yayiyisikhumbuzo sonyaka sesono, ngoba igazi lezinkunzi nelezimbuzi lalingenakususa isono. … Wonke umpristi oma usuku nosuku ekhonza uNkulunkulu, enikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo ngokuphindaphindiwe, akasoze asusa isono. ( Hebheru 10:3-4, 11 )

(6) EkaKristu eTestamenteni Elisha Igazi Kuphela kanye Igeza izono zabantu futhi isuse izono zabantu

buza: Ingabe igazi likaJesu Kristu lizihlanza izono kanye unomphela?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 UJesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi , Kuphela" kanye “Ngenani eNdaweni Engcwele ngenjongo yokubuyisana okuphakade.”—Hebheru 9:12
2 Ngoba yena kuphela" kanye “Zinikele, futhi kuyokwenzeka.”— Hebheru 7:27
3 Manje ivela ezinsukwini zokugcina" kanye “, uzinikele wena ube ngumhlatshelo wokususa isono - Heberu 9:26
4 Kusukela kuKristu" kanye “Wanikelwa ukuba athwale izono zabaningi.”— Hebheru 9:28
5 NgoJesu Kristu kuphela" kanye “Nikela umzimba wakhe ukuba ungcweliswe.”—Hebheru 10:10
6 UKristu wanikela" kanye “Umhlatshelo wezono waphakade uhlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu wami.”— Heberu 10:11
7 Ngoba yena" kanye “Imihlatshelo yenza labo abangcwelisiwe baphelele phakade - KumaHeberu 10:14

Qaphela: Isifundo seBhayibheli ngenhla Isikhombisa umuntu ngamunye" kanye ","" Isikhombisa "Iphelele noma cha? Iphelele! → UJesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi , Kuphela" kanye “Ngenani endaweni engcwele, nihlambulule abantu ezonweni zabo, niphelelisa ukubuyisana kwaphakade, nibenze abangcwelisiweyo bapheleliswe phakade. Ngale ndlela, niqonda kahle na? Bheka kumaHeberu 1:3 noJohane 1:17

buza: manje lokho incwadi KaJesu Igazi " kanye "Uhlanza izono zabantu → Kungani ngihlale ngizizwa nginecala? Kufanele ngenzenjani uma ngonile?"
impendulo: Kungani uzizwa unecala? Kungenxa yokuthi labo badala bamanga, abefundisi bamanga, nabashumayeli bamanga abakayiqondi insindiso kaKristu futhi abaqondi “insindiso” kaKristu. igazi eliyigugu "Njengoba igazi lezinkomo nezimvu eTestamenteni Elidala ligeza izono, ngikufundisa → igazi lezinkomo nezimvu alisoze lasusa izono, ngakho uhlale uzizwa unecala nsuku zonke, uvume izono zakho futhi uphenduke nsuku zonke, uphenduke imisebenzi yenu efileyo, nikhulekele umusa waKhe mihla yonke. Igazi Hlanza izono, wesule izono. Geza namuhla, geza kusasa, geza ngakusasa → "isivumelwano sokungcwelisa iNkosi uJesu" igazi eliyigugu "Njengenjwayelo, ngokwenza lokhu, ingabe nidelela uMoya oNgcwele womusa? Anesabi yini? Ngesaba ukuthi nilandele indlela yamanga! Niyaqonda na? Inkomba ( KumaHeberu Isahluko 10, ivesi 29 ).

Qaphela: Ibhayibheli libhala ukuthi labo abangcwelisiwe bayobe bephelele phakade (KumaHebheru 10:14); amaqhinga okukhohlisa abantu. ukudida ngamabomu Uzothatha iNkosi uJesu" igazi eliyigugu "Kuphathe njengokujwayelekile. Uyezwa?"

buza: Yini okufanele ngiyenze uma ngenza ubugebengu?
impendulo: Lapho ukholwa kuJesu, awusekho ngaphansi komthetho, kodwa ungaphansi komusa → KuKristu ukhululiwe emthethweni, awusekho umthetho okulahlayo. Njengoba ungekho umthetho, isono asibalelwa njengesono. Ufa kanye noKristu. Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile futhi asibalwa njengesono. Uyaqonda? Inkomba (Hebheru 10:17-18, Roma 5:13, Roma 7:8)→Inkomba” uPaul "Ungasifundisa kanjani ukubhekana neziphambeko zenyama→" Inyama nomoya empini “Zonda impilo yesono futhi ulondoloze impilo entsha ibe ukuphila okuphakade ubugebengu Futhi nini bheka yena uqobo fa la; kuNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu, bheka yena uqobo phila kwe. Inkomba ( Roma 6:11 ), uyakuqonda lokhu?

(7) Umthetho weTestamente Elidala uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo

1 Umthetho wawuyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo - (Hebheru 10: 1)
2 Imithetho neziqondiso ziyisithunzi sezinto ezizayo - (Kolose 2:16-17)
3 U-Adamu wayewumfuziselo womuntu owayezofika— (Roma 5:14)

(8) Umfanekiso wangempela womthetho weTestamente Elisha uKristu

buza: Uma umthetho uyisithunzi sento enhle, ufana nobani na?
impendulo: " into yokuqala “Kubukeka sengathi UKristu ! Lokho umzimba Kodwa kunjalo UKristu , okusemthethweni Fingqa leyo UKristu ! U-Adamu uwumfanekiso, isithunzi, isithombe → UKristu uwumfanekiso wangempela wobunjalo bukaNkulunkulu!

1 U-Adamu uwumfanekiso, futhi u-Adamu wokugcina “uJesu” ungumfanekiso wangempela;
2 Umthetho uyisithunzi sento enhle, engokoqobo enguKristu;
3 Imithetho neziqondiso ziyisithunzi sezinto ezizayo, kodwa isimo singuKristu;

Ukulunga okufunwa ngumthetho luthando! Umyalo omkhulu kunayo yonke emthethweni iwukuba uthande uNkulunkulu futhi uthande umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena amalunga omzimba wakhe uJesu Sithande njengoba uzithanda wena! Ngakho-ke, isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu, futhi umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho nguKristu! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Inkomba (Roma 10:4, Mathewu 22:37-40)

(9) Imithetho yeTestamente Elidala yayibhalwe ezibhebheni zamatshe

U-Eksodusi 24:12 UJehova wathi kuMose: “Khuphukela kimi entabeni, uhlale lapha, ngikunike izibhebhe zamatshe, umthetho wami, nemiyalo yami engiyilobileyo ukuba ufundise abantu. ."

(10) Imithetho yeTestamente Elisha ibhalwe ezibhebheni zenhliziyo

“Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke phakathi kwabo” ( KumaHeberu 10:16 )

buza: “ETestamenteni Elisha” uNkulunkulu ubhala “umthetho” ezinhliziyweni zethu futhi awufake ngaphakathi kwethu → Ingabe lokhu akukhona ukugcina umthetho?
impendulo: Isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu, futhi umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho nguKristu! UNkulunkulu ubhala umthetho ezinhliziyweni zethu futhi uwufake kithi → Ubeka [uKristu] kithina uKristu ukimi nami ngikuKristu.

(1) UKristu uwugcwalisile umthetho futhi wagcina umthetho → ngigcwalise umthetho futhi ngagcina umthetho ngaphandle kokwephula ngisho nowodwa.
(2) UKristu akanasono futhi akanakona → Mina, owazalwa nguNkulunkulu, izwi likaKristu, uMoya oNgcwele namanzi, anginasono futhi angeke one. Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona (1 Johane 3:9 no 5:18)

1 Ngizwa iZwi, ngiyakholwa, futhi ngigcina iZwi→" umgwaqo “NguNkulunkulu. UJesu Kristu unguNkulunkulu! Amen
2 ngiyagcina" umgwaqo ", ligcinwe ngokuqinile nguMoya oNgcwele" indlela enhle " ,leyo Gcina uKristu, gcina uNkulunkulu, gcina iZwi ! Amen
3 Isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu, futhi umfanekiso wangempela womthetho nguKristu → kuKristu I gcina UKristu, gcina Tao, kunjalo Gcina uphephile Ngithole umthetho. Amen! Alikho nelilodwa ichashaza lomthetho elingaqedwa, futhi konke kufanele kugcwaliseke → Sisebenzisa " incwadi "Indlela yeNkosi, sebenzisa" incwadi "Ukugcina umthetho, ungaphuli ngisho nowodwa umugqa, konke kuzofezeka. Amen!

Sisebenzisa" incwadi "Umthetho weNkosi, umthetho nemiyalo akunzima ukuwugcina, akunzima! Kulungile? → Siyamthanda uNkulunkulu lapho sigcina imiyalo yakhe, futhi imiyalo yaKhe ayinzima ukuyigcina. ( 1 Johane 5 ) Isahluko 3 . , uyaqonda?
Uma uhamba" gcina "Kubhalwe Ezibhebheni" amazwi Kunzima yini ukuwugcina Kunzima kakhulu ukuwugcina ngoba incwadi ibulala abantu isiqalekiso somthetho, ngokuba umthetho wombhalo uyisithunzi. Isithunzi "Ayinalutho, futhi awukwazi ukuyibamba noma ukuyibamba. Uyezwa?"

(11) Isivumelwano sangaphambili sigugile, siyaguga futhi siwohloka, futhi sizoshabalala maduze.

Manje njengoba sikhuluma ngesivumelwano esisha, isivumelwano sokuqala siyaguga; ( Hebheru 8:13 )

(12) UKristu wazisebenzisela ukwenza isivumelwano esiphakade Igazi Yenza isivumelwano esisha nathi

Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona indawo yokubheka isivumelwano sakamuva. ( Hebheru 8:7 )
Kodwa kuNkulunkulu wokuthula owavusa kwabafileyo uMalusi omkhulu wezimvu ngegazi lesivumelwano esiphakade (Hebheru 13:20).

buza: Isivumelwano sokuqala siyisivumelwano esidala, ngakho sibizwa ngokuthi iTestamente Elidala → Ayini amaphutha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Isivumelwano sokuqala siyisithunzi, u-Adamu uyisithunzi, umhlaba ungumfanekiso, futhi wonke amathunzi kufanele adlule. Ekupheleni kwenkathi, izinto zizoguga futhi ziphele. Ngakho-ke, okwakusesivumelwaneni sokuqala kuzophela maduze.
2 Umthetho wesivumelwano sokuqala wawubuthakathaka futhi wawungenamsebenzi wesikole samabanga aphansi-- (Galathiya 4:9)
3 Imithetho nemithetho yesivumelwano sokuqala yayibuthakathaka futhi ingenamsebenzi futhi ayizuzanga lutho - (Hebheru 7: 18-19)
Akagcini nje ngokuthi " ITestamente Elisha 》Ngokuqondene nesivumelwano esidala, esidala nesibolayo, sesizonyamalala, iTestamente Elidala liyisithunzi, isikole samabanga aphansi esibuthakathaka nesingenamsebenzi, esibuthakathaka nesingenamsebenzi, futhi asifezi lutho → UJesu Kristu walethela ithemba elingcono → UJesu Kristu. wazisebenzisa ingunaphakade Igazi lesivumelwano limisa isivumelwano esisha nathi! Amen.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sihlolile, sahlanganyela, futhi sabelane lapha kushicilelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu, Isifundo 7

Ukwabelana ngemibhalo yevangeli, egqugquzelwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu: UMfowethu Wang*yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila! Ukhunjulwe iNkosi. Amen!

Ihubo: "Umusa Omangalisayo" eTestamenteni Elisha

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kumaHeberu Isahluko 6, ivesi 2, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Imibhabhadiso, nokubeka izandla, nokuvuka kwabafileyo, nokwahlulelwa okuphakade .

Namuhla sizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kube okucebile futhi kuvuselelwe usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya, futhi siqonde ukuqala kwemfundiso okufanele ishiye uKristu. Shiya incwadi, isimiso, isithunzi, umthetho wokulahlwa .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

buza: Kungani ushiya → izimfundiso zobhapathizo, ukubekwa izandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo, nokwahlulelwa kwaphakade?
impendulo: 1 “Ubhapathizo” → Sibhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu kanye kuphela;

2 Ukubekwa izandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo → Siyafa, siyangcwatshwa, futhi sivuka futhi noKristu kanye kuphela;

3 Nemfundiso yokwahlulela okuphakade kuwo wonke amazinga → UKristu wahlulelwa ngomthetho kanye kuphela ngenxa yezono zethu, futhi wagcwalisa umthetho kanye kuphela → Safa noKristu futhi sahlulelwa kanye kuphela, ngeke kube khona izahlulelo eziningi noma ukwahlulelwa okuphakade ezingeni ngalinye isifundo. Ngakho lezi yiziqalo futhi zonke kufanele zihambe → Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Umthetho ngaphandle kwethunzi, izimiso, incwadi, izimiso zenyama

(1) UJesu wasihlenga ngaphansi komthetho

Kodwa lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Galathiya 4:4-5

buza: Abangaphansi komthetho banabo yini abantwana bakaNkulunkulu?
impendulo: Cha . Umthetho "wezincwadi, izimiso, noma izimiso" ulahla abantu, futhi izincwadi zibulala abantu → Izincwadi zomthetho, ngoba angikwazi ukugcina izimiso, ziyangilahla, zingiqalekise futhi zingahlulele. Ngakho-ke, incwadi ibangela ukufa, futhi umthetho ubangela ukufa, ungumuntu ofileyo futhi awunabo ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu. Uyaqonda?

(2) UJesu wesula umthetho, wawususa futhi wawubethela esiphambanweni

...owanenza niphile kanye noKristu, wesula nombhalo wesandla wezimiso owawumelene nathi, owawumelene nathi, ebasusa endleleni, ebabethela esiphambanweni. Kolose 2:13-14

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukwesula umthetho, ukuwususa nokuwubethela?
impendulo: Wakuphilisa kanye noKristu → "nizalwe ngokusha, nina madodana kaNkulunkulu, abalungileyo nabasezulwini, hhayi izinceku" → Wabuye wesula "imithetho" okuyizimiso ezilotshwe emthethweni, ezisihlaselayo "Ubufakazi bephepha" okwasivimbela → kwakuwubufakazi, ubufakazi obahlasela futhi bangahlulela futhi bangilahla, basuswa futhi babethelwa esiphambanweni. Uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke, izincwadi zomthetho ngezokufa, futhi izimiso zomthetho nezimiso zenyama → ngezomuntu omdala. inceku “Awumiselwanga izoni” umuntu olungileyo “Eyamiswa yiNdodana - bheka eyoku-1 Thimothewu isahluko 8 ivesi 9. UKristu uye wayisusa imithetho neziqondiso ‘zomuntu ozelwe uNkulunkulu’ wethu. wasulwa futhi wawasusa esiphambanweni → ngoba lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho mthetho. Kukhona iziphambeko ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono ngaphandle kwemithetho neziqondiso angeke wagwetshwa, ngakho isono asithathwa njengesono, ngoba umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni uma ehlala kuKristu , ngisho naye akoni Angeke uzehlulele noma uzisole?

(3) Sikhululekile emthethweni

buza: Kungani wephula umthetho?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - Roma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono - KwabaseRoma 5:13
3 Ngokuba ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile - KwabaseRoma 7:8

Njengoba uPawulu asho → Ngakho-ke, singathini? Umthetho uyisono na? Lutho neze! Kodwa uma bekungengenxa yomthetho, bengingeke ngisazi ukuthi siyini isono. Ngaphandle kokuthi umthetho uthi, “Ungahaha,” bengingeke ngikwazi ukuthi ukuhaha kuyini. Nokho, isono sathola ithuba lokuvusa yonke inhlobo yokuhaha ngomyalo; Ngingakaphili ngaphandle komthetho; Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:7-9. Qaphela: Lapho umyalo womthetho ufika, isono siyaphila futhi → ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile Uma ufuna umthetho futhi ugcine umthetho → kufanele " ubugebengu "konke phila Uma ufa, uzokufa. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokho uNkulunkulu akusho ngoPawulu?

buza: Indlela yokubalekela umthetho?
impendulo: Ukhululwe emthethweni ngomzimba kaKristu obethelwe esiphambanweni→uKristu yedwa okwe Uma bonke befa, bonke bafile → Kanjalo, bazalwane bami, nani nafile kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu... Roma 7:4 → Kepha njengoba sibopha umthetho wethu njengabafileyo kuwo umthetho, manje sesikhululekile kuwo. umthetho ukuze sikhonze uJehova ( Yilabo kuphela abakhululekile emthethweni futhi bengamadodana abangakhonza iNkosi ; uma ungakhululekile emthethweni futhi uyisigqila sesono, ngeke ukwazi ukukhonza iNkosi, ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele), hhayi ngokuvumelana nomdala omdala; indlela yesiko. Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:6, uyaqonda?

(4) Imithetho neziqondiso ziyizikole zamabanga aphansi ezintekenteke nezingenamsebenzi

buza: Kungani isikole samabanga aphansi esingamagwala nesingenamsebenzi?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuthi kuneziqondiso emthethweni, asinakuzigcina ngokwethembela enyameni, futhi umthetho uyongahlulela futhi ungigwebele ukufa, ngakho isikole samabanga aphansi esinobugwala nesingenamsebenzi → Manje njengoba usumazi uNkulunkulu, futhi kungenzeka wathi waziwa nguNkulunkulu, usakudingani ubuyela kulesiya sikole samabanga aphansi esingamagwala, uzimisele ukuphinde ube yisigqila sakhe? Bheka kwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 4 Ivesi 9

(5) Umthetho ugcina ungafezi lutho

buza: Kungani kuthiwa umthetho awufezanga lutho?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuthi asikwazi ukugcina imithetho yomthetho, ibuthakathaka futhi ayisizi ngalutho, isikole samabanga aphansi esingamagwala nesingenamsebenzi walutho, uJesu “wawusula, wawuqeda, wawuqeda” ngokufa. Ngakho, uyaqonda? →Isimiso sangaphambili, sibuthakathaka futhi singenamsebenzi, saqedwa (umthetho awufezanga lutho), kwase kufakwa ithemba elingcono, esingasondela ngalo kuNkulunkulu. Bheka kumaHeberu 7:18-19

(6) Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo

Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ungewona umfanekiso wento, ungephelelise labo abasondelayo ngokunikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo iminyaka ngeminyaka. Hebheru 10:1

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo?
impendulo: Ingabe “u-Adamu” kuGenesise wadalwa ngomfanekiso “kaJehova uNkulunkulu”? Yebo! Ngakho ingabe “uJesu” unguNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke, uYise Ongunaphakade, neNkosi Yokuthula? UJesu wathi kuFiliphu! Ongibonile mina umbonile uBaba - bheka kuJohane 14:9-11. “U-Adamu” ubizwa ngokuthi umuntu ngoba wadalwa ngomfanekiso nangokufana “kaJesu” owayengakabi sesimweni somuntu, akunjalo? kanjalo" U-Adamu "Isibikezelo singokoqobo futhi siyithunzi! Isithombe sangempela sithi" UJesu ", obizwa ngokuthi u-Adamu wokugcina! Kulungile? Khona-ke umthetho uwumthetho wenyama, osungulwe abantu benyama → Hebheru 7:16 " UJesu “Waba umpristi, hhayi ngokwezimiso zenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli (okwakuqala, okungabhubhiyo). Isithunzi sezinto. U-Adamu nomthetho bobabili" Isithunzi ", ithunzi liyohamba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, libe yize, futhi libuyele libe yize. U-Adamu nomthetho, okungukuthi, iTestamente Elidala, kancane kancane bayoguga futhi banyamalale bengaba yize → Bheka amaHeberu 8:13 , ngakho awukwazi ukugcina umthetho. , kwasekuqaleni kwakuyi " Isithunzi "Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, awusiwo umfanekiso wangempela wento. Umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho nguKristu! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

(7) Isifinyezo somthetho nguKristu, nomfanekiso weqiniso nguKristu

buza: Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ngubani umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho?
impendulo: Umfanekiso womthetho unguKristu, futhi isiphetho somthetho nguKristu → Isiphetho somthetho singuKristu, ukuze wonke okholwa kuye azuze ukulunga. Bheka kwabaseRoma 10:4; kumbe amaSabatha. Lezi ziyizithunzi zezinto ezizayo; kodwa isimo singuKristu. Bheka kwabaseKolose 2:16-17 .

Qaphela: Uma uhlala kuKristu, usemfanekisweni weqiniso, ingqikithi, nomfanekiso weqiniso womthetho → UKristu ugcwalisa umthetho, futhi sigcwalisa umthetho uKristu akanasono futhi akanasono. Ungawephuli umthetho nesono. Ngenxa yokuthi awukho “ethunzini” umthetho, angeke wephule umthetho uma wawuku-Adamu, wawusethunzini, “ inyoka "Ukukulinga uzokwephula umthetho, ukwephula umthetho kuyisono. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Isikhuthazo:

Ngakho-ke, kufanele sishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu→ 1 sukani emisebenzini ezisolayo nefileyo, 2 Yekani isikole samabanga aphansi esinobugwala nesingenamsebenzi, shiyani umthetho ongafezi lutho, gijimani niqonde emgomeni, nilwele ukudlulela ekupheleleni; angifuni Ekuqaleni kwesikole samabanga aphansi, ngavuma izono zami futhi ngaphenduka nsuku zonke futhi ngazisola ngezenzo zami ezimbi; angifuni Ubuyele esikoleni samabanga aphansi esibuthakathaka nesingasizi ngalutho semithetho nemithethonqubo, futhi uzimisele ukuba yisigqila sakhe futhi. angifuni Njengenja ehlanzayo, iphenduka iphinde iyidle futhi; Ingulube ingcolile kini, ngokuba idabula inselo kabili, kepha ayetshisi; " ingulube ” kubhekiselwa kulabo abangcolile nakuba bekwazi ukuhlukanisa iTestamente Elidala neTestamente Elisha, abetshisi. Alukho ukholo oluvumelana nalokho okuzwayo , akusizi lutho kubo, ngakho bahlala bengcolile. Bheka kuLevitikusi isahluko 11 ivesi 7 no-2 Petru isahluko 2 ivesi 22. Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sesiqedile ukuhlola kwethu, ukuhlanganyela, kanye nokwabelana lapha Masihlanganyele kushicilelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu, Isifundo 4 “Shiya Umuntu Omdala Wembathe Umuntu Omusha”.

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kushukunyiswa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu. UKristu. Shumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo Amagama abo alotshwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: Nkosi, Ngiyakholwa

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Xhumana ne-QQ 2029296379

Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.07, 03

articles.title: Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu (Isifundo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kumaHeberu Isahluko 6, ivesi 1, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngakho-ke, kufanele sishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu futhi silwele ukuthuthukela ekupheleleni, ngaphandle kokubeka ezinye izisekelo, njengokuphenduka emisebenzini efileyo nokuthembela kuNkulunkulu.

Namuhla ngizoqhubeka nokufunda, ukuhlanganyela, nokwabelana " Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu 》Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi uthandaze: Aba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude, futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze impilo yethu engokomoya ibe cebile, futhi kuyoba entsha usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi kufanele sishiye isiqalo sezimfundiso zikaKristu, njengokuthi → ukuphenduka emisebenzini efile nokuthembela kuNkulunkulu .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ukukholwa evangelini likaJesu Kristu kuyasikhulula esonweni

---Ivangeli likaJesu Kristu---

(1) Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu

buza: Kuyini ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu?
impendulo: Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu—Marku 1:1. UJesu unguMsindisi, uMesiya, noKristu, ngoba ufuna ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen! Ngakho uJesu Kristu uyisiqalo sevangeli. Bheka uMathewu 1:21

(2) Ukukholelwa evangelini kuyasikhulula esonweni

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Lokho mina Pawulu engakwamukela, ngikudlulisela kini: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi wembelwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo, bheka kwabaseKorinte 1 Incwadi 15 amavesi 3-4. Leli ivangeli umphostoli "uPawuli" alishumayela kwabezizwe "ibandla laseKorinte" ukuze sisindise abantu kuphela thina bezizwe. incwadi "Ngalelivangeli, uzosindiswa.

(3) UJesu Kristu wafela bonke

buza: Ubani owafela izono zethu?
impendulo: Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza; UKristu "Umuntu oyedwa okwe Lapho abaningi befa, bonke bayafa; bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14 . Yilokhu uKristu akufela izono zethu ngokweBhayibheli, akunjalo? →1 Petru 2 Isahluko 24 Yena ngokwakhe wathwala izono zethu emzimbeni wakhe emthini, ukuze sife ezonweni futhi siphilele ukulunga...! UJesu Kristu wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa, sonke singabantu, ukuze thina esafa esonweni siphile ekulungeni. Amen! Kulungile? Kuwukuthatha indawo “yethu” “uJesu” olungileyo abangalungile → UNkulunkulu wamenza ongasazi isono (ongenasono: umbhalo wokuqala ukungazi isono) ukuba abe yisono ngenxa yethu, ukuze sibe ukulunga kwesono. UNkulunkulu kuYe. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:21 .

(4) Abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni

buza: Sisibalekela kanjani isono?
impendulo: ngoba Abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni . Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7 → Lapha ukuthi “abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni.” Umzimba wami usaphila! Ingabe kufanele ngilinde ngize ngife ukuze ngikhululeke esonweni? Cha, ngokwesibonelo, wake waba khona ubaba onendodana eyenza isono futhi yagwetshwa ukufa ngokuvumelana nomthetho! Uyise wendodana washesha wayofuna zonke izimiso namazwi acasulayo emthethweni alahla indodana yakhe, wawesula futhi wawasusa, wabe esehlulelwa ngomthetho ngendodana yakhe, waba yisono, wafa ngenxa yendodana yakhe . Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi kuqhubeke indodana yakhululwa esonweni nasesahlulelweni somthetho. Manje indodana isiyindoda elungile! Akuzona izoni, izoni zingaphansi komthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Kungokufanayo ngoJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaBaba Osezulwini → UJesu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa nethandekayo kaBaba waseZulwini, waba inyama.” okwe “Ngokuba saba yisono, saba ngabalungileyo” okwe "Kwabangalungile, ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu → Umuntu oyedwa, uKristu" okwe "Wonke umuntu uyafa, wonke umuntu uyafa → Ingabe wonke umuntu uhlanganisa mina nawe? Kuhlanganisa, kuhlanganise nabantu baseTestamenteni Elidala, abantu baseTestamenteni Elisha, abantu abazalwa, abantu abangakazalwa, bonke abaphuma enyameni ka-Adamu, kanye nazo zonke iziphambeko abafileyo → abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni. incwadi “UJesu Kristu wafa, futhi ungumuntu wami omdala ( incwadi ) ufile, manje angisaphili! ( incwadi ) sonke safa → Lowo ofile ukhululiwe esonweni, futhi bonke bakhululiwe esonweni. Okholwa yiyo akalahlwa, kepha ongakholwayo uselahliwe, ngokuba engakholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa → Igama leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa nguJesu, " igama likaJesu "Kusho ukusindisa abantu bakho ezonweni zabo. Bheka kuJohane Isahluko 3 Amavesi 7-18 kanye noMathewu Isahluko 1 Ivesi 21. UJesu Kristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → ukusindise ezonweni zakho. Uma " Ungakukholwa "uyolahlwa ngumthetho, ngakho" ubugebengu "Kunqunyiwe. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(5) UKristu usihlenga kuso sonke isono

1 Igazi likaJesu liyasihlanza kuso sonke isono-Bheka kuJohane 1:7
2 UJesu usihlenga kuzo zonke izono—Bheka kuThithu 2:14
3 UNkulunkulu usithethelele (thina) zonke iziphambeko zethu - bheka kwabaseKolose 2:13

Okulandelayo yizimfundiso eziyiphutha zebandla lomhlaba wonke namuhla

buza: Abadala nabefundisi abaningi manje bafundisa:
1 Igazi likaJesu liyangihlanza ezonweni zami “zangaphambi kokukholwa”;
2 Angikenzi izono “emva kokuba sengikholiwe”, futhi angenzanga izono zanamuhla, zakusasa, noma zakusasa?
3 Nezono zami ezifihliwe, izono ezisenhliziyweni yami
4 Noma nini lapho ngona, ngiyahlanzwa Igazi likaJesu linamandla aphakade → Uyakukholelwa lokhu? Izimfundiso zabo ziphambuka kanjani eqinisweni leBhayibheli eliphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu wasiphefumulela ngeBhayibheli futhi wathi, “Chaza ngokuningiliziwe ngezansi.”
1 Igazi leNdodana yakhe “uJesu” liyasihlanza ezonweni zonke - 1 Johane 1:7
2 UJesu usihlenga kuzo zonke izono—Bheka kuThithu 2:14
3 UNkulunkulu usithethelele (thina) zonke iziphambeko zethu - bheka kwabaseKolose 2:13

Qaphela: Lithini iqiniso leBhayibheli eliphefumulelwe uNkulunkulu → 1 Igazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlanza konke isono, 2 Uyasihlenga konke isono, 3 UNkulunkulu uyakuthethelela (thina) konke Iziphambeko → hlanza kuzo zonke izono, khulula kuzo zonke izono, thethelela zonke iziphambeko → uJesu’ Igazi " geza zonke izono "Akubandakanyi izono ngaphambi kokuba ngikholwe kuJesu kanye nezono emva kokuba ngikholwe kuJesu? Ingabe zihlanganisa izono ezifihliwe kanye nezono ezisenhliziyweni yami? Ingabe zihlanganisa zonke, akunjalo? Ngokwesibonelo, kusukela kuGenesise. .. → kuya kuMalaki Incwadi ethi..."UKristu Wabethelwa", ingabe izono zabantu eTestamenteni Elidala zigeziwe? iTestamente Elisha lagezwa Yebo noma cha? Yebo. Wavela nini kuGenesise Cha? Wavela nini lapho uJesu ebethelwa esiphambanweni ngekhulu lokuqala AD, akunjalo? , okuwukuphela kwezwe, futhi anizange nifakwe kuleyo nkathi yomlando, akunjalo?

Ngakho uJesu wathi: “Mina ngingowokuqala nowokugcina, mina ngiyisiqalo nesiphetho; UNkulunkulu ubona iminyaka eyinkulungwane njengosuku olulodwa, Yena geza Ngemva kokuthethelela izono zomuntu, wahlala phansi ngakwesokunene soMkhulu ezulwini - bheka amaHeberu 1:3. Ngabahlanza abantu ezonweni zabo ngaphandle kokubonisana nawe. , akunjalo? Uke wazihlanza ezonweni ozenzile phakathi neminyaka eyikhulu noma ngaphezulu yokubukeka kwakho ngokomzimba emlandweni? Konke kugeziwe, akunjalo? Ngakho kumelwe sihlanganiswe noKristu → ngokufana nokufa kwakhe, futhi ngokufana nokuvuka kwakhe → kanjalo, uJesu wathi! Ubunami kwasekuqaleni - bheka uJohane 15:27.

Kusukela ekudalweni kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe, uJesu unathi uhlanza abantu ezonweni zabo → sonke singcwele, singcwelisiwe, futhi silungisisiwe ngaphambi kokuba singene embusweni wakhe.

Uma "uphenduka, uvuma, futhi uphenduka emisebenzini efileyo nsuku zonke", ngiyakwesaba → ngoba ngokuqinisekile uzobuza uJesu " Igazi "Hlanza izono zakho nsuku zonke futhi uzokwamukela uJesu Igazi "njengegazi lezinkomo nelezimvu ukugeza izono futhi lingcwelise isivumelwano sikaKristu" Igazi "Njengokujwayelekile, ucabanga ukuthi ukugeza izono ngale ndlela kuzwakala kujabulisa futhi kungcwele. Ngokwenza lokhu, udelela uMoya oNgcwele womusa. Niyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke, kufanele uphume ephutheni labo futhi ubuyele eBhayibhelini. Uyaqonda? Bheka kumaHeberu 10:29

(6) Njengoba sihlanganiswe kuKristu ekufeni okufana lokufa, sizahlanganiswa laye futhi ekuvukeni kwakhe okufuze

buza: “Sakholwa” ukuthi uKristu wafa, kodwa manje sisaphila na? Ngakho sizoqhubeka nokwenza ubugebengu! Awukakhululi esonweni na? Yini okufanele ngiyenze uma ngenza ubugebengu? Ingabe inkinga?
impendulo: Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? ... Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe; Singa " abhapathizwe “Ukufakwa ekufeni kukaKristu sibalwa kanjani noKristu” okuhlangene "Wabethelwa esiphambanweni → uhlanganiswe naye ngokufana nokufa, usebenzisa" ukuzethemba "Nge" abhapathizwe "Ubunye noKristu ngokufana nokufa kwakhe → ukuze nawe" incwadi “Nina ngokwenu senifile! Umuntu omdala ufile, isoni sifile! → Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Bheka KwabaseKolose 3:3.

Uyakholwa ukuthi ikhehla lifile kanti isoni sifile? Manje akuseyimi ophilayo, nguKristu ophila kimi. uKristu" okwe "Safa, savuswa kwabafileyo futhi" sazalwa kabusha, futhi " okwe "Siphila → Ukuphila akumina, ngiphila ngo-Adamu, ngiphila izoni; uKristu okwe Ngiyaphila, ngiphila uKristu, ngiphila ngenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu uBaba! Manje njengoba ngikuKristu, wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni futhi angoni. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Njengoba uPawulu asho → Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilayo kimi; Ngiyaziphika. Galathiya 2:20.

(7) Bheka isono kanti ufile

buza: Ngemva kokukholelwa kuJesu futhi sizalwa kabusha, yini okufanele siyenze ngeziphambeko zobuntu bethu obudala?
impendulo: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. KwabaseRoma 8:9 → UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya Ongcwele, uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu, okungukuthi, sivuswa kanye noKristu futhi sizalwa ngokusha sibe ngumuntu omusha.” entsha mina ", umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu" umuntu ongokomoya "Hhayi lomuntu omdala wenyama. Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu." Angiboni "Umuntu omusha, ofihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ukuwe; kusukela ku-Adamu, ozelwe uyise nonina." ebonakalayo "Umzimba wesono womuntu omdala wafa ngenxa yesono, futhi umzimba wesono wabhujiswa → uKristu yedwa" okwe "Uma bonke befa, bonke bayafa → Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya uphila ngenxa yokulunga. Roma 8:10, UKristu kithi uzalwa ngokusha, kodwa umzimba ufile ngenxa yokulunga. isono , ngakho uPawulu wathi “umzimba wokufa, umzimba wokonakala” futhi awuyena owomuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu; umuntu womoya Khona manje" entsha mina "Phila ngokulunga kukaNkulunkulu." engabonakali "Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, ofihliwe kuNkulunkulu" entsha mina ", akusiye owa" ebonakalayo ", kusukela ku-Adamu kuya kubazali" ngimdala "Impilo yobugebengu → Ngakho" ITestamente Elisha 》UNkulunkulu wathi anisayikukhumbula iziphambeko zenyama yomuntu omdala. UNkulunkulu ngeke akhumbule → Khona-ke uyothi, “Ngeke ngiphinde ngizikhumbule izono zabo neziphambeko zabo.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki kube khona imihlatshelo yezono. Bheka kumaHeberu 10:17-18 → UNkulunkulu wenze isivumelwano esisha nathi sokungazikhumbuli iziphambeko zenyama yomuntu omdala, futhi ngeke sizikhumbule. Uma ukukhumbula, kufakazela ukuthi wephule isivumelwano futhi wephule isithembiso . Uyaqonda?

buza: Kuthiwani ngeziphambeko zenyama yomuntu omdala?
impendulo: Ake sibheke izimfundiso zikaPawulu eBhayibhelini → “Ungumuntu omusha ozelwe uNkulunkulu” → “ukona” bheka ”→Umuntu, okungukuthi, “umuntu omdala ozelwe ngu-Adamu” ufile, thina” incwadi “UKristu wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa, ngoba Kholwa ekufeni ", enqubweni yesipiliyoni esilandelayo " Bona ukufa ") Ngakho-ke impilo ewona umuntu omdala" bheka "Ishonile," bheka “Umuntu omdala ufile eziphambekweni zenyama, kepha kuNkulunkulu ukuKristu, okungukuthi, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. entsha mina → Kodwa lapho" bheka "Ngiyaphila. Amen! (phambilini" incwadi "Ukuphila noKristu, kamuva" Omusha "Yiba kuKristu phakathi kokuhlangenwe nakho" bheka "Yena uqobo uyaphila) → Ngoba uyazi ukuthi njengoba uKristu avuswa kwabafileyo, ngeke esafa, futhi ukufa ngeke kusaba namandla phezu kwakhe. Lapho efa, wafa kanye kuphela esonweni; waphilela uNkulunkulu kanjalo, zishoni ukuthi ningabafileyo maqondana nesono, kodwa niphilele uNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu.

(8) Shiya imisebenzi efile ezisolayo futhi uthembele kuNkulunkulu

buza: Kuyini ukuzisola ngemisebenzi efileyo?
impendulo: "Phenduka" kusho ukuphenduka,
UJesu wathi, "Izinsuku zigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele! Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli." phendukani nikholwe evangelini "futhi" Phendukani emisebenzini efileyo, nithembele kuNkulunkulu "Kusho okufanayo. Ngake ngasho ngaphambili ukuthi phenduka, bese " Kholwa ivangeli ”→ Ingabe ukukholelwa evangelini kusho ukuphenduka? Yebo ! Uyalikholwa ivangeli UNkulunkulu onikela ukuphila kwakho Shintsha Okusha → Lena " ukuphenduka "Incazelo yeqiniso → Ngakho leli vangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu → Kholwa evangelini futhi impilo yakho izoguqulwa, wembathe umuntu omusha futhi wembathe uKristu! Ingabe uyaqonda?

buza: Siyini isenzo “sokuphenduka” ezenzweni ezifile kanye “nokuphenduka”?
impendulo: Ukuziphatha komuntu ofile ," isoni "Ingabe ungumuntu ofile? Yebo → ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, Izoni zifile → Mathewu 8:22 UJesu wathi, “Yeka abafileyo bambele abafileyo babo;
Ngakho-ke" ukuzisola "," ukuphenduka "Ingabe ukuziphatha kwesoni, ukuziphatha komuntu ofile? Yebo; kungani kufanele "uphenduke futhi uphenduke"? Ngoba isono sakho sivela ku-Adamu, futhi uyisoni → ngaphansi komthetho nangaphansi kokwahlulela. Bona bayizoni ezingaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho, ezilindele ukufa lapho, ngaphandle kwethemba → ngakho kufanele " ukuzisola , ukuphenduka "Sibheke kuNkulunkulu-" Thembela kuNkulunkulu futhi ukholwe evangelini "Insindiso yeNkosi uJesu Kristu. Uyayiqonda na?"

wena" incwadi "Thembela kuNkulunkulu," incwadi “Ivangeli linjalo phenduka, phenduka →Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu, Kholwa ivangeli UNkulunkulu ukupha ukuphila" Shintsha "Okusha.

1 Isoni sokuqala" Shintsha “Yiba olungileyo
2 Kwabonakala kungcolile” Shintsha "Ngcwelisa
3 Kuvele ukuthi umthetho ungezansi " Shintsha "ngaphansi komusa"
4 Kuyavela ukuthi esiqalekisweni " Shintsha "Chengcifuli
5 Kuvela ukuthi eTestamenteni Elidala " Shintsha ” eTestamenteni Elisha
6 Kuvele ukuthi ikhehla" Shintsha “Yiba ngumuntu omusha
7 Kuyavela ukuthi u-Adamu" Shintsha "KuKristu
kanjalo" Phendukani, phendukani emisebenzini efileyo "Izenzo zabafileyo, izenzo zezoni, izenzo ezingcolile, izenzo ngaphansi komthetho, izenzo ngaphansi kwesiqalekiso, izenzo zomuntu omdala eTestamenteni Elidala, izenzo zika-Adamu → kufanele ushiye ukuqala imfundiso kaKristu → njengaku" Zisole ngesenzo esifile "→Gijima niye emgomweni. Ngakho-ke, kufanele sishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu futhi silwele ukuqhubekela phambili ekupheleleni ngaphandle kokubeka isisekelo, njengalabo abaphenduka emisebenzini efile futhi bathembele kuNkulunkulu. Bheka amaHeberu 6:1 , uyaqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sikuhlolile, sahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngakho kushicilelo olulandelayo: Ukuqala Kwemfundiso Yokushiya UKristu, Isifundo sesi-3

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen! → Njengoba eyabaseFilipi 4:2-3 isho, uPawulu, uThimothewu, u-Evodiya, uSintike, uKlementi, nabanye ababesebenza noPawulu, amagama abo asencwadini yokuphila ephakeme. Amen!

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa Enkosini UJesu Isihlabelelo!

Abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi bamukelekile ukusebenzisa isiphequluli sabo ukucinga - IBandla LeNkosi uJesu Kristu - ukuze bahlanganyele nathi futhi basebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abazalwane nodade emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kumaHeberu Isahluko 6, amavesi 1-2, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngakho-ke, kufanele sishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu futhi siqhubekele ekupheleleni, singabeki ezinye izisekelo, njengokuphenduka emisebenzini efile, ukuthembela kuNkulunkulu, yonke imibhabhadiso, ukubekwa izandla, ukuvuka kwabafileyo, kanye nokwahlulela okuphakade, njll. isifundo.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nawe "Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKristu" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla “lowesifazane olungileyo” lithumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kube okucebile futhi kuvuselelwe usuku nosuku! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi kufanele sishiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu futhi silwele ukuqhubekela ekupheleleni .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ukushiya Isiqalo Semfundiso KaKrestu

buza: Kuyini ukuqala kokuphambuka emfundisweni kaKristu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukuqala kwe-Holy Word Primary School - Heberu 5:12
(2) Lapho siseyizingane, sasibuswa izikole zamabanga aphansi zezwe - Gal 4:3
(3) Esikoleni samabanga aphansi emhlabeni - Kolose 2:21
(4) Kungani ufuna ukubuyela esikoleni samabanga aphansi esingamagwala nesingenamsebenzi futhi uzimisele ukuphinde ube yisigqila sakhe? —Bheka isahluko 4, ivesi 9

Qaphela: Kuyini ukuqala kwemfundiso kaKristu? Kusukela kuGenesise "UMthetho Ka-Adamu, Umthetho KaMose" kuya Encwadini KaMalaki, "YiTestamente Elidala" → Umthetho wadluliselwa ngoMose, futhi kwakungeyena uMose owashumayela umthetho kusukela eVangelini likaMathewu eNcwadini yesAmbulo, “iTestamente Elisha” Umusa neqiniso kokubili kuza ngoJesu Kristu - bheka uJohane 1:17. Pho iyini isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu? ITestamente Elidala lishumayela umthetho, kuyilapho iTestamente Elisha lishumayela uJesu Kristu - umusa neqiniso → Ukuqala kwemfundiso kaKristu → Kusukela 'isivumelwano somthetho' eTestamenteni Elidala kuya 'isivumelwano somusa neqiniso' eTestamenteni Elisha. Lokhu kubizwa ngoKristu. Uyakuqonda ukuqala kweqiniso?

(Isibonelo, A……………B……………C)
→Kusuka ephuzwini A...→Iphuzu B "Isivumelwano-seTestamente Elidala Somthetho" ukusuka ephuzwini B...→Iphuzu C lithi "Isivumelwano-seTestamente Elisha Somusa". Iphuzu B liyavela! “Iphuzu B liyisiqalo → isiqalo semfundiso kaJesu Kristu, kusukela B akhombe indlela yonke eya C Konke Shumayela umusa, iqiniso nensindiso kaJesu Kristu Kusukela ku-A...→B ngaphansi komthetho "isivumelwano esidala, umuntu omdala, isigqila, isigqila sesono", kusukela ku-B...→C ngaphansi komusa "isivumelwano esisha, umuntu omusha, a umuntu olungileyo, indodana”! hamba" B Iphuzu elithi "ukuzalwa kabusha". . → Hamba uye ephuzwini elingu-C Qhubeka nokugijima ubheke emgomeni, futhi uzothola inkazimulo, imivuzo, kanye nemiqhele esikhathini esizayo. "→Ekuqaleni kwezimfundiso zikaKristu, laba bantu banezinkinga ngokholo lwabo. Ngaphandle kokuqonda insindiso kaKristu, laba bantu abazange bazalwe kabusha noma bakhule. Bangamakhehla, izigqila, nezigqila zesono. Bona bazakwahlulelwa ngosuku lokucina. Bheka isAmbulo 20:13 . Uyakuqonda lokhu? )

Ukuqala Kokushiya Imfundiso KaKrestu:

1 hamba iTestamente elidala Ngena ITestamente Elisha
2 hamba isivumelwano somthetho Ngena isivumelwano somusa
3 hamba Indoda endala Ngena Umuntu omusha (okungukuthi, gqoka umuntu omusha)
4 hamba isoni Ngena Olungileyo (okungukuthi, ulungisiswa ngokukholwa)
5 hamba U-Adamu Ngena UKristu (okungukuthi, kuKristu)
6 hamba Ubumba Ngena Ukuzalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele (okungukuthi, ukuzalwa kabusha)
7 hamba umhlaba Ngena Enkazimulweni (okungukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu)

UJesu wathi: “Ngibanikile izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe.” Bheka uJohane 17:14;
Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Bheka kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 amavesi 3-4 .

"Isixwayiso ngezihlubuki":

KumaHeberu 5:11-12, lapha ithi, “Ngokuphathelene noMelkisedeki sinezinto eziningi esingazisho, futhi zinzima ukuziqonda” okusho ukuthi, zazingaphansi koMthetho kaMose lemfundiso." Ivesi 12 liqhubeka lithi: "Bheka ukuthi ufunda kanzima kangakanani." Bavame ukufunda izimfundiso zoMthetho KaMose eBhayibhelini. Kufanele babe abafundisi → kufanele babe abafundisi abashumayela ivangeli, kodwa abanye abantu banjani abafundisi? KwabaseRoma 2:17-20 “Ungumfundisi weziwula nomfundisi wabantwana? Kuthiwani ngenkosi ehola indlela futhi eyisiwula? Bafundisa abanye ukugcina umthetho, kepha abakwazi ukugcina ukulunga okufunwa ngumthetho bona uqobo, ngakho bafundisa abanye ukugcina umthetho kuyisono , niyojeziswa labo abangaphansi kwesiqalekiso somthetho → babheka kuMesiya ukuba abakhulule esiqalekisweni somthetho,” umthetho Ingqikithi ethi "uthando → ibhekisela kuKristu, umsindisi! Ukugcina incwadi yomthetho kuyobulala abantu, ngoba uma uhluleka ukugcina okubhaliwe neziqondiso zomthetho, uyokwahlulelwa futhi uqalekisiwe; Umoya womthetho uluthando - ukhomba "kumoya kamoya" kaKristu futhi wenza abantu baphile . Umthetho awukwazi ukukusindisa, "ungumqeqeshi" nje osiholela kuKristu, futhi silungisiswa futhi sisindiswe ngokukholwa kuKristu → Gal 3:23-25 → , futhi sigadwe umthetho ngaphansi komthetho, sizozungeza kuze kube yilapho indlela yeqiniso yesikhathi esizayo yembulwa. Ngokunjalo umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, usiholela kuKristu, ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa. Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Kodwa manje njengoba iqiniso lensindiso ngokukholwa selifikile, asisekho ngaphansi “komfundisi” womthetho → umthetho ungumfundisi wethu. Qaphela: Lapha uthi “umthetho ungumfundisi wethu” Ngumthetho , uyakuqonda?" Njengoba insindiso kaJesu Kristu isifikile, asisekho ngaphansi kwesandla sikamfundisi "umthetho" → kodwa ngaphansi kwesandla sensindiso sikaKristu Sihlengiwe futhi silondolozwe kuKristu → ngale ndlela, ingabe sihlukanisiwe noma sishiywe? Umfundisi "Umthetho, yebo! Uyaqonda?

Okulandelayo, KumaHeberu 5:12b →…Kwazi bani, othile kuyodingeka anifundise isiqalo sesikole samabanga aphansi sezwi likaNkulunkulu, futhi niyoba yilabo abadinga ubisi futhi abangakwazi ukudla ukudla okuqinile.

Qaphela:

1 Zaziyini iziqalo ze-Holy Word Elementary School? Njengoba kushiwo ngaphambili → Isiqalo siwukuqala "kwephuzu B", isiqalo → esibizwa nge-Shengyan Primary School
2 Lapho siseyizingane, sasingehlukile ezigqileni zasesikoleni samabanga aphansi esingaphansi kwenkosi “yomthetho” nomphathi “uMose” - Gal 4:1-3;
3 Ukugqashula “emithethweni” neziqondiso zezwe eziyisisekelo ezinjengokuthi “Ungaphathi, unganambitha, ungathinti.”— Kolose 2:21
4 Kungani ungafuna ukubuyela esikoleni samabanga aphansi esingamagwala nesingenamsebenzi futhi uzimisele ukuphinde ube yisigqila sakhe? →"Isikole samabanga aphansi esingenalusizo" sibhekisela emithethweni naseziqondisweni Ingabe izimiso nemithetho yomthetho iwusizo → Bheka kuGal

Ithi lapha" Isikole samabanga aphansi esihlakaniphile nesingenamsebenzi, akunjalo? "→Isimiso sokuqala, sibuthakathaka futhi singatheli, saqedwa (umthetho awufezanga lutho), kwase kulethwa ithemba elingcono, esingasondela ngalo kuNkulunkulu. Hebheru 7:18 -Ivesi 19→ kungabi lutho) Ingabe yilokhu uNkulunkulu akushoyo eBhayibhelini? Niyizimvu zeNkosi na? Abanye abantu abathandi ukuzwa amazwi kaNkulunkulu, kodwa bayathanda ukuzwa amazwi abantu, “ngisho amazwi amadeveli Laba bantu bathi bayathanda ukulalela amazwi abantu, ukulalela abadala, futhi kholwa amazwi kamfundisi. Uma ungakukholelwa lokho uNkulunkulu akushoyo eBhayibhelini, uyakholelwa kuJesu?

Ngakho uJesu wathi, “Laba bantu bangikhonza ngezindebe zabo, kodwa izinhliziyo zabo zikude nami; bavuma ukholo kuJesu ngezindebe zabo, kodwa izinhliziyo zabo zikude eNkosini ukubambiswa udonga." Uyaqonda? →Amasonto amaningi emhlabeni wonke namuhla, okuhlanganisa amasonto emindeni, amasonto esonto, amaSeventh-day Adventist, Charismatics, Evangelicals, Izimvu Ezilahlekile, amasonto aseKorea, njll., azokufundisa ukuqala kwesikole samabanga aphansi sezwi likaNkulunkulu → Buyela ku- " amagwala futhi engenamsebenzi esikoleni samabanga aphansi" Ukugcina umthetho kaMose → ukuzimisela ukuba ngaphansi komthetho nokuba yisigqila sesono futhi. Bheka lokho okushiwo eyesi-2 Petru isahluko 2 amavesi 20-22 kuneyokuqala . Bayayazi indlela yokulunga, kodwa bawufulathele umyalo ongcwele abawunikwe, futhi bekuyoba ngcono uma bebengakwazi. Isaga siqinisile sithi: Inja ihlanza, ibuye idle ingulube, ibuye igingqike odakeni; Uyaqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sesihlolile, saxhumana, futhi sabelana ngakho lapha kushicilelo olulandelayo: Isifundo 2 Sokuqala Kokushiya UKristu → Ukushiya "isono", ukuphenduka emisebenzini efile, kanye nokuthembela kuNkulunkulu.

Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Masivule iBhayibheli encwadini yezEnzo Isahluko 19 Amavesi 1-3 Kwathi u-Apholo eseKorinte, uPawulu wadabula izwe elisenhla, wafika e-Efesu, wahlangana nabafundi abathile, wababuza, wathi: “Namamukela yini uMoya oNgcwele lapho nikholwa, baphendula bathi: “Akakho obhapathiziwe, noma ongakabhapathizwa; wezwa ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uphiwe.” UPawulu wabuza: “Pho nabhapathizwa ngaluphi ubhapathizo na?” Bathi: “Ubhapathizo lukaJohane.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nawe "Umbhapathizo Wokuphenduka kanye Nobhapathizo Lwenkazimulo" Umehluko Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo nangezwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu kanye nezwi lenkazimulo Baletha ukudla okuvela kude ezulwini ukuze basinikeze kona ngesikhathi esifanele inkathi, ukuze sibe ngabakaNkulunkulu ukuphila kokomoya kuchichime kakhulu Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu okomoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya. → cacile" abhapathizwe "Kukubunye noKristu, ngo" ubhapathizo “Ekufeni kwakhe, ekufeni nasekungcwatshweni nasekuvukeni; Ubhapathizo lwenkazimulo ! Hhayi uJohane uMbhapathizi umbhabhadiso wokuphenduka .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

Ake sifunde kwabaseRoma isahluko 6 amavesi 3-5 eBhayibhelini futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizwa kuKristu Jesu abhapathizelwa ekufeni kwakhe ? Ngakho, thina Wangcwatshwa kanye Naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukunyakaza kwethu sibe nokuphila okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuphinda sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe;

[Qaphela]: " abhapathizwe "KuKristu → ekufeni Kwakhe;" ubhapathizo "Suka uye ekufeni futhi ungcwatshwe Naye → "Gcina ixhegu", "Suka endodeni endala" → "Ubhapathizo" "umngcwabo" → Bambaniswa Naye “ngesimo” sokufa, futhi uhlanganiswe naye Yena esesimweni sokuvuka Kwakhe . " abhapathizwe "Ukuze ukhazinyuliswe → ngoba ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni kukhazimulisa uNkulunkulu uYise . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

1. UJohane uMbhapathizi umbhabhadiso wokuphenduka , ukuzalwa kabusha phambili yokuwasha

buza: Kuthiwani ngobhapathizo olungenawo "umphumela"?

impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ngokwesibonelo, “uJohane uMbhapathizi” wayethunywe uNkulunkulu, futhi uJesu wafika emfuleni iJordani esuka eGalile ukuze amthole ukuba abhapathizwe; Uma kungeyena "uMbhapathizi" othunywe uNkulunkulu → ubhapathizo ngeke lube nomphumela.

Ngokwesibonelo, "uPetru" → wabhapathiza abeZizwe egameni likaJesu Kristu "uPawulu" → wababhapathiza egameni leNkosi uJesu - bheka izEnzo 10:48 kanye 19:5; igama likaJesu Kristu , Babhapathizeni egameni likaMoya oNgcwele → "Umbhapathizi" akaqondi ukuthi "uYise, neNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele" bangabantu. shayela →Hhayi "igama"→Bheka abakaki ngokucacile (babhapathize, nibanikeze igama likaYise, neNdodana, nelikaMoya oNgcwele)→"Ababhapathizi" abaliqondi igama likaJesu, futhi umbhapathizo abanibhapathiza ngawo ngu "ubhapathizo olungasebenzi". Bheka uMathewu 28:19

Njengoba “uPawulu” esho → angimvumeli owesifazane ukuba ashumayele, noma abe negunya phezu kwendoda, kodwa ukuba athule. Ngoba u-Adamu wadalwa kuqala, u-Eva wadalwa okwesibili, futhi akuyena u-Adamu owayengwa, kodwa owesifazane owayengwa wawela esonweni.

→" owesifazane “Uma umbhapathizi ebeka izandla zakhe phezu kwamakhanda abafowabo nodadewabo futhi “ababhapathize,” usuke ephanga indoda ukuba ibe inhloko nenhloko kaKristu.

"UPawuli" wababuza, "Namamukela uMoya oNgcwele mhla nikholwa na?":"Ubhapathizo lukaJohane uPawulu." Lokho uJohane akwenza kwakuwubhapathizo lokuphenduka , etshela abantu ukuthi bakholwe kulowo oza emva kwakhe, uJesu. "

→" Umbhabhadiso wokuvuma izono nokuphenduka “Ubhapathizo lokuphenduka kukaJohane,” ukuzalwa kabusha " phambili lokubhabhathizwa. " Owezizwe "ngakho" ubhapathizo "Akunamphumela. Inkomba - Izenzo Isahluko 19 Amavesi 2-4

5 Ababhapathiziwe - abaqondi iqiniso levangeli

uma" abhapathizwe "Aniqondi ukuthi ivangeli liyini? Iyiphi indlela yeqiniso? Awuqondi ukuthi "ubhapathizo" kufanele lufakwe kuKristu, ukungcwatshwa naye → ukuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokufa. "Obhapathiziwe" ubhapathizo olumhlophe ubhapathizo olungasebenzi.

" abhapathizwe "Singahlanganiswa kanjani noKristu uma singazalwa ngokusha? Ngokuba sesiphelile" abhapathizwe “Ukufakwa ekufeni kukaKristu nokungcwatshwa kanye Naye→ Khumula ikhehla . Ngakho wena" ukuzalwa kabusha "Yebo" Omusha "→ Ngifuna nje ukukhumula ubuntu bami obudala .

7 Ukubhapathizwa - kholwa ukuthi "ubhapathizo" kusho ukuzalwa kabusha nokusindiswa

Ukubhapathizwa ngale ndlela kuwukubhapathiza okungenamsebenzi, futhi ukugeza kuyize. Funda eyoku-1 Petru 3:21. ubhapathizo lwamanzi Hhayi ukususa ukungcola kwenyama, kodwa kuphela ukungcola kukaKristu Igazi Kuphela ngokuhlanza unembeza womuntu lapho umuntu engakwazi ukuzalwa kabusha kuphela ngokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe.

8 Kobhavu basekhaya, amachibi esonto, amachibi angaphakathi, amachibi aphezu kophahla →Lezi" ubhapathizo “Akusizi lutho” ukubhapathizwa.

9 " "Umcimbi wokuthelwa ngamanzi", ukuwasha amanzi amabhodlela, ukuwasha imicengezi, ukuwasha ishawa →Lezi" ubhapathizo “Ubhapathizo olungasebenzi.

10" abhapathizwe "Indawo "isehlane" → ulwandle, imifula emikhulu, imifula emincane, amachibi, imifudlana, njll. ubhapathizo "Noma yimuphi umthombo wamanzi wamukelekile; uma" ubhapathizo "Hhayi ehlane, eminye imibhabhadiso → imibhabhadiso engasebenzi. Uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMarku isahluko 1, amavesi 4 no-9, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngokunjalo uJohane weza wabhabhathiza enkangala, etshumayela umbhabhadiso wokuphenduka kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono. …Ngaleso sikhathi uJesu weza evela eNazaretha laseGalile wabhapathizwa nguJohane emfuleni iJordani.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane nawe "Ubhapathizo Ehlane" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Qonda ukuthi “ubhapathizo” luse “hlane” futhi luwubunye benyama noKristu ekufeni, ukumbelwa, nokuvuka.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) UJesu wabhapathizwa ngo ihlane

Ngokusho kwalokhu, uJohn uza, ngo-→" Ebhabhadisa ehlane eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono....Ngaleso sikhathi kwafika uJesu evela eNazaretha laseGalile, wabhapathizwa nguJohane eJordani.”—Marku 1:4, 9.

(2) Abathenwa abangabeZizwe babhapathizwa ehlane

Ingelosi yeNkosi yathi kuFiliphu: "Suka uye eningizimu endleleni ephuma eJerusalema eGaza." Lowo mgwaqo uyihlane "...UFiliphu waqala kulo mbhalo washumayela ngoJesu. Besahamba phambili, bafika endaweni enamanzi. Umthenwa wathi: "Bheka, kukhona amanzi lapha? ” ( KwabaseGalathiya 1:37 ) UFiliphu wathi kuye: “Kulungile uma ukholwa ngenhliziyo yakho yonke.” Ngiyakholwa ukuthi uJesu Kristu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ") Ngakho wabayala ukuba bame, futhi uFiliphu nomthenwa bangena emanzini kanyekanye, futhi uFiliphu wambhapathiza. Isikhombo - IzEnzo 8, amavesi 26, 35-36, 38

(3) UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni eGolgotha ehlane

Ngakho bamthatha uJesu. UJesu wathwala isiphambano sakhe waphuma waya endaweni ethiwa iKhalvari, okungukuthi ngesiHeberu IGolgotha . Bambethela lapho esiphambanweni—Johane 19:17-18

(4) UJesu wangcwatshwa ehlane

Kwakukhona insimu lapho uJesu abethelwa khona esiphambanweni. Kukhona ithuna elisha engadini , akekho owake wangcwatshwa. Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi kwakulusuku lokuLungiselela abaJuda, futhi ithuna laliseduze, bambeka lapho uJesu. — Johane 19:41-42

(5) Sihlanganiswe Naye ngokufana nokufa “ehlane”

Uma sinaye ehlangene naye ngesimo sokufa , futhi bayohlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe - Roma 6:5

(6) “Ukubhapathizwa” ehlane kuvumelana nezimfundiso zeBhayibheli

Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? ngakho, Sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni , ukuze konke ukunyakaza kwethu sibe nokuphila okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. — Roma 6:3-4

Isinyathelo sesibili: " abhapathizwe “Kuyisenzo sokufakaza ekukholweni kwakho, isenzo sokubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu, ukuhlanganiswa naye esimweni sokufa, nokufa, nokumbelwa kanye naye.
Isinyathelo sesithathu: Idla okukaJehova" isidlo sakusihlwa "Kuyisenzo sokufakaza ukuvuka kwakho kanye noKristu. Ngokudla iSidlo SeNkosi, uhlanganiswa Naye ngokufana nokuvuka Kwakhe. Ngokudla njalo ukudla okungokomoya nokuphuza amanzi angokomoya, impilo yakho entsha izokhula ibe umuntu omdala. isimo sikaKristu.
Isinyathelo sesi-4: shumayela Kuyisenzo sokukhula empilweni yakho entsha. Uma ushumayela ivangeli, uhlupheka kanye noKristu! Ngiyakubiza Thola inkazimulo, uthole umvuzo, uthole umqhele . Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

---【ubhapathizo】---

Ukufakaza phambi kukaNkulunkulu,
Umemezela emhlabeni,
Umemezela emhlabeni:

(1) Memezela: Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu

→ Ngoba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisakhonza isono - Roma 6:6

( 2 ) uthi: Akuseyimi engiphila manje

→Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophila kimi; . Inkomba-- KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 2 Ivesi 20

→Abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. (NgokukaJohane 17:16) Kodwa mina angisoze ngazibonga, kuphela ngesiphambano seNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, okubethelwe ngaso izwe kimi, nami sengibethelwe esiphambanweni. Galathiya 6:14

( 4 ) uthi: Asiyona ingxenye yenyama yomuntu endala ka-Adamu

→Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kuwe, awuseyena owenyama kodwa ungokaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Inkomba - KwabaseRoma 8:9 → Ngoba nina (umuntu omdala) nafa, kodwa ukuphila kwenu (ubuntu obusha) kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Inkomba - KwabaseKolose Isahluko 3 Ivesi 3

( 5 ) uthi: Asibona abesono

→ Uzozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba uyosindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Mathewu 1:21 → Ngokuba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela, ngokuba sikhumbula ukuthi uKristu wafela bonke, kangangoba bonke bafa, ngokuba owafayo ukhululiwe esonweni. Roma 6:7 ivesi 2 Korinte 5 14

( 6 ) uthi: Asikho ngaphansi komthetho

Isikhombo - KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 4 Ivesi 5

( 7 ) uthi: Ukhululiwe ekufeni, ukhululiwe emandleni kaSathane, ukhululiwe emandleni obumnyama eHayidese

Kolose 1:13-14 uyasisindisa Ukukhululwa emandleni obumnyama , esidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, esinokuhlengwa ngayo nokuthethelelwa kwezono.
IzEnzo 26:18 Ngikuthuma kubo ukuba amehlo abo avulwe, baphenduke ebumnyameni, baye ekukhanyeni. Suka emandleni kaSathane uye kuNkulunkulu Ngokukholwa kimi niyakwamukela ukuthethelelwa kwezono nefa kanye nabo bonke abangcwelisiwe. "

Qaphela: " inhloso yokubhapathizwa “Kuwukubhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu, “ukufa okungabalelwanga u-Adamu,” ukufa kwenkazimulo, okuhlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa, ukumbela umuntu wethu omdala, nokuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka. .
