articles.title: Isidlo Yidla futhi uphuze isidlo seNkosi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kwabaseRoma 6:5 no-8 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, futhi siyohlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, uma safa kanye noKristu , sikholelwa ukuthi uyophila naye.

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke "isidlo sakusihlwa" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho【 ibandla 】Thumela izisebenzi ukuthi zilethe ukudla okuvela ezindaweni ezikude futhi zisiphathele kona ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→【 isidlo sakusihlwa 】 Kungukudla kokomoya ukudla nokuphuza ukuphila kweNkosi! Ukuphuza igazi leNkosi nokudla umzimba weNkosi kuwukuhlangana noKristu esimweni sokuvuka! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

1. UJesu wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi

buza: Yini uJesu ayisebenzisayo ukuze enze isivumelwano esisha nathi?
impendulo: UJesu wasebenzisa eyakhe Igazi Yenza isivumelwano esisha nathi! Amen.

1 kwabaseKorinte 11:23-26... Esebongile wasihlephula, wathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa nina; “Le ndebe yilokhu eniyakukwenza noma nini lapho niphuza isivumelwano esisha egazini lami, ningikhumbula. “Ngokuba njalo, nxa nidla lesi sinkwa, niphuza lesi sitsha, nimemezela ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike.

2. Inkomishi nesinkwa esibusisiwe

buza: Iyini indebe nesinkwa esibusiswayo?
impendulo: wendebe siyibusisile ijusi yamagilebhisi yebo" UmKrestu Igazi ", ubusisiwe" ikhekhe " Kungumzimba weNkosi ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

1 Korinte 10:15-16 Njengokungathi ngikhuluma kwabaqondayo, hlolani amazwi ami. Isitsha esisibusisayo asiyena yini umhlanganyeli wegazi likaKristu na? Isinkwa esisihlephulayo kasihlanganyeli yini umzimba kaKristu? (Qaphela: Inkomishi nesinkwa esikubusisile → kuyigazi likaKristu nomzimba Wakhe)

3. UJesu uyisinkwa sokuphila

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukudla inyama yeNkosi nokuphuza igazi leNkosi?
impendulo: Uma nidla futhi niphuza inyama negazi leNkosi, niyoba nokuphila kukaKristu, futhi uma ninokuphila kukaKristu, niyoba nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.

NgokukaJohane 6:27 Ningasebenzeli ukudla okuphelayo, kodwa sebenzelani ukudla okuhlala kuze kube ngukuphila okuphakade, eyakunika khona iNdodana yomuntu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uBaba unibeke uphawu.

Johane 6:48 Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila. Amavesi 50-51 Lesi yisinkwa esehla ezulwini, ukuze kuthi, uma nisidla, aniyikufa. Mina ngiyisinkwa esiphilayo esehle ezulwini; uma umuntu esidla lesi sinkwa, uyakuphila phakade. Isinkwa engizasinika sona siyinyama yami, enginikela ngayo ngenxa yempilo yezwe. Amavesi 53-56 UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo. ;Ayikho impilo kuwe Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade, mina ngiyakumvusa ngosuku lokugcina;

4. Ukuhlangana neNkosi esimweni sokuvuka

KwabaseRoma 6:5 Ngokuba uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe.

［ abhapathizwe ] → Ubhapathizo lwamanzi luwukuhlanganiswa Naye esimweni sokufa, ukubhapathizelwa ekufeni, nokungcwatshwa Naye → Ikhehla lethu langcwatshwa ehlane.

［ isidlo sakusihlwa ] → Isidlo sakusihlwa kumelwe sihlanganiswe neNkosi esimweni sovuko: umuntu omusha ovusiwe wembatha umzimba kaKristu, wembathe uKristu, futhi wamukele isinkwa sokuphila esisesimweni esivela ezulwini.

(1) Sikholelwa ukuthi safa, sangcwatshwa, futhi savuswa kanye noKristu Lokhu ukuhlangana kwethu neNkosi. ukuzethemba ) ayinawo umumo.

(2) Ukholo olulolongekile luhlanganiswe Naye →→Indebe nesinkwa esibusisiwe siyabonakala futhi sikhona." umumo “Ijusi lamagilebhisi” enkomishini ngekaJehova Igazi .Ngento ebonakalayo nebambekayo" ikhekhe “Ngumzimba weNkosi, yamukelani umzimba weNkosi futhi Igazi Nakhu" umumo “Ukukholwa kuhlangene naYe! Amen. Ngakho, niyaqonda na?

5. Ukubukeza nokucwasa

buza: Kwehlukanisa kanjani phakathi kokudla nokuphuza igazi leNkosi nomzimba?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ukudla komzimba

Ngokujwayelekile yidla ukudla okuvela emhlabathini, okuwukudla okuvela esiswini somzimba.

(2) Ungadli edilini lamadimoni

Okungukuthi, aniyikuhlabela imimoya, ningadli ukudla kwezithombe njengesidlo seNkosi.

(3) Inkomishi nesinkwa esibusisiwe

→→Kuyigazi nomzimba kaKristu.

(4) Uma umuntu edla isinkwa seNkosi, anathe indebe yeNkosi ngokungafanele,

→→Kuwukucasula umzimba negazi leNkosi.

(5) Zihlole [ ukuzethemba ] amukele umzimba weNkosi futhi Igazi

2 Korinte 13:5 “Zihloleni nina” → zihloleni ukuthi “ninokholo” noma cha. Anazi yini ukuthi uma ningabokwanga, ninoJesu Kristu phakathi kwenu na?

( qwashisa : “Abadala nabefundisi” abaningi batshela abazalwane nodade ukuba bahlole izono zabo, ngoba umuntu wethu omdala, “umzimba wesono” ubethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu futhi “umzimba wesono” usufakwe ekufeni kukaKristu ngo "mbhapathizo" futhi uye Wangcwatshwa ehlane.
Hhayi lapha ngikubize ubugebengu bokuhlola , ngoba umuntu ozelwe kabusha akanasono, futhi wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona ( bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:9 ).

Lokhu kungenxa yakho ukuhlola ukholo lwakho,” kholwani “Endebeni ebusisiwe ijusi yamagilebhisi yebo UmKrestu Igazi , isinkwa esabusiswa saba umzimba kaKristu , thola okweNkosi Igazi futhi Umzimba ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

→→( kholwani ) ngo" ubhapathizo “Ukholo olufile esonweni, olufile emthethweni, olufile endodeni endala, olufile emandleni obumnyama, ukholo olufile emhlabeni, ukholo olufile kumuntu omdala;

→→( kholwani ) Umuntu ozelwe kabusha hlola Manje akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa ukukholwa kukaKristu okuphilayo kimi, ukuthatha inhliziyo kaKristu njengenhliziyo yami ukwamukela isinkwa sokuphila sasezulwini. 【 isidlo sakusihlwa 】Ngumuntu ongokomoya owamukela ukudla okungokomoya. umzimba kaKristu futhi Igazi ", umuntu womoya Dlana lapho" umumo “Ukudla okungokomoya kokuphila kwasezulwini, okuwuvuko” umumo "Hlangana neNkosi! Uyakuqonda lokhu?"

Ukuhlukanisa: Isisu senyama sidla ukudla komhlabathi. Uma iSidlo seNkosi sidliwa esiswini somuntu omdala bese siwela endlini yangasese, khona-ke umzimba kaKristu ngeke utholakale kuwe baphuze ezabo izono na? Ingabe labo badala nabafundisi bayakucela ukuba uvume izono zakho, uphenduke, uhlole izono zakho, wesule izono zakho, futhi uzihlanze? Kuyacaca ukuthi laba bantu abawuqondi umzimba nempilo kaKristu.

→Awukazi okwamanje? Uma ukholelwa ngempela ekuvusweni kanye noKristu, okuhlala ezinhliziyweni zakho manje ukuphila kukaKristu! Inkomba - KwabaseRoma 8, 9-10 kanye noJohane 1, 3, 24.

Udla ukudla kweNkosi "isidlo sakusihlwa" Okuningi hlola Ingabe ukuphila kukaKristu kuwe kuyisono na? Umzimba kaKristu uyisono na? Ingabe uKristu wayenecala? Ingabe usafuna ukusula izono zakho futhi uzihlanze? Ingabe ngempela awunalwazi? Ngoba inyama yethu endala, kuhlanganise nezinkanuko nezinkanuko zayo, kwabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu futhi umzimba wesono wabhujiswa! Wangcwatshwa ethuneni! Uyakukholwa na? Uyaqonda?

Labo ababizwa ngokuthi "Abadala, Abefundisi neqembu labo abaqondi nhlobo" IBhayibheli 》Iqiniso, uma bengakaqondi ukuzalwa kabusha futhi bamukele uMoya oNgcwele, abanayo impilo kaKristu. Abaningi bagcwele ukuduka futhi bekhohliswa umoya wokuduka laba bantu banigcina ezonweni zenu, ukuze nonke nidle niphuze izono zenu.

[6 Uba lingawazi umzimba weNkosi, lizakudla linathe izono zenu

→ "Uyahlulelwa futhi ujeziswe yiNkosi" → Abaningi babuthakathaka futhi bayagula, futhi baningi asebefile - Inkomba ( 1 Korinte 11: 29-32 )

(7) Ikhehla liyadla liphuze ukudla okusemhlabeni

【 Indoda endala ] → 1 Korinte 6:13 Ukudla kungokwesisu, nesisu singesokudla;

【 Omusha 】→ umuntu womoya Khona manje" Omusha "Gqoka uKristu, gqoka ubuntu obusha → ube ngcwele, ungabi nasono, ungabi nasici, ungabi nasici, ungonakali → ube ukuphila kukaKristu → uhlale kuKristu, ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, udle isinkwa esivela ezulwini, uphuze kwabaphilayo Amanzi okuphila!

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, okugqugquzelwe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, okungukuthi Ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo!

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuLuka 12 amavesi 49-50 futhi sifunde ndawonye: "Ngize ukuzophonsa umlilo emhlabeni. Ukube ubusubasiwe, bekungeke yini kube yilokho ebengikufuna? Umbhabhadiso ongifaneleyo awukafezeki. Ngiphuthume kangakanani?

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke "Ubhapathizo Lomlilo" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ** ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywe ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu ~ ukuba balethe ukudla okuvela endaweni ekude esibhakabhakeni, futhi basinikeze kona ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kangcono! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Masakhe phezu kwedwala elingokomoya likaKristu, ukuze ukholo lwethu lukwazi ukusinda ekuvivinyweni komlilo futhi luyigugu ngaphezu kwegolide elibhubhayo. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1. Ukubhapathizwa ngomlilo

Asitadishe iBhayibheli, Luka 12, amavesi 49-50, siliphenye futhi silifunde ndawonye: "Ngiyeza umlilo Ukuyilahla phansi, uma isivele yavutha, akukhona lokho engikufunayo? Ubhapathizo olungifanele alukafezeki.

buza: Kuyini ukubhabhadiswa ngomlilo?

impendulo: INkosi uJesu yathi → ngiyeza " umlilo "Yiphonse phansi →" umlilo "Kusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu uphakama endaweni lapho kunokuhlupheka, ukushushiswa, ukuphikiswa, nezitha kuzo zonke izinhlangothi, kodwa akabambekile→" ukuzethemba "Dlula" umlilo “Izivivinyo zibaluleke kakhulu kunegolide elonakeleyo.

Uma isivele iqalile → "Yebo" umlilo "Isivivinyo sesifikile", angithi ngifuna? Ubhapathizo olungifanele alukafezeki.

buza: UJesu wabhapathizwa nguJohane uMbhapathizi →" Geza ngamanzi "futhi" ubhapathizo lomoya ongcwele "→Izulu lavulelwa yena," UMoya oNgcwele "Kwaba sengathi ijuba lehlele phezu kwakhe! Yini enye?" geza "Ayikho impumelelo?
impendulo: " umbhabhadiso womlilo "→YiNkosi uJesu Kristu" okwe "sonke" qhubekela phambili “Isiphambano singesethu ubugebengu ( hlupheka )→wafela izono zethu, wembelwa, wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu→uKristu wavuka kwabafileyo” ukuzalwa kabusha "Wasikhulula → wasikhulula esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe, namandla amnyama kaSathane eHayidesi → Uvuko lukaKristu lwasilungisisa! Ukuzalwa kabusha, ukuvuka , sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade Amen. yena ) Ukuphila okungonakali, okungabuni, okungangcolisiwe, okuphakade! Yilokhu uJesu akusho: “Ubhapathizo olungifanele alukafezeki. Ngiphuthume kangakanani? Niyakuqonda lokhu?

2. UJesu wabhapathizwa ngomlilo

→Sihlupheka naye" umbhabhadiso womlilo "
→Sinaye hlupheka ,
→ ngizoba naye futhi khazimuliswe !

(Abafundi) Bathi: “Singakwazi.” Wathi kubo: “Nani isitsha engisiphuzayo mina kufanele nisiphuze; Ngombhapathizo ofana nalowo owabhapathizwa ngawo, nawe uyobhapathizwa ;Inkomba-Marku Isahluko 10 Ivesi 39

Uma bengabantwana, bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu nezindlalifa kanye noKristu. uba sinaye hlupheka , njalo lizakhazinyuliswa kanye laye . — Roma 8:17

buza: Kanjani ukukhazinyuliswa kanye noKristu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Shiya konke ngemuva
2 zilahle
3 Landelani uJesu nishumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu
4 Ukuzonda impilo yomuntu endala
5 Thatha isiphambano sakho
6 Lahla impilo yakudala
7 Buyisa ukuphila okuphakade kukaKristu! Amen

Njengoba iNkosi “uJesu” yasho: “Khona wayesebizela ndawonye isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma noma ubani efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele. Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho, kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangevangeli uyakukusindisa. Amen!
→Uma sinaye isimo esifile naye okuhlangene , nakuye isimo sokuvuka naye okuhlangene . Lena inqubo yokukhazinyuliswa kanye noKristu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba (Marku 8:34-35 nabaseRoma 6:5)

3. Ukuzethemba " umlilo "Izivivinyo zibaluleke kakhulu kunegolide elonakeleyo."

(1) Ukholo oluvivinywa ngomlilo

Ukuze “ukholo” lwenu ngemva kokuba ‘luvivinyiwe’ lube yigugu ngaphezu kwegolide “elibhubhayo” nakuba livivinywa “ngomlilo,” ukuze namukele ukudunyiswa, inkazimulo, nodumo, lapho uJesu Kristu ebonakala. . Inkomba - 1 Petru Isahluko 1 Ivesi 7

(2) Yakhiwe ngegolide, isiliva, namatshe ayigugu

Uma umuntu akha phezu kwalesi sisekelo ngegolide, nesiliva, namatshe anenani, nezinkuni, nezinhlanga, umsebenzi wawo wonke umuntu uyakwambulwa, ngokuba usuku luyakuwuveza, nomlilo uyakuwubona umsebenzi wabo bonke; Uma umsebenzi umuntu awakha phezu kwaleso sisekelo usinde, uyothola umvuzo. Uma umsebenzi womuntu usha, uyakulahlekelwa, kepha yena uqobo uyakusindiswa, kuyakuba sengathi uphuma emlilweni; Isikhombo - 1 Korinte 3:12-15

(3)Faka ingcebo esitsheni sobumba

“Sinale ngcebo” ebekwe ezitsheni zobumba ukuze kubonakale ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze “ukuphila kukaJesu” nakho “kwambulwe” kithi. → Uma umuntu ezihlanza kokuphansi, uyakuba yisitsha esihloniphekayo, esingcwelisiwe nesiwusizo eNkosini, esilungiselwe yonke imisebenzi emihle. Amen! Reference-2 Thimothewu Isahluko 2 Ivesi 21 kanye 2 KwabaseKorinte Isahluko 4 Amavesi 7-10

Izintshumayelo zokwabelana ngombhalo, zishukunyiswa uMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nabanye abasebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. . Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, okungukuthi Ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo ! Amen

Ihubo: UJesu Unamandla

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Chofoza Landa.Qoqa Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Babhapathizwa 2 Babhapathizwa Emanzini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 6 amavesi 3-4 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na? Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. .

Namuhla sifunda, sihlanganyela, futhi sabelane nawe - bhapathizwa "Babhapathizwa Emanzini" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithuma izisebenzi** ngamazwi alotshwe ezandleni zabo nangezwi leqiniso abalishumayelayo, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu ~ ukuba balethe ukudla okuvela kude ezulwini futhi basiphathele kona ngesikhathi esifaneleyo ukuze singaba ngokomoya Ukuphila kuchichima kakhulu! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Qonda ukuthi uma abeZizwe “bebhapathizwa emanzini” babhapathizelwa ekufeni kukaKristu, “bahlanganiswa” noKristu ekufeni, ukumbelwa nokuvuka, futhi babhapathizwa ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha nokusindiswa. Amen Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Ubhapathizo LwamaJuda

→→Bhapathizwa ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha

1 Ubhapathizo lukaJohane uMbhapathizi → ubhapathizo lokuphenduka

NgokukaMarku 1:1-5...Ngokunjalo kwafika uJohane wabhapathiza ehlane, eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono. IJudiya lonke neJerusalema baphumela kuJohane, bavuma izono zabo, babhapathizwa nguye eJordani.

2 UJesu wabhapathizwa →wamukela uMoya oNgcwele ;

Bonke abantu babhapathizwa → abazange bamukele uMoya oNgcwele . Bheka uLuka 3 amavesi 21-22

3 AmaJuda → ngemva “kobhapathizo lokuphenduka” → akholelwa kuJesu njengoMsindisi, futhi abaphostoli “babeka izandla zabo” futhi bathandaza, base bethola “uMoya oNgcwele” —Bheka izEnzo 8:14-17;

4 Abezizwe →Uma wamukela “ubhapathizo lokuphenduka” lukaJohane uMbhapathizi →okungukuthi, labo “abangazange” bawamukele uMoya oNgcwele ngoba bengaliqondi ivangeli babhapathizwa egameni leNkosi uJesu nelomphostoli uPawulu 'ubeka izandla' emakhanda abo → ukuze bathole uMoya oNgcwele -Bheka kuzEnzo 19:1-7

2. Ubhapathizo Lwabezizwe

---Wabhapathizwa ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha---

1 Owezizwe →“UPetru” washumayela endlini kaKorneliyu, futhi “bezwa” izwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu→babekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe→okungukuthi, “babhapathizwa” ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha. →Bheka kweyabase-Efesu 1 Isahluko 13-14 IzEnzo 10:44-48 .

2 Abezizwe “Umthenwa” wezwa uFiliphu eshumayela ngoJesu→ abhapathizwe —Bheka izEnzo 8:26-38

3 Abezizwe “babhapathizwa” →Ukuhlanganiswa noKristu ngokufana nokufa →ngo" ubhapathizo “Sehlela ekufeni, simbela ubumina bethu obudala kuye—Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:3-5

buza: Ngaphambi kwalokho" abhapathizwe "→ Njengoba nje "ngaphambi kokubhapathizwa", abadala noma abefundisi babiza abantu ukuba baphenduke futhi bavume izono zabo → lokhu" umbhabhadiso wokuphenduka “Ubhapathizo lukaJohane→ Akazange ahlupheke " UMoya oNgcwele “Okungukuthi, ukubhapathizwa ngaphambi kokuzalwa kabusha;
Ingabe ufuna ukukwamukela manje →" abhabhathizwe emanzini “Ukuhlanganiswa noKristu, ukufa nokungcwatshwa kanye Naye→” ubhapathizo "Indwangu yoboya?

impendulo: "Izizwe" abhapathizwe "Kufana nokufa ukuhlanganiswa Naye → Kuwubhapathizo lwenkazimulo, ngoba ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni kukhazimulisa uNkulunkulu uYise → Uma nani nifuna ukukhazinyuliswa futhi nivuzwe njengoKristu! Khazimulisani uNkulunkulu uBaba! → Kufanele wamukele okulungile ngokweBhayibheli " abhapathizwe "→ Isimo sokufa naye" ubhapathizo oluhlangene ".

【 ubhapathizo ] ayikwazi ukuphoqelelwa, ngoba Ubhapathizo aluhlangene nensindiso ; Kodwa kuhlobene nokukhazinyuliswa . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

[Qaphela]: Umuntu ozelwe kabusha → uzimisele ukubhapathizwa enkazimulweni yobunye neNkosi ukuze abhapathizwe kuKristu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

3. Ubhapathizo luyalwa nguJesu

(1) Ubhapathizo luyalwa uJesu —Bheka uMathewu 28:18-20
(2) Umbhapathizi ungumzalwane othunywe uNkulunkulu— Ngokwesibonelo, uJohane uMbhapathizi, uJesu weza kuye ukuba abhapathizwe, abaphostoli, uFiliphu, njll. bonke babethunywe uNkulunkulu
(3) Ngokungcono umbhapathizi kufanele abe umzalwane— Bheka eyoku-1 Thimothewu 2:11-14 neyoku-1 Korinte 11:3
(4) Ababhapathizwayo bayayiqonda imfundiso yeqiniso yevangeli— Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:3-4
(5) Labo ababhapathizwayo bayaqonda ukuthi “ubhapathizo” luwukuhlanganiswa noKristu esimweni sokufa— Bheka amaRoma 6:3-5
( 6) Indawo yokubhabhathizwa yayisehlane.
(7) bhapathizwa egameni likaJesu Kristu— Bheka izEnzo 10:47-48 kanye nezEnzo 19:5-6

4. Ubhapathizo ehlane

buza: lapho abhapathizwe Ngokuvumelana nemfundiso yeBhayibheli?
impendulo: ehlane

(1) UJesu wabhapathizwa eMfuleni iJordani ehlane
Bheka kuMarku 1 Isahluko 9
(2) UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni eGolgotha ehlane
Bheka uJohane 19:17
(3) UJesu wangcwatshwa ehlane
Bheka uJohane 19:41-42
(4) “Ukubhapathizelwa” kuKristu kuwukuhlangana Naye esimweni sokufa Ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, umuntu wethu omdala wembelwa kanye Naye. .

" abhapathizwe " Indawo: Ulwandle, imifula emikhulu, imifula emincane, amachibi, imifudlana, njll ehlane kudinga kuphela imithombo yamanzi elungele "ubhapathizo";

Noma ngabe kuhle kangakanani, ungabhabhathizelwa "echibini, kubhavu, ibhakede, noma i-swimming pool yasendlini" ekhaya noma esontweni, noma "ubhapathize ngamanzi, ugeze ebhodleleni, ugeze endishini, ugeze. kumpompi, noma ugeze eshaweni" → ngoba lokhu akuhambisani nezimfundiso zeBhayibheli zobhapathizo.

buza: Abanye abantu bazokusho lokhu →Abanye abantu sebeneminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili noma ayisishiyagalolunye incwadi Ayesekhulile kangangokuthi ayengakwazi ukuhamba ngaphandle kukaJesu. abhapathizwe "Kwenzenjani? Bakhona nabashumayela ivangeli ezibhedlela noma bengakafi incwadi Jesu! Ungabanika kanjani" abhapathizwe "Indwangu yoboya?

impendulo: Njengoba (yena) bezwa ivangeli, incwadi UJesu Sekuvele kulondoloziwe . Yena (yena)" Yamukela noma cha " Geza ngamanzi Ayihlangene nensindiso ngoba [ abhapathizwe 】Kuhlobene nokwamukela inkazimulo, ukwamukela imivuzo, nokwamukela imiqhele; Thola inkazimulo, uthole umvuzo, uthole umqhele Kunqunyelwe ngaphambili futhi kukhethwe uNkulunkulu. Kutholwa ngokudinga abantu abasha abazelwe kabusha ukuze bakhule futhi basebenze kanye noKristu ekushumayeleni ivangeli, futhi kufanele futhi bahlupheke kanye noKristu. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

articles.title: Ubhapathizo 1 Ubhapathizo lukaMoya oNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuzEnzo Isahluko 11, amavesi 15-16 futhi sifunde ndawonye: "Umphostoli uPetru wathi," → Ngokushesha nje lapho ngiqala ukukhuluma, uMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwabo, njengoba nje wehlele phezu kwethu. Ngakhumbula amazwi eNkosi: “UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina nimelwe ukubhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele.” '

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nawe - ngibhapathizwe "Ubhapathizo lukaMoya oNgcwele" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi,* ivangeli lensindiso yakho, ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo futhi elikhulunywa yibona! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho! Kuyiqiniso elingokomoya → Qonda indlela yeqiniso, kholwa ivangeli, futhi wamukele ubhapathizo lukaMoya oNgcwele → thola ukuzalwa kabusha, ukuvuka, insindiso, nokuphila okuphakade . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Kufanele ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uMarku 1:8 ndawonye: Mina nginibhapathiza ngamanzi; kodwa yena uzakunibhabhathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele .

UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi, kepha ezinsukwini ezimbalwa, Kufanele ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele . ”—IzEnzo Isahluko 1 Ivesi 5

Kwathi nje ngiqala ukukhuluma, uMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwabo, njengoba nje wehlele phezu kwethu. Ngakhumbula amazwi eNkosi: ‘ UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi, kepha nina nimelwe ukubhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele . ’—IzEnzo 11:15-16

[Qaphela] Sikuqophe lokhu ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla:

→ 1 UJohane uMbhapathizi wathi: “Mina nginibhapathiza ngamanzi, kodwa uJesu uzonibhapathiza ngamanzi.” UMoya oNgcwele "Ngibhabhathize
→ 2 UJesu wathi: “UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi, kepha nina nimelwe ukubhapathizwa.” UMoya oNgcwele " yokuwasha
→ 3 UPetru wathi: "Ngiqala ngokushumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu." UMoya oNgcwele ” futhi lwehlela phezu kwabo “abeZizwe,” njengoba nje lasehlela phezu kwethu ekuqaleni, futhi ngakhumbula amazwi eNkosi: ‘UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi; Kufanele ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele . Amen!

buza: Njengoba thina "beZizwe" → "sizwa iqiniso futhi sikholwe ivangeli" → samukela " ubhapathizo lomoya ongcwele "! Ngakho, siwuzwa kanjani umlayezo weqiniso wevangeli?

impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

2. Yizwa indlela yeqiniso futhi uqonde indlela yeqiniso

buza: Iyiphi indlela yeqiniso?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. — Johane 1:1-2

(2)ULizwi waba yinyama

ULizwi waba yinyama, okusho ukuthi “uNkulunkulu” waba yinyama!
ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. Isikhombo (Johane 1:14)

(3)Igama lakhe nguJesu

Wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wazalwa yiNcasakazi uMariya!
Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshiwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayemiselwe uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. …Uzozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba iyosindisa abantu bayo ezonweni zabo. (Funda uMathewu 1:18, 21.)

(4)UJesu ungukukhanya kokuphila

Ukuphila kukuye, futhi lokhu kuphila kungukukhanya komuntu!
UJesu wabe esethi ezixukwini: “Mina ngiwukukhanya kwezwe. Lowo ongilandelayo akasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uyoba nokukhanya kokuphila.” ( Johane 8:12;

(5)Indlela yokuphila

Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi sidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwambulwa kithi.) Isikhombo - 1 Johane 1:1-2

(6)Kufanele uzalwe kabusha

buza: Ungazalwa kanjani kabusha?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya — Johane 3:5-7
2 Wazalwa ngezwi leqiniso levangeli - — 1 Korinte 4:15 noJakobe 1:18
3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu! Amen
Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa ebizweni lakhe. Banjalo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, nangentando yomuntu; ozelwe nguNkulunkulu . Inkomba ( Johane 1:12-13 )

(7) UJesu uyindlela, iqiniso, nokuphila

UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami.

3. Kholwani evangelini—tholani uphawu lukaMoya oNgcwele

Ngokuba lokho enganinika khona nami: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo (1 Korinte 15 Isahluko 3-4)

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: umphostoli" uPaul “Shumayelani kwabezizwe
→" Ivangeli lensindiso "!
→ Engakuthola ngakudlulisela kini ,
→ Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokusho kweBhayibheli:
(1) Sisindise esonweni — Roma 6:6-7
(2) Ukukhululeka emthethweni nasekuqalekisweni kwawo — Roma 7:6; Gal.
Futhi wangcwatshwa →
(3) Hlukanisa ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo — Kolose 3:9;
Futhi ngokweBhayibheli, wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu!
(4) Sithethelele! Vuswa, uzalwe kabusha, usindiswe, futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade noKristu! Amen .
UJesu wanikelwa kubantu ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu; uJesu wavuswa Sithethelele (Noma ukuhumusha: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu). Inkomba ( Roma 4:25 )

Qaphela: UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo" ukuzalwa kabusha “Wasinika ifa elingenakonakala, elingangcolile, nelingabuni, elibekelwe nina ezulwini.
Ukhiqizwa kabusha , hhayi ngembewu ebolayo, kodwa ngembewu engenakonakala, ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelimiyo. ( 1 Petru 1:23 )

UJesu wathuma abaphostoli, nansi indlela " uPetru, uJohane, uPawulu "IVangeli kumaJuda nakwabeZizwe→" IVangeli likaJesu Kristu "→ ivangeli lensindiso yakho → Nobabili" yizwa “Izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi incwadi kaKristu, kusukela incwadi Yena, nje" Wabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe . (1) Nina nonke enikhandlekayo nenisindwayo uJesu uyaniphumuza

Wozani kimi nina nonke enikhatheleyo nenisindwayo, mina ngizakuniphumuza. Bekani ijoka lami phezu kwenu nifunde kimi, ngokuba ngimnene, ngithobekile ngenhliziyo, niyakufumana ukuphumula kwemiphefumulo yenu. Ngokuba ijoka lami lihle, nomthwalo wami ulula. ”— Mathewu 11 amavesi 28-30

Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. articles.title: Ukuxazulula inkinga: Kumele kube nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kumaHeberu Isahluko 4, amavesi 8-9, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ukube uJoshuwa wayebanike ukuphumula, uNkulunkulu wayengeke akhulume ngezinye izinsuku. Kulo mbono, kumelwe kube nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha okusele kwabantu bakaNkulunkulu.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye “Kuyoba Khona Okunye Ukuphumula KweSabatha” Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → 1 Qonda ukuthi umsebenzi wokudala usuphelile futhi ungene ekuphumuleni; 2 Umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuphelile, ngena ekuphumuleni . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Umsebenzi wokudala uqediwe → ungena ekuphumuleni

Masifunde iBhayibheli uGenesise 2:1-3 Wonke amazulu nomhlaba kwadalwa. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo wawusuphelile, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. UNkulunkulu wabusisa usuku lwesikhombisa, walungcwelisa, ngokuba ngalolo suku uNkulunkulu waphumula emisebenzini yakhe yonke yokudala.

KumaHeberu 4:3-4 …Eqinisweni, umsebenzi wokudala usuqediwe kusukela ekudalweni komhlaba. Ngokuphathelene nosuku lwesikhombisa, kwenye indawo kuthiwa: “Ngosuku lwesikhombisa uNkulunkulu waphumula emisebenzini yakhe yonke.”

buza: Liyini iSabatha?

impendulo: “Ngezinsuku eziyisithupha” uJehova uNkulunkulu wadala konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala waphela, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. UNkulunkulu wabusisa usuku lwesikhombisa → walumisa ngokuthi "usuku olungcwele" → izinsuku eziyisithupha zomsebenzi, nosuku lwesikhombisa → "iSabatha"!

buza: Iluphi usuku lwesonto “iSabatha”?

impendulo: Ngokwekhalenda lamaJuda → "iSabatha" eMthethweni KaMose → ngoMgqibelo.

(2) Umsebenzi wokuhlenga usuqediwe → Ukungena ekuphumuleni

Masifunde iBhayibheli, Luka Isahluko 23, Ivesi 46. UJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, “Baba, ezandleni zakho ngiyawubeka umoya wami.” Ngemva kokusho lokhu, wafa.

NgokukaJohane 19:30 UJesu enambitha uviniga, wathi: “Kufeziwe.” Wagebisa ikhanda, wanikela umphefumulo wakhe kuNkulunkulu.

buza: Uyini umsebenzi wokuhlenga?

impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Njengoba “uPawulu” asho → “Ivangeli” engalamukela ngalishumayeza kini: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokweBhayibheli →

1 Sikhulule esonweni: “UJesu” wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa → “Lowo owafayo “wakhululwa” esonweni; bonke bafa → “bonke” “bakhululiwe” esonweni → “Bonke Ngena ekuphumuleni.” Amen! AmaRoma 6:7 kanye neyesi-2 Korinte 5:14

2 Sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo: Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje “sikhululiwe emthethweni” uKristu usihlengile ngokuthatha isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Wonke umuntu olenga emthini ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso.” ( Roma 7:4-6 )

Futhi wangcwatshwa;

3 Nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe: Ningaqambelani amanga;

Futhi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu, ngokomBhalo,

4 Ukusithethelela: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu (noma kuhunyushwa ngokuthi: UJesu wanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu futhi wavuselwa ukulungisiswa kwethu) Inkomba - KwabaseRoma 4:25

→Savuswa kanye noKristu→sembatha ubuntu obusha futhi sembatha uKristu→samukela ukutholwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba-1 KwabaseKorinte Isahluko 15 Amavesi 3-4

"Wagebisa ikhanda futhi wanikela umphefumulo wakhe kuNkulunkulu → "umphefumulo" wanikelwa ezandleni zikaYise → "umphefumulo" insindiso yaqedwa → INkosi uJesu yathi: "Kuphelile! Kubukeka kanjena," Kuyoba nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha "Ugcinelwe abantu bakaNkulunkulu. →NguJesu yedwa" okwe "Uma wonke umuntu efa, wonke umuntu uyafa →" wonke umuntu “Ukungena ekuphumuleni; ukuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo kuyasivuselela” okwe "Sonke sihlala →" wonke umuntu " Phumula kuKristu ! Amen. →Lokhu “kuyoba nokunye ukuphumula kweSabatha” → kubekelwe abantu bakaNkulunkulu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - Hebheru 4 amavesi 8-9

articles.title: ISabatha Izinsuku eziyisithupha zomsebenzi kanye nosuku lwesikhombisa lokuphumula
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuGenesise Isahluko 2 Amavesi 1-2 Zonke izinto ezisezulwini nasemhlabeni zadalwa. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo wawusuphelile, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "iSabatha" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu waqeda umsebenzi wokudala ngezinsuku eziyisithupha futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa → oluqokwe njengosuku olungcwele .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) UNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha

Usuku 1: Ekuqaleni uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba. Umhlaba wawuyize, ungenalutho, nobumnyama babuphezu kokwalasha, kepha uMoya kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwamanzi. UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya,” kwaba khona ukukhanya. UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi ukukhanya kuhle, futhi wahlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama. UNkulunkulu wabiza ukukhanya ngokuthi "imini" nobumnyama "ubusuku." Kukhona ukuhlwa futhi kukhona ekuseni. —Genesise 1:1-5

Usuku 2: UNkulunkulu wathi: "Makube khona umoya phakathi kwamanzi ukuze uhlukanise amanzi phezulu nangaphezulu." Kwaba njalo. —Genesise 1:6-7

Usuku 3: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Amanzi aphansi kwezulu mawaqoqekele ndawonye, kubonakale umhlabathi owomileyo. UNkulunkulu wabiza umhlabathi owomileyo ngokuthi “umhlaba” nokuqoqeka kwamanzi ngokuthi ulwandle. UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi kuhle. UNkulunkulu wathi: "Umhlaba mawuveze utshani, izitshalo ezithela imbewu, nemithi ethela izithelo enembewu kuyo ngezinhlobo zayo." --Genesise 1 Isahluko 9-11 Imikhosi

Usuku 4: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona izinkanyiso esibhakabhakeni ukuze zihlukanise imini nobusuku, futhi zibe yizibonakaliso zezinkathi zonyaka, nezinsuku neminyaka, zibe yizinkanyiso esibhakabhakeni zokukhanyisa emhlabeni. — Genesise 1:14-15

Usuku 5: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Amanzi mawagcwale izidalwa eziphilayo, kundize izinyoni phezu komhlaba nasemkhathini.”— Genesise 1:20

Usuku 6: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Umhlaba mawuveze izilwane eziphilayo ngezinhlobo zazo, izinkomo, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, nezilo zasendle ngezinhlobo zazo. UNkulunkulu wathi: “Masenze abantu ngomfanekiso wethu, basifuze, babuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezinkomo ezisemhlabeni, nomhlaba wonke, naphezu komhlaba wonke. zonke izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ” Ngakho uNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu wabadala owesilisa nowesifazane. —Genesise 1:24, 26-27

(2) Umsebenzi wokudala waqedwa ngezinsuku eziyisithupha futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa

Zonke izinto ezisezulwini nasemhlabeni zadalwa. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wokudala indalo wawusuphelile, ngakho waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa. UNkulunkulu wabusisa usuku lwesikhombisa, walungcwelisa, ngokuba ngalolo suku uNkulunkulu waphumula emisebenzini yakhe yonke yokudala. —Genesise 2:1-3

(3) UMthetho KaMose → ISabatha

“Khumbula usuku lwesabatha, ulungcwelise izinsuku eziyisithupha, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho, kepha usuku lwesikhombisa luyisabatha likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho , nezinceku zakho, nezincekukazi zakho, nezinkomo zakho, nomfokazi wakho ogogobeleyo phakathi komuzi akumelwe basebenze nanoma yimuphi umsebenzi ngoba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha uJehova wenza izulu nomhlaba nolwandle nakho konke okukukho, futhi waphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa Ngakho-ke uJehova walubusisa usuku lwesabatha, walungcwelisa .- Eksodusi Isahluko 20 amavesi 8-11

Kumelwe ukhumbule ukuthi wawuyisigqila ezweni laseGibhithe, lapho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho akukhipha khona ngesandla esinamandla nangengalo eyeluliwe. Ngalokho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho uyakuyala ukuba ugcine isabatha. — Duteronomi 5:15

[Qaphela]: UJehova uNkulunkulu waqeda umsebenzi wokudala ngezinsuku eziyisithupha → waphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi Wakhe wokudala ngosuku lwesikhombisa → "waphumula". UNkulunkulu wabusisa usuku lwesikhombisa walukhetha njengosuku olungcwele → "iSabatha".

EMithethweni Eyishumi yoMthetho kaMose, ama-Israyeli ayetshelwa ukuba akhumbule “iSabatha” futhi aligcine lingcwele, asebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha futhi aphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa.

buza: Kungani uNkulunkulu atshela ama-Israyeli ukuba ‘agcine’ iSabatha?

impendulo: Khumbulani ukuthi babeyizigqila ezweni laseGibithe, uJehova uNkulunkulu owabakhipha kulo ngesandla esinamandla nangengalo eyeluliweyo. Ngakho, uJehova uNkulunkulu wayala ama-Israyeli ukuba ‘agcine’ iSabatha. "Akukho ukuphumula kwezigqila, kodwa kukhona ukuphumula kulabo abakhululiwe ebugqilini → ujabulele umusa kaNkulunkulu. Ingabe uyaqonda lokhu ngokucacile? Inkomba - Duteronomi 5:15

Ukwehlukanisa “ukolweni” nokhula ngesikhathi sokuvuna . Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Umfanekiso kakolweni nokhula

Asitadishe iBhayibheli, uMathewu 13, amavesi 24-30, siliphenye futhi silifunde ndawonye: UJesu wabatshela omunye umfanekiso, wathi: “Umbuso wezulu ufana nomuntu owahlwanyela imbewu enhle ensimini yakhe; elele, kwafika isitha sakhe, sahlwanyela ukhula phakathi kukakolweni, samuka. Kwathi sekuhluma, kwahluma izikhwebu , nokhula Inceku yomninindawo yeza kuye, yathi kuye: "Nkosi, awuhlwanyelanga imbewu enhle ensimini na? Luvelaphi ukhula na?" Yathi, "Lokhu kungumsebenzi wesitha." . "Ngesikhathi sokuvuna ngiyakuthi kubavuni: Buthani ukhula kuqala, nilubophe lube izinyanda, nilugcine ukuba lushiswe, kepha ukolweni kumelwe kubuthelwe esiphaleni.'

(2) Ukolweni uyindodana yombuso wezulu;

NgokukaMathewu 36-43 UJesu wayesesuka esixukwini wangena endlini. Abafundi bakhe beza kuye bathi: “Sitshele umfanekiso wokhula ensimini.” Waphendula wathi: “Ohlwanyela imbewu enhle yiNdodana yomuntu, insimu yizwe; umbuso, nokhula luyilabo ababi; Ukhula luyabuthwa, lushiswe ngomlilo, kuyakuba njalo ekupheleni kwezwe iNdodana yomuntu iyakuthuma izingelosi zayo, zikhiphe embusweni wayo bonke abonayo nabenzi bokubi, zibaphonse esithandweni somlilo. lapho kuyakuba khona ukukhala nokugedla amazinyo.

[Qaphela]: Sifunda imibhalo engenhla ukuze siyiqophe →INkosi uJesu yasebenzisa “ukolweni” kanye “nokhula” njengesingathekiso sokuhlwanyela imbewu→

1 Ndodana yeZulu: "Insimu" ibhekisela emhlabeni, futhi lowo ohlwanyela imbewu enhle "ukolweni" yiNdodana yoMuntu → uJesu! “Imbewu enhle” iyizwi likaNkulunkulu - bhekisela kuLuka 8:11 → “imbewu enhle” iyindodana yombuso wezulu;

2 Amadodana kaMubi: Lapho abantu besalele, kwafika isitha futhi sahlwanyela “ukhula” “emasimini” kakolweni, sabe sesishiya → “ukhula” lungamadodana omubi, isitha esihlwanyela ukhula ngudeveli isikhathi sokuvuna; okwezwe; ukuvuna Abantu bayizingelosi. Buthani ukhula nilushise ngomlilo, kuyakuba njalo ekupheleni kwezwe.

Ngakho-ke, "ukolweni" uzalwa kuNkulunkulu → "ukhula" luzalwa "enyoka" → yindodana yomubi → ukolweni nokhula kuyahlukaniswa ukuqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: Ukuhlukana Umuntu omusha uhlukanisa nomuntu omdala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseKolose isahluko 3 amavesi 9-10 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe, nembatha omusha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "hlukana" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda “ukwembatha” umuntu omusha futhi “ukukhumula” umuntu omusha kuhlukaniswa nomuntu omdala .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

"Omusha"

Ngokuba yena ungukuthula kwethu, wenza laba ababili baba-nye, wadiliza ugange oluhlukanisayo, wachitha ubutha emzimbeni wakhe, yebo, izimiso ezilotshwe emthethweni, ukuze adale umuntu omusha. ngazo zombili, ngaleyo ndlela kuzuzwe ukuzwana. — Efesu 2:14-15

Uma umuntu ekuKristu, "uyisidalwa esisha." —2 Korinte 5:17

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. — Roma 8:9

[Qaphela]: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu “ehlala” kini, anisibo abenyama kodwa ningokaMoya.

buza: Uhlukaniswa kanjani umuntu omusha nomuntu omdala?

impendulo: UMoya kaNkulunkulu “UnguMoya Ongcwele” Nomoya WeNdodana Yakhe → “uhlala” ezinhliziyweni zenu → okungukuthi, umuntu omusha “ozelwe kabusha” “akuyena” womuntu omdala, inyama ka-Adamu, kodwa ungowomuntu omusha. UMoya oNgcwele. →“Umuntu omusha” uphila kuKristu ngenxa yokulunga “umuntu omdala” uyafa ngenxa yesono. Ngakho-ke, "umuntu omusha" akayena "omuntu omdala" "umuntu omusha" "uzalwa kabusha" ngeqiniso levangeli → uhlukana nomuntu omdala → umuntu omusha "uhlukaniswe" omdala; umuntu; "umuntu omusha" ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu kuze kubuye uKristu → "Umuntu omusha" uvela → uvela noKristu enkazimulweni. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isikhombo-Kolose 3:3

"Indoda endala"

Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo - Kolose 3:9

Uma nizwile izwi lakhe, namukela imfundiso yakhe, nafunda iqiniso lakhe, nikhumule ubuntu benu obudala, onakaliswa inkohliso yenkanuko.”— Efesu 4:21-22

[Qaphela]: Niye nalalela amazwi akhe, nathola izimfundiso zakhe, futhi nafunda iqiniso lakhe → niye wezwa “izwi leqiniso” Njengoba niye nakholwa kuKristu, namukele “uMoya oNgcwele” othenjisiwe njengophawu → nizalwa kabusha! Bheka eyabaseKolose 1:13 . →Ngale ndlela, "ukhumule" →"indoda endala kanye nokuziphatha komuntu omdala. Leli khehla liya liba libi kancane kancane ngenxa yokukhohliswa kwezifiso zobugovu →umzimba wangaphandle uyabhujiswa."

1 Umzimba "omdala" wafa ngenxa yesono → kancane kancane wawohloka, umzimba wangaphandle wabhujiswa, itende ladilizwa → futhi ekugcineni wabuyela othulini.

2 "Umuntu omusha" uphila ngokulunga kukaNkulunkulu → wenziwa musha futhi wakhiwe kuKristu "ngoMoya oNgcwele", wenziwa musha usuku nosuku, futhi "uyakhula" → ugcwele isimo sikaKristu → UKristu uyabuya futhi uvela inkazimulo. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isithenjwa - 2 Korinte 4:16-18

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.06.03

articles.title: Ukwehlukana ITestamente Elisha lehlukaniswe neTestamente Elidala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Korinte 11, amavesi 24-25, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Esebongile, wasihlephula, wathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami owahleshulelwa nina; kwenzeni lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule; “Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami. Njalo nxa niphuza kuyo, kwenzeni lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "hlukana" Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ** ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi iNkosi uJesu yasebenzisa igazi layo ukumisa “isivumelwano esisha” nathi ukuze silungisiswe futhi samukele isiqu samadodana kaNkulunkulu. .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

ITestamente Elidala

( 1 ) Isivumelwano Somthetho Ka-Adamu → Isivumelwano Sokuphila Nokufa

UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala u-Adamu: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa. — Genesise 2:16-17

( 2 ) Isivumelwano sikaNowa soThingo

UNkulunkulu wathi: “Kukhona isibonakaliso sesivumelwano sami esiphakade phakathi kwami nani nazo zonke izilwane eziphilayo ezikanye nani. Ngibeke uthingo efwini, futhi luyoba uphawu lwesivumelwano phakathi kwami nomhlaba.”— Genesise. UGenesise Isahluko 9 Amavesi 12-13 Qaphela: Isivumelwano Sothingo → siyisivumelwano sokuthula → "isivumelwano esiphakade" → sifanekisela "isivumelwano esisha" uJesu asenza nathi, okuyisivumelwano saphakade.

( 3 ) Isivumelwano sika-Abrahama Sokholo

UJehova wakhuluma kuye, wathi: “Lona akayikudla ifa lakho; Wathi kuye: “Iyakuba njalo inzalo yakho.” U-Abrama “wakholwa” nguJehova, uJehova wambalela lokho njengokulunga. —Genesise 15:4-6. Qaphela: Isivumelwano sika-Abrahama → isivumelwano "sokholo" → "isithembiso" isivumelwano → "ukulungisiswa" "ngokholo".

( 4 ) Isivumelwano Somthetho KaMose

"Imiyalo Eyishumi, nezimiso, nezahlulelo" → UMose wabiza "bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli" wathi kubo: "O Israyeli, lalela izimiso nezahlulelo engikunika zona namuhla, ukuze uzifunde futhi uzigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi entabeni yaseHorebe “Lesi sivumelwano” asenziwanga nokhokho bethu, kodwa nathi esiphilayo lapha namuhla—Duteronomi 5:1-3.

[Qaphela]: "ITestamente Elidala" →ihlanganisa 1 Isivumelwano Somthetho Ka-Adamu, 2 Isivumelwano Sokuthula SikaNowa SoThingo Lwasenkosazane Safanekisela Isivumelwano Esisha, 3 Isivumelwano Sika-Abrahama Sokholo-Isithembiso, 4 Isivumelwano soMthetho KaMose senziwa nama-Israyeli.

Ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama yethu, asikwazi ukugcwalisa “ukulunga komthetho” okungukuthi, “imiyalo, nezimiso, nezimiso” zomthetho ukwehluleka ukwenza lokho kuwukwephulwa kwesivumelwano.

1 Imithetho yangaphambilini yayibuthakathaka futhi ingenamsebenzi → ngakho yaqedwa

Izimiso zangaphambili zaqedwa ngoba zazibuthakathaka futhi zingenanzuzo - Hebheru 7:18 → Isaya 28:18;

2 Umthetho awufezi lutho → kumele ushintshwe

(Umthetho awufezanga lutho) ngaleyo ndlela wethula ithemba elingcono esingangena ngalo ebukhoneni bukaNkulunkulu. KumaHeberu 7:19 → Njengoba ubupristi sebushintshile, nomthetho kumelwe uguqulwe. — Hebheru 7:12

3 Amaphutha esivumelwaneni sangaphambilini → Yenza isivumelwano esisha

Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona indawo yokubheka isivumelwano sakamuva. Ngakho-ke, uJehova wabasola abantu Bakhe futhi wathi (noma elihunyushwe ngokuthi: Ngakho-ke uJehova wakhomba ukushiyeka kwesivumelwano sokuqala): “Izinsuku ziyeza lapho ngiyokwenza isivumelwano esisha nendlu ka-Israyeli nendlu kaJuda; kungenjengalokho ngabamba oyise ngesandla ngabahola, ngenza isivumelwano nabo ekuphumeni kwami eGibithe, ngokuba bengasigcinanga isivumelwano sami,” usho uJehova.

ITestamente Elisha

( 1 ) UJesu wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi ngegazi lakhe siqu

Engangishumayeza ngakho yikho engakwamukela eNkosini Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa ngenxa yami. wena.” Imiqulu yasendulo: ephukile) “Kumelwe nikwenze lokhu ningikhumbula. Ngemva kokudla kwakusihlwa, wathatha nesitsha, wathi: “Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami; mina. ”— 1 Korinte 11:23-25

( 2 ) Isiphetho somthetho nguKristu

“Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke phakathi kwabo kanye neziphambeko zabo.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki kube nemihlatshelo yezono. -- Hebheru 10: 16-18 → Futhi iNkosi yathi: “Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nendlu ka-Israyeli emva kwalezo zinsuku: Ngiyakufaka imithetho yami phakathi kwabo, ngiyilobe ezinhliziyweni zabo eyabo Nkulunkulu; bayakuba-ngabantu bami, abayikuba yilowo nalowo umakhelwane wakhe nomfowabo, ngokuthi, ‘Yazini iNkosi’; ukungalungi, futhi ungabe usasikhumbula isono sabo.”

Njengoba sikhuluma “ngesivumelwano esisha,” sibheka “isivumelwano sangaphambili” “njengesidala” kodwa lokho okugugayo nokunciphayo kuzoshabalala maduzane. — Hebheru 8:10-13

( 3 ) UJesu unguMlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha

Ngaleso sizathu, waba umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, njengoba ukufa kwakhe kwahlawulela izono ezenziwa abantu ngesikhathi sesivumelwano sokuqala, wenza ukuba ababiziweyo bathole ifa eliphakade ababelithenjisiwe. Noma ngubani owenza incwadi yefa kumele alinde kuze kube yilapho umuntu oshiye incwadi yefa (umbhalo wokuqala ufana nesivumelwano) ngoba incwadi yefa isebenza kuphela ngemva kokufa komuntu kusazoba usizo? — Hebheru 9:15-17

Bantwanyana bami, nginilobela lokhu ukuze ningoni. Uma umuntu ona, sinoMmeli kuBaba, uJesu Kristu olungileyo . —1 Johane isahluko 2 ivesi 1

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: Ukuhlukana Ukukhanya nobumnyama kuyahlukana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuGenesise Isahluko 1, amavesi 3-4, futhi sifunde ndawonye: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya,” kwaba khona ukukhanya. UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi ukukhanya kuhle, futhi wahlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "hlukana" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi ukukhanya kwehlukanisiwe nobumnyama.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

ukukhanya nobumnyama kuyahlukana

Masifunde iBhayibheli, uGenesise Isahluko 1, amavesi 1-5, futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ekuqaleni, uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba. Umhlaba wawuyize, ungenalutho, nobumnyama babuphezu kobuso bakwalasha, kepha uMoya kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwamanzi. UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya,” kwaba khona ukukhanya. UNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi ukukhanya kuhle, futhi wahlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama. UNkulunkulu wabiza ukukhanya ngokuthi "imini" nobumnyama "ubusuku." Kukhona ukuhlwa futhi kukhona ekuseni.

(1) UJesu ungukukhanya kweqiniso, ukukhanya kokuphila komuntu

UJesu wabe esethi ezixukwini: “Mina ngiwukukhanya kwezwe. Lowo ongilandelayo akasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uyoba nokukhanya kokuphila.”— Johane 8:12

UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi kuye abukho nhlobo ubumnyama. Leli yilizwi esilizwile eNkosini futhi salibuyisela kini. — 1 Johane 1:5

Ukuphila kwakukhona kuye, futhi lokhu kuphila kwakuwukukhanya kwabantu. …Lokho kukhanya kungukukhanya kweqiniso, okukhanyisa bonke abaphila emhlabeni. —Johane 1:4, 9

[Qaphela]: Ekuqaleni uNkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba. Umhlaba wawuyize, ungenalutho, nobumnyama babuphezu kokwalasha, kepha uMoya kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwamanzi. UNkulunkulu wathi: "Makube-khona ukukhanya", kwaba khona ukukhanya → "Ukukhanya" kubhekisela ekuphileni, ukukhanya kokuphila → UJesu "uwukukhanya kweqiniso" kanye "nokuphila" → Ungukukhanya kokuphila komuntu, futhi ukuphila kungukuphila. Kuye, futhi lokhu kuphila kuwumuntu Ukukhanya kukaJesu → Noma ubani olandela uJesu akasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uyoba nokukhanya kokuphila → "ukuphila kukaJesu"! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngakho uNkulunkulu wadala amazulu nomhlaba nazo zonke izinto → UNkulunkulu wathi: “Makube khona ukukhanya”, kwaba khona ukukhanya. Lapho uNkulunkulu ebona ukukhanya ukuthi kuhle, wahlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama.

(2) Uyakholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana yokukhanya

NgokukaJohane 12:36 Kholwani ekukhanyeni nisenakho, ukuze nibe ngabantwana bokukhanya. ” UJesu eseshilo lokho wasuka kubo wacasha.

1 Thesalonika 5:5 Nonke ningabantwana bokukhanya, abantwana bemini. Asibona abobusuku, noma abobumnyama.

Kepha nina niluhlanga olukhethiweyo, ubupristi obobukhosi, isizwe esingcwele, abantu bakaNkulunkulu, ukuze nishumayele ubukhosi balowo owanibiza niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okumangalisayo. —1 Petru 2:9

[Qaphela]: UJesu "ungukukhanya" → silandela "uJesu" → silandela ukukhanya → siba abantwana bokukhanya! Amen. → Kepha nina niluhlanga olukhethiweyo, ubupristi obobukhosi, isizwe esingcwele, abantu bakaNkulunkulu, ukuze nishumayele “ivangeli” ubuhle balowo owanibiza niphume ebumnyameni ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okumangalisayo.

→Nkosi uJesu Kristu insindiso. → Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Ngize ezweni njengokukhanya, ukuze lowo okholwa yimi angahlali ebumnyameni nanini. Inkomba - Johane 12:46

(3)Ubumnyama

Ukukhanya kukhanya ebumnyameni, kodwa ubumnyama abukwamukelanga ukukhanya. — Johane 1:5

Uma umuntu ethi usekukhanyeni, kepha ezonda umzalwane wakhe, usesebumnyameni. Lowo othanda umzalwane wakhe uhlala ekukhanyeni, futhi akukho sikhubekiso kuye. Kepha ozonda umzalwane wakhe usebumnyameni, uhamba ebumnyameni, engazi lapho eya khona, ngokuba ubumnyama bumphuphuthekisile. — 1 Johane 2:9-11

Ukukhanya kufikile emhlabeni, futhi abantu bathanda ubumnyama esikhundleni sokukhanya, ngoba imisebenzi yabo mibi. Wonke owenza okubi uzonda ukukhanya futhi akezi ekukhanyeni, funa imisebenzi yakhe isolwe. — Johane 3:19-20

[Qaphela]: Ukukhanya kukhanya ebumnyameni, kodwa ubumnyama abukutholi ukukhanya → UJesu ungu "Ukukhanya". Ukungamukeli "uJesu" → kusho ukungakwamukeli "ukukhanya". Uma amehlo akho ecwebile →" amehlo akho omoya avuliwe → ubona uJesu", umzimba wakho wonke uzokhanya; uma amehlo akho efiphele futhi wena " ungambonanga uJesu", umzimba wakho wonke uzoba mnyama. . Ngakho-ke zihlole, funa kube khona ubumnyama kuwe. Uma kukhona ukukhanya emzimbeni wakho wonke, futhi kungekho bumnyama, uyokhanya ngokuphelele njengokukhanya. yesibani.” Ingabe nikuqonda kahle lokhu? Isikhombo- Luka 11:34-36

articles.title: Ukuxazulula izinkinga: UPawulu, uPetru, uJohane, uJakobe kanye noMthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 7 ivesi 6 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane nabeZizwe "Shiya uMthetho - noma Gcina uMthetho" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ** ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qondani ukuthi kokubili abeZizwe namaJuda kufanele bagqashule emthethweni futhi bafe emthethweni;

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】UJakobe kanye noMthetho

1 UJakobe wayeshisekela umthetho

“UJakobe” wathi kuPawulu: “Mfowethu, bheka ukuthi zingaki izinkulungwane zamaJuda ezikholwe eNkosini, futhi zonke ‘zishisekela umthetho.’ Bezwa abantu bethi: “Ufundise bonke abaJuda lahlani uMose, nibafundisile Wathi: "Ningabasoki abantwana benu, ningayilandeli imithetho. Wonke umuntu uyakuzwa ukuthi uyeza. Nizokwenzani na?"

2 UJakobe wanikeza imiyalo emi-4 kwabezizwe ngokombono wakhe

Ngakho-ke → "Ngokubona kwami" ningabakhathazi abezizwe abalalela uNkulunkulu, kodwa babhaleleni, nibayale ukuba badede → 1 ukungcola kwezithombe, 2 ukuphinga, 3 izilwane eziklinyiwe, negazi 4. Reference - Apostle IzEnzo 15:19-20

3 UJakobe utshela uPawulu ukuba alalele umthetho

Yenza njengoba sisho! Sibane lapha, futhi sonke sinezifiso. Bathathe uhambe nabo, wenze isihlambululo kanye nabo; Ngale ndlela, wonke umuntu uzokwazi ukuthi izinto abazizwile ngawe zingamanga nokuthi wena ngokwakho ungumuntu oziphethe kahle futhi ogcina umthetho. — IzEnzo 21:23-24

4 Uma wephula umthetho owodwa, wephula yonke imithetho.

Ngokuba ogcina umthetho wonke kepha akhubeke kokukodwa unecala kuwo wonke. Reference-Jakobe Isahluko 2 Ivesi 10

buza: Ubani yedwa owasungula umthetho?

impendulo: Munye kuphela umniki-mthetho nomahluleli, “uNkulunkulu olungile” ongasindisa futhi abhubhise. Ungubani wena ukuba wahlulele abanye? Isikhombo-Jakobe 4:12

buza: Ngoba uMoya oNgcwele unquma nathi? Noma ingabe “uJakobe” wabekela abeZizwe imiyalo emi-4 ngokusekelwe embonweni wakhe?

impendulo: lokho okushiwo umoya ongcwele → Akuhambisani

UMoya oNgcwele usho ngokucacile ukuthi ngezikhathi zokugcina abanye bayohlubuka ekukholweni futhi balandele imimoya edukisayo nezimfundiso zamademoni. Lokhu kungenxa yokuzenzisa kwabaqamba amanga abanembeza babo bashiswe ngensimbi eshisayo. Benqabela ukuganwa, bazithibe ekudleni, uNkulunkulu akudalela abakholwayo nabalaziyo iqiniso ukuba bakwamukele ngokubonga. Konke okudalwe nguNkulunkulu kuhle. Inkomba - 1 Thimothewu Isahluko 4 Amavesi 1-5 kanye nabaseKolose 2 Amavesi 20-23

→Ngokombono wakhe, uJakobe wamisa "imiyalo emi-4" yabeZizwe → emi-3 yayo ihlobene nokudla futhi owodwa uhlobene nenyama. →Kukhona izinto ezingeke zenziwe ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama→uNkulunkulu ngeke acele ukuthi "abezizwe" abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu "bagcine" imithetho abangakwazi ukuyigcina. "UJakobe" wayengayiqondi ngaphambili, kodwa kamuva → "Ukubhala Incwadi kaJakobe", waqonda intando kaNkulunkulu → Kubhaliwe ukuthi: "Kuyoba kuhle uma uhlala kulokhu ophakeme." umthetho. Ubani owagcwalisa umthetho? Ubani ogcina umthetho? Akuyena uKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu? UKristu uwugcwalisile umthetho, wagcina umthetho, ngiphila kuKristu, ngiyakholwa ukuthi uma ewugcwalisa, sowufeza, uma ewugcina, siyawugcina. Amen, ingabe lokhu kucacile kuwe? …Ngokuba ogcina umthetho wonke kepha akhubeke kokukodwa unecala lokweqa yonke. —Izikhombo-Jakobe 2:8, 10

【2】UPetru noMthetho

---Ungafaki ijoka elingenakubekezelelwa ezintanyeni zabafundi bakho---

UNkulunkulu wafakaza kubo, owazi izinhliziyo zabantu, wabanika uMoya oNgcwele, njengalokho esinikile, wahlambulula izinhliziyo zabo ngokholo, engahlukanisi phakathi kwabo nathi. Kungani manje alinga uNkulunkulu ukuba abeke ijoka ezintanyeni zabafundi bakhe okhokho bethu nathi esingeke silithwale? Sisindisiwe ngomusa weNkosi uJesu, njengabo. ”Hlanganyela—IzEnzo 15:8-11

buza: Liyini “ijoka elingabekezeleleki”?

impendulo: Amakholwa ambalwa kuphela, ayengamalungu ehlelo labaFarisi, asukuma athi: “Kumelwe nisoke → 1 AbeZizwe futhi nibayale → 2 “lalela umthetho kaMose.” Isikhombo - IzEnzo 15:5

【3】UJohane noMthetho

--lalela imiyalo kaNkulunkulu--

Siyazi ukuthi siyamazi uma sigcina imiyalo yakhe. Noma ubani othi: “Ngiyamazi,” engagcini imiyalo yakhe, ungumqambimanga, neqiniso alikho kuye. Inkomba - 1 Johane Isahluko 2 Amavesi 3-4

Uma sithanda uNkulunkulu futhi sigcina imiyalo yakhe, ngalokho siyokwazi ukuthi siyabathanda abantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Sithanda uNkulunkulu ngokugcina imiyalo Yakhe, futhi imiyalo Yakhe ayiwona umthwalo. Inkomba - 1 Johane 5 amavesi 2-3

[Qaphela]: Siyamthanda uNkulunkulu lapho sigcina imiyalo yakhe

buza: Iyini imiyalo? Ingabe iMiyalo Eyishumi KaMose?

impendulo: 1 Thanda uNkulunkulu, 2 Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena → Le miyalo emibili iyisifinyezo sawo wonke umthetho nabaprofethi. "Inkomba - Mathewu Isahluko 22 Ivesi 40 → Isifinyezo somthetho sithi "uKristu" - Isikhombo KwabaseRoma Isahluko 10 Ivesi 4 → UKristu "unguNkulunkulu" → uNkulunkulu "uLizwi" → Ekuqaleni wayekhona "uLizwi", futhi "uLizwi" "uNkulunkulu" → uNkulunkulu "uJesu" → "Uthanda umakhelwane wakhe njengoba ezithanda yena" futhi usinika "indlela" yokuphila kwakhe Ngale ndlela, isifinyezo somthetho uKristu → lapho sigcina umoya womthetho → sigcina "indlela" → Vele uyilandele "Imiyalo" kaNkulunkulu → "Ukugcina izwi" kusho "ukugcina imiyalo." Abantwana bakaNkulunkulu abazalwa kabusha abaphila kuKristu bagcina izwi, hhayi amazwi abulala abantu/noma ngubani osekelwe emthethweni bonke baqalekisiwe. Bheka kwabaseGalathiya 3:10-11.

【4】Isiqinisekiso IsiLuo kanye noMthetho

1 efile emthethweni

Ngakho-ke, bazalwane bami, “nifile emthethweni” ngomzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe ngababanye, balowo owavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sithele izithelo kuNkulunkulu. — Roma 7:4

2 fela emthethweni

Ngenxa yomthetho “ngafa kuwo umthetho” ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. — Galathiya 2:19

3 Sifile emthethweni osibophayo → sikhululiwe emthethweni

Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje “sesikhululiwe emthethweni” ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza uJehova ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwesiko elidala. Isampula. — Roma 7:6

impendulo: Ngoba ngenkathi sisenyameni..." inkanuko yenyama "→" Lokho ngoba " umthetho "Futhi→" wazalwa "Izifiso ezimbi zenziwa kusebenze emalungwini ethu → "Izifiso zokuzicabangela ziyasebenza" → "ukukhulelwa" kuqala → Lapho izifiso zobugovu sezikhulelwe → "Isono" sizalwa → "Isono" siyakhula → "Ukufa" kuyazalwa → okuholela esithelweni lokufa.

Ngakho-ke kufanele ubaleke →" fa ", kufanele sihambe →" ubugebengu ";Ufuna ukuhamba→" ubugebengu ", kufanele sihambe →" umthetho “Niyakuqonda kahle lokhu? Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:4-6 noJakobe 1:15

articles.title: (7) Ukuphuma kumuntu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseKolose isahluko 3 amavesi 3-4 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukuhlukaniswa" Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi ngabethelwa esiphambanweni, ngafa, ngangcwatshwa, futhi ngavuswa kanye noKristu Ngale ndlela, ngibushiyile ubuntu bami obudala → manje sengiphila noKristu. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu;

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kepha umphefumulo uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga. — Roma 8:9-10

[Qaphela]: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu, “uMoya oNgcwele” ehlala ezinhliziyweni zenu, aniyena “owenyama evela ku-Adamu ezelwe ngabazali”;

buza: Kuyini okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu?

impendulo: 1 kuMoya oNgcwele, 2 ozelwe ngeqiniso levangeli, 3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu. → Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa nguNkulunkulu. Isikhombo - Johane 1:13

buza: Yini evela ekuphileni?

impendulo: Inzalo ka-Adamu no-Eva → Ukuhlangana kwendoda nowesifazane “ozelwe ngabazali bakhe” kuvela ekuphileni komuntu. →Emzimbeni nasekuphileni komuntu, njengoba umphostoli “uPawulu” asho → uwumzimba wokufa, umzimba ofayo, umzimba owonakalayo, umzimba wesono ongcolile nongcolile → umphostoli “uPetru” wathi → ngoba: “Yonke inyama Bonke ubuhle bakhe bunjengezimbali zotshani;

(2) Ukuphila kwethu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngoba "ufile" → "ukuphila kwakho" kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. — Kolose 3:3-4

Bazalwane abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu manje, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; kodwa siyazi ukuthi "uma iNkosi ibonakala" → "siyoba njengaye" ngoba sizobona isimo sakhe sangempela. —1 Johane 3:2

(3) Ukuphila kwethu kuvuswa noKristu futhi sihlale ndawonye ezulwini

Wasivusa, wasihlalisa kanye nathi ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu Jesu, ukuze abonakalise ezizukulwaneni ezilandelayo inotho enkulu yomusa wakhe, umusa wakhe kithina kuKristu Jesu. — Efesu 2:6-7

buza: Iphi impilo yethu yokuvuka noKristu manje →?

impendulo: kuKristu

buza: Uphi uKristu manje?

impendulo: "Ezulwini, ehlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba" → Ukuphila kwethu okuvusiwe noKristu kusezulwini, kuKristu, futhi kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu → uKristu uhlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba, futhi thina ehlezi naye esandleni sokunene sikaYise uNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Inkomba - KwabaseKolose Isahluko 3:4 → Bazalwane abathandekayo, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu manje, futhi lokho esiyoba yikho esikhathini esizayo akukabonakali; Yena njengoba Enjalo. Isikhombo - 1 Johane 3:2

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 6 ivesi 14 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kodwa mina angisoze ngazibonga, kuphela ngesiphambano seNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, okubethelwe ngaso izwe kimi, nami emhlabeni. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukuhlukaniswa" Cha. 6 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho 【isonto】 Thumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Umhlaba ubethelwe esiphambanweni

Kodwa mina angisoze ngazibonga, kuphela ngesiphambano seNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, okubethelwe ngaso izwe kimi, nami emhlabeni. — Galathiya 6:14

UKristu wafela izono zethu ukuze asisindise kulesi sikhathi esibi, ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu. — Galathiya 1:4

Umbuzo: Kungani umhlaba ubethelwa?

Impendulo: Ngoba umhlaba wadalwa “ngo” uJesu, iNkosi yendalo, wabethelwa esiphambanweni → Ingabe umhlaba awukabethelwa esiphambanweni?

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Zonke izinto zenziwa ngaye; — Johane 1:1-3

NgokukaJohane 1:10 Wayekhona ezweni, izwe lavela ngaye, kepha izwe alimazanga.

1 Johane 4:4 Bantwanyana, nina ningabakaNkulunkulu, nibahlulile; ngokuba lowo okini mkhulu kunaye osezweni.

(2) Thina singabakaNkulunkulu;

Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi. — 1 Johane 5:19

Qaphelani nina, ningenzi njengeziwula, kodwa njengabahlakaniphileyo. Sebenzisani ngokugcwele isikhathi, ngoba lezi zinsuku zimbi. Ungabi yisiwula, kodwa qonda ukuthi iyini intando yeNkosi. — Efesu 5:15-17

[Qaphela]: Izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi, futhi inkathi yamanje yimbi; → UKristu wafela izono zethu ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu, ukuze asisindise → kulesi sikhathi esibi. Inkomba - KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 1 Ivesi 4

INkosi uJesu yathi: “Thina “esizelwe nguNkulunkulu” asibona abomhlaba, njengoba nje neNkosi ingeyena owaleli zwe → Ngibaniké “izwi lakho.” Futhi izwe liyabazonda, ngoba bengebona izwe, njengalokhu nami bengesibo abezwe . Inkomba - Johane 17 14. -16 amafindo

Nina ningabakaNkulunkulu, bantwanyana, nibahlulile, ngokuba lowo okini mkhulu kunaye osezweni. Bangabezwe, ngakho bakhuluma ngezinto zezwe, futhi izwe liyabalalela. Thina singabakaNkulunkulu, futhi labo abamaziyo uNkulunkulu bayosilalela; Kulokhu singakwazi ukubona umoya weqiniso nomoya wokuduka. Isikhombo-1 Johane 4:4-6
