Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Ukukhululeka ethonyeni likaSathane

Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi. — 1 Johane 5:19

ngiyakuthuma kubo, ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, baphenduke ebumnyameni, baye ekukhanyeni, basuke emandleni kaSathane, baye kuNkulunkulu; bangcwelisiwe. ’”— IzEnzo 26:18

[Qaphela]: INkosi uJesu yathumela "uPawulu" ukuba ashumayele ivangeli kwabeZizwe → ukuba amehlo abo avulwe → okungukuthi, "amehlo omoya" → ukubona ivangeli likaJesu Kristu → basuke ebumnyameni baye ekukhanyeni, emandleni kaSathane kuNkulunkulu; futhi ngenxa yokuthi ukholelwa kuJesu futhi wamukele ukuthethelelwa kwezono futhi uhlanganyele ifa nabo bonke abangcwelisiwe. Amen

buza: Ungaphunyuka kanjani emandleni kaSathane?

impendulo: Wathi futhi: “Ngizothembela kuye futhi: “Bheka, mina nabantwana uNkulunkulu anginike bona sihlanganyela umzimba ofanayo wenyama negazi, naye “Yena waba” inyama negazi , ikakhulukazi nge "Ukufa" → bhubhisa lowo onamandla okufa, okungukuthi, udeveli, futhi akhulule labo abaye bagqilazwa ukuphila kwabo konke ngenxa yokwesaba ukufa. Isikhombo-AmaHeberu Isahluko 2 Amavesi 13-15

(2) Baphunyukile emandleni obumnyama eHayidese

AmaHubo 30:3 Jehova, wawukhuphula umphefumulo wami eHayidesi, wangiphilisa ukuba ngehlele egodini.

Hoseya 13:14 Ngiyakubahlenga “eHayidesi,” ngibahlenge “ekufeni. Kufa, iphi inhlekelele yakho? Kuphi ukubhujiswa kwakho, Shiyoli? Akukho nhlobo ukuzisola phambi kwamehlo ami.

1 Petru 2:9 Kepha nina niluhlanga olukhethiweyo, ubupristi obobukhosi, isizwe esingcwele, abantu bakaNkulunkulu, ukuze nishumayele izwi lalowo owanibiza niphume ebumnyameni, ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okumangalisayo.

(3) Sishukumisele embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo

Usikhulule emandleni obumnyama futhi wasidlulisela “embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo” sihlengiwe ngayo futhi sithethelelwe izono zethu. Amen! Izikhombo-Kolose Isahluko 1 Amavesi 13-14

buza: Ingabe manje sisembusweni weNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo?

impendulo: Yebo! "Impilo entsha" esanda kuzalwa uNkulunkulu → isikhona kakade embusweni weNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo → Wasivusa futhi wasihlalisa ndawonye ezulwini noKristu Jesu. Ngoba ufile "okungukuthi, impilo endala ifile" → ukuphila kwakho "okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu" kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - Kolose 3:3-4 nabase-Efesu 2:6

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.06.08

articles.title: (4) Ukugqashula ezifisweni ezimbi nezifiso zenyama yomuntu endala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 5 ivesi 24 futhi sifunde ndawonye: AbangabakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukuhlukaniswa" Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi uthandaze: Aba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nathi njalo! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Labo abangabakaJesu Kristu bakhululiwe ezinkanukweni nasezifisweni zenyama . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Hlukana nezifiso ezimbi nezifiso zenyama yomuntu endala

buza: Yiziphi izinkanuko ezimbi nezinkanuko zenyama?

impendulo: Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, umona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. — Galathiya 5:19-21

Sonke sasiphakathi kwabo, senza izinkanuko zenyama, silandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo, futhi ngokwemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo bonke abanye. — Efesu 2:3

Ngakho bulalani amalungu emizimba yenu asemhlabeni: ubufebe, nokungcola, nenkanuko, nezifiso ezimbi, nokuhaha, okufana nokukhonza izithombe. Ngenxa yalezi zinto, ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luyofika phezu kwabantwana bokungalaleli. Nawe nakwenza lokhu ngesikhathi niphila kulezi zinto. Kepha manje lahlani zonke lezi zinto kanye nolaka, nolaka, nenzondo, nokuhlambalaza, nenkulumo eyichilo ephuma emlonyeni wenu. Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo - Kolose 3:5-9

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi → Ukwanelisa izinkanuko zenyama nokulandela izinkanuko zenyama nenhliziyo ngokwemvelo kungabantwana bolaka → Labo abenza lezi zinto ngeke balizuze ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. →Lapho uJesu efela bonke, bonke bafa →"bonke bayikhumula" inyama yendoda endala nezinkanuko nezinkanuko zayo ezimbi. Ngakho-ke, iBhayibheli lithi “nikhumule” umuntu omdala kanye nezenzo zakhe “Lowo okholwayo” usezikhumulile izinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama “Lowo ongakholwa” uyothwala izono zenyama . Nombhalo usho kanje: Okholwa nguye ulahliwe, kepha ongakholwayo uselahliwe. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka uJohane 3:18

(2) Umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ; Hhayi ngekhehla lenyama

KwabaseRoma 8:9-10 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kepha umphefumulo uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga.

[Qaphela]: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu "uhlala" ezinhliziyweni zenu → niyozalwa kabusha futhi nivuswe kanye noKristu! →“Umuntu omusha” owenziwe kabusha akayena owomuntu omdala u-Adamu weza enyameni →kodwa ungokaMoya oNgcwele, uJesu Kristu, noNkulunkulu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Uma uKristu ekini, “umzimba” womuntu omdala ufile ngenxa yesono, futhi “umoya” uyinhliziyo ngoba “uMoya oNgcwele” uhlala kithi, okusho ukuthi uphila ngokulunga kukaNkulunkulu. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngoba “umuntu omusha” wethu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ufihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu → “umuntu omusha” ozelwe uNkulunkulu → “akayena owakhe” → u-Adamu omdala nezinkanuko ezimbi nezinkanuko zenyama yomuntu omdala → ngakho "sibe " yahlukaniswa kusukela endala Izinkanuko ezimbi kanye nezifiso zomuntu omdala. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.06.07

articles.title: (3) Hlukanisa ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseKolose isahluko 3 ivesi 9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Suka" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi ngabethelwa esiphambanweni, ngafa, futhi ngangcwatshwa noKristu → ngimukile umuntu omdala nemikhuba yakhe. Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Esekhumule ikhehla

Umbuzo: Salilahla nini ikhehla?

Impendulo: Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasishukumisa; Futhi bonke bafa → futhi bonke bakhululwa esonweni. Ngakho uKristu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu futhi wembelwa → 1 ekhululekile esonweni, 2 ekhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, 3 ekhululekile ekuphileni okuyisono kwendoda endala u-Adamu. Ngakho-ke, uJesu Kristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu futhi wembelwa → Ngale ndlela, "sesivele" sikhumule indoda endala. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Bayeke ukuziphatha kwakudala

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuziphatha kwekhehla?

Impendulo: Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, nomona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. Inkomba - KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 5 Amavesi 19-21

Umbuzo: Singakuyeka kanjani ukuziphatha kwekhehla?

Impendulo: Labo abangabakaKristu Jesu “bayibethele” inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo. →Igama elithi "vele" lapha lisho ukuthi uKristu wabethelwa futhi wafa. Selokhu kwenzeka → ngikholelwa ukuthi sabethelwa esiphambanweni, safa futhi sangcwatshwa kanye noKristu → ukuziphatha komuntu omdala nomdala → izinkanuko ezimbi nezinkanuko zenyama zabethelwa ndawonye → “sikuyekile” ukuziphatha komuntu omdala nokuziphatha komuntu omdala . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Izikhombo-Galathiya 5:24

(3) Gqoka ubuntu obusha futhi nembathe uKristu

Umbuzo: Ikhehla lihlehlisiwe, manje selizigqokile →ukuphila komzimba kabani?

Impendulo: Gqoka “umzimba ongenakonakala nokuphila” kukaJesu Kristu

Gqoka indoda entsha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe. Inkomba - KwabaseKolose Isahluko 3 Ivesi 10

Futhi nigqoke ubuntu obusha, owadalwa ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele. Isikhombo- Kwabase-Efesu Isahluko 4 Ivesi 24

KwabaseGalathiya 3:27 Ngokuba nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembethe uKristu.

[Qaphela]: "Gqoka" okusha → "khumula" omdala ube nomzimba omusha nokuphila kukaKristu → "Umzimba omdala nempilo ka-Adamu kuyafana nalokho kwezwe, futhi umzimba wangaphandle uya konakaliswa futhi ubhujiswe ngenxa yenkanuko; ", futhi ekugcineni ikhehla "lilandisa" Ishede "lizikhumula futhi libuyela othulini."

Futhi siyayifaka" Omusha "→ Yebo" phila "KuKristu → Lowo ofihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, ngaye" UMoya oNgcwele "Ivuselelwa usuku nosuku → Lapho uKristu ebonakala, ukuphila kwethu kuyobonakala kanye noKristu enkazimulweni. Amen! Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile? Inkomba - 2 Korinte 4:16 kanye nabaseKolose 3:3

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.06.06

articles.title: (2) Abakhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 7 nevesi 6 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane "Ithimba" Isahluko 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho 【Isonto】Thumela ngaphandle abasebenzi Ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → 1 ukhululiwe emthethweni, 2 ngaphandle kwesono, 3 odolweni lokufa, 4 Uphunyukile esahlulelweni sokugcina. Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Inkanuko yenyama → izala isono ngomthetho

Masifunde kwabaseRoma 7:5 eBhayibhelini ngoba lapho sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizalwa ngomthetho zazisebenza emalungwini ethu, ziveza isithelo sokufa.

Lapho inkanuko isithathiwe, izala isono; — Jakobe 1:15

[Qaphela]: Lapho sisenyameni → "inkanuko" → "izifiso zenyama" ziyizifiso ezimbi → ngoba → "umthetho" usebenza emalungwini ethu → "izifiso zisebenza" → "ukukhulelwa" kuqala, futhi ngokushesha nje lapho izinkanuko bakhulelwa → babelethe lapho isono sesikhulile, sizala ukufa, okungukuthi, sithela isithelo sokufa. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Umbuzo: “Isono” sivelaphi?

Impendulo: "Isono" → lapho sisenyameni → "izinkanuko zenyama" → ngenxa "yomthetho", "izinkanuko eziqhutshwa" emalungwini ethu → "izinkanuko eziqalayo" → ziqala "ukukhulelwa" → njengoba izinkanuko zikhulelwa → zizala isono. "Isono" "sizalwa" ngenxa yenkanuko + umthetho →. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? lapho kungekho-mthetho khona, lapho kungekho-mthetho, isono asibalwa; Bheka amaRoma isahluko 4 ivesi 15, isahluko 5 ivesi 13 nesahluko 7 ivesi 8 .

(2) Amandla esono ngumthetho, futhi udosi lokufa yisono.

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba?

Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho?

Udosi lokufa yisono, futhi amandla esono umthetho. — 1 Korinte 15:55-56 . Qaphela: Udosi lokufa → yisono, inkokhelo yesono → ukufa, futhi amandla esono → umthetho. Uyabazi-ke ubudlelwano phakathi kwalaba abathathu?

Lapho kukhona "umthetho" kukhona → "isono", futhi uma kukhona "isono" kukhona → "ukufa". Ngakho iBhayibheli lithi → lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho “siphambeko” → “ngaphandle kweseqo” → akukho ukwephulwa komthetho → akukho ukwephulwa komthetho → akukho sono, “ngaphandle kwesono” → akukho udosi lokufa “. , ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(3) Ukukhululeka emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho

Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje “sesikhululiwe emthethweni” ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza uJehova ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwesiko elidala. Isampula. — Roma 7:6

KwabaseGalathiya 2:19 Ngokuba ngomthetho ngafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. → Nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe-ngababanye, yena owavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sithele izithelo kuNkulunkulu. — Roma 7:4

UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ngokuba yisiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;

[Qaphela]: Umphostoli “uPawulu” wathi: “Ngafa kuwo umthetho ngenxa yomthetho → 1 “Ngafa kuwo umthetho” ngomzimba kaKristu → 2 “Ngafa kuwo umthetho” → 3 emthethweni ungibophe Ngifile.

buza: Iyini "inhloso" yokufela umthetho?

impendulo: Ngikhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo.

Umphostoli "uPawulu" wathi → Ngabethelwa futhi ngafa kanye noKristu → 1 ngaphandle kwesono, 2 "Nikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho."

Ngakho kukhona kuphela: 1 sikhululekile emthethweni → sikhululekile esonweni; 2 Ukukhululeka esonweni → kukhululekile emandleni omthetho; 3 Ukukhululwa emandleni omthetho → ukukhululwa ekwahlulelweni komthetho; 4 Ukukhululwa ekwahlulelweni komthetho → ukukhululwa odolweni lokufa. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.06.05

articles.title: (1) Ukukholelwa evangelini kuyasikhulula esonweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 6 amavesi 5-7 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngokuba uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, bangabe besaba yizigqila zesono;

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke "Ukuhlukaniswa" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso nenkazimulo yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Ukuqonda ivangeli kanye nesiphambano sikaKristu → kusikhulula esonweni. Siyabonga Nkosi Jesu ngothando olungaphezu kolwazi!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

(1) Yini isono?

Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; —1 Johane 3:4

Konke ukungalungi kuyisono, futhi kukhona izono ezingaholeli ekufeni. — 1 Johane 5:17

articles.title: Inkunzi yakhubeka, futhi u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukuze asekele umphongolo wesivumelwano
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 IziKronike 139 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lapho befika esibuyeni saseKetoni (uNagoni ku-2 Samuweli 6:6), u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukuba abambelele emphongolweni ngoba inkabi yayikhubekile.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane " Inkabi yakhubeka futhi u-Usa Yi welula isandla sakhe ukuze abambe uMphongolo wesivumelwano. 》Umkhuleko: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. " Owesifazane oqotho “Thumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yakho silethwa sivela ezulwini, sinikezwe ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kokomoya kwande. UJesu uhlala ekhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi avule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli futhi asenze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya→ Qondani isixwayiso sika-Uza owelula isandla sakhe ukusekela umphongolo wesivumelwano emva kokuba inkabi ikhubeka. .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

1 IziKronike 13:7, 9-11

Bawukhipha umphongolo kaNkulunkulu endlini ka-Abinadaba, bawubeka enqoleni entsha. U-Uza no-Ahiyo baqhuba inqola. … Lapho befika esibuyeni saseKetoni (okuyiNagoni ku-2 Samuweli 6:6), u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukuba abambelele emphongolweni, ngoba izinkabi zazikhubekile. UJehova wamthukuthelela, wamshaya, ngokuba welulela isandla sakhe phezu komphongolo, wafa phambi kukaNkulunkulu. UDavide wakhathazeka, ngokuba uJehova wayembulele u-Uza, waqamba leyo ndawo ngokuthi iPheresi-Uza kuze kube namuhla.

(1) Ama-Israyeli ayenoMthetho KaMose futhi enza ngokuvumelana nemithetho neziqondiso

buza: Inkabi yakhubeka futhi 'yagxuma' → Ingabe kwakungalungile ngo-Uza ukwelula isandla sakhe ukuze abambe uMphongolo Wesivumelwano?
impendulo: “U-Uza” akazange azilalele izimiso zoMthetho KaMose → “wawuthwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu ngezigxobo nasemahlombe” futhi “wajeziswa” → ngenxa yokuthi aniwuthwalanga umphongolo ngaphambi kokubuza kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu ngokwesiko; ngakho Ujezisa (umbhalo wokuqala uwukubulala) thina. “Ngakho abapristi bamaLevi bazingcwelisa ukuba bakhuphule umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, amadodana kaLevi athwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu emahlombe awo ngezinti, njengalokho uJehova eyalile ngesandla sikaMose. Inkomba - 1 IziKronike 15 Isahluko 13-15

buza: Ingabe u-Uza wayengowozalo lukaLevi?
impendulo:" Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu “wabekwa endlini ka-Abinadaba entabeni yaseKiriyati-jeyarimi, lapho wahlala khona iminyaka engamashumi amabili - bheka eyoku-1 Samuweli 7:1-2, futhi kwakuwumsebenzi wamaLevi ukuqapha itabernakele kanye “nezinceku zikaNkulunkulu. izitsha zendlu engcwele" - -Bheka kuNumeri 18, "Uza" indodana ka-Abinadaba, futhi umndeni ka-Abinadaba unomthwalo wemfanelo wokuqapha umphongolo wesivumelwano.

buza: “Umphongolo Wesivumelwano” wabekwa “enqoleni entsha” “nokudonsa izinkabi” futhi u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukuze “abambe” uMphongolo → Yiziphi iziqondiso ezaphulwa?
impendulo: Kodwa izinqola nezinkabi azinikwanga abantwana bakwaKohati, ngokuba babesemsebenzini wendlu engcwele, bethwala izinto ezingcwele emahlombe abo. Bheka kuNumeri isahluko 7 ivesi 9 --- Lapho kufika isikhathi sokusuka, u-Aroni namadodana akhe sebeqedile ukusibekela indawo engcwele nezitsha zayo zonke zithinte izinto ezingcwele, funa Zife. Lezi zinto etabernakele zazizothwalwa amadodana kaKohati. Numeri 4:15→

Qaphela: "Umphongolo Wesivumelwano" umele iNgcwelengcwele kanye nesihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu! Kufanele iphakanyiswe, iphakanyiswe ngezigxobo nasemahlombe → Jeremiya 17:12 Indlu yethu engcwele iyisihlalo sobukhosi senkazimulo, esimiswe phezulu kusukela ekuqaleni. ; Uma "Umphongolo Wesivumelwano" ubekwa enqoleni entsha, abantu bade kunekalishi uma bephakeme kunoNkulunkulu! UNkulunkulu waxwayisa ama-Israyeli neNkosi uDavide “ngokwethusa” kwenkabi “nangokujeziswa” kuka-Uza Ngemva kwesigameko sika-Uza, iNkosi uDavide yathobeka kakhulu → Nami ngizothotshiswa futhi ngithotshiswe emehlweni ami - 2 Samuweli Isahluko 6. Ivesi 22. Ngakho uNkulunkulu wathi, “UDavide uyindoda ethandwa yinhliziyo yami—bheka iZenzo 13 ivesi 22 . Nathi balaleli kufanele sizithobe futhi singabi ngaphezu kwezisebenzi ezithunywe uNkulunkulu!

(2) AbeZizwe banemithetho yabo siqu, okungukuthi, imithetho kanembeza okufanele bayilandele

buza: AmaFilisti abeka “umphongolo wesivumelwano” enqoleni entsha, awubuyisela endaweni yawo yokuqala ngezinkabi? Kunalokho, inhlekelele yabashiya?
impendulo: AmaFilisti “okungukuthi, abeZizwe” abanawo uMthetho kaMose futhi abadingi ukwenza ngokuvumelana nezimiso zoMthetho kaMose; , futhi benze izinto zomthetho ngokwemvelo yabo - bhekisela eRoma Joshuwa 2:14 → Bathi, “Uma nifuna ukuletha u-Israyeli Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu awuyikubuyiswa ungenalutho, kepha uyakunikelwa kuye ukubuyisana, wazi ukuthi kungani isandla sakhe singasukanga kuwe Bamphendula bathi: “Amathumba egolide ayisihlanu namagundwane ayisihlanu egolide, ngokwenani lezikhulu zamaFilisti, ngokuba phakathi kwenu nonke na? Isifo esifanayo sehlele amadoda nezikhulu zenu… ebhokisini, uwubeke eduze komphongolo, bese uthumela umphongolo.

(3) Njengoba umthetho ubuthakathaka enyameni, kukhona izinto ongeke uzenze

Njengoba umthetho wawubuthakathaka ngenxa yenyama, futhi ungenakukwenza utho, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe siqu ifana nenyama enesono ukuba ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ilahla isono enyameni ukuze ukulunga komthetho kugcwaliseke kithi thina ningaphili ngokwenyama, yilabo kuphela abalandela uMoya oNgcwele. KwabaseRoma 8:3-4

Qaphela: Ama-Israyeli ayenoMthetho KaMose, futhi abeZizwe nabo babenemithetho yabo → Kodwa wonke umuntu emhlabeni wonile futhi wasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu ngokwephula umthetho - bheka kwabaseRoma 3:23. Ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama, umuntu akakwazanga ukugcwalisa ukulunga komthetho uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana Yakhe ukuba ibe sesimweni senyama yesono futhi yaba umnikelo wesono enyameni ukuze ukulunga komthetho kungagcwaliseka kithi abangalandeli inyama, kuphela labo abalandela uMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Umusa weNkosi yokuqala uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kuhlale kuni nonke! Amen

2021.09.30

articles.title: UNadabi no-Abihu banikela ngomlilo ongajwayelekile
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuLevitikusi Isahluko 10, amavesi 1-3, futhi sifunde ndawonye: ONadabi no-Abihu, amadodana ka-Aroni, bathatha, kwaba yilowo nalowo umcengezi wakhe, bawugcwalisa ngomlilo, babeka impepho phezu kwawo, banikela phambi kukaJehova umlilo ongesesikweni, uJehova angabayalanga ngawo.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Umlilo Oyinqaba" Khulekani: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Sibonge uJehova ngokuthumela izisebenzi ezibhala ngezandla zazo futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu. Isinkwa silethwa sivela ezulwini futhi sinikezwa ngesikhathi ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya→ Uyakuqonda ukuthi kusho ukuthini ukunikela ngomlilo ongajwayelekile?

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umlilo ojwayelekile, Libizwa ngokuthi fán huǒ, igama lesiShayina elisho izifiso ezingokomzwelo zabantu bezwe.

chaza : Izifiso ezingokomzwelo zabantu bezwe.

Umthombo: Isahluko sokuqala se-Yuan Dynasty Zheng Tingyu's "Nin Zi Ji":"Uma umfundi wakho engayisebenzisi imali ngonya, umlilo ojwayelekile uzovutha esiswini sami. Ngizowufihla emkhonweni wami emoyeni njengenkosi yami, futhi ngizowufihla emkhonweni wami nilingise inyanga ekhanyayo yenkosi yami esihlokweni sodondolo lwakhe.

ULevitikusi 10:1-3 ONadabi no-Abihu, amadodana ka-Aroni, bathatha, kwaba yilowo nalowo umcengezi wakhe womlilo, wawugcwalisa ngomlilo, wafaka impepho phezu kwawo, anikela phambi kukaJehova umlilo ongesesikweni, uJehova angabayalanga ngawo; phuma umlilo ebusweni bukaJehova, ubashise, bafe phambi kukaJehova. Khona-ke uMose wathi ku-Aroni: “Yilokhu uJehova akushilo: ‘Ngiyoba ngcwele phakathi kwalabo abasondela kimi, futhi ngizokhazinyuliswa phambi kwamehlo abo bonke abantu.’” U-Aroni wathula.

Incazelo yeBhayibheli:

buza: Usho ukuthini umlilo ongaziwa?

impendulo: Umlilo oyinqaba ubhekisela emlilweni wasemhlabeni, hhayi umlilo ongcweliswe e-altare letabernakele → ubizwa ngokuthi "umlilo ongaziwa".

buza: Umeleni umlilo ongaziwa?

impendulo: Umlilo oyinqaba ufanekisela izinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama - zenyama, zezwe, ezingcolile, ezinesono, ezingangcwelisiwe → "Nxa wena namadodana akho ningena etendeni lokuhlangana, ningaphuzi wayini nasiphuzo esinamandla, funa nife; kube yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu, ukuba nihlukanise ongcwele kokungcolileyo, nohlambulukileyo kongcolileyo;

Qaphela: Amasonto amaningi namuhla awahlukanisi phakathi kwezinto ezingcwele nezivamile, izinto ezihlanzekile nezingcolile → wonke anikela “okunesici, okufakwe imvubelo nokungcolile ngokwentando yawo, akukho mehluko phakathi kwesivumelwano esidala nesivumelwano esisha, futhi kukhona akukho mahluko phakathi kokuphansi komthetho" Akukho mahluko phakathi komusa nomusa, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi komuntu omdala nomuntu omusha, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi kokuka-Adamu nalokho okukaKristu, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi kwenyama nekamoya, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi kwezoni nabalungile, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama, akukho ukwehlukana phakathi kwabahlanzekile nabahlanzekile Ukuntuleka kokuhlukaniswa → akukona ukunikela "izoni" ezingcwelisiwe kuNkulunkulu → njengoNadabi no-Abihu banikela "ngomlilo ongaziwa" kuNkulunkulu, uJehova engabayala ukuba banikele "Ukujeziswa" okunikezwe uNkulunkulu, uNadabi kanye U-Abihu uyisibonelo → ukulinda ngokwesaba ukwahlulelwa nomlilo oqothulayo oyoqothula zonke izitha. Bheka amaHeberu 10:27, 2 Thesalonika 2:8 kanye nesAmbulo 20. isahluko.

kanjalo" uPaul Ithi → Ngenze isigqila sikaKristu Jesu kwabezizwe, umpristi wevangeli likaNkulunkulu, ukuze umhlatshelo wami kwabezizwe ungcweliswe ngoMoya oNgcwele → "Ubungcwele buyilowo ongenasono" futhi wamukeleke . → Uma " isoni "Ukunikeza → ukunikeza" Umlilo ojwayelekile Njengoba bezinikele kuNkulunkulu, abashumayeli abanjalo “ngoNadabi no-Abihu.” Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseRoma 15:16

articles.title: Iveyili elimboze ubuso bukaMose
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli futhi sifunde eyesi-2 Korinte 3:16 ndawonye: Kodwa lapho nje izinhliziyo zabo ziphendukela eNkosini, iveli liyasuswa.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Iveyili ebusweni bukaMose" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. ngiyabonga"" Owesifazane oqotho "Ithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywe ezandleni zabo → isinika ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini zasendulo, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisa ngaphambili ngaphambi kwaphakade ukuze sisindiswe futhi sikhazimuliswe! ngoMoya oNgcwele kuyembulwa Amen! Qonda isithunzi sikaMose emboze ubuso bakhe ngeveyili .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Eksodusi 34:29-35

Lapho uMose ehla entabeni yaseSinayi ephethe izibhebhe ezimbili zomthetho esandleni sakhe, wayengazi ukuthi ubuso bakhe babukhazimula ngoba uJehova wayekhuluma kuye. U-Aroni nabo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babona ukuthi ubuso bukaMose bukhazimula, besaba ukusondela kuye. UMose wababiza; u-Aroni nezinduna zenhlangano beza kuye, uMose wakhuluma nabo. Khona-ke wonke u-Israyeli wasondela, futhi wabayala wonke amazwi kaJehova ayewakhulume kuye entabeni yaseSinayi. Kwathi uMose eseqedile ukukhuluma nabo, wamboza ubuso bakhe ngeveli. Kepha lapho uMose engena phambi kukaJehova ukukhuluma naye, walisusa iveli, waphuma, wabatshela abantwana bakwa-Israyeli lokho uJehova ayala ngakho. Ama-Israyeli abona ubuso bukaMose bukhazimula. UMose wabuye wamboza ubuso bakhe ngeveli, futhi lapho engena ukukhuluma noJehova, walisusa iveli.

buza: Kungani uMose amboza ubuso bakhe ngeveli?
impendulo: Lapho u-Aroni nabo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bebona ubuso bukaMose obukhazimulayo, besaba ukusondela kuye

buza: Kungani ubuso bukaMose obuhle bakhazimula?
impendulo: Ngoba uNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi uJehova wakhuluma kuye, futhi wenza ubuso bakhe bukhanye → UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi abukho ubumnyama kuye. Leli yilizwi esilizwile eNkosini futhi salibuyisela kini. 1 Johane 1:5

buza: UMose omboze ubuso bakhe ngeveli umelelani?
impendulo: “UMose wamboza ubuso bakhe ngesihenqo” kubonisa ukuthi uMose wayengumphathi womthetho owawulotshwe ezibhebheni zamatshe, hhayi umfanekiso wangempela womthetho. Liphinde lifanekisela ukuthi abantu abanakuthembela kuMose futhi bagcine umthetho kaMose ukuze babone umfanekiso weqiniso futhi babone inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu → Umthetho washunyayelwa ekuqaleni ngoMose; Isikhombo - Johane 1:17. “Umthetho” uyinkosi yokuqeqesha esiholela “emseni naseqinisweni” Kuphela “ngokukholwa” kuJesu Kristu ukuze silungisiswe → singabona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu! Amen—bheka Gal.

buza: Unjani ngempela umthetho?
impendulo: Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ungewona umfanekiso wento, ungephelelise labo abasondelayo ngokunikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo iminyaka ngeminyaka. KumaHeberu Isahluko 10 Ivesi 1 → “Isimo somthetho singuKristu, nomthetho ofinyeziwe nguKristu → Isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu, ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa nguye azuze ukulunga. Inkomba - KwabaseRoma Isahluko 10 Ivesi 4. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

Kwakukhona inkazimulo enkonzweni yokufa eyayilotshwe etsheni, kangangokuthi abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babengenakugqolozela ubuso bukaMose ngenxa yenkazimulo eyayisebusweni bakhe obabuphela kancane kancane, 2 Korinte 3:7 .

(1) Inkonzo yomthetho ebhalwe etsheni → iyinkonzo yokufa

buza: Kungani umthetho ubhalwe etsheni uyinkonzo yokufa?
impendulo: Ngenxa yokuthi uMose wakhipha ama-Israyeli endlini yobugqila eGibhithe, ama-Israyeli adilika ehlane Ngisho naye ngokwakhe akakwazanga “ukungena” eKhanani, izwe laligeleza ubisi noju olwaluthenjiswe uNkulunkulu, ngakho umthetho waqoshwa etsheni. Inkonzo yakhe iyinkonzo yokufa. Uma ungakwazi ukungena eKhanani noma ukungena embusweni weZulu ngokoMthetho kaMose, ungangena kuphela uma uKalebi noJoshuwa bebahola “ngokukholwa”.

(2) Inkonzo yomthetho ebhalwe etsheni → iyinkonzo yokulahlwa

2 Korinte 3:9 Uma inkonzo yokulahlwa inenkazimulo, inkonzo yokulungisiswa inenkazimulo kakhulu.

buza: Kungani inkonzo yomthetho iyinkonzo yokulahla na?
impendulo: Umthetho uhloselwe ukwenza abantu bazi ngezono zabo Uma wazi ukuthi unecala, kufanele uhlawulele izono zakho eTestamenteni Elidala, izinkomo nezimvu zazihlatshwa izikhathi eziningi ukuze kuhlawulelwe izono zakho. umthetho ukhulunywa kwabaphansi komthetho, ukuze kuvinjwe wonke umuntu emhlabeni wonke awele ekwahlulelweni kukaNkulunkulu. Bheka kwabaseRoma 3:19-20 Uma ugcina umthetho kaMose kepha wehluleka, uyakulahlwa nguMose, ngokuba uyaqonda na? Ngakho-ke, inkonzo yomthetho iyinkonzo yokulahlwa. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(3) Inkonzo elotshwe esibhebheni senhliziyo iyinkonzo yokulungisiswa

Umbuzo: Ubani umphathi wenkonzo yokulungisiswa?
Impendulo: Inkonzo yokulungisiswa, “uKristu”, ungumphathi → Abantu kufanele basibheke njengezikhonzi zikaKristu nabaphathi bezimfihlakalo zikaNkulunkulu. Okufunekayo kumphathi ukuthi athembeke. 1 Korinte 4:1-2 Amabandla amaningi namuhla “ cha “Umphathi wezimfihlakalo zikaNkulunkulu, cha Izikhonzi zikaKristu→Bayokwenza umthetho kaMose~ Umphathi wokulahlwa, inkonzo yokufa →Letha abantu esonweni futhi babe izoni, bengakwazi ukuphunyuka etilongweni lesono, behola abantu ngaphansi komthetho nasekufeni, njengalapho uMose ehola abantwana bakwa-Israyeli ebakhipha eGibhithe futhi bawela phansi ehlane ngaphansi komthetho; kamuva ababizwa ngokuthi Abaphathi bokulunga → "Akekho ongakhonza amakhosi amabili abazona izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ezithembekile Bangabaholi abayizimpumputhe ngoba abaziqondi izinto ezingaqondakali zikaNkulunkulu.

(4) Njalo lapho inhliziyo ibuyela eNkosini, iveli lizasuswa

( 2 Korinte 3:12-16 ) Njengoba sinethemba elinjalo, sikhuluma ngesibindi, ngokungafani noMose owamboza iveli ebusweni bakhe ukuze ama-Israyeli angagxili ekupheleni kwaLowo owayezobhujiswa. Kodwa izinhliziyo zabo zazilukhuni, futhi ngisho nanamuhla lapho kufundwa iTestamente Elidala, umgubuzelo awuzange ususwe. Leli veli kuKristu Sekuvele kuqediwe . Nokho kuze kube namuhla, lapho kufundwa incwadi kaMose, umgubuzelo usekhona ezinhliziyweni zabo. Kodwa lapho nje izinhliziyo zabo ziphendukela eNkosini, iveli liyasuswa.

Qaphela: Kungani abantu emhlabeni wonke bemboza ubuso babo ngamaveli namuhla? Akufanele yini uqaphe? Ngenxa yokuthi izinhliziyo zabo zilukhuni futhi azizimisele ukubuyela kuNkulunkulu, bakhohliswa uSathane futhi bazimisele ukuhlala eTestamenteni Elidala, ngaphansi komthetho, ngaphansi kwenkonzo yokulahlwa, futhi bafulathele izindlebe zabo iqiniso bese uphendukela emazwini. Vala ubuso bakho ngeveli → Kubonisa ukuthi ngeke beze Ukubona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu phambi kukaNkulunkulu , abanakho ukudla okungokomoya abangakudla, namanzi aphilayo okuphuza → “Izinsuku ziyeza,” isho iNkosi uJehova, “lapho ngiyothumela khona indlala emhlabeni. bayokoma, kungabi ngenxa yokuswela amanzi, kodwa ngokuba bengayikulilalela izwi likaJehova. —Amose 8:11-12

(5) Ngobuso obuvulekile kuKristu, ungabona inkazimulo yeNkosi

INkosi inguMoya; lapho uMoya weNkosi ekhona, kukhona inkululeko. Thina sonke, ngobuso obuvulekile sibuka inkazimulo yeNkosi njengasesibukweni, siguqulelwa emfanekisweni ofanayo kusukela enkazimulweni kuye enkazimulweni, njengalokhu kungoMoya weNkosi. 2 Korinte 3:17-18

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana nokwabelana nawe kwanamuhla Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, kanye nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.10.15

articles.title: (5) Bheka kuKristu ukuze uthole insindiso;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli ku-Isaya isahluko 45 ivesi 22 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Insindiso nenkazimulo" Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Siyabonga "kuwesifazane oqotho" ngokuthumela abasebenzi bona Izwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni futhi lakhulunywa → lisinikeza ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe esikhathini esidlule, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kwaphakade! Sambulelwa thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso elingokomoya → siqonde ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kokudalwa komhlaba! Kuwukubheka kuKristu ngensindiso; ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Bheka kuKristu ukuze uthole insindiso

U-Isaya Isahluko 45 Ivesi 22 Bhekani kimi nina nonke mikhawulo yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu akakho omunye.

(1) Ama-Israyeli eTestamenteni Elidala abheka enyokeni yethusi ukuze athole insindiso

UJehova wathi kuMose: “Yenza inyoka enesihlungu, uyibeke esigxotsheni; lowo olunywayo uyakubheka inyoka, aphile; ukuphila. Numeri Isahluko 21 Amavesi 8-9

buza: Imelelani “inyoka yethusi”?
impendulo: Inyoka yethusi ifanekisela uKristu owaqalekiswa ngenxa yezono zethu futhi walengiswa emthini yizoni → Walengiswa emthini futhi wathwala izono zethu mathupha, ukuze njengoba safa ngenxa yezono, sife ngokulunga. Ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa. Isithenjwa--1 Petru Isahluko 2 Ivesi 24

(2) Ukubheka kuKristu ngensindiso eTestamenteni Elisha

NgokukaJohane 3:14-15 Njengoba uMose waphakamisa inyoka ehlane, kanjalo iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuphakanyiswa, ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo abe nokuphila okuphakade (noma okuhunyushwa ngokuthi: ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo abe nokuphila okuphakade). → Johane 12 Isahluko 32: Uma ngiphakanyiswa emhlabeni, ngiyodonsela bonke abantu kimi. ” → Johane 8:28 Ngakho-ke uJesu wathi: “Lapho seniyiphakamisile iNdodana yomuntu, niyokwazi ukuthi mina nginguKristu → Ngakho-ke ngithi kini, niyofela ezonweni zenu. Uma ningakholwa ukuthi mina nginguKristu, niyakufela ezonweni zenu. ” Johane 8:24.

buza: Usho ukuthini uKristu?
impendulo: UKristu unguMsindisi kusho → UJesu unguKristu, uMesiya, kanye noMsindisi wezimpilo zethu! UJesu Kristu uyasisindisa: 1 ngaphandle kwesono, 2 Sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo, 3 Baphunyuka emandleni obumnyama kaSathane eHayidesi, 4 ekhululekile ekwahlulelweni nasekufeni; 5 Ukuvuka kukaKristu kwabafileyo kuphinde kwasizala, kusinika isimo sabantwana bakaNkulunkulu nokuphila okuphakade! Amen → Kumelwe sibheke kuKristu futhi sikholwe ukuthi uJesu Kristu unguMsindisi noMsindisi wezimpilo zethu. INkosi uJesu ithi kithi → Ngakho-ke ngithi kini, niyofela ezonweni zenu. Uma ningakholwa ukuthi mina nginguKristu, niyakufela ezonweni zenu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba--1 Petru Isahluko 1 Amavesi 3-5

【2】Hlangana noKristu futhi ukhazinyuliswe

Uma sesihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlangana naye ekuvukeni okufana naye;

(1) Bhaphathizwa kuKristu

buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani noKristu ekufeni kwakhe?
impendulo: “Babhapathizelwa kuKristu” → Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa Kwakhe? Inkomba - KwabaseRoma Isahluko 6 Ivesi 3

buza: Iyini injongo yobhapathizo?
impendulo: 1 ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha → Ngakho sangcwatshwa naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengalokho uKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Isikhombo — Roma 6:4;
2 Sibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze sikhululwe esonweni. ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono; Qaphela: “Ukubhapathizwa” kusho ukuthi sibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu Ingabe uyakuqonda kahle lokhu? Isikhombo — Roma 6:5-7;
3 Gqokani ubuntu obusha, nembathe uKristu → Nenziwe basha engqondweni yenu futhi nembathe umuntu omusha, owadalwa ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nobungcwele. Efesu 4:23-24 → Ngakho-ke nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. Galathiya 3:26-27

(2) Ubunye noKristu ngendlela yokuvuka

buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani Naye ekufaneni nokuvuka?
impendulo: " Idla isidlo seNkosi ” → UJesu wathi, “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, Ngaphandle kokuthi nidle inyama yeNdodana yomuntu futhi niphuze igazi layo, aninakho ukuphila kini. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade, mina ngiyakumvusa ngosuku lokugcina. Isikhombo - Johane 6:53-54 → Engakushumayela kini ngalolo suku ngakwamukela eNkosini uJesu ngobusuku eyakhashelwa ngabo, futhi ngemva kokubonga, yasihlephula yathi: " lokhu kungumzimba wami, ohleshulelwa nina; kwenzeni lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule.” Ngemva kokudla, wathatha nendebe, wathi: “Le ndebe ngeyami. noma nini lapho niphuza isivumelwano esisha esimiswe egazini lakhe “Njalo uma nidla lesi sinkwa noma niphuza lesisitsha, nivuma ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike. Inkomba--1 Korinte 11 amavesi 23-26

(3) Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele iNkosi, Shumayela ivangeli lombuso khazimuliswe

Wayesebizela kuso isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele.”— Marku 8:34

buza: Iyini “inhloso” yokuthwala umuntu isiphambano nokulandela uJesu?
impendulo: dlula Khuluma ngesiphambano sikaKristu, ushumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu

1 "Kholwa" Ngabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu "ophilayo" ngenxa yami → Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilayo kimi; ukuphila engikuphila manje enyameni ngikuphila ngokukholwa eNdodaneni kaNkulunkulu eyangithandayo yazinikela ngenxa yami. Inkomba-- KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 2 Ivesi 20
2 “Ukukholwa” Umzimba wesono uyabhujiswa, futhi thina sikhululiwe esonweni → Ngoba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisaba izigqila. esonweni; ngokuba owafayo ukhululiwe esonweni. KwabaseRoma 6:6-7
3 "Ukholo" luyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo → Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza iNkosi ngokuvumelana nomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi oNgcwele). Spirit) Indlela entsha, hhayi ngokwendlela endala. KwabaseRoma 7:6 → UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, enziwe isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;
4 “Ukukholwa” kulahla ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo – bheka kwabaseKolose 3:9
5 "Ukholo" luyasinda udeveli noSathane → Njengoba abantwana behlanganyela emzimbeni ofanayo wenyama negazi, naye ngokwakhe wathatha inyama negazi elifanayo ukuze ngokufa ambhubhise lowo onamandla okufa, okungukuthi , udeveli, futhi akhulule labo abesaba ukufa ukuphila kwabo konke Umuntu oyisigqila. Hebheru 2:14-15
6 “Ukholo” lusinda emandleni obumnyama neHayidesi → Uyasikhulula emandleni obumnyama futhi asidlulisele embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo;
7 "Ukholo" luphunyukile emhlabeni → ngibanike izwi lakho. Izwe liyabazonda, ngokuba abasibo abezwe, njengalokhu nami ngingesiye owezwe. ... njengalokhu ungithumile emhlabeni, nami ngibathumile emhlabeni. Funda uJohane 17:14, 18
8 " incwadi " Ngafa kanye noKristu futhi “ngiyokholwa” ukuvuswa, ukuzalwa kabusha, ukusindiswa, futhi ngibe nokuphila okuphakade Naye, futhi ngidle ifa lombuso wezulu! Amen . Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:8 neyoku-1 Petru 1:3-5

Yilokhu iNkosi uJesu eyakusho → Yathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli "Ivangeli lombuso wezulu" → Ngoba noma ubani ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe ( → noma ukuhunyushwa: umphefumulo ingxenye 2) Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli uyolahlekelwa yikho. Kunanzuzoni kumuntu uma ezuza izwe lonke kodwa alahlekelwe ukuphila kwakhe na? Yini enye umuntu anganikela ngayo ibe yisihlengo sokuphila kwakhe na? Inkomba--Marku Isahluko 8 Amavesi 35-37 kanye neSahluko 1 Ivesi 15

Ihubo: Wena uyiNkosi yodumo

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana nokwabelana nawe kwanamuhla Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, kanye nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.05.05

articles.title: (4) Qondani indlela yeqiniso futhi nisindiswe;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyoku-1 Thimothewu Isahluko 2 nevesi 4 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ufuna bonke abantu basindiswe futhi baqonde iqiniso.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Insindiso nenkazimulo" Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Sibonge uJehova ngokuthuma izisebenzi ukuba zisinike ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe endulo ngezwi leqiniso elalotshwa lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyizwi uNkulunkulu alimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe phambi kwakho konke. ingunaphakade! Sambulelwa thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso elingokomoya → siqonde ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kokudalwa komhlaba! Kuwukuqonda iqiniso futhi usindiswe; ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】 Qonda indlela yeqiniso futhi usindiswe

1 Thimothewu 2:4 Ufisa ukuba bonke abantu basindiswe futhi bafinyelele olwazini lweqiniso.

(1) Qonda indlela yeqiniso

buza: Iyiphi indlela yeqiniso?
impendulo: “Iqiniso” liyiqiniso, futhi elithi “Tao” nguNkulunkulu → Ekuqaleni kwakukhona uTao, uTao wayenoNkulunkulu, futhi uTao wayenguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Zonke izinto zenziwa ngaye; Inkomba--Johane Isahluko 1 Amavesi 1-3

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. … Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise, embonakalisile. Isikhombo—Johane 1:14, 18. Qaphela: ULizwi waba yinyama → okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu waba yinyama → wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya futhi wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele → [igama elithi uJesu]! Igama likaJesu → lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen! Akekho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa “uJesu” kuphela esesifubeni sikaYise emambulile → okungukuthi, ukwambula uNkulunkulu noYise! →Ngakho iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Uma beningazi mina, niyomazi noBaba. Kusukela manje kuqhubeke niyamazi futhi nimbonile.”— Johane 14:7

(3) Indlela yokuphila

Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, yilokhu esikuzwile, sakubona, sakubona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sakuthinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi simemezela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwabonakala nathi.) Simemezela kini lokho esikubonileyo nesikuzwileyo, ukuze nina basebudlelwaneni nathi. Kuyinhlanganyelo yethu noBaba kanye neNdodana Yakhe, uJesu Kristu. 1 Johane 1:1-3

(4) UJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo

Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu. Uzokhulelwa, ubelethe indodana, futhi ungayiqamba ngokuthi uJesu. OPhezukonke uJehova uyakumenza abe yinkosi phezu kwendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe awuyikuba nasiphelo amandla oPhezukonke ayokusibekela, futhi lowo ozozalwa uyobizwa ngokuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu (Luka 1:30 -35 amafindo).
NgokukaMathewu 16:16 USimoni Petru wamphendula wathi: “Wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo.”

(5) UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ethandekayo ukuba izalwe ngaphansi komthetho ukuze ihlenge labo abangaphansi komthetho ukuze sithole ubudodana.

KwabaseGalathiya 4:4-7 Kepha lapho sekufikile ukuphelela kwesikhathi, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele igama lamadodana. Njengoba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu (imibhalo yokuqala: eyethu), ememeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” futhi njengoba uyindodana, wethembele kuNkulunkulu oyindlalifa yakhe.

(6) Thola uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu nanjengesitifiketi sokungena embusweni wezulu

Kwabase-Efesu 1:13-14 nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe.

(7) Qonda indlela yeqiniso futhi usindiswe

Johane Isahluko 15 Ivesi 3 “Manje senihlambulukile ngenxa yezwi engilikhulume kini,” kwasho iNkosi uJesu.

1 Sekuhlanzekile: Hlanza izindlela Ongcwele, ongenasono →Nakholwa kuye nani, lapho nezwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, nakholwa kuye enabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso →“Njengoba uPawulu esho,” ukuze mina inceku kaKristu Jesu kwabezizwe, babe ngabapristi bevangeli likaNkulunkulu, ukuze imihlatshelo yabezizwe yamukelwe, engcwelisiwe ngoMoya oNgcwele. Isikhombo - Roma 15:16
2 Isivele igeziwe, yangcweliswa futhi yalungisiswa: Babenjalo abanye kini, kodwa senagezwa, senangcweliswa, senalungisiswa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu nangoMoya kaNkulunkulu wethu. Isikhombo - 1 Korinte 6:11

(8) UJesu uyindlela, iqiniso, nokuphila

Johane Isahluko 14 Ivesi 6 UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwangami → Kungo“Kristu” lapho esivulele khona indlela entsha nephilayo. Umgwaqo wawudabula iveyili, okwakuwumzimba wakhe.

【2】Ingcebo yembulwa futhi ikhazinyuliswe lapho ibekwe esitsheni sobumba

(1) Umcebo wembulwa esitsheni sobumba

Sinale ngcebo ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu hhayi kithi. Qaphela:" ingane "leyo umoya weqiniso , ingane leyo IZwi likaNkulunkulu , ingane leyo UJesu Kristu ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? 2 Korinte 4:7

(2) Ukufa kukaJesu kwenza ubuntu bethu obudala busebenze futhi kwenza ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakale ebuntwini bethu obusha

Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi. Ngoba thina esiphilayo sihlala sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emizimbeni yethu efayo. Kulo mbono, ukufa kuyasebenza kithi, kodwa ukuphila kuyasebenza kuwe. 2 Korinte 4:8-12

(3) Umcebo obonakaliswayo usenza sikwazi ukuzuza isisindo esingenakuqhathaniswa senkazimulo yaphakade

Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhidlizwa, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. 2 Korinte 4:16-17

Ihubo: Ukuvuselelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana nokwabelana nawe kwanamuhla Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, kanye nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: (3) Kholwani yivangeli nisindiswe;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Korinte 15, amavesi 3-4, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba lokho enganinika kona, okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Insindiso nenkazimulo" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Sibonge uJehova ngokuthuma izisebenzi ukuba zisinike ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe endulo ngezwi leqiniso elalotshwa lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyizwi uNkulunkulu alimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe phambi kwakho konke. ingunaphakade! Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kokudalwa komhlaba! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Ivangeli lensindiso

*UJesu wathuma uPawulu ukuba ashumayele ivangeli lensindiso kwabezizwe*

buza: Liyini ivangeli lensindiso?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu wathumela umphostoli uPawulu ukuba ashumayele kwabeZizwe “ivangeli lensindiso ngoJesu Kristu” → Manje, bazalwane, ngimemezela kini ivangeli engalishumayeza ngaphambili, enalamukela futhi kulo, enimi kulo, futhi uma anikholwa ngeze, kepha uma nibambelela kulokho enginishumayeza khona, niyakusindiswa ngalelivangeli. Engakudlulisela kini kwaba kanje: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu ngokwemiBhalo - 1 Korinte Book 15 amavesi 1-4

buza: Yini uKristu ayixazulula lapho efela izono zethu?
impendulo: 1 Kusenza sikhululeke esonweni → Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu lusishukumisa; 6:7 → "UKristu" ufele bonke, ngakho bonke bafile → "Lowo ofile ukhululiwe esonweni, futhi bonke bafile" → Bonke bakhululiwe esonweni. Amen! , uyakholwa? Labo abakholwayo abalahlwa, kodwa abangakholwa sebevele balahliwe ngoba bengakholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa "uJesu" ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo → "UKristu" wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa. .bafa bonke, bonke bakhululwa esonweni.
2 Ukhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo-bheka kwabaseRoma 7:6 kanye no-Gal 3:12. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

buza: Futhi wangcwatshwa, yini eyaxazululwa?
impendulo: 3 Khululeka kumuntu omdala nasezindleleni zakhe ezindala - Kolose 3:9

buza : UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu ngokweBhayibheli → Yini eyaxazululwa?
impendulo: 4 "UJesu Kristu wavuswa kwabafileyo" → waxazulula inkinga 'yokusithethelela' → UJesu wanikelwa kubantu ngenxa yezono zethu wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu (noma ukuhumusha: UJesu ungenxa yeziphambeko Zakhe wakhululwa, futhi yena wavuselwa ukulungisiswa kwethu) Inkomba--- KwabaseRoma 4:25

Qaphela: Lona → UJesu Kristu wathumela uPawulu ukuba ashumayele [ivangeli lensindiso] kwabeZizwe → uKristu wafela izono zethu → 1 Ixazulule inkinga yesono, 2 Izinkinga Zomthetho Neziqalekiso Ezixazululiwe; kanye Nokungcwatshwa → 3 Ukuxazulula inkinga yomuntu omdala kanye nokuziphatha kwakhe ovuswe ngosuku lwesithathu→ 4 Ixazulula "izinkinga zokulungisiswa, ukuzalwa kabusha, ukuvuka, insindiso, nokuphila okuphakade kithi." Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba--1 Petru Isahluko 1 Amavesi 3-5

【2】Gqoka umuntu omusha, nikhumule umuntu omdala nizuze udumo

(1) Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu, asisenanyama

KwabaseRoma 8:9 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

buza: Kungani kwenzeka ukuthi lapho uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu, singebona abenyama?
impendulo: Ngokuba "uKristu" wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa → ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu "ukuphila okuvela kuNkulunkulu" kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Kolose 3:3 → Ngakho-ke, uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kithi, sizalwa ngokusha sibe ngumuntu omusha, futhi “umuntu omusha” akayena “owomuntu omdala wenyama” → Ngoba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala. wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono; ukufa, umzimba wokonakala (ukonakala). Njengoba nje uPawulu asho → ngidabuke kakhulu! Ngubani ongangisindisa kulomzimba wokufa na? Siyabonga uNkulunkulu, singaphunyuka ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ngokwalokhu kubuka, ngilalela umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo yami, kodwa inyama yami ilalela umthetho wesono. KwabaseRoma 7:24-25, niyakuqonda kahle lokhu?

(2) Esekhumule ikhehla, ehlangabezana nokukhumula ikhehla

KwabaseKolose 3:9 Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemisebenzi yakhe.

buza: “Ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.” Ingabe akusho ukuthi “nikhumule” lapha? Kungani sisadinga ukuqhubeka nenqubo yokulahla izinto ezindala nokuziphatha?
impendulo: UMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala ezinhliziyweni zethu, futhi asisekho enyameni → Lokhu kusho ukuthi ukholo “luyikhumulile” inyama yomuntu omdala → Ukuphila kwethu “komuntu omusha” kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu; ” isekhona Yidla, uphuze uhambe! IBhayibheli lithi kanjani “ufile” Emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, “indoda endala” yakho ifile → UKristu wafela bonke, futhi bonke bafa → Ngokusobala "umuntu omdala" uyafa uphila "umuntu omusha" ongabonakali kusukela ku-Adamu Umuntu omdala akanayo "impi phakathi komoya nenyama" njengoba uPawulu asho kuphela inyama yokuqala ka-Adamu engakaze ibhekane nokukhumula umuntu omdala → Uma uye walalela amazwi akhe, wathola izimfundiso zakhe , futhi wafunda iqiniso lakhe, Kufanele nikhumule ubuntu benu obudala ekuziphatheni kwenu kwangaphambili, okuba kubi kancane kancane ngenxa yokukhohlisa kwenkanuko Ingabe nikuqonda ngokucacile lokhu? Inkomba - Efesu Isahluko 4 Amavesi 21-22

(3) Ukwembatha umuntu omusha nokubona injongo yokukhumula umuntu omdala ukuze sikhazinyuliswe.

Efesu 4:23-24 nenziwe basha engqondweni yenu, nembathe umuntu omusha, owadalwa ngokomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ekulungeni kweqiniso nasebungcweleni. → Ngakho-ke, asiphelelwa yinhliziyo. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle ubhidlizwa, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Kuvela ukuthi kasikhathali ngokubonwayo, kodwa okungabonwayo; 2 Korinte 4:16-18

Ihubo: INkosi ingamandla ami

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana nokwabelana nawe kwanamuhla Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, kanye nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.05.03

articles.title: (2) Kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi ubhapathizwe kuKristu futhi wembathe uKristu ukuze akhazinyuliswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMarku isahluko 16 ivesi 16 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa; Roma 6:3 Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe na?

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Insindiso nenkazimulo" Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Sibonge uJehova ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywa ezandleni zabo → esinika ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini zasendulo, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kwezikhathi zonke. ! NgoMoya oNgcwele Sembuliwe kithi Amen! Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kokudalwa komhlaba! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa

NgokukaMarku 16:16 Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa;

buza: Okholwayo futhi abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa → Yini okholelwa ukuba basindiswe?
impendulo: Kholwa evangelini futhi usindiswe! → Wathi: "Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, futhi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele. Phendukani futhi nikholwe ivangeli!"

buza: Liyini ivangeli?
impendulo: Ivangeli uNkulunkulu wathumela umphostoli uPawulu ukuba ashumayele "ivangeli lensindiso" kwabeZizwe → Engakwamukela futhi washumayela kini: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu futhi wembelwa ngokuvumelana neBhayibheli futhi ngokweBhayibheli He wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu. Inkomba--1 Korinte 15 amavesi 3-4.

Qaphela: Uma nje ukholwa lelivangeli, uzosindiswa. Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

buza: bhapathizwa ngokukholwa→lokhu” abhapathizwe “Ingabe ubhapathizo lukaMoya oNgcwele na? Geza ngamanzi
impendulo: Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa → Lokhu " abhapathizwe "yebo ubhapathizo lomoya ongcwele ngoba nje" Wabhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele "Ukuze uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, futhi usindiswe! Amen. Njengoba uJohane uMbhapathizi asho → Nginibhapathiza ngamanzi, kodwa yena uyonibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele Marku 1:8 → IzEnzo 11:16 ivesi, ngakhumbula amazwi eNkosi: "UJohane wabhapathiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina nizobhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele." ’; futhi “ukubhapathizwa emanzini” kumelwe kufakwe ekufeni kukaKristu. Geza ngamanzi Akunandaba nokususa ukungcola kwenyama - bheka eyoku-1 Petru 4:21. abhabhathizwe emanzini ” akuwona umbandela wensindiso, Kuphela " Wabhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele " Kulapho kuphela lapho ungazalwa kabusha futhi usindiswe .

buza: Ungawamukela kanjani umbhapathizo kaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Kholwa yivangeli, uqonde iqiniso, futhi ubekwe uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe → Nakholwa kuye nani, lapho nezwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, nakholwa kuye, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. Isikhombo - Efesu 1:13-14. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

【2】Bhaphathizelwa kuKristu, nembathe uKristu, namukele inkazimulo

Roma 6:5 Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe;

(1) Uma sihlanganiswa naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe

buza: Sihlanganiswa kanjani noKristu ngokufana nokufa kwakhe?
impendulo:" Bhaphathizwa kuKristu ngamanzi! Lokhu kungukuhlangana Naye esimweni sokufa → Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu sabhapathizelwa ekufeni Kwakhe? - KwabaseRoma 6:3

buza: Kungani “ubhapathizo lwamanzi” luwuhlobo lokufa nobunye noKristu?
impendulo: Ngoba uKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu. imizimba yalengiswa emthini, futhi uNkulunkulu wenza abangenasono ukuba "bathathe indawo" yezono zethu ngokulengiswa emthini → UNkulunkulu wenza abangenasono ukuba babe yizono ngenxa yethu, ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye. Isikhombo—2 Korinte 5:21
Ngakho “ukubhapathizwa ngamanzi” ekufeni kukaKristu → ukuhlanganisa imizimba yethu ebunjiwe ngobhapathizo nomzimba kaKristu obunjiwe olenga esihlahleni → lokhu “ukuhlanganiswa naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe”. Uma “ubhapathizwa emanzini” usuke umemezela futhi ufakaza emhlabeni ukuthi wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu! "Ijoka" lokubethelwa noKristu lilula, futhi "umthwalo" ulula → lona umusa kaNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Kungakho iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngokuba ijoka lami lilula, nomthwalo wami ulula.”—Mathewu 11:30

(2) Bahlanganiswe laye ekufaneni lokuvuka kwakhe

buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani noKristu ekufaneni kokuvuka kwakhe?
impendulo: “Ukudla nokuphuza inyama negazi leNkosi” kuwukuba munye noKristu ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe → UJesu wathi, “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama, niphuze igazi Ndodana yomuntu aninakho ukuphila kinina; kimi, nami kuye. - Johane 6:53-56.

(3) Yidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa

Engangishumayeza ngakho yikho engakwamukela eNkosini Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa ngenxa yami. (Imiqulu Yasendulo: Ephukile), kwenzeni lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule ningikhumbula.” Njalo nxa nidla lesi sinkwa, niphuza lesisitsha, nimemezela ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike. 1 Korinte 11:23-26

【 3】Gqoka uKristu futhi wamukele inkazimulo

Ngakho-ke nina nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. Galathiya 3:26-27

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukwembatha uKristu?
impendulo: "Gqoka uKristu" → "Ukugqoka" kusho ukugoqa noma ukumboza, "ukugqoka" kusho ukugqoka, ukugqoka → Lapho sembatha umoya, umphefumulo nomzimba "womuntu omusha" kaKristu, sembathiswa uKristu ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? →Gqokani njalo iNkosi uJesu Kristu futhi ningalungiseleli inyama ukuba izinkanuko zayo. Inkomba - Roma 13:14 . Qaphela: UNkulunkulu ungukukhanya, futhi kuye abukho nhlobo ubumnyama - 1 Johane 1:5 → UJesu waphinda wathi kubo bonke abantu: "Mina ngiwukukhanya kwezwe. Ongilandelayo akasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa uyoba ukukhanya kokuphila.”— Johane 8:12. Ngakho-ke, kuphela lapho sembatha umuntu omusha futhi sembathe uKristu lapho singakhanya khona, sibe nenkazimulo, futhi sikhazimulise uNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ihubo: Ngilapha

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana nokwabelana nawe kwanamuhla Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, kanye nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.05.02

articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma Isahluko 1 nevesi 17 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.”

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Insindiso nenkazimulo" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Sibonge uJehova ngokuthuma izisebenzi ukuba zisinike ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe endulo ngezwi leqiniso elalotshwa lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyizwi uNkulunkulu alimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe phambi kwakho konke. ingunaphakade! Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qondani ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe futhi sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Isandulelo: Ivangeli lensindiso lithi "" Ngokusekelwe okholweni ", ivangeli lenkazimulo namanje" incwadi ” → ukuze incwadi . Amen! Insindiso iyisisekelo, futhi ukukhazinyuliswa kusekelwe ensindisweni.

Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kuye wonke okholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

【1】Ivangeli lensindiso lingokukholwa

buza: Ivangeli lensindiso lisekelwe okholweni. Iliphi ivangeli umuntu akholelwa kulo ukuze asindiswe?
impendulo: Ukukholelwa kulowo uNkulunkulu amthumileyo kuwumsebenzi kaNkulunkulu → Johane 6:28-29 Bambuza, “Yini okufanele siyenze ukuze sibhekwe njengabenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu na?” ngoNkulunkulu yilokhu nje ukwenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu.”

buza: Ubani okholwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uthumile?
impendulo: "UMsindisi uJesu Kristu" ngoba uyosindisa abantu Bakhe ezonweni zabo → Mathewu 1:20-21
Esacabanga kanjalo, kwabonakala kuye ingelosi yeNkosi ephusheni, ithi: “Josefa, ndodana kaDavide, ungesabi, thatha uMariya umkakho, ngokuba lokho akukhulelweyo kungoMoya oNgcwele. . "Uyozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba uyosindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo."

buza: Imuphi umsebenzi uMsindisi uJesu Kristu asenzele wona?
impendulo: UJesu Kristu "usenzele umsebenzi omkhulu" → "ivangeli lensindiso yethu", futhi siyosindiswa ngokukholelwa kuleli vangeli →
Manje ngiyanitshela, bazalwane, ivangeli engalishumayeza nina, enalamukela futhi enimi kulo; Engakunikeza futhi kini kwakuyilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo. Amen! Amen, ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kweyoku-1 Korinte isahluko 15 amavesi 1-3.

Qaphela: Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu, futhi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwambulwa kulelivangeli.Lokhu kulunga kusekelwe ekukholweni wensindiso kwabangaphandle→ Okokuqala, uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokweBhayibheli. 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 ukhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo" futhi wembelwa " 3 “Esesukile kumuntu omdala nezindlela zakhe” futhi ngokusho kweBhayibheli, wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu “ 4 Ukuze silungisiswe, sizalwe ngokusha, sivuswe, sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade.” → Uma ukholwa, uzosindiswa ngokukholwa kulelivangeli! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

【2】Ivangeli lenkazimulo liholela ekukholweni

buza: Ivangeli lenkazimulo yilowo okholwayo → Iliphi ivangeli alikholelwayo ukuba likhazinyuliswe?
impendulo: 1 Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu okusindisa wonke umuntu okholwa kulo Insindiso evangelini isekelwe ekukholweni isintu. Uma ukholwa, uzosindiswa ngokukholwa kulelivangeli;
2 Ivangeli lenkazimulo namanje "ukholo" → ukuze ukholo lukhazinyuliswe . Ngakho yiliphi ivangeli ongakholwa kulo ukuze uthole inkazimulo? → Ukukholelwa kuJesu kudinga labo abathunywe uBaba kwe" Umduduzi ",leyo" umoya weqiniso ", ukwenza kithi" vuselela "umsebenzi, ukuze sikhazinyuliswe → "Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami. Futhi ngiyakucela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma uMduduzi; ofanayo ngezansi), ukuze abe nani phakade, lowo Izwe elingenakumamukela. uMoya weqiniso, ngokuba awumboni, awumazi, kepha nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhlezi kini, uyakuba kini.

buza: Hlobo luni lomsebenzi wokuvuselela owenziwa “uMoya oNgcwele” ngaphakathi kwethu?
impendulo: UNkulunkulu ngobhapathizo lokuphindukuzalwa kanye nomsebenzi wokuvuselela kaMoya oNgcwele → Insindiso kaJesu Kristu nothando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba makuthululwe ngokucebile kithi nasezinhliziyweni zethu →Wasisindisa, kungengamisebenzi yokulunga esayenzayo thina, kepha ngokomusa wakhe ngesigezo sokuzalwa kutsha nangokwenziwa sibe basha ngoMoya oNgcwele. UMoya oNgcwele yilokho uNkulunkulu akuthululela phezu kwethu ngokucebile ngoJesu Kristu, uMsindisi wethu, ukuze silungisiswe ngomusa wakhe futhi sibe izindlalifa ngethemba lokuphila okuphakade (noma okuhunyushwa ngokuthi: ifa lokuphila okuphakade ngethemba). KuThithu 3:5-7 → Ithemba alisihlazi, ngokuba uthando lukaNkulunkulu lutheliwe ezinhliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oNgcwele esimuphiweyo. Isithenjwa - Roma 5:5.

Qaphela: UMoya oNgcwele esiwuphiwe uthela uthando lukaNkulunkulu ezinhliziyweni zethu, futhi uthando lukaNkulunkulu luphakathi kwethu sobala Kakade ngenxa kaKristu" njenge “Sesiwugcwalisile umthetho, “sikholwa” ukuthi uKristu uwugcwalisile umthetho, okungukuthi, siwugcwalisile umthetho, ngokuba uKristu ukithi. sobala , sihlala kuKristu, Kulapho kuphela lapho singakhazinyuliswa khona . Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ukwabelana okulotshiweyo kweVangeli, kugqugquzelwe uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMfowethu Wang*Yun, isisebenzi sikaJesu Kristu , uDade uLiu, uDade uZheng, uMfowethu Cen - nabanye asebenza nabo, basekela futhi basebenza ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Bashumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa!

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen
