articles.title: “Ukumiselwa ngaphambili 3” UNkulunkulu usimisele ngaphambili ukuba sikhazinyuliswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Korinte 2 Isahluko 7 Lokhu esikhuluma ngakho kuwukuhlakanipha okufihliwe kukaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu akumisela ngaphambili ngaphambi kwezikhathi ngenjongo yodumo lwethu.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Beka" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Sibonge iNkosi ngokuthumela izisebenzi ukuze zisinike ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini ezidlule, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sibe nenkazimulo ngaphambi kwezikhathi, ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo futhi “elikhulunywayo” →
Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasivumela ukuba sazi imfihlakalo yentando Yakhe ngokwenjongo Yakhe enhle → UNkulunkulu usimisele kusengaphambili ukuba sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kwalo lonke iphakade!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

[1] Hlanganani Naye ekufaneni kokufa, nihlanganiswe Naye ekuvukeni Kwakhe.

Roma 6:5 Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe;

(1) Uma sihlanganiswa naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe

buza: Ungahlanganiswa kanjani noKristu ekufeni kwakhe?
impendulo: “Babhapathizelwa ekufeni Kwakhe” → Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu, sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa Kwakhe? Inkomba - KwabaseRoma Isahluko 6 Ivesi 3

buza: Iyini injongo yobhapathizo?

impendulo: "Ukwembatha uKristu" kusenza sihambe ekuphileni okusha → Ngakho-ke, nonke ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu Jesu. Nina nonke enabhapathizwa kuKristu nembathe uKristu. Isikhombo - Galathiya 3:26-27 → Ngakho sangcwatshwa naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wazalwa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise Okufanayo nokuvuka. KwabaseRoma 3:4

(2) Hlanganyeni Naye ekuvukeni Kwakhe

buza: Bahlanganiswe kanjani ekufanekisweni kokuvuka kukaKristu?
impendulo: "Yidlani niphuze iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa" → UJesu wathi: "Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi nidle inyama yeNdodana yomuntu futhi niphuze igazi leNdodana yomuntu, aninakuphila kini. odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, umuntu unokuphila okuphakade; inkomba—Johane 6:53-56 neyoku-1 Korinte 11:23-26

【2】Thatha isiphambano sakho ulandele uJesu

NgokukaMarku 8:34-35 Wayesebizela kubo isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe. (noma ukuhunyushwa: umphefumulo; okufanayo ngezansi) uyolahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe; kodwa noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nevangeli uyokusindisa.

(1) Loba ngubani olahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami langenxa yevangeli uzayisindisa.

buza: Iyini “inhloso” yokuthwala umuntu isiphambano nokulandela uJesu?
impendulo: "Inhloso" iwukulahlekelwa ukuphila "okudala" ukusindisa ukuphila "okusha" → Lowo owazisa ukuphila kwakhe uyolahlekelwa yikho; noma ubani ozonda ukuphila kwakhe "okudala" kulomhlaba kufanele akugcine "kuNkulunkulu" umuntu" uphilela ukuphila okuphakade. Isikhombo - Johane 12:25

(2) Gqoka umuntu omusha kanye nesipiliyoni sokukhumula umuntu omdala

buza: Gqoka umuntu omusha; Inhloso "Kwenzenjani?"
impendulo: " Inhloso "leyo" Omusha "Vuselela kancane kancane futhi ukhule;" Indoda endala "Ehamba, ekhumula ukuwohloka → umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini, abe-mfanekiso woMdali wakhe. Inkomba - Kolose 3:10 → Nikhumule umuntu omdala ngendlela enake naziphatha ngayo, leli khehla Abantu baya babi kancane kancane. ngenxa yenkohliso yezifiso zobugovu bhekisela ku- Efesu 4:22

buza: Ngabe "sesivele" silahle ikhehla? Kungani kusamele ulahle ikhehla? → Kolose 3:9 Ningaqambelani amanga, ngoba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo.
impendulo: Sikholelwa ekubethelweni, ukufa, ukungcwatshwa nokuvuswa kanye noKristu → " Ukholo uselichithile ikhehla ", abantu bethu abadala basekhona futhi basabonakala → Vele uyikhumule futhi "uzizwe uyikhumula" →Ingcebo ebekwe esitsheni sobumba iyokwambulwa, futhi “umuntu omusha” uyokwambulwa kancane kancane futhi akhule ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuze agcwale isimo sikaKristu; zihambe, zonakaliswe (inkohlakalo), zibuyele othulini, futhi zibuyele eziyize→ Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba “umuntu omdala” ebhubha ngaphandle, “umuntu omusha kuKristu” wenziwa musha usuku nosuku ngaphakathi. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba--2 Korinte 4 amavesi 16-17

【3】Shumayela ivangeli lombuso wezulu emhlane wakho

(1) Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, njalo lizakhazinyuliswa kanye laye

KwabaseRoma 8:17 Futhi uma bengabantwana, futhi izindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu, izindlalifa kanye noKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye.
KwabaseFilipi 1:29 Ngokuba niphiwe nina, kungesikho ukukholwa kuKristu kuphela, kodwa nokuhlushwa ngenxa yakhe.

(2) Isifiso sokuhlupheka

1 Petru 4:1-2 Njengoba uKristu wahlupheka enyameni, Kufanele futhi usebenzise lolu hlobo lwesifiso sokuvelela njengesikhali , ngoba lowo ohlupheke enyameni uyekile esonweni. Ngenhliziyo enjalo, kusukela manje ungaphila isikhathi sakho esisele kulo mhlaba hhayi ngokwezifiso zomuntu kodwa kuphela ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu.
1 Petru 5:10 Emva kokuba senihluphekile isikhashana, uNkulunkulu womusa wonke owanibizela enkazimulweni yakhe yaphakade kuKristu, yena uyakuniphelelisa, aniqinise, aniqinise.

(3) UNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sikhazinyuliswe

Siyazi ukuthi konke kusebenzelana kube ngokuhle kwabamthandayo uNkulunkulu, kulabo ababiziweyo ngokwecebo lakhe. labo abazi ngaphambili Wazimisela kusengaphambili ukulingiswa iNdodana yakhe~ " Thatha isiphambano sakho, ulandele uJesu, futhi ushumayele ivangeli lombuso wezulu ” futhi wenza indodana yakhe izibulo phakathi kwabafowabo abaningi. kunqunywe kusengaphambili nabaphansi wababiza; Labo abalungisisileyo ubakhazimulisile futhi . Isikhombo - Roma 8:28-30

Lomusa siphiwe ngokuchichimayo nguNkulunkulu kukho konke ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda; ngokwentando yakhe , ukuze sazi imfihlakalo yentando yakhe, ukuze kuthi ekugcwaleni kwesikhathi konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni kuhlanganiswe kuKristu. Kuye futhi sinefa, owenza zonke izinto ngokwentando yentando yakhe. emiswe ngokwentando yakhe . Inkomba-Efesu 1:8-11→ Lokhu esikhuluma ngakho yilokho okwakufihliwe endulo , ukuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu okuyimfihlakalo, uNkulunkulu akumisela ngaphambili kube yinkazimulo yethu ngaphambi kwaphakade. . Amen! Isikhombo - 1 Korinte 2:7

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: “Ukumiselwa kusengaphambili 2” UNkulunkulu usimisele ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngoJesu Kristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Thesalonika isahluko 5 ivesi 9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu akasimiselanga ulaka, kodwa ukusindiswa ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Beka" Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Siyabonga uJehova ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo → ukuze zisinikeze ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini ezidlule, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sibe nenkazimulo ngaphambi kwazo zonke izinkathi!

Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasivumela ukuba sazi imfihlakalo yentando Yakhe ngokwenjongo Yakhe enhle ayinqunyelwe kusengaphambili → UNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Bonke ababemiselwe ukuphila okuphakade bakholwa

IzEnzo 13:48 Kwathi abezizwe bekuzwa, bathokoza, balidumisa izwi likaNkulunkulu;
Umbuzo: Wonke umuntu omiselwe ukuphila okuphakade ukholiwe kanjani ukuze athole ukuphila okuphakade?
Impendulo: Kholwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu! Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Kholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo

Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu. Uzokhulelwa, ubelethe indodana, futhi ungayiqamba ngokuthi uJesu. OPhezukonke uJehova uyakumenza abe yinkosi phezu kwendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe awuyikuba nasiphelo amandla oPhezukonke ayokusibekela, futhi lowo ozozalwa uyoba ngcwele, futhi uyobizwa ngokuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu Luka 1:30- Ivesi 35 → UJesu wathi: “Nina-ke nithi ngingubani? USimoni Petru wamphendula wathi: "Wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo." ” Mathewu 16:15-16

(2) Kholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiZwi elisenyameni

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. …ULizwi waba yinyama (okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu waba yinyama, wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya, wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu!”—Bheka uMathewu 1:21, 21, futhi wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. . sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. … Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise, embonakalisile. Johane 1:1, 14, 18

(3) Kholwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengomhlatshelo wenhlawulo

KwabaseRoma 3:25 UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu abe yinhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokukholwa, ukuze abonakalise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ekubekezeleni kwakhe wathethelela izono zabantu ababezenzile ngaphambili, 1 Johane Isahluko 4 Ivesi 10 Akukhona ukuthi siyamthanda uNkulunkulu, kodwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi wathumela iNdodana yakhe ukuba ibe yinhlawulo ngezono zethu , lolu uthando → “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade … okholwayo eNdodaneni unokuphila okuphakade; iNdodana ngeke ibe nokuphila okuphakade ( (umbhalo wokuqala: ngeke ikubone ukuphila okuphakade), nolaka lukaNkulunkulu luhlezi phezu kwayo.” Johane 3:16,36.

【2】UNkulunkulu usimisele kusengaphambili ukuba samukele ubudodana

(1) Ukuhlenga abangaphansi komthetho ukuze sithole ubudodana

Kodwa lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Njengoba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu (imibhalo yokuqala: eyethu), ememeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” futhi njengoba uyindodana, wethembele kuNkulunkulu oyindlalifa yakhe. Galathiya 4:4-7 .

buza: Kukhona yini ngaphansi komthetho? unkulunkulu Ubundodana?
impendulo: Cha. Kungani? →Ngokuba amandla esono angumthetho, nabaphansi komthetho bayizigqila, isigqila asiyona indodana, ngakho ayinabo ubudodana. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:56

(2) UNkulunkulu usimisele ngaphambili ukuba samukele ubuntwana ngoJesu Kristu

Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Usibusisile ngezibusiso zonke zomoya ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu: njengalokho uNkulunkulu wasikhetha kuye ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe, ukuze sibe ngcwele, singabi nacala phambi kwakhe, ngenxa yothando lwakhe ngathi, wasikhetha kuye, wasimisela ngaphambili ekuthathweni kwamadodana ngoJesu Kristu ngokwentando yakhe, Efesu 1:3-5

【3】UNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngeNkosi uJesu Kristu

(1) Kholwa evangelini lensindiso

Umphostoli uPawulu wathi → “Ivangeli” engalishumayela kini futhi: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokwemiBhalo → (1 ukuze asikhulule esonweni; 2 ukuze asikhulule emthethweni nasemthethweni Isiqalekiso ) - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7, 7:6 kanye no-Gal 3:13, futhi wangcwatshwa (3 wahlukaniswa nomuntu omdala nezindlela zakhe zakudala) - bheka kwabaseKolose 3:9; avuswe ngosuku lwesithathu (4 ukuze silungisiswe, sizalwe ngokusha, sisindiswe, futhi sibe nokuphila okuphakade! Amen) - bheka kwabaseRoma isahluko 4 ivesi 25, 1 Petru isahluko 1 amavesi 3-4 kanye 1 Korinte 15 isahluko 3- 4 Umkhosi

(2) UNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sisindiswe ngeNkosi uJesu Kristu

1 KwabaseThesalonika 5:9 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu akasimiselanga ulaka, kepha usimisele ukusindiswa ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.
Kwabase-Efesu 2:8 Ngomusa nisindisiwe ngokukholwa; nalokhu akuveli kini, kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu;

articles.title: “Ukumiselwa Ngaphambili 1” Ukumiselwa KukaNkulunkulu Ngaphambili
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyabase-Efesu 1:8-10 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Lomusa siphiwe ngokuchichimayo nguNkulunkulu kukho konke ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda konke kungokwentando yakhe, ayimisele ngaphambili ukuba asazise imfihlakalo yentando yakhe, ukuze asenze ekugcwaleni kwesikhathi; izinto zasezulwini ngokohlelo Lwakhe, konke okusemhlabeni kubumbene kuKristu. Amen

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Beka" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Siyabonga eNkosini ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elalotshwa futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla Zakhe → ukuze asinikeze ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini zasendulo, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela ngaphambili ukuba sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kwezikhathi. .
Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasivumela ukuba sazi imfihlakalo yentando Yakhe ngokwenjongo Yakhe enhle ayimisela ngaphambili.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Ukubhuka

1 buza: Kuyini ukubhukha?
impendulo: Yazi kusengaphambili, nquma kusengaphambili!

2 buza: Kuyini ukwazi kusengaphambili?
impendulo: Izinto azizange zenzeke, yazi kusenesikhathi! →Mathewu 24:25 Bhekani, nginitshelile ngaphambili.

3 buza: Siyini isiprofetho?
impendulo: Yazi kusenesikhathi ngaphambi kokuthi kwenzeke, khuluma kusenesikhathi!

4 buza: Siyini isibikezelo?
impendulo: Yazi kusengaphambili futhi ukubike! "Njengesimo sezulu"

5 buza: Luyini uhlobo?
impendulo: Ukwazi kusengaphambili, ukwenza izinto zibonakale, ukuzembula!

6 buza: Kuyini ukuvimbela?
impendulo: Yazi kusengaphambili, thatha izinyathelo zokuphepha kusengaphambili

7 buza: Siyini isibikezelo?
impendulo: Isibikezelo, isibikezelo, isibikezelo, isibonakaliso esivela ngaphambi kokuthi kwenzeke okuthile! →Mathewu Isahluko 24 Ivesi 3 Kwathi uJesu ehlezi eNtabeni Yeminqumo, abafundi bakhe bathi ngasese: “Sitshele ukuthi lezi zinto ziyokwenzeka nini na?

【2】Ukumiselwa KukaNkulunkulu Kungaphambili

(1) UNkulunkulu wanquma kusengaphambili u-Adamu ukuba asindiswe

UJehova uNkulunkulu wenzela u-Adamu nomkakhe iziphuku zesikhumba, wabembathisa. Genesise 3:21 →---U-Adamu uwumfanekiso womuntu ozayo. KwabaseRoma Isahluko 5 Ivesi 14 → Kubhaliwe futhi eBhayibhelini: “Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa waba yinyama)”; 1 Korinte 15:45

buza: Zimelelani “izingubo zezikhumba” abazozigqoka?
impendulo: Izingubo ezenziwe ngesikhumba sesilwane esihlatshiwe "iwundlu" zafakwa phezu kwazo → zifanekisela uKristu njengewundlu elabulawa "u-Adamu", okungukuthi, izono zethu wafa esiphambanweni, wangcwatshwa, futhi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → uKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo futhi wazalwa kabusha ukuze embathe ubuntu obusha, embathe uKristu. Okusho ukuthi, u-Adamu wangaphambili wayengu " Isithunzi, isithunzi ", uvukile kwabafileyo" UKristu "Kunjalo Ukufana kweqiniso kuka-Adamu → "" UKristu "Kunjalo u-adam wangempela ,ngakho kuthiwa " u-adam wokugcina "INdodana kaNkulunkulu - bhekisa ohlwini lozalo lukaJesu kuLuka 3:38, Nathi singo-Adamu wokugcina , ngoba singamalungu omzimba kaKristu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Umshado ka-Isaka noRebheka wawunqunyelwe kusengaphambili uNkulunkulu

Uma ethi: "Phuza, ngizakhelela amakamela akho amanzi, abe ngumfazi uJehova ammiseleyo indodana yenkosi yami." ’ Ngingakaqedi ukukhuluma okwakusenhliziyweni yami, uRebheka waphuma ethwele igabha lamanzi ehlombe, wehlela emthonjeni ukuyokha amanzi. Ngathi kuye: ‘Ngicela ungiphe amanzi. ’ Ngokushesha walithatha ibhodlela ehlombe wathi, ‘Ngicela uphuze! ngiyakuphuzisa namakamela akho; ’ Ngakho ngaphuza; futhi waphuzisa amakamela ami. Genesise 24:44-46

(3) Ukubusa kukaDavide njengenkosi kwanqunywa kusengaphambili uNkulunkulu

UJehova wathi kuSamuweli: “Kuyoze kube nini ulilela uSawule, njengoba mina ngimalile ukuba angabi yinkosi kwa-Israyeli? Gcwalisa uphondo lwakho ngamafutha okugcoba, futhi ngizokuthuma kuJese waseBhetlehema, ngoba ngiphakathi kwabantu bakhe. umisile inkosi phakathi kwamadodana akhe.” 1 Samuweli 16:1 .

(4) Ukuzalwa kukaKristu kwanqunywa ngaphambili nguNkulunkulu

INkosi futhi izothumela uKristu (uJesu) owayemiselwe ukuthi eze. Izulu liyomgcina kuze kube-sekubuyiselweni kwakho konke uNkulunkulu akukhuluma ngomlomo wabaprofethi bakhe abangcwele selokhu kwasekelwa izwe. IzEnzo 3:20-21

(5) Ukuhlupheka kukaKristu ngenxa yezono zethu kwanqunywa ngaphambili nguNkulunkulu

Nakuba iNdodana yomuntu izokufa njengoba kumiselwe, maye kulabo abayikhaphela iNdodana yomuntu! NgokukaLuka 22:22 → Yathwala izono zethu emzimbeni wayo emthini, ukuze kuthi, sesifile ezonweni, siphilele ukulunga, ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa; nani ngaphambili naninjengemvu elahlekile, kepha manje senibuyele kuMalusi noMbonisi wemiphefumulo yenu 1 Petru 2:24-25.

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli ukusesha - Nkosi ibandla likaJesu Krestu -Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Baningi ababiziweyo, kepha bayingcosana abakhethiweyo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMathewu Isahluko 22 Ivesi 14 Ngokuba baningi ababiziweyo, kepha bayingcosana abakhethiweyo.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Baningi ababiziweyo, kepha bayingcosana abakhethiweyo" Khulekani: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga uJehova ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo → ukuze zisinikeze ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini ezidlule, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sibe nenkazimulo ngaphambi kwazo zonke izinkathi! Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qondani ukuthi baningi ababiziweyo, kodwa bayingcosana abakhethiweyo .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Baningi ababiziwe

(1) Umfanekiso Wedili Lomshado

UJesu wakhuluma nabo ngemifanekiso, wathi: “Umbuso wezulu ufana nenkosi eyalungisela indodana yayo idili lomshado, Mathewu 22:1-2

buza: Lifanekiselani idili lomshado wenkosi lendodana yayo?
impendulo: Isidlo somshado kaKristu iWundlu→ Masijabule futhi simdumise. Ngoba umshado weWundlu usufikile, nomakoti usezilungisile, futhi uphiwe umusa wakhe ukuba agqoke ilineni elicolekileyo, elikhanyayo nelimhlophe. (Ilineni elicolekileyo lingukulunga kwabangcwele.) Ingelosi yathi kimi: “Loba: Babusisiwe abamenyelwe esidlweni somshado weWundlu.” Yathi kimi: “Leli liyiqiniso likaNkulunkulu ” IsAmbulo 19:7-9
Ngakho wathuma izinceku zakhe ukuba zibize abamenyiweyo edilini, kodwa bala ukuza. Mathewu 22:3

buza: Thumela inceku u-Efa. Ingubani le “nceku”?
impendulo: UJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu → Inceku yami iyohamba ngokuhlakanipha futhi iyophakanyiswa futhi ibe phezulu kunawo wonke. U-Isaya 52:13 “Bheka, inceku yami engiyikhethileyo, othandiweyo wami, ngiyakubeka uMoya wami phezu kwakhe;
Inkosi yasithuma ezinye izinceku, yathi: "Tshelani ababiziweyo ukuthi selilungisiwe idili lami; izinkabi nemfuyo ekhuluphalisiweyo sekuhlatshiwe, konke sekulungile; ngicela nize edilini." ’—Mathewu 22:4

buza: Yayingubani “enye inceku” inkosi eyayithunywe?
impendulo: Abaprofethi abathunywe nguNkulunkulu eTestamenteni Elidala, abaphostoli abathunywe nguJesu, amaKristu, nezingelosi, njll.

1 Ababiziweyo

Labo bantu bamshaya indiva bahamba omunye waya ensimini yakhe Mathewu 22:5 → Lona “umfanekiso womhlwanyeli” owakhulunywa nguJesu → kuminyene; Abahlwanyelwe emeveni yilabo abalizwayo izwi, kepha kamuva izinkathazo zezwe nokukhohlisa kwemali kwaliminyanisa izwi, futhi lalingakwazi ukuthela isithelo → okungukuthi, alikwazanga ukuthela "isithelo * isithelo uMoya.” Lababantu basindiswa kuphela, kodwa bengenalo inkazimulo. , nomvuzo, nomqhele. Isikhombo-Mathewu 13 Isahluko 7, Ivesi 22

2 Labo abaphikisana neqiniso

Abanye babamba izinceku, bazithuka, bazibulala. Inkosi yathukuthela, yathumela amabutho ukuba abulale ababulali ashise nomuzi wabo. Mathewu 22:6-7

buza: Bonke abanye babamba inceku.
impendulo: Abantu abangabakaSathane noDeveli → Ngabona kubuthene isilo namakhosi omhlaba nawo wonke amabutho awo ukuba alwe nalowo ohlezi ehhashini elimhlophe nebutho lakhe. Isilo sabanjwa, nomprofethi wamanga, owenza izimangaliso phambi kwaso ukuze adukise labo abamukela uphawu lwesilo nabakhulekela umfanekiso waso, wabanjwa kanye nesilo. Ababili kubo baphonswa besezwa echibini lomlilo elivutha isibabule; IsAmbulo 19:19-21

3. Ukungagqoki okusemthethweni, mzenzisi

Yathi ezincekwini zayo: “Umshado usulungile, kepha ababiziweyo abafanele. Ngakho-ke khuphukani niye emfolokoni yomgwaqo, nibizele edilini bonke enibafumanayo. ’ Ngakho izinceku zaphuma zaya endleleni zabutha bonke ezazihlangana nabo, abalungile nababi, futhi idili lagcwala abamenyiweyo. Ithe inkosi ingena izobuka abamenyiweyo, yabona kukhona umuntu ongambethe ingubo esemthethweni, yathi kuye: "Mngane, ubekwa yini lapha ungagqokile? ’ Indoda yathula. Khona-ke inkosi yathi esithunywa sayo, ‘Mbopheni izinyawo nezandla, nimphonse ebumnyameni obungaphandle; ’—Mathewu 22:8-13

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukungagqoki ingubo?
impendulo: Hhayi “ukuzalwa ngokusha” ukwembatha umuntu omusha futhi embathe uKristu → Ingagqoki ilineni elicolekileyo, elikhanyayo nelimhlophe (ilineni elicolekileyo lingukulunga kwabangcwele) Inkomba - IsAmbulo 19:8

buza: Obani abangagqokile izingubo ezisemthethweni?
impendulo: Kukhona “abaFarisi abangabazenzisi, abaprofethi bamanga nabazalwane bamanga ebandleni, nabantu abangawuqondi umyalezo weqiniso wevangeli → Yilolu hlobo lwabantu olungena ngokunyenya emizini yabantu futhi lubophe abesifazane abangenalwazi , Belingwa yizinkanuko ezihlukahlukene futhi befunda njalo, abasoze bayiqonda indlela yeqiniso - 2 Thimothewu 3:6-7 .

[2] Bambalwa abantu abakhethwayo, kukhona izikhathi eziyi-100, izikhathi ezingama-60, nezikhathi ezingama-30.

(1) Izwa intshumayelo abantu abaqondayo

Ngokuba baningi ababiziweyo, kepha bayingcosana abakhethiweyo. ” Mathewu 22:14

Umbuzo: Kubhekiselwa kubobani “abambalwa abakhethwa”?
Impendulo: Ozwa izwi futhi aqonde → Futhi enye iwela emhlabathini omuhle futhi ithele izithelo; ikhulu Izikhathi, yebo amashumi ayisithupha Izikhathi, yebo amashumi amathathu izikhathi. Onezindlebe zokuzwa makalalele! ” → Ohlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilowo olizwayo izwi, aliqonde, athele isithelo, adle. ikhulu Izikhathi, yebo amashumi ayisithupha Izikhathi, yebo amashumi amathathu izikhathi. ” Isikhombo-Mathewu 13:8-9,23

(2) Labo ababiziweyo ngokwenjongo yakhe, abamiselwe ngaphambili inkazimulo

Siyazi ukuthi konke kusebenzelana kube ngokuhle kwabamthandayo uNkulunkulu, kulabo ababiziweyo ngokwecebo lakhe. Ngokuba labo ayebazi ngaphambili wabamisa ngaphambili ukuba bafane nomfanekiso weNdodana yakhe, ukuze yona ibe yizibulo phakathi kwabazalwane abaningi. Labo abamisiwe ngaphambili, labo ababizile, ubalungisisile futhi; Isikhombo - Roma 8:28-30

articles.title: Umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Ake sivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 7 ivesi 14 Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Umthetho ungowomoya" Khulekani: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga uJehova ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo → ukuze zisinikeze ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini ezidlule, izwi uNkulunkulu alimisela kusengaphambili ukuba sibe nenkazimulo ngaphambi kwazo zonke izinkathi! Sembulelwe thina nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Yazini ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Umthetho ungowomoya

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya, kepha mina ngingowenyama, ngithengisiwe esonweni. — Roma 7:14

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya?
impendulo: Umthetho ungowomoya → elithi “ka” lisho ukuba ngowakho, futhi “lomoya” → UNkulunkulu ungumoya – bheka uJohane 4:24, okusho ukuthi umthetho ungokaNkulunkulu.

buza: Kungani umthetho ungowomoya futhi ungowaphezulu?
impendulo: Ngoba umthetho wamiswa nguNkulunkulu → Munye kuphela umniki-mthetho nomahluleli, lowo ongasindisa futhi abhubhise. Ungubani wena ukuba wahlulele abanye? Inkomba - Jakobe 4:12 → UNkulunkulu umisa imithetho futhi ahlulele abantu Munye kuphela uNkulunkulu ongasindisa abantu noma ababhubhise. Ngakho-ke, "umthetho ungokamoya nokaNkulunkulu." Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

buza: Umthetho wamiselwa bani?
impendulo: Umthetho awusenzelwanga yena, hhayi iNdodana, noma abalungileyo, wenzelwe "izoni" kanye "nezigqila zesono" abangamhloniphiyo uNkulunkulu, izoni, nabangangcwele, nabezwe, nababulali, nababulali, neziphingi, nezifebe, nabaphangi, nabaqambimanga, nabafunga amanga, nanoma yini enye ephambene nokulunga. Phawula: Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi “iTao” inguNkulunkulu → Umthetho wamiswa ‘njengezinto ezimelene nendlela efanele nezimelene noNkulunkulu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - 1 Thimothewu Isahluko 1:9-10 (Ngokungafani nabantu abayiziwula emhlabeni abacabanga ukuthi bahlakaniphile, babeka umthetho ngokwabo, bese "babeka" ijoka elinzima lomthetho entanyeni yabo. isono → Ukuzilahla icala, inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, ukuzibulala)

(2) Kodwa mina ngingowenyama

buza: Kodwa kusho ukuthini ukuthi ngingowenyama?
impendulo: Izidalwa eziphilayo ezingokomoya nazo zihunyushwa ngokuthi izidalwa eziphilayo zenyama nenyama ephilayo → Kubhaliwe futhi eBhayibhelini: “Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba yisidalwa esiphilayo esinomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi inyama negazi)”; U-Adamu waba umoya ophilisayo. Isikhombo - 1 Korinte 15:45 noGenesise 2:7 → Ngakho-ke “uPawulu” wathi, “Kepha mina ngingowenyama, umphefumulo ophilayo womoya, umuntu ophilayo wenyama, umuntu ophilayo wenyama. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(3) Selithengiselwe isono

buza: Inyama yami yathengiswa nini esonweni na?
impendulo: Ngoba lapho sisenyameni, lokho kungenxa yokuthi “ umthetho "futhi" wazalwa "kwe izifiso ezimbi "leyo izifiso zobugovu "isebenza emalungwini ethu ukuba ithele isithelo sokufa → Lapho inkanuko isithathile, izala isono; futhi lapho isono sesikhule ngokugcwele, sizala ukufa. Ngakho-ke." ubugebengu "yebo Ozelwe ngomthetho , ngakho-ke, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - Jakobe isahluko 1 ivesi 15 namaRoma isahluko 7 ivesi 5 → Lokhu kufana nje nesono sangena ezweni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwehlela wonke umuntu ngoba wonke umuntu wona ubugebengu. KwabaseRoma 5 ivesi 12. Sonke siyinzalo ka-Adamu no-Eva. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(4) Ukulunga komthetho makugcwaliseke kithi esingalandeli inyama kodwa esilandela uMoya kuphela . — Roma 8:4

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukugcina ukulunga komthetho ekuhambisaneni nenyama?
impendulo: Umthetho ungcwele, nemiyalo ingcwele, ilungile, futhi mihle - bheka kwabaseRoma 7:12→ Njengoba umthetho ubuthakathaka ngenxa yenyama, kunezinto esingenakuzenza → Ngoba lapho sisenyameni, imikhuba emibi izalwa "ngenxa yomthetho", okungukuthi, izifiso zobugovu, lapho izinkanuko zikhulelwa ukuzalwa esonweni "Uma nje ugcina umthetho, uzozala isono." "Wozani, umthetho ufundisa abantu ukwazi isono nokuhle nokubi Ububi budinga ukufa → Ngakho-ke, umthetho awukwazanga ukwenza “ubungcwele, ukulunga, nokulunga” okwakufunwa umthetho ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama yomuntu → UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe siqu ukuba ibe umfanekiso wenyama enesono futhi yaba umnikelo wesono. . Kwakukhona ukulahlwa kwesono enyameni → ukuze kuhlenge labo ababengaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukutholwa njengamadodana. Bheka kuGal 4:5 futhi ubhekisele kwabaseRoma 8:3 → ukuze ukulunga komthetho kugcwaliseke kithi, esingaphili ngokwenyama kodwa ngokukaMoya. Amen!

buza: Kungani ukulunga komthetho kulandela kuphela labo abanoMoya?
impendulo: Umthetho ungcwele, ulungile, futhi muhle→ ukulunga okufunwa ngumthetho leyo Thanda uNkulunkulu futhi uthande umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena! Umuntu akakwazi ukuthwala ukulunga komthetho ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama, futhi “ukulunga komthetho” kungalandela kuphela labo abazelwe uMoya oNgcwele → Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi kufanele nizalwe kabusha ukuze nizalwe ngokusha. "ukulunga komthetho" kungalandela abantwana bakaNkulunkulu abazelwe uMoya oNgcwele → UKristu ungumuntu oyedwa " okwe "Wonke umuntu wafa → UNkulunkulu wenza labo abangasazi isono, okwe Saba yisono ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye - bheka kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:21 → “ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu” Umthetho ungokaNkulunkulu liyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo futhi akusona isithombe sangempela sale nto → isifinyezo somthetho sikaKristu, futhi umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho nguKristu → uma ngihlala kuKristu, ngiphila emfanekisweni weqiniso we umthetho; uma ngingahlali ku-"" isithunzi somthetho "Ngaphakathi - bheka amaHeberu 10: 1 namaRoma 10: 4 → ngihlala emfanekisweni womthetho: umthetho ungcwele, ulungile, futhi muhle; uKristu ungcwele, ulungile, futhi muhle. Muhle, ngihlala kuKristu futhi ngiyilungu lomzimba wakhe, "ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe" nami ngingcwele, ngilungile, futhi ngimuhle → ngakho uNkulunkulu wenza " ukulunga komlayo ” Lokhu kufezwa kithi esingahambi ngokwenyama kodwa ngokukaMoya Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokusobala?

Qaphela: Intshumayelo eshunyayelwe kulesi sihloko ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ihlobene nokuthi uphakathi kwenkulungwane yeminyaka noma cha. phambili "Uvuko; KuseseMinyakeni Eyinkulungwane" emuva "Uvuko. Iminyaka Eyinkulungwane" phambili "Uvuko lunegunya lokwahlulela → Kungani unegunya lokwahlulela? Ngoba ungokomfanekiso weqiniso womthetho, hhayi ethunzini lomthetho, ngakho unegunya lokwahlulela → Uhlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi esikhulu ukwahlulela "izingelosi eziwile ezenza okubi, ukwahlulela nahlulele izizwe zonke, abaphilayo nabafileyo" → Busa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane - bhekisela kusAmbulo Isahluko 20. Abazalwane nodade kufanele babambelele ngokuqinile ezithembisweni zikaNkulunkulu futhi bangalahlekelwa ubuzibulo babo njengo-Esawu.

KULUNGILE! Lokho kungenxa yokuxhumana kwanamuhla kanye nokwabelana nawe Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.05.16

articles.title: Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kumaHeberu isahluko 10 ivesi 1 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ungesiwo umfanekiso wangempela wento, ungebenze baphelele labo abasondelayo ngokunikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo unyaka nonyaka. .

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane " Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo 》Umkhuleko: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Siyabonga iNkosi ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo → Siphe ukuhlakanipha kwemfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu eyayifihliwe ezikhathini ezedlule, indlela uNkulunkulu ayimisela ngaphambili ukuba sikhazinyuliswe ngaphambi kwaphakade! Sambulelwa thina nguMoya oNgcwele . Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, awuwona umfanekiso weqiniso wento yangempela; Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo

Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ungewona umfanekiso wento, ungephelelise labo abasondelayo ngokunikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo iminyaka ngeminyaka. Hebheru 10:1

( 1 ) buza: Kungani umthetho ukhona?

impendulo: Umthetho wenezelwa iziphambeko → Pho, kungani umthetho lapho? Wenezelwa iziphambeko, ulindele ukufika kwenzalo okwathenjiswa kuyo isithembiso, wamiswa ngumlamuli ngezingelosi. Isikhombo - KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 3 Ivesi 19

( 2 ) buza: Umthetho ngowabalungileyo na? Noma kungenxa yezoni?
impendulo: Ngokuba umthetho awenzelwanga olungileyo, kepha owabangenamthetho nabangalaleliyo, abangamesabi uNkulunkulu nezoni, nabangangcwele, nabangakholwayo, nabangakholwayo, nabezwe, nokubulala, nokufeba, nokufeba, nokuphanga, nabaqambimanga, nabafungayo. ngamanga, noma nganoma yini enye ephambene nokulunga. Inkomba--1 Thimothewu Isahluko 1 Amavesi 9-10

( 3 ) buza: Kungani umthetho ungumfundisi wethu?
impendulo: Kodwa isimiso sokusindiswa ngokukholwa asikafiki, futhi sigcinwe ngaphansi komthetho kuze kube sekwambulweni kweqiniso okuzayo. Ngokunjalo umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, usiholela kuKristu, ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa. Kodwa njengoba isimiso sokusindiswa ngokukholwa sesifikile, asisekho ngaphansi kwesandla seNkosi. Inkomba - KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 3 Amavesi 23-25. Qaphela: Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu osiholela kuKristu ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa! Amen. Manje njengoba “indlela yeqiniso” isibonakalisiwe, asisekho ngaphansi komthetho “omkhulu”, kodwa singaphansi komusa kaKristu. Amen

( 4 ) buza: Kungani umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo?

impendulo: Isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu - bheka kwabaseRoma 10:4 → Isithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo sibhekisela kuKristu, " Isithunzi "Akusona isithombe sangempela sento yokuqala." UKristu ” umfanekiso wangempela → umthetho uyisithunzi, noma imikhosi, ukwethwasa kwezinyanga, namaSabatha kuyizinto ezizayo. Isithunzi , kodwa leso simo singuKristu - bhekisela kweyabaseKolose 2:16-17 → “Njengesihlahla sokuphila”, lapho ilanga likhanya ngokunganaki esihlahleni, kuba nesithunzi ngaphansi “kwesihlahla” esingumthunzi wesihlahla. isihlahla Ndodana, "isithunzi" akuwona umfanekiso weqiniso wento yokuqala "Umuthi wokuphila" ungumfanekiso weqiniso, futhi uKristu ungumfanekiso weqiniso isithunzi sento enhle! Uma ugcina umthetho, ulingana nokugcina "isithunzi" siwukucabanga futhi asinalutho "Izingane" kancane kancane zizoguga futhi zibole futhi ngokushesha zinyamalale Uma ugcina umthetho, uzogcina "usebenzela ize, uzama ukukha amanzi kubhasikidi woqalo," futhi ngeke uthole lutho ngaleso sikhathi. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka amaHeberu 8:13

[2] Emfanekisweni wangempela womthetho, uhlobene nenkulungwane yeminyaka phambili ukuvuka

AmaHubo 1:2 Ubusisiwe umuntu okuthokoza kwakhe kusemthethweni kaJehova, ozindla ngawo imini nobusuku.

buza: Uyini umthetho kaJehova?
impendulo: Umthetho kaJehova uthi “ umthetho kaKristu "→"Imiyalo, iziqondiso, nezimiso" eziqoshwe ezibhebheni zamatshe zoMthetho kaMose zonke ziyithunzi lezinto ezinhle zesikhathi esizayo. Uthembele "ethunzini", ungacabanga ngakho imini nobusuku→thola isimo , thola ingqikithi, futhi uthole isithombe sangempela→ Isithombe sangempela somthetho Khona manjalo yebo UKristu , isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu! Amen. Ngakho-ke, umthetho ungumfundisi wethu osiqeqeshayo, usiholela eNkosini uKristu olungisiswa ngokukholwa → ukuphunyuka " Isithunzi ", kuKristu ! KuKristu ngi “ku umzimba Ngo, ku I-Ontology Ngo, ku Ngempela Ku-→ emthethweni Ngempela 里→Lokhu kukukhathaza noma Uvuko “ngaphambi” kwenkulungwane yeminyaka, noma “enkulungwaneni yeminyaka” emuva "Uvuko. Abangcwele bavuse "ngaphambi" kwenkulungwane yeminyaka Yiba negunya lokwahlulela "Yahlulelani izingelosi eziwile, nahlulele zonke izizwe" Busa noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane → Ngabona izihlalo zobukhosi, nabantu behlezi phezu kwazo, banikwa igunya lokwahlulela. Ngabona ukuvuka kwemiphefumulo yalabo ababenqunywe amakhanda ngenxa yobufakazi babo ngoJesu nangenxa yezwi likaNkulunkulu, nalabo ababengazange basikhulekele isilo nomfanekiso waso, noma ababengamukelanga uphawu emabunzini abo noma ezandleni zabo. . futhi babuse kanye noKristu iminyaka eyinkulungwane. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isikhombo - IsAmbulo 20:4.

KULUNGILE! Konke lokho kungenxa yenhlanganyelo yanamuhla kanye nokwabelana nawe Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokusinika indlela ekhazimulayo Umfanekiso weqiniso womthetho uKristu, owambulwa kithi ngoMoya oNgcwele. Amen. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.05.15

articles.title: Ukugcina Isivumelwano Kwethembela KuMoya Oyingcwele Ukugcina Isivumelwano Esisha Siqinile
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyesi-2 Thimothewu isahluko 1 amavesi 13-14 futhi siwafunde ndawonye. Gcina amazwi aphilileyo owawezwa kimi ngokukholwa nothando olukuKristu Jesu. Kufanele uvikele izindlela ezinhle oziphathisiwe nguMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane "Ukugcina Isithembiso" Khulekani: Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Sibonge iNkosi ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu. Isinkwa silethwa sivela ezulwini futhi sinikezwa ngesikhathi ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Cela iNkosi ukuba isifundise ukugcina iSivumelwano Esisha siqinile ngokukholwa nothando, sincika kuMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

[1] Amaphutha Esivumelwaneni Esingaphambili

Inkonzo manje enikezwa uJesu ingengcono, njengoba nje engumlamuleli wesivumelwano esingcono, esamiswa ngesisekelo sezithembiso ezingcono. Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona indawo yokubheka isivumelwano sakamuva. Hebheru 8:6-7

buza: Ayini amaphutha esivumelwaneni esedlule?
impendulo: " ukuqokwa kwangaphambilini “Kukhona izinto umthetho ongeke uzenze ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama – bheka kwabaseRoma 8:3→ 1 Ngokwesibonelo, umthetho ka-Adamu othi, “Ungadli kuwo umuthi wokuhle nokubi; ngosuku oyodla ngalo kuwo uyakufa nokufa.”— Genesise 2:17 → Ngoba lapho sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi zazalwa. womthetho wawusemalungwini ethu Wenziwa wasebenza ngendlela yokuthi uthele isithelo sokufa—Bheka KwabaseRoma 7:5→ inkanuko yenyama ngoba umlayo uzazala " ubugebengu "Woza → Lapho inkanuko isithathile, izale isono; nesono, lapho sesikhule ngokugcwele, sizala ukufa. Jakobe 1:15 → Ngakho inkanuko yenyama "iyazala isono ngomthetho; futhi isono siyokhula sibe ukuphila nokufa. 2 Umthetho kaMose: Uma ulalela yonke imithetho ngokucophelela, uyobusiswa ekuphumeni kwakho futhi uyobusiswa lapho ungena khona, uyoqalekiswa lapho uphuma futhi uyoqalekiswa lapho uyangena. →Bonke abantu emhlabeni bonile, basilalelwe inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu; U-Adamu no-Eva abazange bawugcine umthetho ensimini yase-Edene futhi baqalekiswa - bheka kuGenesise Isahluko 3 amavesi 16-19; IBhabhiloni - bhekisela kuDaniyeli isahluko 9 ivesi 11 →Umthetho nemiyalo mihle, ingcwele, ilungile, futhi mihle, inqobo nje uma abantu beyisebenzisa ngendlela efanele, kodwa ayizuzisi ngaso sonke isikhathi Izimiso zangaphambili zazibuthakathaka futhi ziyize →Umthetho awukwazi kusetshenziswe ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama yomuntu Uma abantu bengakwazi ukufeza ukulunga okufunwa ngumthetho, umthetho ngeke ufeze lutho - bheka kumaHeberu 7 amavesi 18-19. Amaphutha esivumelwaneni sangaphambilini ", UNkulunkulu wethula ithemba elingcono → " Ukuqokwa kamuva 》Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

【2】Umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo

Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, ungewona umfanekiso wento, ungephelelise labo abasondelayo ngokunikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo iminyaka ngeminyaka. Hebheru 10:1

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo?
impendulo: Isifinyezo somthetho sithi uKristu--Bheka kwabaseRoma 10:4→ izinto ezinhle ezizayo libhekisela ku UKristu Wathi, " UKristu "ngumfanekiso weqiniso, umthetho unjalo Isithunzi , noma imikhosi, ukwethwasa kwenyanga, amaSabatha, njll., ekuqaleni kwakuyizinto ezizayo. Isithunzi ,Ukuthi umzimba Kodwa kunjalo UKristu --Bheka kwabaseKolose 2:16-17 → “Njengesihlahla sokuphila”, lapho ilanga likhanya ngokunganaki esihlahleni, kuba nesithunzi ngaphansi “kwesihlahla” esingumthunzi wesihlahla, “isithunzi” Akusona isithombe sangempela sento yokuqala, ukuthi " umuthi wokuphila "kwe umzimba Kungumfanekiso weqiniso nomthetho Isithunzi - umzimba yebo UKristu , UKristu Yilokho ukubukeka kwangempela Kungokufanayo “ngomthetho” Umthetho muhle futhi uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle! Uma ugcina umthetho → uzogcina " Isithunzi "," Isithunzi "Ayinalutho, ayinalutho. Awukwazi ukuyibamba noma ukuyigcina. "Ithunzi" lizoshintsha ngokuhamba kwesikhathi nokuhamba kokukhanya kwelanga," Isithunzi "Iyaguga, iphele, futhi isheshe inyamalale. Uma ugcina umthetho, uzogcina "udonsa amanzi kubhasikidi we-bamboo ngeze, ngaphandle komphumela, nokusebenza kanzima kuyize." Ngeke uthole lutho.

【3】Sebenzisa ukholo nothando ukuze ubambelele ngokuqinile esivumelwaneni esisha ngokwethembela kuMoya oNgcwele ophila ngaphakathi kwethu.

Gcina amazwi aphilileyo owawezwa kimi ngokukholwa nothando olukuKristu Jesu. Kufanele uvikele izindlela ezinhle oziphathisiwe nguMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi. 2 Thimothewu 1:13-14

buza: Sisho ukuthini “isilinganiso samazwi aphilileyo, indlela enhle”?
impendulo: 1 “Isilinganiso samazwi aphilileyo” yivangeli lensindiso uPawulu alishumayela kwabeZizwe → Njengoba senizwile izwi leqiniso, liyivangeli lensindiso yenu - bheka kwabase-Efesu 1:13-14 kanye neyoku-1 Korinte 15:3 -4; 2 “Indlela enhle” iyindlela yeqiniso! ULizwi unguNkulunkulu, uLizwi waba yinyama, okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu waba inyama *ethiwa uJesu → UJesu Kristu wanikela ngenyama negazi lakhe kithi, futhi Kanye neTao , Ngokuphila kukaNkulunkulu uJesu Kristu ! Amen. Lena indlela enhle, isivumelwano esisha uKristu asenza nathi ngegazi lakhe siqu incwadi umgwaqo gcina umgwaqo, gcina " indlela enhle ",leyo gcina isivumelwano esisha ! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

【ITestamente Elisha】

“Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke phakathi kwabo”;

buza: Kusho ukuthini ukuthi umthetho ulotshiwe ezinhliziyweni zabo futhi ubekwe phakathi kwabo na?

impendulo: Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo hhayi umfanekiso weqiniso wale nto → “Ukuphela komthetho kunguKristu” → “ UKristu "Lokhu kungumfanekiso weqiniso womthetho, unkulunkulu leyo Ukukhanya ! " UKristu "Kuveziwe, okungukuthi Ngempela Kwembuliwe, Ukukhanya Kwembuliwe→Umthetho Wangaphambi Kwesivumelwano" Isithunzi "Vele unyamalale," Isithunzi “Ukuguga nokubola, futhi ngokushesha ashabalala abe yize.”— Hebheru 8:13 . UNkulunkulu ubhala umthetho ezinhliziyweni zethu → UKristu Igama lakhe lilotshiwe ezinhliziyweni zethu, " indlela enhle "Kushise ezinhliziyweni zethu; ukubeke kuzo →" uKristu" Kufake kithi → Lapho sidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa, “sidle inyama yeNkosi, siphuze igazi leNkosi” sinoKristu ngaphakathi kwethu! →Njengoba sinempilo “kaJesu Kristu” ngaphakathi kwethu, singumuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. Omusha "hhayi okwenyama" Indoda endala "Izinto ezindala zidlulile, futhi thina siyindalo entsha!--Bheka kwabaseRoma 8: 9 kanye 2 Korinte 5:17→ Wabe esethi: "Angisayikuzikhumbula izono zabo (zomuntu omdala) nezono zabo (zomuntu omdala). ) izono. “Njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki ukuba kube nemihlatshelo yezono. KumaHeberu 10:17-18 → UNkulunkulu wayekuKristu ebuyisana nezwe, engalixoshi. Indoda endala ) iziphambeko zibalelwa kubo ( Omusha ) umzimba, futhi usiphathise umlayezo wokubuyisana → Shumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu! Ivangeli elisindisayo! Amen . Isikhombo-2 Korinte 5:19

【Kholwa futhi ugcine Isivumelwano Esisha】

(1) Lahla “isithunzi” somthetho futhi ugcine umfanekiso weqiniso: Njengoba umthetho uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo, awuwona umfanekiso weqiniso wento yangempela - bheka kumaHeberu isahluko 10 ivesi 1 → Isifinyezo somthetho sithi UKristu , Isithombe sangempela somthetho leyo UKristu , lapho sidla futhi siphuza inyama yeNkosi negazi, sinokuphila kukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu, futhi siyikho yena Ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe amalungu akhe → 1 UKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo, futhi savuswa kanye Naye; 2 UKristu ungcwele, nathi singcwele; 3 UKristu akanasono, kanjalo nathi; 4 UKristu wawugcwalisa umthetho, thina sigcwalisa umthetho; 5 Uyangcwelisa futhi athethelele → nathi singcwelisa futhi sithethelele; 6 Uphila phakade, futhi thina siphila phakade→ 7 Lapho uKristu ebuya, siyobonakala kanye Naye enkazimulweni! Amen.

UPawuli lo utshela uThimothi ukuthi agcine indlela elungileyo → Amazwi aphilileyo owawezwa kimi, uwagcine ngokholo nothando olukuKristu Jesu. Kufanele uvikele izindlela ezinhle oziphathisiwe nguMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi. Bheka eyesi-2 Thimothewu 1:13-14

(2) Hlala kuKristu: Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. Roma 8:1-2 → Qaphela: AbakuKristu abakwazi “ Impela "Uma unecala, awukwazi ukulahla abanye; uma unecala" Impela “Uma unecala, nawe Hhayi lapha KuJesu Kristu → Wena uku-Adamu, futhi umthetho uwukwenza abantu baqaphele isono, ngaphansi komthetho, uyisigqila sesono, hhayi indodana. Ngakho, ingabe ucacile?

(3) Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu: Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. 1 Johane 3:9-10 no-5:18

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: “Isivumelwano” UJesu wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli [1 Korinte 11:23-25] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Engangishumayeza ngakho yikho engakwamukela eNkosini Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa ngenxa yami. wena.” Imiqulu yasendulo: ephukile) “Kumelwe nikwenze lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule. Ngemva kokudla kwakusihlwa, wathatha nendebe, wathi: “Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami. ” KumaHeberu 9:15 Ngenxa yalokhu uye waba ngumlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, ukuze ababiziweyo bamukele ifa eliphakade elathenjiswayo, sebefile ukuze bahlawulele izono ezenziwa ngaphansi kwesivumelwano sokuqala. Amen

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isivumelwano" Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Thuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yakho! Siphe ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kuchichime. Amen! Ngiyacela! INkosi uJesu iyaqhubeka akhanyisele amehlo ethu omoya, avule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, asenze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya, futhi siqonde ukuthi iNkosi uJesu imise isivumelwano esisha nathi ngegazi layo! Qondani ukuthi iNkosi uJesu yabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi yahlupheka ukuze isithenge esivumelwaneni sethu sangaphambili, Ukungena esivumelwaneni esisha kwenza labo ababiziweyo bathole ifa laphakade elithenjisiwe ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Inkontileka

Incazelo ye-Encyclopedia: Inkontileka ekuqaleni isho idokhumenti ehlobene nokuthengisa, izikweletu zezindlu, ukuqashisa, njll. engenwa kukho ngokuvumelana phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezimbili noma ngaphezulu Ingaqondwa "njengokugcina izithembiso." Kukhona izinkontileka ezingokomoya nezinkontileka ezibhaliwe ngendlela yezinkontileka Izinto zingahluka, kufaka phakathi: abalingani bebhizinisi, abangani abaseduze, abathandi, izwe, umhlaba, sonke isintu, kanye nezivumelwano nawe, njll Ungasebenzisa "okubhaliwe. izivumelwano" ukuze uvumelane, futhi ungasebenzisa "ulimi" ukuze uvumelane. Ukwenza isivumelwano, kungase futhi kube isivumelwano "esithule". Kufana nesivumelwano esibhaliwe "senkontileka" esisayinwe emphakathini wanamuhla.

【2】INkosi uJesu yenza isivumelwano esisha nathi

(1) Yenza isivumelwano nesinkwa nesiphuzo samagilebhisi enkomishini
Masifunde iBhayibheli [1 Korinte 11:23-26], silivule ndawonye futhi sifunde: Engangishumayeza ngakho yikho engakwamukela eNkosini Ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo, yathatha isinkwa, yasibonga, yasihlephula, yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa ngenxa yami. wena.” Ngikhumbuleni.” Ngemva kokudla, wathatha nendebe, wathi: “Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami, noma nini lapho niphuza kuyo, kwenzeni lokhu ningikhumbula.” Noma nini lapho sidla lesi sinkwa futhi siphuza le ndebe , siveza ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike. Futhi niphendukele [kuMathewu 26:28] ngokuba lokhu kuyigazi lami lesivumelwano, elithululwa ngenxa yabaningi kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono. Buyela emuva [ku-Heberu 9:15] Ngenxa yalokhu uye waba umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, ukuze ababiziweyo basemukele ngokufa inhlawulo yezono zabo abazenza ngaphansi kwesithembiso sefa eliphakade.

(2) ITestamente Elidala liyisivumelwano sokuqala

(Qaphela: Ngokufunda imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, iNkosi uJesu yamisa “isivumelwano esisha” nathi. Njengoba kuthiwa isivumelwano esisha, kuyoba khona “Isivumelwano Esidala” okuyisivumelwano esedlule. “Esedlule Isivumelwano” esilotshwe eBhayibhelini sihlanganisa ikakhulukazi: 1 UNkulunkulu wenza umyalo no-Adamu ensimini yase-Edene, “isivumelwano sokungadli emthini wokuhle nokubi” okwakuyisivumelwano somthetho “wolimi”; 2 Isivumelwano sokuthula ‘sothingo’ sikaNowa ngemva kukazamcolo sasifanekisela isivumelwano esisha; 3 Isivumelwano “sesithembiso” sokukholwa kuka-Abrahama sifanekisela isivumelwano somusa kaNkulunkulu; 4 ISivumelwano SoMthetho KaMose sasiyisivumelwano somthetho esibekwe ngokucacile nama-Israyeli. Bheka kuDuteronomi 5 amavesi 1-3.

(3) Isono sangena emhlabeni ku-Adamu yedwa

U-Adamu, ukhokho wokuqala, wephula umthetho futhi wona futhi wadla emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi! Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, futhi ngesono ukufa kweza kubantu bonke, ngoba bonke bonile. Nokho, kusukela ku-Adamu kuya kuMose, ukufa kwabusa, futhi nalabo abangonanga njengo-Adamu babengaphansi kombuso wakhe - “Okungukuthi, nalabo abangonanga njengo-Adamu bafana nathi esifile Phansi kwegunya”. Bheka kwabaseRoma 5:12-14 inkokhelo yesono ukufa – bheka kwabaseRoma 6:23; Adam Uma umuntu ephula inkontileka futhi enze ubugebengu, uba a "Izigqila zesono", yonke inzalo ezalwa ukhokho u-Adamu iyizigqila "zesono", ngoba amandla esono umthetho, inzalo ka-Adamu ingaphansi komthetho "Ungadli emthini wokwazi okuhle. nokubi" Ngokulandela umthetho wemiyalo. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(4) Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Njengoba nje “isono” sibusa, siyoqalekiswa ngomthetho, okuholela ekufeni - bheka kwabaseRoma 5:21 → Ngokufanayo, umusa nawo uyabusa “ngokulunga”, okwenza abantu bathole insindiso ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ukuphila okuphakade. Amen! Ngalendlela, siyazi ukuthi “ukufa” kuvela “esonweni”-“isono” kuvela kumuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, owephula isivumelwano somthetho “yisono” – bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 3 ivesi 3 . ［ umthetho ]--[ ubugebengu ]--[ fa ] Lezi zintathu zihlobene Uma ufuna ukuphunyuka "ekufeni", kufanele ubalekele "esonweni", kufanele ubalekele emthethweni, okusho ukuthi kufanele ubaleke esiqalekisweni siqalekisiwe isivumelwano sakho somthetho. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Ngakho-ke, “isivumelwano sokuqala” siwumthetho wesivumelwano sika-Adamu “wokungadli emthini wokuhle nokubi” Kumelwe sithembele eNkosini uJesu Kristu ukuze siphunyuke kuso. “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. ; okufanayo ngezansi), ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye. amavesi 16-18.

(5) Isivumelwano sokuqala sikhululwa ngokufa kukaKristu okuhlupheka

UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba ibe yinyama futhi izalwe ngaphansi komthetho ukuze ihlenge abangaphansi komthetho ukuze sithole isiqu samadodana kaNkulunkulu! Amen—bheka Gal. 4:4-7. Njengoba kulotshiwe ku-1 Korinte 15:3-4, ngokweBhayibheli, uKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa “yezono” zethu, 1 ukuze asikhulule esonweni-” okwe Lapho bonke befa, bonke bayafa, ngoba labo asebefile bakhululiwe esonweni - bheka 2 KwabaseKorinte 5:14 nabaseRoma 6:7 2 bakhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho - bheka KwabaseRoma 7 Isahluko 6 nabaseGalathiya 3; :13; nokungcwatshwa, 3 kusisusa endodeni endala nezindlela zayo zakudala - bheka abaseKolose 3:9 nabaseGalathiya 5:24. Wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, 4 ukuze silungisiswe - bheka kwabaseRoma 4:25, ngokwesihawu sakhe esikhulu, uNkulunkulu wasenza kabusha ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo! Masifinyelele eTestamenteni Elisha. Amen!

Ngale ndlela siyakhululwa ezonweni ezatholwa ukhokho wethu u-Adamu, futhi sikhululiwe kuzo ukuqokwa kwangaphambilini “Isivumelwano sokungadli emthini wokuhle nokubi, okungukuthi, uJesu wasifela esiphambanweni Phakamisa Isivumelwano Esidala - Isivumelwano Somthetho Ka-Adamu sangaphambi Kwesivumelwano! Ikhehla lethu labhabhadiselwa ekufeni kukaKristu, lafa, lambelwa, lavuka kanye Naye! Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha akasekho ekuphileni kuka-Adamu okuyisono, futhi akasekho “ ukuqokwa kwangaphambilini "ETestamenteni Elidala umthetho uqalekisiwe, kodwa ngomusa" ITestamente Elisha 》KuKristu! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(6) Umuntu oshiye isivumelwano esivumelwaneni sokuqala uyafa; ITestamente Elisha Yenza umphumela

Ama-Israyeli ayenoMthetho kaMose, futhi ngokukholwa kuMsindisi uJesu Kristu, nawo akhululwa esonweni nasesithunzini soMthetho kaMose futhi angena esivumelwaneni esisha - bheka kuZenzo 13:39. Ake sivule amaHeberu isahluko 9 amavesi 15-17. Ngenxa yalesi sizathu, “uJesu” usephenduke umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha njengoba wafa futhi “wabethelwa esiphambanweni” ukuze ahlawulele izono ezenziwa abantu ngesikhathi “sesivumelwano esandulelayo”, uyokwenza ukuba ababiziweyo bazuze. Ifa laphakade elithenjisiwe. Noma yisiphi “isivumelwano esisha” uJesu ashiya kuso itestamente kumelwe silinde kuze kube yilapho lowo oshiye isivumelwano (umbhalo wokuqala ufana nesivumelwano) efa, okungukuthi, uJesu Kristu yedwa. okwe “Bonke bafa, bonke bafa” ngoba bonke bafa “Ngokuba njengalokhu ubuntu bethu obudala babhapathizwa kuKristu futhi bakholwa ukufa kanye naye, kanjalo nathi “Hoxisa inkontileka edlule “Isivumelwano esingokomthetho” kanye nesivumelwano “okungukuthi, isivumelwano esisha uJesu asishiyela sona ngegazi lakhe siqu” siyasebenza ITestamente Elisha Iqala ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? ,

Uma umuntu oshiye ifa esaphila "Awunaye umuntu omdala" Kholwa ekufeni “Yibani ngabafileyo kanye noKristu, okungukuthi, umuntu wenu omdala usaphila, usaphila ku-Adamu, usaphila ngaphansi komthetho wesivumelwano sokuqala”, lelo sivumelwano “okungukuthi - uJesu wethembisa ukushiya itestamente” ITestamente Elisha "Ihlangene ngani nawe?" Ingabe uqinisile? Wonke umuntu emhlabeni uyabuqonda ubudlelwano phakathi "kwenkontileka nesivumelwano", awuqondi?

(7) UKristu wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi ngegazi lakhe siqu

Ngakho ngobusuku iNkosi uJesu eyakhashelwa ngabo yathatha isinkwa, futhi ngemva kokubonga, yasihlephula yathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa nina. Lokhu kwenzeni ukuba ningikhumbule wathi: Le ndebe iyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami. Noma nini lapho niphuza kuso, kwenzeni lokhu ningikhumbula. "Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma nidla lesi sinkwa niphuza lesi sitsha, nivuma ukufa kweNkosi ize ifike. Amen! Siyabonga Nkosi Jesu ngokusikhulula emthethweni "wesivumelwano sokuqala" ukuze sithole iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. .Amen wenza isivumelwano esisha nathi ngegazi lakhe, ukuze thina esibiziweyo samukele ifa eliphakade elathenjiswayo!

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

2021.01.07

articles.title: Isivumelwano iTestamente Elidala neTestamente Elisha
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli [Hebheru 8:6-7, 13] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Inkonzo manje enikezwa uJesu ingengcono, njengoba nje engumlamuleli wesivumelwano esingcono, esamiswa ngesisekelo sezithembiso ezingcono. Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona indawo yokubheka isivumelwano sakamuva. …Njengoba sesikhulume ngesivumelwano esisha, isivumelwano sokuqala siyaguga;

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane " Yenza isivumelwano 》Cha. 6 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Ibandla lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Bayosinika ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kwande kakhulu. Amen! INkosi uJesu iyaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda imfihlakalo kusukela eTestamenteni Elidala kuya eTestamenteni Elisha, futhi uqonde intando yaKho . Khulekani egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】Kusuka "ETestamenteni Elidala" kuya "eTestamenteni Elisha"

ITestamente Elidala

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Hebheru 7:11-12] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Endulo, abantu babethola umthetho ngaphansi kobupristi bukaLevi, uma babengapheleliswa ngalesi sikhundla, sasingekho isidingo sokumisa omunye , ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, noma hhayi ngokohlelo luka-Aroni? Njengoba ubupristi bushintshiwe, nomthetho kumelwe uguqulwe. Ivesi 16 Waba umphristi, hhayi ngokwezimiso zenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli (ngokwezwi nezwi, okungenakubhubhiswa). Ivesi 18 Umthetho wokuqala waqedwa ngoba wawubuthakathaka futhi ungasizi lutho (umthetho awufezi lutho) wethula ithemba elingcono esingasondela ngalo kuNkulunkulu.

(Qaphela: ITestamente Elidala liyisivumelwano sokuqala, 1 Isivumelwano saseNsimini yase-Edene sokuthi u-Adamu angadli “Esihlahleni sokuhle nokubi”; 2 Isivumelwano sokuthula sikaNowa “sothingo” sifanekisela isivumelwano esisha; 3 Ukukholwa kuka-Abrahama “esivumelwaneni sesithembiso” kuyisivumelwano somusa; 4 Isivumelwano Somthetho KaMose. Esikhathini esidlule, abantu babengakwazi “ukwamukela umthetho” ngokuphelele ngaphansi kwesikhundla “sobapristi abangamaLevi”, ngakho uNkulunkulu wavusa omunye umpristi [uJesu] ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki! UMelkisedeki waziwa nangokuthi yiNkosi yaseSalema, okusho ukuthi iNkosi Yomusa, Yokulunga Nokuthula. Akanayise, akananina, akanalo uhlu lozalo, akanakuqala kokuphila, nokuphela kokuphila, kodwa ufana neNdodana kaNkulunkulu.

Ngakho njengoba ubupristi bushintshiwe, nomthetho kumelwe uguqulwe. UJesu waba umphristi, hhayi ngokwezimiso zenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli Izimiso zangaphambili zaqedwa ngoba zazibuthakathaka futhi zingenamsebenzi walutho Umthetho wawungafezi lutho futhi wethula ithemba elingcono. Kuvela ukuthi abapristi bamaLevi bavinjwa ukufa futhi abakwazanga ukuhlala isikhathi eside Umthetho ekuqaleni wamisa abantu ababuthakathaka njengabapristi ukugcwalisa umhlatshelo “wesono . Kusukela manje kuqhubeke, ngeke sisanikela ngemihlatshelo "yezono". Kusukela manje kuya phambili nizalwe ngokholo lwevangeli likaKristu, isizukulwane esikhethiweyo kanye nobupristi bobukhosi. Amen

【2】---Faka iTestamente Elisha---

Ake sihlole iBhayibheli [Hebheru 8:6-9] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Manje uJesu unenkonzo engcono, njengoba nje engumlamuleli wesivumelwano esingcono, esamiswa ngezithembiso ezingcono. Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona indawo yokubheka isivumelwano sakamuva. Ngakho-ke, uJehova wabasola abantu Bakhe futhi wathi (noma elihunyushwe ngokuthi: Ngakho-ke uJehova wakhomba ukushiyeka kwesivumelwano sokuqala): “Izinsuku ziyeza lapho ngiyokwenza isivumelwano esisha nendlu ka-Israyeli nendlu kaJuda; kungenjengalokho ngabamba okhokho babo ngesandla ngabahola, ngenza isivumelwano nabo ekuphumeni kwami eGibithe, ngokuba bengaqhubekanga nokugcina isivumelwano sami, angiyikubanaka,” usho uJehova :16-18 “Emva kwalezo zinsuku,” usho uJehova, “Nasi isivumelwano sabo: Ngiyoloba umthetho wami ezinhliziyweni zabo, futhi ngiyowubeka ezinhliziyweni zabo. ungabe usaba neziphambeko.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, ayisekho imihlatshelo yesono.

(Qaphela: Siyabonga ngomusa weNkosi! “Owesifazane Onekhono” uthumele uMfoweth’ uCen, isisebenzi, ukuba anihole ukuze niqonde imfihlakalo yevangeli, nilalele intando kaNkulunkulu, nisuke “esivumelwaneni somthetho” endulo. "Isivumelwano somusa" esivumelwaneni esisha!

1 ITestamente Elidala ngu-Adamu kuqala; ITestamente Elisha U-Adamu wokugcina nguJesu Kristu
2 Umuntu eTestamenteni Elidala wadalwa ngothuli; ITestamente Elisha Abazelwe nguNkulunkulu
3 Abantu beTestamente Elidala babengabenyama; ITestamente Elisha abantu bakaMoya oNgcwele
4 Abantu beSivumelwano Esidala babengaphansi kwesivumelwano somthetho; ITestamente Elisha umuntu uyisivumelwano somusa
5 Abantu eTestamenteni Elidala babengaphansi komthetho; ITestamente Elisha lalabo abakhululiwe emthethweni ngomzimba kaKristu
6 Abantu beTestamente Elidala baphula umthetho; ITestamente Elisha lalabo abagcwalisa umlayo ngothando lukaKristu
7 Abantu beTestamente Elidala babeyizoni; ITestamente Elisha Umuntu ulungile
8 Umuntu weTestamente Elidala wayeku-Adamu; ITestamente Elisha abantu kuKristu
9 Abantu eTestamenteni Elidala bangabantwana baka-Adamu; ITestamente Elisha abantu bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu
10 Abantu eTestamenteni Elidala balele emandleni omubi; ITestamente Elisha abantu baphunyuka ogibeni lukaSathane
11 Abantu beTestamente Elidala babengaphansi kwamandla obumnyama eHayidesi; ITestamente Elisha Labo abasencwadini yokuphila yeNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo, umbuso wokukhanya
12 Abantu eTestamenteni Elidala babengabesihlahla sokuhle nokubi; ITestamente Elisha Abantu bangabomuthi wokuphila!

ITestamente Elidala liyisivumelwano somthetho; iTestamente Elisha liyisivumelwano somusa Sithola umusa ngothando olukhulu lukaJesu Kristu. Amen, Isivumelwano Esisha senza iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ibe umphristi omkhulu. Njengoba abapristi sebeshintshiwe, nomthetho kufanele uguqulwe, ngoba isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu, uKristu unguNkulunkulu, futhi uNkulunkulu uluthando! Umthetho kaKristu uluthando. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 6 amavesi 1-2. Ngakho iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngininika umyalo omusha, Petru, wokuba nithandane; njengoba nje nginithandile, nani kumelwe nithandane! Lona ngumyalo wokuqala! Amen. Bheka uJohane 13:34 kanye Johane 1:2 Isahluko 11

【3】Isivumelwano sokuqala siyaguga futhi siwohloka, futhi maduze sizonyamalala sibe yize

Manje njengoba sikhuluma ngesivumelwano esisha, isivumelwano sokuqala siyaguga; Ngakho-ke, iTestamente Elidala "liyisithunzi", futhi njengoba umthetho "uyisithunzi" sezinto ezinhle hhayi umfanekiso weqiniso wento yokuqala, uKristu ungumfanekiso weqiniso! Njengokuthi "isithunzi" ngaphansi kwesihlahla, "isithunzi" esingaphansi kwesihlahla siyanyamalala kancane kancane ngokuhamba kokukhanya nesikhathi. Ngakho-ke, isivumelwano sokuqala-isivumelwano somthetho sizoshabalala maduze. Bheka amaHeberu 10:1 noKol. 2:16 . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Manje amabandla amaningi anifundisa amanga ukuba nibuyele emuva niyogcina iSivumelwano Esidala - isivumelwano soMthetho kaMose ama-Israyeli ayewugcina umthetho futhi awawugcinanga. Njengomphostoli “uPawuli”, kwakungasizi ukugcina umthetho gxeka “Lokho ayekubheka njengenzuzo kuyothiwa kuyinzuzo ngemva kokumazi uKristu elahlwa ngumthetho, ngakho uPawulu wathi kwakuyilahleko. , abaFarisi nababhali abangochwepheshe abakwazi ukugcina umthetho, futhi nina beZizwe abayizimfundamakhwela anikwazi ngisho nokuwugcina nicabanga ukuthi lokho kulungile?

Ngakho-ke uqala kusuka " iTestamente elidala "Ngena" ITestamente Elisha ", qonda intando kaNkulunkulu, uhlale kuKristu, embusweni ongcwele weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo! Amen

kulungile! Ngihlanganyela nani lokhu namuhla. Kwangathi uNkulunkulu angababusisa bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

articles.title: Isivumelwano uthando lukaKristu lugcwalisa umthetho kithi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mngani Othandekayo! Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli [Roma 13:8] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ningabi nacala kumuntu, kuphela elokuthandana, ngokuba othanda umakhelwane wakhe uwugcwalisile umthetho.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Yenza isivumelwano 》Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! " owesifazane oqotho "Ibandla lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe lakhulunywa ngezandla zakhe, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Uzosipha ukudla kwasezulwini kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kuchichime. Amen! Nkosi! UJesu iyaqhubeka ikhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya, ivula izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi isenze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya. Qonda uthando lwakho olukhulu ngenxa yothando lukaKristu” okwe “Sesiwugcwalisile umthetho, ukuze ukulunga kwawo kugcwaliseke kithi, esingaphili ngokwenyama kodwa ngokukaMoya.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【 eyodwa 】 Othanda umakhelwane wakhe uwugcwalisile umthetho

Masifunde iBhayibheli [KwabaseRoma 13:8-10] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Ningabi nacala kumuntu ngaphandle kokuthandana, ngoba othanda umakhelwane wakhe uwugcwalisile umthetho. Ngokwesibonelo, imiyalo enjengokuthi “Ungafebi, Ungabulali, Ungebi, Ungafisi” neminye imiyalo esongwe kulo musho othi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena”. Uthando alwenzi okubi kwabanye, ngakho uthando lugcwalisa umthetho.

【 ezimbili 】 Uthando lukaJesu lugcwalisa umthetho kithi

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Mathewu 5:17] futhi silivule ndawonye futhi sifunde: (UJesu) “Ningacabangi ukuthi ngize ukuchitha umthetho noma abaprofethi kini, kuze kudlule izulu nomhlaba, akuyikudlula gamana linye nasicashana sinye somthetho, kuze kufezeke konke.

[Johane 3:16] “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade (noma translation: ahlulele izwe; okufanayo ngezansi) iwukuba umhlaba usindiswe ngaye

[KwabaseRoma 8 Isahluko 3-4] Njengoba umthetho wawubuthakathaka ngenyama futhi ungenakukwenza utho, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe siqu ifana nenyama enesono ukuba ibe ngumnikelo wesono, elahla isono enyameni, ukuze umthetho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kugcwaliseka kithi esingahambi ngokwenyama kodwa ngokoMoya.

[ KwabaseGalathiya 4:4-7 ] Kepha lapho sekufikile ukuphelela kwesikhathi, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze sibe namadodana aphezulu. Njengoba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu (imibhalo yokuqala: eyethu), ememeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!” futhi njengoba uyindodana, wethembele kuNkulunkulu oyindlalifa yakhe.

( Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi akumelwe nikweleti muntu ngaphandle kokuthanda omunye nomunye. ungafebi Bulala, ungebi, ungabi nobugovu, konke kugoqwe ngamazwi athi "thanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena". Uthando lwezwe lungamanga, njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: “Akakho olungileyo, akakho noyedwa, ngokuba bonke baphule umthetho, nokwephula umthetho kuyisono, bonke emhlabeni bonile, basilela kuNkulunkulu. inkazimulo! Njengoba umthetho ubuthakathaka ngenxa yenyama yomuntu, awukwazi ukufeza ukulunga komthetho. Manje, ngomusa kaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe uqobo, uJesu, ukuba ibe yinyama, futhi yazalwa ngaphansi komthetho, ithatha isimo senyama enesono, yaba ngumnikelo wesono, ilahla izono zethu enyameni, futhi yabethelwa Wafa ukuze asikhulule esonweni, emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho. Kungowokuhlenga labo abangaphansi komthetho ukuze samukele isiqu samadodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi uNkulunkulu uthumela uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu , "izalwe kabusha"! Njengoba nizelwe nguNkulunkulu, ningabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, njengoKristu Jesu, ningabiza uBaba osezulwini ngokuthi, “Aba, Baba!” Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

【 ezintathu 】 Ukuze ukulunga komthetho kugcwaliseke kithi esingahambi ngokwenyama kodwa ngokukaMoya

Njengoba ukhululiwe emthethweni, uNkulunkulu usegcwalise “ukulunga” komthetho kithi esingahambi ngokwenyama kodwa “ngokukaMoya”. Ngamanye amazwi, uthando olukhulu lukaJesu selugcwalise izidingo nokulunga kwemithetho, izimiso, izimiso kanye nezimiso zokuziphatha ezilotshwe encwadini yomthetho ngathi, ukuze kuKristu Jesu, singabe sisalahlwa ngomthetho. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu usikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. Isiphetho somthetho nguKristu --Bheka kwabaseRoma 10 Isahluko 4→ SikuKristu, futhi uKristu ugcwalisa umthetho " olungileyo ", Yithina esigcwalisa ukulunga komthetho! Uma esenqobile, sinqobile, akaphulanga nowodwa umthetho kuwo, okusho ukuthi siwumisile umthetho futhi asikephuli mthetho noma senze icala! Ungcwele. Olungisiswayo ungolungileyo; Ufana nabafowabo kukho konke, unjani! Sinjalo nathi, ngokuba uKristu uyinhloko yethu, singumzimba wakhe.” ibandla “Amalungu omzimba wakhe ayithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe. ! Uma ukholwa kuJesu, useyisoni na? Awulona ilunga lakhe futhi awukaqondi insindiso Uma umuntu oyisoni exhumene noMzimba kaKristu, khona-ke wonke umzimba woMzimba kaKristu uzodakwa yisono.

Kungakho iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ningacabangi ukuthi ngizele ukuzochitha uMthetho noma abaProfethi, kodwa ngizé ukuzogcwalisa Ijodi lomthetho liyochithwa, kufanele ligcwaliseke uthando lukaJesu Kristu.

kulungile! Ngihlanganyela nani lokhu namuhla. Kwangathi uNkulunkulu angababusisa bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen
