articles.title: Isivumelwano Isivumelwano Somthetho KaMose
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mngani Othandekayo! Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Savula iBhayibheli [Duteronomi 5:1-3] futhi safunda ndawonye: UMose wabizela ndawonye bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kubo: “O Israyeli, lalela izimiso nezahlulelo engizisho kini namuhla, ukuze nizifunde futhi nizenze. UJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi entabeni yaseHorebe. . Lesi sivumelwano akusona Esasungulwa nokhokho bethu samiswa kanye nathi esiphila lapha namuhla. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Yenza isivumelwano 》Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda uMthetho KaMose, okuyisivumelwano esilotshiwe sikaNkulunkulu nama-Israyeli. .

---Umthetho Wama-Israyeli---

【okukodwa】 imiyalo yomthetho

Ake sibheke iBhayibheli [ Duteronomi 5:1-22 ] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Khona-ke uMose wabiza bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli wathi kubo: “O ma-Israyeli, lalelani izimiso nezahlulelo enginitshela zona namuhla, nizifunde iNkosi yethu. UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nathi entabeni yaseHorebe, asenziwanga nokhokho bethu, kodwa uJehova wakhuluma nani ubuso nobuso entabeni , owakukhipha ezweni laseGibithe, endlini yobugqila,
1 Ungabi nabanye onkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami.
2 Ungazenzeli izithombe ezibaziweyo, nomfanekiso wokusezulwini phezulu, nowokusemhlabeni phansi, nowokuphansi komhlaba, nowokusemanzini.
3 Ungaliphathi ngeze igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ngokuba uJehova akayikumyeka oliphatha ngeze igama lakhe.
4 Wongcwelisa usuku lwesabatha, njengalokho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ekuyalile. Izinsuku eziyisithupha uyakusebenza, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho, kepha usuku lwesikhombisa luyisabatha likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho. …
5 Hlonipha uyihlo nonyoko, njengoba nje uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ekuyalile, ukuze kukuhambele kahle futhi izinsuku zakho zibe zinde ezweni uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho akunika lona.
6 Ungabulali.
7 Ungaphingi.
8 Ungebi.
9 Ungafakazi amanga ngomuntu.
10 Ungafisi umfazi womakhelwane wakho, noma insimu yakhe, nenceku yakhe, nencekukazi yakhe, nenkabi yakhe, nembongolo yakhe, nanoma yini anayo. “Lawa ngamazwi uJehova awakhuluma kini lonke ibandla, ngezwi elikhulu elivela emlilweni, efwini, nasebumnyameni, akenezelanga amanye amazwi kuwo lawa mazwi ezibhebheni ezimbili zamatshe wanginika wona.

【okubili】 izimiso zomthetho

( 1 ) Isimiso Somnikelo Wokushiswa

Levitikusi 1:1-17 UJehova wabiza uMose esetendeni lokuhlangana, wathi kuye: “Khuluma nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Uma omunye kini eletha umnikelo kuJehova, uyakunikela ngomnikelo wesono. “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungumnikelo wokushiswa wenkomo, uyakunikela ngenkunzi engenasici ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, wamukelwe phambi kukaJehova. Uyakubeka izandla zakhe enhloko yomnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo wokushiswa wamukeleke, ube yinhlawulo yezono zakhe. … “Uma umnikelo womuntu ungumnikelo wokushiswa wemvu noma wembuzi, uyakunikela ngenqama engenasici… “Uma umnikelo womuntu ungumnikelo wokushiswa wenyoni, uyakunikela ngehobhe noma ithole lembuzi. ijuba. Umpristi uyakukushisa phezu kwe-altare njengomnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. —Kulotshwe kuLevitikusi 1:9

( 2 ) Isimiso Sokunikela Ngenyama

[ Levitikusi 2:1-16 ] Uma umuntu eletha umnikelo wempuphu njengomnikelo kuJehova, makathele ufulawa ocolekileyo ngamafutha, engeze nenhlaka yempepho... “Uma unikela ngomnikelo wempuphu wokudla okugazingiwe eziko, wowunikela ngomnikelo wempuphu wokudla okugazingiwe. uyisebenzise. Amaqebelengwane empuphu acolekileyo angenamvubelo ahlanganiswe namafutha, noma izinkwa eziyizinkwa ezingenamvubelo, ezigcotshwe ngamafutha… kuJehova. Lokhu kuyakunikelwa kuJehova njengomnikelo wolibo, kepha akumelwe kunikelwe e-altare njengomnikelo omnandi. Wonke umnikelo wokusanhlamvu owunikelayo kumelwe uyoliswe ngosawoti; Yonke iminikelo kufanele inikelwe ngosawoti. ...Umpristi uyakukushisa okunye okusanhlamvu kube yisikhumbuzo, namanye amafutha, nayo yonke inhlaka yempepho, kube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova. irekhodiwe

( 3 ) Isimiso Somnikelo Wokuthula

[ Levitikusi Isahluko 3 Amavesi 1-17 ] “Nxa umuntu eletha umnikelo wokuthula, uwunikela emhlambini wezinkomo, noma iduna noma insikazi, woba ngumnikelo ongenasici phambi kukaJehova. . . . “Nxa kunikelwa kuJehova umnikelo wokuthula, woba ngowomhlambi, iduna noma insikazi, ongenasici. ... “Uma umnikelo womuntu uyimbuzi, wonikela ngayo phambi kukaJehova.

( 4 ) Isimiso Somnikelo Wesono

[Levitikusi 4 Isahluko 1-35] UJehova wathi kuMose: “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Uma umuntu ona kunoma iyiphi yemiyalo uJehova ayale ngayo engekho emthethweni, noma uma umpristi ogcotshiweyo ona futhi onisa abantu, uyakuba necala ngakho. . ngenxa yesono sokunikela ngenkunzi engenasici kuJesu Inkosi ingumnikelo wesono ... “Uma inhlangano yonke yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli yenza noma yini kubo eyenqatshelwe, futhi yenza isono ngephutha, kodwa kufihliwe futhi kungabonakali kuyo. ngokushesha nje lapho ibandla lisiqaphela isono esilenzile, kumelwe lilethe iduna etendeni lokuhlangana njengomnikelo wesono. ... “Uma umbusi enza lokho uJehova akwenzileyo, uyakwenza Uma umuntu enza isono esenqatshelwe uNkulunkulu futhi esazi isono asenzileyo kufanele alethe impongo engenasici njengomnikelo... "Uma umuntu phakathi kwabantu enza noma yini engavunyelwe ngokomthetho kaJehova. , Uma wona ngephutha, futhi usazi isono osenzileyo, woletha impongo yensikazi engenasici, ibe ngumnikelo wesono sakho. “ ‘Uma umuntu eletha imvu yomnikelo wesono, uyakuletha insikazi engenasici, abeke izandla zakhe enhloko yomnikelo wesono, awuhlabe njengomnikelo wesono endaweni yomnikelo wokushiswa. umpristi awushise e-altare ngokwezimiso zomnikelo womlilo kuJehova, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana, athethelelwe.

( 5 ) I-Odinensi Yokunikela Ngecala

[Levitikusi 5:1-19] “Uma umuntu ezwa izwi libiza isifungo, engufakazi, kepha angakutsheli lokho akubonileyo noma akwaziyo, kuyisono; isilo esifileyo, nesilwane esifileyo esingcolileyo, noma impethu efileyo engcolile, engakwazi, ngalokho uba ngongcolile, unecala lesono. Noma uye wathinta ukungcola komunye umuntu, futhi akazi ukuthi ungcolile kangakanani, futhi lapho ekwazi, unecala ... "Uma umuntu ona futhi enze noma yini enqatshelwe yiNkosi, nakuba engenzi wonile, uyakuthwala ububi bakhe, ulethe kumpristi inqama engenasici, ibe ngumnikelo wecala njengokulinganisa kwakho. + Ngokuqondene nephutha elenze ngephutha, umpristi kumelwe amenzele ukubuyisana, futhi uyothethelelwa.

( 6 ) Imithetho mayelana Neminikelo Yemagagasi kanye Neminikelo Yokuphakamisa

[ Levitikusi 23:20 ] Umpristi uyakunikela ngakho umnikelo wokuzuliswa kanye nesinkwa solibo lukakolweni, akuzulise phambi kukaJehova kube ngumnikelo ongcwele kuJehova; Bheka ku-Eksodusi 29, ivesi 27

【ezintathu】 imithetho yomthetho

[ Eksodusi 21:1-6 ] “Nanku umthetho oyakuwumisa phambi kwabantu: Uma uthenga umHeberu abe yisigqila, uyakukukhonza iminyaka eyisithupha, aphume ekhululekile, aphume eyedwa ; uma linomfazi, umkalo angaphuma nalo, uma inkosi yalo ilinika umfazi, alizalele indodana noma indodakazi, umkayo nabantwana kuyakuba ngabenkosi, yona ibe yodwa. Phuma. Uma isigqila sithi, “Ngiyayithanda inkosi yami nomkami nabantwana, futhi angifuni ukuphuma ngikhululekile,” inkosi yaso iyosiyisa kumahluleli (noma uNkulunkulu; yena lowo ngezansi) futhi imthathe ihambe naye. . Hamba uye emnyango, usondele ohlakeni lomnyango, ubhoboze indlebe yakhe ngosungulo, futhi uyokhonza inkosi yakhe kuze kube phakade (Qaphela: Imithetho iyimithetho eyisisekelo yokulawula ukuphila nokuziphatha kwabantu).

【Okune】 Uma uthobela imiyalelo, imithetho, kanye nezimiso, uzobusiswa

[Duteronomi 28:1-6] “Uma ulalela nokulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine, wenze yonke imiyalo yakhe engikuyala ngayo namuhla, uyakukumisa phezu kwazo zonke izizwe zomhlaba lalela iNkosi UNkulunkulu uthi, lezi zibusiso ziyokulandela futhi zibe phezu kwakho: Uyakubusiswa emzini, futhi uyobusiswa esithelweni sesisu sakho, esithelweni sezwe lakho, ngenzalo yezinkomo zakho, nasematholeni akho. 23:14 futhi uyakubusiswa ubhasikidi wakho, nositsha sakho sokuxova isinkwa.

【esihlanu】 Labo abephula imiyalo bayoqalekiswa

Amavesi 15-19 “Uma ningamlaleli uJehova, Uma ungalilaleli izwi likaNkulunkulu, ulalele yonke imiyalo yakhe nezimiso zakhe, engikuyala ngakho namuhla, lezi ziqalekiso ziyakulandela, zikwehlele: Uyoqalekiswa emzini, uqalekisiwe ensimini .Makuqalekiswe ubhasikidi wakho, nositsha sakho sokuxova isinkwa, uqalekisiwe amathole akho namawundlu akho Ngokunjalo umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, usiholela kuKristu, ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa.

Qaphela: Ngokutadisha imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi imithetho yama-Israyeli ihlanganisa imiyalo, izimiso neziqondiso, ingqikithi engu-613! Umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, ngaphambi kokuba iqiniso lensindiso lifike, sasigcinwa ngaphansi komthetho kuze kube yilapho iqiniso elizayo lambulwa. Njengoba isimiso seTestamente Elisha sokusindiswa ngokukholwa sesifikile, asisekho ngaphansi kwenkosi “yomthetho weTestamente Elidala”, kodwa ngaphansi komusa “weTestamente Elisha,” okungukuthi, kuKristu, ngoba isiphetho somthetho nguKristu. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

articles.title: Isivumelwano Isivumelwano sika-Abrahama Sokholo Nesithembiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen

Savula iBhayibheli [Genesise 15:3-6] futhi safunda ndawonye: U-Abrama wathi futhi: "Awunginikanga indodana; ozelwe endlini yami uyindlalifa yami." ngaphandle, wathi: "Bheka phezulu esibhakabhakeni, ubale izinkanyezi. Ungazibala na?" .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " yenza isivumelwano 》Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! " Owesifazane oqotho "Thumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Siphe ukudla kokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi esifaneleyo ukuze ukuphila kwethu kuchichime. Amen! INkosi uJesu Ukhanyisela njalo amehlo ethu okomoya. sivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi sisenze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya. Ukuze silingise u-Abrahama okholweni futhi samukele isivumelwano sesithembiso !

Ngiyakhuleka okungenhla egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【 eyodwa 】 Isivumelwano sika-Abrahama Sesithembiso SikaNkulunkulu

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Genesise 15:1-6] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Ngemva kwalezi zinto, uJehova wakhuluma ku-Abrama ngombono, wathi: “Ungesabi, Abrama, mina ngiyisihlangu sakho; U-Abrama wathi: “O Nkosi Jehova, uyakunginikani, lokhu ngingenandodana na? Odla ifa lami ngu-Eliyezeri waseDamaseku ozelwe emndenini wami uyakuba yindlalifa yami; wathi: "Bheka phezulu ezulwini, ubale izinkanyezi. Ungazibala na?"
Isahluko 22 Amavesi 16-18 “ ‘Ngenxa yokuthi wenze lokhu, ungagodlanga indodana yakho, indodana yakho okuwukuphela kwayo,’ usho uJehova, ‘ngizifunga mina ngokwami, ngizakubusisa kakhulu,’ usho uJehova ngiyakwandisa inzalo yakho ibe ngangezinkanyezi zezulu, nangesihlabathi sogwini lolwandle, inzalo yakho ibe ngamasango ezitha zayo, ngenzalo yakho zibusiswe izizwe zonke zomhlaba, ngokuba ulalele izwi lami. ." Phinda uvule isithembiso ku-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe. UNkulunkulu akasho ukuthi " inzalo ", kubhekiselwa kubantu abaningi, kusho ukuthi" Leyo nzalo yakho ", Ekhomba umuntu, okungukuthi, uKristu .

( Qaphela: Siyazi ukuthi iTestamente Elidala liwumfanekiso nesithunzi, futhi u-Abrahama ungumfanekiso “kaBaba waseZulwini”, uyise wokukholwa! UNkulunkulu wathembisa ukuthi yilabo kuphela abazalwa ngu-Abrahama ababeyoba izindlalifa Zakhe ekuqaleni isithembiso senziwa ku-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe. UNkulunkulu akasho “yonke inzalo yakho,” ebhekisela kubantu abaningi, kodwa ethi “omunye wenzalo yakho,” ebhekisela kumuntu oyedwa, uKristu. Sizalwa ngezwi leqiniso levangeli likaJesu Kristu, sizalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, futhi sizalwa nguNkulunkulu. Kungale ndlela kuphela esingaba ngabantwana bakaBaba oseZulwini, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu, futhi sizuze ifa likaBaba oseZulwini. . ! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? UNkulunkulu wathembisa u-Abrahama ukuthi inzalo yakhe yayiyoba ningi ngangezinkanyezi zesibhakabhaka nesihlabathi esisogwini lolwandle! Amen. U-Abrahama “wakholwa” nguJehova, uJehova wambalela lokho njengokulunga kuye. Lesi isivumelwano sesithembiso uNkulunkulu asenza no-Abrahama ! Amen)

【 ezimbili 】 uphawu lwesivumelwano

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Genesise 17:1-13] Lapho u-Abrama eneminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye ubudala, uJehova wabonakala kuye wathi: “NginguNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke, ngibe ngophelele phambi kwami, futhi ngizokwenza wenze isivumelwano nawe, ukuze inzalo yakho ibe ningi kakhulu, u-Abrama wawa phansi, wathi kuye: “Nami ngenza isivumelwano nawe: Kusukela manje uyakuba nguyise wezizwe eziningi ungabe usabizwa ngokuthi u-Abrama, futhi uyakuthiwa u-Abrahama, ngokuba ngikwenzé uyise wezizwe eziningi; ngimise eyami nawe nenzalo yakho ezizukulwaneni zayo, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wakho nenzalo yakho emva kwakho, izwe ongowezizwe kulo, izwe lonke laseKhanani, libe yifa lakho kuze kube phakade. nenzalo yakho, mina ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo.

UNkulunkulu wathi ku-Abrahama: “Wena nenzalo yakho anokugcina isivumelwano sami ezizukulwaneni zakho. Bonke abesilisa bakho mabasokwe; lesi yisivumelwano sami eniyakusigcina phakathi kwami nani nenzalo yakho. Niyakusokwa nonke. (umbhalo wokuqala uthi ukusoka; amavesi 14, 23, 24, no-25 ayafana); Othengwe ngemali kowezizwe ongeyena owenzalo yakho kumelwe asokwe ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ngemva kokuzalwa kwakhe.

( Qaphela: ITestamente Elidala uNkulunkulu wathembisa u-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe ukuthi babe yizindlalifa, futhi isibonakaliso sesivumelwano kwakuwukusoka, okusho ekuqaleni “ukusoka” okuwuphawu oluqoshwe emzimbeni; Lifanekisela abantwana beTestamente Elisha abazelwe yizwi leqiniso levangeli likaJesu Kristu, abazelwe ngoMoya oNgcwele, nabazelwe nguNkulunkulu! Isethembiso sokubekwa uphawu [ngoMoya oNgcwele] , akulotshwanga enyameni, ngoba inyama ebolayo evela ku-Adamu ayiyona eyethu. Ukusoka kwangaphandle akukona ukusoka kweqiniso, kungenziwa ngaphakathi kuphela ukusoka kweqiniso kusenhliziyweni futhi kuncike ". umoya "Khona manje UMoya oNgcwele ! Ngokuba kuKristu ukusoka nokungasoki akunamsebenzi, kuphela lokho okuveza uthando. ukuzethemba "leyo kholwa kuJesu Krestu "Kuyasebenza. Amen! Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseRoma 2: 28-29 noGal. 5: 6

【ezintathu】 Lingisa ukholo luka-Abrahama futhi uthole izibusiso ezithenjisiwe

Sihlola iBhayibheli [KwabaseRoma 4:13-17] ngoba uNkulunkulu wathembisa u-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe ukuthi bayodla ifa lomhlaba, hhayi ngomthetho kodwa ngokulunga kokukholwa. Uma kuphela labo abangokomthetho beyizindlalifa, ukholo luyoba yize nesithembiso siyokwenziwa ize. Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka; Ngakho-ke, kungokholo ukuthi umuntu uyindlalifa, ngakho-ke ngomusa, ukuze isithembiso senziwe kuyo yonke inzalo, kungabi kuyo abomthetho kuphela, kodwa nakulabo abalingisa ukholo luka-Abrahama. U-Abrahama wakholwa kuNkulunkulu ovusa abafileyo nowenza izinto zibe yize, nonguYise wethu thina bantu phambi kukaJehova. Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Ngikwenze uyise wezizwe eziningi, nakuba ithemba lalingekho, wayelokhu enethemba ngokholo, futhi wakwazi ukuba nguyise wezizwe eziningi, njengoba nje kwashiwo ngaphambili. "Kuyoba njalo inzalo yakho."

KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 3 Ivesi 7.9.14 Ngakho-ke, kufanele nazi: Labo abangabokholo bangabantwana bakaAbrahama . … Kuyabonakala ukuthi labo abasekelwe ekukholweni bayabusiswa kanye no-Abrahama onokholo. ukuze isibusiso sika-Abrahama sifike kwabezizwe ngoKristu Jesu, ukuze samukele isithembiso sikaMoya oNgcwele ngokukholwa, sidle ifa lombuso wezulu. . Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Isivumelwano SikaNowa SoThingo Lwenkosazana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen

Savula iBhayibheli kuGenesise isahluko 9 amavesi 12-13 futhi safunda ndawonye: UNkulunkulu wathi: “Kukhona isibonakaliso sesivumelwano sami esiphakade phakathi kwami nani nazo zonke izidalwa eziphilayo ezikanye nani. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " yenza isivumelwano 》Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! “Abesifazane abalungileyo” bathumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli futhi sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya ~ Qonda uNowa I-Rainbow Peace Pact "! Amen

【 eyodwa 】 Hlangana nothingo ngemva kwemvula

Isikhathi asinawo umkhondo, ngaso sonke isikhathi siqopha imizwa noma nini nanoma kuphi Incwadi yokubhala yempilo ibuyekezwa ngekhasi, iqopha imikhondo yakho phansi ngiyiqambe ngemicabango ephukile yokwazisa. Ezinsukwini zemvula, zizwela ngokuthula imizwa emvuleni, ushiye isizungu eminyakeni, futhi ushiye ukulula kuwe. Uma ngibheka ebangeni eliphakathi kwezinzipho nemvula, uthingo lwabonakala phambi kwamehlo ami. Inemibala eyisikhombisa yayo yonke imibala emhlabeni: obomvu belanga, ophuzi wegolide, oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka olwandle, amaqabunga aluhlaza okotshani, owolintshi wokukhanya kwasekuseni, onsomi benkazimulo yasekuseni, kanye nombala oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka. utshani. Namuhla, abafana abaningi, amantombazane nabathandi abasha bazokwenza isifiso ezinhliziyweni zabo ngokungazi lapho bebona uthingo - "ukuthula nezibusiso"! Abantu bangabhekana kanjani nothingo uma bengenawo umoya nemvula? Mngani Othandekayo! Uyazi ukuthi ezikhathini zasendulo, abantu babhekana nozamcolo omkhulu? IBhayibheli liyalandisa-" uthingo “NguNkulunkulu nathi bantu, zonke izidalwa eziphilayo, nezindawo yenza isivumelwano umaka! Eyaziwa nangokuthi "i-Rainbow Peace Pact" .

【 ezimbili 】 uzamcolo omkhulu

Ngahlola iBhayibheli [Genesise 6:9-22] ngalivula kanyekanye ngafunda: Laba bayinzalo kaNowa. UNowa wayeyindoda elungile futhi engumuntu ophelele esizukulwaneni sakhe. UNowa wahamba noNkulunkulu. UNowa wayenamadodana amathathu, uShemi, uHamu, noJafete. Izwe lonakele phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi umhlaba ugcwele ubudlwangudlwangu. UNkulunkulu wawubuka umhlaba, wabona ukuthi wonakele; Khona-ke uNkulunkulu wathi kuNowa: "Ukuphela kwayo yonke inyama sekufikile phambi kwami, ngoba umhlaba ugcwele ubudlova bayo, futhi ngizobabhubhisa kanye nomhlaba kanye emakamelweni, uwagcobe ngerono ngaphakathi nangaphandle, kepha ngiyakwenza isivumelwano nawe: wena namadodana akho, nabafazi bamadodana akho, niyakungena emkhunjini, kubili kuzo zonke izilwane umkhumbi, iduna nensikazi, ukuze kugcinwe kini, izinyoni ngezinhlobo zazo, nezinkomo ngezinhlobo zazo, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ngezinhlobo zazo, ezimbili ngezinhlobo zazo. Kumelwe kufike kuwe umusa, ukuze ulondoloze ukuphila kwakho, kumelwe uzibekelelele zonke izinhlobo zokudla kwakho nokwazo. Konke uNkulunkulu ayemyale ngakho, wakwenza.

Isahluko 7 amavesi 1-13 uJehova wathi kuNowa: “Ngena emkhunjini, wena nendlu yakho yonke, ngokuba ngibonile ukuthi ulungile emehlweni ami kulesi sizukulwane; uyakuletha kanye nawe amakhosi ayisikhombisa azo zonke izilwane ezihlambulukileyo. kuzo zonke izilwane ezingcolile, iduna nensikazi, nakuzo zonke izinyoni zezulu, zithatheleni kini izinduna eziyisikhombisa nezinsikazi eziyisikhombisa, ukuze zibe nenzalo ehlala emhlabeni wonke. thumela imvula emhlabeni izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku obungamashumi amane kuyakuchithwa emhlabeni. ...Ngomnyaka wamakhulu ayisithupha wokuphila kukaNowa, ngenyanga yesibili, ngosuku lweshumi nesikhombisa lwenyanga, ngalolo suku yonke imithombo yotwa olukhulu yabhoboka, namafasitele ezulu avuleka, lana kakhulu phezu komhlaba. emhlabeni izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku. Ngalolo suku uNowa wangena emkhunjini, namadodana akhe amathathu oShemi, noHamu, noJafete, nomkaNowa, nabafazi bamadodana akhe abathathu. 24 Amanzi aba maningi kakhulu emhlabeni izinsuku eziyikhulu namashumi ayisihlanu.

Isahluko 8 Amavesi 13-18 Kwathi uNowa eseneminyaka engamakhulu ayisithupha nanye, ngolokuqala lwenyanga yokuqala amanzi abeseshile emhlabeni. Lapho uNowa esusa isembozo somkhumbi ebheka, wabona ukuthi umhlabathi womile. Ngo-February 27, umhlabathi wawusomile. ... “Uyakuphuma emkhunjini, wena nomkakho, namadodana akho, nabafazi bamadodana akho, ukhiphe zonke izidalwa eziphilayo ezikanye nawe: izinyoni, nezinkomo, nazo zonke izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo phezu komhlaba. Banda kakhulu, banda kakhulu.” Waphuma uNowa, nomkakhe, namadodana akhe, nabafazi bamadodana akhe. Futhi zonke izilwane, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, nezinyoni, futhi zonke izidalwa ezihamba phezu komhlaba, ngezinhlobo zazo, kwaphuma emkhunjini.

【ezintathu】 I-Rainbow Peace Pact

( Qaphela: " uthingo "Isikhombisa" iyinombolo ephelele, efanekisela insindiso kaNkulunkulu ephelele yesintu Iwukuhlengwa ngeNdodana Yakhe ethandekayo, uJesu Kristu. umkhumbi ] uyisiphephelo nomuzi wokuphephela, futhi “umphongolo” ufanekisela ibandla leTestamente Elisha - ibandla lobuKristu. uyangena" umkhumbi "Ngena nje" uKristu" --Uma usemkhunjini, ukuKristu! Ngaphandle koMphongolo kunezwe, njengoba nje u-Adamu axoshwa eNsimini yase-Edene, futhi ngaphandle kweNsimu yase-Edene kukhona umhlaba. Ku-Adamu nikhona: ezweni, esonweni, phansi komthetho nesiqalekiso somthetho, nilele phansi kwesandla somubi, nasemandleni obumnyama eHayidese kuphela, “emkhunjini” kuKristu; Embusweni weNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo kuphela, eNsimini yase-Edene, “ipharadesi ezulwini”, ungaba nokuthula, injabulo, nokuthula! Ngoba ngeke kusaba khona ukuqalekisa, ukulila, ukukhala, ubuhlungu, ukugula ngeke kusaba, nendlala! Amen.

UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano noNowa nenzalo yakhe I-Rainbow Peace Pact ",yebo Ifanekisela [isivumelwano esisha] uJesu Kristu asenza nathi , uyisivumelwano sokubuyisana nokuthula phakathi kukaNkulunkulu nomuntu! Lapho uNowa enikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa, uJehova uNkulunkulu wezwa iphunga elimnandi, wathi: “Ngeke ngisawuqalekisa umhlaba ngenxa yomuntu, futhi ngeke ngiphinde ngibhubhise isidalwa esiphilayo ngenxa yomuntu.” Kuyo yonke imihla yomhlaba, uJehova akasoze ayeka izitshalo, ukushisa, ubusika, ihlobo, imini nobusuku. Lokho kusho ukuthi: “Isivumelwano esisha phakathi kukaJesu Kristu nathi siyisivumelwano somusa , ngoba siphiwe umusa wokuba kuKristu, uNkulunkulu ngeke esazikhumbula izono zethu neziphambeko zethu! Amen. Ngeke kusaba khona iziqalekiso esikhathini esizayo, ngoba ngeke sakhe phezu kwesihlahla sokuhle nokubi; ungapheli! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - Heberu 10:17-18 kanye nesAmbulo 22:3.

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen

Savula iBhayibheli [Genesise 2:15-17] futhi safunda ndawonye: UJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isivumelwano" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! " Owesifazane oqotho "Ibandla lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Bazosiphakela ukudla kwasezulwini okungokomoya ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kwande. Amen! Nkosi! iyaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli futhi sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya: Qonda isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu sokuphila nokufa kanye nensindiso no-Adamu !

Lemikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, kanye nezibusiso kwenziwa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

【 eyodwa 】 Ensimini yase-Edene uNkulunkulu ubusisa isintu

Asifunde iBhayibheli [uGenesise 2 Isahluko 4-7] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Isiqalo sokudalwa kwezulu nomhlaba, lapho uJehova uNkulunkulu edala izulu nomhlaba, kwakunje kwakungakabikho tshani endle, nemifino yasendle yayingakamili; wamanzisa izwe. UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. (Genesise 1:26-30) UNkulunkulu wathi: “Masenze abantu ngomfanekiso wethu, basifuze, babuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezinkomo ezisemhlabeni, naphezu kwakho konke. umhlaba nakho konke okukuwo “UNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, wabadala ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu; UNkulunkulu wababusisa, wathi kubo: “Zalani, nande, nigcwalise umhlaba, niwunqobe, nibuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezilwanyana zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni. .” UNkulunkulu wathi: “Bhekani, ngininikile yonke imifino ethela imbewu, esebusweni bomhlaba, nemithi yonke ethela izithelo enembewu kuyo ukuba ibe ngukudla, nezilwane zomhlaba nezinyoni zezulu; nezilwanyana zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ngazinika utshani obuluhlaza.

(Genesise 2:18-24) UJehova uNkulunkulu wathi: “Akukuhle ukuba umuntu ahlale yedwa; waziletha kumuntu, bheka ukuthi ungubani igama lakhe. Lokho umuntu azibiza ngakho isidalwa esiphilayo ngasinye, yilelo gama laso. Umuntu waziqamba amagama zonke izinkomo, nezinyoni zezulu, nezilwane zasendle; UJehova uNkulunkulu wamehlisela ubuthongo obunzima, walala; UJehova uNkulunkulu wakha owesifazane ngobambo ayeluthathile kumuntu, wamyisa kumuntu. Yathi indoda: "Lo uyithambo lamathambo ami nenyama yenyama yami. Ungambiza ngokuthi ngowesifazane, ngokuba uthathwe endodeni." . Izithandani zazinqunu ngaleso sikhathi futhi zingenawo amahloni.

【 ezimbili 】 UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano no-Adamu ensimini yase-Edene

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli [Genesise 2:9-17] futhi silifunde ndawonye: UJehova uNkulunkulu wenza ngomhlabathi yonke imithi ebukekayo nesithelo sayo esihle ukudliwa. Nasensimini kwakukhona umuthi wokuphila nomuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi. Kwaphuma umfula e-Edene wokunisela insimu; kusukela lapho wahlukana waba imisele emine: igama lowokuqala laliyiPishoni, owawuzungeza izwe lonke laseHavila. Kwakukhona igolide lapho, negolide lalelo zwe lalilungile; Igama lomfula wesibili yiGihoni, ezungeza izwe lonke laseKushe. Umfula wesithathu wawuthiwa iTigrisi, futhi ugeleza ngasempumalanga kwase-Asiriya. Umfula wesine yi-Ewufrathe. UJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” Phawula: UJehova uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano no-Adamu! Ukhululekile ukudla kuyo yonke imithi yasensimini yase-Edene , Kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa. ")

【 ezintathu 】 Ukwephulwa kwesivumelwano sika-Adamu nensindiso kaNkulunkulu

Masifunde iBhayibheli [uGenesise 3:1-7] bese siliphenya: Inyoka yayinobuqili kunazo zonke izilwane zasendle abezenzile uJehova uNkulunkulu. Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: "Ingabe uNkulunkulu ushilo ngempela ukuthi anivunyelwe ukudla emithini yasensimini?" phakathi nensimu." , UNkulunkulu wathi, 'Ningadli kuwo, futhi ningathinti, funa nife.'" Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: "Aniyikufa nokufa, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyazi. ukuze mhla nisidla kuwo amehlo enu avuleke, nibe njengoNkulunkulu, nazi okuhle nokubi. Kwathi owesifazane ebona ukuthi isithelo somuthi sasilungele ukudliwa, futhi siyabukeka emehlweni, nokuthi sihlakaniphisa abantu, wathatha esithelweni sawo wadla, wanika umyeni wakhe, naye wadla. . . Ayesevuleka amehlo abo bobabili, babona ukuthi bahamba ze, bazenzela amahlamvu omkhiwane, bazenzela iziketi. Amavesi 20-21 u-Adamu waqamba umkakhe ngokuthi u-Eva, ngokuba wayengunina wazo zonke izinto eziphilayo. UJehova uNkulunkulu wenzela u-Adamu nomkakhe iziphuku zesikhumba, wabembathisa.

Owesifazane uEva uwumfanekiso ibandla -" umakoti ", umakoti kaKristu ! U-Eva ungunina wazo zonke izinto eziphilayo, futhi ufanekisela unina weJerusalema lasezulwini leTestamente Elisha! articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Uthi "Emanuweli", "Emanuweli" nsuku zonke!

Lisho ukuthini elithi “Emmanuel”?

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Emmanuel" , ake sivule iBhayibheli ku-Isaya 7:10-14 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Khona-ke uJehova wakhuluma ku-Ahazi, wathi: “Cela isibonakaliso kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho: noma ekujuleni noma ekujuleni ” kusho u-Ahazi, “angiyikumvivinya uJehova.” Wathi u-Isaya: “Lalelani nina ndlu kaDavide! UNkulunkulu udiniwe yini? Ngakho-ke iNkosi uqobo iyakuninika isibonakaliso: intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana, ibizwe ngokuthi u-Imanuweli (okusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu unathi).

NgokukaMathewu 1:18, 22-23 Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kulotshwe kanje: Unina uMariya wayemiselwe uJosefa, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba bashade, uMariya wakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. Zonke lezi zinto zenzeka ukuze kugcwaliseke okwashiwo iNkosi ngomprofethi ukuthi: “Intombi iyokhulelwa, izale indodana, bayoqamba igama layo ngokuthi u-Emanuweli (okusho ukuthi “uNkulunkulu noNkulunkulu”) Sikulokhu ndawonye.")
[Qaphela]: Ngokutadisha imibhalo engenhla, sibhala → ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu, owakhulelwa yintombi uMariya evela kuMoya oNgcwele Zonke lezi zinto zafezwa ukuze "kugcwalise" amazwi eNkosi ngomprofethi "Isaya", ethi: "Lapho Intombi iyokhulelwa izale indodana; bayoyiqamba ngokuthi u-Imanuweli.

articles.title: Ukuphila Okuphakade 3 kwenza wonke umuntu okholwayo athole ukuphila okuphakade kuKristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo* Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Ake sivule ibhayibheli kuJohane Isahluko 3 Amavesi 15-16 “ UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuze wonke umuntu okholwa yiyo angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa nguye abe nokuphila okuphakade (noma kuhunyushwa ngokuthi: ukuze wonke okholwa kuye abe nokuphila okuphakade kuye) Amen.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "ukuphila okuphakade" Cha. 3 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi wonke umuntu okholwayo angaba nokuphila okuphakade kuJesu Kristu . Amen!

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Ukuze wonke umuntu okholwayo abe nokuphila okuphakade kuKristu

Masifunde uJohane 3 Isahluko 15-18 eBhayibhelini futhi silifunde ndawonye: Ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa Kuye abe nokuphila okuphakade (noma okuhunyushwe: ukuze wonke okholwa kuye abe nokuphila okuphakade). “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. ; (okufanayo ngezansi), ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye; kaNkulunkulu.

“Owasezulwini uphezu kwakho konke; ovela emhlabeni ungowomhlaba, nokukhuluma kwakhe kuphuma emhlabeni. Owasezulwini uphezu kwakho konke, ufakaza ngalokho akubonayo nakuzwayo; Kodwa kakho owabamukelayo ubufakazi bakhe, wabeka uphawu, etshengisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uqinisile, ngoba othunywe nguNkulunkulu ukhuluma ilizwi likaNkulunkulu. UNkulunkulu umnike uMoya oNgcwele ngokungenamkhawulo. UYise uyayithanda iNdodana futhi unikele zonke izinto ezandleni zayo umbhalo awukona ukuphila okuphakade), futhi ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luhlezi phezu kwakhe.”— Johane 3:31-36 .

( 2 ) Ngokuphila kweNdodana kaNkulunkulu, kukhona ukuphila okuphakade

Lo nguJesu Kristu oweza ngamanzi nangegazi, kungengamanzi odwa kodwa ngamanzi negazi, efakaza ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngokuba uMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso. Bathathu abafakazayo: uMoya oNgcwele, namanzi, negazi, futhi laba abathathu bamunye. Njengoba samukela ubufakazi babantu, kufanele samukele ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu ngisho nangokwengeziwe (kufanele sithole: umbhalo wasekuqaleni mkhulu), ngoba ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu bubeNdodana Yakhe. Lowo okholwa eNdodaneni kaNkulunkulu unalobu bufakazi kuye; Lobu bufakazi buwukuthi uNkulunkulu usiphile ukuphila okuphakade, futhi lokhu kuphila okuphakade kuseNdodaneni yakhe. Uma umuntu eneNdodana kaNkulunkulu, unokuphila; uma engenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, akanakho ukuphila. — 1 Johane 5:6-12

( 3 ) ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade

Nginilobela lezi zinto nina enikholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade. …Siyazi futhi ukuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu isifikile, yasinika ukuhlakanipha ukuze simazi oweqiniso, futhi sikuye oweqiniso, iNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu. Lona unguNkulunkulu weqiniso nokuphila okuphakade. — 1 Johane 5:13, 20

[Qaphela]: Sifunda umbhalo ongenhla → "Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Ngokuba uNkulunkulu akayithumanga iNdodana emhlabeni ukuba ilahle izwe. Noma kuhunyushwe ngokuthi: Yahlulelani izwe ngezansi), ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye → ukuze wonke umuntu okholwayo abe nokuphila okuphakade kuJesu Kristu Labo abakholelwa eNdodaneni bayoba nokuphila okuphakade, labo abangakholelwa eNdodaneni ngeke bakuthole ukuphila okuphakade → NoMoya oNgcwele, amanzi negazi kufakaza → Labo abaneNdodana kaNkulunkulu bayoba nokuphila okuphakade → Amen. Nina enikholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade ! Amen.

articles.title: Ukuphila Okuphakade 1 Sindiswa futhi ube nokuphila okuphakade
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli ku-Isaya Isahluko 45 Amavesi 21-22 Niyakusho, niveze imibono yenu, nibavumele babonisane bodwa. Ngubani owalibonisa kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo? Ngubani owakutshela endulo? Angisiye uJehova na? akakho uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami; Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "ukuphila okuphakade" Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Wonke umuntu osemikhawulweni yomhlaba kufanele abheke kuKristu, futhi uyosindiswa futhi abe nokuphila okuphakade ! Amen.

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Bheka kuKristu futhi uzosindiswa

Inkosi ayinakunqoba ngenxa yamabutho ayo amaningi; Kuyize ukuthembela emahhashini ukuze asindise abantu ngenxa yamandla awo amakhulu. — IHubo 33:16-17
AmaHubo 32:7 Wena uyindawo yami yokucasha; (Sela)
AmaHubo 37:39 Kepha ukusindiswa kwabalungileyo kuvela kuJehova;
AmaHubo 108:6 Siphendule usisindise ngesandla sakho sokunene, ukuze labo obathandayo basindiswe.
U-Isaya Isahluko 30 Ivesi 15 Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, ithi: “Ekubuyeni kwenu nasekuphumuleni kwenu kukhona amandla enu ngokuthula nangokuthula;
U-Isaya 45:22 Bhekani kimi nina nonke mikhawulo yomhlaba, niyakusindiswa, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu akakho omunye.
KwabaseRoma 10:9 Uma uvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuthi uJesu uyiNkosi, ukholwa enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamvusa kwabafileyo, uyakusindiswa.
KwabaseRoma 10:10 Ngokuba umuntu uyakholwa ngenhliziyo, alungisiswe, ngomlomo uyavuma, asindiswe.
KwabaseRoma 10:13 Ngokuba “yilowo nalowo obiza igama leNkosi uyakusindiswa.”
KwabaseFilipi 1:19 Ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kuzongiphumelelisa ekusindisweni kwami ngemikhuleko yenu nangosizo lukaMoya kaJesu Kristu.

[Qaphela]: Ngokutadisha imibhalo engenhla, uNkulunkulu wathi: “Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba mina nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye. Amen! → “Ekubuyeni kwakho nasekuphumuleni kwakho kuyakuba-khona insindiso ngokuthula kuyoba amandla akho "Ukuphumula, ukuthula nokuthula" → ngena esithembisweni sokuphumula kwakhe → ubethelwe esiphambanweni noKristu, ungcwatshwe, uvuswe futhi ungene ekuphumuleni, okuwukuphumula kuJesu Kristu ngale ndlela, uyazi Ingabe uyaqonda? Bheka kumaHeberu isahluko 4 ivesi 1.

Uma uvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuthi uJesu uyiNkosi futhi ukholelwa enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamvusa kwabafileyo, uyosindiswa → ngoba umuntu angalungisiswa ngokukholwa ngenhliziyo yakhe futhi asindiswe ngokuvuma ngomlomo wakhe. “Obiza igama leNkosi uyakusindiswa. → Ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi ngemithandazo yenu nangosizo loMoya kaJesu Kristu, lokhu ekugcineni kuyoholela ensindisweni yami. Amen

( 2 ) INkosi esithembisa yona ingukuphila okuphakade

“UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, Ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa kuye angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade . Ngoba uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana Yakhe emhlabeni, ingasi ukuba yahlulele umhlaba (noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi: ukwahlulela izwe; yona ngezansi), kodwa ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye. — Johane 3:16-17

Okholwa eNdodaneni unokuphila okuphakade ; ongakholwa eNdodaneni kayikubona ukuphila okuphakade, kodwa ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luhlezi phezu kwakhe. — Johane 3:36
Johane 6:40 ngoba uBaba uthanda ukuze loba ngubani obona iNdodana akholwe yiyo abe lempilo elaphakade , futhi mina ngiyomvusa ngosuku lokugcina. "
NgokukaJohane 6:47 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Okholwayo unokuphila okuphakade .
Johane 6:54 Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade , mina ngiyakumvusa ngosuku lokugcina.
Johane 10:28 mina ngizinika ukuphila okuphakade , azisoze zabhubha naphakade, futhi akekho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami.
NgokukaJohane 12:25 Othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho;
Johane 17:3 Yazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, futhi Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade, ukwazi uJesu Kristu omthumileyo .

[Qaphela] : Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi → INkosi isithembisa ukuphila okuphakade! Ukuthola kanjani ukuphila okuphakade→ 1 Lokhu kungukuphila okuphakade: ukwazi wena, owukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso, noJesu Kristu omthumileyo → 2 Okholwa eNdodaneni unokuphila okuphakade; 3 Labo abadla inyama "kaJesu" futhi baphuze igazi "likaJesu" bayothola ukuphila okuphakade uJesu uyosivusa kwabafileyo ngosuku lokugcina→ 4 Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa kaJesu kanye nevangeli uyosindisa ukuphila kwakhe futhi azuze ukuphila kukaJesu Kristu→ Londoloza ukuphila kube ukuphila okuphakade ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ihubo: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukuze useshe ngesiphequluli sakho - ibandla lenkosi ujesu kristu -Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Uma ususindisiwe, awusoze wabhubha, kodwa ube nokuphila okuphakade
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane Isahluko 10 Amavesi 27-28 Izimvu zami ziyalizwa izwi lami, nami ngiyazazi, futhi ziyangilandela. mina ngizinika ukuphila okuphakade azisoze zabhubha, akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Uma ususindisiwe, ukuphila okuphakade" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zakhe, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya→ Labo abaqondayo ukuthi uJesu wanikela ngomhlatshelo wesono kwaba kanye bangangcweliswa ingunaphakade, basindiswe phakade, futhi babe nokuphila okuphakade.

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Inhlawulo kaKristu yezono kanye kuphela yenza labo abangcwelisiwe baphelele phakade

KumaHeberu 7:27 Wayengafani nabapristi abakhulu ababefanele ukunikela imihlatshelo imihla ngemihla ngenxa yezono zabo siqu, andukuba banikele ngezono zabantu, ngokuba ngokuzinikela kwakhe kube kanye, ukufezile lokho.
KumaHeberu 10:11-12, 14 Wonke umpristi omi usuku nosuku ekhonza uNkulunkulu, enikela ngomhlatshelo ofanayo ngokuphindaphindiwe, angeze asusa isono. Kodwa uKristu wanikela ngomhlatshelo owodwa waphakade ngenxa yezono futhi wahlala ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu. …Ngokuba ngomhlatshelo munye ubenza baphelele phakade abangcwelisiweyo.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, singabona ukuthi uKristu wanikela “munye” umnikelo wesono waphakade, ngaleyo ndlela ephelelisa “umnikelo wesono” →

buza: Kuyini ukuphelela?
impendulo: Ngoba uKristu wenza inhlawulo yaphakade yezono → indaba yokubuyisana nemihlatshelo → "wayeka".
“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakho nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isono, ukuhlanzwa, ukuhlanza, nokwenza ukubuyisana ngesono. “Ukwenza ukubuyisana”, ukwethula (noma ukuhumusha: ukwambula) ukulunga okuphakade → "ukwethula ukulunga kukaKristu okuphakade nokuphila okungenasono", ukuvala umbono nesiprofetho, nokugcoba oNgcwele (noma: noma ukuhumusha) kanje , uyasiqonda ngokucacile isikhombo - Daniyeli Isahluko 9 Ivesi 24
→ Ngenxa "kaKristu," umhlatshelo Wakhe owodwa wenza labo abangcwelisiwe baphelele phakade →

buza: Ubani ongangcweliswa kuze kube phakade?
impendulo: Ukukholelwa ukuthi uKristu wanikela ngomnikelo wesono ngenxa yezono zethu kuyokwenza labo “abangcwelisiwe” baphelele phakade →Kungani? →Ngoba umuntu wethu omusha "uzelwe kabusha" "uyithambo lamathambo nenyama yenyama" kaKristu, amalungu omzimba wakhe, umzimba nokuphila kukaJesu Kristu! Ukuphila kwethu okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu kufihliwe kanye noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 2 ) Umuntu omusha ozelwe uNkulunkulu → akayena owomuntu omdala

Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseRoma 8:9 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

[Qaphela]: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu “uhlezi” kuwe, okusho ukuthi, “umuntu omusha” uzelwe nguNkulunkulu, awusekho enyameni, okusho ukuthi “umuntu omdala wenyama”. →“Umuntu omusha” ozalwa nguNkulunkulu akayena “owomuntu omdala” wenyama; “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ungokaMoya oNgcwele! Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

→Lona nguNkulunkulu kuKristu ebuyisana nezwe, “engabaleli” →iziphambeko zenyama yabo “yomuntu omusha” wabo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, ebeka kubo izwi lokubuyisana, Amen! 5:19

( 3 ) Uma ususindisiwe, awusoze wabhubha, kodwa ube nokuphila okuphakade

KumaHebheru 5:9 Manje njengoba esephelelisiwe, useba umthombo “wensindiso yaphakade” kubo bonke abamlalelayo.
NgokukaJohane 10:27-28 Izimvu zami ziyalizwa izwi lami, nami ngiyazazi, ziyangilandela. Futhi ngizinika ukuphila okuphakade → "Azisoze zabhubha", futhi akekho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami. “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade

[Qaphela]: Njengoba uKristu esephelelisiwe, usephenduke umthombo wensindiso yaphakade kubo bonke abalalelayo “wabethelwa esiphambanweni, wafa, wembelwa, wavuswa kanye noKristu. Amen! →UJesu usinika ukuphila okuphakade →Labo abakholwa Kuye "ngeke babhubhe naphakade". Amen! → Uma umuntu eneNdodana kaNkulunkulu, unokuphila uma engenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, akanakho ukuphila. Nginilobela lezi zinto nina enikholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade. Amen! Isikhombo-1 Johane 5:12-13

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Uchofoza lesi sihloko ukuze ufunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukwamukela futhi "ukholelwe" kuJesu Kristu njengoMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, singathandaza ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izofela esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu" → 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! Futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Ukukhumula indoda endala nezenzo zayo yavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Esikhathini esizayo, sizozuza ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Thandaza egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

articles.title: Insindiso 3 Kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele, uyakusindiswa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku Isahluko 16 Ivesi 16 Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Kulondoloziwe" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya→ Labo abaqondayo ukuthi bakholelwa “indlela yeqiniso nevangeli” futhi babhapathizwe “ngoMoya oNgcwele” ngokuqinisekile bayosindiswa; ongakholwayo uyakulahlwa .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele, futhi uyakusindiswa

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uMarku 16:16 ndawonye: Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa;

[Qaphela]: Kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe → uzosindiswa

buza:" Kusho ukuthini “ukholo”?
impendulo: “Kholwa” kusho “kholwa evangelini, qonda indlela yeqiniso → kholwa endleleni yeqiniso”! Sengivele ngikhulumile futhi ngabelana nani ukuthi liyini ivangeli nokuthi iyini indlela yeqiniso.

buza: Lapha "kholwa futhi ubhapathizwe" kusho ubhapathizo lwamanzi? Noma ubhapathizo lukaMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Kungukubhapathizwa “kaMoya oNgcwele”! Amen

buza: Ungaluthola kanjani ubhapathizo luka "Moya oNgcwele"? Noma “uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe”?
impendulo: 1 Qondani indlela yeqiniso - kholwani endleleni yeqiniso, 2 Kholwani evangelini - ivangeli elisindisayo!
Lapho uzwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho, futhi ukholelwa kuKristu, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. Inkomba - Efesu 1:13-14 . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 2 ) UMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe ubhapathizwa yiNkosi uJesu uqobo

NgokukaMarku 1:4 Ngokunjalo kwafika uJohane wabhapathiza ehlane, eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono.
NgokukaMathewu 3:11 Mina nginibhapathiza ngamanzi kukho ukuphenduka; Kodwa lowo oza emva kwami unamandla amakhulu kunami, futhi angifaneleki ngisho nokuphatha izimbadada zakhe. Uyokubhapathiza → "UMoya oNgcwele nomlilo."
NgokukaJohane 1:32-34 UJohane wafakaza futhi: “Ngabona uMoya oNgcwele ehla njengejuba evela ezulwini, wahlala phezu kwakhe, kodwa lowo owangithuma ukuba ngibhapathize ngamanzi wathi kimi: “Lowo ombonayo uMoya oNgcwele ehla ahlale phezu kwakhe nguye obhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele.”

Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

articles.title: Insindiso 2 Kholwa evangelini futhi usindiswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Korinte 15, amavesi 3-4, futhi sifunde ndawonye: Enganinikela khona futhi: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi wembelwa, nokuthi wavuka futhi ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo kufanele nisindiswe ngokukholwa kuleli vangeli . Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Kulondoloziwe" Cha. 2 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya→ Uma uqonda ivangeli, uzosindiswa ngokukholwa evangelini! Amen .

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【 eyodwa 】 Liyini ivangeli?

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uLuka 4:18-19 ndawonye: “UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele izindaba ezinhle kwabampofu, ungithumile ukuba ngimemezele ukukhululwa kwabathunjwa vula izimpumputhe ukubona, ukukhulula abacindezelwe, ukumemezela umnyaka womusa kaNkulunkulu.”

[Qaphela]: Lona iNdodana kaNkulunkulu→uJesu Kristu “ushumayela” ivangeli lombuso→ 1 “Abathunjwa” bayakhululwa, 2 "Izimpumputhe" kufanele zibone, 3 Ukukhulula labo “abacindezelweyo” nokumemezela unyaka wejubili owamukelekayo kaNkulunkulu. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

【 ezimbili 】 Okuqukethwe okuyinhloko kwevangeli

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli futhi sifunde 1 KwabaseKorinte 15:3-4 ndawonye: Ngoba lokho enganinika kona futhi: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu futhi wembelwa njengokwemiBhalo futhi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu iBhayibheli.
[Qaphela] : Umphostoli “uPawulu” wathi: “Ivangeli” engalamukela ngase ngilishumayeza: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokweBhayibheli;

( 1 ) ekhululekile esonweni

Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasishukumisela; ngoba sicabanga ukuthi njengoba “uKristu” afela bonke, bonke bafa → ngoba owafa “ukhululiwe” esonweni → “bonke” bafa, “bonke” Bonke bakhululiwe kuso. isono. Amen! →Labo "abakholwayo" bakhululiwe esonweni abalahlwa; Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka ku-2 Korinte 5:14, Roma 6:7, noJohane 3:18.

( 2 ) Ngikhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo

Roma 7:4, 6 Bazalwane bami, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe-ngababanye... Kepha njengoba safa kuwo umthetho esiboshwe ngawo Manje sesikhululiwe emthethweni, ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela yakudala yesiko.
KwabaseGalathiya 3:13 UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, esenziwe isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu;
Futhi wangcwatshwa →

KwabaseKolose 3:9 Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo.
AbangabakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo. — Galathiya 5:24
Futhi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokusho kweBhayibheli.

( 4 ) Senze sibe ngabalungileyo, silungisiswe, singcweliswe

articles.title: Insindiso 1 Kholwa ngendlela yeqiniso, qonda indlela yeqiniso futhi usindiswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Thesalonika Isahluko 2 Ivesi 13 Kufanele simbonge uNkulunkulu ngaso sonke isikhathi ngani, bazalwane abathandwa yiNkosi, ngoba yanikhetha kwasekuqaleni ukuze nisindiswe ngokungcweliswa kukaMoya oNgcwele ngokukholwa ekukholweni. 1 Thimothewu Isahluko 2:4 ufisa ukuba bonke abantu basindiswe futhi bafinyelele olwazini lweqiniso.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " usindiswe 》Cha. 1 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya→ Qonda indlela yeqiniso, kholelwa endleleni yeqiniso futhi usindise! Amen .

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Sibheke Enyokeni Yethusi Ukuze Sisindiswe eTestamenteni Elidala

Masifunde iBhayibheli kuNumeri 21:8-9 uJehova wathi kuMose: “Yenza inyoka enesihlungu uyibeke esigxotsheni. Olunywe yinyoka uyakuphila nxa ebheka inyoka yethusi.

[Qaphela]: Lapha sibheka 'inyoka yethusi' → Ithusi: ithusi elikhanyayo - bheka isAmbulo 1:15 . Ifanekisela insindiso kaKristu → UKristu "wasifela waba yisiqalekiso futhi walengiswa esigxotsheni. → Noma ubani obheka "inyoka yethusi" ubheka uMsindisi, futhi "ubuthi benyoka" emizimbeni yabo kuthiwa bubangelwa inhlamba "inyoka yethusi" Uqalekisiwe ngalendlela, abantu abalunywe izinyoka bayophila uma bebuka le nyoka yethusi Uyaqonda kahle.

( 2 ) ITestamente Elisha Bheka KuKristu Ukuze Uthole Insindiso

Masifunde iBhayibheli u-Isaya Isahluko 45 Ivesi 22 Mababheke kimi, yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba, futhi bayosindiswa; ngoba nginguNkulunkulu, futhi akakho omunye. 1 Thimothewu Isahluko 2:4 ufisa ukuba bonke abantu basindiswe futhi bafinyelele olwazini lweqiniso.

[Qaphela]: Wonke umuntu emikhawulweni yomhlaba kufanele abheke kuMsindisi futhi “azi iqiniso” futhi uyosindiswa. Amen

buza: Iyini iTao?
impendulo: Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi “uTao” kwakunguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni.

buza: Singayiqonda kanjani indlela yeqiniso?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi
“ULizwi” waba yinyama, okungukuthi, “uNkulunkulu” waba yinyama → waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu! Igama elithi “Jesu” lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. Amen! →Wakhulelwa futhi wazalwa “ngoMoya oNgcwele” yintombi uMariya, futhi uyindodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke. Bheka uJohane 1:1-2, 14 noMathewu 1:21-23

Ngokuba njengoba abantwana behlanganyela igazi nenyama, naye ngokwakhe wahlanganyela khona lokho, ukuze ngokufa ambhubhise yena onamandla okufa onguSathane, akhulule labo ababegqilazwe ukuphila kwabo konke. ngokwesaba ukufa. →NguKristu "owabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu →wasihlenga futhi wasikhulula: 1 ngaphandle kwesono, 2 Sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo, 3 Wakhumula ikhehla nezindlela zakhe zakudala wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → ukuze asenze sibe ngabalungileyo! Thola ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu. Amen! →Ngale ndlela, uKristu usebenzisa ukufa ngokuqondile ukuze “abhubhise” udeveli onamandla okufa, futhi akhulule labo phakathi kwethu ababeyizigqila zesono ukuphila kwethu konke ngenxa yokwesaba ukufa. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka amaHeberu 2:14-15 kanye neyoku-1 Korinte 15:3-4

( 3 ) Kholwa ngendlela yeqiniso, uqonde indlela yeqiniso futhi usindiswe

Lona → izwi leqiniso "uJesu Kristu" "insindiso" → ubheka kuJesu owafela esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → qonda ukuthi uKristu walengiswa esihlahleni futhi waqalekiswa: "ukuze asikhulule esonweni, esiphambanweni umthetho nomthetho" "Isiqalekiso somthetho, ukukhumula umuntu omdala nezindlela zakhe zakudala" → UJesu Kristu "uphinda azalwe" ngokuvuka kwabafileyo → Labo abaqonda leli "zwi leqiniso" bayosindiswa. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngemva kokuzwa “izwi leqiniso,” “ivangeli lensindiso,” futhi usukholwe kuKristu, wabekwa uphawu “ngoMoya oNgcwele” othenjisiwe. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. Isikhombo- Kwabase-Efesu 1:13-14

Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, wamukele ukutholwa njengendodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! articles.title: Ukusoka Kuyini ukusoka nokusoka kweqiniso?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo* Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 2 amavesi 28-29 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngokuba noma ubani ongumJuda ngokusobala akasuye umJuda weqiniso, nokusoka akusiye ongokwenyama. Yilabo abenziwa ngaphakathi kuphela abangamaJuda eqiniso; Udumo lwalo muntu aluveli kumuntu, kodwa luvela kuNkulunkulu

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ngamazwi kaNkulunkulu ndawonye "Kuyini ukusoka nokusoka kweqiniso?" 》Umkhuleko: “Baba oseZulwini othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi njalo! Ngiyabonga “wesifazane olungileyo” ngokuthumela izisebenzi ngezandla zabo ezibhale zakhuluma izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Isinkwa sinikelwa kithi esivela ezulwini ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu kokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli futhi sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya→ Ukuqonda ukuthi kuyini ukusoka nokusoka kweqiniso kuncike emoyeni .

Lemikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukunxusa, ukubonga, nezibusiso kwenziwa egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) kuyini ukusoka

(Genesise 17:9-10) Futhi uNkulunkulu wathi ku-Abrahama: “Wena nenzalo yakho niyogcina isivumelwano sami ezizukulwaneni zenu. Bonke abesilisa bakho bayakusokwa, lesi isivumelwano sami phakathi kwakho nenzalo yakho.

buza: Kuyini ukusoka?
impendulo: "Ukusoka" kusho ukusoka → Nina "abesilisa" kufanele nisokwe (umbhalo wokuqala uthi ukusoka Lobu ubufakazi besivumelwano phakathi kwami nawe - bheka uGenesise 17:11).

buza: Amadoda asokwa nini?

impendulo: Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ngemva kokuzalwa → Bonke abesilisa ezizukulwaneni zenu ezizukulwaneni zenu, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi bazalwa emndenini wakini noma abathengwa ngemali kubantu bangaphandle abangeyona inzalo yakho, kumelwe basokwe ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ngemva kokuzalwa kwabo. Bobabili abazalelwa endlini yakho nalabo obathenga ngemali yakho kufanele basokwe. Khona-ke isivumelwano sami siyomiswa enyameni yenu sibe yisivumelwano esiphakade—Bheka uGenesise 17:12-13

( 2 ) Kuyini ukusoka kweqiniso?

buza: Kuyini ukusoka kweqiniso?
impendulo: Ngokuba noma ubani ongumJuda ngokusobala akasuye umJuda weqiniso, nokusoka akusiye ongokwenyama. Yilabo abenziwa ngaphakathi kuphela abangamaJuda eqiniso; Ukudunyiswa kwalo muntu akuveli kumuntu, kodwa kuNkulunkulu. KwabaseRoma 2:28-29.

Qaphela: Ukusoka kwangaphandle akukona ukusoka kweqiniso "Kungani → Ngenxa yokuthi ukusoka kwangaphandle kuqoshwe enyameni, inyama yomuntu endala izowohloka kancane kancane ngenxa yokukhohliswa kwezifiso zobugovu futhi ibuyele othulini, okungekho lutho, futhi kunjalo hhayi ukusoka kweqiniso-- Bheka kwabase-Efesu 4:22

( 3 ) Ukusoka kweqiniso nguKristu

buza: Ngakho kuyini ukusoka kweqiniso?

impendulo: “Ukusoka kweqiniso” kusho ukuthi lapho uJesu esenezinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili ubudala, wamsoka umntwana futhi wamqamba ngokuthi uJesu; Isikhombo-Luka 2:21

buza: Kungani ukusoka “kukaJesu” kuwukusoka kweqiniso?

impendulo: Ngoba uJesu uyiZwi esesimweni somuntu noMoya esesimweni somuntu → Yena “ Lingcheng “Uma sidla, siphuze ukusoka kwakhe Inyama futhi Igazi , singamalungu akhe, Lapho esokwa, sasokwa! Ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka uJohane 6:53-57

AmaJuda asokile" Inhloso "Kusho ukuphendukela kuNkulunkulu, kodwa ukusokwa enyameni - Inyama ka-Adamu iyashabalala ngenxa yenkanuko futhi ayikwazi ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu, ngakho ukusoka enyameni akukhona ukusoka kweqiniso → ngoba labo abangamaJuda ngaphandle abawona amaJuda eqiniso; nokusoka akusikho enyameni yangaphandle Bheka kwabaseRoma 2:28 → Umthetho uyisithunzi. osokiwe Kuyisithunzi nje, ithunzi lisiholela ekugcwalisekeni " Umoya kaKristu waba umzimba futhi wasokwa ”→ Sithatha umoya siwufake emzimbeni kaKristu osokiwe siwufake ezinhliziyweni zethu →UJesu Kristu wasivusa kwabafileyo. Ngale ndlela, singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi sisokile ngempela! Kungaleso sikhathi kuphela lapho singabuyela kuNkulunkulu → Kubo bonke abamamukelayo, labo abakholwa egameni lakhe, ubanika igunya lokuba ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu. Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. Johane 1:12-13

→Ngakho" ukusoka kweqiniso "Kusenhliziyweni nasemoyeni! Uma sidla, siphuza inyama negazi leNkosi, singamalungu omzimba wayo, okungukuthi, sizelwe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, futhi sisokile. Amen! → Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Okuzalwa yinyama Okuzelwe yinyama; okuzelwe uMoya kungumoya - bheka uJohane 3 ivesi 6 → 1 kuphela labo abazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngezwi leqiniso levangeli, 3 ozelwe nguNkulunkulu Ukusoka kweqiniso lokho ! Amen

"Ukusoka kweqiniso" obuyela kuNkulunkulu ngeke akubone ukonakala futhi angathola ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu → bakhuthazele phakade futhi baphile phakade! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngakho-ke umphostoli uPawulu wathi → Ngoba noma ubani ongumJuda ngokusobala akayena umJuda weqiniso, nokusoka akusikho okubonakala enyameni. Yilabo abenziwa ngaphakathi kuphela abangamaJuda eqiniso; Ukudunyiswa kwalo muntu akuveli kumuntu, kodwa kuNkulunkulu. KwabaseRoma 2:28-29

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Uchofoza lesi sihloko ukuze ufunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukwamukela futhi "ukholelwe" kuJesu Kristu njengoMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, singathandaza ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izofela esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu" → 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! Futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Ukukhumula indoda endala nezenzo zayo yavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Esikhathini esizayo, sizozuza ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Thandaza egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: “Uvuko” Akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilela mina
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo* Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 2 ivesi 20 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " UKristu uphilela mina 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Sithuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Isinkwa sithathwa sivela kude ezulwini, futhi sinikezwa thina ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kwande! Amen . Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → ukuqonda. "Ngiphile" ukuze ngiphile u-Adamu, isoni, nesigqila sesono uKristu "wangifela," "wangcwatshwa" ngenxa yami → UKristu waphila ngomfanekiso kaKristu; kaKristu inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu uBaba ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

Manje akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilayo ngenxa yami

Ihubo: Ngabethelwa kanye noKristu

( 1 ) Ngibethelwe kanye noKristu

KwabaseRoma 6:5-6 Ngokuba uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuthi umzimba wesono. sibhujiswe, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe.
KwabaseGalathiya 5:24 AbakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko zayo.

Qaphela: Ngihlanganiswe noKristu, ngabethelwa esiphambanweni, ngafa, ngangcwatshwa futhi ngaphilela injongo efanayo→ 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo, 3 Susani ikhehla nezindlela zalo zakudala; 4 Ukuze silungisiswe futhi samukele ukuma kwamadodana kaNkulunkulu. Amen

( 2 ) Ngena Isithembiso Sakhe Sokuphumula

Ngoba ongena ekuphumuleni uphumule emisebenzini yakhe, njengoba nje noNkulunkulu waphumula kweyakhe. Hebheru 4 ivesi 10→

Qaphela: Ngabethelwa esiphambanweni noKristu ukuze "ngibhubhise" umzimba nokuphila okuvela ku-Adamu esonweni → Lokhu kuwukuphumula emsebenzini wami "wesono", njengoba nje uNkulunkulu aphumula "emsebenzini Wakhe wendalo" → ukungena ekuphumuleni!
Ngoba umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni, wafa, futhi wangcwatshwa noKristu → "umuntu omdala" umzimba wesono wangena ekuphumuleni savuswa kanye noKristu → "umuntu omusha" wangena kuKristu futhi wajabulela ukuphumula → "uMoya oNgcwele" wavuselelwa; futhi wakhela kimi → yebo uKristu “waphila” kimi → ngale ndlela, kumelwe kube “okunye ukuphumula kweSabatha” → kubekelwe abantu bakaNkulunkulu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kumaHeberu 4:9

Njengoba sisele nesithembiso sokungena ekuphumuleni Kwakhe, asesabe hleze omunye wethu (ekuqaleni, nina) abonakale esalela emuva. Ngokuba ivangeli lishunyayelwa kithi njengabo; ukuzethemba "ngalokho okuzwile" umgwaqo “Sixubile. Kepha thina esikholwayo siyakwazi ukufinyelela kulokho kuphumula, njengokuba uNkulunkulu esho: “Ngifungile ekuthukutheleni kwami ngathi: ‘Abayikungena ekuphumuleni kwami; ’” Eqinisweni, umsebenzi wokudala usuqediwe kusukela ekudalweni komhlaba—Izikhombo 4:1-3

( 3 ) UKristu uphilela mina, ngiphila njengoKristu

Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, futhi akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu uphila kimi; — KwabaseGalathiya isahluko 2 ivesi 20
Ngoba kimi, ukuphila kunguKristu, futhi ukufa kuyinzuzo. — Filipi 1:21

[Qaphela]: Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu asho → Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni noKristu, futhi manje akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilayo kimi.

buza: Ubumina bami obudala babethelwa esiphambanweni, bafa, futhi bangcwatshwa kanye noKristu;
impendulo: Ngoba ufile → "umuntu omdala wokuphila ufile" futhi ukuphila kwakho → "uzelwe ngokusha ngomuntu omusha wokuphila" kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isikhombo-Kolose Isahluko 3 Amavesi 3-4

→YiNkosi uJesu Kristu” okwe "Ukufa kithi sonke," okwe “Sonke sangcwatshwa; uKristu “wasenza kabusha” ngokuvuka kwakhe kwabafileyo → futhi manje Uzokwenza” okwe "Sonke siphila → uKristu" okwe "Wonke umuntu uphila ngoKristu nenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu uBaba! Akukhona ukuthi "siphila" uKristu → "niyaphila" → kodwa philani ngo-Adamu, philani izoni, philani izigqila zesono, futhi nithele izithelo zesono. .

Ngakho-ke, uma sihlanganiswe Naye ngokufana nokufa Kwakhe, futhi siyohlanganiswa Naye ngokufana nokuvuka Kwakhe → Manje “ngihlala” futhi ngiphumule kuKristu → Ngenziwa musha kuKristu “ngoMoya oNgcwele ” ohlala kimi Yakha→uKristu” okwe "Ngihlala→ 1 UKristu ophilayo uNkulunkulu uYise “uthola” inkazimulo + mina “ngithola” inkazimulo, 2 Ukuphila kukaKristu "uthola" umvuzo + kusho ukuthi "ngithola" umvuzo, 3 Ukuphila kukaKristu “ukuthola” umqhele+ kusho ukuthi “ngithola” umqhele, 4 UKristu “waphila” uvuko oluhle kakhulu kimi, okungukuthi, ukuhlengwa komzimba + lapho uKristu ebonakala okwesibili, imizimba yethu iyovuswa ngendlela enhle kakhulu! 5 UKristu uyabusa + ngibusa kanye noKristu! Amen! Haleluya! Ngale ndlela, ingabe uzimisele? Ngiyitholile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.02.03

articles.title: Incazelo yobunzima: Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami kanye nevangeli uyokusindisa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo* Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMarku isahluko 8 ivesi 35 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho, kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangevangeli uyakukusindisa. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye - incazelo yemibuzo enzima " Ulahlekelwe ukuphila kwakho, uzosindisa ukuphila okuphakade 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Thumelani izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiweyo nelikhulunywe ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu! Isinkwa sithathwa sivela kude ezulwini, futhi sinikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kwande! Amen Qonda ukuthi ngabethelwa esiphambanweni noKristu → ukulahlekelwa ukuphila okunesono "umphefumulo" ka-Adamu ngiyozuza ukuphila okungcwele okuphakade "umphefumulo" kaKristu! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

( 1 ) uthole ukuphila

NgokukaMathewu 16:24-25 UJesu wayesethi kubafundi bakhe: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe, noma umphefumulo wakhe; ngezansi) uyakulahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe;

( 2 ) izimpilo ezisindisiwe

NgokukaMarku 8:35 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho, kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli uyakukusindisa. —Bheka uLuka 9:24

( 3 ) Londoloza ukuphila kube ukuphila okuphakade

NgokukaJohane Isahluko 12 Ivesi 25 Othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; kepha ozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyakukulondela ukuphila okuphakade.
1 Petru Isahluko 1:9 Futhi namukele imiphumela yokholo lwenu, → "insindiso yemiphefumulo yenu." IHubo 86:13 Ngokuba mkhulu umusa wakho kimi;

[Qaphela]: INkosi uJesu yathi → Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe (ukuphila: noma okuhunyushwa ngokuthi "umphefumulo") "kimi" kanye "nevangeli" → 1 Uzoba nokuphila, 2 usindise izimpilo, 3 Londoloza ukuphila kube ukuphila okuphakade. Amen!

buza: Ukulahlekelwa ukuphila → "ukuphila" noma okuhunyushwe ngokuthi "umphefumulo" → ukulahlekelwa "umphefumulo"? Akashongo yini ukuthi ufuna “ukusindisa” imiphefumulo? Indlela → "ukulahlekelwa umphefumulo wakho"?
impendulo: Njengoba iBhayibheli lisho → “ukuzuza ukuphila” kusho “ukuzuza umphefumulo” futhi “ukusindisa ukuphila” kusho “ukusindisa umphefumulo” → Okokuqala kufanele sitadishe iBhayibheli Uyini “umphefumulo” ka-Adamu? uthuli lomhlabathi. Wadala umuntu, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe ukuphila

Waba isidalwa esiphilayo okuthiwa u-Adamu. →Umuntu ophilayo “onomoya” (umoya: noma okuhunyushwa ngokuthi inyama)”; u-Adamu ungumuntu ophilayo wenyama negazi. Inkomba - 1 Korinte 15:45 → Isambulo sikaJehova ngo-Israyeli. izisekelo zomhlaba , →INkosi “eyadala umoya ongaphakathi womuntu” yathi, bhekisela kuZakariya Isahluko 12 Ivesi 1→Ngakho “umzimba womphefumulo” ka-Adamu wadalwa, futhi “umzimba womphefumulo” owadalwa u-Adamu wawuseNsimini ka-Adamu. I-Edene Inyoka "ingcolile → ithengiswe esonweni - Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile? Inkomba - KwabaseRoma 7:14.

buza: INkosi uJesu iyisindisa kanjani imiphefumulo yethu?
impendulo: "UJesu" → Wabiza abantu nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: "Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele → Ngihlanganiswe noKristu futhi ngibethelwe "Injongo ":"Ukuphila Okulahlekile" → okungukuthi, ukuphila kokulahlekelwa "umphefumulo nomzimba" womuntu omdala u-Adamu nokwenza isono → ngoba noma ubani ofuna ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe (noma okuhunyushwe ngokuthi: umphefumulo; okufanayo ngezansi) uyolahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe; noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa "mina" kanye "nevangeli" Ukuphila okulahlekile →

1 Uyoba nokuphila→

buza: Ukuphila kukabani okuyozuzwa?

impendulo: Ukuthola impilo kaJesu Kristu→impilo (noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi: umphefumulo)→ukuthola "umphefumulo kaJesu Kristu". Amen! ;" Ngeke futhi “Buyisa” umphefumulo wemvelo ka-Adamu, indalo. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

2 Uma usindisa ukuphila kwakho, uyowusindisa umphefumulo wakho→ Uma umuntu eneNdodana kaNkulunkulu, unokuphila; uma engenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, akanakho ukuphila. Inkomba - 1 Johane 5:12 → Okusho ukuthi, ukuba "nokuphila kukaJesu" kuwukuba → "umphefumulo" kaJesu → unomphefumulo kaJesu Kristu → ukusindisa umphefumulo wakho! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Isexwayiso: Abantu abaningi abawufuni "umphefumulo kaKristu" babheke yonke indawo futhi babuze yonke indawo → Uphi umphefumulo wami? , uphi umphefumulo wami? okufanele ngikwenze? Ucabanga ukuthi laba bantu bayizintombi eziyiziwula akukuhle yini ukuthi unomphefumulo kaJesu Kristu? Ingabe umphefumulo owadalwa u-Adamu muhle?

buza: Ngenzenjani ngomphefumulo wami?

impendulo: INkosi uJesu yathi → "Ilahlekile, ilahliwe, ilahlekile"; umoya omusha "→ KukaKristu" umphefumulo ", umzimba omusha → umzimba kaKristu ! Amen. →Ngoba "umphefumulo kaKristu" ngokufa esiphambanweni → "umphefumulo wolungileyo" → Lapho uJesu enambitha (emukela) uviniga, wathi: " Kwenzekile ! "Wehlisa ikhanda wathi," umphefumulo “Kunikeni uNkulunkulu. Isikhombo - Johane 19:30

UJesu Kristu uyokwenza umphefumulo Ubaba Wokulethwa ngu-→ Phelisa umphefumulo olungileyo "! Awufuni? Ngitshele ukuthi "uyisiwula noma cha". Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kumaHeberu 12: 23

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Lowo othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyolahlekelwa “impilo yakhe endala,” kodwa ozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyokulondoloza. okusha “Ukuphila kube ukuphila okuphakade Amen

→ Kwangathi uNkulunkulu wokuthula angangcwelisa ngokuphelele! Futhi sengathi “umoya, umphefumulo nomzimba” wakho njengomuntu ozelwe ngokusha kungalondolozwa ungenasici ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Reference-1 Thesalonika Isahluko 5 Ivesi 23

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen
