articles.title: Incazelo yobunzima: Ingabe kwakuwukuvuka komzimba ka-Adamu ofayo noma ukuvuka komzimba kaKristu ongafi?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 8 ivesi 11 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kepha uma uMoya walowo owavusa uJesu kwabafileyo ehlala kini, yena owavusa uKristu Jesu kwabafileyo uyakuphilisa nemizimba yenu efayo ngoMoya wakhe owavusa uKristu Jesu kwabafileyo. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ngemibuzo nezimpendulo ndawonye ukuze imizimba yenu efayo ivuswe 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Thumelani izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiweyo lakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu! Isinkwa sithathwa sivela kude ezulwini, futhi siphiwa thina ngesikhathi esifaneleyo, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kwande. !Amen ! Qonda ukuthi “umzimba ofayo waphila” ungumzimba kaKristu akuwona umzimba ka-Adamu ofayo owaphila.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

( 1 ) ukuze imizimba yenu efayo ivuswe

buza: Uyini umzimba ofayo?
impendulo: Umzimba ofayo → njengoba umphostoli "uPawulu" ebiza → "umzimba wenyama negazi, umzimba wesono, umzimba ofayo, umzimba ongcolile, umzimba ongcolile, umzimba ongaphansi kokubola, ukubhujiswa, nokukhubazeka" → kubizwa ngokuthi umzimba ofayo. Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:24 nabaseFilipi 3:21+ njll.!

buza: “Umzimba wenyama” unesono, uyafa, futhi ungaphansi kokufa...ingabe “umzimba wenyama, umzimba ofayo” uyavuswa?
impendulo: UKristu “wathatha” umzimba ka-Adamu ofayo wawushintsha wafana nomzimba onesono ukuze usebenze njengomnikelo wesono - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:3 → UNkulunkulu wenza umzimba “kaKristu” ongenasono waba umzimba wesono ka-Adamu - bheka 2 KwabaseKorinte 5:21 kanye no-Isaya 53:6, inkokhelo yesono ukufa → "okuthiwa umzimba ofayo", uKristu "waba umzimba wesono ngenxa yethu" Kumele afe kanye →Ngale ndlela, lapho uKristu efika, Kuqediwe "Umthetho, inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, futhi ngosuku oyodla ngalo kuwo uyakufa nokufa. Bheka kwabaseRoma 6: 10 noGenesise 2: 17. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile? → U-Adamu no-Eva "Ungadli lokho enikudlayo" Isithelo somuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi. Owesifazane u-Eva uyithambo nenyama ka-Adamu. Owesifazane u-Eva ufanekisela ibandla. "Ibandla" lafa enyameni engasokile. "Umoya wokuphila." “ukuthi uJehova uNkulunkulu akuphefumulela ku-Adamu kuyoba khona esikhathini esizayo.

( 2 ) Ngumzimba womoya ovuswayo

Futhi "u-Adamu" kuhlwanyelwe Kungumzimba wenyama negazi,” ovusiwe "Yebo →" umzimba womoya ". Uma kukhona umzimba wenyama, kufanele kube nomzimba womoya. Inkomba - 1 Korinte 15:44 → "Umzimba kaJesu" uyiZwi elisenyameni, wakhulelwa futhi wazalwa “ngoMoya oNgcwele” yintombi uMariya → Ngakho-ke uJesu Kristu wafa ngokufa Umzimba ovusiwe kuKristu "ungumzimba womoya" Umzimba wethu ovusiwe kanye noKristu futhi "umzimba womoya".

Njalo lapho sidla isidlo seNkosi, sidla isinkwa seNkosi.” Umzimba ",phuza eNkosini" Igazi “Ukuphila→Ngale ndlela sinomzimba nokuphila kukaKristu, I Bangamalungu omzimba wakhe→ Kubuye kube ngumzimba nempilo engcwele, engenasono, engenasici, engenabala, engenakonakala → lena "impilo yami evuswe kanye noKristu"! usuku wesifazane" ibandla “Sifile ngeziphambeko nokungasoki kwenyama, kodwa kuKristu” ibandla “Phindile futhi. Amen! Ku-Adamu bonke bafa; kuKristu bonke bayaphiliswa. Ingabe uyakuqonda kahle lokhu?

Ngakho-ke → Lowo owavusa uKristu Jesu kwabafileyo futhi phila "Ezinhliziyweni zenu" UMoya oNgcwele ", ukuze imizimba yenu efayo ivuselelwe → NguMzimba kaKristu ophilayo futhi! Amen ; Awudalwanga ngothuli → "Umzimba ofayo, ofayo, owonakalayo, wenziwa uphile futhi. Uyakuqonda lokhu?"

Uma "umzimba odalwe ngothuli uphila" → uzoqhubeka ubola futhi ufe → kuphela lokho uNkulunkulu akuvuse okungakakuboni ukubola → ingabe lokhu "aziphikisani"? Ucabanga kanjalo? Bheka kubaPhostoli 13:37

( 3 ) ukuhunyushwa kabi →Futhi nenze imizimba yenu efayo iphile futhi

---Uma isisekelo sokuvuka kwakho noKristu singalungile~"uyobe unephutha kuzo zonke izinyathelo zendlela"---

Amasonto amaningi namuhla "awuhumushe kabi lo mbhalo ongcwele" futhi ithonya likhulu kakhulu → ngoba isisekelo sokuvuka kwakho noKristu asilungile → "isisekelo sokuvuka" asilungile, futhi "izenzo" zabadala, abefundisi, nabashumayeli ziyiphutha. lokho abakushoyo nabakushumayelayo kuyohlale kungalungile → Ngokwesibonelo, “enyameni yaba uLizwi”, bathi uJesu waba uLizwi → Singaba uLizwi “enyameni” ngokwethembela “kuMoya oNgcwele” → Singaba kanjani uLizwi ngokwethembela “ezimfundisweni zabo” Ukwenza “inyama ka-Adamu” ngokomthetho iba kuhle futhi yenze ubuhle benyama → Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi “ukulungisiswa ngemisebenzi - ukuphelela kwenyama”? uMoya oNgcwele nokupheleliswa ngenyama → "insindiso kaKristu, indlela kaNkulunkulu" , "iqiniso, nokuphila" kulahliwe futhi yawa emseni. Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? → Njengoba "uPawulu" asho. → Njengoba naqala ngoMoya oNgcwele, ingabe nisathembele enyameni ukuze niyiqedele Ingabe ningabantu abangenalwazi?

Emasontweni amaningi namuhla, futhi baphishekela ukushisekela → "izwi likaNkulunkulu" kanye "nokuphila", kodwa hhayi ngokolwazi lweqiniso → ngoba "abakwazi" ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu futhi bafuna ukumisa ukulunga kwabo, kodwa abazithobanga ekulungeni kukaNkulunkulu . Yeka usizi, yeka usizi! Isikhombo- KwabaseRoma 10:3

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano Uma sifa noKristu, sikholwa ukuthi sizophila kanye naye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Mngani Othandekayo! Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 6 nevesi 8 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma safa kanye noKristu, kufanele sikholwe ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. Kwabase-Efesu 2:6-7 Wasivusa, wasihlalisa kanye nathi ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu Jesu, ukuze ambulele izizukulwane ezizayo ingcebo yomusa wakhe omkhulu, umusa wakhe kithi kuKristu Jesu.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "siphambano" Cha. 8 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela emazulwini akude ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uma safa kanye noKristu, sizokholwa ukuthi siyohlala naye futhi sihlale naye ezulwini! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

Uma sifa kanye noKristu, nathi Xinbi hlala naye

( 1 ) Sikholelwa ekufeni, ukumbelwa nokuvuka kanye noKristu

buza: Sifa kanjani, singcwatshwe, futhi sivuka futhi noKristu?
impendulo: Kuvela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasishukumisela; ngoba sicabanga ukuthi njengoba oyedwa wafela bonke, bonke bafa → "uKristu" wafa - "bonke" bafa → lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi ukholo "bafa kanyekanye" futhi uKristu "wangcwatshwa" - " Bonke” bangcwatshwa → lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi ukholo “ukungcwatshwa kanyekanye”; uJesu Kristu “wavuswa kwabafileyo” → “bonke” nabo “bavuswa kwabafileyo” → lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi ukholo “baphila ndawonye”! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Inkomba - 2 Korinte 5:14 → Ukuvuka noKristu “uvuko kuKristu” hhayi ukuvuka kuka-Adamu. → Ku-Adamu bonke bayafa kanjalo kuKristu bonke bayakuphiliswa. Isikhombo - 1 Korinte 15:22

( 2 ) Imizimba yethu nezimpilo zethu ezivusiwe kufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

buza: Iphi imizimba yethu evusiwe neziphila manje?
impendulo: Siphila noKristu "emzimbeni nasekuphileni" → "sifihliwe" kuNkulunkulu noKristu, futhi sihlezi ndawonye ezulwini ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? → Lapho sasifile ngeziphambeko, wasenza siphile kanye noKristu (ngomusa nisindisiwe). Wasivusa futhi wasihlalisa ndawonye ezulwini noKristu Jesu - bheka kwabase-Efesu 2:5-6

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. —Bheka eyabaseKolose 3:3-4

( 3 ) Umzimba ka-Adamu wavuswa, izimfundiso ezingamanga
KwabaseRoma 8:11 Kepha uma uMoya walowo owavusa uJesu kwabafileyo ehlala kini, yena owavusa uKristu Jesu kwabafileyo uyakuphilisa nemizimba yenu efayo ngoMoya wakhe owavusa uKristu Jesu kwabafileyo ephila.

[Qaphela]: Uma “uMoya kaNkulunkulu” uhlala kithi, anisibo abenyama, kodwa ningokaMoya → okungukuthi, “aniyena owe” inyama eyavela ku-Adamu, umzimba wakhe owafa ngenxa yesono wabuyela othulini - Inkomba Genesise 3:19 KwabaseRoma 8:9-10 → “Umoya” “uphila” kimi ngoba uMoya kaKristu uhlala kithi! Amen. →Njengoba “singebona” emzimbeni ka-Adamu onesono, asiwona umzimba ka-Adamu ophinde waphila.

buza: Ingabe kwakungasho ukuthi imizimba yenu efayo yayiyovuswa?

impendulo: Umphostoli “uPawulu” wathi → 1 Ubani ongangisindisa kulo mzimba wokufa - Isikhombo - Roma 7:24, 2 “Kwembule “ukonakala nokufa” “kwembatha” umzimba kaKristu ongenakonakala → "Ukufa kugwinywe ngokunqoba" kuyogcwaliseka → ukuze lokhu "okufayo" kugwinywe ukuphila "okungafi" kukaKristu

buza: Kuyini ukungafi?
impendulo: Ungumzimba kaKristu → ekwazi lokhu kusengaphambili, ekhuluma ngokuvuka kukaKristu, wathi: “Umphefumulo wakhe awushiywanga eHayidesi, nenyama yakhe ayikubonanga ukubola.” Isikhombo-IzEnzo 2:31
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wabeka izono "zabantu bonke" kuKristu, okwenza uJesu ongenasono "abe" "isono" ngenxa yethu, lapho ubona "umzimba kaJesu" ulenga esihlahleni → "ngumzimba wakho wesono" → obizwa ngokuthi ufe kanye noKristu ngenxa “yokufayo, efayo, ekonakalayo” futhi angcwatshwe ethuneni nasothulini. → Ngakho-ke, umzimba wakho ofayo wenziwa uphile futhi → NguKristu "owathatha" umzimba ka-Adamu → Ubizwa ngokuthi umzimba ofayo, okungukuthi, wafa kanye kuphela ngenxa "yezono zethu", futhi umzimba kaKristu evusiwe futhi evuswa kwabafileyo; Ngakho, uyaqonda?

→Uma sidla futhi siphuza "inyama negazi leNkosi," sinomzimba nokuphila kukaKristu ngaphakathi kwethu → UJesu wathi, "Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama, niphuze igazi iNdodana yomuntu, akukho ukuphila kinina, odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade, mina-ke ngiyomvusa ngosuku lokugcina.

Isaziso: Izimfundiso zamasonto amaningi namuhla → Kholwa ukuthi "u-Adamu wayengumuntu ofayo futhi enesono futhi wavuswa" - ukukufundisa, lokhu kuyimfundiso engalungile kakhulu → Bafuna ukusebenzisa "inyama ukuze ibe iTao" noma bathembele emthethweni ukuze bahlakulele umhlaba wezwe "wenyama ukuba ube Tao" Neo-Confucianism kanye nezimiso zikufundisa, ngakho izimfundiso zabo zifana ncamashi nalezo ezisetshenziswa ubuTao ukuba abe ongafi nobuBuddha, ezifana ukutshalwa Sakyamuni ukuze abe Buddha Ngakho, do uyaqonda?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen

2021.01.30

articles.title: Isiphambano Inhloso yokuhlangana noKristu obethelwe esiphambanweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Ake sivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 6 ivesi 8, ivesi 4 Uma sifa kanye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " isiphambano 》Cha. 7 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo eziloba futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni, wafa, futhi wembelwa naye → 1. Esonweni, 2. Emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, 3. Kumuntu omdala nemikhuba yakhe. Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Iyini inhloso yokuthi ikhehla lethu lishone lingcwatshwe kanye nalo?

Masifunde iBhayibheli:

Roma 6:8, 4 Uma safa kanye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise.
KwabaseKolose 2:12 Nangcwatshwa kanye naye embhapathizweni, okungawo nani navuswa kanye naye ngokukholwa ukusebenza kukaNkulunkulu owamvusa kwabafileyo.

[Qaphela]: Uma safa kanye noKristu, kumelwe sikholwe ukuthi siyophila kanye naye

buza: Kungani ufe kanye noKristu;
impendulo: "Ukufa noKristu, ukulingana nokufa Kwakhe" → kuwukwamukela inkazimulo, umqhele, nomvuzo! Amen. Ngoba ukufa kukaJesu Kristu esiphambanweni kwakuwukufa okwakhazimulisa uNkulunkulu uBaba. Kanje, uyazwisisa?
Uma ufa kanye noKristu, uzokholwa ukuthi uzovuka kanye naye! →UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu →Umzimba wakhe "wawungekho" emhlabathini futhi " yima "Afile → Ngakho "umzimba wakhe" ungowasezulwini, awuwona owomhlaba, futhi awudalwanga ngothuli; U-Adamu "Umzimba" awe phansi “Abafileyo emhlabeni, ngakho u-Adamu, owadalwa ngothuli, waqalekiswa ngenxa ‘yesono’ futhi ekugcineni wabuyela othulini.”— Genesise 3:19

( 2 ) Umuntu wethu omdala uhlanganiswe noKristu - wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafa ndawonye

→Kumelwe futhi ushiye inhlabathi futhi "ume" ukuze ufe→"Injongo yokuma nokufa"→" Igazi "Phuma emzimbeni," ukuphila egazini "-Bheka kuLevitikusi 17:14 → Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: "Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli uyokusindisa! “Amen. Bheka kuMarku 8:35
Ngenxa yempilo ka-Adamu" Igazi "ingubo" inyoka “Ensimini yase-Edene ngcolisa Yebo, igciwane - yebo " onesono "Ukuphila → Sihlanganiswe noKristu futhi Sibethelwe" ukuma "Ukufa → "UJesu wachitha igazi, ngachitha igazi" ukuze afake u-Adamu ushevu Igazi "Ukugeleza okucacile kuyaphuma → bese" Faka “Ongcwele” uJesu Igazi ",leyo" Faka "Impilo kaJesu Kristu! Amen. Niyaqonda?

Saphuma ku-Adamu" Igazi "NoKristu" umfudlana ocacile "Phuma, ngaphansi kwesiphambano. Ngakho-ke kusukela manje ku-Adamu" Igazi "Akuyona eyami - kunjalo impilo ka-adam Akuyona eyami.

“Umzimba wethu onesono womuntu omdala” wangcwatshwa noKristu ethuneni, kusukela ku-Adamu. umzimba wesono “Buyelani othulini. →Ngale ndlela, sikhumula umuntu omdala nezindlela zakhe zakudala—Izikhombo KwabaseKolose 3:9

( 3 ) UJesu Kristu wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wasizala kabusha

→Sishayele Shintsha Umzimba, Shintsha Igazi! leyo Faka Umzimba nempilo kaKristu.

1 Petru 1:3 Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokwesihe sakhe esikhulu, usenze kabusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo.

Qaphela: uJesu Kristu kusukela" Ukuvuka kwabafileyo "→" ukuzalwa kabusha "Kithina → sidla futhi siphuze "umzimba" kanye "negazi" leNkosi → kukhona ngaphakathi kwethu umzimba kaKristu "futhi" ukuphila "-Khona manje" Faka Noma gqoka umuntu omusha, gqoka uKristu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? → Njengoba iNkosi uJesu yathi: "Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi nidle inyama yeNdodana yomuntu futhi niphuze igazi leNdodana yomuntu, aninakuphila kini. Lowo odla inyama yami, aphuze. igazi lami linokuphila okuphakade.” , ngiyomvusa ngosuku lokugcina.”— Johane 6:53-54 .
Ngakho sembelwa kanye naye ngokubhapathizelwa ekufeni, ukuze sihambe ekuphileni okusha, njengoba nje noKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo ngenkazimulo kaYise. Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano Indoda yethu endala yabethelwa kanye Naye
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 6 nevesi 6 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala babethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " isiphambano 》Cha. 6 Masikhuleke: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [iBandla] wathumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zakhe kanye “nevangeli lensindiso alishumayelayo lalethwa kude ezulwini ukuba sisinikeze lona ngesikhathi, ukuze thina sibe ukuphila okungokomoya kuningi kakhulu Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone iqiniso likamoya→ Qondani ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wahlanganiswa noKristu wabethelwa esiphambanweni ukuze abhubhise umzimba wesono ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono, ngoba abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni. Amen !

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ikhehla lethu labethelwa kanye Naye

Ake sifunde kwabaseRoma 6:5-7 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, futhi siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi ubuntu bethu obudala sibethelwe kanye naye esiphambanweni, ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono;

[Qaphela]: Uma sihlanganiswe naye ngokufana nokufa kwakhe

buza: Singaba munye kanjani ekufaneni kokufa kukaKristu?
impendulo: UJesu uyiZwi elisenyameni → "Uyabonakala" njengathi, umzimba wenyama negazi! Wathwala izono zethu emthini → UNkulunkulu wabeka izono zethu sonke phezu Kwakhe. Inkomba-Isaya Isahluko 53 Ivesi 6

UKristu “wayenomzimba” lapho elengiswa esihlahleni → ubunye bethu naye → “sibhapathizelwa ekufeni kwakhe” → ngoba lapho “sibhapathizwa emanzini” sabhapathizwa “ngemizimba yemizimba” → lena “singaphakathi Kristu" sihlanganiswe naye esimweni sokufa → Anazi yini ukuthi thina esabhapathizelwa kuKristu Jesu sabhapathizelwa kukho ukufa kwakhe? articles.title: Isiphambano sikaKristu 5: Siyasikhulula emandleni obumnyama bukaSathane eHayidesi
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseKolose Isahluko 1, amavesi 13-14, sifunde ndawonye: Wasikhulula emandleni obumnyama, wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, esinohlengo ngayo nokuthethelelwa kwezono. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " isiphambano sikaKristu 》Cha. 5 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Ukuqonda uKristu nokubethelwa Kwakhe kusikhulula emandleni amnyama kaSathane eHayidesi . Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Isiphambano sikaKristu siyasikhulula emandleni obumnyama eHayidesi likaSathane

( 1 ) Umhlaba wonke usezandleni zomubi

Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke lisemandleni omubi. 1 Johane 5:19
Umbuzo: Kungani umhlaba wonke usezandleni zobubi?
Impendulo: Abonayo bangabakaSathane, ngokuba uSathane wona kwasekuqaleni. INdodana kaNkulunkulu yabonakala ukuba ichithe imisebenzi kaSathane. 1 Johane 3:8 → Ngoba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu;
→Labo abenza amacala bangabakasathane, futhi wonke umuntu emhlabeni ungokasathane, futhi ungaphansi komubi, udeveli.

( 2 ) Udosi lokufa yisono

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba? Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho? Udosi lokufa yisono, futhi amandla esono umthetho. 1 Korinte 15:55-56 → Njengoba nje isono sangena ezweni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kwangena ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kwasakazekela kubo bonke, ngoba bonke bonile. Ngaphambi komthetho isono sasikhona emhlabeni; Kodwa kusukela ku-Adamu kuya kuMose, ukufa kwabusa, ngisho nalabo abangazange benze isono esifana nesika-Adamu. U-Adamu wayengumfanekiso womuntu owayezofika. KwabaseRoma 5:12-14

3 ) Ukufa neHayidese

Amahubo 18:5 Izintambo zeHayidese zingizungelezile, nezihibe zokufa ziphezu kwami.
Amahubo 116:3 Izintambo zokufa zingithandele;
AmaHubo 89:48 Ngubani ongaphila phakade, agweme ukufa, asindise umphefumulo wakhe emasangweni eHayidese na? (Sela)
IsAmbulo 20:13-14 Ngakho ulwandle lwabakhipha abafileyo ababekukho, nokufa neHayidese kwakhipha abafileyo ababekukho; Ukufa neHayidesi nakho kwaphonswa echibini lomlilo;

( 4 ) Ngokufa, uKristu ubhubhisa udeveli onamandla okufa

Wayesethi: “Bheka, mina nabantwana uNkulunkulu anginike bona bahlanganyela igazi nenyama, naye uqobo wathatha inyama negazi ukufa ukubhubhisa lowo onamandla okufa onguSathane, nokukhulula labo ababegqilazwe ukuphila kwabo konke ngokwesaba ukufa. KumaHebheru 2:13-15 → Lapho ngimbona, ngawa ngasezinyaweni zakhe njengofileyo. Wabeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwami wathi: "Ungesabi! Mina ngingowokuqala nowokugcina, ophilayo; ngangifile, futhi bheka, ngiphila kuze kube phakade naphakade, futhi ngiphethe ukufa ezingalweni zami. . nezihluthulelo zeHayidesi IsAmbulo 1:17-18 .

( 5 ) UJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, wasivusa kwabafileyo futhi wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo.

Wasikhulula emandleni obumnyama, wasidlulisela embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, esinokuhlengwa ngayo nokuthethelelwa kwezono. Kolose 1:13-14
Njengomphostoli “uPawulu” owayethunywe uNkulunkulu → nginithuma kubo, ukuze avulwe amehlo abo, futhi baphenduke ebumnyameni baye ekukhanyeni, futhi basuke emandleni kaSathane baye kuNkulunkulu; bamukele ukuthethelelwa kwezono, futhi bonke abangcwelisiwe bahlanganyele ifa. ’”—IzEnzo 26:18

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kube nani nonke! Amen!

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Uchofoza lesi sihloko ukuze ufunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukwamukela futhi "ukholelwe" kuJesu Kristu njengoMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, singathandaza ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izofela esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu"→ 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! Futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Ukukhumula indoda endala nezenzo zayo yavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Esikhathini esizayo, sizozuza ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Khulekani egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano sikaKristu 4: Ukukhumula umuntu omdala ka-Adamu

articles.content:

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseKolose isahluko 3 ivesi 9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isiphambano sikaKristu" Cha. 4 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Thumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Siphe ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze ukuphila kwethu kuchichime. Amen! Ngiyacela! INkosi uJesu iyaqhubeka nokukhanyisa. amehlo ethu omoya, avule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi asenze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya. Ukuqonda uKristu nokufa Kwakhe esiphambanweni kanye nokungcwatshwa Kwakhe kuyasikhulula kumuntu omdala nasezindleleni zakhe zakudala ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

1: Isiphambano sikaKristu → sisenza sikwazi ukukhumula umuntu omdala nokuziphatha kwakhe

( 1 ) Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe

Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono; KwabaseRoma 6 amavesi 6-7. Qaphela: Umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye Naye → "injongo" iwukubhubhisa umzimba wesono ukuze singabe sisaba izigqila zesono, ngoba abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni → "futhi bembelwa" → ukukhumula indoda endala ka-Adamu . Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Inyama yabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye nezinkanuko nezifiso zayo ezimbi

Imisebenzi yenyama isobala: ukuphinga, ukungcola, amanyala, ukukhonza izithombe, ubuthakathi, inzondo, ukuxabana, umhawu, ukufutheka, ukuhlukana, ukuhlukana, ukuhlubuka, umona, ukudakwa, ukuxokozela, njll. Sengike ngasho kini ngaphambili, ngiyanitshela namanje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. …Labo abangabakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko. Galathiya 5:19-21, 24

(3) Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala ezinhliziyweni zenu , awuyena owekhehla lenyama

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. Uma uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kepha umphefumulo uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga. KwabaseRoma 8:9-10

(4) Ngoba “ikhehla” lakho lifile , Impilo yakho “yomuntu omusha” ifihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Kolose 3:3-4
Ningaqambelani amanga, ngokuba nikhumule umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe. Kolose 3:9

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa kaJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano sikaKristu 3: Siyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibheli [Roma 7:5-6] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba lapho sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizelwe ngomthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, zathela isithelo sokufa. Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko.

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isiphambano sikaKristu" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso abalibhalayo futhi balikhulume ngezandla zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde uKristu nokufa kwakhe esiphambanweni kaKristu Afile, manje Ukukhululwa emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho kusenza sizuze isikhundla samadodana kaNkulunkulu nokuphila okuphakade! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umthetho WeTestamente Lokuqala WeBhayibheli

( 1 ) Ensimini yase-Edene, uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano no-Adamu ukuthi angadli emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi.

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Genesise 2:15-17] futhi silifunde ndawonye: UJehova uNkulunkulu wamthatha umuntu wambeka ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kodwa ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngoba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.” : Inyoka yalinga u-Eva waphula umthetho futhi wona ngokudla isithelo somuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi wonile. Ngaphambi komthetho, isono sasikhona emhlabeni; , ngaphansi kwamandla esono, naphansi kwamandla okufa.” U-Adamu uwumfanekiso walowo owayezakuza, uJesu Kristu.

( 2 ) Umthetho KaMose

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Duteronomi 5:1-3] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Khona-ke uMose wabiza bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kubo: “O bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, lalelani izimiso nezahlulelo enginitshela zona namuhla; sigcineni uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi eHorebe, kepha asenziwanga nathi, esikhona namuhla.

( Qaphela: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu nama-Israyeli sihlanganisa: IMithetho Eyishumi eqoshwe ezibhebheni zamatshe, futhi ingqikithi yezimiso neziqondiso ezingu-613 Siyisivumelwano esiwubeka ngokucacile umthetho. Uma ugcina futhi ugcina yonke imiyalo yomthetho, uzobusiswa "Uyobusiswa ekuphumeni kwakho, futhi uyobusiswa ekungeneni kwakho." (Bheka uDuteronomi 28, amavesi 1-6 no-15-68)
Masifunde iBhayibheli [Galathiya 3:10-11] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Wonke umuntu osekelwe emisebenzini yomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; Uqalekisiwe owenza zonke izinto ezilotshwe kuyo.” Kusobala ukuthi ngomthetho akukho muntu olungisiswa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba umbhalo uthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa;
Buyela emuva [kwabaseRoma 5-6] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba ngesikhathi sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizelwe ngomthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, ziveza isithelo sokufa. Kodwa njengoba safa kuwo umthetho owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngokwendlela endala ye isiko.

( Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, singabona ukuthi ngomphostoli [uPawulu] owayenekhono kakhulu emthethweni wamaJuda, uNkulunkulu wembula “umoya” wokulunga komthetho, izimiso, iziqondiso nothando olukhulu: Noma ubani osekelwe emikhubeni yomthetho. umthetho, bonke bangaphansi kwesiqalekiso; ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Uqalekisiwe umuntu ongaqhubeki nakho konke okulotshwe encwadini yomthetho; Ngoba ngenkathi sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizalwa ngomthetho, "izifiso ezimbi" ziyizinkanuko, lapho inkanuko isithathile, ibeletha isono; kuya kuJakobe 1 isahluko 15 uMkhosi.

Ungabona ngokucacile ukuthi [isono] sizalwa kanjani: “Isono” sibangelwa inkanuko yenyama, futhi inkanuko yenyama “inkanuko embi ezelwe ngomthetho” iqala emalungwini, futhi inkanuko iqala nxa inkanuko isithathile, ibeletha isono; Ngokubona kwalo mbono, [isono] sikhona ngenxa [yomthetho]. Ingabe ukuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - Bheka KwabaseRoma 4:15
2 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono - Bheka KwabaseRoma 5:13
3 Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile. Ngoba uma abantu abadalwe ngothuli begcina umthetho, bayozala isono ngenxa yomthetho, kulapho uzozala khona isono umthetho. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 1 ) Njengo “Adamu” ensimini yase-Edene ngenxa yomyalelo othi “angadli isithelo somuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi”, u-Eva walingwa inyoka e-Edene, kanye nezifiso zenyama zika-Eva. okubi owazalwa ngomthetho" Ufisa ukusebenza emalungwini abo, ufuna isithelo esilungele ukudla, amehlo akhanyayo, abukekayo emehlweni, ukwazi okuhle nokubi, izinto ezithandekayo emehlweni; ezenza abantu bahlakaniphe. Ngale ndlela, baphula umthetho futhi bona futhi baqalekiswa ngumthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

( 2 ) UMthetho KaMose uyisivumelwano phakathi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu nama-Israyeli eNtabeni YaseHorebe, kuhlanganise nemithetho eyishumi, izimiso neziqondiso u-Israyeli angazange awugcine, futhi bonke baphula umthetho futhi benza isono kuncike kulokho okwakulotshwe eMthethweni KaMose, iziqalekiso nezifungo, futhi zonke izinhlekelele zathululelwa kuma-Israyeli - bheka uDaniyeli 9:9-13 kanye namaHeberu 10:28.

( 3 ) ngomzimba kaKristu owafa ukuze asibophe emthethweni, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseRoma 7:1-7 Manje ngithi kulabo abawaziyo umthetho, anazi yini ukuthi umthetho “uyabusa” umuntu esaphila? Ngoba "amandla esono umthetho. Uma nje usaphila emzimbeni ka-Adamu, uyisoni. Ngaphansi komthetho, umthetho uyakulawula futhi uyakuvimbela. Uyazwisisa?"

Umphostoli "uPawulu" usebenzisa [ Ubudlelwano phakathi kwesono nomthetho ]isifaniso[ ubudlelwano bowesifazane nomyeni ] Njengowesifazane onendoda, uboshiwe ngomthetho, indoda isekhona; Ngakho-ke, uma umyeni wakhe esaphila futhi eshade nomunye, ubizwa ngokuthi isiphingi, uma indoda isifile, ukhululiwe emthethweni wayo, futhi noma eshade nomunye umuntu, akasona isifebe. Qaphela: “Bantu besifazane” okusho ukuthi thina zoni siboshiwe “umyeni” okungukuthi, umthetho womshado, umyeni wethu esaphila , ubizwa ngokuthi isiphingi, ubuntu bethu obudala "Owesifazane "ngomzimba kaKristu wafa esiphambanweni emthethweni “Wafa” emthethweni, wavuswa kwabafileyo ukuze sibuyele kwabanye [uJesu] futhi sithele izithelo zomoya kuNkulunkulu uma “ungafanga” emthethweni, okungukuthi, awuzange wephule kusukela "endodeni" yomthetho, kufanele ushade futhi ubuyele [kuJesu], uyaphinga futhi ubizwa ngokuthi isifebe [isifebe esingokomoya]. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngakho “uPawulu” wathi: “Ngenxa yomthetho ngafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu – bheka Gal 2:19. Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni “womyeni wesivumelwano sokuqala”, ukuze sikwazi ukukhonza uJehova ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele). “okungukuthi, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. Umuntu omusha okhonza uJehova “hhayi ngokomthetho omdala” akusho ukuthi akuhambisani nendlela endala yezoni enyameni ka-Adamu. Ingabe nonke nikuqonda kahle lokhu?

Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Namuhla amehlo akho abusisiwe nezindlebe zakho zibusisiwe uNkulunkulu uthumele izisebenzi ukuba zikuhole ukuze uqonde iqiniso leBhayibheli kanye nengqikithi yomthetho wenkululeko “emadodeni” njengoba “uPawulu” esho → NgeZwi kuKristu ngeVangeli " wazalwa “Ukuninika endodeni eyodwa, ukunimisa kuKristu nizintombi ezimhlophe. Amen!—Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 11:2.

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke lapha. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano SikaKristu 2: Siyasikhulula Esonweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibheli [Roma 6:6-11] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono;

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Isiphambano sikaKristu" Cha. 2 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! Wathumela izisebenzi, futhi ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhuluma izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda uthando olukhulu loMsindisi wethu uJesu Kristu, owafela esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu, wasikhulula ezonweni zethu. . Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu. Amen

Isiphambano sikaKristu siyasikhulula esonweni

( 1 ) ivangeli likaJesu Krestu

Masifunde iBhayibheli [Marku 1:1] futhi silivule ndawonye futhi sifunde: Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. NgokukaMathewu 1:21 Uzozala indodana, uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJesu, ngokuba nguye oyakusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. NgokukaJohane Isahluko 3 Amavesi 16-17 “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Ngoba uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana Yakhe emhlabeni, ingasi ukuba yahlulele umhlaba (noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi: ukwahlulela izwe; yona ngezansi), kodwa ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye.

Qaphela: INdodana kaNkulunkulu, uJesu Kristu, iyisiqalo sevangeli → UJesu Kristu uyisiqalo sevangeli! Igama [likaJesu] lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. UnguMsindisi, uMesiya, noKristu! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isibonelo, igama elithi "UK" lisho i-United Kingdom of Great Britain kanye ne-Northern Ireland, ehlanganisa i-England, Wales, Scotland kanye ne-Northern Ireland, ebizwa ngokuthi "UK" igama elithi "USA" libhekisela e-United States of I-America igama elithi "Russia" libhekisela kuhulumeni waseRussia. Igama elithi "uJesu" lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo → yilokhu okushiwo igama elithi "Jesu". Uyaqonda?

Ngiyabonga Nkosi! UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa [uJesu], eyakhulelwa ngoMoya oNgcwele yintombi uMariya, yaba yinyama, yazalwa ngaphansi komthetho ukuze ihlenge labo ababengaphansi komthetho, okungukuthi, ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. .Phumani ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana kaNkulunkulu! Amen, ngakho igama [uJesu] linguMsindisi, uMesiya, kanye noKristu, ukuze asindise abantu Bakhe ezonweni zabo. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

( 2 ) Isiphambano sikaKristu siyasikhulula esonweni

Masifunde eyabaseRoma 6:7 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngoba abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni → “UKristu” wafela “munye” wabo bonke, kanjalo bonke bafa → Ngokufa kwabo bonke, bonke "bakhululiwe" benecala. Amen! Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14 → UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafela izono zethu, wasikhulula ezonweni zethu . Ngoba anikholwa eNdodaneni kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa” igama likaJesu "→ Zisindise ezonweni zakho , "Awukholwa"→wena" ubugebengu "Zithathele umthwalo wakho, futhi uyokwahlulelwa ngesahlulelo sosuku lwembubhiso." Ungakukholwa "UKristu" kakade "Khulula esonweni sakho → ukulahla" isono sokungakholwa "→ Kodwa abanamahloni nabangakholwayo... Nikuqonda kahle lokhu? Bheka kusAmbulo Isahluko 21 Ivesi 8 noJohane Isahluko 3 Amavesi 17-18

→Ngenxa yokuthi" U-Adamu “Ukungalaleli komuntu oyedwa kwenza izoni eziningi; kanjalo nangokungalaleli komuntu oyedwa” UKristu “Ukulalela komuntu oyedwa kwenza bonke balunge. Njengoba nje isono sabusa ekufeni, kanjalo umusa uyabusa ngokulunga kube ukuphila okuphakade ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu. Ingabe lokhu nikuqonda ngokucacile?

Phenduka futhi ku[1 Petru Isahluko 2-24] Wathwala izono zethu ngokwakhe emthini, ukuze sife ezonweni futhi siphilele ukulunga. Ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa. Qaphela: UKristu wathwala izono zethu futhi wabangela ukuba sife ezonweni → futhi "sikhululwe ezonweni" → Labo abafile baye bakhululwa ezonweni, futhi labo abaye bakhululwa ezonweni → bangaphila ngokulunga! Uma singakhululekile esonweni, ngeke siphile ekulungeni. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke lapha. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Isiphambano SikaKristu 1: Ukushumayela NgoJesu Kristu Naye Ebethelwe Esiphambanweni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Bangane abathandekayo, ukuthula kubo bonke bazalwane! Amen,

Masivule iBhayibheli [1 Korinte 1:17] futhi sifunde ndawonye: UKristu akangithumanga ukuba ngibhapathize kepha ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli, kungabi ngamazwi okuhlakanipha, funa isiphambano sikaKristu sibe yize. . 1 Korinte 2:2 Ngokuba nganquma ukuthi angiyikwazi lutho phakathi kwenu, kuphela uJesu Kristu, naye obethelwe esiphambanweni .

Namuhla siyafunda, siyahlanganyela, futhi sabelane ndawonye “Ukushumayela ngoJesu Kristu Naye Obethelwe Esiphambanweni” Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi ezibhala ngezandla zazo futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya → Ukushumayela uKristu nensindiso Yakhe ebethelwe ukuveza indlela yensindiso, iqiniso, nokuphila ngothando olukhulu lukaKristu namandla okuvuka lapho uKristu ephakanyiswa emhlabeni, uyoheha bonke abantu ukuba beze kuwe. .

Lemikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukunxusa, izibusiso, nokubonga kwenziwa egameni elingcwele leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) Inyoka yethusi elenga okhunini eTestamenteni Elidala ifanekisela insindiso yesiphambano sikaKristu.

Ake sibheke iBhayibheli [Numeri Isahluko 21:4-9] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Bona (okungukuthi, ama-Israyeli) basuka eNtabeni yaseHori futhi baqonda oLwandle Olubomvu ukuze bazungeze izwe lakwa-Edomi. Abantu bacasuka kakhulu ngenxa yobunzima bendlela, bakhononda kuNkulunkulu nakuMose, bathi: “Nisikhipheleni eGibithe (izwe lobugqila) nasenza sife (okungukuthi, sife ngendlala) ezweni? (Ngoba ingxenye enkulu yehlane leNhlonhlo YaseSinayi iwugwadule), akukho kudla namanzi lapha, futhi izinhliziyo zethu ziyakuzonda lokhu kudla okubuthakathaka (ngaleso sikhathi, uJehova uNkulunkulu wehlisa “imana” ezulwini futhi walinika uJehova. Ama-Israyeli njengokudla, kodwa aqhubeka ekuzonda lokhu kudla okuncane)” Ngakho uJehova wathuma izinyoka ezinomlilo phakathi kwabantu, zabaluma. Kwafa abantu abaningi phakathi kwama-Israyeli. (Ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu akabange esabavikela, kwangena izinyoka ezinesihlungu phakathi kwabantu, zabaluma, zafakwa ubuthi. Kwafa abantu abaningi phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli.) Abantu beza kuMose, bathi: ngonile kuJehova nakinina; UJehova wathi kuMose: “Yenza inyoka enesihlungu, uyibeke esigxotsheni. Olunywayo uyakubheka inyoka, aphile; uzophila.

( Qaphela: “Inyoka yomlilo” isho inyoka enesihlungu; Igama elithi “ithusi” lifanekisela ukukhanya nokungabi nasono - bhekisela kusAmbulo 2:18 nakwabaseRoma 8:3. UNkulunkulu wenza isimo "senyoka yethusi" okusho ukuthi "engenabo ubuthi" futhi okusho ukuthi "engenasono" esikhundleni "sobuthi bokuhlwanyela kusho isono" ama-Israyeli ayelengiswa esigxotsheni ukuze abe ihlazo, isiqalekiso nokufa kobuthi benyoka. ." Lona umfanekiso kaKristu eba yisono sethu. "Isimo" somzimba sasisetshenziswa njengomnikelo wesono. Lapho ama-Israyeli ebheka "inyoka yethusi" elenga esigxotsheni, "ubuhlungu benyoka" emizimbeni yabo. badluliselwe “enyokeni yethusi” futhi ababhubhise Noma ubani olunywe inyoka wayeyophila lapho ebuka inyoka yethusi Yebo Ama-Israyeli athole ukuphiliswa kanye nensindiso kaNkulunkulu.

( 2 ) Shumayela uJesu Kristu futhi Yena ebethelwe esiphambanweni

NgokukaJohane Isahluko 3 Ivesi 14 Ngokuba njengalokho uMose waphakamisa inyoka ehlane, kanjalo neNdodana yomuntu iyakuphakanyiswa. ’ Amazwi kaJesu ayebhekisela endleleni ayezofa ngayo. Johane 8:28 Ngakho uJesu wathi: “Lapho niyiphakamisile iNdodana yomuntu, niyokwazi ukuthi mina nginguKristu.

U-Isaya 45:21-22 Khulumani niveze imicabango yenu, nibonisane. Ngubani owalibonisa kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo? Ngubani owakutshela endulo? Angisiye uJehova na? akakho uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami; Bhekani kimi nina mikhawulo yonke yomhlaba, nize nisindiswe, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye.

Qaphela: INkosi uJesu yathi: “Njengoba uMose aphakamisa inyoka ehlane, kanjalo iNdodana yomuntu yaphakanyiswa futhi “yabethelwa.” Ngemva kokuphakamisa iNdodana yomuntu, niyokwazi ukuthi uJesu unguKristu futhi uMsindisi, osisindisayo esonweni UNkulunkulu okhululiwe esiqalekisweni somthetho futhi okhululekile ekufeni → UNkulunkulu wathi ngomprofethi: "Abantu abasemikhawulweni yomhlaba bayosindiswa uma bebheka "kuKristu" ." Amen! Ingabe kucacile lokhu?

( 3 ) UNkulunkulu wamenza isono ngenxa yethu ukuze thina sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli [2 Korinte 5:21] Lowo owayengasazi isono wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye. 1 Petru 2:22-25 Akenzanga sono, kwakungekho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. Lapho ethukwa, akazange aphindisele lapho enzakala, akazange amsongela, kodwa wathembela kuye owahlulela ngokulunga. Walenga esihlahleni futhi wathwala izono zethu mathupha ukuze kuthi, sesifile esonweni, siphilele ukulunga. Ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa. Beninjengezimvu ezidukileyo, kepha manje senibuyele kuMalusi noMbonisi wemiphefumulo yenu. 1 Johane 3:5 Niyazi ukuthi iNkosi yabonakala ukuba isuse izono kubantu okungekho kubo isono. 1 kaJohane 2:2 Yena uyinhlawulo yezono zethu, kungengezethu zodwa kodwa nezono zezwe lonke.

( Qaphela: UNkulunkulu wenza uJesu ongenasono ukuba abe yisono ngenxa yethu yena mathupha wathwala izono zethu futhi walengiswa emthini, okungukuthi, “isiphambano” njengomnikelo wesono, ukuze njengoba safa esonweni, siphilele ukulunga! Uyinhlawulo yezono zethu, hhayi ezethu kuphela kodwa nezomhlaba wonke. UKristu wanikela ngomzimba Wakhe kwaba kanye njengomnikelo wesono, ngalokho enza labo abangcwelisiwe baphelele phakade. Amen! Kade sasinjengezimvu ezilahlekileyo, kodwa manje sesibuyele kuMalusi noMbonisi wemiphefumulo yenu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngakho uPawulu wathi: “UKristu akangithumanga ukuba ngibhapathize, kodwa ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli, kungabi ngamazwi okuhlakanipha, ukuze isiphambano sikaKristu singabi-lutho, ngokuba izwi lesiphambano liwubuwula kwababhubhayo; kodwa ngenxa yamandla kaNkulunkulu, njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: “Ngizachitha ukuhlakanipha kwabahlakaniphileyo, ngichithe ukuqedisisa kwabahlakaniphileyo. “AmaJuda afuna izimangaliso, namaGreki afuna ukuhlakanipha, kepha thina sishumayela uKristu obethelwe esiphambanweni, okuyisikhubekiso kumaJuda nobuwula kwabezizwe. UNkulunkulu uguqula imfundiso yobuwula “yesiphambano” ibe yisibusiso, ukuze sisindiswe . ukuze sibonise uthando olukhulu, namandla, nokuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu, osenze ukuhlakanipha kwakhe, nokulunga, nobungcwele, nokuhlengwa kwakhe, ngokuba mina, Pawulu, nginqume ukungazi lutho ngaphandle kwenu.

Njengoba simazi uJesu Kristu futhi ebethelwe esiphambanweni, amazwi engawakhuluma nezintshumayelo engazishumayela kwakungewona amazwi okuhlakanipha ahlanekezelwe, kodwa kwaba ngezibonakaliso zikaMoya oNgcwele nezamandla, ukuze ukholo lwenu lungabi phezu kokuhlakanipha kwabantu kodwa phezu kwengqondo. amandla kaNkulunkulu. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 1:17-2:1-5.

kulungile! Namuhla ngizokhuluma futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke lapha. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

2021.01.25

articles.title: Isiphambano｜Imvelaphi yesiphambano
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen. Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ngemvelaphi yesiphambano

isiphambano sasendulo samaRoma

ukubethelwa , kuthiwa yadalwa AbaseFenike Ukusungulwa, uMbuso WaseFenike yigama elijwayelekile lochungechunge lwezifunda ezincane zedolobha esifundeni esisenyakatho yogu olusempumalanga yeMedithera yasendulo. Isiphambano sethuluzi lokuhlushwa ngokuvamile sasihlanganisa izikhonkwane ezimbili noma ezintathu zokhuni---noma ngisho ezine uma kuyisiphambano esinezinhlangothi ezine, esinezimo ezihlukahlukene. Ezinye zimise okwe-T, ezinye zino-X, kanti ezinye zino-Y. Enye yezinto ezinkulu ezasungulwa abaseFenike kwakuwukubulawa kwabantu ngokubethelwa esiphambanweni. Kamuva, Le ndlela yadluliselwa kusuka kwabaseFenike kuya kumaGreki, ama-Asiriya, amaGibhithe, amaPheresiya namaRoma. Idume kakhulu embusweni wasePheresiya, uMbuso waseDamaseku, uJuda UMbuso, uMbuso ka-Israyeli, iCarthage, neRoma lasendulo, ngokuvamile kwakusetshenziselwa ukubulala amavukela-mbuso, amambuka, izigqila, nabantu abangenazo izakhamuzi. .

Lesi sijeziso esinonya savela esigxotsheni sokhuni. Ekuqaleni, isiboshwa sasiboshelwa esigxotsheni sokhuni futhi sincishwe umoya size sife, okwakuyinto evamile futhi enonya. Kamuva kwethulwa amafreyimu okhuni, okuhlanganisa iziphambano, amafreyimu amise okwe-T kanye namafreyimu amise okwe-X. Uhlaka olumise okuka-X luphinde lubizwe ngokuthi "uhlaka lukaSaint Andrew" ngoba usanta ushone ohlakeni olumise okuka-X.

Nakuba imininingwane yokubulawa ihluka kancane ezindaweni ngezindawo, isimo siyafana: isiboshwa sishaywa kuqala bese siphoqelelwa ukuba sithwale uhlaka lokhuni siye lapho kubulawelwa khona. Ngezinye izikhathi uhlaka lwamapulangwe lusinda kangangokuthi kube nzima kumuntu oyedwa ukulususa. Ngaphambi kokuba sibulawe, isiboshwa sakhumulwa izingubo, kwasala ibhande kuphela. Kukhona ukhuni olumise okwesika ngaphansi kwezandla nezinyawo zesiboshwa ukuze umzimba ungasheleli phansi ngenxa yamandla adonsela phansi. Bese ufaka isiphambano endaweni elungisiwe engaguquki phansi. Ukuze kusheshiswe ukufa, ngezinye izikhathi izitho zesiboshwa zaziphulwa. Lapho ukubekezelelana kwesiboshwa kunamandla, ukuhlukunyezwa kuyakhula. Ilanga elikhipha umkhovu etsheni lashisa isikhumba sabo esingenalutho, izimpukane zabaluma zabamunca izithukuthuku nothuli olwalusemoyeni lwabathintitha.

Ukubethelwa kwakuvame ukwenziwa ngamaqoqo, ngakho iziphambano eziningana zazivame ukumiswa endaweni efanayo. Ngemva kokuba isigebengu sesibulewe, saqhubeka nokulengiswa esiphambanweni ukuze sibukiswe esidlangalaleni, kwakuyisiko ukungcwaba isiphambano kanye nesigebengu ndawonye. Ukubethelwa kamuva kwaba nentuthuko ethile, njengokumisa isiboshwa ikhanda phansi ohlakeni lokhuni, okwakungenza isiboshwa siquleke ngokushesha futhi empeleni kunciphise ubuhlungu besiboshwa.

Kunzima kubantu banamuhla ukuba bacabange ubuhlungu bokubethelwa, ngoba ngaphandle nje, ukubophela umuntu esigxotsheni akubonakali kuyisijeziso esinonya ngokukhethekile. Isiboshwa esiphambanweni asibulawanga indlala noma ukoma, futhi asibulawanga ukopha—izipikili zabethelwa esiphambanweni, isiboshwa sagcina sifile ukuqunjelwa. Umuntu owayebethelwe wayekwazi ukuphefumula kuphela ngokwelula izingalo zakhe. Nokho, esimweni esinjalo, kuhambisana nobuhlungu obukhulu obubangelwa ukushayelela izinzipho, yonke imisipha izosheshe ikhiqize amandla okufinyeza emhlane anobudlova, ngakho umoya ogcwele esifubeni awukwazi ukudedelwa. Ukuze kusheshiswe ukuminza, izinsimbi zivame ukulengiswa ezinyaweni zabantu abaqine kakhulu, ukuze bangabe besakwazi ukwelula izingalo zabo ukuze baphefumule. Ukuvumelana phakathi kososayensi ukuthi ukubethelwa kwakuyindlela yokubulawa enonya ngendlela engavamile ngoba kancane kancane kwakuhlukumeza umuntu aze afe esikhathini esiyizinsuku ezimbalwa.

Ukubethelwa kokuqala eRoma kufanele kube ngesikhathi sokubusa kukaTargan ekupheleni kwamaKhosi ayisikhombisa. Ekugcineni iRoma yacindezela ukuhlubuka kwezigqila ezintathu. Futhi konke ukunqoba kwakuhambisana nokubulawa kwabantu okuchitha igazi, futhi izinkulungwane zabantu zabethelwa esiphambanweni. Eyokuqala emibili yayiseSicily, enye ngekhulu lokuqala BC kanti enye ngekhulu lokuqala BC. Eyesithathu nedume kakhulu, ngo-73 BC, yayiholwa nguSpartacus futhi abantu abayizinkulungwane eziyisithupha babethelwa esiphambanweni. Kwabekwa iziphambano kusukela eCabo kuya eRoma. Ukubulawa ngesiphambano noma ngekholomu kwakudume kakhulu ngezikhathi zamaRoma, kodwa kwaqala ukunyamalala kancane kancane emakhulwini eminyaka ngemva kokuba uKristu ebethelwe esiphambanweni, wavuka kwabafileyo futhi wenyukela ezulwini. Labo ababephethe abasayisebenzisi indlela yokubulala “amadodana kaNkulunkulu” ukuze abulale izigebengu, futhi ukulengiswa nezinye izijeziso kwaqala ukusetshenziswa kabanzi.

umbusi waseRoma uConstantine zikhona Ikhulu le-4 AD "Isiyalo simenyezelwe" Isimemezelo saseMilan " qeda Ukubethelwa. isiphambano Kuwuphawu lobuKristu banamuhla, obumelela uthando olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu nokuhlenga umhlaba. 431 Ukuqala ukuvela esontweni lobuKristu ngo-AD 586 Yakhiwe phezu kwesonto kusukela ngonyaka.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Hlukanisa phakathi kokuzalwa kabusha kweqiniso nokungamanga
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyabase-Efesu isahluko 1 ivesi 13 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwa kuKristu, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Ungawusho kanjani umehluko: ukuzalwa kabusha kweqiniso namanga 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! [Owesifazane oqotho] wathuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo, ezilotshiwe nezishunyayelwayo, ngezwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Fundisa abantwana bakaNkulunkulu indlela yokuhlukanisa ukuzalwa kabusha kweqiniso nokuzalwa kabusha okungamanga lapho benoMoya oNgcwele njengophawu lwabo. ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

【1】AmaKristu azelwe kabusha aphila kuKristu

---Phila ngoMoya oNgcwele, uhambe ngoMoya oNgcwele---

- --Izici zokuziphatha ukuzethemba---

KwabaseGalathiya 5:25 Uma siphila ngoMoya, masihambe futhi ngoMoya.

buza: Kuyini ukuphila “ngoMoya oNgcwele”?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya ~ bhekisa kuJohane 3 ivesi 5-7;
2 Ukuzalwa eqinisweni levangeli ~ bheka kweyoku-1 Korinte 4:15 noJakobe 1:18;
3 Uzelwe nguNkulunkulu ~ bhekisela kuJohane 1:12-13

buza: “AmaKristu aphila kanjani ngoMoya oNgcwele? Futhi "kanjani" ukuhamba ngoMoya oNgcwele?
impendulo: Kholwa Kuye Othunywe nguNkulunkulu, lona ngumsebenzi kaNkulunkulu → Bambuza, “Yini okufanele siyenze ukuze sibhekwe njengabenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu?” Nkulunkulu.”—Johane 6:28-29

【okubili】 Kholwa emsebenzini omkhulu uNkulunkulu athumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izowufeza ngenxa yethu

"Pawuli" Ngidlulisela kini lokho nami engakwamukela: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemibhalo, ukuthi wembelwa, nokuthi wavuka futhi ngosuku lwesithathu ngokusho imiBhalo! 1 Korinte 15:3-4

(1) ekhululekile esonweni ~Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-7 nakwabaseRoma 8:1-2
(2) Ngikhululekile emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo —Bheka eyabaseRoma 7:4-6 no-Gal 3:12
(3) Lahla ikhehla nokuziphatha kwalo kwakudala~ Bheka Kol. 3:9 no-Gal
(4) Uphunyuke emandleni obumnyama bomhlaba kaSathane ~ Bheka kwabaseKolose 1:13 owasikhulula emandleni obumnyama, wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo kanye neZenzo 28:18
(5) Ezweni ~ Bheka uJohane 17:14-16
(6) ezihlukanisile —Bheka amaRoma 6:6 no-7:24-25
(7) Sithethelele —Bheka kwabaseRoma 4:25

【ezintathu】 Kholwa kuJesu futhi ukhulekele uMoya oNgcwele othunywe uBaba ukuba enze umsebenzi omkhulu wokuvuselela

KuThithusi 3:5 Wasisindisa, kungeyisikho ngemisebenzi yokulunga esayenzayo thina, kodwa ngokomusa wakhe, ngesigezo sokuzalwa kutsha lokwenziwa batsha ngoMoya oNgcwele.

Kolose 3:10 yembathani umuntu omusha. Umuntu omusha wenziwa musha olwazini abe nomfanekiso woMdali wakhe.

(1) Ngoba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila , wangikhulula emthethweni wesono nokufa kuKristu Jesu ~ Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:1-2
(2) Thola ukutholwa njengendodana kaNkulunkulu futhi wembathe uKristu —Bheka kuGal. 4:4-7, Roma 8:16;
(3) Ukulungisiswa, ukulungisiswa, ukungcweliswa, ukungcweliswa: “Ukulungisiswa” kubhekise kwabaseRoma 5:18-19... Ngenxa yesenzo “sikaKristu” esisodwa sokulunga, bonke abantu balungisiswa futhi baba “nokulunga” ngenxa yokungalaleli komuntu oyedwa, bonke abantu baba yizoni ngokufanayo; ukungalaleli komuntu oyedwa, bonke abantu benziwa izoni ngokulalela komuntu oyedwa, “ubungcwele” bungcweliswa nguMoya oNgcwele futhi bamukelekile – bheka kwabaseRoma 15:16; Ngokuba ngomhlatshelo wakhe munye wenza abangcwelisiweyo baphelele phakade - Bheka KumaHeberu 10:14
(4) Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni; Bheka kuJohane 1 isahluko 3 ivesi 9 no-5 ivesi 18
(5) Ukusoka ukususa inyama nenyama: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, akasiye okaKristu - Bheka KwabaseRoma 8:9 → Kuyena futhi nasokwa ngaphandle kwezandla, ekusokeni kukaKristu ngokukhumula isimo senyama yesono. Kolose 2:11
(6) Umcebo wembulwa esitsheni sobumba : Sinale ngcebo ezitsheni zebumba ukubonisa ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi. 2 Korinte 4:7-10
(7) Ukufa kuyasebenza kithi, impilo iyasebenza kuwe : Ngoba thina esiphilayo sinikelwa njalo ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emizimbeni yethu efayo. Kanjalo ukufa kusebenza kithi, kepha kinina ukuphila kusebenza.”— 2 Korinte 4:11-12
(8) Yakhani umzimba kaKristu futhi nikhule nibe ngabantu abadala ~Bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:12-13→ Ngakho-ke, asidangali. Nakuba umzimba wangaphandle uyabhidlika, nokho owangaphakathi wenziwa musha usuku nosuku. Ukuhlupheka kwethu kwesikhashana nokulula kuzosisebenzela isisindo saphakade senkazimulo esingenakuqhathaniswa. Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:16-17

【Okune】 "AmaKristu" azelwe kabusha ngamanga

--- Inkolelo yokuziphatha kanye nezici---

(1) Ngaphansi komthetho: Ngoba amandla esono umthetho - bheka 1 Korinte 15:56 → Labo abangaphansi komthetho bayizigqila zesono ngaphandle kokukhululwa "esonweni", ayikho indlela yokuphunyuka "ekufeni"; ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu ngaphansi komthetho Akukho uMoya oNgcwele nokuzalwa kabusha → kodwa wena” Uma "eholwa nguMoya oNgcwele" , akekho ngaphansi komthetho. Bheka kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 5 ivesi 18 nesahluko 4 amavesi 4-7
(2) Ngokusekelwe ekugcinweni komthetho: Wonke umuntu osebenza ngokomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Uqalekisiwe wonke umuntu ongaqhubeki enza konke okulotshwe encwadini yomthetho
(3) Ku-Adamu "isoni": Inkokhelo yesono ukufa Ku-Adamu, wonke umuntu wafa, ngakho kwakungekho uMoya oNgcwele nokuzalwa kabusha. —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:22
(4) Enyameni "yomhlaba" wenyama: INkosi ithi, "Ngenxa yokuthi umuntu uyinyama, uMoya wami ngeke uhlale kuye kuze kube phakade, kodwa izinsuku zakhe ziyoba iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amabili." "esikhwameni sewayini elidala" → okungukuthi, "uMoya oNgcwele" ngeke uhlale enyameni kuze kube phakade.
(5) Labo abavumayo, abahlanzayo, futhi besula izono zenyama nsuku zonke →Laba bantu bephule "isivumelwano esisha" →KumaHeberu 10:16-18... Ngemva kwalokho, bathi: “Ngeke ngiphinde ngizikhumbule izono zabo neziphambeko zabo njengoba lezi zono zithethelelwe, asikho isidingo sokwenza lokho Abazange baphinde “bakholelwe” ukuthi ubumina babo obudala babethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu futhi “umzimba wesono” wawusubhujisiwe, kodwa “bawukhumbula” nsuku zonke → bavuma, bagezwa, futhi besula izono zabo. lomzimba wokufa, umzimba wesono ofayo. Kwephula iTestamente Elisha nje
(6) Bethela iNdodana kaNkulunkulu futhi →Lapho beqonda indlela yeqiniso futhi “bakholwa yivangeli”, kufanele bashiye isiqalo semfundiso kaKristu abazimisele ukushiya “isiqalo” ngisho nokubuyela emthethweni futhi bazimisele ukuba yizigqila zesono bayengwa futhi babanjwe uSathane "ngesono" futhi abakwazi ukuphuma →Izingulube ziyagezwa bese zibuyela ekugingqikeni odakeni. 2 Petru 2:22
(6) Phatha “igazi eliyigugu” likaKristu njengento evamile : Vuma futhi uphenduke nsuku zonke, wesule izono, ugeze izono, futhi udlulise ezeNkosi " igazi eliyigugu “Njengokujwayelekile nje alilihle njengegazi lezinkomo nezimvu.
(7) Ukuklolodela uMoya oNgcwele womusa: Ngenxa “kaKristu,” umhlatshelo wakhe owodwa wenza labo abangcwelisiwe baphelele phakade. Hebheru 10:14→ Ngenxa “yokungakholwa” kwabo abantamo-lukhuni → Ngoba uma sona ngamabomu ngemva kokwamukela ulwazi lweqiniso, awusekho umhlatshelo wezono, kodwa ukulindela okwesabekayo ukwahlulelwa nomlilo oqothulayo oyoqothula zonke izitha zethu. Uma umuntu oweqile umthetho kaMose engahawukelwa, futhi efa ngenxa yofakazi ababili noma abathathu, kakhulu kangakanani-ke ongayinyathela iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, alenze igazi lesivumelwano elamngcwelisa njengeliyize, adelele uNkulunkulu. UMoya oNgcwele womusa cabanga ukuthi isijeziso azosithola kufanele sibe sibi kangakanani! Hebheru 10:26-29

Qaphela: Bafowethu nodadewethu! Uma unezinkolelo eziyiphutha ezingenhla, sicela uvuke ngokushesha futhi uyeke ukukhohliswa amaqhinga kaSathane nokusebenzisa “isono” ukukubopha. isono , angikwazi ukuphuma. Kumele ufunde kubo I-Liao engalungile Phuma okholweni lwakho → ngena "eBandleni likaJesu Kristu" futhi ulalele ivangeli leqiniso → yiBandla likaJesu Kristu elikuvumela ukuba usindiswe, ukhazinyuliswe, futhi uhlengwe umzimba wakho → iqiniso! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen
