articles.title: Incazelo yenkinga: Ingabe abantu bemvelo banoMoya oNgcwele?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuGenesise isahluko 6 ivesi 3 futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Uma umuntu eyinyama, uMoya wami awuyikuhlala kuye kuze kube phakade,” usho uJehova, “kepha izinsuku zakhe ziyakuba yiminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amabili.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye “Umuntu wemvelo akanawo uMoya oNgcwele” Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo wathuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo, ezilotshiwe nezikhulunywayo, ngezwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi “uMoya oNgcwele” awuhlali kubantu bemvelo .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

( 1 ) UMoya kaNkulunkulu ngeke uhlale nabantu bemvelo kuze kube phakade


buza: Ingabe uMoya oNgcwele uhlala nomuntu “wenyama” yenyama kuze kube phakade?
impendulo: “Uma umuntu eyinyama,” usho uJehova, “uMoya wami awuyikuhlala kuye kuze kube phakade, kepha izinsuku zakhe ziyakuba yiminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amabili.

Qaphela: Ukhokho “u-Adamu” wadalwa ngothuli—uJehova uNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi futhi waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe ukuphila, waba umuntu ophilayo, ongokomoya okuthiwa u-Adamu. Genesise Isahluko 2 Ivesi 7 → "Umuntu ophilayo onomoya" → U-Adamu 'ungumuntu ophilayo wenyama negazi' → Kulotshiwe okufanayo eBhayibhelini: “U-Adamu, umuntu wokuqala, waba umoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi inyama negazi) “umuntu ophilayo”; 1 Korinte 15:45

“Uma umuntu eyinyama, uMoya wami ngeke uhlale kuye kuze kube phakade,” kusho uJehova

1 Njengoba nje “iNkosi uSawule” eTestamenteni Elidala, umprofethi uSamuweli wamgcoba ngamafutha, futhi wayenoMoya kaNkulunkulu! Inkosi yenyama uSawule ayizange ilalele umyalo kaNkulunkulu→UMoya WeNkosi” hamba “USawule, umoya omubi ovela kuJehova weza ukumhlupha.”— 1 Samuweli 16:14 .

2 Kukhona futhi “inkosi uDavida” eyayesaba kakhulu ukuthi uNkulunkulu uzohoxisa uMoya oNgcwele ngenxa yeziphambeko zenyama yakhe yazibonela ngawayo amehlo ukuthi uMoya kaNkulunkulu wawusukile enkosini uSawuli yathandaza kuNkulunkulu → Ungangilahli ebusweni bakho; IHubo 51:11

Ngakho eTestamenteni Elidala sibona “abaprofethi nalabo abesaba uNkulunkulu” UMoya kaNkulunkulu uyabaphefumulela, kodwa ngeke uhlale kubo kuze kube phakade, ngoba abantu benyama “yomhlaba” banezinkanuko zobugovu, nenyama ekhanukayo kancane kancane iyoba nenkanuko. abe mubi , “uMoya kaNkulunkulu” awukwazi ukuhlala emzimbeni owonakala. Abantu benyama “yomhlaba” abanakuqukatha uMoya oNgcwele, njengoba nje iwayini elisha lingenakufakwa ezingqalathini zewayini ezindala. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 2 ) Iwayini elisha alinakufakwa ezimvabeni ezindala

Ake sifunde ngokukaMathewu 9:17: “Akakho othela iwayini elisha ezingqalathini zewayini ezindala; Kuphela ngokufaka iwayini elisha ezingqalathini zewayini ezintsha kuyolondolozwa kokubili. "

buza: Ngabe isingathekiso esithi "iwayini elisha" sibhekisa kuphi lapha?
impendulo: " iwayini elisha "indlela" UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya oNgcwele "Kulungile!

buza: Siyini isingathekiso "sesikhwama sewayini esidala"?
impendulo: "Izikhumba zewayini ezindala" zibhekisela kumuntu omdala uvela ku-Adamu - umuntu ophilayo ozalwa kubazali → "umhlaba" wenyama uye wathengiswa esonweni, "isoni nomzimba wesono". Iwohloka kancane kancane futhi ekugcineni ibuyele othulini→kusho uJesu! Izingqalathi zewayini ezindala “azikwazi” ukubamba iwayini elisha, okusho ukuthi, “umuntu omdala” akanakuwubamba “uMoya oNgcwele”, ngoba umuntu omdala uyonakala futhi uyavuza, futhi akanakuqukatha uMoya oNgcwele. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

buza: Sisho ukuthini isingathekiso 'sesikhumba sewayini esisha'?
impendulo: Isingathekiso esithi "izingqalathi zewayini ezintsha" sibhekisela emzimbeni kaKristu, umzimba weZwi osesimweni somuntu, umzimba womoya osesimweni somuntu, umzimba ongenakonakala, kanye nomzimba ongaboshiwe ukufa→" isikhwama esisha sesikhumba "yebo Ebhekisela emzimbeni kaKristu , “iwayini elisha” lipakishwa “ezingqalathini zewayini ezintsha,” okungukuthi, “uMoya oNgcwele” “ugcwele” okungukuthi, uhlala “emzimbeni kaKristu” → Yilokhu esikushoyo lapho sidla iSidlo SeNkosi Sakusihlwa: Lokhu umzimba wami "isinkwa esingenamvubelo" ", thina dla Yilokho kuphela thola Umzimba kaKristu, lokhu "ujusi wamagilebhisi" enkomishini yami yegazi, uwuphuze futhi uyoba nokuphila kukaKristu! Amen.

Umuntu wethu omusha ozelwe kabusha ungumzimba nempilo kaKristu UMoya oNgcwele uhlala kuKristu futhi singamalungu aKhe. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 3 ) Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kithi, asisibo abenyama

KwabaseRoma 8:9-10 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu. KwabaseRoma 8:9.

Qaphela: UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele → Uma lihlala kuwe, "ubuntu bakho obusha" ngeke busaba benyama kodwa boMoya oNgcwele. Inyama akusiyo ekaMoya oNgcwele. Uma ungowenyama, usuke ungenaye uMoya oNgcwele kaKristu, akayena okaKristu → Uma uyinyama “yomhlaba” Umuntu wenyama, umuntu wenyama, indoda endala ka-Adamu, isoni ngaphansi komthetho, isigqila sesono. ungeyena okaKristu, awukazalwa kabusha, futhi awunawo uMoya oNgcwele. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Uchofoza lesi sihloko ukuze ufunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukwamukela futhi "ukholelwe" kuJesu Kristu njengoMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, singathandaza ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izofela esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu" → 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! Futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Ukukhumula indoda endala nezenzo zayo yavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Esikhathini esizayo, sizozuza ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Khulekani egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.05

articles.title: Incazelo yenkinga: Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 3 ivesi 9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye;

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ngezincazelo zemibuzo enzima ndawonye “Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona” Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” wathuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe lakhulunywa ngezandla zakhe, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Siyazi ukuthi wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu , 1 ngeke one , 2 Abukho ubugebengu , 3 Awukwazi ukwenza ubugebengu → Ngoba wazalwa nguNkulunkulu → isigebengu Angikaze ngimbone futhi abazi insindiso kaJesu Kristu . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

( 1 ) Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona

Ake sifunde 1 Johane 3:9 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye, futhi angoni, ngokuba uzelwe nguNkulunkulu. Uma sivula iSahluko 5, ivesi 18, siyazi ukuthi wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke one; ngingakwazi ukumlimaza .

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala → Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu 1 Awusoze wona, 2 abukho ubugebengu, 3 Awukwazi ukona → Amaphesenti ayikhulu, ngokuphelele, futhi nakanjani ngeke one → Lokhu okukaNkulunkulu 【 iqiniso 】 Akusona isimiso "somuntu". . →Siyini isono? Noma ubani owonayo wephula umthetho kuyisono - bhekisela kuJohane 1 Isahluko 3 Ivesi 4 → Noma ubani ozelwe nguNkulunkulu ngeke aphule umthetho, futhi uma engawephuli umthetho → "ngeke one". Amen? Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Amasonto amaningi namuhla anjalo ukuhunyushwa kabi La mavesi amabili adukise abazalwane nodade. Njengokuhunyushwa Okusha nezinye izinguqulo → kuyaqondakala ukuthi amakholwa ngeke ona "ngokuvamile noma ngokuqhubekayo". Qonda nje “iqiniso” likaNkulunkulu eliphelele njengeqiniso elilinganiselwe. Ngenxa yokuthi [iqiniso] alihambisani "nomuntu" → ukucabanga okunengqondo, bashintsha "iqiniso eliphelele" likaNkulunkulu libe "iqiniso elihlobene" lomuntu → "njengenyoka" "elinga" u-Eva ukuba adle "okungadliwayo" ensimini ka-Eva. I-Edene Isithelo esisemthini wokuhle nokubi siyefana → “Mhla udla kuso uyakufa nokufa” → Lokhu kuqinisekile futhi kuphelele → “Inyoka” enobuqili yashintsha umyalo kaNkulunkulu “ophelele” waba ngu-100%. "isihlobo" esisodwa → "Uyadla Uma ufa, ungase ungafi." Uyabona, “inyoka” nayo ilinga abantu ngale ndlela, ishintsha “iqiniso” likaNkulunkulu eliseBhayibhelini libe “imfundiso yomuntu” ukuze likufundise futhi likudukise endleleni yeqiniso yevangeli. Uyaqonda?

( 2 ) Kungani umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni?

Nansi impendulo enemininingwane:

1 UJesu wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → ukuze asikhulule ezonweni zethu - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-7
2 Ukhululiwe emthethweni nasekuqalekisweni kwawo→Bheka amaRoma 7:6 kanye namaGal 3:13
3 Hhayi ngaphansi komthetho, futhi lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa → Bheka amaRoma 6:14 nabaseRoma 4:15
futhi wangcwatshwa
4 Hlukanisa umuntu omdala nokuziphatha kwawo→Bheka abaseKolose 3:9 nabase-Efesu 4:22
5 “Umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena owomuntu omdala → bheka eyabaseRoma 8:9-10 . Qaphela: “Umuntu omusha” ozelwe uNkulunkulu ufihlwe kuNkulunkulu kanye noKristu futhi “akayena” womuntu omdala owona ku-Adamu → Ngicela ubuyele emuva uyofuna → “Umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu” engahlanganyela nawe ngokuningiliziwe odabeni oludlule akulona olwabantu abadala.
6 UNkulunkulu udlulisele ukuphila kwethu embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo → Bheka KwabaseKolose 1:13 → Abasibo abezwe, njengoba nje nami ngingeyena owezwe—Bheka uJohane 17:16.
Qaphela: “Ukuphila kwethu okusha” sekukhona kakade embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo, futhi akukhona okwemithetho yezimiso zenyama, futhi akwephuli imithetho. Uyaqonda?
7 Sesivele sikuKristu → Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila okuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa - Bheka KwabaseRoma 8:1-2 → Ubani ongabeka icala kwabakhethiweyo bakaNkulunkulu? Ingabe uNkulunkulu ubalungisisile (noma nguNkulunkulu obalungisisayo) - Roma 8:33

[Qaphela]: Sibhala amaphuzu angu-7 angenhla ombhalo wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu→ 1 Awusoze wona, 2 abukho ubugebengu, 3 Angoni ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye, angoni ngokuba ezelwe nguNkulunkulu. Amen! Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Haleluya! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 3 ) Wonke umuntu owonayo akambonanga noma akamazi uJesu

Uyalazi “igama likaJesu”? →"Igama likaJesu" lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo! Amen.

→ “UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuze wonke umuntu okholwa yiyo angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. okufanayo ngezansi), ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye : Ukufa kukaJesu esiphambanweni kukukhulule esonweni → Uyakukholwa? Uma ungakukholwa, khona-ke uzolahlwa ngokwesono sokungakholwa kwakho. Uyaqonda?

Ngakho-ke kuthiwa ngezansi → Lowo ohlala kuye akoni; Bantwanyana bami, ningalingeka. Lowo owenza ukulunga ulungile, njengoba nje uJehova elungile. Lowo owenza isono ungokaSathane, ngoba uSathane wonile kwasekuqaleni. INdodana kaNkulunkulu yabonakala ukuba ichithe imisebenzi kaSathane. Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 3 Amavesi 6-10 kanye noJohane Isahluko 3 Amavesi 16-18.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.06

articles.title: UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngezinhliziyo zethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 8 amavesi 16-17 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Thumelani izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiweyo nelikhulunywe ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yenu. Isinkwa silethwa kude ezulwini, sinikezwa thina ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kokomoya kwande! Amen . UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza kanye nomoya wethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu;

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngezinhliziyo zethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

( 1 ) Yizwani izwi leqiniso

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde kwabase-Efesu 1:13-14 ndawonye: Ngemva kokuzwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwe kuKristu, namukela isithembiso sikaMoya oNgcwele. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe.

Qaphela]: Ngiye ngabhala ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla → Njengoba nizwile izwi leqiniso → Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, futhi uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, futhi uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. ..."ULizwi waba yinyama" kusho ukuthi "uNkulunkulu" waba yinyama → wazalwa yintombi uMariya → waqanjwa ngokuthi [uJesu] futhi wahlala phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. … Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise, embonakalisile. Inkomba--Johane 1 Isahluko 1-2, 14, 18. → Mayelana nezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, esilizwile, salibona, sazibona ngamehlo ethu, futhi salithinta ngezandla zethu → "iNkosi uJesu Kristu" ibhekisela ku-1 Johane 1: Isahluko 1. →

【 UJesu ungumfanekiso weqiniso wobuNkulunkulu 】

UNkulunkulu, owakhuluma endulo kokhokho bethu ngabaprofethi izikhathi eziningi nangezindlela eziningi, usekhulumile kithi kulezi zinsuku zokugcina ngeNdodana ayimise ibe yindlalifa yakho konke, adala ngayo umhlaba wonke. Ungukubenyezela kwenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu → "umfanekiso wangempela kaNkulunkulu", futhi usekela zonke izinto ngomyalo wamandla akhe. Ngemva kokuba esehlambulule abantu ezonweni zabo, wahlala phansi ngakwesokunene soMkhulu ezulwini. Njengoba igama abizwa ngalo lihle kakhulu kunamagama ezingelosi, uzidlula kude. Isikhombo - Hebheru 1:1-4.

【 UJesu uyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila 】

UTomasi wathi kuye: “Nkosi, asazi lapho uya khona; pho, singayazi kanjani indlela na?” Wathi kuye: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; Baba ngaphandle kokuthi Ngami

( 2 ) ivangeli lensindiso yakho

1 KwabaseKorinte amavesi 153-4 “Ivangeli” enganishumayeza lona: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu, wembelwa njengokwemibhalo, nokuthi, ngokwemibhalo, uvusiwe okwesibili ngezinsuku ezintathu; Qaphela: UJesu Kristu wafela izono zethu → 1 wakhululwa esonweni, 2 wakhululwa emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho, futhi wembelwa → 3 wakhumula umuntu omdala nezenzo zawo → wabuye wavuka ngosuku lwesithathu → 4 sibizwa Silungisisiwe futhi samukela ukutholwa njengamadodana kaNkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

( 3 ) Thola uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu

Lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yenu, futhi nikholwa kuKristu, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. Isikhombo - Efesu 1:13-14.

( 4 ) UMoya oNgcwele ufakaza ngezinhliziyo zethu ukuthi singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu

Ngokuba aniwamukelanga umoya wobugqila, ukuze nihlale ekwesabeni; bayizindlalifa, izindlalifa zikaNkulunkulu, lezindlalifa kanye loKristu. Uma sihlupheka kanye naye, sizokhazinyuliswa kanye naye. — Roma 8:15-17

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa kaJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.03.07

articles.title: Incazelo yobunzima: Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha akayena owendoda endala
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyabaseRoma isahluko 8 nevesi 9 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye→Sichaza izinkinga ezinzima "Umuntu ozelwe kabusha akayena owomuntu omdala" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” wathuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo, ezilotshiwe futhi zashunyayelwa ngezwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone iqiniso elingokomoya → siqonde ukuthi “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena “owomuntu omdala” ka-Adamu. Amen.

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

“Umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena owomuntu omdala ka-Adamu

Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseRoma 8:9 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

[Qaphela]: Umoya kaNkulunkulu unguMoya kaNkulunkulu uBaba → Umoya Ongcwele, Umoya kaKristu → Umoya Ongcwele, Umoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu → noMoya Ongcwele, bonke bangumoya owodwa → "Umoya Ongcwele"! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? → Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala kuwe → "uzalwa kabusha", futhi elithi "wena" libhekisela "kumuntu omusha" ozelwe uNkulunkulu → hhayi ngenyama → okusho ukuthi, "hhayi okwenyama yomuntu omdala u-Adamu → kodwa ngoMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?
Ukuhlukaniswa kwabantu abasha kwabadala:

( 1 ) ehlukanisiwe ekuzalweni kabusha

Abasha: 1 Abazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 Abazelwe ngevangeli, iqiniso kuKristu Jesu, 3 Abazelwe nguNkulunkulu → bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu! Amen. Bheka kuJohane 3:5, 1 Korinte 4:15, noJakobe 1:18.
Indoda endala: 1 Badalwa ngothuli, abantwana baka-Adamu no-Eva, 2 abazalwa ngenyama yabazali babo, 3 bemvelo, benesono, basemhlabeni, futhi ekugcineni bayobuyela othulini → bangabantwana bomuntu. Bheka uGenesise 2:7 neyoku-1 Korinte 15:45

( 2 ) ngokwehlukana ngokomoya

Abasha: Labo abangaboMoya oNgcwele, kaJesu, kaKristu, kaYise, kaNkulunkulu → bembathiswa umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu → bangcwele, abanasono, futhi abanakona, abanasici, abangcolile, abanakonakala, abakwazi yokubola, engakwazi ukugula, engakwazi ukufa. Ukuphila okuphakade! Amen - bheka uJohane 11:26
Indoda endala: Emhlabeni, eka-Adamu, ezelwe yinyama yabazali, engokwemvelo → enesono, ethengiswe esonweni, engcolile futhi engcolile, ekonakalayo, ekonakalayo ngenkanuko, efayo, futhi ekugcineni iyobuyela othulini. Bheka uGenesise 3:19

( 3 ) Hlukanisa phakathi "okubonwayo" kanye "nokungabonwa"

Abasha: "Umuntu omusha" noKristu I-Tibetan KuNkulunkulu → Bheka KwabaseKolose 3:3 Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. →Manje iNkosi uJesu evusiwe kakade isisezulwini, ihlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba, futhi “umuntu wethu omusha owenziwe kabusha” ufihliwe lapho, ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu uBaba! Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? →Bheka kweyabase-Efesu 2:6 owasivusa wasihlalisa kanye naye ezindaweni zasezulwini kanye noKristu Jesu. →Lapho uKristu, ongukuphila kwethu, ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Bheka kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 ivesi 4 .

Qaphela: UKristu" phila "Enhliziyweni" yakho, Hhayi bukhoma “Enyameni yomuntu omdala ka-Adamu, “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu umzimba womzimba → Zonke zifihliwe, zifihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu → Ngalolo suku lapho uJesu Kristu ebuya futhi, uyozalwa nguNkulunkulu." osanda kufika " umzimba womzimba Intando avele Phuma futhi ube noKristu enkazimulweni. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Indoda endala: “Indoda endala” ingumzimba onesono owaphuma ku-Adamu, futhi abanye bayakwazi ukuzibona yona ingumzimba womphefumulo wenyama ovela ku-Adamu! Yonke imicabango, iziphambeko kanye nezifiso ezimbi zenyama kuyovezwa ngalo mzimba wokufa. Kodwa “umphefumulo nomzimba” walendoda endala kwakusesiphambanweni noKristu ilahlekile . Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Ngakho "umzimba womphefumulo" wale ndoda endala akusikho okwakho →Umzimba "womuntu omusha" ozelwe nguNkulunkulu! → ozelwe nguNkulunkulu →" umoya “NguMoya oNgcwele,” umphefumulo "Ngumphefumulo kaKristu," umzimba "Ngumzimba kaKristu! Uma sidla isidlo seNkosi, sidla, siphuze okweNkosi." umzimba negazi "! Sinayo umzimba kaKristu futhi umphefumulo wokuphila . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Amasonto amaningi namuhla imfundiso Iphutha likulokhu → Ukungaqhathanisi umzimba womphefumulo ka-Adamu nomzimba womphefumulo kaKristu hlukana , imfundiso yabo →"ukusindisa"→umphefumulo ka-Adamu→ukuhlakulela umzimba wenyama futhi ube umTao; →“umzimba womphefumulo” kaKristu walahlwa .

Ake sibone → okwashiwo iNkosi uJesu: “Noma ubani olahlekelwa ukuphila kwakhe (ukuphila noma umphefumulo) ngenxa yami kanye nevangeli → uyolahlekelwa “umphefumulo” ka-Adamu → futhi “uyosindisa” ukuphila kwakhe → → “ukusindisa umphefumulo wakhe”; "imvelo" - bheka kweyoku-1 Korinte 15:45 → Ngakho-ke, kufanele ahlanganiswe noKristu futhi abethelwe ukuze abhubhise umzimba wesono futhi alahlekelwe ukuphila kwakhe → Uvuko nokuzalwa kabusha kanye noKristu! Kuzuziwe → "umphefumulo" kaKristu → lokhu →" Usindise umphefumulo " ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka uMarku 8:34-35 .

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Ensimini yase-Edene uNkulunkulu wadala “umoya” ka-Adamu njengomoya wemvelo. Manje uNkulunkulu ukuholela kulo lonke iqiniso ngokuthumela izisebenzi → Qonda ukuthi uma "ulahlekelwa" umphefumulo ka-Adamu → uzothola umphefumulo "kaKristu", okungukuthi, sindisa umphefumulo wakho! Uyazikhethela → Uyawufuna umphefumulo ka-Adamu? Kuthiwani ngomphefumulo kaKristu? Njengokuthi → 1 Umuthi wokuhle nokubi, “umuthi omubi” wahlukaniswa emthini wokuphila, “umuthi omuhle”; 2 Isivumelwano Esidala neSivumelwano Esisha zihlukene” njengezivumelwano ezimbili; 3 Isivumelwano somthetho sehlukene nesivumelwano somusa;4 Izimbuzi zihlukaniswa nezimvu; 5 Owasemhlabeni wehlukaniswe nowasezulwini; 6 U-Adamu wehlukaniswa no-Adamu wokugcina; 7 Umuntu omdala uhlukaniswe nomuntu omusha → [Indoda endala] Umzimba wangaphandle uwohloka kancane kancane ngenxa yezifiso zobugovu futhi ubuyela othulini; [Omusha] Ngokuvuselelwa koMoya oNgcwele, sikhula sibe ngabantu abadala usuku nosuku, sigcwele isimo sokugcwala kukaKristu, sizakha kanye noKristu othandweni. Amen! Bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:13-16

Ngakho-ke, “umuntu omusha” ozelwe uNkulunkulu → kumelwe ahlubuke, akhumule, futhi ashiye “umuntu omdala” ka-Adamu, ngoba “umuntu omdala” akayena “owomuntu omusha” → izono zika-Adamu. inyama yomuntu omdala ngeke ibalelwe “kumuntu omusha” → Isikhombo 2 Korinte 5:19 → Ngemva kokumisa isivumelwano esisha, ithi: “Angisayikuzikhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo. "Bheka kumaHeberu 10:17 → Kumelwe ugcine "Isivumelwano Esisha" "Umuntu omusha" uhlala kuKristu → ungcwele, akanasono, futhi akanakona .

Ngale ndlela, “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi ophila ngoMoya oNgcwele kufanele enze ngoMoya oNgcwele → abulale zonke izenzo ezimbi zomzimba womuntu omdala. Ngale ndlela, “ngeke usazivuma” izono zakho nsuku zonke ngenxa yezono zenyama yomuntu omdala, futhi uthandazela igazi eliyigugu likaJesu ukuba lihlanze futhi lisule izono zakho. Sengikhulume okuningi, ngiyazibuza ukuthi ngabe niqonda ngokucacile? Kwangathi uMoya weNkosi uJesu ungakukhuthaza → uvule izingqondo zakho ukuze uqonde iBhayibheli, Qonda ukuthi “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akayena “owomuntu omdala” . Amen

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ukuzalwa kabusha (Isifundo 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula, bangane abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 1 amavesi 12-13 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa ebizweni lakhe. Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukuzalwa kabusha" Cha. 3 Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho" ibandla "Sithuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywe ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Isinkwa sithathwa sivela kude ezulwini, futhi sinikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kwande! Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 wazalwa ngevangeli leqiniso, 3 Labo abazelwe nguNkulunkulu→bonke baphuma koyedwa, futhi bonke bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

1. Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Kuyini ukuzalwa kwegazi, ukuzalwa kwenkanuko, nokuzalwa kwentando yomuntu?
Impendulo: Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya (“umoya” noma “inyama”) - 1 Korinte 15:45 .

UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. Genesise 2:7

[Qaphela:] U-Adamu, owadalwa ngothuli, waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya, “okungukuthi, umuntu ophilayo wenyama negazi → unomzimba wenyama negazi, unobubi izinkanuko nezifiso, futhi uNkulunkulu ubiza u-Adamu "umuntu" ngakho-ke, bonke abantu abavela ku-Adamu Konke okuphuma ezimpandeni → kuzalwa ngegazi, inkanuko, nentando yomuntu! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Umbuzo: Kuyini okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:1
“ULizwi” waba yinyama → okungukuthi, “uNkulunkulu” waba yinyama, futhi “uNkulunkulu” ungumoya → okungukuthi, “uMoya” waba yinyama, wakhulelwa intombi emsulwa ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wazalwa, waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu. Bheka kuMathewu 1:21, Johane 1:14, 4:24

UJesu wazalwa nguBaba waseZulwini → Kuzo zonke izingelosi, iyiphi uNkulunkulu ake athi kuyo: “Wena uyiNdodana yami, mina ngikuzele namuhla? Yimuphi kubo athi: Mina ngizakuba nguYise, yena abe yindodana yami? Hebheru 1:5

Umbuzo: Singamamukela kanjani uJesu?
Impendulo: Siyakholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uma sidla umzimba wakhe futhi siphuza igazi leNkosi, siyoba “nokuphila kukaJesu Kristu” ngaphakathi kwethu. Bheka uJohane 6:53-56

UBaba uJehova unguNkulunkulu, iNdodana uJesu unguNkulunkulu, noMoya oNgcwele uMduduzi unguNkulunkulu! Lapho samukela uJesu, siyamamukela uNkulunkulu. Ukwamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe wukuba noJesu Uma uneNdodana "uJesu", unoBaba. Amen! Bheka ku-1 Johane 2:23

Ngakho-ke, wonke owemukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe, wemukela uJesu, futhi wemukela uBaba oNgcwele! "Umuntu omusha" uzalwa kabusha ngaphakathi kuwe → Lolu hlobo lomuntu aluzalwa ngegazi "lika-Adamu", hhayi ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa nguNkulunkulu.
Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

2. Wazalwa nguNkulunkulu (okungeyena owo) umzimba ka-Adamu

Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseRoma 8:9 Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, anisibo abenyama, kodwa ningabakaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

Qaphela: "Umoya kaNkulunkulu" → uMoya kaJehova, uMoya kaBaba, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele, noMoya oNgcwele weqiniso! Kuphinde kuthiwe uMduduzi kanye noGcobo.

Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya oNgcwele uhlala kuwe! "Umuntu" uzalwa kabusha kuwe - bheka kwabaseRoma 7:22. Lo “muntu” ungumzimba kaJesu, igazi likaJesu, ukuphila kukaKristu, umuntu womoya lo “muntu omusha” ungumzimba kaKristu! Amen

Wena “umuntu omusha” awuwona “owomuntu omdala” womzimba wenyama ka-Adamu, umzimba “womuntu omusha” ongafi awuwona “womuntu omdala” womzimba ka-Adamu owonakalayo; “Umuntu omusha” wakho ozelwe kabusha ungokaMoya oNgcwele, uKristu, noNkulunkulu uBaba! Amen

Uma uKristu kuwe, "umuntu omdala" enyameni ufa ngenxa yesono → wafa kanye noKristu; kodwa umphefumulo uyalungisiswa futhi uphila "ngokholo" → "umuntu omusha" uhlala noKristu! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka amaRoma 8:9-10

3. Wonke umuntu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akasoze ona

Ake siphendukele ku-1 Johane 3:9 Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; futhi angoni, ngokuba uzelwe nguNkulunkulu.

Umbuzo: Kungani labo abazelwe nguNkulunkulu bengoni?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlala enhliziyweni - Johane 3:9
2 Kodwa uMoya kaNkulunkulu uhlala kini, futhi anisibo abenyama - Roma 8:9
3 Umuntu omusha ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uhlala kuJesu Kristu - 1 Johane 3:6
4 Umthetho kaMoya wokuphila ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa - Roma 8:2
5 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - Roma 4:15
6 Sigeziwe, sangcweliswa, salungisiswa ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu - 1 Korinte 6:11
7 Izinto ezindala zidlulile;

“Umuntu omdala” wabethelwa esiphambanweni noKristu → izinto ezindala zidlulile;

“Umuntu omusha” uhlala noKristu, manje uhlala kuKristu, usehlanziwe, wangcweliswa, futhi walungisiswa ngoMoya oNgcwele → yonke into isibe yintsha (ebizwa ngokuthi umuntu omusha)!

Umbuzo: AmaKristu (abasha) angakwazi yini ukona?
Impendulo: Akekho ozelwe nguNkulunkulu oyokona; Bheka ku-1 Johane 3:8-10, 5:18

Umbuzo: Abanye abashumayeli bathi amaKristu asaqhubeka enza izono?
Impendulo: Abantu abathi (abazelwe nguNkulunkulu) bangona abaqondi insindiso kaKristu Bakhohliswa ngamaphutha. Ngoba labo abonayo abazalwa kabusha; Lowo ongenaye uMoya kaKristu akasiye okaKristu.

(Uma uKristu ekini:)

1 Umzimba “omdala” ufile ngenxa yesono → Lowo “okholwa” ukuthi umuntu omdala ufile ukhululekile esonweni - Roma 6:6-7
2 Ukukhululwa emthethweni → Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - KwabaseRoma 4:15
3 Khumulani umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe → Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama (izenzo ezindala) - Roma 8:9, Kol 3:9
4 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asibalwa → "iTestamente Elisha" UNkulunkulu ngeke esazikhumbula izono zakho neziphambeko zakho zokuziphatha komuntu omdala kwabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu ngenxa yokuthi ufile (bheka Kol. 3:3 ) Ngakho-ke UNkulunkulu akakhumbuli! — Roma 5:13; Heberu 10:16-18
5 Ngokuba ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile (KwabaseRoma 7:8) → Nisusiwe esonweni, nasemthethweni, nasebuntwini obudala nemisebenzi yakhe ngomzimba kaKristu. Senifile - Kol. 3:3 “umuntu omusha” wenu akayena owezenzo neziphambeko zenyama yomuntu omdala uNkulunkulu ngeke esazikhumbula izono neziphambeko zenu, ngakho uPawulu wathi! Zicabangeni ningabafileyo esonweni futhi niphilele uNkulunkulu ngoKristu Jesu - KwabaseRoma 6:11
6 Umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya uyaphila ngenxa yokulunga (KwabaseRoma 8:10).

Umbuzo: Umzimba wesono ufa kanjani?
Impendulo: Kholwa ekufeni noKristu → ukuzwa ukufa komuntu omdala futhi ukukhumule kancane kancane → thatha umzimba ofileyo, umzimba ofayo, umzimba owonakalayo, futhi umzimba wangaphandle uyobhidliza kancane kancane futhi wonakale (Efesu 4:21) -22) Umzimba ka-Adamu onesono Uvela othulini futhi uyobuyela othulini. —Bheka uGenesise 3:19

Umbuzo: Baphila kanjani abasanda kungena?
Impendulo: Phila noKristu → Umuntu omusha (umuntu ozelwe kabusha ngokomoya) uhlala kuKristu Jesu, futhi kuwe (umuntu omusha) ukhula usuku nosuku abe ngumuntu, ekhulela esimweni sikaKristu. Uma "ingcebo" ibekwe esitsheni sobumba, izobonisa ukuthi lamandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu Ivuselela ukufa kukaJesu futhi ibonise ukuphila kukaJesu → ukushumayela ivangeli, ukushumayela iqiniso, nokuholela abantu abaningi. ukulunga! Izwa ukuvuka noKristu kanye nokuhlengwa komzimba. Impilo kamoya "yomuntu omusha" izozuza isisindo esingenakuqhathaniswa senkazimulo yaphakade Lapho uKristu ebonakala, umzimba wakho uzovela (okungukuthi, umzimba uhlengiwe), futhi uzovuswa ngobuhle nakakhulu! Amen. Funda eyesi-2 Korinte 4:7-18

7 Wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngoba ilizwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; 1 Johane 3:9 , 5:18

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla sabelana ngokuthi "Ukuzalwa kabusha" lapha.
Masikhuleke kuNkulunkulu kanyekanye: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Khanyisa njalo amehlo ethu okomoya futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya, siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi siqonde ukuzalwa kabusha, 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngezwi leqiniso levangeli, 3 ozelwe nguNkulunkulu! Lowo ohlala kuJesu Kristu ungcwele, akanasono, futhi akoni. Akekho ozelwe nguNkulunkulu oyokona, ngoba sonke sizelwe nguNkulunkulu. Amen
Egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

IVangeli Linikezelwe kumama wami othandekayo!

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli:

Izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye abasebenzi basekela futhi basize umsebenzi wevangeli likaKristu futhi basebenze ndawonye nalabo abakholelwa kuleli vangeli! Amagama abangcwele abashumayelayo nabahlanganyela lokhu kukholwa alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila. Amen Reference Filipi 4:1-3

Bafowethu nodadewethu Khumbulani ukuqoqa

Isithombe esingezansi: Wazalelwa u-Adamu futhi U-Adamu wokugcina ( ozelwe nguNkulunkulu )

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Chofoza lesi sihloko ukuze usifunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukusamukela futhi" kholwani “UJesu Kristu unguMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, ingabe kufanele sithandaze ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu Wafa esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu" → 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Susani umuntu omdala nemikhuba yawo; Wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade! Esikhathini esizayo, sizozuza ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Khulekani egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ihubo: Amazing Grace

Siyakwamukela abafowethu nodadewethu abaningi ukusebenzisa isiphequluli ukusesha - Nkosi ibandla likaJesu Krestu -Hlanganyela nathi futhi nisebenze ndawonye ekushumayeleni ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

articles.title: Ukuzalwa kabusha (Isifundo 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu!

Namuhla siyaqhubeka nokuhlola ukwabelana kwethrafikhi "Ukuzalwa kabusha" 2

Isifundo 2: Izwi Leqiniso leVangeli

Ake siphenye kweyoku-1 Korinte 4:15 emaBhayibhelini ethu futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Nina enifunda ngoKristu ningaba nabafundisi abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi kodwa obaba bayingcosana, ngokuba mina nginizele ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu.

Buyela emuva kuJakobe 1:18 ngokwentando yakhe wasizala ngezwi leqiniso, ukuze sibe njengolibo kuyo yonke indalo yakhe.

La mavesi amabili akhuluma ngawo

1 UPawuli wathi! Ngoba mina ngizalizala ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu

2 UJakobe wathi! UNkulunkulu wasizala ngeqiniso

1. Sazalwa endleleni yeqiniso

Umbuzo: Iyiphi indlela yeqiniso?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

Incazelo yeBhayibheli: “Iqiniso” liyiqiniso, futhi elithi “Tao” nguNkulunkulu!

1 Iqiniso nguJesu! Amen
UJesu wathi, “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami

2 “ULizwi” unguNkulunkulu - Johane 1:1-2

“ULizwi” waba yinyama - Johane 1:14
“UNkulunkulu” waba yinyama - Johane 1:18
ULizwi waba yinyama, wakhulelwa yintombi, wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu! Amen. Funda kuMathewu 1:18, 21
Ngakho-ke, uJesu unguNkulunkulu, iZwi, neZwi leqiniso!
UJesu uyiqiniso! Iqiniso lasizala, nguJesu owasizalayo! Amen.

Umzimba wethu wenyama (umuntu omdala) wazalwa ngu-Adamu ngaphambili; Ngakho, uyaqonda?
Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. Efesu 1:13

2. Nazalwa ngevangeli kuKristu Jesu

Umbuzo: Liyini ivangeli?
Impendulo: Sichaza kabanzi

1 UJesu wathi: “UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile;
Ngibize ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu;
Abathunjwa bayakhululwa,
Izimpumputhe kumele zibone,
Ukukhulula abacindezelweyo,
Isimemezelo sonyaka kaNkulunkulu owamukelekayo wejubili. Luka 4:18-19

2 UPetro wathi! Nizelwe kabusha, kungengambewu eyonakeleyo, kodwa ngengenakonakala, ngezwi likaNkulunkulu eliphilayo nelihlala njalo. …Izwi leNkosi kuphela elihlala phakade. Leli yivangeli elashunyayelwa kinina. 1 Petru 1:23, 25

articles.title: Ukuzalwa kabusha (Isifundo 1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubangane bami abathandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 3 amavesi 5-6 futhi sifunde ndawonye: UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, okuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Ukuzalwa kabusha" Umkhuleko weSifundo 1: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! 【Owesifazane oqotho】 ibandla owathuma izisebenzi ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywa ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Kuphela ngokuqonda “ukuzalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya” singangena embusweni kaNkulunkulu ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uJohane 3:4-8 ndawonye: UNikodima wathi kuye: “Umuntu angaphinda azalwe kanjani esemdala na? “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu; umangale lapho ngithi: “Umoya uphephetha lapho othanda khona; uMoya.”

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo egciniwe engenhla → mayelana【 ukuzalwa kabusha 】Umbuzo → INkosi uJesu yaphendula uNikodemu: “Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu →

( 1 ) amanzi agelezayo

buza: Hlobo luni lwamanzi uJesu alusho lapho ethi “amanzi” lapha?
impendulo: Nakhu amanzi "Akubhekiseli emanzini omthombo, amanzi omfula, noma amanzi olwandle phansi. Amanzi aphansi "ayisithunzi", futhi "isithunzi" amanzi afanekisela amanzi asezulwini.

1 UJesu wathi" amanzi "ibhekisela ku amanzi agelezayo —Bheka kuJohane Isahluko 4 Amavesi 10-14,

2 yebo Amanzi aphilayo aphuma emthonjeni wokuphila —Bheka isAmbulo 21:6

3 yebo Amanzi okomoya avela edwaleni lomoya avela ezulwini —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 10:4.

4 yebo Imifula yamanzi aphilayo igeleza isuka esiswini sikaKristu ! →UJesu washo lokhu ebhekisela kukho incwadi Abantu bakhe bazohlupheka" UMoya oNgcwele "Wathi → incwadi Futhi labo ababhapathizwayo bayosindiswa → okungukuthi Wabhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka uJohane 7:38-39 noMarku 16:16.

( 2 ) ezelwe nguMoya oNgcwele

→"uMoya oNgcwele" ubhekisela kuMoya kaNkulunkulu uBaba noMoya kaJesu→NguMoya oNgcwele! Amen. →UJesu wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya futhi wazalwa “ngoMoya oNgcwele”! →UJesu wacela uBaba ukuba amthumelele "i-Paraclete" → Umoya Ongcwele Weqiniso → "Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami. Ngizocela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma ukuhumusha: Umyalelo) (UMduduzi; yena ongezansi), ukuze abe nani phakade, uMoya weqiniso, lowo izwe elingemamukele, ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi, kepha nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhlala nani, kuwena inkomba - Johane 14 amavesi 15-17.

( 3 ) Okuzelwe nguMoya kunguMoya

unkulunkulu" umoya wendodana ethandekayo “Ngenani ezinhliziyweni zenu! → Kodwa lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe phansi komthetho, ukuba ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. madodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu (ekuqaleni eyethu), omemeza ethi, “Abba! baba! Ngakho-ke kusukela manje awuseyona inceku, kodwa usuyindodana; futhi uma uyindodana, uyindlalifa ngoNkulunkulu.”— Galathiya 4:4-7 .

Ngokuba sonke sabhapathizwa ngaMoya munye emzimbeni munye, futhi saphuza kuwo amanzi omoya afanayo, kuMoya munye . Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 12:13

Yilokhu uJesu akusho: “Ngaphandle kokuba umuntu azalwe ngamanzi (amanzi aphilayo omthombo wokuphila) nangoMoya oNgcwele, akanakungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu → Labo abazalwa ngenyama bazalwa “ngenyama yabo. abazali bayobola, kancane kancane babe babi, futhi abanakulidla ifa likaNkulunkulu. kusuka ku" umoya “Ukuzalwa kufana nomoya ovunguza nomaphi lapho uthanda khona. Uyawuzwa umsindo womoya, kodwa awukwazi lapho uvela khona nalapho oya khona. yizwa Ivangeli , cacile indlela yeqiniso kholwani UJesu Kristu ,Ungu" ngokungazi "nini" UMoya oNgcwele "yangena" inhliziyo yakho ", usuvele" ukuzalwa kabusha "Yebo. Imfihlakalo lena! Njengoba umoya uphephetha noma kuphi lapho uthanda khona, kanjalo wonke umuntu ozelwe nguMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

Mngani Othandekayo! Siyabonga Ngomoya KaJesu → Chofoza lesi sihloko ukuze usifunde futhi ulalele intshumayelo yevangeli Uma uzimisele ukusamukela futhi" kholwani “UJesu Kristu unguMsindisi nothando Lwakhe olukhulu, ingabe kufanele sithandaze ndawonye?

Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen. Siyabonga Baba waseZulwini ngokuthumela iNdodana yakho ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba izofela esiphambanweni "ngenxa yezono zethu" → 1 usikhulule esonweni, 2 Sikhulule emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo. 3 Ukhululekile emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni beHayidesi. Amen! Futhi wangcwatshwa → 4 Ukukhumula indoda endala nezenzo zayo yavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 5 Sithethelele! Yamukela uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, uzalwe kabusha, uvuswe, usindiswe, uthole ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, futhi uthole ukuphila okuphakade!
