Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi “inhliziyo yokuphenduka” isho ukuthi ngabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, ngoba lokho esihlupheka ngakho kufanele esikwenzayo! Amen .

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ebethelwe esiphambanweni noKristu, ufanele ukuphenduka

(1) Ebethelwe noJesu, ukuphenduka kweselelesi

Ake sifunde uLuka isahluko 23 amavesi 39-41 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Esinye sezelelesi ezimbili ezazibethelwe ndawonye samhleka futhi sathi: “Awusiye uKristu wena kanye nathi! Wathi: ". Njengoba ningaphansi kwesijeziso esifanayo, animesabi yini uNkulunkulu? Kumele, Ngoba esikutholayo kuyakufanelekela esikwenzayo , kodwa lomuntu akakaze enze into embi. "

Qaphela: Izigebengu ezimbili ezabethelwa noJesu "Iziboshwa" zibhekisela kubantu abangakwazi ukwenza izono Babizwa ngokuthi "izoni" → ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, ngakho inhliziyo yesigebengu igcwele umlomo waso. Vele ukusho → kufanele, ngoba lokho thina nge ngalokho thina Yenza kwe" ngokulingana "→Yilokhu okushiwo ukubethelwa noJesu" Inhliziyo efanele ukuphenduka ".Lokhu" ukuphenduka kweqiniso ".→ "Kholwa eVangelini" futhi usindiswe →Isiboshwa sathi: "Jesu, lapho umbuso wakho ufika, ngicela ungikhumbule!" UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namuhla uzakuba nami eParadisi . "Izikhombo - Luka 23 amavesi 42-43.

Esinye isiboshwa sahleka uJesu sathi: "Awuyena uKristu? Zisindise kanye nathi!" Ngakho-ke, labo abangakholelwa ukuthi uJesu ungumsindisi abakwazi ukuthola insindiso kaNkulunkulu → umbuso kaNkulunkulu waphakade “iPharadesi” futhi → labo abangakholelwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu futhi umsindisi ngeke babe nasabelo ezulwini.

Isexwayiso:

Njengoba ukholelwa kuJesu njengoKristu noMsindisi, wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → 1 Zisindise esonweni, uyakholwa na? 2 Uyakholwa ukuthi ukhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho? futhi wangcwatshwa, 3 Uyakholwa ukuthi usukhumule umuntu omdala nokuziphatha okuyisono kwendoda endala? →Ngenxa yokuthi umuntu omdala wabethelwa kanye noKristu, umzimba wesono usuchithiwe. 4 Uvuko ngosuku lwesithathu ~ usizalwe kabusha! Amen! Uyakukholwa noma cha? Uma ungakholelwa noma yikuphi kwalokhu okungenhla? Ngicela ukubuza unembeza wakho, kungani ukholelwa kuJesu? →Uyini umehluko phakathi kwalokhu nesigebengu esasigcona uJesu njengoKristu? Uyakusho! Kulungile?

Ngakho-ke, inhliziyo yokuphenduka ilingana, kanjalo nokholo. → Kumelwe uthele izithelo ngokuhambisana nokuphenduka. Ungasho ukuthi ngidinga nje ukukholelwa kuJesu, kodwa ungakholelwa kuye ukuze akusindise. -- 1 ngaphandle kwesono, 2 Sikhululiwe emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo, 3 Hlukanisa ikhehla nezindlela zalo zakudala. Kungenjalo ungavuswa kanjani kanye noKristu [ ukuzalwa kabusha ]Indwangu yoboya? Usuyibonile inyanga? Isikhombo-Mathewu 3 ivesi 8

Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu esho encwadini yakhe: “Uma sihlanganiswe naye ekufananeni kokufa kwakhe, siyakuhlanganiswa naye ekufananeni kokuvuka kwakhe, sazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuthi umzimba wethu ungowaphakade. kwesono kube yiNcithakalo, ukuze singabe sisaba yizigqila zesono; Uma sifa kanye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi siyophila kanye naye. → Ngibethelwe esiphambanweni kanye noKristu, Akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophila kimi Futhi ukuphila engikuphila manje enyameni ngiphila ngokukholwa eNdodaneni kaNkulunkulu, eyangithanda futhi yazinikela ngenxa yami. Izikhombo-Galathiya 2:20 namaRoma 6:5-8.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ukuphenduka 3｜Ukuphenduka Kwabafundi BakaJesu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuLuka isahluko 5 amavesi 8-11 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lapho uSimoni Petru ebona lokhu, waguqa emadolweni kaJesu wathi: “Nkosi, suka kimi, ngoba ngiyisoni!”...Kwaba njalo nakubangane bakhe, uJakobe noJohane, amadodana kaZebedewu. UJesu wathi kuSimoni: "Ungesabi; kusukela manje uzozuza abantu ogwini, bashiya konke, bamlandela uJesu." .

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nawe "ukuphenduka" Cha. ezintathu Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ngezandla zabo eziloba futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi “ukuphenduka” kwabafundi kusho “ukukholwa” kuJesu: ukushiya konke ngemuva, ukuziphika, ukuthwala isiphambano sakho, ukulandela uJesu, ukuzonda ukuphila kwesono, ukulahlekelwa ukuphila okudala, nokuzuza ukuphila okusha kukaKristu! Amen .

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Shiya konke ngemuva

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uLuka 5:8 ndawonye: Lapho uSimoni Petru ebona lokhu, wawa emadolweni kaJesu wathi, “ Nkosi ngiyeke, ngiyisoni ! Ivesi 10 UJesu wathi kuSimoni: “Ungesabi! Kusukela manje, uzowina abantu. Ivesi 11 Baletha izikebhe ezimbili ogwini, ngemva kwalokho. shiya ngemuva “Bonke, balandela uJesu.

(2) Ukuziphika

NgokukaMathewu 4:18-22 Kwathi uJesu ehamba ngaselwandle lwaseGalile wabona izelamani ezimbili, uSimoni othiwa uPetru, no-Andreya umfowabo, bephonsa inetha olwandle; UJesu wathi kubo: “Wozani, ngilandeleni, ngizakunenza abadobi babantu.” Base bewashiya masinyane amanetha abo, bamlandela. Esadlula lapho, wabona izelamani ezimbili, uJakobe kaZebedewu, noJohane umfowabo, besemkhunjini kanye noyise uZebedewu, belungisa amanetha abo, uJesu wababiza. Lahla "Phuma esikebheni", "valelisa" kuyise futhi ulandele uJesu.

(3) Thatha esakho isiphambano

Luka 14:27 "Ayikho yonke into" emuva Ukuthwala isiphambano sakho" landela futhi abanakuba ngabafundi bami.

(4) Landela uJesu

NgokukaMarku 8 34 Wayesebizela kubo isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu efuna ukungilandela, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe. landela I. NgokukaMathewu 9:9 Wathi uJesu edlula lapho, wabona indoda ethiwa uMathewu ihlezi endaweni yokuthela, wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.”

(5) Zonda ukuphila kwesono

Johane 12:25 Lowo othanda ukuphila kwakhe uyolahlekelwa yikho; inzondo Uma udedela “impilo yakho endala yesono”, kufanele ulondoloze impilo yakho “entsha” ukuze uthole ukuphila okuphakade Ngale ndlela, ingabe uyaqonda?

(6) Ukulahlekelwa ukuphila kobugebengu

NgokukaMarku 8:35 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; lahlekelwa Osindisa ukuphila uyosindisa ukuphila.

(7) Thola ukuphila kukaKristu

NgokukaMathewu 16:25 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; thola ukuphila. Amen!

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala → abafundi bakaJesu” ukuphenduka "yebo incwadi Ivangeli! Landela uJesu ~ ukuphila Shintsha okusha : 1 Shiya konke ngemuva, 2 ukuziphika, 3 Thatha isiphambano sakho, 4 Landela uJesu, 5 Zonda impilo yesono, 6 Lahla impilo yakho yobugebengu, 7 Thola impilo entsha kuKristu ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Lesi ukuphela kwenhlanganyelo nokuhlanganyela kwami nani namuhla Kwangathi abafowethu nodadewethu bangalalela ngokucophelela indlela yeqiniso futhi babelane ngendlela yeqiniso kakhudlwana → Lena indlela efanele yokuba nihambe. Loluhambo lukamoya olokuthi uvuswe kanye noKristu, ukuze uzalwe kabusha, usindiswe, ukhazinyuliswe, uklonyeliswe, uthweswe umqhele, futhi ube nokuvuka okungcono kakhulu esikhathini esizayo. ! Amen. Haleluya! Ngiyabonga Nkosi!

Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Phendukani | Angizanga ukuzobiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni ukuba ziphenduke
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuLuka 5 isahluko 32 futhi sifunde ndawonye: "UJesu" wathi, "Angizanga ukuzobiza abalungile, kodwa izoni ukuba ziphenduke."

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "ukuphenduka" Cha. eyodwa Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Ibandla likaJesu Kristu lithumela izisebenzi ezibhala ngazo futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu. Siphe ukudla ngesikhathi futhi ukhulume izinto ezingokomoya kubantu abangokomoya ukuba balalele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi uJesu weza ukuzobiza izoni ukuba ziphenduke → Kholwa evangelini futhi wamukele ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu! Amen .

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

Ake sitadishe iBhayibheli futhi sifunde uLuka 5:31-32 ndawonye: UJesu wathi kubo, “Labo abangaguli abamdingi udokotela, ngabagulayo angizanga ukuzobiza abalungileyo izoni ekuphendukeni.”

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?

Impendulo: Noma ubani owonayo weqa umthetho; . Isikhombo - 1 Johane 3:4

Umbuzo: Siyini isoni?

Impendulo: Labo abephula umthetho benze ubugebengu babizwa ngokuthi "izoni"

Umbuzo: Ngaba kanjani "isoni"

Impendulo: Ngenxa yesiphambeko somuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu → Njengoba nje isono sangena ezweni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kwafika kubo bonke abantu ngoba bonke abantu bonile. Isikhombo- KwabaseRoma 5:12

Umbuzo: Bonke bonile → Ingabe bayizigqila zesono?

Impendulo: UJesu waphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Wonke owonayo uyisigqila sesono. Reference Bible - Johane 8:34

Umbuzo: Sonke “siyizoni” futhi siyizigqila zesono Uyini inkokhelo “yesono”?

Impendulo: Ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa;

Ngakho-ke, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngithi kini: Cha! Ngaphandle kokuba niphenduke, niyobhubha kanjalo nonke!”

Umbuzo: "Izoni" zingakugwema kanjani "ukufela" ezonweni zazo?

Impendulo: "Phendukani" → "Kholwani" ukuthi uJesu unguKristu noMsindisi → UJesu wathi kubo: "Nina ningabaphansi, mina ngingowaphezulu; nina ningabalelizwe, kepha mina angisiye owaleli zwe." . Ngakho ngithi kini, niyofela ezonweni zenu uma ningakholwa ukuthi mina nginguKristu.”— Johane 8:23-24 .

Umbuzo: "Isoni" "siphenduka" kanjani?

Impendulo: "Kholwa evangelini" →Kholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uKristu, noMsindisi! UNkulunkulu wafela "izono" zethu ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu → 1 Uyasikhulula esonweni - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7, 2 Uyasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho - Gal 3 isahluko 13 ivesi, futhi wangcwatshwa → 3 Ukukhumula umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - bhekisela kwabaseKolose 3:9, Ukuvuswa ngosuku lwesithathu → 4 Ukusithethelela - bhekisela kwabaseRoma 4:25 neyoku-1 Korinte 15 Isahluko 3-4

[Qaphela]: "Phenduka"→"Ukholo"→"Ivangeli" →Ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu ensindiso kubo bonke abakholwayo, ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwa kulo; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.”— KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

Lokhu "kulunga" kusekelwe okholweni, ukuze ukholo → "ukuphenduka" → "ukukholelwa" evangelini! uNkulunkulu uzokunika" isoni "Ukuphila - ngokufa kukaKristu esiphambanweni (isoni, umzimba wesono wabhujiswa) → Shintsha ku →Ukuvuka kukaKristu kusenze kabusha ukuze silungisiswe futhi samukele " umuntu olungileyo " ukuphila. Lokhu ukuphenduka kweqiniso, ngakho iNkosi uJesu ekugcineni yathi esiphambanweni, "Kuphelile! "→UJesu weza ukuzobiza "izoni" ukuba ziphenduke futhi insindiso yaba yimpumelelo. isoni "→ ngokukholwa evangelini →UNkulunkulu wathatha ukuphila okuyisono kwendoda yakho endala→ Shintshela ku-→ " umuntu olungileyo "Kuyimpilo yomntwana kaNkulunkulu ongcwele, ongenasono! Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Bafowethu nodadewethu! Nikhule kuKristu, ningabe nisaba ngabantwana ngaphandle, nibe yizisulu zobuqili nenkohliso yabantu, nijikijelwa ngapha nangapha yiyo yonke imimoya yobuhedeni, nilandela konke ukuhlubuka; isiqalo kuze kube sekupheleni → Lalela ngokucophelela kabili futhi uzoqonda insindiso kaJesu Kristu → Kuyini ukuzalwa kabusha Yamukela umqhele, uKristu uyabuya → Uvuko ngomzimba omuhle kakhulu, futhi uyobusa noKristu esikhathini esizayo? iNkosi kuze kube phakade ezulwini elisha nasemhlabeni omusha.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kufanele nilalele izwi leqiniso kakhulu, nabelane ngokwengeziwe, nicule ngomoya wenu, nidumise ngomoya wenu, futhi ninikele imihlatshelo enamakha amnandi kuNkulunkulu! Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Ubunzima buchazwe: Ukuhlukanisa imimoya
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 4 ivesi 1 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Bazalwane abathandekayo, ningakholwa yibo bonke omoya, kodwa hlolani omoya ukuze nibone ukuthi bangabakaNkulunkulu yini, ngoba baningi abaprofethi bamanga abaphumele ezweni. Wonke umoya ovumayo ukuthi uJesu Kristu ufikile enyameni uvela kuNkulunkulu; 1 kwabaseKorinte 12:10 Futhi wenza ukuba umuntu enze izimangaliso, akhonze njengomprofethi, Futhi kwenza umuntu akwazi ukubona imimoya , futhi wenza ukuthi umuntu oyedwa akwazi ukukhuluma ngezilimi, futhi wenza umuntu oyedwa akwazi ukuhumusha izilimi.

Namuhla ngizofunda, ngihlanganyele, futhi ngihlanganyele nani nonke "Imimoya Ehlukanisayo" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [isonto] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuba iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya, ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli, futhi isenze sizwe futhi sibone iqiniso elingokomoya → isifundise ukusebenzisa uMoya oNgcwele weqiniso → ukuze sihlukanise imimoya.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Hlukanisa imimoya

(1) UMoya oNgcwele weqiniso

Masifunde iBhayibheli NgokukaJohane 14:15-17 “Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami, ngiyakucela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi (noma ukuhunyushwa: uMduduzi; yena lowo ngezansi), ukuze abe. ukanye nani kuze kube phakade, uMoya weqiniso, lowo izwe elingemamukele, ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi, kepha nina niyamazi, ngokuba uhlala nani, futhi ukini.

[Qaphela]: INkosi uJesu yathi: "Uma ningithanda, niyogcina imiyalo yami. Futhi ngizocela kuBaba, futhi uyoninika omunye uMduduzi ukuba abe nani kuze kube phakade, onguMoya weqiniso → Umoya weqiniso ufikile. , Uyokuholela “kulo lonke iqiniso”!

Ungawemukela kanjani uMoya oNgcwele? → Nakholwa kuye nani, lapho nezwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, nakholwa kuye, nabekwa uphawu ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso. — Efesu 1:13 . Qaphela: Ngemva kokuthi "uzwile" izwi leqiniso → waqonda iqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho → wakholwa kuKristu futhi wathola isithembiso【 UMoya oNgcwele ]! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

→ Ngike ngaxhumana nawe ngaphambili ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele weqiniso → uMoya oNgcwele uyiqiniso! → UNkulunkulu ungumoya: “UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uMoya weNkosi, noMoya weqiniso “ngumoya munye” → okungukuthi, uMoya oNgcwele weqiniso! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Umoya womuntu

UGenesise Isahluko 2 Ivesi 7 UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. → “Umoya” usho inyama negazi , “Umoya” ku-Adamu, ukhokho wesintu → umoya wemvelo . Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:45. →[Umoya womuntu] wafa eziphambekweni nasenyameni yakhe engasokile, okungukuthi, ukhokho wokuqala u-Adamu weqa umthetho futhi wona, futhi “umoya womuntu” wafa enyameni yakhe engasokile. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

UmShumayeli 3 Isahluko 21 Ubani owaziyo ukuthi "umoya womuntu" uyenyuka → "Umoya" womuntu uyakhuphuka njengomoya okholelwa evangelini futhi usindiswe; kodwa kulabo "bangakholwa" evangelini, emva kwemizimba yabo babuyela othulini, “imimoya” yabo isejele, okungukuthi, iHayidesi→ uKristu ngokusebenzisa umoya ]Shumayela ivangeli kubomoya abasetilongweni nakuba inyama yahlulelwa ngokukholwa kuKristu. umoya "Ukuphila ngoNkulunkulu, ngoba insindiso "yevangeli" ayikavezwa ezikhathini zasendulo. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile? Inkomba - 1 Petru Isahluko 3 Ivesi 19 no-4 Isahluko 5-6.

(3) Umoya wengelosi ewile

U-Isaya 14:12 “O nkanyezi ekhanyayo, Ndodana yokusa, uweleni ezulwini na? Kungani wena, mnqobi wezizwe, unqunyelwe emhlabeni na? IsAmbulo 12:4 Umsila wawo udonsa izinkanyezi zezulu. okwesithathu kwayo yawela phansi.

Qaphela: "Inkanyezi ekhanyayo, ndodana yokusa" esibhakabhakeni futhi yahudula "ingxenye yesithathu" yezingelosi → yawela phansi → yaba "udrako, inyoka, udeveli, uSathane" kanye nengxenye eyodwa kwezintathu yezingelosi ewile → kwaba" Umoya wephutha , umoya womphikukristu "-Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 4 Amavesi 3-6," umoya kasathane , Umoya ongcolile womprofethi wamanga —Bheka kusAmbulo 16, amavesi 13-14. Ukulinga imimoya emibi —Bheka eyoku-1 Thimothewu isahluko 4 ivesi 1. umoya wamanga (Bheka eyoku-1 AmaKhosi 22:23) Umoya wephutha “Bheka u-Isaya 19:14. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

→ kuphi[ umoya ] Vuma ukuthi uJesu Kristu weza enyameni, okungukuthi, evela kuNkulunkulu; Umlandeli" umoya “Uma uphika uJesu, awusiye okaNkulunkulu umoya womphikukristu . Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 4:2-3.

Into esobala kakhulu ukuthi emasontweni amaningi namuhla → "imimoya" yabaprofethi bamanga ikufundisa ukuthi ngemva "kokukholwa" kuJesu kufanele "uvume izono zakho nsuku zonke futhi ucele igazi lakhe eliyigugu ukuze lihlanze izono zakho → Bala igazi lesivumelwano elamngcwelisa njengelijayelekileko →Yilokhu Umoya wephutha . “Amakholwa” anjalo abakayiqondi indlela yeqiniso yevangeli futhi bakhohliswe ngamaphutha abo. Uma ngempela “benoMoya oNgcwele” ngaphakathi kubo, abasoze babheka “igazi leNdodana kaNkulunkulu” njengelijwayelekile, lokhu kusobala, usho! Kulungile? →Uma "uzelwe kabusha" → awubadingi abanye ukuba bakufundise, ngoba "ukugcoba" kuzokufundisa okufanele ukwenze! Ngakho-ke, kufanele uphume kubo → "ngena" "ibandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu" elishumayela ivangeli futhi likhuluma iqiniso → ukuze ukwazi: ukuvuswa, ukuzalwa kabusha, ukusindiswa, ukuphila, ukuthola inkazimulo, ukuthola imivuzo , thola imiqhele, futhi esikhathini esizayo Uvuko oluhle kakhulu! Amen. Uyaqonda? Inkomba - Hebheru 10:29 noJohane 1:26-27.

(4) Umoya okhonzayo wezingelosi

Hebheru 1:14 Ingelosi Akubona bonke Umoya wenkonzo , othunyelwe ukukhonza labo abazakudla ilifa lensindiso?

Qaphela: UJesu Kristu wazalwa → Izingelosi zaletha izindaba ezinhle kuMariya nabelusi, lapho uHerode eshushiswa, izingelosi zavikela uMariya nomkhaya wakhe ukuba babaleke, uJesu walingwa ehlane, futhi uJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni; nathi, nezingelosi zengeza amandla Akhe → ngoba sikholelwa evangelini futhi siyaliqonda iqiniso → ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha nensindiso → zingamalungu omzimba wakhe, “ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe”! Amen. Sinomzimba nempilo kaKristu → "wonke umuntu" ugadwe izingelosi ezikhonzayo. Amen! Haleluya! Uma umuntu engenawo umzimba nempilo kaKristu, ngeke kube khona ukugadwa yizingelosi. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Abafowethu nodadewethu kufanele “balalelisise futhi balalele ngokuqonda” - ukuze baqonde amazwi kaNkulunkulu! kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Incazelo yemibuzo enzima: UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, noMoya oNgcwele
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu Isahluko 3 kanye nevesi 16 futhi sifunde ndawonye: UJesu wabhapathizwa futhi ngokushesha waphuma emanzini. Khonokho izulu lavuleka kuye, wabona uMoya kaNkulunkulu wehla njengejuba uhlezi phezu kwakhe. noLuka 3:22 UMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwakhe enesimo sejuba; . "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [isonto] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, noMoya oNgcwele bonke banguMoya munye! Sonke sibhapathizwa ngaMoya munye, sibe umzimba munye, futhi siphuze uMoya munye! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya oNgcwele

(1) Umoya kaNkulunkulu

Vula uJohane 4:24 futhi nifunde ndawonye → UNkulunkulu ungumoya (noma kungekho zwi), ngakho labo abamkhulekelayo kufanele bamkhulekele ngomoya nangeqiniso. Genesise 1:2 UMoya kaNkulunkulu wawuhamba phezu kwamanzi. U-Isaya 11:2 Umoya kaJehova uyohlala phezu kwakhe, umoya wokuhlakanipha nowokuqonda, umoya weseluleko nowamandla, umoya wolwazi nowokumesaba uJehova. NgokukaLuka 4:18 “UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu; 2 Korinte 3:17 INkosi inguMoya; futhi lapho uMoya weNkosi ekhona, kukhona inkululeko. .

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi → [uNkulunkulu] ungumoya (noma akanazwi), okungukuthi, → UNkulunkulu ungumoya → Umoya kaNkulunkulu uhamba phezu kwamanzi → umsebenzi wendalo. Sesha iBhayibheli elingenhla bese lithi "Umoya" → "Umoya KaNkulunkulu, Umoya KaJehova, Umoya WeNkosi → INkosi InguMoya" → Uluhlobo luni lomoya [uMoya kaNkulunkulu]? → Masiphinde sitadishe iBhayibheli, uMathewu 3:16 uJesu abhapathizwa futhi ngokushesha waphuma emanzini. Kuthe kusenjalo lavuleka izulu kuye, wabona umoya kaNkulunkulu Kwaba sengathi ijuba lehla lahlala phezu kwakhe. Luka 2:22 UMoya oNgcwele kwehlela phezu kwakhe kunjengejuba; kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: "Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo, engithokozile ngayo." amanzi, futhi wanika uJohane uMbhapathizi isaha →" umoya kaNkulunkulu “Njengejuba lehla, lehlela kuJesu; uLuka uyalandisa → “Moya oNgcwele “Wawela phezu kwakhe enesimo sejuba → kanje, [ umoya kaNkulunkulu ]→ Yilokho-ke "Moya oNgcwele" ! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Umoya kaJesu

Ake sifunde IzEnzo 16:7 Lapho befika emngceleni waseMisiya, bafuna ukuya eBhithiniya, → umoya kaJesu “Kepha kabavunyelwanga, 1 Petru 1:11 uhlola kubo “uMoya kaKristu” ofakazela kusengaphambili isikhathi nendlela yokuhlupheka kukaKristu nenkazimulo yakamuva. Gal 4:6 Njengoba wena Njengendodana, uNkulunkulu. wathumela "yena", uJesu →" umoya wendodana Ngenani ezinhliziyweni zenu (ezethu) nikhale nithi, “Abba! baba! ’; Roma 8:9; Umoya kaNkulunkulu" Uma lihlala kini, anisayikuba yinyama kodwa ningokaMoya. Noma ubani ongenakho “okukaKristu” akayena okaKristu.

[Qaphela]: Ngiyiqophe ngokusesha imibhalo engenhla → 1 " Umoya kaJesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu → Ngena ezinhliziyweni zethu , 2 Roma 8:9; umoya kaNkulunkulu "→ hlalani ezinhliziyweni zenu, 3 1 Korinte 3:16 Anazi yini ukuthi niyithempeli likaNkulunkulu?" umoya kaNkulunkulu "→Ingabe nihlala kini? 1 Korinte 6:19 Anazi yini ukuthi imizimba yenu ingamathempeli kaMoya oNgcwele? UMoya oNgcwele ] uvela kuNkulunkulu → futhi uhlala kini → ngakho, "UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu," → okungukuthi UMoya oNgcwele ! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(3) Munye uMoya oNgcwele

Asifunde iBhayibheli NgokukaJohane 15:26 Kepha nxa esefikile uMduduzi engiyakumthuma kuBaba, uMoya weqiniso ophuma kuBaba, nguyena wofakaza ngami. Isahluko 16 Ivesi 13 “Nxa ufika “uMoya weqiniso” uzakuniholela kulo lonke iqiniso 1 kwabaseKorinte 12 Ivesi 4 kukhona iziphiwo eziningi, kepha “kuwo lowo Moya munye; Kwabase-Efesu 4:4 Munye umzimba “noMoya munye,” njengoba nje nabizelwa ethembeni linye. 1 Korinte 11:13 bonke babhapathizwa ‘ngoMoya munye oNgcwele’ futhi baba umzimba munye, bephuza “kuMoya oNgcwele munye” → Yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu, uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwakho konke, wonke umuntu futhi uhlala kuwo wonke umuntu. → 1 Korinte 6:17 Kepha ohlanganiswe neNkosi uba umoya munye neNkosi .

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi → uNkulunkulu ungumoya → "UMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMoya kaJehova, uMoya weNkosi, uMoya kaJesu, uMoya kaKristu, uMoya weNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uMoya weqiniso." → Kunjalo nje” UMoya oNgcwele ". umoya ongcwele munye , sonke sazalwa kabusha futhi sabhapathizwa “kuMoya oNgcwele munye”, saba umzimba munye, umzimba kaKristu, futhi saphuza kuMoya oNgcwele → sidla futhi siphuza ukudla okufanayo okungokomoya namanzi angokomoya! → Yinye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, munye umbhapathizo, munye uNkulunkulu uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, nakubo bonke. Okusihlanganisa neNkosi ukuba umoya munye neNkosi → "Moya oNgcwele" ! Amen. → kanjalo" 1 UMoya kaNkulunkulu unguMoya oNgcwele, 2 Umoya kaJesu unguMoya oNgcwele, 3 Umoya osezinhliziyweni zethu unguMoya oNgcwele” . Amen!

Qaphela ukuthi [akukona] ukuthi “umoya wenyama” ka-Adamu munye noMoya oNgcwele, hhayi ukuthi umoya womuntu umunye noMoya oNgcwele?

Abafowethu nodadewethu kufanele “balalelisise futhi balalele ngokuqonda” - ukuze baqonde amazwi kaNkulunkulu! kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Incazelo yemibuzo enzima: Ekuqaleni, kwakukhona iTao?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJohane isahluko 1 amavesi 1-2 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Yini iTao 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Abesifazane abaqotho [amasonto] bathumela izisebenzi - Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao →uNkulunkulu. ULizwi waba yinyama → ogama lakhe linguJesu, abaphostoli abamuzwa, bambona, babona ngamehlo abo, futhi bazithinta ngezandla zabo → ekuqaleni lalikhona izwi lokuphila, futhi lokhu kuphila kwembulwa “ngoJesu”! Amen .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao.

(1) UTao unguNkulunkulu

Ake sihlole uJohane 1:1-2 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, futhi uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Qaphela: "I-Taichu" → yasendulo, yasendulo, yokuqala, ekhona ngokwayo, sebenzisa "i-Taichu". " ngu → 【 UNkulunkulu]! Ngamanye amazwi, kwakukhona uNkulunkulu "ekuqaleni"! Amen. Lo "Lizwi" wayenoNkulunkulu ekuqaleni→ "Ekuqaleni kwendalo, ngaphambi kokudalwa kwezinto zonke, ngangikhona . Kusukela phakade, kwasekuqaleni, umhlaba ungakabikho, ngamiswa. Isikhombo - IzAga 8:22-23 . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) ULizwi waba yinyama

NgokukaJohane 1:14 ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise.

(3) ULizwi waba yinyama futhi waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu.

NgokukaMathewu 1:20-21...ngokuba lokho akukhulelweyo kungoMoya oNgcwele. Uzozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba iyosindisa abantu bakubo ezonweni zabo. "

(4) Akekho owake wabona uNkulunkulu uNkulunkulu uYise wembula uNkulunkulu ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa.

NgokukaJohane 1:18 Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise embonakalisile.

(5) Kwangathi kungaba khona indlela yokuphila

Eyoku-1 Johane 1:1-2 ikhuluma ngezwi lokuqala lokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, esalizwa, salibona, salibona ngamehlo ethu, futhi salithinta ngezandla zethu → Lokhu “kuphila” kuye kwaba ngeNdodana ezelwe yodwa [uJesu]. ] babonakala, abaphostoli nabo bakubona, futhi manje bayafakaza, bedlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakunoBaba futhi kwabonakala nathi! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

[6 Ukuphila kukuye, lalokhu kuphila kungukukhanya komuntu

Johane 1 4 Kuye kwakukhona ukuphila, futhi ukuphila kwakuwukukhanya kwabantu. Ivesi 9 Ukukhanya kungukukhanya okuqinisileyo okukhanyisa wonke umuntu ophila emhlabeni → UJesu wathi kubo bonke: "Mina ngiwukukhanya kwezwe. Ongilandelayo akasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa woba nokukhanya kokuphila. " Inkomba - Johane Isahluko 8 ivesi 12.

(7) UJesu ungumfanekiso wangempela wobunjalo bukaNkulunkulu

Ungukubenyezela kwenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, “umfanekiso weqiniso kaNkulunkulu,” futhi usekela zonke izinto ngomyalo wakhe onamandla. Ngemva kokuba esehlambulule abantu ezonweni zabo, wahlala phansi ngakwesokunene soMkhulu ezulwini. Inkomba - KumaHeberu 1 ivesi 3.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo egciniwe engenhla → 1 Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao [ unkulunkulu ] → 2 "ULizwi" waba inyama, okungukuthi, "uNkulunkulu" waba inyama → 3 Wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya ngoMoya oNgcwele futhi wazalwa: waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu! 【 UJesu 】 Igama lakhe lisho ukusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo. . Amen! → Bonke abamukela wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa egameni lakhe. "Ukwamukela" → "Izwi" UJesu waba inyama! INkosi uJesu yathi: “Ngaphandle kokuba nidle futhi niphuze inyama negazi leNdodana yomuntu, aninakuphila kini. Lowo odla inyama yami futhi aphuze igazi lami unokuphila okuphakade, futhi ngizomvusa ngosuku lokugcina. → Uma sidla futhi siphuza" iNkosi "inyama" "negazi leNkosi", "sinezwi" likaJesu futhi laba umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu → Sembatha umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu → Laba bantu abazalwa ngegazi, abazalwanga ngenkanuko, abazalwanga ngentando yomuntu, kodwa "bazalwa ngokusha" →Lomzimba "ongafi" ungadla ifa lokuphila okuphakade kanye nefa likaBaba oseZulwini ? Isahluko 1 amavesi 12-13 kanye nesahluko 6 amavesi 53-56.

Isexwayiso: " Ukukhanyiselwa enyameni "→ imfundiso engamanga , izimfundiso eziningi zesonto namuhla zisekelwe eqinisweni lokuthi umzimba ka-Adamu wadalwa ngothuli, Thembela emthethweni ukuze uhlakulele inyama, inyama mayibe yiTao futhi ibe umoya . Yilokhu "iziqhwaga ezingokomoya" zesizukulwane esedlule zakufundisa. →Uma kunjalo, yini umehluko phakathi kwalokhu noSakyamuni owabhekana nobunzima futhi wahlakulela umzimba wakhe ukuze abe uBuddha? Uyakusho! Kulungile? Lokhu ngokusobala imfundiso engamanga. → Ngakho-ke yizwa "izwi leqiniso - futhi uqonde izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho! Thola isithembiso [ UMoya oNgcwele ]. Amen! Ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha, sincika “kuMoya oNgcwele” ukuze sibone → ukuthi yimaphi amazwi avela “kuNkulunkulu”; Phumani ezimfundisweni zabo zamanga → ukuze singabe sisaba abantwana, sibanjwe ubuqili nenkohliso yabantu, sijikijelwa yonke imimoya yobuqaba, silandela zonke izifundiso - Efesu 4 Isahluko 14.

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaJesu: thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuMarku 12:29-31 uJesu waphendula: “Into yokuqala ithi: ‘Yizwa, Israyeli; INkosi uNkulunkulu wethu yiNkosi eyodwa. Wothanda uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nomphefumulo, ingqondo, namandla. ’ Okwesibili yilokhu: ‘Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena. ’ Awukho umyalo omkhulu kunale emibili. . "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " uthando lukaJesu 》Cha. ayisishiyagalombili Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [isonto] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi zisiphakele ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Uthando lukaJesu! Uthando oluthanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba ezithanda → ngoba ulalela imiyalo kaYise osezulwini → futhi usinika umzimba wakhe ongenakonakala nokuphila ukuze sibe amalungu omzimba wakhe → “ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe” → ubona “Umuntu omusha” esizalwa nguNkulunkulu → uwumzimba Wakhe! Ngakho uthando lukaJesu → "thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena" . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaJesu luwukuthanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena

“Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena” kusho ukuthanda abanye njengoba uzithanda wena. Ngaphambi kokuthanda abanye, udinga ukufunda ukuzithanda wena kuqala. Noma phatha abanye ngendlela oziphatha ngayo, futhi uthande abanye ngendlela ozithanda ngayo wena. Isimiso esithi “thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena” sisho ukuthi akufanele uzonde abanye, kodwa ngaso sonke isikhathi unakekele abanye. UConfucius wake wathi: "Ungakwenzi kwabanye lokho ongafuni ukuthi abanye bakwenze kuwe." Ngokombono ongemuhle, uConfucius wayekholelwa ukuthi lokho ongakuthandi ngokuqinisekile ngeke kuthandeke kwabanye, ngakho awukuphoqeleli kwabanye. Lokhu kudinga ukuthi abantu bathathe isinyathelo sokuphatha abanye kahle, banakekele abanye, futhi bathande abanye kungakhathaliseki ukuthi benzani.

UJesu wathi" Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena "Iqiniso → UJesu walalela intando yomyalo kaYise futhi wanikela "yena" "umzimba" ongcwele, ongenasono, ongenasici, ongonakali futhi ongabuni "nokuphila" kithi → ngale ndlela, thina Ngomzimba nokuphila UJesu uyindawo yokuhlala kaMoya oNgcwele, ithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele → UBaba ukuJesu, noBaba ukimi → Baba Kugcwele kuwo wonke umuntu nokuhlala kuwo wonke umuntu → UJesu “ubona” imizimba nezimpilo zethu, okusho ukuthi “ubona” umzimba wakhe siqu nokuphila kwakhe → ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe! nathi njengoba ezithanda Yena → Leli yiqiniso lokuthi "thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena".

(1) Baba uyangithanda, ngiyamthanda uBaba

Masifunde iBhayibheli ngokukaJohane 10:17 uBaba uyangithanda, ngokuba ngidela ukuphila kwami ukuba ngibuye ngikuthabathe. NgokukaJohane 17:23 Mina ngibe kubo, nawe ukimi, ukuze babe munye ngokupheleleyo, ukuze izwe lazi ukuthi wena ungithumile, nokuthi ubathandile njengoba nje ungithandile. 26 Ngembulile ibizo lakho kubo, njalo ngizaliveza kubo, ukuze uthando ongithande ngalo lube kubo, lami ngibe kubo.

[Qaphela]: INkosi uJesu yathi: “UBaba uyangithanda,” ngoba ngidela ukuphila kwami ukuze ngibuye ngikuthathe. Akekho othatha ukuphila kwami kimi, futhi nginamandla okuwuthatha; ufuna “ukunikeza” umzimba nokuphila “kwendodana yakhe ethandekayo” kithi noma ukuba yikho. "Sizalwa ngokusha" ngevangeli leqiniso likaKristu futhi sibe nokuphila kwenyama kukaJesu → Yingakho uJesu athandaza kuYise: "Mina kubo, nawe ukimi, ukuze babe munye ngokuphelele, Ukuze izwe libe munye. yazi ukuthi wena ungithumile, nokuthi ubathandile njengalokhu ungithandile mina. Ngembulile igama lakho kubo, futhi ngiyobembulela lona, ukuze uthando ongithande ngalo lube kubo, nami ngibe kubo. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena

Masifunde iBhayibheli ngokukaMathewu 22:37-40 futhi silifunde ndawonye: UJesu wathi kuye: “Kumelwe uthande uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho Umyalo wesibili uyafana othi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.” umakhelwane njengoba uzithanda wena.” ULevitikusi 19:18 “Ungaphindiseli, ungakhononi ngabantu bakini, kepha wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena. nginguJehova.

[Qaphela] : Ngokutadisha imibhalo engenhla, iNkosi uJesu yathi: “Woyithanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho. Lona umyalo wokuqala nomkhulu kunayo yonke. , “thanda umakhelwane wakho” “Njengoba uzithanda wena” umyalo wokuqala othanda uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho; umyalo wesibili Kusho ukuthanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena! Amen. UBaba Osezulwini uyamthanda uJesu, futhi uJesu uyamthanda uBaba → Ngoba uJesu ulalela intando kaBaba oseZulwini futhi unikeza umzimba Wakhe “ongcwele, ongenasono, nongonakali” kanye nokuphila! Wazinikela ukuba “aphiwe” kithi, ukuze thina “esikholwa” kuye, okungukuthi, labo “abenza intando” yakhe, samukele futhi samukele umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu, okungukuthi, sembathe okusha. umuntu futhi wembathe uKristu. Bheka kuJohane 1:12-13 kanye no-Gal 3:26-27 → “Umuntu wethu omusha” wembatha umzimba nokuphila kukaKristu. →Leli yithempeli likaMoya oNgcwele kanye nendawo yokuhlala kaMoya oNgcwele! Amen. UMoya oNgcwele "ngeke" uphile emzimbeni ka-Adamu - uyaqonda? Sicela ufunde kabanzi Ukubuyela kulokho engangikushilo ngaphambili [Iwayini elisha lifakwa ezikhwameni ezintsha]

→ Njengoba nje iNkosi uJesu yathi kuTomase: “Ongibonile mina umbonile uBaba; mina ngikuBaba, noBaba ukimi → Ngoba uNkulunkulu uBaba unesihe futhi unothando! Ngezwi leqiniso levangeli kaJesu Kristu-"ukuzalwa kabusha" kwethu , ukuze sibe nomzimba nokuphila kukaKristu→Ngalendlela, UBaba ukuJesu futhi kithi → "UNkulunkulu wethu uwukuphela kukaNkulunkulu weqiniso." Bheka eyabase-Efesu 4:6 . →Lapho uJesu "ebona" imizimba yethu futhi ephila, "ubona" umzimba wakhe nempilo yakhe! Ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe → ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe! UKristu uyasithanda njengoba ezithanda Yena! Amen → lokhu Lokhu kuyiqiniso lalokho uJesu akusho: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena. Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka eyabase-Efesu 5:30 .

Qaphela ukuthi “uthande umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena” NguJesu kuphela ongaveza uthando lukaBaba. U-Adamu, efundisa abafowethu nodadewethu indlela yokusebenzisa inyama yomuntu omdala uku- Ukuthanda abantu njengokufana hhayi ngokukaKristu, njengoba nifundiswa ngezimfundiso nangezinkohliso eziyize → Xwayani funa kube khona onifundisa ngesifundiso nangenkohliso eyize, kungengokukaKristu, kodwa ngokwesiko lezwe nangokwezimfundiso zemfundiso yenkolo. mhlaba. Bangikhonza ngeze, ngokuba bafundisa abantu imiyalo yabo njengezifundiso. ’” Bhekisela kuMathewu 15:9 nakwabaseKolose 2:8.

INkosi uJesu isinika umyalo omusha [ thandanani ] Johane 13 Isahluko 34-35 Ngininika umyalo omusha wokuba nithandane; Ngalokho bonke bayakukwazi ukuthi ningabafundi bami, uma nithandana. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: engathandi ukuba kubhubhe namunye, kodwa ukuthi bonke basindiswe
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli sifunde ndawonye: 2 Petru isahluko 3 ivesi 9 Isethembiso seNkosi asikagcwaliseki, futhi abanye abantu bacabanga ukuthi uyephuza, kodwa uyabekezelela wena, kodwa ufuna wonke umuntu aphenduke - kholwa evangelini ! Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " uthando lukaJesu 》Cha. Isikhombisa Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zihambise ukudla ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya! Uthando lwakho olukhulu lubonakalisiwe futhi iqiniso levangeli liyavezwa Awufuni ukuthi noma ubani abhubhe, kodwa ufuna wonke umuntu aphenduke futhi akholwe evangelini - baqonde iqiniso → basindiswe. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaJesu alufuni kubhubhe muntu, Ngakho Kwangathi bonke abantu bangasindiswa

(1) Uthando lukaJesu alufuni kubhubhe muntu

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde eyesi-2 Petru 3:8-10 ndawonye → Bazalwane abathandekayo, kunento eyodwa okungafanele niyikhohlwe: eNkosini usuku olulodwa lunjengeminyaka eyinkulungwane, neminyaka eyinkulungwane injengosuku olulodwa. INkosi ayikasigcwalisi isithembiso sayo, futhi abanye bacabanga ukuthi iyalibazisa, kepha empeleni ayilibali, kepha iyanibekezelela, ingafisi ukuthi kubhubhe namunye, kodwa ukuthi bonke bafinyelele ekuphendukeni. Kodwa usuku lweNkosi luzafika njengesela. Ngalolo suku, amazulu ayodlula ngomsindo omkhulu, futhi zonke izinto ezibonakalayo ziyoqedwa ngomlilo, futhi umhlaba nakho konke okukuwo kuyoshiswa.

[Qaphela]: Ngokutadisha imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, umphostoli “uPetru” umzalwane wathi: “Bazalwane abathandekayo, akumelwe nikhohlwe into eyodwa: eNkosini usuku olulodwa lunjengeminyaka eyinkulungwane, neminyaka eyinkulungwane injengosuku olulodwa → sibonile ukuthi embusweni kaNkulunkulu, ukuphila ingunaphakade. Ngeke kusaba khona ukudabuka, ukukhala, ukugula, nobuhlungu ngeke kusaba khona . Abanye abantu bacabanga ukuthi kuwukubambezeleka, kodwa akukona ukubambezeleka, kodwa isifiso → kholwa evangelini "Ivangeli" lizoguqula impilo yakho, wembathe uKristu Kungale ndlela kuphela eningazuza ngayo ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu futhi nizuze ifa likaBaba osezulwini? eTestamenteni Elidala." "→Ngalolosuku izulu liyodlula ngomsindo omkhulu, nakho konke kuyakubhujiswa ngomlilo, nomhlaba nakho konke okukuwo kushiswe. Kepha thina "esizelwe nguNkulunkulu" ngokwesithembiso sakhe. Sibheke phambili ezulwini elisha nomhlaba omusha, singene embusweni waphakade othenjiswe yiNkosi → lapho kuyohlala khona ukulunga.

(2) Sengathi bonke abantu bangasindiswa futhi baqonde indlela yeqiniso

Masifunde 1 Thimothewu isahluko 2 amavesi 1-6 eBhayibhelini futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Ngiyanincenga, kuqala, ukuba nenze ukunxusa, ukukhuleka, ukunxusa nokubonga ngenxa yabantu bonke, ngisho namakhosi nabo bonke abaphetheyo, ukuze siphile ukuphila kokuhlonipha uNkulunkulu, ubuqotho, nokuthula. Lokhu kuhle futhi kuyamukeleka emehlweni kaNkulunkulu uMsindisi wethu. Ufuna bonke abantu basindiswe futhi baqonde indlela yeqiniso . Ngokuba munye uNkulunkulu, munye nomlamuleli phakathi kukaNkulunkulu nabantu, umuntu uKristu Jesu, owazinikela abe yinhlawulo yabo bonke, njengokuba kuyakubonakaliswa ngesikhathi esifanele. NgokukaJohane 3:16-17 “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade (noma translation: ahlulele izwe; okufanayo ngezansi) iwukuba umhlaba usindiswe ngaye.

[Qaphela]: Ngokutadisha imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, umphostoli “uPawulu” wanxusa uMfoweth’ uThimothewu → Ngiyanikhuthaza ukuba kuqala ninxuse, nithandaze, ninxuse futhi nibonge ngenxa yabo bonke abantu! Kanjalo namakhosi nabo bonke abanegunya, ukuze thina, abantwana bakaNkulunkulu, siphile ukuphila okunokuthula nokumesaba uNkulunkulu. Lokhu kuhle futhi kuyamukeleka kuNkulunkulu. →UNkulunkulu wethu ufuna wonke umuntu aphenduke → akholwe ivangeli futhi aqonde iqiniso→Ufuna wonke umuntu asindiswe. Amen! Ngoba ivangeli lingamandla kaNkulunkulu futhi lidinga wonke umuntu okholwayo! Amen. →UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa “uJesu” ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Ngoba uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe “uJesu” emhlabeni ukuba ingalahli izwe (noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi: ukwahlulela izwe; yona ngezansi), kodwa ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye. →Bonke baphenduke→Kholwani ivangeli niliqonde iqiniso→Bazalwane abathandekayo beNkosi, asihlale simbonga uNkulunkulu ngani;ngoba wanikhetha kwasekuqaleni ukuba ningcweliswe ngoMoya oNgcwele ngokukholwa ekukholweni,Ningasindiswa. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka eyesi-2 Thes. 2:13.

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaJesu: Umntwana uveza iqiniso levangeli
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:14-15 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela; phila.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " uthando lukaJesu 》Cha. eziyisithupha Khuluma futhi wenze umkhuleko: Baba othandekayo waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala unathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela kude kuya ezulwini, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Kuyavela ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasikhuthaza! Ngoba sicabanga - njengengcebo ebekwe esitsheni sobumba, "ingcebo" iyoveza indlela yeqiniso yevangeli, futhi sengathi bonke abantu basindiswe. ! Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

KaJesu njenge ukuvusa amadlingozi Thina, "Baby" siveza iqiniso levangeli

Ake sifunde kweyesi-2 Korinte 5:14-15 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngoba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela, ngoba sikhumbula ukuthi njengoba oyedwa wafela bonke, bonke bafa ngenxa yabo; owafa wabuye wavuka ngenxa yabo. Futhi 2 Korinte 4: 7-10 siphethe le ngcebo ezitsheni zebumba ukubonisa ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithi. Sizungezwe izitha nxazonke, kepha asibambi, kepha asijabhiswa, kepha asishiywanga phansi; Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi.

[Qaphela]: Ngokufunda imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, sithola ukuthi uthando lukaKristu luyasishukumisa; ngoba sicabanga ukuthi njengoba uJesu afela bonke, wafela bonke; Amen. Sinale “ngcebo” ebekwe ezitsheni zobumba ukuze sibonise ukuthi lamandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithina, kodwa asibambeki, kodwa asijabhiswa; .Angawiswa phansi, kodwa angabulawa. Sihlala sithwele ukufa kukaJesu ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kwambulwe kithi. Amen!

(1) Baby uveza ivangeli

Liyini ivangeli? Masifunde IBhayibheli NgokukaLuka 24:44-48 UJesu wathi kubo: “Yilokhu engakusho kini ngisenani: Kulotshiwe emthethweni kaMose, nakubaprofethi nasemaHutsheni ukuthi, Konke okushiwo ngami. kufanele kwenzeke.” Khona uJesu wavula ingqondo yabo ukuze baqonde imiBhalo, wathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi uKristu wahlupheka futhi wavuka kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu; washumayela egameni lakhe ezizweni zonke, ngokuba nina ningofakazi balezi zinto; 15:3-4; futhi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu ngokweBhayibheli.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi “iNkosi uJesu” ngokwayo yathi: “Konke okulotshwe ngami emthethweni kaMose, nakubaprofethi, nasemaHutsheni kufanele kugcwaliseke njengokulotshiweyo emibhalweni, uKristu Yena uyakuhlupheka, avuke kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, kushunyayelwe egameni lakhe ukuphenduka nokuthethelelwa kwezono ezizweni zonke, kuqalwe eJerusalema. Nina ningofakazi balezi zinto! Amen.

nomphostoli "uPawulu" owashumayela ivangeli lensindiso kwabeZizwe → Engashumayela kini futhi kwaba: okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu ngokuvumelana nemiBhalo, → 1 ukuze sikhululwe esonweni, 2. Breaking umthetho nesiqalekiso somthetho--bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-7 nakwabaseRoma 7:6. Futhi wangcwatshwa → 3 Ukukhumula umuntu omdala nezenzo zakhe - bhekisela kweyabaseKolose 3:9; →Uvuko lukaKristu luyasithethelela! Amen. Bheka amaRoma 4:25 . Njengoba iBhayibheli lisho ku-1 Petru Isahluko 1: 3-5 - "ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo", sizalwa kabusha → "thina", Amen! ukuze sibe nethemba eliphilayo, ukuze sibe nefa elingenakonakala, elingenabala, nelingabuni, elibekelwe nina ezulwini. Nina enigcinwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa nizakwamukela insindiso elungiselelwe ukwambulwa ngesikhathi sokugcina. Leli ivangeli elishunyayelwa iNkosi uJesu → abaphostoli uPawulu, uPetru nabanye abaphostoli. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Indlela yeqiniso yengcebo yembulwa

Masifunde iBhayibheli NgokukaJohane Isahluko 1:1-2 Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayenoNkulunkulu, futhi uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu. ULizwi wayekuNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Ivesi 14 ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, egcwele umusa neqiniso. sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise. Ivesi 18 Akakho owake wabona uNkulunkulu, kuphela iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise. 1 Johane 1:1-2 Ngokuphathelene nezwi lokuphila elalikhona kwasekuqaleni, esalizwa, sayibona, sayibona ngamehlo ethu, sayithinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, futhi sikubonile, futhi manje siyafakaza ukuthi simemezela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukhona kuBaba futhi kwabonakala nathi.) NgokoMoya wobungcwele, ngokuvuka kwabafileyo. Wembulwa ukuthi uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu enamandla amakhulu. Bheka amaRoma 1:4.

[Qaphela]: Ekuqaleni kwakukhona iTao, futhi iTao yayinoNkulunkulu, futhi iTao yayinguNkulunkulu. Lo Lizwi wayenoNkulunkulu ekuqaleni → waba yinyama, wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya futhi wazalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele, futhi waqanjwa ngokuthi uJesu! Amen. Wathi umphostoli uJohane! Ngokuphathelene nendlela yokuqala yokuphila kusukela ekuqaleni, sizwile, sabona, sabona ngamehlo ethu, futhi sazithinta ngezandla zethu. (Lokhu kuphila kubonakalisiwe, sikubonile, futhi manje ngiyafakaza ukuthi ngidlulisela kini ukuphila okuphakade okwakukuBaba futhi kwabonakala kithi). Lapho sesivusiwe kanye noKristu → sathola umzimba nokuphila kukaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ethandekayo → sinale “ngcebo” ebekwe ezitsheni zobumba ukuze “ibonise” ukuthi la mandla amakhulu avela kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kithi. …Sihlala sithwele ngaphakathi kwethu ukufa kukaJesu, ukuze ukuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe kithi. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 4:7, 10.

KULUNGILE! Yilapho engihlanganyela khona nawe namuhla Kufanele ulalele kakhulu izwi leqiniso futhi wabelane okwengeziwe! Kufanele futhi uhlabelele ngomoya wakho, udumise ngomoya wakho, futhi unikele imihlatshelo enephunga elimnandi kuNkulunkulu! Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: usenza izindlalifa kuBaba wethu waseZulwini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen. Ake sivule iBhayibheli lethu kumaHeberu isahluko 9 ivesi 15 Ngenxa yalesi sizathu, waba umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, njengoba ukufa kwakhe kwahlawulela izono ezenziwa abantu ngesikhathi sesivumelwano sokuqala, wenza ukuba ababiziweyo bathole ifa eliphakade ababelithenjisiwe.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Uthando LukaJesu" Cha. amahlanu Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! owesifazane oqotho [IBandla] lithumela izisebenzi ukuba zilethe ukudla okuvela ezindaweni ezikude futhi zisinikeze kona ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. UKristu uye waba umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, njengoba afa ukuze ahlenge labo abasesivumelwaneni sokuqala futhi angene esivumelwaneni esisha, wenze ababiziweyo bazuze ifa eliphakade elathenjiswa ngu-Aba, uBaba waseZulwini. . Amen! Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaJesu lusenza izindlalifa zefa likaYise laphakade

(1) Ifa lamadodana izigqila azinakudla ifa.

Pheqa ufunde uGenesise 21:9-10 → Khona-ke uSara wabona uHagari umGibhithe eklolodela indodana ka-Abrahama, futhi wathi ku-Abrahama: “Sixoshe lesi sigqilakazi nendodana yaso! Isaka.” Manje vula kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 4 ivesi 30. Kodwa lithini iBhayibheli? Lithi: "Xosha isigqilakazi nendodana yaso! Ngokuba indodana yesigqilakazi ayiyikudla ifa kanye nendodana yokhululekileyo."

Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi indodana eyazalwa “incekukazi” uHagari yazalwa “ngegazi” indodana eyazalwa ngowesifazane okhululekile “uSara” yazalwa ngokwesithembiso. Laba “abesifazane” ababili abayizivumelwano ezimbili → iTestamente Elidala neTestamente Elisha. iTestamente elidala →Izingane ezizalwa “ngegazi” futhi ngaphansi komthetho, “ziyizigqila, izigqila zesono” futhi “azinakudla” ifa, ngakho abantwana benyama kumelwe baxoshwe;

ITestamente Elisha →Izingane ezizalwa "ngowesifazane okhululekile" zizalwa "ngesithembiso" noma "zizalwa ngoMoya oNgcwele". Labo abazalwa ngokwenyama → "Inyama yethu endala ingeyenyama" bayoshushisa labo abazelwe ngomoya → "abazelwe nguNkulunkulu", ngakho kumelwe sixoshe labo abazelwe yinyama futhi labo “abazelwe ngowesifazane okhululekileyo” okungukuthi, “umuntu omusha” kaMoya oNgcwele adle ifa likaYise. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Angiqondi kufanele ngiyilalele izikhathi eziningana! Amen.

Inyama yethu endala yobuntu izalwa abazali bethu, idalwe ngothuli “njengo-Adamu”, ezalwa ngokwenyama → ezalwa esonweni, ezelwe ngaphansi komthetho, siyizigqila zesono, futhi asinakukwazi ifa lombuso wezulu. . →Bheka iHubo 51:5 Ngazalelwa esonweni, umama wayesesonweni kusukela ekukhulelweni kwami. → Ngakho-ke, umuntu wethu omdala kufanele abhapathizwe kuKristu futhi abethelwe kanye Naye ukuze abhubhise umzimba wesono futhi aphunyuke kulo mzimba wokufa. Labo abazelwe “ngowesifazane okhululekileyo” → 1 mabazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya oNgcwele, 2 bazalwe ngevangeli likaJesu Kristu, 3 babe “ngumuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu, bazuze ifa likaBaba Osezulwini. . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Ngokusekelwe emthethweni hhayi esithembisweni

Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseGalathiya 3:18 Ngokuba uma ifa lingokomthetho, aliveli ngesithembiso; namaRoma 4:14 Uma kuphela abomthetho beyizindlalifa, ukukholwa kuyize, nesithembiso sichithwa.

Qaphela: Ngokomthetho hhayi okwesethembiso, ngike ngababela abafowethu nodadewethu kushicilelo oludlule. Namuhla into esemqoka ukuvumela abafowethu nodadewethu baqonde ukuthi bangalithola kanjani ifa likaBaba oseZulwini. Ngenxa yokuthi umthetho uthukuthelisa ulaka lukaNkulunkulu, labo abazalwa ngokwenyama bayizigqila zesono futhi abanakulidla ifa likaYise kuphela labo abaphuma emthethweni → “abazelwe ngokwesithembiso” noma “abazelwe ngoNgcwele UMoya" bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu Kuphela futhi abantwana bakaNkulunkulu abangazuza ifa likaBaba wabo waseZulwini. Labo abangabomthetho bayizigqila zesono futhi abanakulidla ifa → bangabomthetho hhayi abesithembiso → labo bomthetho bahlukaniswa noKristu futhi bawa emseni → baye bazichitha izibusiso ezithenjiswe nguNkulunkulu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(3) Siyifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini

UDuteronomi 4:20 UJehova wanikhipha eGibithe, esithandweni sensimbi, ukuze anenze abantu befa lenu njenganamuhla. Isahluko 9 Ivesi 29 Eqinisweni, bangabantu bakho nefa lakho, owalikhipha ngamandla akho nangengalo eyeluliweyo. Phenya futhi kwabase-Efesu 1:14 futhi loMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo yakhe. KumaHeberu 9:15 Ngenxa yalokhu uye waba ngumlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, ukuze ababiziweyo bamukele ifa eliphakade elathenjiswayo, sebefile ukuze bahlawulele izono ezenziwa ngaphansi kwesivumelwano sokuqala.

Qaphela: ETestamenteni Elidala → uJehova uNkulunkulu wakhipha ama-Israyeli eGibhithe futhi wawakhipha esithandweni sensimbi, izigqila zesono ngaphansi komthetho → ukuze babe abantu abakhethekile befa likaNkulunkulu. bonke abangakholwa babeyihlane lokuqothuka → liyisixwayiso kulabo ezinsukwini zokugcina. Izingane esizizalayo ngesithembiso "sokholo" → "uMoya oNgcwele" uwubufakazi befa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu → ifa likaNkulunkulu likhulungiwe ukuze kudunyiswe inkazimulo yaKhe. Amen! Ngoba uJesu ungumlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, wafa esiphambanweni ngenxa yezono zethu → inhlawulo yezono zethu. ukuqokwa kwangaphambilini "Okungukuthi, isivumelwano somthetho, lapho labo ababengaphansi komthetho bahlengwa → esonweni nasemthethweni → nalabo ababiziwe bavunyelwa ukungena." ITestamente Elisha “Yamukelani ifa eliphakade elithenjisiwe . Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaJesu: ukusinika ubuntwana
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyabase-Efesu 1:3-5 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Usibusisile ngezibusiso zonke zomoya ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu: njengalokho uNkulunkulu wasikhetha kuye ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe, ukuze sibe ngcwele, singabi nacala phambi kwakhe, ngenxa yothando lwakhe ngathi asikhethele yena ngaphambili thina ukuze samukelwe njengabantwana ngoJesu Kristu, ngokwentando yakhe. . Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " uthando lukaJesu 》Cha. 4 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi zisiphakele ukudla ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qondani ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasikhetha kuKristu ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe Sahlengwa ngegazi leNdodana yakhe ethandekayo futhi wasimisela kusengaphambili ukuba samukele ubudodana ngoJesu Kristu. . Amen!

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Sibuthola kanjani ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu?

Masifunde iBhayibheli KwabaseGalathiya Isahluko 4 Amavesi 1-7 Ngathi lowo ozuza “umbuso wezulu” ungumnikazi wayo yonke impahla, kodwa lapho “esemncane” kubhekiselwa esikhathini lapho ayengaphansi komthetho nesigqila sesono →--a isikole samabanga aphansi esingasizi ngalutho, ingabe uzimisele ukuba isigqila sakhe futhi? umfundisi, okungukuthi, “umthetho” nomphathi, kuze kufike isikhathi esimisiwe nguyise. Kungokufanayo lapho "siyizingane" futhi sibuswa isikole samabanga aphansi sezwe → "umthetho". Lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane okuthiwa iNcasakazi uMariya, owazalwa ngaphansi komthetho → Njengoba umthetho wawubuthakathaka ngenyama futhi wawungenakukwazi ukwenza okuthile, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe, okwathi waba Ukufana komzimba wesono kwasebenza njengomnikelo wesono futhi isono esilahlwayo enyameni - bheka kwabaseRoma 8:3.

(2) Sizalwa ngaphansi komthetho, sihlenga abaphansi komthetho ukuze samukele ubudodana

Nakuba “uJesu” wazalelwa ngaphansi komthetho, ngenxa yokuthi akanasono futhi ungcwele, akayena owomthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda? →UNkulunkulu wenza “uJesu” ongenasono ukuba abe yisono ngenxa yethu →ukuze ahlenge abaphansi komthetho ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. →"Qaphela:Ukwamukelwa njengamadodana 1 kuwukukhululwa emthethweni, 2 ukukhululwa esonweni, 3 nokukhumula umuntu omdala → Njengoba ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe;"uMoya oNgcwele" ungene kuwe (umbhalo wokuqala uthi) uyakhala: “Abba! Nkulunkulu! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda? —Bheka eyoku-1 Petru isahluko 1 ivesi 3. →Kuyabonakala ukuthi kusukela manje awusesona isigqila, okungukuthi, “uyisigqila sesono,” kodwa usuyindodana; “Qaphela” uma ungakholwa “uJesu ukuhlengile “emthethweni, nasesonweni, nasendodeni endala.” Ngale ndlela, “ukholo” lwakho alunabo ubuntwana bakho bukaNkulunkulu.

(3) UNkulunkulu wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba samukele ubudodana ngoJesu Kristu ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe.

Masifunde iBhayibheli Kwabase-Efesu 1:3-9 Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Usibusisile ngezibusiso zonke zomoya ezindaweni zasezulwini kuKristu: njengalokho uNkulunkulu wasikhetha kuye ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe, ukuba sibe ngcwele, singasoleki phambi kwakhe, ngenxa yothando lwakhe ngathi, wasikhetha kuye owamiselwa ngaphambili; iwukuba, “eyamiselwa ngaphambili” ukuba asamukele njengamadodana ngoJesu Kristu, ngokuvumelana nentando yakhe, kube udumo lomusa wakhe okhazimulayo asinike wona ngeNdodana yakhe ethandekayo “uJesu” wayo. Sinokuhlengwa ngegazi lale Ndodana ethandekayo, ukuthethelelwa kwezono zethu ngokwengcebo yomusa wayo. Lomusa siwuphiwe ngokuchichimayo nguNkulunkulu kukho konke ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda kwakhe konke kungokwecebo lakhe elihle, ukuze sazi imfihlakalo yentando yakhe. —Bheka eyabase-Efesu 1:3-9. Lo mbhalo ongcwele ukwenze kwacaca kakhulu, futhi wonke umuntu kufanele awuqonde.

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: lusenza ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyesi-2 Korinte 5 nevesi 21 futhi sifunde ndawonye: UNkulunkulu wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " uthando lukaJesu 》Cha. 3 Masikhuleke: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Abesifazane abalungile [amasonto] bathumela izisebenzi! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Lowo ongasazi isono uNkulunkulu wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze thina sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngoJesu Kristu ! Amen.

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaJesu lwaba yisono ngenxa yethu ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye

(1) UNkulunkulu wenza abangenasono

Ake sibheke eyoku-1 Johane 3:5 futhi siyifunde ndawonye → Niyazi ukuthi uJehova wabonakala ukuze asuse isono somuntu, okungekho kuso isono. Inkomba - 1 Johane 3:5 → Akenzanga sono, futhi kwakungekho nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe. Isikhombo - 1 Petru Isahluko 2 Ivesi 22 → Njengoba sinompristi omkhulu okhuphukele ezulwini, uJesu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, masibambe isivumo sethu. Ngokuba umpristi wethu omkhulu akakwazi ukuzwelana nobuthakathaka bethu. Walingwa kuzo zonke izici njengathi, kodwa engenasono. Inkomba - KumaHeberu 4 amavesi 14-15. Qaphela: Incazelo yasekuqaleni yegama elithi “ukungabi nasono” nguNkulunkulu ithi “ukungasazi isono” njengengane engakwazi okuhle nokubi. UJesu uyiZwi elisenyameni → ungcwele, akanasono, akanasici, futhi akangcolisiwe! Awukho umthetho wokuhle nokubi → Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa! Ngakho akenzanga isono, ngoba iZwi likaNkulunkulu lalisenhlizweni yakhe, futhi wayengenakona! Indlela yeNkosi ijulile futhi iyamangalisa! Amen. Angazi noma uyaqonda?

(2) Yiba yisono ngenxa yethu

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde u-Isaya 53:6 ndawonye → Sonke siye saphambuka njengezimvu; → Wathwala izono zethu mathupha esihlahleni ukuze, sesifile esonweni, siphilele ukulunga. Ngemivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa. Inkomba - 1 Petru 2:24 → Lowo ongasazi isono (owayengasazi isono) wamenza isono ngenxa yethu, ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye. Isikhombo— 2 Korinte 5:21 . Qaphela: UNkulunkulu wabeka izono zethu sonke kuJesu “ongenasono,” waba yisono ngenxa yethu, futhi wathwala izono zethu. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(3) Ukuze sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuye

Masifunde iBhayibheli, KwabaseRoma 3:25-26 uNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokholo lomuntu ukuze abonise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; abonakalise ukulunga kwakhe ngalesisikhathi, ukuze aziwe ukuthi ulungile lomlungisisi walabo abakholwayo kuJesu. →Isahluko 5 Amavesi 18-19 Ngakho njengoba ngesiphambeko sinye bonke balahlwa, kanjalo ngesenzo esisodwa sokulunga bonke bayalungisiswa futhi babe nokuphila. Njengoba ngokungalaleli komuntu oyedwa abaningi benziwa izoni, kanjalo ngokulalela komuntu oyedwa abaningi benziwa abalungileyo. → Babenjalo abanye kini; kodwa senagezwa, senangcweliswa, senalungisiswa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu nangoMoya kaNkulunkulu wethu. Isikhombo— 1 Korinte 6:11 .

Qaphela: UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo yokukuhlambulula ezonweni zonke “ngegazi” likaJesu, Ngokholo lomuntu, uyobonisa ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu, ukuze umuntu azi ukuthi yena ngokwakhe ulungile nokuthi uyolungisisa nalabo abalungile. kholwani kuJesu. Ngenxa yokungalaleli kuka-Adamu oyedwa, bonke benziwa isono; Ngakho uJehova wasungula insindiso yakhe → UNkulunkulu wenza iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, “engenasono” ukuba ibe isono ngenxa yethu → ukuze asindise abantu bakhe esonweni futhi abahlenge esiqalekisweni somthetho → 1 wakhululwa esonweni, 2 Ngemva kokuba ekhululiwe. emlayweni lesiqalekiso sawo, 3 esekhumule umuntu omdala ka-Adamu. Ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze sibe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kuMathewu 5:17-18 futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Ningacabangi ukuthi ngize ukuchitha uMthetho noma abaProfethi. Angizanga ukuchitha uMthetho, kodwa ukuwugcwalisa. adlule eMthethweni .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Uthando lukaJesu lugcwalisa umthetho 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela kude kuya ezulwini, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuthi uthando lukaJesu lugcwalisa umthetho futhi luphelelisa umthetho kaKristu. Uthando lukaJesu lugcwalisa futhi lugcwalise umthetho

[I-Encyclopedia Definition]

Qedela: incazelo yasekuqaleni iwukuphelela, ukusiza abantu babone izifiso zabo

Qedela: okuphelele, okuphelele, okuphelele, okuphelele.

【Ukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli】

(1) Uthando lukaJesu “lugcwalisa” umthetho: UNkulunkulu akanacala, okwe Saba yisono; ngoba bonke bonile → inkokhelo yesono ingukufa → futhi njengoba uJesu afela bonke, bonke bafa. Ngale ndlela, akukho nelilodwa ichashana noma ichashana elilodwa lomthetho elingaqedwa ngenxa kaJesu.” njenge “Umthetho usugcwalisekile. Niyaqonda kahle na?

(2) Uthando lukaJesu "lugcwalisa" umthetho: Ngokuba othanda abanye uwugcwalisile umthetho → UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, egama layo linguJesu, kubo bonke abakholwa yiyo → 1 ngaphandle kwesono, 2 ukhululiwe emthethweni, 3 Susa ikhehla, 4 Gqoka "umuntu omusha" futhi wembathe uKristu →dlulisela "umuntu omusha" wethu ozelwe nguNkulunkulu embusweni weNdodana yakhe ethandekayo. Ngoba wasinika umzimba wakhe “ongonakali” kanye nokuphila! Amen. Ngakho uthando lukaJesu “luphelelisa” umthetho . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

articles.title: Uthando lukaKristu: UNkulunkulu uluthando
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 4 amavesi 7-8 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Bazalwane abathandekayo, kufanele sithandane, ngoba uthando luvela kuNkulunkulu. Wonke umuntu onothando uzelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi uyamazi uNkulunkulu. Lowo ongathandiyo akamazi uNkulunkulu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uluthando .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "UNkulunkulu Uluthando" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zithwale ukudla okuvela kude kuye ezulwini, futhi zisiphakele ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya, ngoba uthando luvela kuNkulunkulu, futhi wonke umuntu onothando uzelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi uyamazi uNkulunkulu. UNkulunkulu uyasithanda, futhi siyakwazi futhi siyakukholwa. UNkulunkulu uluthando; ohlala othandweni uhlala kuNkulunkulu, noNkulunkulu uhlala kuye. Amen!

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uthando lukaJesu Kristu: UNkulunkulu uluthando

Masifunde 1 Johane 4:7-10 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Mfowethu othandekayo, Kufanele sithandane ngoba uthando luvela kuNkulunkulu . Wonke umuntu onothando uzelwe nguNkulunkulu futhi uyamazi uNkulunkulu. Lowo ongathandiyo akamazi uNkulunkulu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uluthando. UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa emhlabeni ukuze siphile ngayo. Akukhona ukuthi siyamthanda uNkulunkulu, kodwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi wathumela iNdodana yakhe ukuba ibe yinhlawulo ngezono zethu.

[Qaphela] : Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, umphostoli uJohane wathi: “Bazalwane abathandekayo, kufanele sithandane, →_→ ngoba “uthando” luvela kuNkulunkulu; aluveli ku-Adamu owadalwa ngothuli.U-Adamu wayeyinyama. futhi wayegcwele izinkanuko ezimbi nezinkanuko →_→ njengokuphinga, nokungcola, nokuxhwaleka, nokukhonza izithombe, nokuthakatha, nokuzondana, nokuxabana, nomhawu, nokufutheka, nokuhlukana, nokuhlukana, nokuhlubuka, nomona, nokudakwa, nokuzitika, namadili, nokunye. ngiyanitshela manje ukuthi abenza okunjalo abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu. - Gal.

Ngakho lwalungekho uthando ku-Adamu, kuphela uthando lwamanga - lokuzenzisa. Uthando lukaNkulunkulu luwukuthi: UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa "uJesu" emhlabeni ukuze siphile ngayo →_→ ngoJesu Kristu owafela izono zethu emthini futhi wangcwatshwa ngosuku lwesithathu Wavuswa! Amen. Ukuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo →_→ kusenza sibe kabusha, ukuze singazalwa ngu-Adamu, hhayi abazali benyama →_→ kodwa 1 ozelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya, 2 ozelwe ngokukholwa ivangeli likaJesu Kristu , 3 abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Uthando lukaNkulunkulu ngathi luyembulwa lapha. Akukhona ukuthi siyamthanda uNkulunkulu, →_→ kodwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyasithanda futhi wathumela iNdodana Yakhe ukuba ibe yinhlawulo yezono zethu. Isikhombo - Johane 4 amavesi 9-10.

UNkulunkulu usinika uMoya wakhe (“uMoya” kubhekiselwa kuMoya oNgcwele), futhi kusukela lapho kuya phambili siyazi ukuthi sihlala kuye futhi uhlala kithi. UYise wayithuma iNdodana ukuba ibe nguMsindisi wezwe; Lowo ovuma ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uhlala kuye, futhi uhlala kuNkulunkulu. (Njengoba kulotshiwe - iNkosi uJesu yathi! Mina ngikuBaba noBaba ukimi → Uma sihlala kuKristu, kusho ukuthi sizalwa kabusha futhi sivuswa 'njengabantu abasha' ngomzimba nokuphila kukaKristu → the Ubaba uhlala kimi Ngaphakathi Amen!

UNkulunkulu uyasithanda, siyazi futhi siyakholwa . unkulunkulu uluthando Ohlala othandweni uhlala kuNkulunkulu, noNkulunkulu uhlala kuye. Ngale ndlela, uthando luyopheleliswa kithi, futhi siyoba nethemba ngosuku lokwahlulela. Ngoba njengoba enjalo, sinjalo nathi kulomhlaba. →_→ Ngenxa yokuthi sizalwa kabusha futhi sivuswa, “umuntu omusha” uyilungu lomzimba kaKristu, “ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe.” Ngakho asinalo ukwesaba “ngalolo suku” →_→ Njengoba enjalo, sinjalo nathi emhlabeni. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Isikhombo— 1 Johane 4:13-17 .

Ihubo: UNkulunkulu uluthando
