articles.title: Incazelo yemibuzo enzima: Izinhlobo ezintathu zeziphingi eziseBhayibhelini
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kusAmbulo Isahluko 17 Amavesi 1-2 Kwase kufika kimi enye yezingelosi eziyisikhombisa ezazinezitsha eziyisikhombisa, yathi: “Woza lapha, futhi ngizokukhombisa ukujeziswa kwesifebe esikhulu esihlezi phezu kwamanzi amakhosi omhlaba aphinga naso. abahlala emhlabeni badakwe yiwayini lobufebe balo . "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Izinhlobo Ezintathu Zezifebe eBhayibhelini 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zihambise ukudla ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda izinhlobo ezintathu ‘zezifebe’ okukhulunywa ngazo eBhayibhelini futhi uyale abantwana bakaNkulunkulu ukuba baqhele ebandleni lesifebe saseBabiloni. .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uhlobo lokuqala lwesifebe

---IBandla Lihlangene NeNkosi Yomhlaba---

Masifunde iBhayibheli kusAmbulo 17:1-6 Enye yezingelosi eziyisikhombisa ezazinezitsha eziyisikhombisa yeza kimi yathi, “Woza lapha, futhi ngizokubonisa isijeziso sesifebe esikhulu esihlezi phezu kwamanzi wena amakhosi omhlaba aphingile nalo, nabakhileyo emhlabeni badakwe yiwayini lobufebe balo.”… emhlabeni.” “Unina wezinengiso.” Ngabona owesifazane edakwe yigazi labangcwele negazi lofakazi bakaJesu. Lapho ngimbona, ngamangala kakhulu. Qaphela: Isonto okuhlanganiswe kulo inkosi yomhlaba nebandla → "imfihlakalo"! Ngaphandle kukhona "iBandla lobuKristu", futhi awukwazi ukukhuluma iqiniso kwamanga Libizwa ngokuthi "imfihlakalo" → Kodwa ngaphakathi, amakhosi omhlaba aphinga "naye", isonto, ehlangene nalo. omunye nomunye, besebenzisa izimiso zezwe nefilosofi yabantu, futhi abazilandeli izimfundiso zikaKristu kini ngokwamasiko abantu → Leli “bandla” liyimfihlakalo—ibandla lesifebe saseBhabhiloni Elikhulu.

Uhlobo lwesibili lwesifebe

---Abangane bomhlaba---

EkaJakobe 4:4 Ziphingi, anazi yini ukuthi ubungane nezwe kungubutha kuNkulunkulu na? Ngakho-ke, noma ubani ofuna ukuba umngane wezwe uyisitha sikaNkulunkulu.

[Qaphela]: Uhlobo lokuqala lwesiphingi kulula ukulibona, okungukuthi, isonto nenkosi yomhlaba kubumbano ukuze kuzuze bobabili ngaphakathi uphinga nenkosi, ememeza “uJesu” emlonyeni wakhe, kodwa eqinisweni ikhanda negunya lakhe kuyinkosi. Emasontweni amaningi emhlabeni, abantu abaningi badakwe iwayini lobufebe bakhe, okuyi-Neo-Confucianism yomhlaba wonke kanye namanga adukisayo Lokhu kusho ukuthi isonto liye lahlanganisa amafilosofi ezwe, i-Neo-Confucianism, njengeTaoism, Confucianism. , ubuBuddha nezinye izimfundiso nezimfundiso ezimsulwa nezingaxutshiwe. Abaningi bamukele izwi lesiphingi nemimoya yamademoni, imimoya emibi ezalwa “kanina” wezinengiso. Bonke babedakiwe lapho, futhi bengalazi iqiniso;

Isiphingi sesibili singumngane wezwe, njengabakhonza izithombe, abathakathi, ukuphinga, ukungcola, ukudakwa, imibuthano exokozelayo, njll uBhali , futhi balandela abanye onkulunkulu ababengabazi - bhekisela kuJeremiya 7:9 .

Uhlobo lwesithathu lwesifebe

---Ngokusekelwe ekugcinweni komthetho---

( 1 ) Umthetho ubusa abantu usaphila

KwabaseRoma Isahluko 7 1Kepha ngithi kini, bazalwane, eniwaziyo umthetho: Anazi yini ukuthi umthetho ubusa umuntu esekhona na?

[Qaphela]: Lokhu kusho ukuthi - ngenkathi sisenyameni, sase sithengiselwe isono - bheka kwabaseRoma Isahluko 7:14 → Ngakho-ke, ngenkathi inyama yethu isaphila, okungukuthi, "umzimba wesono" usaphila, siboshiwe futhi silondolozwe ngomthetho - Gal 3 Isahluko 22 - Ivesi 23, ngokuba amandla esono angumthetho, uma nje sisaphila, okungukuthi, uma nje "izoni" zisaphila, sibuswa futhi sivinjelwe ngumthetho. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

( 2 ) Ubuhlobo phakathi kwesono nomthetho “bufaniswa” nobuhlobo phakathi kowesifazane nomyeni wakhe

KwabaseRoma 7:2-3 Njengoba nje owesifazane enendoda, uboshiwe ngomthetho ngesikhathi indoda isekhona; Ngakho-ke, uma umyeni wakhe esaphila futhi eshade nomunye, ubizwa ngokuthi isiphingi, uma indoda isifile, ukhululiwe emthethweni wayo, futhi noma eshade nomunye umuntu, akasona isifebe.

[Qaphela]: Umphostoli uPawulu wasebenzisa [ isono lomlayo ] ubudlelwano qhathanisa ne ［ owesifazane nomyeni ]ubudlelwano! Uma nje indoda isaphila, owesifazane uboshiwe ngomthetho womshado wendoda yakhe, uma eshada nomunye, usuke ephula umthetho womshado, futhi ubizwa ngokuthi isiphingi. Uma indoda isifile, owesifazane ukhululiwe emthethweni wendoda yakhe, noma eganile, akabizwa ngokuthi isiphingi. Uma umfazi elahla indoda yakhe, ashade nomunye, uyaphinga. — Marku 10:12 “Ukuphinga enyameni.
KwabaseRoma 7:4 Kanjalo, bazalwane bami, nani nafa kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu, ukuze nibe-ngababanye, ophilayo kwabafileyo, ukuze sithele izithelo kuNkulunkulu.

( 3 ) Uma owesifazane “isoni” ephila futhi eza kuKristu, uyisifebe

" isoni "isiqhathaniso" owesifazane "Uma uphila, akukho ndlela" umthetho" Khona manje umyeni fa ," isoni "Cha" Phuma " Izingqinamba zomthetho womyeni, "Uma ubuya" UKristu ",uyafona nje" isiphingi "Leyo [ isifebe somoya ]. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Ngakho-ke, uma umyeni wakhe esaphila futhi eshade nomunye, ubizwa ngokuthi isiphingi, uma indoda isifile, ukhululiwe emthethweni wayo, futhi noma eshade nomunye umuntu, akasona isifebe.

[Qaphela]: Ngokutadisha imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, umphostoli “uPawulu” wathi: “Bazalwane, manje ngithi kulabo abawuqondayo umthetho → okungukuthi, labo abaqonda “isivumelwano sokuqala,” okungukuthi, umthetho weTestamente Elidala, don. “Niyazi ukuthi umthetho ubusa abantu, noma “isoni” siphila, “abaphansi komthetho bayizoni, bayizigqila zesono, ngokuba amandla esono angumthetho na? KwabaseKorinte 15:56 → Inqobo nje uma “isoni” sisaphila, siboshiwe ngomthetho, ngoba singaphansi komthetho. Amandla omthetho leyo" ubugebengu ". Ngakho, uyaqonda?

(2) Ubuhlobo phakathi kwesono nomthetho bufaniswa nobuhlobo phakathi kowesifazane nomyeni wakhe

Lapha umphostoli “uPawulu” uqhathanisa “ubuhlobo phakathi kwesono nomthetho” “nobuhlobo phakathi kowesifazane nomyeni wakhe” →_ Njengoba nje “owesifazane” efaniswa “nesoni” esinomyeni siqhathaniswa. Emthethweni indoda nayo ifaniswa nomthetho ngesikhathi isaphila, owesifazane uboshiwe ngomthetho “wokugana” uma umyeni wakhe efa, owesifazane ukhululiwe emthethweni womyeni wakhe. Ngakho-ke, uma indoda yakhe isaphila, ungowomunye umuntu (okungukuthi, “owesifazane” engakakhululwa emthethweni “wokugana”) uma eba isiphingi, uma engowabo indoda isifile, ukhululiwe emthethweni womyeni wakhe, noma eba isiphingi, akasona isifebe.

Ngakho-ke ubuhlobo phakathi “kwezoni nomthetho” buyafana → KwabaseRoma 7:4 bazalwane bami, nani nafa “emthethweni” ngomzimba kaKristu Ivesi 6 Safa “emthethweni”, Gal :19 "UPawulu" wathi → Ngafa "emthethweni" ngenxa yomthetho! Ukuze nilethwe kwabanye, ngisho kuYe owavuswa kwabafileyo → [INkosi uJesu Kristu], ukuze sithele izithelo “ezingokomoya” kuNkulunkulu.

(3) Uma owesifazane ephila “njengesoni” futhi eza kuKristu, uyisifebe

Uma nina "zoni" niphila "ngaphandle kokufa emthethweni, "ngaphandle kokuphunyuka" ebugqilini bomthetho, futhi uma niphendukela kuKristu, niyobiza ngokuthi "isifebe" [isifebe sikamoya] . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Abantu abaningi bafana “nezingulube” esezihlanziwe zaphindela emuva ekugingqikeni odakeni bakhala “Nkosi, Nkosi” ngezindebe zabo futhi baphenduke futhi “ezinhliziyweni zabo” babuyele emthethweni weTestamente Elidala. ukuqokwa kwangaphambilini Husband" date. Lokho kusho ukuthi usunayo Amadoda "amabili" → indoda eyodwa "yeTestamente Elidala", "uyisiphingi esingokomoya" umuntu omdala; ". Galathiya 4:5 UNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba ihlenge labo ababengaphansi "komthetho" ukuze nize eNkosini uJesu Kristu; kodwa abaningi "babuya" futhi bafuna ukuba izigqila ngaphansi komthetho. Ukuba izoni. Laba bantu “bayaphinga” kanye “nokuphinga okungokomoya”, futhi babizwa ngokuthi iziphingi zomoya. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

NgokukaLuka 6:46 INkosi uJesu yathi: “Ningibizelani ngokuthi, ‘Nkosi, Nkosi,’ kodwa ningawalaleli amazwi ami na? Nithi! umthetho manje "ukhululekile" emthethweni, usivumela ukuba sikhonze iNkosi "Izoni ezingakhululekile emthethweni azikwazi ukukhonza iNkosi."

Ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele), hhayi ngokwendlela yakudala yesiko. → Kodwa uma niholwa nguMoya oNgcwele, anikho ngaphansi komthetho. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 5 ivesi 18

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kube nani nonke! Amen

2021.06, 14

articles.title: Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kwabaseRoma Isahluko 4 nevesi 15 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka; .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi - ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elikhulunywe ezandleni zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu → eletha isinkwa esivela kude ezulwini ukuze asinikeze ukudla ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze thina ukuphila kuchichima kakhulu! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi uqhubeke ukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi uvule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amazwi akho, angamaqiniso kamoya→ Yazini ukuthi lapho okungekho umthetho khona, akukho ukweqa; .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ubuhlobo phakathi komthetho nesono

Umbuzo: Ingabe ukhona umthetho “wokuqala”? Noma ingabe "kuqala" unecala?
Impendulo: Okokuqala kukhona umthetho, bese kuba yisono. →Lapho kungekho mthetho, asikho isiphambeko; Amen! →"Ngoba amandla esono angumthetho" →Igunya lamandla omthetho [ukulawula iziphambeko, izono, nezoni] Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:56 namaRoma 4:15.

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?
Impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono → Noma ngubani owonayo oweqa umthetho uyisono; Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:4

Umbuzo: Siyini isizathu "sesono"?
Impendulo: Ngenkathi sisenyameni, isono "sazalwa" ngenxa "yomthetho" →Ngokuba lapho sisenyameni, izinkanuko ezimbi ezizelwe ngomthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, zathela isithelo sokufa. Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:5

→ "Izifiso ezimbi zenyama, izinkanuko, zisebenza ezithweni" → Lapho izinkanuko zikhulelwa, zizala isono; Bheka kuJakobe 1:15

Umbuzo: Uvelaphi umzimba wethu wesono?
Impendulo: Imizimba yethu enesono yazalwa ukhokho wethu [u-Adamu]. → Lokhu kufana nje nesono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwafika kuwo wonke umuntu ngoba wonke umuntu wona. …Kodwa kusukela ku-Adamu kuye kuMose, ukufa kwabusa, ngisho nalabo abangonanga njengo-Adamu. U-Adamu wayengumfanekiso womuntu owayezofika. Bheka amaRoma 5:12, 14

(2) Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Umbuzo: Njengoba “ukufa” kuvela “esonweni,” singakubalekela kanjani ukufa?
Impendulo: Uma ufuna ukuphunyuka ekufeni, kufanele ubalekele esonweni → Uma ufuna ukuphunyuka esonweni, kufanele ubalekele emthethweni.

Umbuzo: Ungasibalekela kanjani isono?
Impendulo: "Kholwani" ukuthi umuntu oyedwa kuKristu "wafela" bonke, futhi bonke bafa. →“Lowo ofileyo ukhululiwe esonweni.”—Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:7

→"Kholwa" futhi bonke bafa, "Kholwa" futhi bonke basindiswa esonweni. Amen!

Asihambi ngokubona, kodwa ngokukholwa → Ngokubona inyama yami iyaphila, futhi ngokholo umuntu wami omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafa kanye noKristu. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14.

Umbuzo: Ungabalekela kanjani umthetho?
Impendulo: Sifile kuwo umthetho engiboshwe ngawo ngomzimba kaKristu, futhi manje sikhululekile emthethweni → Ngakho, bazalwane bami, nani nifile kuwo umthetho ngomzimba kaKristu .Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni, ukuze sikhonze iNkosi ngokobusha bomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele) hhayi ngendlela endala yomkhosi. Bheka amaRoma 7:4, 6

(3) Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa : Ngoba umthetho uvusa ulaka (noma ukuhumusha: kubangela abantu ukujeziswa lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa); KwabaseRoma 4 Ivesi 15
2 Ngokuba ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile — Roma 7:8
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asisona isono : Ngaphambi komthetho isono sasikhona emhlabeni; Roma 5:13
4 Uma unomthetho, uyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho : Noma ubani owona ngaphandle komthetho futhi uyobhubha ngaphandle komthetho; Roma 2:12

[Qaphela]: Abantwana abazelwe nguNkulunkulu ‘banomthetho kaKristu,’ futhi isifinyezo somthetho sikaKristu - bheka kwabaseRoma 10:4 → Umthetho kaKristu unguKristu. "thanda" ! Thanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena ! Amen. Ngoba ngaphandle komthetho “wokugwetshwa”, bekungeke kube khona isono nobugebengu . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? ngakho IZwi likaNkulunkulu liyimfihlakalo Kwembulwa kubantwana bakaNkulunkulu kuphela! Kepha “abangaphandle” abezwayo, bayezwa, kodwa abaqondi; Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:9 no-5:18.

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu uBaba, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kube nani nonke! Amen

2021.06.13

articles.title: Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe ngaphandle komthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 3 amavesi 21-22 futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Kepha manje ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu sekubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho, kufakazelwa ngumthetho nabaprofethi: ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa nguJesu Kristu kubo bonke abakholwayo, ngaphandle kokuhlukaniswa. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe ngaphandle komthetho 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane olungileyo [ibandla] wathuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo ezilobayo zashumayela izwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi “ukulunga” kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe ngaphandle komthetho . Umthandazo ongenhla,

Khuleka, ncenga, ubonge, ubusise! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu

Umbuzo: Kwembulwa kuphi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu?
Impendulo: Manje ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu sekubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho.

Ake sibheke kwabaseRoma 3:21-22 siwafunde ndawonye: Kepha manje ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu sekubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho, kunobufakazi bomthetho nabaprofethi: kungukulunga kukaNkulunkulu okunikezwa kuzo zonke izinto. ngokukholwa kuJesu Kristu Akukho mehluko kwabakholwayo. Phenduka futhi kwabaseRoma 10:3 ngoba labo abangamazi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu futhi abafuna ukumisa okwabo ukulunga abalaleli ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi manje “ukulunga” kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwa “ngaphandle komthetho”, njengoba kufakazelwa umthetho nabaprofethi → UJesu wathi kubo: “Yilokhu engangikwenza lapho nginani ” Nginitshela lokhu: Kumelwe kugcwaliseke konke okulotshwe ngami eMthethweni kaMose, nakubaProfethi nasemaHutsheni.”— Luka 24:44 .

Kodwa lapho ukuphelela kwesikhathi sekufikile, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, ezelwe ngowesifazane, ezelwe ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ihlenge abaphansi komthetho, ukuze samukele ukuma kwamadodana. Inkomba – Kanye nesahluko 4 amavesi 4-5. →“Ukulunga” kukaNkulunkulu kufakazelwa yilokho okulotshwe eMthethweni, kubaProfethi, nasemaHutsheni, okungukuthi, uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa uJesu, uLizwi waba yinyama, wakhulelwa iNcasakazi uMariya futhi wazalwa nguJesu. uMoya oNgcwele, futhi wazalwa ngaphansi komthetho, ukuze ahlenge labo abangaphansi komthetho→ 1 ngaphandle komthetho , 2 Khululeka esonweni, khumula ikhehla . Ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo, sizalwa kabusha → ukuze samukele ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu ! Amen. ngakho, Ukwamukela “ubuntwana bukaNkulunkulu” kusho ukuba ngaphandle komthetho, ukukhululeka esonweni nokukhumula umuntu omdala→ Kungale ndlela kuphela umuntu angathola ngayo “isiqu sendodana kaNkulunkulu” ";

ngoba amandla esono Kungumthetho - bheka kweyoku-1 Korinte 15:56 → Emthethweni " ngaphakathi "Okubonakalayo ukuthi 〔ubugebengu〕 , inqobo nje uma unayo" ubugebengu" -Umthetho ungakwazi sobala Phuma. Kungani uwe ngaphansi komthetho? , ngoba wena isoni , okusemthethweni amandla kanye nobubanzi Vele ukunakekele ubugebengu 〕. Emthethweni kukhona kuphela [izoni] Akukho ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu - akukho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kusekelwe okholweni, ukuze ukholo

Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.”— KwabaseRoma 1:17 . →Kulokhu, singathini? AbeZizwe abangazange bakuphishekele ukulunga empeleni bathola ukulunga, “okungukulunga” okuvela “ekukholweni”. Kodwa ama-Israyeli aphishekela ukulunga komthetho, kodwa ehluleka ukuthola ukulunga komthetho. Siyini isizathu salokhu? Yingoba abaceli ngokukholwa, kodwa “ngemisebenzi” kuphela bawela kuleso sikhubekiso. — Roma 9:30-32 .

(3) Bengakwazi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngaphansi komthetho

Ngenxa yokuthi ama-Israyeli ayengakwazi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu futhi efuna ukumisa okwawo ukulunga, ama-Israyeli ayecabanga ukuthi ngokugcina umthetho nangokuncika enyameni ukuze ilungise futhi ithuthukise ukuziphatha kwawo, ayengalungisiswa. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi bacela ngemisebenzi kunokukholwa, ngakho bawela kuleso sikhubekiso. Bathembela emisebenzini yomthetho futhi abalalelanga ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu. Inkomba - KwabaseRoma 10 ivesi 3.

Kodwa kufanele futhi uqaphele ukuthi → nina "enibagcina umthetho" abafuna ukulungisiswa ngomthetho → nihlukanisiwe noKristu futhi niwile emseni. NgoMoya oNgcwele, ngokukholwa, silindele ithemba lokulunga. Inkomba - Kanye nesahluko 5 amavesi 4-5. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.06.12

articles.title: Uma kungomthetho, akuveli ngesithembiso
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 3 ivesi 18 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba uma ifa lingokomthetho, aliveli ngesithembiso, kepha uNkulunkulu walinika u-Abrahama ifa ngokwesithembiso. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye “Uma kungomthetho, akungokwesithembiso” Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Owesifazane oqotho [ibandla] uthumela izisebenzi ukuba zihambise ukudla ezindaweni ezikude esibhakabhakeni, futhi asabele ukudla ngesikhathi ukuze enze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya futhi siqonde izibusiso ezithenjiswe uNkulunkulu eBhayibhelini→ Uma kungomthetho, akuveli ngesithembiso; “Ngokukholwa” sithola uMoya oNgcwele othenjisiwe njengophawu, okuwubufakazi bokuzuza ifa likaYise. Amen!

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Uma kungomthetho, akuveli ngesithembiso

(1) UNkulunkulu wathembisa inzalo ka-Abrahama ukuthi izothola ifa

Ake sifunde kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 3 amavesi 15-18 eBhayibhelini futhi siwafunde ndawonye: Bazalwane, mangikusho ngolimi oluvamile lwabantu: Nakuba kuyisivumelwano phakathi kwabantu, uma simisiwe → kusho ukuthi simisiwe phakathi kukaNkulunkulu nomuntu" "Isivumelwano sombhalo esihle" asinakulahlwa noma sengezwe kuso. Isithembiso senziwa ku-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe. →Ngokuba uNkulunkulu wathembisa ukuthi u-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe babeyodla ifa lomhlaba, kungabi ngomthetho kodwa ngokulunga kokukholwa. --Bheka kwabaseRoma 4:13 → UNkulunkulu akasho ukuthi "yonke inzalo yakho," ebhekisele kubantu abaningi, kodwa uthi "inzalo yakho eyodwa," ebhekisela "kumuntu oyedwa," onguKristu.

(2) Noma ubani osekelwe okholweni uyodla ifa likaBaba waseZulwini

Umbuzo: Yini esekelwe ekukholweni
Impendulo: Noma ubani okholelwa "eqinisweni levangeli" "ngokholo", ethembele kuphela okholweni hhayi emisebenzini yomuntu omdala → ukukholelwa "evangelini likaJesu Kristu" 1 ozelwe okholweni lwevangeli , 2 abazelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya oNgcwele, 3 ngokuzalwa nguNkulunkulu! Kulapho kuphela lapho singathola khona ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu, sizuze ifa lokuphila okuphakade, futhi sizuze ifa likaBaba wethu waseZulwini. Ngakho-ke, kufanele nazi ukuthi labo abasekelwe “ekukholweni” bayinzalo ka-Abrahama. --Bheka kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 3 ivesi 7. Engikushoyo ukuthi isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu kusenesikhathi sibhekisa esithembisweni sikaNkulunkulu sokuthi u-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe bayodla ifa “lombuso kaNkulunkulu” emhlabeni. —Bheka uGenesise 22:16-18 namaRoma 4:13

(3) Izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu azinakwenziwa ize ngomthetho

Ngeke uqedwe ngumthetho eminyakeni engama-430 kamuva →_→ ibhekisela "emthethweni kaMose" ngokomthetho, akekho ogcina umthetho ophule umthetho. Ngoba bonke bonile futhi basilalelwe inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu - bheka isahluko 3 ivesi 23 . Ngokomthetho →_→ wonke umuntu emhlabeni wenze "isono", futhi umsebenzi "wesono" "ukufa". Okusho ukuthi, lapho abantu befa futhi bebuyela othulini, ngeke yini izibusiso ezithenjiswe nguNkulunkulu kusengaphambili zibe yize?

Ngakho-ke isivumelwano esamiswa nguNkulunkulu ngaphambili asinakuchithwa ngomthetho emva kweminyaka engamakhulu amane namashumi amathathu, senze isithembiso sibe yize. Ngokuba uma ifa lingomthetho, aliveli ngesithembiso; →_→Uma kuphela labo abangabomthetho kuyizindlalifa, “ukholo” luyoba yize futhi “isithembiso” siyoba yize.

(4) Umthetho uvusa intukuthelo futhi ujezisa abantu

Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka (noma ukuhunyushwa: kubizela isijeziso lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa); →_→ kusho ukuthi sihlengiwe ngoJesu Kristu, okusenza → 1 sikhululwe esonweni → 2 abakhululiwe emthethweni → 3 bakhululwe kumuntu omdala u-Adamu → 4 wasidlulisela “kumuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu wasiyisa embusweni weNdodana ethandekayo. Ngale ndlela, awusekho ngaphansi komthetho, ngeke wephule umthetho kanye nesono, futhi ngeke uqalekisiwe ngomthetho wokwahlulela. Ngakho, uyaqonda? .

(5) Ukuwa emseni ngenxa yomthetho

Umbuzo: Uyini uMthetho?
Impendulo: Labo abalungisiswa ngemisebenzi yomthetho.
Ngakho-ke, “ngokukholwa” ukuthi umuntu uyindlalifa, ngakho-ke ngomusa, ukuze ngokuqinisekile isithembiso senzeke kuyo yonke inzalo, hhayi kwabangokomthetho kuphela, kodwa nakulabo abalingisa ukholo u-Abrahama. —Bheka amaRoma 4:14-16. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Isexwayiso: Noma ubani osekelwe emisebenzini yomthetho uqalekisiwe, ngoba akukho muntu ongalungisiswa ngemisebenzi yomthetho “ngomthetho” hhayi “ngokukholwa” kodwa ngemisebenzi yomthetho. Abantu abasekelwe emthethweni bahlukanisiwe noKristu futhi bawile emseni. Izibusiso ezithenjiswe uNkulunkulu zenziwa ize kubo. Ngakho-ke, izibusiso ezithenjiswe nguNkulunkulu zisekelwe “ekukholweni” hhayi “emthethweni”! Amen. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Izifundo ZeBhayibheli: Indlela Yokungoni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma isahluko 4 ivesi 15 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka; Phinda uvule eyoku-1 Johane 3:9 Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ngezimfundiso zeBhayibheli ndawonye "Ungakwenzi kanjani ubugebengu" Khulekani: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi ezibhala ngezandla zazo futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kude, ukudla kunikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele, futhi izinto ezingokomoya zikhulunywa kubantu abangokomoya ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu kucebe. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Uma uqonda ukuthi ukhululiwe emthethweni nasesonweni, angeke wephule umthetho futhi uyone; ! Amen.

Imithandazo engenhla, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

buza: IBhayibheli lisifundisa → Ingabe ikhona indlela yokungoni?
impendulo: Masifunde kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 5 ivesi 18 eBhayibhelini futhi silifunde ndawonye: Dan Uma niholwa nguMoya, aniphansi komthetho . Amen! Qaphela: Uma uholwa nguMoya oNgcwele awukho ngaphansi komthetho → "Uma ungekho phansi komthetho" angeke ona . Uyakuqonda lokhu?

buza: Yiziphi ezinye izindlela zokungawenzi ubugebengu?
impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

【1】Baleka emthethweni

1 Amandla esono umthetho :Fa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba? Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho? Udosi lokufa yisono, namandla esono umthetho. Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:55-56
2 Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono; Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 3 Ivesi 4
UJesu waphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Wonke owonayo uyisigqila sesono. Bheka uJohane 8:34
3 Inkokhelo yesono ingukufa; Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. Bheka amaRoma 6:23
4 Izifiso ezimbi zivela emthethweni: Ngokuba lapho sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizelwe ngomthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, zathela isithelo sokufa. Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:5
Lapho inkanuko isithathiwe, izala isono; Bheka kuJakobe 1:15
5 Awukho umthetho ngaphandle kokwahlulela ngokomthetho; Ngoba uNkulunkulu akabheki ubuso bamuntu. Noma ubani owona ngaphandle komthetho uyobhubha ngaphandle komthetho; Bheka kwabaseRoma 2:11-12

6 Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile —Bheka amaRoma 7:7-13
7 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa; Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka; Bheka kwabaseRoma 4:15

8 Ngaphandle komthetho isono asithathwa njengesono. Ngaphambi kokuba kube khona umthetho, isono sasivele sikhona emhlabeni; Bheka amaRoma 5:13
9 Ukufa esonweni kungukukhululwa esonweni: Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, singabe sisakhonza isono; …Wafa esonweni kwaba kanye; Kanjalo nani kufanele nizisho ukuthi ningabafileyo esonweni, kodwa niphilele uNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu. Bheka kwabaseRoma 6, amavesi 6-7, 10-11
10 Ukufa emthethweni kungukukhululeka emthethweni. Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni—bheka kwabaseRoma 7:6.

Ngenxa yomthetho, mina Pawulu ngafa kuwo umthetho ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. —Bheka kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 2 ivesi 19

【2】Uzalwe nguNkulunkulu

Bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa ebizweni lakhe. Laba yilabo abangazalwanga ngegazi, noma ngenkanuko, noma ngentando yomuntu, kodwa abazelwe nguNkulunkulu. Bheka uJohane 1:12-13
Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; Kulokhu kwembulwa ukuthi obani abangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi abangabantwana bakaSathane. Noma ubani ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu, nanoma ubani ongamthandi umfowabo. 1 Johane 3:9-10

Siyazi ukuthi lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu kasoze ona; Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 5 Ivesi 18

【3】KuKristu

Lowo ohlala kuye akoni; Bantwanyana bami, ningalingeka. Lowo owenza ukulunga ulungile, njengoba nje uJehova elungile. Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:6-7
Lowo owenza isono ungokaSathane, ngoba uSathane wonile kwasekuqaleni. INdodana kaNkulunkulu yabonakala ukuba ichithe imisebenzi kaSathane. Bheka kuJohane 1 Isahluko 3 Ivesi 8

Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. —Bheka kwabaseRoma 8 amavesi 1-2

Ngoba nafa futhi ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Lapho uKristu ongukuphila kwethu ebonakala, nani niyobonakala kanye naye enkazimulweni. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseKolose isahluko 3 amavesi 3-4 .

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, thina IBhayibheli lisifundisa ukuthi singawephuli kanjani umthetho noma isono : 1 Ukukholwa kuhlangene noKristu, kwabethelwa esiphambanweni, kwafa, kwangcwatshwa, futhi kwavuswa—kuhleliwe esonweni, kukhululiwe emthethweni, futhi kukhululiwe kumuntu omdala; 2 ozelwe nguNkulunkulu; 3 Hlala kuKristu. Amen! Lawa angenhla angamazwi kaNkulunkulu aseBhayibhelini? Babusisiwe abakholwayo, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabo bonke bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu futhi bayodla ifa likaBaba oseZulwini esikhathini esizayo. Haleluya! Amen

Izintshumayelo zokwabelana ngombhalo, ezigqugquzelwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu, uMfowethu Wang, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen, kanye nezinye izisebenzi, basekela futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli weBandla likaJesu Kristu. Shumayela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, ivangeli elivumela abantu ukuba basindiswe, bakhazinyuliswe, futhi bahlengwe imizimba yabo! Amen

articles.title: Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho nesono
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen

Savula iBhayibheli [Roma 7:7] futhi safunda ndawonye: Pho, singathini? Umthetho uyisono na? Lutho neze! Kodwa uma bekungengenxa yomthetho, bengingeke ngisazi ukuthi siyini isono. Ngaphandle-ke uma umthetho uthi “Ungabi nomhobholo”, angazi ukuthi ukuhaha kuyini .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho nesono 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthuma izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elakhulunywa yibo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka kude kuya ezulwini, futhi ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini kunikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele, okwenza ukuphila kwethu kucebe. Amen! Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe iqiniso elingokomoya → siqonde ubuhlobo phakathi komthetho nesono.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Munye kuphela umniki-mthetho nomahluleli

Ake sibheke iBhayibheli [Jakobe 4:12] futhi silifunde ndawonye: Munye umniki-mthetho nomahluleli, lowo onamandla okusindisa nokubhubhisa. Ungubani wena ukuba wahlulele abanye?

1 Ensimini yase-Edene, uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano somthetho no-Adamu ukuthi kwakungafanele adle emthini wokuhle nokubi uJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayilondoloze. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: "Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa." Isahluko 15- Ivesi 17 lirekhodiwe.

2 Umthetho KaMose WamaJuda - UJehova uNkulunkulu wanika umthetho “iMiyalo Eyishumi” eNtabeni YaseSinayi, okungukuthi, iNtaba iHorebe. U-Eksodusi 20 noLevitikusi. UMose wabizela ndawonye bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kubo: “O Israyeli, lalela izimiso nezahlulelo engizisho kini namuhla, ukuze nizifunde futhi nizenze. UJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi entabeni yaseHorebe. Lesi sivumelwano asisona esasungulwa nokhokho bethu samiswa kanye nathi esiphila lapha namuhla - Duteronomi 5:1-3.

(2) Umthetho awumiselwanga olungileyo;

Siyazi ukuthi umthetho muhle, uma usetshenziswa kahle; ubudlwangudlwangu, labo abaphanga ukuphila kwabo, labo abaqamba amanga, labo abafunga izifungo ezingamanga, lanoma yini enye ephambene lokulunga. --Kulotshwe kweyoku-1 Thimothewu Isahluko 1:8-10

(3) Umthetho wenezelwa iziphambeko

Ngale ndlela, kungani umthetho ukhona? Wenezelwa iziphambeko, ulindele ukufika kwenzalo okwathenjiswa kuyo isithembiso, wamiswa ngumlamuli ngezingelosi. — Galathiya 3:19

(4) Umthetho wenezelwa ngaphandle ukuze kwandiswe iziphambeko

Umthetho wenezelwa ukuze iziphambeko zande; —Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 5:20. Qaphela: Umthetho ufana "nokukhanya nesibuko" okwembula "isono" kubantu Uyasiqonda?

(5) Umthetho wenza abantu baqaphele izono zabo

Ngakho-ke akukho nyama engalungisiswa phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngemisebenzi yomthetho, ngokuba umthetho ulahla abantu ngesono. —Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 3:20

(6) Umthetho uvimba yonke imilomo

Siyazi ukuthi konke okungokomthetho kubhekiselwa kwabaphansi komthetho, ukuze yonke imilomo ivinjwe, izwe lonke libe ngaphansi kokwahlulelwa nguNkulunkulu. —Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 3:19. Ngoba uNkulunkulu ubophe bonke abantu ekungalalelini ngenjongo yokuba lesihawu kubo bonke abantu. —Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 11:32

(7) Umthetho unguthisha wethu wokuqeqesha

Kodwa isimiso sensindiso ngokukholwa asikafiki, futhi sigcinwe ngaphansi komthetho kuze kube sekwambulweni kweqiniso okuzayo. Ngale ndlela, umthetho ungumfundisi wethu wokuqeqesha, osiholela kuKristu ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa. —Kulotshwe kwabaseGalathiya 3:23-24

Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho nesono

( 1 ) Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; —Kulotshwe ku-1 Johane 3:4. Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. — Roma 6:23 . UJesu waphendula: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Wonke umuntu owona uyisigqila sesono.”— Johane 8:34

( 2 ) Inyama yazala isono ngomthetho -Ngokuba lapho sisenyameni, izifiso ezimbi ezizelwe ngumthetho zasebenza ezithweni zethu, zathela isithelo sokufa. —Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 7:5. Kodwa yilowo nalowo uyengwa lapho ehuhwa futhi ehungwa ngezakhe izinkanuko. Lapho inkanuko isithathiwe, izala isono; —NgokukaJakobe 1:14-15

( 3 ) Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile -- Pho, singathini? Umthetho uyisono na? Lutho neze! Kodwa uma bekungengenxa yomthetho, bengingeke ngisazi ukuthi siyini isono. Ngaphandle kokuthi umthetho uthi, “Ungahaha,” bengingeke ngikwazi ukuthi ukuhaha kuyini. Nokho, isono sathola ithuba lokuvusa yonke inhlobo yokuhaha ngomyalo; Ngingakaphili ngaphandle komthetho; Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 7:7-9.

( 4 ) Awukho umthetho Isono akusona isono. -- Njengoba isono sangena ezweni ngamuntu munye, nangesono kwangena ukufa kubo bonke, ngokuba bonke bonile. Ngaphambi komthetho isono sasikhona emhlabeni; Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 5:12-13

( 5 ) Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa -Ngokuba umthetho uvusa ulaka; Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 4:15.

( 6 ) Noma ubani owona ngaphansi komthetho uyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho -Wonke owonayo ngaphandle komthetho uyobhubha ngaphandle komthetho; Kulotshwe kwabaseRoma 2:12.

( 7 ) Sisindisiwe esonweni nasemthethweni nasesiqalekisweni somthetho ngokukholwa eNkosini uJesu Kristu.

( Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, singakwazi ukubona ukuthi siyini isono? Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono; --Bheka kwabaseRoma 6:23 Amandla esono umthetho --Bheka ku-1 Korinte 15:56, izifiso ezimbi zazalwa ngomthetho, okuyinkanuko, inkanuko wazala isono, isono, Lapho sikhula, sizala ukufa. Okusho ukuthi, inkanuko enyameni yethu iyovuswa emalungwini ngenxa “yomthetho” - izinkanuko zenyama ziyosebenza emalungwini "ngomthetho" futhi ziqale ukukhulelwa - futhi masinyane. njengoba izinkanuko zikhulelwe, bayozala "isono"! Ngakho “isono” sikhona ngenxa yomthetho. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

kanjalo" uPaul "Isifinyezo KwabaseRoma" umthetho lesono "Ubudlelwano:

1 Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile.

2 Uma ungekho umthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono.

3 Lapho kungekho mthetho - akukho ukweqa!

Ngokwesibonelo, “u-Eva” walingwa inyoka ensimini yase-Edene ukuba adle emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi Inyoka yathi kuye: “Aniyikufa nokufa, kodwa mhla nidla kuwo. amehlo enu ayakuvuleka, nibe njengoNkulunkulu, nikwazi okuhle nokubi. Amazwi ayengayo “enyoka” angena enhliziyweni ka-Eva, futhi ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama yakhe, inkanuko eyayingaphakathi kuye yaqala emalungwini enyama Inkanuko yaqala ukukhulelwa ngenxa yomyalo othi “Uzakwenza ungadli” emthethweni, futhi inkanuko yaqala ukumitha.” Ngemva kokukhulelwa, isono siyazalwa! Ngakho u-Eva welula isandla wakha isithelo emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi wadla nomyeni wakhe “u-Adamu”. Ngakho, ingabe nonke niyaqonda ngokucacile?

thanda" uPaul "Kwashiwo kwabaseRoma 7! Ngaphandle kokuthi umthetho uthi, ungafi, angazi ukuthi ukuhaha kuyini na? Niyazi "ukuhaha" - ngoba niwazi umthetho - umthetho uthi "imali", ngakho "uPawulu" wathi. : "Ngaphandle komthetho isono sifile, kodwa ngomyalo womthetho isono siyaphila, mina ngifile." ngakho! Uyaqonda?

UNkulunkulu uyawuthanda umhlaba! Wathumela iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba ibe yinhlawulo yethu, ngokukholwa, sabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu ngenyama nezinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama Futhi isiqalekiso somthetho, thola ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu, uthole ukuphila okuphakade, futhi uthole ifa lombuso wezulu! Amen

kulungile! Yilapho engithanda ukuhlanganyela khona nani namuhla. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: umusa nomthetho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen,

Savula iBhayibheli [Johane 1:17] futhi safunda ndawonye: Umthetho wanikezwa ngoMose, umusa neqiniso kwavela ngoJesu Kristu. Amen

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane ndawonye "Umusa Nomthetho" Umkhuleko: Baba oNgcwele othandekayo, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ngokuthi uMoya oNgcwele unathi ngaso sonke isikhathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthuma izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo, elakhulunywa yibo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Ukudla kuhanjiswa kude futhi ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini kunikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuthi umthetho washaywa ngoMose. Umusa neqiniso kuvela kuJesu Kristu ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, imikhuleko, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

(1) Umusa awunandaba nemisebenzi

Masihlole iBhayibheli [KwabaseRoma 11:6] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma kungomusa, akuncikile emisebenzini; ufanelwe umusa wakhe; Njengoba nje noDavide ebiza labo abalungisiswa nguNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwemisebenzi yabo babusisiwe. KwabaseRoma 9:11 Ngoba amawele ayengakazalwa, futhi kwakungakenzeki okuhle noma okubi, kodwa ukuze kwambulwe inhloso kaNkulunkulu ngokukhetha, kungabi ngenxa yemisebenzi, kodwa ngenxa yalowo owabizayo. )

(2) Umusa unikezwa ngesihle

[Mathewu 5:45] Kanjalo niyakuba-ngabantwana bakaYihlo osezulwini, ngokuba yena wenza ilanga lakhe liphumele abahle nababi, anise imvula phezu kwabalungileyo nabangalungile. AmaHubo 65:11 Unika iminyaka yakho umqhele womusa;

(3) Ukusindiswa kukaKristu akuxhomekile ekulaleleni umthetho

Ake sihlole iBhayibheli [KwabaseRoma 3:21-28] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Kodwa manje ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu sekubonakalisiwe ngaphandle komthetho, kunobufakazi bomthetho nabaprofethi: ngisho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuJesu. UKristu Kubo bonke abakholwayo, ngaphandle kokuhlukaniswa. Ngokuba bonke bonile futhi bayasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu; kodwa manje sebelungisisiwe ngesihle ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngokuhlengwa okukuKristu Jesu. UNkulunkulu wamisa uJesu njengenhlawulo ngegazi likaJesu nangokholo lomuntu ukuze abonise ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu; owaziwayo ukuthi ulungile, futhi ukuze alungisise labo abakholwa kuJesu. Uma kunjalo, ungaziqhayisa kanjani? Ayikho into ongaziqhenya ngayo. Singayisebenzisa kanjani into engekho? Ingabe kuyindlela ephumelelayo? Cha, kuyindlela yokukholelwa eNkosini. Ngakho (kukhona imiqulu yasendulo: ngoba) siqinisekile: Umuntu ulungisiswa ngokukholwa, hatshi ngokulalela umthetho .

( Qaphela: Kokubili amaJuda ayengaphansi komthetho kaMose kanye nabeZizwe ababengenawo umthetho manje sebelungisisiwe ngomusa kaNkulunkulu futhi balungisiswa ngesihle ngokukholwa ensindisweni kaJesu Kristu! Amen, akusiyo indlela yenkonzo encomekayo, kodwa indlela yokukholelwa eNkosini. Ngakho-ke siphethe ngokuthi umuntu ulungisiswa ngokukholwa futhi akancikile ekulaleleni umthetho. )

Umthetho wama-Israyeli wanikezwa ngoMose:

(1) Imiyalo eqoshwe ematsheni amabili

[U-Eksodusi 20:2-17] “NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho owakukhipha ezweni laseGibithe, endlini yobugqila, ungabi nabanye onkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami ungazenzeli izithombe ezibaziweyo, nomfanekiso wokusezulwini phezulu, nowokusemhlabeni, nokuphansi komhlaba, nowokusemanzini. Ungaliphathi ngeze igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ngokuba uJehova akayikumyeka oliphatha ngeze igama lakhe, “Khumbula usuku lwesabatha, ulungcwelise...” , ukuze izinsuku zakho zibe zinde ezweni uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho akunika lona.” “Ungaphingi.” “Ungafakazi amanga ngomakhelwane wakho.” “Ungafisi indlu yomakhelwane wakho; ungafisi umfazi womakhelwane wakho, nenceku yakhe, nencekukazi yakhe, nenkabi yakhe, nembongolo yakhe, nanoma yini anayo.

(2) Ukulalela imiyalelo kuyophumela ezibusisweni

[Duteronomi 28:1-6] “Uma ulalela nokulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine, wenze yonke imiyalo yakhe engikuyala ngayo namuhla, uyakukumisa phezu kwazo zonke izizwe zomhlaba lalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, lezi zibusiso ziyakulandela, zize phezu kwakho: Uyakubusiswa emzini, ubusiswe esithelweni sesisu sakho, esithelweni somhlaba wakho, nasesithelweni sakho. uyakubusiswa ubhasikidi wakho, ubusiswe ekuphumeni kwakho, ubusiswe ekungeneni kwakho.

(3) Ukuphula imithetho nokuqalekiswa

Amavesi 15-19 “Uma ungalilaleli izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine yonke imiyalo yakhe nezimiso zakhe engikuyala ngakho namuhla, lezi ziqalekiso ezilandelayo ziyakulandela, zikwehlele: Uyoqalekiswa ezweni. kuyakuba-qalekisiwe endle, kuqalekiswe ubhasikidi wakho, nomcengezi wakho wokuxova isinkwa, uqalekisiwe; lokhu kusobala, ngokuba umbhalo uthi: “Olungileyo uyakuqalekiswa; "

(4) Umthetho uncike ekuziphatheni

[ Roma 2:12-13 ] Ngoba uNkulunkulu akabheki ubuso bamuntu. Noma ubani owona ngaphandle komthetho uyobhubha ngaphandle komthetho; (Ngokuba akusibo abezwa umthetho abalungileyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu, kodwa ngabenzi bomthetho.

KwabaseGalathiya 3 verse 12 Ngokuba umthetho wawungengokholo, kepha wathi: “Owenza lezizinto uyakuphila ngazo.”

( Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi umthetho wanikwa ngoMose, njengoba nje noJesu wakhuza amaJuda - Johane 7:19 UMose akaninikanga yini umthetho na? Kodwa akekho kini ogcina umthetho. AmaJuda anjengo “Pawuli” ayewugcina umthetho njengoba ayenjalo ngaphambili, uPawulu wayefundiswe ngokuqinile ngomthetho ngaphansi kukaGamaliyeli. Kungani uJesu athi akekho kubo ogcina umthetho? Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi bagcina umthetho, kodwa akekho owagcina umthetho. Yikho uJesu wasola amaJuda ngokungawugcini uMthetho kaMosi. UPawulu ngokwakhe wathi ngaphambili ukugcina umthetho kwakuzuzisa, kodwa njengoba eseyazi insindiso kaKristu, ukugcina umthetho kuyingozi. —Bheka eyabaseFilipi 3:6-8.

Ngemva kokuba uPawulu eqonde ukusindiswa komusa kaNkulunkulu ngoKristu, waphinde wakhuza amaJuda asokile ngokungawugcini umthetho ngisho nawo ngokwawo - Galathiya 6:13. Ingabe ukuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

Njengoba wonke umuntu emhlabeni ephule umthetho, ukwephula umthetho kuyisono, futhi wonke umuntu emhlabeni bonile futhi wasilela enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu. UNkulunkulu uyawuthanda umhlaba! Ngakho-ke, wathumela iNdodana Yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, ukuba ize phakathi kwethu izokwembula iqiniso. —Bheka amaRoma 10:4.

Uthando lukaKristu lugcwalisa umthetho → okungukuthi, luguqula ukugqilazwa komthetho kube umusa kaNkulunkulu nesiqalekiso somthetho sibe yisibusiso sikaNkulunkulu! Umusa kaNkulunkulu, iqiniso, nothando olukhulu lubonakaliswa ngozelwe yedwa uJesu ! Amen, ngakho, ingabe nonke niyaqonda ngokucacile?

kulungile! Yilapho engithanda ukuhlanganyela khona nani namuhla. Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumlelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele kungaba nani nonke! Amen

Hlala ubukele ngokuzayo:

2021.06.07

articles.title: Ubudlelwane phakathi koMthetho, Isono, Nokufa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kweyoku-1 Korinte 15:55-56 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba? Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho? Udosi lokufa yisono, namandla esono umthetho .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho, isono, nokufa 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela abasebenzi → ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, okuyivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde iBhayibheli. Qonda ukuthi “ukufa” kuvela esonweni, futhi “isono” sibangelwa izifiso ezimbi ezivela emthethweni osenyameni. Kungabonakala ukuthi uma ufuna ukuphunyuka "ekufeni" → kufanele ubalekele "esonweni" uma ufuna ukuphunyuka "esonweni" → kufanele ubalekele "emthethweni". Ngomzimba weNkosi uJesu Kristu nathi sifile kuwo umthetho → sakhululwa ekufeni, esonweni, emthethweni, nasesiqalekisweni somthetho . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseRoma 5:12, siliphendule futhi sifunde ndawonye:
Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile.

1. Ukufa

Umbuzo: Kungani abantu befa?
Impendulo: Abantu bafa ngenxa (yesono).
Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. Roma 6:23
→→Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa (u-Adamu), nokufa kwavela esonweni, kanjalo ukufa kwafika kubo bonke abantu ngoba bonke abantu bonile. Roma 5:12

2. Isono

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?
Impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho → kuyisono.
Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; 1 Johane 3:4

3. Umthetho

Umbuzo: Iyini imithetho?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) UMthetho Ka-Adamu

Kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa. ” Genesise 2:17
(Qaphela: U-Adamu waphula isivumelwano futhi wona - Hoseya 6:7 → "Isono" sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa (u-Adamu), futhi ukufa kwavela esonweni, ngakho ukufa kwehlela kubo bonke abantu ngenxa yokuthi bonke abantu bonile → Ukwephula umthetho Isono-ke bonke balahlwa futhi bafa ngaphansi komthetho ka-Adamu→bonke bafa ku-Adamu (bona 1 Korinte 15:22).

(2) UMthetho KaMose

Umbuzo: Uyini uMthetho KaMose?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

1 Imithetho Eyishumi—Bheka ku-Eksodusi 20:1-17
2 Izimiso, nemiyalo, nezahlulelo, nemithetho elotshwe encwadini yomthetho!
→→Ingqikithi: 613 izinto

[Imithetho Neziqondiso] UMose wabiza bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kubo: “O ma-Israyeli, lalelani izimiso nezahlulelo engininika zona namuhla, ukuze nizifunde futhi nizenze.”— Duteronomi 5:1
[Kulotshiwe eNcwadini yoMthetho] Wonke u-Israyeli weqile umthetho wakho, waphambuka, akalilalelanga izwi lakho; phezu kwethu, ngokuba sonile kuNkulunkulu. Daniyeli 9:11

4. Ubuhlobo phakathi komthetho, isono nokufa

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba?
Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho?
Udosi lokufa yisono, namandla esono umthetho. ( 1 Korinte 15:55-56 )

(Qaphela: Uma ufuna ukukhululeka "ekufeni" → → kufanele ukhululeke "esonweni"; uma ufuna ukukhululeka "esonweni" → → kufanele ukhululeke emandleni nesiqalekiso "somthetho")

Umbuzo: Ungabalekela kanjani umthetho nesiqalekiso?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

→→... ngomzimba kaKristu nathi safa kuwo umthetho... Kepha njengoba safa kuwo umthetho osibophayo, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni... Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:4, 6 no-Gal. 3:13

Umbuzo: Ungasibalekela kanjani isono?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

→→UJehova ubeke phezu Kwakhe (uJesu) isono sabo bonke abantu—Bheka ku-Isaya 53:6
→→ (UJesu) Ngoba njengoba oyedwa wafela bonke, bonke bafa - bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:14
→→Ngoba abafileyo bakhululiwe esonweni—Bheka Roma 6:7 →Ngokuba nafa—Bheka eyabaseKolose 3:3
→→Wonke umuntu uyafa, futhi wonke umuntu ukhululiwe esonweni. Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Umbuzo: Ungakubalekela kanjani ukufa?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Kholwa kuJesu

“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade ... okholwayo eNdodaneni unokuphila okuphakade; ukuphila okuphakade (umbhalo wokuqala usho ukuthi ngeke akubone ukuphila okuphakade) , ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luhlezi phezu kwakhe.”

(2) Kholwa evangelini→insindiso kaJesu Kristu

→→(UJesu) wathi: “Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele, nikholwe yivangeli!”

→→Niyakusindiswa ngalelivangeli, uma ningakholwa ngeze kepha nibambelela entweni enginishumayeza yona. Engakunikeza futhi kini kwakuyilokhu: Okokuqala, ukuthi uKristu wafela izono zethu njengokwemiBhalo, ukuthi wangcwatshwa, nokuthi wavuswa ngosuku lwesithathu ngokwemiBhalo, 1 Korinte 15:2-4

→→Anginamahloni ngevangeli, ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu kube yinsindiso kubo bonke abakholwayo, kumJuda kuqala, nakumGreki futhi. Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwembulwe kuleli vangeli; Njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseRoma 1:16-17

(3)Kufanele uzalwe kabusha

UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, okuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya. . Ngithi, ‘Nimelwe ukuzalwa ngokusha.’ Ungamangali
Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Ngokomusa wakhe omkhulu usinike ukuphila okusha ethembeni eliphilayo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo, 1 Petru 1:3

(4) Loba ngubani ophila akholwe kuye kasoze afa laphakade

UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila. Lowo okholwa yimi uyakuphila, noma efa; futhi lowo ophilayo ekholwa yimi kasoze afa naphakade. Uyakukholwa lokhu na?
(Ngiyazibuza ukuthi niyaqonda yini: Isho ukuthini iNkosi uJesu ngala mazwi? Uma kungenjalo, kufanele nithobeke futhi nilalele kakhulu ivangeli leqiniso elishunyayelwa izisebenzi zikaNkulunkulu.)
4. Imiyalo yakhe ayinzima ukuyigcina

Sithanda uNkulunkulu ngokugcina imiyalo Yakhe, futhi imiyalo Yakhe ayiwona umthwalo. 1 Johane 5:3

Umbuzo: Ingabe uMthetho KaMose → kunzima ukuwugcina?
Impendulo: Kunzima ukuvikela.

Umbuzo: Kungani kunzima ukuvikela?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

→→Ngoba noma ubani ogcina umthetho wonke kodwa akhubeke kokukodwa unecala kuwo wonke. Jakobe 2:10

→→Wonke umuntu ogcina umthetho njengesisekelo sakhe ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso; umthetho (okungukuthi, ngokugcina umthetho), ngoba iBhayibheli lithi: “Olungileyo uyakuphila ngokukholwa.” KwabaseGalathiya 3:10-11.

Umbuzo: Ungawugcina kanjani umthetho?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

(1) Uthando lukaJesu lugcwalisa umthetho

“Ningacabangi ukuthi ngize ukuchitha uMthetho noma abaProfethi. Angizanga ukuchitha uMthetho, kodwa ukuwugcwalisa. kudlule eMthethweni Konke kuzogcwaliseka Mathewu 5:17-18.

Umbuzo: UJesu wawugcwalisa kanjani umthetho?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

→→...INKOSI ubeke phezu (kuJesu) isono sethu sonke—Isaya 53:6

→→ Ngoba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela;

→→... ngomzimba kaKristu nathi safa kuwo umthetho... Kepha njengoba safa kuwo umthetho osibophayo, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni... Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:4, 6 no-Gal. 3:13

→→Ningakweleti muntu lutho, kuphela elokuthandana, ngokuba othanda umakhelwane wakhe uwugcwalisile umthetho. Ngokwesibonelo, imiyalo enjengokuthi “Ungafebi, Ungabulali, Ungebi, Ungafisi” neminye imiyalo esongwe kulo musho othi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena”. Uthando alwenzi okubi kwabanye, ngakho uthando lugcwalisa umthetho. KwabaseRoma 13:8-10

(2) Kumele azalwe kabusha

1 Uzelwe ngamanzi nangoMoya—Johane 3:6-7

2 Izwi leqiniso liyazala—1 Korinte 4:15, Jakobe 1:18

3 Bazalwa nguNkulunkulu—Johane 1:12-13

Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; 1 Johane 3:9

(3) Phila kuKristu

Manje akukho ukulahlwa kwabakuKristu Jesu. Ngokuba umthetho kaMoya wokuphila kuKristu Jesu ungikhululile emthethweni wesono nokufa. KwabaseRoma 8:1-2
Lowo ohlala kuye akoni; 1 Johane 3:6

(4)Imithetho yakhe ayinzima ukuyigcina

Umbuzo: Kungani imiyalo ingenzima ukuyigcina?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

→→ Ngoba (umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha) uhlala kuKristu--Bheka kwabaseRoma 8:1
→→ (Ukuzalwa kabusha komuntu omusha) Kufihliwe kuNkulunkulu--Bheka kwabaseKolose 3:3
→→ UKristu uyavela (Umuntu omusha) uyavela - bheka kwabaseKolose 3:4
→ UJesu wagcwalisa umthetho → okungukuthi, (umuntu omusha) wagcwalisa umthetho;
→→ UJesu wavuka kwabafileyo → (umuntu omusha) wavuka naye;
→→ UJesu wakunqoba ukufa→okungukuthi, (umuntu omusha) wanqoba ukufa;
→→ UJesu akanasono futhi akanakona → okungukuthi, (umuntu omusha) akanasono;
→→ UJesu uyiNkosi Engcwele → Abantwana bakaNkulunkulu nabo bangcwele!

Thina (umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha) singamalungu omzimba wakhe, afihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu! "ITestamente Elisha" Umthetho ubekwe kumuntu omusha - Hebheru 10:16 → Isifinyezo somthetho singuKristu - Roma 10:4 → UKristu unguNkulunkulu → UNkulunkulu uluthando - 1 Johane 4:16 (Umuntu omusha ozelwe kabusha ) ukhululiwe emthethweni “isithunzi” somthetho - KumaHeberu 10:1 → Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa - KwabaseRoma 4:15. Umuntu (omusha) uhlala emfanekisweni kaKristu weqiniso, ufihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu, futhi uhlala othandweni lukaNkulunkulu (umuntu omusha) uvela kuphela lapho uKristu ebonakala. Ngakho-ke, (umuntu omusha) akaphulanga nowodwa umthetho futhi uye wagcina yonke imithetho futhi akazange aphule noma yimuphi umthetho futhi one. Amen!

→→Ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni, ngokuba izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlezi kuye; futhi angoni, ngokuba uzelwe nguNkulunkulu. 1 Johane 3:9 (Angaphezu kuka-90% amakholwa ayahluleka ukuphumelela kulolu vivinyo futhi awele esimweni sokholo nezimfundiso) - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:17-23

Angazi, uyaqonda?

Yilowo nalowo olizwayo izwi lombuso wezulu, engaliqondi, omubi uyeza, akususe okuhlwanyelwe enhliziyweni yakhe; . Mathewu 13:19

Ngakho uJohane wathi → Siyamthanda uNkulunkulu uma sigcina imiyalo yaKhe (okuwuthando), nemiyalo yaKhe ayinzima. Ngokuba wonke ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uyalinqoba izwe, nokukholwa kwethu okusenza sinqobe izwe. Ngubani onqoba izwe na? Akuyena yini okholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu? 1 Johane 5:3-5

Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Okulotshiweyo kweVangeli:
Izisebenzi zikaJesu Kristu uMfowethu Wang*Yun, uDadewethu uLiu, uDadewethu uZheng, uMfowethu Cen... kanye nabanye ozakwethu bayasekela, baxhase ngezimali futhi basebenze ndawonye emsebenzini wevangeli likaKristu, futhi basebenze nalabo abakholelwa kuleli vangeli futhi bashumayele ivangeli! le ndlela yeqiniso, amagama abo alotshiwe encwadini yokuphila
Bheka eyabaseFilipi 4:1-3

Bafowethu nodadewethu Khumbulani ukuqoqa

---2020-07-17---

articles.title: Incazelo yemibuzo enzima: Owesifazane oqotho
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen

Masivule iBhayibheli [IzAga 31:10] futhi sifunde ndawonye: Ubani ongathola owesifazane oqotho? Uligugu elidlula kakhulu amaparele.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " owesifazane oqotho 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen, sibonge uJehova!

owesifazane oqotho IBandla eNkosini uJesu Kristu lithumela izisebenzi - ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe nelikhulunywayo ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu! Sinikeze ukudla okungokomoya kwasezulwini ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu kucebe kakhudlwana. Amen!

Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi elithi "owesifazane olungileyo" libhekisela esontweni eNkosini uJesu Kristu → Ubani ongayithola? Uligugu elidlula kakhulu amaparele . Amen!

Lemikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukunxusa, ukubonga, nezibusiso kwenziwa egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu! Amen

【1】Ngomfazi Omuhle

-----Owesifazane oqotho-----

Ngahlola iBhayibheli [ IzAga 31:10-15 ], ngalivula ndawonye ngafunda: Ubani ongathola owesifazane oqotho? Uligugu elidlula kakhulu amaparele . Umyeni wakhe ngeke aswele lutho uma inhliziyo yakhe ithembele kuye; Wafuna i-cashmere nelineni futhi wayezimisele ukusebenza ngezandla zakhe. Ufana nomkhumbi wabahwebi oletha ukudla uvela kude, uyavuka ekuseni, abele abantu bendlu yakhe, abele izincekukazi zakhe umsebenzi.

(1) Owesifazane

[ Genesise 2:22-24 ] Ngakho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakha owesifazane ngobambo ayeluthathile kumuntu, wamyisa kumuntu. Yathi indoda: "Lo uyithambo lamathambo ami nenyama yenyama yami. Ungambiza ngokuthi ngowesifazane, ngokuba uthathwe endodeni." .

( 2 ) inzalo yowesifazane -- Genesise 3:15 noMathewu 1:23 : “Intombi emsulwa iyokhulelwa izale indodana, futhi bayoyiqamba ngokuthi u-Emanuweli (u-Emanuweli lihunyushwa ngokuthi “uNkulunkulu noNkulunkulu.”) Sikule ndawo ndawonye .")

( 3 ) Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe Efesu 1:23 Ibandla liwumzimba wakhe, ogcwaliswe nguye ogcwalisa konke kukho konke. Isahluko 5 Amavesi 28-32 Kanjalo, amadoda kumelwe athande omkawo njengoba ethanda imizimba yawo siqu. Akekho owake wazonda owakhe umzimba, kodwa kunalokho uyawondla futhi awuphathe ngesisa, njengoba nje noKristu enza ebandleni, ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imibhalo yenezela: Inyama namathambo akhe). Ngenxa yalokhu indoda iyakushiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayakuba nyamanye. Le yimfihlakalo enkulu, kepha ngikhuluma ngoKristu nebandla.

( Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi u-Adamu uwumfanekiso futhi uJesu Kristu ungumfanekiso weqiniso; owesifazane "U-Eva ukhona lifanekisela ibandla , ibandla liyithambo lamathambo nenyama yenyama kaKristu. UJesu wazalwa yintombi uMariya, uyinzalo yowesifazane, thina sizelwe nguNkulunkulu - kuKristu Jesu iNkosi Phila ngendlela yeqiniso Kithina, sidla futhi siphuze umzimba negazi likaKristu, sizuza umzimba nokuphila Kwakhe singamalungu aKhe - ithambo lethambo nenyama yenyama! Ngakho-ke, nathi siyinzalo yabesifazane; Ngiyabonga Nkosi! )

【2】Ubani ongathola owesifazane oqotho?

--------------

Ngalihlola iBhayibheli [IzAga 31:10-29]
10 Ubani ongathola owesifazane oqotho? Uligugu elidlula kakhulu amaparele .

Qaphela: "Owesifazane oqotho ubhekisela ebandleni. Ibandla likamoya"

11 Umyeni wakhe ngeke aswele lutho uma inhliziyo yakhe ithembele kuye
12 Akenzanga lutho olubi kumyeni wakhe.
13 Ubheka ikheshi nefilakisi, asebenze ngezandla zakhe ngokuzithandela.
14 Unjengomkhumbi wabathengisi oletha amabele kude;
15 Uvuka kusempondo zankomo, abele abantu bendlu yakhe, abele izincekukazi zakhe umsebenzi.

Qaphela: "yena" kubhekise ku ibandla Ukudla okungokomoya kuhanjiswa kusuka “kude” kuya esibhakabhakeni Ngaphambi kokuntwela kokusa, ibandla lilungiselela ukudla okuvela ezulwini kusenesikhathi, linikeze ukudla “imana lokuphila,” okungukuthi, ukudla okungokomoya, kubazalwane nodade ngokokwabiwa kokudla. , futhi yabela umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe “kuzincekukazi” ezibhekisela kulabo abathunywe uNkulunkulu izinceku noma izisebenzi ezishumayela izwi leqiniso levangeli! Uyakuqonda lokhu?

16 Lapho efisa insimu, wayithenga ngenzuzo yezandla zakhe, watshala isivini.
Qaphela: "inkambu" ibhekise ku umhlaba , bonke bahlengwa nguye, futhi watshala isivini, “Umuthi Wokuphila Ensimini yase-Edene” nomsebenzi wezandla zakhe.

17 Ngamandla akhe ( Amandla Omoya Ongcwele ) bopha ukhalo lwakho ukuze izingalo zakho ziqine.
18 Uthi umsebenzi wakhe unenzuzo; isibani sakhe asicimi ebusuku.
19 Uphethe induku esandleni sakhe, nesondo lokuphotha esandleni sakhe.
20 Uyasivulela isandla sakhe ompofu, welulele abampofu isandla sakhe. Qaphela: Izisebenzi zebandla zishumayela ivangeli kubantu abampofu, zibavumela ukuba bazuze ukuphila, abagcini nje ngokuzuza ukuphila, futhi bayadla futhi baphuze amanzi kamoya nokudla kukamoya ukuze babe nokuphila okuchichimayo. Amen!
21 Kazange akhathazeke ngomndeni wakhe ngenxa yeqhwa, ngoba wonke umndeni wawugqoke okubomvu. →Kuwuhlobo "lokwembatha ubuntu obusha nokwembatha uKristu".
Qaphela: Lapho kufika indlala nenkathazo ngosuku "lweqhwa", ibandla ngeke likhathazeke ngamalungu omndeni ngoba wonke anophawu lukaJesu kuwo. Amen
22 Wazenzela izembatho ezifekethisiweyo;
23 Umyeni wakhe wayehlezi esangweni lomuzi kanye namalunga ezwe, futhi yaziwa yibo bonke.
24 Wenza izingubo zelineni, wathengisa ngazo, wathengisa namabhande akhe kubathengisi.
25 Amandla nobukhosi yizingubo zakhe;
26 Uvula umlomo wakhe ngokuhlakanipha;
27 Uyaqaphela imisebenzi yasendlini futhi akadli ukudla okuyize. Abantwana bakhe bayasukuma bathi ubusisiwe;
28 Nendoda yakhe yamdumisa;
29 wathi: Baningi abantu besifazane abanekhono futhi abaqotho, kodwa uwena wedwa obadlula bonke. ! "

( Qaphela: 【Ngomfazi Omuhle】 owesifazane oqotho :umyeni" UKristu "Dumisa umkakho" ibandla "Ungumfazi oqotho,uvula umlomo ngokuhlakanipha,uyamamatheka uma ecabanga ngekusasa,ngoba izingane zakhe zomoya ziyalizwa iqiniso zibuyele ekhaya.Njengoba uSara ehleka ezala u-Isaka! Akadli angenzi lutho." ukudla - futhi Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni ukondla umndeni wakhe nsuku zonke, futhi izingane zakhe "zikhomba" zisukuma zimbize ubusisiwe, Umyeni wakhe naye uyamncoma, ethi: "Baningi abesifazane abanamakhono futhi abalungile, kodwa wena yibo kuphela abadlula bonke!" “Amen. IsAmbulo 19 8-9 UKristu shada ［ ibandla ]Isikhathi sesifikile. Ngakho, ingabe nonke niyaqonda ngokucacile? Ngiyabonga Nkosi! Haleluya!

articles.title: IBhayibheli｜Isono sini? Isono esingasi ekufeni na?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 5 ivesi 17 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Konke ukungalungi kuyisono, futhi kukhona izono ezingaholeli ekufeni. .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Yisiphi isono esingasi ekufeni? 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” wathuma izisebenzi ngezandla zabo, ezilotshiwe futhi zashunyayelwa ngezwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yenu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi “isiphi isono” isono esingaholeli ekufeni? Ukuze ngokwethembela kuMoya oNgcwele, sibulale zonke izenzo ezimbi zomzimba, sigxile ekukholweni, sigxiliswe futhi sakhe kuJesu Kristu esikhundleni sokwakhelwa ku-Adamu. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umbuzo: Yibuphi ubugebengu? Kuyisono esingasi ekufeni na?

Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

【1】Izono ezingaphandle komthetho wesivumelwano phakathi kukaNkulunkulu nomuntu

Njengasezikhathini zasendulo lapho wawungekho umthetho womshado, kwakungesona isono ngomfowabo ukuba athathe udadewabo umfowethu ngamzali munye futhi kamuva waba umkami. Kukhona futhi imibhalo kuGenesise 38 mayelana noJuda noTamari, okungukuthi, isono sokuphinga nokulala phakathi kukayisezala noTamari.

KuJohane 2, kukhona nesifebe sezizwe okuthiwa uRahabi, naye owenza isono sokuqamba amanga, kodwa abeZizwe bengenawo uMthetho kaMose, ngakho kwakungabhekwa njengesono. Lezi yizono ezingaphandle kwesivumelwano somthetho, ngakho azithathwa njengezono. Ngoba umthetho ubangela ulaka (noma ukuhunyushwa: kubangela abantu ukuba bajeziswe) “lapho kungekho mthetho,” akukho ukweqa; —Bheka amaRoma 4:15. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

[2] Izono ezenziwa yinyama

Masifunde kwabaseRoma 8:9 eBhayibhelini futhi sikufunde ndawonye: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehlala kini, aniseyinyama, kodwa ningokaMoya. Uma umuntu engenaye uMoya kaKristu, lowo akasiye okaKristu.

Qaphela: Uma uMoya kaNkulunkulu, okungukuthi, uMoya oNgcwele “uhlala” ezinhliziyweni zenu, aniyena owenyama → okungukuthi, “niyezwa” futhi niqonde indlela yeqiniso futhi nikholwe ivangeli likaKristu → ebhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele → okungukuthi, "umuntu omusha" ophinde azalwe futhi asindisiwe akayena Owomzimba "omdala". Nampa abantu ababili → omunye uzalwa ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu; Iziphambeko ezibonakalayo “zomuntu omdala” enyameni ngeke zibalelwe “kumuntu omusha” ofihlwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu. Njengoba iNkosi isho: “Ningababambi iziphambeko zomuntu wabo omdala “kumuntu omusha.” Amen - bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:19. Ingabe uyakuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?

Umpostoli uPawuli wakhuza ibandla laseKorinte wathi: “Kuzwakele ukuthi ubufebe bukhona phakathi kwenu. ukuphinga uyojeziswa Mxosheni onjalo phakathi kwenu nimnike uSathane ukuba "onakalise inyama yakhe" ukuze umphefumulo wakhe usindiswe ngosuku lweNkosi uJesu - ngoba umuntu onjalo uma uphila ngokuvumelana “umuntu omdala” futhi ufuna ukubhidliza ithempeli likaNkulunkulu, uJehova uyomjezisa futhi achithe umzimba wakhe ukuze umphefumulo wakhe usindiswe. izinkanuko ezimbi, izifiso ezimbi, nokuhaha (ukuhaha kuyafana nokukhonza izithombe). Ukuphila kukaJesu makubonakaliswe kithi

Uma umuntu ekuKristu, uyisidalwa esisha; …Kanjalo uNkulunkulu wayekuKristu ebuyisana naye izwe, engasibaleli iziphambeko zabo, esiphathisa leli zwi lokubuyisana. —Bheka eyesi-2 Korinte 5:17, 19.

KwabaseRoma 7:14-24 Njengoba nje umphostoli “uPawulu” wazalwa kabusha futhi inyama yayilwa nomoya, ngakho ngiyazi ukuthi akukho okuhle kimi, okungukuthi, enyameni yami. Ngoba kukimi ukuthi nginqume ukwenza okuhle, kodwa akukhona kimi ukukwenza. Ngakho-ke okuhle engikuthandayo, angikwenzi; Uma ngenza into engingayifuni, akumina engikwenzayo, kodwa yisono esihlala kimi. Inyama yomuntu endala yabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi yafa kanye noKristu akuseyimi ophilayo, kodwa uKristu ophilayo ngenxa yami. Njengoba umphostoli “uPawulu” asho! Ngizibona ngifile “esonweni” futhi ngifile emthethweni ngenxa “yomthetho” - bheka kwabaseRoma 6:6-11 kanye noGal 2:19-20. Lichaza ukuthi “umuntu omusha” ngemva kokuzalwa kabusha nokusindiswa akayena owezono zenyama “yomuntu omdala”. Ithi iNkosi! Ungabe usakhumbula, futhi ungababaleli "umuntu omusha" izono zenyama yomuntu omdala. Amen! Wabe esethi: “Angisayikuzikhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki ukuba kuhlatshelwe “isono” imihlatshelo. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? —Funda amaHebheru 10:17-18

(Isixwayiso: INkosi uDavide nayo yaphinga nokubulala enyameni, futhi inhlekelele yenkemba yehlela emndenini wayo enyameni. Wathi encwadini yeHubo labo ababalwa nguNkulunkulu “ngaphandle kwemisebenzi” babusisiwe. “Ukulunga” kukaNkulunkulu Okwambulwa “ngaphandle komthetho” - bheka kwabaseRoma 3:21 Ngokufanayo, “inkosi uSawulu noJudasi imbuka” bazisola ngezenzo zabo futhi bavuma izono zabo ngoba “babengakholwa” futhi abazange bamise imithetho [yokholo]. ]. UNkulunkulu akazithethelelanga izono zabo? (Bheka u-2 Thimothewu 1:4.)

【3】Isono esenziwe ngaphandle komthetho

1 Noma ubani owona ngaphandle komthetho, uyobhubha ngaphandle komthetho; — Roma 2:12 .

2 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa → ngoba umthetho uvusa ulaka (noma ukuhumusha: ukujezisa, futhi lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa); — Roma 4:15

3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile → Nokho, isono sathola ithuba lokusebenza kimi yonke inhlobo yokuhaha ngomyalo; — Roma 7:8

4 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono → Ngaphambi kokuba umthetho ube khona, isono sasikhona kakade ezweni; — Roma 5:13

( Roma 10:9-10 ) Abezizwe abanawo umthetho, bangalungisiswa futhi bathole ukuphila okuphakade ngokukholwa kuJesu Kristu kuphela, kodwa amaJuda anomthetho kaMose, kufanele aqale aphenduke ezonweni zawo futhi abhapathizwe emanzini .Kumelwe bakholelwe kuJesu futhi babhapathizwe ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuze basindiswe futhi babe nokuphila.

Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

KULUNGILE! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela ukuhlanganyela kwami nani nonke Kwangathi umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, uthando lukaNkulunkulu, nogqozi lukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

2021.06.05

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 5 ivesi 16 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Uma umuntu ebona umzalwane wakhe enza isono esingasi ekufeni, makamkhulekele, khona uNkulunkulu uyakumnika ukuphila; .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Siyini isono esiholela ekufeni? 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela izisebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kulethwa kusuka kude esibhakabhakeni futhi kunikezwa kuwe ngesikhathi esifanele, ukuze impilo yakho yokomoya ibe mnandi kakhulu! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qondani ukuthi siyini isono esiholela ekufeni? Masikholwe yivangeli futhi siqonde indlela yeqiniso, futhi sikhululwe esonweni esiholela ekufeni; ! Amen!

Umbuzo: Siyini isono esiholela ekufeni?
Impendulo: Ake sibheke eyoku-1 Johane 5:16 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Uma umuntu ebona umfowabo enza isono esingasi ekufeni, makamkhulekele, futhi uNkulunkulu uyomnika ukuphila; isono esiholela ekufeni, I Akushiwo ukuthi umuntu akathandazele lesi sono.

Umbuzo: Ziyini izono eziholela ekufeni?
Impendulo: Incazelo enemininingwane ngezansi

【1】Isono sika-Adamu sokwephula isivumelwano

UGenesise Chapter 2 verse 17 Kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.

KwabaseRoma 5:12, 14 Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, futhi ngesono ukufa kweza kubo bonke, ngoba bonke bonile. …Kodwa kusukela ku-Adamu kuye kuMose, ukufa kwabusa, ngisho nalabo abangonanga njengo-Adamu. U-Adamu wayengumfanekiso womuntu owayezofika.

1 Korinte 15:21-22 Ngokuba njengoba ukufa kweza ngomuntu oyedwa, kanjalo nokuvuka kwabafileyo kweza. Njengalokhu ku-Adamu bonke bayafa, ngokunjalo kuKristu bonke bayakuphiliswa.

KumaHeberu 9:27 Kumiselwe ukuba abantu bafe kanye, emva kwalokho kube ukwahlulelwa.

(Qaphela: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi “isono sika-Adamu sokwephula isivumelwano” siyisono esiholela ekufeni; uJesu Kristu, indodana kaNkulunkulu, uye wageza izono zabantu “ngegazi” lakhe siqu. [abakholelwayo] kuye ngeke balahlwe → Ukuphila okuphakade labo abangakholelwa kakade balahliwe - "igazi" likaJesu ligezile izono zabantu, futhi wena [abangakholwa] → uyolahlwa, futhi kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa; ngemva kokufa → "Ngokusho kwakho, ungaphansi komthetho "Uyokwahlulelwa ngalokho okwenzayo." Ingabe ukuqonda lokhu ngokucacile?)

【2】Isono esisekelwe ekusebenzeni komthetho

KwabaseGalathiya 3 Isahluko 10 Wonke umuntu ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso owenza imisebenzi yomthetho, ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Ongaqhubeki enza konke okulotshwe encwadini yomthetho ungaphansi kwesiqalekiso.

( Qaphela: Ngokufunda imibhalo engenhla, siloba ukuthi yilowo nalowo othatha umthetho njengobuntu bakhe, ozishaya isifuba ngokuthi ulungisisiwe ngokugcina izimiso zomthetho, onaka izimiso zomthetho njengophawu lokuzithoba, ogcina umthetho njengokuphila kwakhe, futhi "ohamba emthethweni" Labo abangaphili "ukulunga komthetho" bayoqalekiswa ngumthetho labo abangawunaki umusa kaNkulunkulu kanye nemivuzo umusa uqalekisiwe. Ngakho, uyaqonda?

Akukuhle njengesipho ukulahlwa ngenxa yesono somuntu oyedwa, kepha isipho silungisiswa ngezono eziningi. Uma ngesiphambeko somuntu oyedwa ukufa kwabusa ngalowo muntu, kakhulu kangakanani labo abamukele umusa omkhulu nesipho sokulunga bayobusa ekuphileni ngomuntu oyedwa, uJesu Kristu? …Umthetho wenezelwa ngaphandle, ukuze kwande ukweqa; Njengoba nje isono sabusa ekufeni, kanjalo umusa uyabusa ngokulunga kube ukuphila okuphakade ngoJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu. —Bheka kwabaseRoma 5 amavesi 16-17, 20-21. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

Njengoba umphostoli “uPawulu” asho! Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni owawusibopha, manje sesikhululekile emthethweni ...--Bheka KwabaseRoma 7:6.

Ngenxa yomthetho ngafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. —Qhathanisa neyabaseGalathiya 2:19. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? )

【3】Isono sokuqeda isivumelwano esisha esimiswe ngegazi likaJesu

KumaHeberu 9:15 Ngenxa yalokhu ungumlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha, ukuze ababiziweyo bamukele ifa eliphakade elathenjiswayo, behlawulelwa izono zesivumelwano sokuqala ngokufa. Amen!

(I) Wonke umuntu emhlabeni wenza ubugebengu kanye nokuphulwa kwenkontileka

Ngoba bonke bonile. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 3: 23 Ngakho-ke bonke baphulile isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu , kokubili abeZizwe nabaJuda basephulile isivumelwano futhi bonile. Roma 6:23 Inkokhelo yesono ingukufa. UJesu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, wafela izono zethu ukuze ahlawulele izono ezenziwa umuntu “esivumelwaneni esandulelayo”, okuyizono zika-Adamu esephula isivumelwano kanye nezono ezenziwa amaJuda ngokwephula “umthetho ka-Adamu. Mose". UJesu Kristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, wasikhulula emthethweni nasesiqalekisweni sawo - bheka Gal 3:13.

(II) Labo abangasigcini iSivumelwano esisha kodwa abagcina iSivumelwano Esidala

KumaHeberu 10:16-18 “Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke phakathi kwabo; ngeke besazikhumbula izono zabo neziphambeko zabo.” Njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki kube neminye imihlatshelo yezono. (Kodwa abantu bahlale behlubukile futhi benenkani, bezama njalo ukuthola izindlela zokukhumbula iziphambeko zenyama yabo. Abakukholwa lokho uJehova akushoyo! INkosi yathi abayikukhumbula iziphambeko zenyama. Iziphambeko zenyama. wabethelwa esiphambanweni kanye noKristu. Uyikhumbulani na? uyaqonda?

Gcina amazwi aphilileyo owawezwa kimi ngokukholwa nothando olukuKristu Jesu. Kufanele “ugcine” “indlela enhle” ophathiswe yona ngokwethembela kuMoya oNgcwele ohlala kithi. Izinga lamagama amsulwa → Nizwile izwi leqiniso, okuyizwi elihle, ivangeli lensindiso yenu! Thembela kuMoya oNgcwele futhi uwugcine uqinile; Uyaqonda? —Bheka eyesi-2 Thimothewu 1:13-14

(III) Labo ababuyayo ukugcina isivumelwano sabo sangaphambili

KwabaseGalathiya 3:2-3 Ngifuna ukunibuza lokhu kuphela: Namamukela uMoya oNgcwele ngemisebenzi yomthetho na? Ingabe kungenxa yokuzwa ivangeli? Njengoba naqalwa nguMoya oNgcwele, ingabe namanje nithembele enyameni ukuze nipheleliswe? Ingabe awunalwazi?
UKristu uyasikhulula. Ngakho yima uqine futhi ungazivumeli ukuba ubanjwe ijoka lobugqila. --Bheka ku-Plus isahluko 5, ivesi 1.

( Qaphela: UJesu Kristu wasihlenga esivumelwaneni esidala futhi wasikhulula ukuze simise isivumelwano esisha nathi. Uma sibuyela emuva ukuze sigcine imithetho “yesivumelwano sokuqala,” ingabe lokhu ngeke yini kusho ukuthi sesilahlile isivumelwano esisha iNdodana kaNkulunkulu esenze nathi ngegazi layo siqu? Ingabe awunalwazi? Kuphinde kube isingathekiso kithi bantu banamuhla, kulungile yini ukuthobela imithetho yoBukhosi Bama-Qing yasendulo, uBukhosi baseMing, uBukhosi bukaTang noma uBukhosi bukaHan? Uma ugcina imithetho yakudala ngale ndlela, awazi yini ukuthi wephula imithetho yamanje?

Gal 6:7 Ningakhohliswa, uNkulunkulu akayikuhlekwa. Noma yini umuntu ayihlwanyelayo, uyovuna yona futhi. Ungaphinde ubanjwe yijoka lezigqila zesono. Uyaqonda? )

【4】Isono sokungakholwa kuJesu

NgokukaJohane 3:16-19 UNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. Ngoba uNkulunkulu wathumela iNdodana Yakhe emhlabeni, ingasi ukuba yahlulele umhlaba (noma ihunyushwe ngokuthi: ukwahlulela izwe; yona ngezansi), kodwa ukuze izwe lisindiswe ngaye. Okholwa yiyo akalahlwa, kepha ongakholwayo uselahliwe, ngokuba engakholwanga egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa. Ukukhanya kufikile emhlabeni, futhi abantu bathanda ubumnyama esikhundleni sokukhanya, ngoba imisebenzi yabo mibi.

( Qaphela: Igama leNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezelwe yodwa nguJesu. Uyozala indodana, futhi kumelwe uyiqambe ngokuthi uJesu, ngoba iyona ezosindisa abantu bayo ezonweni zabo. NguJesu Kristu ozohlenga labo abangaphansi komthetho, asisindise ezonweni zendoda endala u-Adamu ephula isivumelwano, futhi asenze sikwazi ukuthola ubudodana bukaNkulunkulu! Amen. Labo abakholwa Kuye ngeke balahlwe → futhi bathole ukuphila okuphakade! ;Labo abangakholwa sebevele balahliwe. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? )
