articles.title: Isono ｜Ukudalwa kuka-Adamu nokuwela ensimini yase-Edene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Sivula iBhayibheli kuGenesise Isahluko 3 17, futhi ivesi 19 lithi ku-Adamu: “ Ngokuba ulalele umkakho, wadla kuwo umuthi engakuyala ngawo ukuba ungadli kuwo, uqalekisiwe umhlabathi ngenxa yakho; ...ngesithukuthuku sobuso bakho uyakudla isinkwa sakho, uze ubuyele emhlabathini owazalwa kuwo. Uluthuli, futhi uyobuyela othulini. "

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Ukudalwa kuka-Adamu nokuwa ensimini yase-Edene 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” uthumela izisebenzi – ngezwi leqiniso, elilotshiwe futhi lakhulunywa ezandleni zabo, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Siyaqonda ukuthi u-Adamu odaliwe “ubuthakathaka” futhi angawa kalula uNkulunkulu usitshela ukuthi singahlali ku-Adamu “odaliweyo” ukuze siphile kuJesu Kristu, ozelwe nguNkulunkulu. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Indalo U-Adamu wawela emhlabeni ensimini yase-Edene

(1) U-Adamu wadalwa ngothuli lomhlabathi

UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. —Bheka uGenesise 2:7
UNkulunkulu wathi: “Masenze abantu ngomfanekiso wethu, basifuze, babuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezinkomo ezisemhlabeni, nomhlaba wonke, naphezu kwawo wonke umhlaba. nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni.” UNkulunkulu wathi Wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, wabadala ngomfanekiso wakhe owesilisa nowesifazane. UNkulunkulu wababusisa, wathi kubo: “Zalani, nande, nigcwalise umhlaba, niwunqobe, nibuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezinyoni zezulu, nezilwanyana zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni. .”—Isikhombo sikaGenesise Isahluko 1 amavesi 26-28

(2) U-Adamu wadalwa ngothuli futhi wawa

IBhayibheli futhi liloba lokhu: “Umuntu wokuqala, u-Adamu, waba umuntu ophilayo onomoya (umoya: noma uhunyushwa njengenyama)”; —Bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:45

UJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayigcine. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa.”— Genesise 2 15 - Isigaba 17.

Inyoka yayinobuqili kunazo zonke izilwane zasendle abezenzile uJehova uNkulunkulu. Inyoka yathi kowesifazane, “Ingabe uNkulunkulu ushilo ngempela ukuthi anivunyelwe ukudla emithini yasensimini na?”...Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: “Aniyikufa nokufa, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyazi ukuthi ensimini ngosuku eniyodla ngalo kuwo amehlo enu ayovuleka njengoba nje uNkulunkulu azi okuhle nokubi.”— Genesise 3:1, 4-5 .

Kwathi owesifazane ebona ukuthi isithelo salowo muthi sasilungele ukudliwa, futhi siyabukeka, nokuthi sihlakaniphisa abantu, wathatha esithelweni saso wadla, wanika umyeni wakhe, naye wadla. —Genesise 3:6

(3) U-Adamu weqa umthetho futhi waqalekiswa ngumthetho

UJehova uNkulunkulu wathi enyokeni: “Ngokuba ukwenzile lokhu, uqalekisiwe ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinkomo nezilo zasendle; uyakuhamba ngesisu sakho, udle uthuli izinsuku zonke zokuhamba kwakho
Wathi kowesifazane: “Ngiyakwandisa iminjunju yakho ekukhulelweni kwakho;
Wathi ku-Adamu: “Ngokuba ulalele umkakho, wadla kuwo umuthi engakuyala ngawo ukuba ungadli kuwo, umhlabathi uqalekisiwe ngenxa yakho; uyakusebenza izinsuku zonke zokuhamba kwakho ukuze uthole ukudla kuwo. "Kuyakukhulela ameva namakhakhasi, udle imifino yasendle, udle isinkwa sakho ngezithukuthuku zobuso bakho, uze ubuyele othulini, ngokuba wazalwa othulini, futhi uyakubuya. .”— Genesise 3:17-19

(4) Isono sangena emhlabeni kusukela ku-Adamu yedwa

Njengoba nje isono sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, nokufa kweza ngesono, kanjalo ukufa kweza kubo bonke ngoba bonke bonile. — Roma 5:12
Ngokuba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa, kepha isipho somusa sikaNkulunkulu singukuphila okuphakade kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu. — KwabaseRoma 6 Isahluko 23
Njengoba ukufa kweza ngomuntu oyedwa, kanjalo nokuvuka kwabafileyo kweza ngomuntu oyedwa. Njengalokhu ku-Adamu bonke bayafa, ngokunjalo kuKristu bonke bayakuphiliswa. — 1 Korinte 15:21-22
Ngokudalelwa, wonke umuntu umiselwe ukufa kanye, futhi ngemva kokufa kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa. — Hebheru 9:27

( Qaphela: Encwadini yokugcina, ngabelana nani ukuthi ensimini yase-Edene esibhakabhakeni, uLusifa, “iNkwekwezi Ekhanyayo, iNdodana yokusa” eyadalwa uNkulunkulu, wayezidla ngenhliziyo ngenxa yobuhle bakhe, futhi wonakalisa ukuhlakanipha kwakhe ngenxa yokuhlakanipha kwakhe. ubuhle bakhe, futhi wadlwengulwa ngenxa yokuhweba kwakhe okweqile ngenkanuko. Ngenxa yobubi bakhe, ukuhaha, inzondo, umhawu, ukubulala, inkohliso, inzondo ngoNkulunkulu, ukwephulwa kwezivumelwano, njll., inhliziyo yakhe enamahloni yashintsha isimo sayo yaba udrako omkhulu obomvu oyihlazo kanye nenyoka yasendulo enamazinyo nezinzipho eziklewulayo. Iklanyelwe ukukhohlisa abantu ukuba baphule izivumelwano futhi bone, ibenze baqhele kuNkulunkulu Ensimini yase-Edene emhlabeni, u-Adamu no-Eva, ababedalwe ngothuli, balingwa “yinyoka” ngenxa yobuthakathaka babo. ngakho “basephula isivumelwano” futhi bona futhi bawa.

Kodwa uNkulunkulu usithanda sonke futhi wasinika iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, uJesu, njengoJohane 3:16, “Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangangokuba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa, ukuze yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. ” INkosi uJesu uqobo yathi futhi, kufanele nizalwe ngokusha, nizalwe ngoMoya oNgcwele, nizelwe uNkulunkulu, njengabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, ukuze ningoni - bhekisa kuJohane 1:3:9 ngoba izwi likaNkulunkulu liyizwi likaNkulunkulu. (umbhalo wokuqala uyimbewu) uhlala kuye futhi Angeke senze isono ngoba uzelwe nguNkulunkulu.

U-Adamu, owadalwa ngothuli, wayezophula kalula umthetho futhi enze isono futhi awe ngenxa yenyama yakhe ebuthakathaka kuphela abangeke bawe, ngoba bangamadodana kaNkulunkulu ahlala ekhaya kuze kube phakade awukwazi ukuhlala ekhaya unomphela. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? )

2021.06.03

articles.title: Isono｜Inkanyezi ekhanyayo edaliwe yawa ezulwini eNsimini yase-Edene
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli ku-Isaya isahluko 14 ivesi 12 futhi sifunde ndawonye: “Wena nkanyezi ekhanyayo, ndodana yokusa, uweleni ezulwini, wena mnqobi wezizwe?

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Inkanyezi ekhanyayo yendalo yawa ezulwini eNsimini yase-Edene 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela izisebenzi - ngezwi leqiniso elilotshwe ezandleni zabo futhi elikhulunywa yibo, ivangeli lensindiso yethu. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke ikhanyisela amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso angokomoya → Qonda ukuthi "inkanyezi ekhanyayo yadalwa, iNdodana yokusa" nomsila wayo udonsa umuntu. -Okwesithathu kwezinkanyezi esibhakabhakeni , yawa e-Edene esibhakabhakeni futhi yaphonswa emhlabeni, yaba udrako, inyoka endala, uSathane, uSathane, ingelosi ewile engumoya omubi owenza okubi. Cela iNkosi uJesu ukuthi igqokele abantwana bayo izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, bopha izinkalo zakho ngeqiniso, ufake isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga, ugqoke izicathulo zakho ngevangeli, uphathe isihlangu sokukholwa, ufake isigqoko sokuzivikela. insindiso, thatha inkemba kaMoya oNgcwele, okuyiZwi likaNkulunkulu! Ngokuthandaza nokucela ngaso sonke isikhathi, unganqoba futhi umelane namaqhinga kadeveli. Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Kwadalwa inkanyezi ekhanyayo

(1) Inkanyezi ekhanyayo yendalo-lucifer

Masifunde u-Isaya isahluko 14 ivesi 12 eBhayibhelini futhi silifunde ndawonye: “Uweleni ezulwini, nkanyezi ekhanyayo, ndodana yokusa? Kanjani wena mnqobi wezizwe ugawulwe phansi? Hezekeli 28:11-15 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi: “Ndodana yomuntu, khalela inkosi yaseTire, uthi: Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Uhlomele konke, uhlakaniphile, uhlakaniphile. insimu yase-Edene ihlotshiswe ngamatshe ayigugu... kanye nawe kukhona izigubhu ezinhle nemitshingo ezalungiselelwa ngosuku lokudalwa kwakho uhlezi entabeni engcwele kaNkulunkulu;

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi “iNkwekwezi Ekhanyayo-Indodana Yasekuseni” edaliwe isilungiselwe konke, igcwele ukuhlakanipha, futhi inhle ngokuphelele Uyingelosi eyinhloko yokudumisa, futhi yalungiselelwa ngokugcwele nguNkulunkulu ngosuku lwe indalo. Kwakungamakherubi agcotshiwe ayesibekela umphongolo wesivumelwano, uNkulunkulu awubeka entabeni engcwele kaNkulunkulu, ensimini yase-Edene yasezulwini. Ungahamba phakathi "kwamagugu" akhanya njengomlilo, futhi kamuva uzokwazi ukubona ukungabi nabulungisa. " okungalungile "→ Konke ukungalungi kuyisono .. --Bheka uJohane 1:17 namaRoma 1:29-31 . Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(2) Inkanyezi ekhanyayo yendalo yawa

U-Isaya 14:13-15 Wathi enhliziyweni yakho: ‘Ngiyakukhuphukela ezulwini, ngiphakamise isihlalo sami sobukhosi phezu kwezinkanyezi zikaNkulunkulu; ngiyakukhuphukela ezindaweni eziphakeme zamafu; ’ Nokho, uzowela eHayidesi nasekujuleni komgodi. —Isaya 14:13-15

(Qaphela: Uma uthi "ngiyafuna" enhliziyweni yakho, lokhu kungukuqala kokuwa, njengengelosi enkulu eyayikhonzwa futhi idunyiswa ngokuthi "Inkanyezi Ekhanyayo - INdodana Yokusa", ngenxa yokuzikhukhumeza enhliziyweni yayo. , wathi "ngifuna" izikhathi eziyisi-5 zilandelana, futhi ngenxa yobuningi bezentengiselwano, wagcwala ubudlova futhi wona owasibekela umphongolo wesivumelwano ngiyakukuchitha ngenxa yobuhle bakho, nangenxa yodumo lwakho wonakalise ukuhlakanipha kwakho, ukuze akubone, angcolise indawo yakho ngenxa yobuningi bamatshe. izono zakho nokungalungi kokuhweba kwakho ngiyakukwenza uphume phakathi kwakho, ukuqede, ube ngumlotha emhlabeni emehlweni abo bonke abakubonayo; abakwaziyo abantu bayoshaywa luvalo futhi ngeke besaba khona emhlabeni kuze kube phakade.” Bheka uHezekeli 28:15-19 kanye nesAmbulo 20, 21 ukuze uthole ukwahlulela kokugcina.

(3) obizwa ngokuthi uyise kaSathane, uyise wezinkanuko, noyise wamanga

NgokukaJohane 8:44 Nina ningabakayihlo uSathane, nithanda ukwenza izinkanuko zikayihlo. Yena wayengumbulali wabantu kwasekuqaleni futhi akazange ahlale eqinisweni, ngoba iqiniso lalingekho kuye. Uqamba amanga ngokuthanda kwakhe, ngokuba ungumqambimanga noyise wamanga.

(Genesise 3:1-4) Inyoka yayinobuqili kunazo zonke izilwane zasendle uJehova uNkulunkulu ayezenzile. Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: "Ingabe uNkulunkulu ushilo ngempela ukuthi anivunyelwe ukudla emithini yasensimini?" phakathi nensimu." , UNkulunkulu wathi, 'Ningadli kuwo, futhi ningathinti, funa nife.'" Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: "Aniyikufa nokufa;

UGenesise 2:17 Kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa. "

(Qaphela: Inyoka yinyoka yakudala, ebizwa nangokuthi udrako, udeveli, noSathane - bhekisa kuSambulo 20:2, uBelzebule, inkosi yamademoni - bhekisa kuMathewu 12:24. Omubi, Umphikukristu, omkhulu isoni, umkhohlisi, "Inyoka" ineziqu eziningi ezifana nomlingi → U-Eva no-Adamu baphula umthetho futhi baba yisigqila sesono futhi baqalekiswa ngumthetho.

(4) Udeveli wenza amacala futhi wabulala abantu kusukela ekuqaleni

Lowo owonayo ungokaSathane, ngokuba uSathane wonile kwasekuqaleni... --Bheka eyoku-1 Johane 3:8

Nina ningabakayihlo uSathane, nithanda ukwenza izinkanuko zikayihlo. Yena wayengumbulali wabantu kwasekuqaleni futhi akazange ahlale eqinisweni, ngoba iqiniso lalingekho kuye. Uqamba amanga ngokuthanda kwakhe, ngokuba ungumqambimanga noyise wamanga. —Qhathanisa noJohane 8:44

Isela kalizi kuphela ukweba, ukubulala, lokubhubhisa; —Bheka uJohane 10:10

Nguye lo muntu owenza izwe libe yihlane, owisa imizi, angakhululi abathunjwa baye emakhaya abo? ’—Bheka u-Isaya 14, ivesi 17

Nokho, niyowela eHayidesi nasekujuleni komgodi. —Bheka eSahlukweni 14, ivesi 15 likaIsaya

(Qaphela: Ekwahlulelweni kokugcina, udeveli, uSathane, nezikhonzi zakhe baphonswa echibini lomlilo nesibabule basha. Bheka kuSambulo Isahluko 20)

articles.title: Siyini isono? Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kweyoku-1 Johane isahluko 3 ivesi 4 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Lowo oweqa umthetho uyisono; Futhi uphendukela kuJohane 8:34 UJesu waphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Wonke umuntu owona uyisigqila sesono.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " siyini isono 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela izisebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka “ezulwini” kude, futhi ukudla okungokomoya kunikezwa ngesikhathi, ukuze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe kakhudlwana! Amen. Thandaza ukuba iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya futhi siqonde ukuthi ziyini izono? Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Umbuzo: Siyini isono?

Impendulo: Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono.

Ake sifunde 1 Johane 3:4 eBhayibhelini futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Noma ubani owona oweqa umthetho futhi oweqa umthetho uyisono.

[Qaphela]: Ngokuhlola imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, siyini “isono”? Ukwephula umthetho kuyisono. Umthetho uhlanganisa: imiyalo, izimiso, iziqondiso, kanye nezinye izinhlinzeko zemithetho nemigomo ehlukahlukene "isivumelwano", lona umthetho. Uma wephula umthetho futhi weqa umthetho, kuyisono. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

(1) Umthetho ka-Adamu:

“Ungadli” kuwumyalo! Ensimini yase-Edene, "uNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nomuntu. Wenza umyalo nokhokho u-Adamu → uJehova uNkulunkulu wambeka umuntu ensimini yase-Edene ukuba ayilime futhi ayilondoloze. UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kepha ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngokuba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa Genesise 2 Isahluko 15 -17 amafindo.

Ukhokho wokuqala [u-Adamu] waphula umthetho wadla isithelo somuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi Lokhu njengoba nje “isono” sangena emhlabeni ngomuntu oyedwa, u-Adamu, nokufa kwavela esonweni, “ngoba inkokhelo yesono ingukufa” khona-ke ukufa kufika kuwo wonke umuntu ngoba wonke umuntu wonile ngaphandle komthetho isikhona kakade emhlabeni; kodwa ngaphandle komthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono, Ngamanye amazwi, uma ungekho umyalo ongokomthetho othi “ungadli”, ngeke kubhekwe njengokungathi ukhokho u-Adamu “wadla isinkwa. isithelo somuthi". Isono, ngoba u-Adamu akephulanga umthetho. Ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? Bheka kwabaseRoma 5:12-13 nakwabaseRoma 6:23.

(2) Ubudlelwano phakathi komthetho nesono:

1 Lapho kungekho mthetho, isono asithathwa njengesono-Bheka kwabaseRoma 5:13
2 Lapho kungekho mthetho, akukho ukweqa—Bheka kwabaseRoma 4:15
3 Ngaphandle komthetho, isono sifile—bheka amaRoma 7:8 . Lobu ubuhlobo phakathi komthetho nesono! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?
4 Kanye nomthetho - uma ona phansi komthetho, niyokwahlulelwa ngokomthetho - KwabaseRoma 2:12

[3 Owenyama uzala isono ngomthetho;

Ngoba lapho “sisenyameni,” izifiso ezimbi ezazalwa “ngomthetho” zaziyizinkanuko nezinkanuko zenyama, “Wozani, isono, lapho sesikhulile, siveza ukufa,” okungukuthi, “wozani; sithela isithelo saso sokufa. Bheka kwabaseRoma 7:5 noJakobe 1:15.

Njengoba umphostoli uPawulu asho: “Ngaphambi kokuba ngiphile ngaphandle komthetho, kodwa lapho kufika umyalo, isono sabuye saphila, futhi ngafa. wangiyenga ngomyalo, wangibulala; isono sikhonjiswa ukuthi siyisono ngolungileyo, futhi isono sibonakala sibi ngokwedlulele ngenxa yomthetho. Ngakho-ke [isono] sikhona ngenxa “yomthetho” “UPawuli” owazi kahle kakhulu umthetho wamaJuda “uPawuli” usiholela ekutholeni “isono” ngokusobala ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu “ubudlelwane nomthetho.” Ameni!

(4) Izindlela zokuxazulula isono: Manje njengoba umthombo “wesono” kanye “nomthetho” usutholakele, [isono] singaxazululeka kalula. Amen! Ake sibone ukuthi umphostoli uPawulu usifundisani

[Sikhululekile emthethweni] → 1 Kodwa njengoba safa emthethweni osibophayo, “umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafa ebunyeni neNkosi ngomzimba kaKristu,” manje sesikhululekile emthethweni.... .. KwabaseRoma 7:6 noGal. 2:19 Ngokuba ngomthetho ngafa kuwo umthetho.
[Ukhululiwe esonweni] → 2 Ngoba siyazi ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa kanye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono ubhujiswe, ukuze singabe sisakhonza isono; Amen! Bheka amaRoma 6:6-7. Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile?

articles.title: umthetho kaKristu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula makube kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli lethu kwabaseGalathiya isahluko 6 ivesi 2 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Thwalisanani imithwalo yenu, nizawugcwalisa kanjalo umthetho kaKristu.

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " umthetho kaKristu 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela izisebenzi - ababhala ngezandla zabo futhi bakhulume izwi, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi umthetho kaKristu "umthetho wothando, ukuthanda uNkulunkulu, ukuthanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda wena" ! Amen.

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【Umthetho kaKristu uluthando】

(1)Uthando lugcwalisa umthetho

Bazalwane, uma umuntu ehlelwa yisiphambeko, nina bomoya mbuyiseni ngobumnene; Thwalisanani imithwalo yenu, nizawugcwalisa kanjalo umthetho kaKristu. --Engeza isahluko 6 amavesi 1-2
NgokukaJohane 13:34 Ngininika umyalo omusha wokuba nithandane, njengalokho nginithandile, nani nithandane;
1 Johane 3:23 Umyalo kaNkulunkulu uwukuthi sikholwe egameni leNdodana yakhe, uJesu Kristu, futhi sithandane, njengoba nje asiyala. Isahluko 3 ivesi 11·Umthetho wokuqala wezwa.
Ngoba wonke umthetho ugoqelwe kulomusho othi: "Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena." --Engeza isahluko 5 ivesi 14
Ningabi nacala kumuntu, kuphela elokuthandana, ngokuba othanda umakhelwane wakhe uwugcwalisile umthetho. Ngokwesibonelo, imiyalo enjengokuthi “Ungafebi, Ungabulali, Ungebi, Ungafisi” neminye imiyalo esongwe kulo musho othi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena”. — Roma 13:8-9
Uthando luyabekezela, uthando alunamhawu; aluthokozi ngokungabi nabulungisa, kodwa luthanda iqiniso, lubekezelela izinto zonke, lukholwa yizinto zonke, luthemba izinto zonke, lubekezelela izinto zonke. Uthando alupheli. --1 Korinte 13:4-8-Indlela engcono kakhulu!

(2)Uthando lukaKristu lude, lubanzi, luphakeme futhi lujulile

Ngenxa yalokhu ngiyaguqa phambi kukaBaba (okuthiwa ngaye yonke imindeni esezulwini nesemhlabeni) ngimcele ngokwengcebo yenkazimulo yakhe ukuba aniphe ukuba niqiniswe ngamandla ngoMoya wakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu. , ukuze uKristu akhanye ngawe ukukholwa kwakhe kuhlale ezinhliziyweni zenu, ukuze nigxiliswe, nisekelwe othandweni, nibe namandla okuqonda kanye nabangcwele bonke ukuthi lungakanani, nobubanzi, nokuphakama, nokujula kothando lukaKristu, nokwazi ukuthi lolu thando ludlula ulwazi. UNkulunkulu unamandla okwenza okukhulu kakhulu kunakho konke esikucelayo nesikucabangayo ngokwamandla asebenza ngaphakathi kwethu. — Efesu 3:14-20

Kakusikho lokho kuphela, kodwa sithokoza lasezinsizini zethu, sazi ukuthi ukuhlupheka kuveza ukuqinisela, ukuqinisela kuveza isimilo, ukuziphatha kuveza ithemba, ithemba alidanisi, ngokuba uthando lukaNkulunkulu lutheliwe ezinhliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oNgcwele. uMoya oNgcwele esiwuphiwe. — Roma 5, isahluko 3-5,

1 Johane 3 11 Kufanele sithandane. Lona ngumyalo enawuzwa kwasekuqaleni.

Kepha isiphetho somyalo luthando; —1 Thimothewu 1 ivesi 5

[Ukubethelwa kukaKristu kukhombisa uthando olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu]

(1) Igazi lakhe eliyigugu lihlanza izinhliziyo zenu nazo zonke izono

Wangena kanye kuphela endaweni engcwele, kungengagazi lezimbuzi nelamathole, kodwa ngelakhe igazi, esezuze ukubuyisana okuphakade. Kakhulu kangakanani igazi likaKristu owazinikela kuNkulunkulu ngoMoya ophakade engenasici, liyakuhlambulula izinhliziyo zenu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo? —Hebheru 9:12, 14

Uma sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu esekukhanyeni, sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye, negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula kuso sonke isono. —1 Johane 1:7

Umusa nokuthula makube kuwe, uJesu Kristu, ufakazi othembekileyo, ongowokuqala ukuvuka kwabafileyo, inhloko yamakhosi omhlaba! Uyasithanda futhi usebenzisa igazi lakhe ukugeza (ukugeza) izono zethu - IsAmbulo 1:5

Babenjalo abanye kini, kodwa senagezwa, senangcweliswa, senalungisiswa egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu nangoMoya kaNkulunkulu wethu. — 1 Korinte 6:9-11

Ungukubengezela kwenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, ufana ngqo nobuyena bukaNkulunkulu, futhi usekela zonke izinto ngomyalo wamandla akhe. Ngemva kokuba esehlambulule abantu ezonweni zabo, wahlala phansi ngakwesokunene soMkhulu ezulwini. — Hebheru 1:3

Uma kungenjalo, ingabe imihlatshelo yayingeke ime kudala? Ngoba onembeza babakhulekeli sebehlanziwe futhi abasazizwa benecala. — Hebheru 10:2

(Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakho nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuba kuqedwe isiphambeko, kuqedwe isono, kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngobubi, kungeniswe ukulunga okuphakade, banamathelise umbono nesiprofetho, agcobe oNgcwele. ( Daniyeli 9:24 )

(2) Wasebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze abhubhise ubutha - imithetho ebhalwe emthethweni
Kuhlanganisa nomthetho ka-Adamu, nomthetho kanembeza, nomthetho kaMose, yonke imithetho eyayisilahla yabhidlizwa, yasulwa, yasuswa, yaqedwa, futhi yabethelwa esiphambanweni.

【1】 ukubhidliza
Nina enanikade nikude manje senisondezwe kuKristu Jesu ngegazi lakhe. Ngokuba ungukuthula kwethu, owenza okubili kube-munye, ubhidlizile ugange oluhlukanisayo;
【2】 Susa inzondo
Futhi wasebenzisa owakhe umzimba ukuze abhubhise ubutha, okuyisimiso esilotshwe emthethweni, ukuze bobabili benziwe umuntu munye omusha ngaye ngokwakhe, kanjalo kuzuze ukuthula. — Efesu 2:15
【3】 gcoba
【4】 susa
【5】 ebethelwe esiphambanweni
Nanifile eziphambekweni nasekungasokini kwenyama yenu, uNkulunkulu walenza niphile kanye noKristu, esenithethelele zonke iziphambeko zethu, 14 sesesule umthetho olotshiweyo wezimiso, sayisusa imibhalo eyayisivimbela, sayisusa. wababethela esiphambanweni. — Kolose 2:13-14
【6】 UJesu wayibhidliza, futhi uma ephinda eyakha uyoba isoni
Uma ngibuye ngakhe lokho engikudilizile, kungubufakazi bokuthi ngiyisoni. --Engeza isahluko 2 ivesi 18

( qwashisa : UJesu wabethelwa esiphambanweni futhi wafa ngenxa yezono zethu, esebenzisa umzimba wakhe ukuze aqede amagqubu, okungukuthi, ukuchitha izimiso zomthetho futhi esula okulotshwe emithethweni (okungukuthi, yonke imithetho neziqondiso ezazisilahla. ), Susa imibhalo esihlaselayo futhi esivimbelayo (okungukuthi, ubufakazi bosathane esibeka icala) futhi uyibethele esiphambanweni uma othile “efundisa abadala, abefundisi, noma abashumayeli ngalokho abakwenzayo,” abazalwane futhi odade bayobuyela eTestamenteni Elidala futhi baboshwe ngaphansi komthetho [ukulalela imithetho neziqondiso] Laba bantu benza izono futhi benza okubi bangabakadeveli neqembu likaSathane futhi abanayo imfuyo. [UJesu wanikela ngokuphila kwakhe ukuze akuhlenge ngaphansi komthetho; imithetho kanye nokuzibopha ngaphansi komthetho kufakazela ukuthi uyisoni laba bantu abakayiqondi insindiso kaKristu, ivangeli, abakazalwa ngokusha, abakawamukeli uMoya oNgcwele, futhi bakhohliswa ngamaphutha. )

【Misa isivumelwano esisha】

Izimiso zakuqala, zibuthakathaka futhi ziyize, zaqedwa (umthetho awufezanga lutho), kwase kufakwa ithemba elingcono, esingasondela ngalo kuNkulunkulu. — Hebheru 7:18-19

Umthetho wamisa obuthakathaka abe ngumpristi omkhulu; — Hebheru 7:28

Waba umpristi, hhayi ngokwezimiso zenyama, kodwa ngokwamandla okuphila okungapheli (okwakuqala, okungabhubhi). — Hebheru 7:16

Inkonzo manje enikezwa uJesu ingengcono, njengoba nje engumlamuleli wesivumelwano esingcono, esamiswa ngesisekelo sezithembiso ezingcono. Uma bekungekho sici esivumelwaneni sokuqala, bekungeke kube khona ithemba lesivumelwano sakamuva. — Hebheru 8:6-7

“Yilesi isivumelwano engiyosenza nabo emva kwalezo zinsuku, isho iNkosi: Ngiyakuloba imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngiyibeke phakathi kwabo kanye neziphambeko zabo.” Manje njengoba lezi zono sezithethelelwe, akusadingeki kube nemihlatshelo yezono. — Hebheru 10:16-18 .

Usenza sikwazi ukukhonza njengezikhonzi zalesi sivumelwano esisha, hhayi ngombhalo kodwa ngomoya; —2 Korinte 3:6

(Qaphela: Imibhalo ayinakuphila futhi ibangela ukufa. Abantu abangenaye uMoya oNgcwele ngeke baliqonde nhlobo iBhayibheli; umoya unokuphila okuphilayo. Abantu abanoMoya oNgcwele bahumusha izinto zikamoya. Umoya womthetho kaKristu Uyincazelo uthando, futhi uthando lukaKristu luguqula izwi elilotshiwe libe ukuphila futhi liguqule abafileyo babe izinto eziphilayo. Lona umoya (noma ukuhumusha: uMoya oNgcwele) owenza abantu baphile.

Isikhundla sompristi sishintshiwe, Umthetho nawo kumele ushintshe. — Hebheru 7:12

【Umthetho ka-Adamu, umthetho wakhe, umthetho kaMose】 Shintsha ku 【Umthetho Wothando LukaKristu】

1 Umuthi wokuhle nokubi ushintsho umuthi wokuphila 13 izindawo ushintsho okwasezulwini

【UJesu usivulele indlela entsha nephilayo】

UJesu wathi: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami

Bazalwane, njengoba sinethemba lokungena eNgcwelengcwele ngegazi likaJesu, kungendlela entsha nephilayo esivulelwe yona ngeveyili elingumzimba wakhe. — Hebheru 10:19-22

Uma abezizwe abangenawo umthetho benza izinto zomthetho ngokwemvelo yabo, nakuba bengenawo umthetho, bona ngokwabo bangumthetho. Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi umsebenzi womthetho uqoshwe ezinhliziyweni zabo, izingqondo zabo zokuhle nokubi zifakaza ndawonye, futhi imicabango yabo iyaqhudelana, okuhle noma okubi. — Roma 2:14-15

( Qaphela: AbeZizwe abanawo umthetho oshiwo ngokucacile, ngakho bathembele kunembeza wabo ukuba benze izinto zomthetho, futhi benza ngokuvumelana noMthetho kaMose; kaMose Phumani → ningene kuKristu" uthando "Umthetho. AmaKristu aphila ngoMoya oNgcwele, ngakho kufanele ahambe ngoMoya oNgcwele. unembeza Uma usuhlanziwe, awusazizwa unecala. "Akukho ukuncika Umthetho KaMose “Isenzo.”—Galathiya 5:25; Hebheru 10:2

[Umsebenzi womthetho wakho]

(1) Zibaze okuhle nokubi enhliziyweni yakho;

Ngenxa yokuthi isono sihlukanisa abantu noNkulunkulu, wonke umuntu emhlabeni wenza ngokuvumelana nonembeza wakhe futhi ulandela intando ka-Adamu yokuhlukanisa phakathi kokuhle nokubi Lona umsebenzi womthetho ka-Adamu oqoshwe enhliziyweni yawo wonke umuntu.

(2) Yenza ngokuvumelana nonembeza:

Abantu bavame ukuthi, uphi unembeza wakho? Impela engenanhliziyo. Angenzanga lutho olubi, anginasono, futhi angizisoli.

(3) Ukusolwa ngonembeza:

Uma wenza okuthile okuphambene nonembeza wakho, unembeza wakho uyobekwa icala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

(4) Ukulahlekelwa unembeza:

Inhliziyo yomuntu inenkohliso ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto futhi imbi ngokwedlulele. —Jeremiya 17:9
Njengoba unembeza ungasekho, umuntu uzitika ngenkanuko futhi wenza yonke inhlobo yokungcola. — Efesu 4:19
Kulowo ongcolile nongakholwa, akukho lutho oluhlanzekile, ngisho nenhliziyo yakhe noma unembeza wakhe.— Thithu 1:15

[Umthetho kanembeza womuntu uveza isono somuntu]

Kuvela ukuthi ulaka lukaNkulunkulu lwembulwa luvela ezulwini kubo bonke abantu abangamhloniphi uNkulunkulu nabangalungile, labo abenza izinto ezingalungile nabathiya iqiniso. Lokho okukwaziwa ngoNkulunkulu kusezinhliziyweni zabo, ngoba uNkulunkulu ukwambulile kubo... 29 egcwele ukungalungi, nobubi, nokuhaha, nenzondo, egcwele umona, nombulali, nokuxabana, nenkohliso, nenhlamba; inhlebi, ozonda uNkulunkulu, ozidlayo, ozidlayo, ozidlayo, umqambi wezinto ezimbi, ongalaleli abazali, ongenalwazi, owephula izivumelwano, ongenalo uthando lomndeni, ongenazwelo kwabanye. Lanxa besazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubahlulele ukuthi abenza izinto ezinjalo bafanele ukufa, kabagcini ngokuzenza bona, kodwa bakhuthaza labanye ukuthi bazenze. — Roma 1:1-32

[UNkulunkulu wahlulela izono zomuntu eziyimfihlo ngokwevangeli]

Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi umsebenzi womthetho uqoshwe ezinhliziyweni zabo, izingqondo zabo zokuhle nokubi zifakaza ndawonye, futhi imicabango yabo iyaqhudelana, okuhle noma okubi. ) Ngosuku uNkulunkulu ayokwahlulela ngalo izimfihlo zomuntu ngoJesu Kristu, ngokwalokho ivangeli lami elikushoyo → Uyokwahlulela abangakholwayo ngosuku lokugcina “ngendlela yeqiniso” kaJesu Kristu. —Bheka kwabaseRoma 2:15-16 kanye neSivumelwano 12:48

"Ungacabanga ukuthi umuthi muhle ( Kubhekiselwa emthini wokuphila ), isithelo sihle; Umuthi wokuhle nokubi ), isithelo naso sibi; Izinhlobo zezinyoka ezinobuthi! Njengoba ningabantu ababi, ningasho kanjani okuhle na? Ngokuba umlomo ukhuluma ngokuchichima kwenhliziyo. Umuntu omuhle ukhipha izinto ezinhle engcebweni enhle yenhliziyo yakhe; “Kepha ngithi kini: Wonke amazwi ayize umuntu awakhulumayo uyakuzilandisa ngawo ngosuku lokwahlulelwa; ”— Mathewu 12:33-37

( umuthi omubi Kubhekiselwa esihlahleni sokuhle nokubi Labo abazalwa empandeni ka-Adamu bonke bangabantu ababi. umuthi ungcoliswe izinyoka ezinobuthi njengama-virus, ngakho-ke labo abazalwa bangakwazi ukwenza okubi futhi bathele izithelo ezimbi, isithelo sokufa;

umuthi omuhle Kubhekiselwa emthini wokuphila, okusho ukuthi izimpande zomuthi kaKristu zinhle, futhi isithelo esisithelayo singukuphila nokuthula. Ngakho-ke, impande yomuntu olungile ingukuphila kukaKristu, futhi umuntu omuhle, okungukuthi, umuntu olungileyo, uyothela kuphela isithelo sikaMoya oNgcwele. Amen! Ngakho, ingabe uyaqonda ngokucacile? )

articles.title: Umthetho KaMose
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Asivule iBhayibheli Fundani u-Eksodusi 34:27 ndawonye: “UJehova wathi kuMose: “Loba lawa mazwi, ngokuba njengalaba ngenza isivumelwano nawe nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli; thina esiphila lapha namuhla . —Duteronomi 5 ivesi 3

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Umthetho KaMose 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" uthumela izisebenzi - ngezandla zabo babhala futhi bakhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qondani ukuthi umthetho kaMose uyisithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo nomfundisi osiholela kuKristu ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa kuJesu Kristu. . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

[UMthetho KaMose] - umthetho obekwe ngokucacile

ENtabeni yaseSinayi, uNkulunkulu wanika isizwe sakwa-Israyeli umthetho, umthetho wezimiso zenyama emhlabeni, obizwa nangokuthi uMthetho KaMose.

【UNkulunkulu wenza isivumelwano nama-Israyeli】

UJehova wathi kuMose: “Loba lawa mazwi, ngokuba ngalawa ngisesivumelwano sami nawe nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli.”
UMose wahlala noJehova izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku obungamashumi amane, engadli, engaphuzi. UJehova waloba amazwi esivumelwano, iMithetho Eyishumi, ezibhebheni ezimbili. — Eksodusi 34:27-28
UJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wenza isivumelwano nathi eHorebe. — Duteronomi 5:2
Lesi sivumelwano asenziwanga nawokhokho bethu, kodwa nathi esisekhona lapha namuhla. —Duteronomi 5 ivesi 3

[UMthetho KaMose uhlanganisa:]

(1) IMithetho Eyishumi- Eksodusi 20:1-17
(2) Imithetho- Levitikusi 18:4
(3) Isimiso- Levitikusi 18:5

· · · njll. Kukhona abangenele abangu-613 sebebonke!

【Gcina imiyalo futhi uzobusiswa】

“Uma ulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, uqaphele ukwenza yonke imiyalo yakhe engikuyala ngayo namuhla, uyakukumisa phezu kwezizwe zonke emhlabeni, uma ulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ziyakuza kuwe, zikulandele, zibe phezu kwakho: uyakubusiswa emzini, ubusiswe esithelweni sesisu sakho, esithelweni sezwe lakho; ngenzalo yezinkomo zenu, nangamathole enu, nangamawundlu enu, niyakubusiswa ekuphumeni kwenu, nibusiswe ekungeneni kwenu. 6.

【Ukwephula isivumelwano kuzoholela esiqalekisweni】

Uma ungalilaleli izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, ungagcini nokulalela yonke imiyalo yakhe nezimiso zakhe engikuyala ngakho namuhla, zonke lezi ziqalekiso ziyakulandela, zikwehlele...uyakuba ngaphansi kwesiqalekiso. Uqalekisiwe, nawe uqalekisiwe. — Duteronomi 28:15-19

Noma ubani ongagcini emazwini alo mthetho uyoqalekiswa! ’ Bonke abantu bayothi, ‘Amen! ’”—Dut. 27:26

1 UJehova uyakwehlisela phezu kwakho iziqalekiso, nokuhlupheka, nesijeziso kuwo wonke umsebenzi wezandla zakho ngenxa yezenzo zakho ezimbi omnike zona, uze ubhujiswe, ubhubhe ngokushesha. —Duteronomi 28:20
2 UJehova uyakwenza ukuba isifo sinamathele kuwe aze akubhubhise ezweni owangena kulo ukulidla. —Duteronomi 28:21
3 UJehova uyakuphendula imvula efika ezweni lakho ibe uthuli nothuli, yehlele phezu kwakho ivela ezulwini, uze ubhujiswe. — Duteronomi 28:24
4 UJehova uyakukuhlasela ngesifo sofuba, nangomkhuhlane, nangomlilo, nangomalaleveva, nangenkemba, nangokoma, nangesikhutha. zonke lezi ziyokusukela uze ubhujiswe. — Duteronomi 28:22
5 Zonke lezi ziqalekiso ziyakulandela, zikufice uze ubhujiswe....—Duteronomi 28:45

7 Bayakudla isithelo sezinkomo zakho nezithelo zezwe lakho uze ubhubhe. Amabele akho, newayini lakho elisha, namafutha enu, namathole enu, namawundlu enu, akuyikwaphulwa kini, nize nibhujiswe. —Duteronomi 28:51
8 Futhi zonke izinhlobo zezifo nezinhlupho ezingalotshiwe kule ncwadi yomthetho ziyokwehliselwa phezu kwakho uze ubhubhe. —Duteronomi 28:61
9 Uyakwahlukaniswa kuzo zonke izizwe zakwa-Israyeli njengazo zonke iziqalekiso ezilotshwe encwadini yomthetho nasesivumelwaneni, ajeziswe. —Duteronomi 29:21
10 Ngibiza izulu nomhlaba ukuba kube ngofakazi kini namuhla;

Isexwayiso: Ngakho, bazalwane, yazini lokhu: ngalowo kushunyayelwa kini ukuthethelelwa kwezono. Kulowo muntu niyakulungisiswa ngomthetho kaMose enikholwa ngakho kukho konke eningalungisiswa kukho. Ngakho qaphelani, funa phezu kwenu okulotshwe kubaprofethi. —Bheka izEnzo 13:38-40

Inyoka yathi kowesifazane: “Aniyikufa nokufa, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyazi ukuthi mhla nizidla, ayovuleka amehlo enu, nibe njengonkulunkulu, nazi okuhle nokubi.” isithelo salowo muthi sasilungele ukudliwa, sibukeka kubantu, amehlo ayebukeka, ehlakaniphile; wayesethatha isithelo, wasidla, wanika umyeni wakhe, naye wasidla. U-Adamu wayengumfanekiso womuntu owayezofika. — Roma 5: Isahluko 12-14

Hoseya 6:7 “Kodwa bafana U-Adamu waphula isivumelwano , wangikhohlisa endaweni.

Icala liwukugwetshwa ngumuntu oyedwa]

Ifa! Aphi amandla akho okunqoba? Ifa! Luphi udosi lwakho? Udosi lokufa yisono, futhi amandla esono umthetho. — 1 Korinte 15:55-56

Futhi kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa emva kokufa]

Ngokudalelwa, wonke umuntu umiselwe ukufa kanye, futhi ngemva kokufa kuyoba khona ukwahlulelwa. — Hebheru 9:27

(Isixwayiso: Umthetho ka-Adamu waletha isono esiholela ekufeni kwawo wonke umuntu, kodwa amabandla amaningi awawunaki, kunalokho afundisa abazalwane nodade ukuba bagcine umthetho kaMose. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi bakhohliswa uSathane. . Uma u-Adamu ephula lo mthetho, kuyoholela ekufeni “Isiqalekiso” sezono zethu asikaxazululwa thina beZizwe sigxumela esiqalekisweni soMthetho kaMose: “Uma uwe kwenye yazo, wephule yonke into? bona” futhi niyowela ngempela ekwahlulelweni okukhulu kosuku lokugcina.” Isiqalekiso “ukufa phezu kokufa” - bheka uJude 1:12. articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo emndenini kaNkulunkulu! Amen.

Masivule iBhayibheli kuJakobe 4:12 futhi sifunde ndawonye: Munye umniki-mthetho nomahluleli, lowo onamandla okusindisa nokubhubhisa. Ungubani wena ukuba wahlulele abanye?

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Imithetho Emine Eyinhloko YeBhayibheli 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! "Owesifazane olungileyo" → wathumela izisebenzi ngezandla zabo, ezilotshwe futhi zashunyayelwa, ngezwi leqiniso, eliyivangeli lensindiso yakho. Ukudla kuhanjiswa kusuka esibhakabhakeni kude futhi kunikezwa kithi ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu okungokomoya kucebe! Amen. Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda imisebenzi nezinjongo zemithetho emine esemqoka eBhayibhelini . Amen!

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

Kunemithetho emine eyinhloko eBhayibhelini:

【Umthetho ka-Adamu】-Ungadli

UJehova uNkulunkulu wamyala wathi: “Ungadla kuwo wonke umuthi wensimu ngokuthanda kwakho, kodwa ungadli kuwo umuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ngoba mhla udla kuwo uyakufa nokufa. Genesise 2 16- Isigaba 17

[UMthetho KaMose] - Imithetho ebeka ngokucacile amaJuda ukuba ayigcine

UNkulunkulu wamemezela umthetho eNtabeni yaseSinayi futhi wawunikeza isizwe sakwa-Israyeli Umthetho wasemhlabeni ubizwa nangokuthi uMthetho kaMose. Kuhlanganisa neMithetho Eyishumi, imithetho, izimiso, uhlelo lwetabernakele, imithetho yemihlatshelo, imikhosi, izithombe ezibaziweyo zenyanga, amaSabatha, iminyaka... njalo njalo. Kukhona abangenele abangu-613 sebebonke! —Bheka u-Eksodusi 20:1-17, uLevitikusi, uDuteronomi.

【Owami umthetho】-Umthetho wabezizwe

Uma abezizwe abangenawo umthetho benza okungokomthetho ngokwemvelo yabo, bengenawo umthetho; Ungumthetho wakho . Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi umsebenzi womthetho uqoshwe ezinhliziyweni zabo, futhi umuzwa wabo wokulungile nokungalungile uyafakaza. , futhi imicabango yabo iyaqhudelana, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi okulungile noma okungalungile. ) ngosuku uNkulunkulu ayokwahlulela ngalo izimfihlo zabantu ngoJesu Kristu ngokwevangeli lami. — Roma 2:14-16 . (Kungabonakala ukuthi imibono yokuhle nokubi iqoshwe ezingqondweni zabeZizwe, okungukuthi, umthetho ka-Adamu uthathwa njengolungile noma ongalungile. Unembeza usola wonke umuntu ngokuhle nokubi, okuhle nokubi, okuyizinto ezingalungile eqoshwe kunembeza wabezizwe.

【Umthetho kaKristu】Umthetho kaKristu uluthando na?

Thwalisanani imithwalo yenu, nizawugcwalisa kanjalo umthetho kaKristu. --Engeza isahluko 6 ivesi 2
Ngoba wonke umthetho ugoqwe kulomusho othi: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena. --Engeza isahluko 5 ivesi 14
UNkulunkulu uyasithanda, futhi siyakwazi futhi siyakukholwa. UNkulunkulu uluthando; ohlala othandweni uhlala kuNkulunkulu, noNkulunkulu uhlala kuye. — 1 Johane 4:16

(Qaphela: Umthetho ka-Adamu - umthetho kaMose - umthetho kanembeza, okungukuthi, umthetho wabezizwe, umthetho ongowezimiso zenyama emhlabeni; umthetho kaKristu uluthando! Ukuthanda umakhelwane wakho njengoba uzithanda kudlula yonke imithetho yasemhlabeni. )

[Inhloso yokusungula imithetho] ?-Yembula ubungcwele bukaNkulunkulu, ubulungisa, uthando, isihe nomusa!

【Umsebenzi Womthetho】

(1) Bagwebe abantu ngesono

Ngakho-ke akukho nyama engalungisiswa phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngemisebenzi yomthetho, ngokuba umthetho ulahla abantu ngesono. — Roma 3:20

(2) Yandisa iziphambeko

Umthetho wenezelwa ukuze iziphambeko zande; — Roma 5:20

(3) Ukuvalela wonke umuntu esonweni futhi abaqaphe

Kodwa ibhayibheli livalele bonke abantu esonweni... Ingakafiki imfundiso yokusindiswa ngokukholwa, sasigcinwa phansi komthetho kuze kube sekwambulweni kokukholwa esikhathini esizayo. --Engeza isahluko 3 amavesi 22-23

(4) amise wonke umuntu umlomo

Siyazi ukuthi konke okungokomthetho kubhekiselwa kwabaphansi komthetho, ukuze yonke imilomo ivinjwe, izwe lonke libe phansi kwesahlulelo sikaNkulunkulu. — Roma 3:19

(5) Gcina wonke umuntu ekungalalelini

Nanike ningamlaleli uNkulunkulu, kodwa manje senihawukelwe ngenxa yokungalaleli kwabo. …Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ubeke bonke abantu phansi kokungalaleli ukuze abe nesihe kubo bonke. — Roma 11:30, 32

(6) Umthetho unguthisha wethu

Ngokunjalo umthetho ungumfundisi wethu, usiholela kuKristu, ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa. Kodwa njengoba isimiso sokusindiswa ngokukholwa sesifikile, asisekho ngaphansi kwesandla seNkosi. --Engeza isahluko 3 amavesi 24-25

(7) ukuze izibusiso ezithenjisiweyo zinikwe abakholwayo

Kodwa iBhayibheli libophela bonke abantu esonweni, ukuze izibusiso ezithenjisiwe ngokukholwa kuJesu Kristu zinikwe abakholwayo. —Galathiya isahluko 3 ivesi 22

Nabekwa uphawu kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso, lapho nani nikholwa kuKristu lapho nizwa izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu. LoMoya oNgcwele uyisibambiso (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) sefa lethu kuze kube yilapho abantu bakaNkulunkulu (umbhalo wokuqala: ifa) behlengwa kube udumo lwenkazimulo Yakhe. —Bheka eyabase-Efesu 1:13-14 noJohane 3:16.

kulungile! Namuhla ngithanda ukuhlanganyela nani nonke lapha. Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuphefumulelwa kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke! Amen

articles.title: Owesifazane u-Eva ufanekisela ibandla
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula emndenini wami othandekayo, bafowethu nodadewethu! Amen.

Masivule amaBhayibheli ethu kweyabase-Efesu 5:30-32 futhi siyifunde ndawonye: Ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (eminye imiqulu yasendulo inezela: amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe).

Ngenxa yalokhu indoda iyakushiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayakuba nyamanye. Le yimfihlakalo enkulu, kepha ngikhuluma ngoKristu nebandla .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane " Owesifazane u-Eva ufanekisela ibandla 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! " owesifazane oqotho "Ibandla lithumela izisebenzi → ngezwi leqiniso elilotshiwe futhi elakhulunywa ngezandla zabo, okuyivangeli lensindiso yethu. Amen! Isinkwa silethwa kude ezulwini ukuze sisinikeze sona ngesikhathi esifanele sokuphila kwethu okungokomoya Sichichima Kakhulu Amen.

Thandaza ukuthi iNkosi uJesu iqhubeke nokukhanyisa amehlo ethu omoya futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze siqonde iBhayibheli ukuze sizwe futhi sibone amaqiniso kamoya. Qonda ukuthi owesifazane u-Eva ufanekisela ibandla .

Imikhuleko engenhla, ukunxusa, ukuncenga, ukubonga, nezibusiso! Lokhu ngikucela egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen.

【1】U-Adamu ufanekisela uKristu

Masifunde iBhayibheli kuGenesise 2:4-8 futhi sikufunde ndawonye → Imvelaphi yokudalwa kwezulu nomhlaba Mhla uJehova uNkulunkulu edala izulu nomhlaba, kwakungenjalo endle, nemifino yasendle yayingakamili, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wayengakakhuli imvula emhlabathini, kungabe kusalima muntu, kepha kuvuka inkungu emhlabathini, imanzise izwe. UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. UJehova uNkulunkulu watshala insimu e-Edene ngasempumalanga, wambeka lapho umuntu amdalayo.

[Qaphela]: Imvelaphi yokudala kukaJehova uNkulunkulu izulu nomhlaba Ngosuku lwesithupha lokudalwa kukaJesu, uNkulunkulu wadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wakhe, owesilisa nowesifazane. Bheka uGenesise 1:27 . UJehova uNkulunkulu wambumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlabathi, waphefumulela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila, waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo, igama lakhe lalingu-Adamu. (Lapha "umoya" ungaba "inyama")
U-Adamu ukhona umfanekiso →Lifanekisela uKristu, futhi u-Adamu wokugcina ungu Ngempela →Ibhekisela kuKristu! Amen. Bheka amaRoma 5:14 neyoku-1 Korinte 15:44-45.

【2】Owesifazane u-Eva ufanekisela ibandla

Genesise 2 Isahluko 18-24 UJehova uNkulunkulu wathi: “Akukuhle ukuba umuntu u-Adamu ahlale yedwa. Ngizomenzela umsizi, futhi uJehova wamehlisela ubuthongo obunzima, walala. lala “Emehlweni abantu, lisho “ukufa”; emehlweni kaNkulunkulu, lisho ukulala!” Ngokwesibonelo, uJesu eTestamenteni Elisha wathi: “ULazaru wami walala, okusho ukuthi uLazaru ufile.” INkosi yenza ukuba u-Adamu alale. "lala", wafikelwa ubuthongo obukhulu ". lala ". Lifanekisela u-Adamu wokugcina weTestamente Elisha, "uJesu," owabethelwa futhi wafa ngenxa yezono zethu, "walala" futhi wangcwatshwa ethuneni; kwase kuphuma olunye lwezimbambo zakhe futhi inyama yavalwa. INkosi uNkulunkulu isebenzisa lowo muntu" U-Adamu "Izimbambo ezithathwe emzimbeni zenza eyodwa" owesifazane "," owesifazane "" ingumfanekiso "womlobokazi", okungukuthi, iBandla likaJesu Kristu - "umlobokazi" kusAmbulo Isahluko 19, ivesi 7. "Ubambo uJehova uNkulunkulu aluthatha ku-Adamu ukuze adale" "owesifazane" uhlobo lweTestamente Elisha uJesu Ngaye Umzimba "udala" " Omusha "Yibandla, ibandla likamoya. Amen! Niyaqonda kahle na? Bheka kwabase-Efesu 2 Isahluko 15 noJohane Isahluko 2 Amavesi 19-21 "UJesu wenza umzimba wakhe ube yithempeli."

Genesise 2:23-24 Indoda yathi, “Lo uyithambo lamathambo ami nenyama yenyama yami. Ungambiza ngokuthi ngowesifazane, ngoba uthathwe endodeni.” “Umuntu omusha” ungumzimba kaKristu, futhi ngamunye wethu uyilungu lamathambo kaKristu nenyama yenyama yakhe? , ivesi 27.

Ngakho-ke indoda iyoshiya uyise nonina inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayoba nyamanye. Kufanekisa ukuthi “umuntu omusha” ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uyoshiya umuntu omdala ka-Adamu owazalwa ngenyama yabazali bakhe, ahlanganiswe nomkakhe, noma “umlobokazi, umakoti, ibandla” likaKristu, okuyilo umzimba kaJesu Kristu Wena noKristu niyoba umzimba munye umsingathi ibandla likaJesu Krestu Amen! Ngakho, uyaqonda? Bheka eyabase-Efesu 5:30-32 . Ngakho-ke, “u-Eva wesifazane” eTestamenteni Elidala ufanekisela “iBandla lamaKrestu” eTestamenteni Elisha! Amen.

articles.title: IBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu (1)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ukuthula kubo bonke abafowethu nodadewethu abathandekayo! Amen.

Masivule [iBhayibheli] kweyabase-Efesu 1:23, siyiphenye futhi sifunde ndawonye: IBandla liwumzimba Wakhe, ogcwaliswe nguye ogcwalisa konke kukho konke.

nabaseKolose 1:18 futhi uyinhloko yomzimba webandla. Uyisiqalo, ngowokuqala ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngowokuqala kuzo zonke izinto .

Namuhla sizofunda, sihlanganyele, futhi sabelane "INkosi" ibandla likaJesu Krestu 》Umkhuleko: Abba othandekayo, Baba oNgcwele waseZulwini, iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, siyabonga ukuthi uMoya oNgcwele uhlala enathi! Amen. Ngiyabonga Nkosi! “Owesifazane olungileyo” eNkosini uJesu ibandla Thumela izisebenzi, ezibhala ngezandla zazo futhi zikhulume izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lensindiso yethu. Ukudla sinikezwa ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze senze ukuphila kwethu kucebe. Amen! Sengathi iNkosi uJesu ingaqhubeka nokukhanyisa amehlo emiphefumulo yethu futhi ivule izingqondo zethu ukuze sibone futhi sizwe amaqiniso angokomoya futhi siqonde amazwi kamoya [eBhayibheli]! Qonda ukuthi “owesifazane, umakoti, unkosikazi, umakoti, owesifazane olungileyo” ufanekisela [ibandla] ibandla eNkosini uJesu Kristu! Amen . [IBandla] lingumzimba kaJesu Kristu, futhi thina singamalungu akhe. Amen! Imithandazo, ukubonga, kanye nezibusiso ngalokhu okungenhla! Egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu! Amen

【1】IBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu

IBandla leNkosi uJesu Kristu:

Kungabuye kubizwe ngokuthi « ibandla likaJesu Krestu »

IBandla likaJesu Kristu:

UJesu Kristu uyitshe legumbi eliyinhloko, akha phezu kwesisekelo sabaphostoli nabaprofethi. Amen!

Bukela ku: 1 KwabaseThesalonika 1:1 UPhawuli loSilasi loThimothi balobela ibandla laseThesalonika elikuNkulunkulu uBaba laseNkosini uJesu Khristu. Kwangathi umusa nokuthula makube kini! neyabase-Efesu 2:19-22

Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe

Masifunde iBhayibheli futhi sifunde kwabase-Efesu 1:23 ndawonye: Ibandla lingumzimba wakhe, ukugcwala kwalowo ogcwalisa konke kukho konke.

KwabaseKolose 1:18 futhi uyinhloko yomzimba webandla. Uyisiqalo, ngowokuqala ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze abe ngowokuqala kuzo zonke izinto.

[Qaphela:] Ngokuhlola imibhalo egciniwe engenhla, singathola: ibandla ] ungumzimba kaJesu Kristu, ogcwaliswe ngaye ogcwalisa konke kukho konke. Amen! UyiZwi, iSiqalo, nokuVuka kwabafileyo kuwo wonke umzimba weBandla. Ngokwamandla amakhulu awawasebenzisayo emzimbeni kaKristu, wamvusa kwabafileyo futhi wamenza waba kabusha.” Omusha ’—Bheka eyabase-Efesu 2:15 “Yenza omunye uwedwa” Omusha "Nokuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuzalwa kabusha" thina "-Bheka ku-1 Petru 1: 3. KuKristu" wonke umuntu “Bonke bayovuswa futhi - bheka eyoku-1 Korinte 15:22. Abasanda kufika, thina, wonke umuntu "Bonke bakhomba [ ibandla ] Umzimba kaJesu Kristu uqobo wakusho lokho, ngoba singamalungu omzimba! Amen. Ngakho, uyaqonda!

[2] Ibandla lakhelwe phezu kwedwala lomoya likaKristu

Masifunde iBhayibheli ngokukaMathewu 16:18 futhi ngithi kuwe: Wena unguPetru, futhi phezu kwaleli dwala ngizokwakha ibandla lami; Waphinda waphuza amanzi angokomoya njengaku-1 Korinte 10:4. Lokhu abakuphuzayo kuvela kulokho okubalandelayo Idwala lomoya; .

[Qaphela:] Ngokutadisha imibhalo engenhla, sibhala ukuthi iNkosi uJesu yathi kuPetru: “Ngizothatha okwami [ ibandla ] eyakhelwe phezu kwaleli dwala, leli" idwala "ibhekisela ku- idwala elingokomoya ], Lokho" idwala "Lowo nguKristu." idwala "Kuyisingathekiso futhi "amatshe aphilayo nezinsika eziphambili"! UJehova uyitshe eliphilayo, noma elahlwa ngabantu, ukhethiwe futhi uligugu nguNkulunkulu. Uma ufika kuJehova, nawe uyakwakhiwa. njengamatshe aphilayo Indlu kamoya ikhonza njengompristi ongcwele, enikela imihlatshelo yomoya eyamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu ngoJesu Kristu.

【3】Singamalungu ebandla

Masifunde eyabase-Efesu 5:30-32 eBhayibhelini. Ngoba singamalungu omzimba wakhe (Eminye imiqulu yasendulo iyengeza ngokuthi: Just Ngamathambo akhe nenyama yakhe ). Ngenxa yalokhu indoda iyakushiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, futhi laba ababili bayakuba nyamanye. Le yimfihlakalo enkulu, kepha ngikhuluma ngoKristu nebandla. Nokho, yilowo nalowo kini makathande umkakho njengoba ezithanda wena. Inkosikazi kufanele ihloniphe nomyeni wayo.

［ Qaphela: 】Ngifunde imibhalo engenhla ukuze ngibhale ukuthi sithola isihe nothando olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu uBaba! Nizalwe kabusha ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo” thina "ibhekisela ku [isonto] , ibandla yebo Umzimba kaKristu, singamalungu akhe ! Njengoba nje iNkosi uJesu yasho: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi nidle inyama yeNdodana yomuntu futhi niphuze igazi leNdodana yomuntu, aninakuphila kini. Lowo odla inyama yami futhi aphuze igazi lami lilokuphila okuphakade." , mina ngiyakumvusa ngosuku lokugcina. Inyama yami iwukudla ngempela, negazi lami liwukuphuza. Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, uhlala kimi, nami kuye Johane 6. Isahluko 53-56. Lapho sidla futhi siphuza inyama negazi leNkosi, sinomzimba nokuphila kukaJesu Kristu ngaphakathi kwethu, ngakho singamalungu omzimba wakhe! Ithambo lamathambo akhe nenyama yenyama yakhe. Amen.

Ngakho-ke indoda kufanele ishiye abazali bayo, okungukuthi, " hamba "Ukuzalwa kubazali - ukuphila okuyisono emzimbeni ka-Adamu; futhi" unkosikazi “Ukuhlangana kuwukuba [ ibandla ] sebehlangene, laba ababili baba munye.
